verse_text: Abraham Ccapaw, David Ccapaw Jesu Kri a thokeinaw ciihan ccauh.
Abraham nynh Isaak a saah, te Isaak nynh Jakob a saah, te Jakob nynh Judah te a uno`ae a saah.
Te Judah nynh a zu Tamar kyate Farez te Zerah a saah, te Farez nynh Hezron a saah, Hezron nynh Ram a saah.
Te Ram nynh Amminadab a saah, te Amminadab nynh Nahshon a saah, te Nahshon nynh Salmon a saah.
Te Salmon nynh a zu Rahab kyate Boaz a saah, te Boaz nynh Ruth kyate Obed a saah, te Obed nynh Jessi a saah.
Te Jessi nynh siapharan David a saah, te siapharan David nynh Uriah zu lang phe a tang vae paw nopinung kyate Solomon a saah.
Te Solomon nynh Rehoboam a saah, te Rehoboam nynh Abija a saah, te Abija nynh Asa a saah.
Te Asa nynh Jehoshafat a saah, te Jehoshafat nynh Jehoram a saah, te Jehoram nynh Uzziah a saah.
Te Uzziah nynh Jotham a saah, te Jotham nynh Ahaz a saah, te Ahaz nynh Hezekiah a saah.
Te Hezekiah nynh Manasseh a saah, te Manasseh nynh Amon a saah, te Amon nynh Josiah a saah.
Te Josiah nynh Jekoniah te a uno`ae kha a saah. Tuh ccyh loukaw khe nynh Jew`ae kha Babilon lang a cciakhae`ae.
Te minmin kha Babilon lang a cciakhae`ae koute Jekoniah nynh Shealtiel a saah, Shealtiel nynh Zerubbabel a saah.
Te Zerubbabel nynh Abiud a saah, te Abiud nynh Eliakim a saah, te Eliakim nynh Azor a saah.
Te Azor nynh Zadok a saah, te Zadok nynh Akhim a saah, te Akhim nynh Eliud a saah.
Te Eliud nynh Eliazar a saah, te Eliazar nynh Matthan a saah, te Matthan nynh Jakob a saah.
Te Jakob nynh Meri a vawpaw Josef a saah, tuh-e nung kyate nynh Kri acikuh paw Jesu tuh a pui.

Tukeiccu Abraham kyate David kyacia she balyn tuh she haw laepali, te David kyate Babilon lang see lang cciakhaenaw kyacia she haw laepali, te Babilon lang see lang cciakhaenaw kyate Kri kyacia she haw laepali acih.
Atu Jesu Kri puinaw tuh hynhte nynh athua: A nung Meri tuh Josef zu lang hawpah`ae zah minmin pynkheihlan a umkheih`ae maw khe, aning tuh Thyaa Muisaw ccaaw a poi.
Te a vawpaw Josef tuh adingpaw ccungccaw athua thyhhawte kha-e nung kha zapi malang maethyasah lan ry khyh zah amaw kha aphi te zya mya lan a tuaku.

Thuasalama hynh-e uccaw`ae kong a tua lyakhe, dotua, a maan kya Bawipaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a kya yn langkuh zah, “David ccapaw Josef, na zu Meri kha namaw kalan hoeiku lanpaw rih nan, pawccecize a kya a poi paw ccaaw kha Thyaa Muisaw kya-e nynh thua.
Te aning nynh Ccapaw lukheit yn saah cih zah Jesu cite a min na phu cih, pawccecize aning nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha mih seinaw`ae kyate a khum cih`ae,” a cipya.
Bawipaw nynh profeh kyate a hopaw accing nawlan nynh atu hynh-e balyn tuh acyikuh. Tuh-e a hopaw tuh:
“Dotua, liaccady nynh ccaaw a poi cih zah Ccapaw a saah cih, te minmin nynh a min kha Immanuel cite a phu cih`ae,” tuh-e asuilan tuh, “Pachia kaening ryte a um,” cipaw nynh thua a ci.
Oute Josef tuh inaw kyate tho zah Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a hopya hawte cyih zah a kalan a zu kha a hoeiku.
Te a ccatawccaaw phe a pui cia kha-e nung kha ikhae khyh, te Josef nynh a min kha Jesu cite a phu.
Atu Herod nynh siapharan lang a tang ccyh lya Judea pee Bethlehem khua kya Jesu he a pui tuh, dotua, nithua langte mihaw`ae nynh Jerusalem lang oun thua`ae zah,
“A pui paw Jew`ae Siapharan tuh teisangmou a um? Pawccecize nithua langkhe amaw awsi kha phe kae muih zah amaw beik khylan nynh kae thua,” a ci`ae.
Hynh-e kong kha siapharan Herod nynh he a thae tuh a thinphang, te amaw ryte Jerusalem ccungccaw`ae balyn mih thinphang.
Te aning nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw`ae kyaze kawbya ccangpatu`ae balyn kha pynkheihlan a suelua`ae koute, Kri tuh teisangmou a pui cih cipaw kha a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Judea pee Bethlehem kya nynh thua; pawccecize profeh kyate hynhte azeikuh:
‘Judah ram kya Bethlehem nang tuh Judah uktu`ae lakuze adih huaccepaw na thua khyh, pawccecize nang na kyate ka ccungccaw Israel`ae a ring lanpaw ram Uktu yn pou cih,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Herod nynh mihaw`ae kha aphiru lante zya ko`ae zah paw ccyh kya mou awsi alangku cite minmin kha akaw-aleih a khia`ae.
Te minmin kha Bethlehem lang saw`ae zah, “La cceih oh lah imohpaw kha thawmawte oun ccung oh, te he nae muih oh te nae hopah bua cih oh, kae mah kae cceihbua cih zah ka beik bua ccaw,” a cipya`ae.
Siapharan bya he a thae`ae koute minmin tuh a pou`ae; te dotua, nithua lang-e a muih`ae paw awsi tuh mih malang khe a cceih. Imohpaw a umnaw luki kya a thua tuh a thadyn.
Minmin nynh awsi kha he a muih`ae tuh myaryasangkae mih lungtua.

Te minmin nynh inn lungkhu he thua`ae tuh Imohpaw kha a nung Meri ryte a muih`ae, te bakhung`ae zah amaw kha a beik`ae; te minmin nynh mih sisua`ae kha hung`ae zah lasung`ae sui, frankinsens te mura kha amaw a pya`ae.
Te minmin tuh Herod kalan a ki vae khyh nawlan`ae Pachia nynh mih maan kya raeringnaw a pya`ae thyhte, minmin tuh mimaw ram lang ccangpaw laanpi langte nynh a ki`ae.

Te minmin he a pou`ae te, dotua, maan kya Bawipaw kyae vaaw ccungccapaw tuh Josef kya yn langkuh zah, “Thokuh lah Imohpaw kha laah lah a nung ryte Izip ram lang ccuekhae`ae, te bya kae hopya makhia tuin kyakhe la um, pawccecize Herod nynh Imohpaw kha chia khylan yn ccung vae cih,” a cipya.
Josef tuh thokuh zah Imohpaw te a nung kha hoei`ae zah khuazi khe Izip ram lang a poukhae`ae.
Te Herod a chi mawlaezung aning tuh tuin kya nynh a um. Ou tuhte, “Izip ram kyate ka Ccapaw kha phe ka ko vae,” cite Bawipaw nynh profeh kyate a hopaw accing nawlan nynh thua.

Oute mihaw`ae nynh phe yn ling vae`ae cipaw kha Herod nynh he a nyh tuh myaryamaw a thinria, te ccungccaw saw zah mihaw`ae kha akaw-aleih a khiasah`ae paw accyh thyhhawte, Bethlehem kya te tuh-e area balyn kya um paw, kum ning te akaw lang-e pise imua`ae balyn kha marya a chiasah`ae.
Oute profeh Jeremiah nynh a hosyapaw bya tuh accing vae. A hopaw tuh:
“Ramah kya rawnaw te khuinaw te thinlung phe koi paw rawkhuinaw roi tuh thae athua, Rachel tuh a ccaaw`ae a um vae khyh keiccuze rah zah soihbiaku ry vae khyh,” a ci.
Thuasalama Herod he a chih tuh, dotua, Izip ram kyakhe Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh maan kyate Josef kalan yn langkuh zah,
“Thokuh lah Imohpaw te a nung kha laah`ae lah Israel ram lang cceih ccavae, pawccecize Imohpaw hiinnaw a ccung`ae paw tuh phe chih vae`ae,” a cipya.
Te Josef tuh thokuh zah Imohpaw te a nung kha cciakhae`ae zah Israel ram lungkhu lang a thua`ae.

Thuasalama Judea ram kya Arkhelaus nynh a paaw Herod hanpaw a uk cipaw kha Josef nynh he a thae tuh tuh-e kalan ccia lan phe a rih; tuhzemah maan kya Pachia nynh raeringnaw phe a pya vae thyhte, Galilee pee sang kheit lungkhu lang aning tuh a maeleihkuh.
Te, “Aning tuh Nazarethpaw cite ko athua cih,” acikuh paw profeh`ae nynh a ho`ae paw accing nawlan aning tuh Nazareth acikuh paw khua kya thua zah tuin kyakhe a um vae.
Ccyh khaw aro koute Baptisma pyatu Johan tuh yn thua zah Judea pee rangkaw khe phungho zah,
“Nanning ngaesikuh oh, pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh anae vae,” a ci.
Pawccecize e paw tuh profeh Isaiah nynh, “Rangkaw kya a sia paw roi nynh, ‘BAWIPAW a ccianaw kha paccynpah oh, A laanpi`ae kha lawbabinlan raepah oh,’ ” cite a honuathepaw kha nynh thua.
Te Johan tuh kalauk ming te rae paw uccaw kha lawkuh zah a tae kya saving taesung kha a sungku; te a aepaw tuh tungkhipaw`ae te rangkaw e khoitui nynh thua.
Oute Jerusalem e, Judea pee e te Jordan pepan e ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Johan kalan oun thua`ae zah,
mih seinaw`ae kha phykute Jordan vaw khe amaw kya baptisma a in`ae.

Thuasalama Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae patae nynh baptisma-in khylan oun thua`ae paw kha Johan nynh he a muih tuh minmin kha hynhte a cipya`ae, “Pou fuparepaw ciihan`ae, yn thua vae cih paw thinrianaw kyate ccue khylan hung nynh mou nanning kha raering ae pya oh?
Tukeiccu ngaesikunaw te angaekuhpaw athae`ae kha oun thuakhae oh,
te naemaw te naemaw kya, ‘Kaening tuh paaw lang Abraham kae hoi,’ cite ho lan tuakuh nan oh. Pawccecize Pachia tuh hynh-e lung`ae kyate Abraham a ccaaw`ae kha a pousah kho cipaw nanning kae hopya oh.
Te atu mah hae tuh thingku leihpaw kya nungde athua vae; tukeiccu ahoypaw athae thae leipaw thingku miakaw tuh nge thua zah maee lungkhu lang phung athua.

Ngaesikunaw hanlan kae nynh tui kya baptisma kae insah ccaccing oh; thuasalama kamaw koute yn thua lanpaw aning tuh kae laeze alesaehua, tuh-e paw a ccukoh ccyngpya lan kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh; aning nynh nanning kha Thyaa Muisaw kya te maee kya baptisma ae insah cih oh.
A kuih kya ccankung ccyng zah a sarahmin kha thyaapaping lang a cciccae cih, te a chanvui kha byng lungkhu lang a ruin cih, thuasalama asipaw kha tuh a chih kho leipaw maee te a u cih,” a ci.
Oute Jesu tuh baptisma-in khylan Galilee kyate Jordan vaw lang Johan kalan yn thua.
Thuasalama Johan nynh, “Kae khaw nang na kya-e baptisma-in lan ka ccan, nang nynh tou kae ka kalan nae cceih?” ci zah amaw kha a khee.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Atu ua, pawccecize dingnaw balyn marya accing nawlan ou tuhte aening hanlan accanpaw nynh thua,” a cipya. Oute Johan nynh amaw kha a ua.
Te baptisma-in koute Jesu tuh tui kyate taloi a pou. Te dotua, amaw hanlan vaawran tuh hungkuh zah Pachia Muisaw nynh vafu hawte yn rungbung zah Jesu tungvaw a ccu paw kha Johan nynh a muih.
Te vaekheihmawte vaawran kyate roi ccangkheit nynh, “E paw tuh ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw kya ka lungrythua,” a ci.
Oute diabolos nynh a tuh-ou ccaw cite rangkaw langkhe Muisaw nynh Jesu kha a cciakhae.
Te Jesu tuh nin sungpali te zi sungpali looh-ae he a sung tuh a vuelaw vae.
Te tuh-outu amaw kalan yn thua zah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw na thua ze hynh-e lung`ae hynh sanlou lang tang lan kawpyatua,” a cipya.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccathyaa kya, ‘Ccungccaw tuh sanlou kyalya te hiin lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia khalang kyate yn toikuh paw bya miakaw te nynh a hiin cih,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
Oute diabolos nynh Jesu kha athyaapaw khuapi lungkhu lang cciakhae thung zah tempal ahang huaccenaw tungvaw khe a umsah.

Te amaw kha, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw na thua ze namaw te namaw toikubung tua; pawccecize Ccathyaa kya, ‘Nang te asekuh lante Pachia nynh a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha kaw yn pya cih`ae,’ te ‘Lung kya na ccu na thuhku khyh nawlan minmin nynh mih kuih kya ae dua cih`ae,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “Ccathyaa kya, ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha nang nynh na syntawtua lan khyh,’ cite bua azeikuh,” a cipya.
Diabolos nynh myarya ahangpaw mua langkhe bua cciakhae thung zah laephipi peenaw`ae te lesaenaw`ae balyn kha marya a muihsah.
Te amaw kha, “Na bakhung zah kamaw hynh nae beik lan thua ze hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh marya kae pya cih,” a cipya.
Oute Jesu nynh, “Setan, la cceih! Pawccecize Ccathyaa kya, ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha na beik cih zah amaw kyalya kha rya na lawpah cih,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
Oute diabolos nynh amaw kha a poutaw; te dotua, vaaw ccungccaw`ae oun thua`ae zah amaw kha a dooih`ae.
Johan kha thung a saw`ae cipaw Jesu nynh he a thae tuh Galilee pee lang a cceih.
Te Nazareth khua kha cciataw te rili phae pe Zebulun phin te Naftali phin ramri kya um paw Kapernaum khua kya thua zah tuin kyakhe a um.
Ou tuhte profeh Isaiah nynh a hopaw kha accing nawlan nynh thua. A hopaw tuh:
“Zebulun ram te Naftali ram, rili laanpi pe, Jordan vaw khuraw, Zenta`ae umnaw Galilee ram:
Mohnaw kya um paw ccungccaw`ae nynh alepaw awnaw kha a muih vae`ae. Te chinaw mynlyh te chinaw ram kya dahung`ae paw kya awnaw tuh yn langkuh vae,” a ci.
Tuh-e ccyh kyate Jesu nynh, “Ngaesikuh oh, pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh anae vae,” cite phungho lan a thotakaw vae.
Te Jesu nynh Galilee Rili pe a ccia lya Piter cite a ko`ae paw Simon te a neitaw Andru, uno luning rili lungkhu mia vua`ae paw kha a muih; pawccecize minmin tuh ngasaw kyngtu`ae nynh thua.
Te minmin kha, “Kamaw oun zui oh lah nanning kha ccungccaw kyngtu`ae lang kae rae cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh vaekheihmawte mih mia kha cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te tuin kyate he cceih`ae tuh ccangpaw uno luning, Zebedi ccapaw`ae James te a neitaw Johan tuh kohlung kya mih paaw Zebedi ryte mih mia a thue`ae paw kha muih zah minmin kha a ko`ae.
Te minmin nynh vaekheihmawte kohlung te mih paaw kha cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te Jesu tuh Galilee pee balyn po khuaccung zah mih sinakok`ae kya ccangpah`ae zah peenaw thehoypaw kha a hopya`ae, te ccungccaw`ae laku ccinaw aphuinphuin te ccihawnaw aphuinphuin kha a dansah`ae.

Te a thungpang tuh Siria pee balyn po pazaekuh; te raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw, a dung`ae paw, te mih kuihccuchih`ae paw, ccihawnaw aphuinphuin te myarya a ccih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae zah minmin kha marya a dansah`ae.
Te Galilee pee kyate, Dekapolis pee kyate, Jerusalem kyate, te Judea pee kyate, te Jordan vaw khuraw langte oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw zapi pi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh Jesu tuh mua muakheit kalan a kaethung; te he a dahung tuh a zuitu`ae amaw kalan oun thua`ae.
Te a khalang aw zah minmin kha hynhte a ccangpya`ae:
“Muisaw kya ryachi`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh minmin kyae nynh thua.
A rah a khui`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh soihbia athua cih`ae.
Lungne`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh laephi rho a ccou cih`ae.
Dingnaw elan vuelaw`ae zah tuihaw`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh bynsah athua cih`ae.
Ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh ngaethyaumsanaw a mue cih`ae.
Thinlung athyaa`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia kha a muih cih`ae.
Daenaw raetu`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae cite ko athua cih`ae.
Dingnaw keiccuze a tua a sah`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh minmin kya-e nynh thua.
“Kamaw keiccuze nanning kha ae sarya oh, ae tua ae sah oh zah ahme lei lante ahoy leipaw aphuinphuin ae honua vae oh ze, nanning tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
Lungtua oh lah myaryamaw nae lungpaw sah, pawccecize vaawran kya nae ryalaw mee tuh ale; pawccecize nanning maw-e profeh`ae kha mah minmin nynh tuhte a tua a sah`ae.

“Nanning tuh laephi loi nynh na thua oh; thuasalama loi nynh a enawpaw kha a zosah lanze pawcihtemou esah kho thua ung cih? Pawpaw elan sanmah hoy vae lan khyh, thuasalama dae vua lan zah ccungccaw ccu kaw syde lan nynh accan vae cih.
“Nanning tuh laephipi awnaw nynh na thua oh. Mua vawlan sak paw khua tuh thuru kho um khyh.
Ccungccaw`ae nynh maeekhua aw`ae zah kee khung he khyh`ae, thuasalama maee awnawpaw vawlan nynh a nung`ae, te inn kya um`ae paw balyn kha awnaw a pya.
Ahoypaw nae ryalaw`ae kha ccungccaw`ae nynh muih`ae zah vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw kha phu-esah nawlan`ae ccungccaw`ae malang nae awnaw kha awsah oh.
“Kawbya tukhyhze Profeh`ae bya ro khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua cite tua nan oh; kae tuh ro khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama ccingsah khylan nynh kae thua.
Pawccecize byaccaccing kae hopya oh, vaawran te laephi azo cia, Kawbya abalynte accing makhia Kawbya kyaze adih huapaw ccafang te dyhsuapaw kha pawpawte mah roh lan khyh.

Tukeiccu hunghung zemah hynh-e kawpyapaw`ae kyaze adih huapaw ccangkheit kha a lue lanze, ccungccaw`ae kha mah tuhte a ccangpya ze, aning tuh vaawran peenaw kya adih huapaw nynh athua cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah kha-e`ae kha zui zah ming`ae kha a ccangpya ze aning tuh vaawran peenaw kya alepaw athua cih.
Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, nae dingnaw nynh kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae dingnaw kha alue khyh lanze pawpawte mah nanning tuh vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang na tee lan khyh oh.
“ ‘Ccungccaw na theih lan khyh, hunghung zemah a theih paw tuh byapianaw kha a tung cih,’ cite kawbya nynh langmaw lya a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.

Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah akonglang um leite a unopaw kha a thinrianuapaw tuh byapianaw kha a tung cih, te hunghung zemah a unopaw kha, ‘Raka!’ a cih paw tuh kungsi zung kya byapia athua cih, te hunghung zemah a unopaw kha, ‘Nang tuh mingaeepaw!’ a cih paw tuh kehenna maee kya-e runaw kha a mue cih.
Tukeiccu silawhang kalan na lasung kha nae ccyng vae ze, te na unopaw nynh nang ae rawse lanpaw kha khe kya na nyku lanze;
silawhang malang khe na lasung kha cciataw lah la cceih, masaty na unopaw kya ccawkunaw kha rae lah oute rang lah na lasung kha pya.

“Nang ae rawsetupaw ryte laanpi kya na cciakheih lya oh khe, arangte ccawkuh oh, tukhyh lanze ae rawsetupaw nynh byapiatu kalan ae ah cih zah byapiatu nynh thung uktu kalan ae ah cih, te nang kha thung ae saw cih`ae.
Byaccaccing kae hopya, na rung lanpaw kuadron phuapia phe ccing lang na rung mawlaezung thunginn kyate na pou lan khyh.
“ ‘Milae zu milae vawpaw na seikhae lan khyh,’ cite langmaw lya a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.
Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah nopinung kha seikhae rynaw te a do lanze a thinlung kya khae nung ryte seinaw phe a rae vae.
Te na ranglang mit nynh ae seisah ze, poh khoi lah na kyate dae vua; pawccecize na pyn balynte hell lungkhu lang vua na thua lae tuh na pyn kya-e ccangkhakheit aro lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
Te na ranglang kuih nynh ae seisah ze thoh tya lah na kyate dae vua; pawccecize na pyn balynte hell lungkhu lang vua na thua lae tuh na pyn kya-e ccangkhakheit aro lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.
“ ‘Hunghung zemah a zu kha a mya lanze myakunawpaw ccaw kha kha-e nung kha pyasah,’ cite phe a ho vae`ae.

Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah ohhuakunaw keiccu thua leite a zu kha a mya lanze kha-e nung kha milae vawpaw kya a seisahpaw nynh thua; te hunghung zemah a mya`ae paw nopinung kha zu lang a umkhaepaw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua.
“Tuh-e koute, ‘Ahme leite bya na kinkuh lan khyh, thuasalama na byakinkupaw kha Bawipaw malang na tynsah hahe cih,’ cite langmaw lya a ho`ae paw kha mah phe na thae vae oh.
Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, kharyh byakinkuh nan oh, vaawran phyate mah byakinkuh nan oh, pawccecize tuh-e tuh Pachia kya-e suitungkhung nynh thua;
laephi phyate mah byakinkuh nan oh, pawccecize hynh-e tuh a ccusy nynh thua; Jerusalem phyate mah byakinkuh nan oh, pawccecize tuh-e tuh alesaepaw Siapharan kya-e khualipi nynh thua.
Na lu phyate mah byakinkuh nan, pawccemacize na sang ccangkheit sanmah na rawsah kho khyh, na mangsah kho khyh.
Thuasalama na ho paw tuh ‘athua’ ze ‘athua,’ ‘thua khyh’ ze ‘thua khyh,’ na ci cih; pawccecize pawpaw bya zemah hynh-e`ae laelan tuh ahoy leipaw kyate nynh yn thua.
“ ‘Mit ccangkheit hanlan mit ccangkheit, te haw ccangkheit hanlan haw ccangkheit,’ cite a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.
Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, mihoy leipaw kha la khee nan oh, thuasalama hunghung nynh zemah na ranglang byaki kha ae bia ze, hawkheit lang kha mah la tuapakuh.
Te lukhakheit nynh tazaeccoi ae ry zah na angki kha a lawku ze, na angkile kha mah va lawku bia sah.
Te hung nynh zemah me kheit ccia lan ae riase ze amaw ryte me ning la cceih oh.
Nang ae ngiakuh paw ccungccaw kha la pya, te na kya-e koi lan ae ry paw kyate la maeleihtawkuh nan.
“ ‘Na innpaw kha na sungsah cih zah na rhawpaw kha na hua cih’ cite a ho`ae paw kha phe na thae vae oh.

Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, nae rhaw`ae kha sungsah oh, nanning thya ae law oh paw kha hythuapya oh, nanning ae hua oh paw kha ahoypaw cyipah oh, te nanning kha ae sarya oh zah ae tua ae sah oh paw hanlan sawsangpah oh.
Ou tuhte nanning tuh vaawran a um paw nae Paaw ccaaw`ae na thua ccaw oh; pawccecize ahoy leipaw te ahoypaw ccungccaw tungvaw a khuanin kha pawsah zah adingpaw te ading leipaw tungvaw khua a rawsah.
Pawccecize nanning ae sungsah oh paw kyalya kha na sungsah oh ze amee pawmou na mue cih oh? Nguntokhoi`ae paw nynh hei tuhhawte cyih khyh`ae tou?
Te na uno`ae kyalya kha na beih`ae ze ming`ae laeze pawmou na cyi hua? Nguntokhoi`ae paw nynh hei tuhte cyih khyh`ae tou?
Tukeiccu vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw tuh accing hawte nanning mah la ccing oh.
“Ccungccaw`ae nynh muihku khylan minmin malang ryachi bawngnaw na pya khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh; tukhyh lanze vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw kya-e amee na mue lan khyh oh.

Tukeiccu ryachi bawngnaw he na pya vae ze cyihruh`ae nynh sinakok`ae kya te laanpi`ae kyakhe ccungccaw`ae kya-e phuesanaw ccou khylan a cyi`ae hawte na malang mungkae la tu nan. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, minmin tuh mih ryalaw mee kha phe a mue vae`ae.
Thuasalama ryachi bawngnaw he na pya vae ze na ranglang kuih nynh paw nynh a cyi cipaw kha na voilang kuih la nysah nan.
Ou tuhte ryachi bawngnaw na pya paw kha hung nynh san a ny khyh ccaw; te aphirute cyipaw a muih paw na Paaw amaw ccaccei nynh raerae muih lante amee kha ae pya cih.

“Te saw he na sang vae ze cyihruh`ae hawte la cyih nan; pawccecize minmin tuh sinakok`ae kya, te laanpi`ae atungkunaw kya ccungccaw`ae nynh muihku khylan thadyn lante nynh sawsang a ry`ae. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, minmin tuh mih ryalaw mee phe a mue vae`ae.

Thuasalama nang tuh saw he na sang vae ze na khaan lungkhu lang tee lah na thuakaw he na khaw te, muih leipaw kya um paw na Paaw kalan khe sawsang, te aphirute cyipaw a muih paw na Paaw nynh raerae muih lante amee kha ae pya cih.
Thuasalama saw he na sang vae oh ze lawki`ae nynh a cyi`ae hawte accakaepaw bya pei hothuipaw kha mang nan oh; pawccecize minmin nynh patae a ho`ae paw liate oun thaepah hua cih`ae cite a tuaku`ae.
Tukeiccu nanning tuh minmin hawte cyih bua nan oh; pawccecize nae Paaw nynh paw uccaw`ae nynh nanning elan aho cipaw amaw na ngia maw oh phe a ny vae.
Tukeiccu hynhcihte sawsang oh: Vaawran kya um paw kaening Paaw, na min sawtuanaw um sah.
Na peenaw thua ccavae sah. Vaawran kya na rynaw acyikuh hawte laephi vawlan cyikuh bua sah.
Nin takyh kae ae paw looh atunin kaening oun pyabua.
Te kae tungvaw a sei`ae paw kae ngaethya`ae hawte kae seinaw kha oun ngaethyabua.
Te tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang oun cciakhae nan, thuasalama ahoy leipaw kyate oun khumtua. Pawccecize peenaw, lesaenaw te phu-enaw tuh zungzae na kya-e nynh thua. Amen.
“Pawccecize nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae cyiseinaw kha na ngaethya oh ze vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh mah nanning kha ae ngaethya cih oh.
Thuasalama nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae cyiseinaw kha na ngaethya khyh oh ze, nae Paaw nynh mah nanning cyiseinaw kha ae ngaethya lan khyh oh.

“Tuhlaeze looh-ae he na sung vae oh ze, cyihruh`ae hawte a ngaethahpaw maesue te la um nan oh; pawccecize minmin tuh ccungccaw`ae malang looh-ae a sung paw hawte langku khylan mih maesue kha a umsaku`ae. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, minmin tuh mih ryalaw mee kha phe a mue vae`ae.
Thuasalama nang looh-ae he na sung vae ze na lu kha sathothuhkuh lah na mae la phikuh.

Ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae malang looh-aesung paw hawte na langku khyh ccaw, thuasalama muih leipaw kya a um paw na Paaw malang na langkuh cih; te aphirute cyipaw a muih paw na Paaw nynh raerae muih lante amee kha ae pya cih.
“Laehaw te chihhang nynh a ronaw te miruh`ae nynh kiabia`ae zah a runaw`ae laephi vawlan naemaw hanlan sisua`ae kha ccykuh nan oh.
Thuasalama laehaw te chihhang nynh mah a ro leinaw, te miruh`ae nynh mah a kiabia leinaw`ae te a ru leinaw`ae vaawran kyakhe naemaw elan sisua`ae kha ccykuh oh.
Pawccecize nae sisua umnaw kya nae thinlung mah a umbua cih.
“Pyn kya-e awnaw tuh mit nynh thua; tukeiccu na mit tuh ahoy lanze na pyn balyn tuh awnaw te phe beih cih.
Thuasalama na mit ahoy khyh ze na pyn balyn tuh mohnaw te phe beih cih. Tukeiccu nang na kya um paw awnaw tuh mohnaw athua ze tuh-e mohnaw tuh pawcih babang mou ale!

“Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah bawi luning ryalawpah kho khyh; pawccecize bawi lukheit kha a hua ze lukheit kha a sungsah cih; tukhyhze lukheitpaw kalan a pang ze lukheitpaw kha pawlangria leite a um cih. Nanning nynh Pachia te phuasui kha rya na lawpah kho khyh oh.

“Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, pawmou kae ae cih, tukhyhze pawmou kae nia ngaw cite nae hiinnaw hanlan nae lungriathae nan sah. Te pawmou kae lawkuh cih cite nae pyn hanlan nae lungriathae nan sah. Hiinnaw tuh aepaw laeze sunghua khyh tou? Te uccaw laeze pyn tuh sunghua khyh tou?

Vaaw lang-e pavaw`ae khu dotua oh. Minmin tuh ccaciivua khyh`ae, looh mah rue khyh`ae, ccunginn lungkhu lang mah ruinkuh khyh`ae; tuhzemah vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh minmin kha a dang`ae. Nanning tuh minmin laeze patae nae phutehua khyh tou?
Nanning lakuze hungmou thinphangnaw liate amaw a hangnaw kha dung kheit a hangchih sakuh khopaw um?
“Tukeiccu pawccemou uccaw hanlan nae lungvawsaw? Rangkaw e lilipaw`ae kha pawcihte nynh a lethung`ae cipaw tuatua oh; minmin tuh loopho khyh`ae, laaw mah sukuh khyh`ae.
Tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, Solomon a phu-enaw balyn nynh heize lilipaw ccangkheit tuhte ccaankuh kho khyh.

Tukeiccu, pou zynnaw azya`ae paw nanning, atunin um zah awkhualan tahkuamaee lungkhu lang phung athua paw rangkaw-e lonua hei kha Pachia nynh tuhte a ccaan lanze, nanning kha tuhlaeze houh ae ccaan lan khyh oh tou?
Tukeiccu, ‘Pawmou ah ae cih oh? Tukhyhze pawmou ah neih cih oh? Tukhyhze paw uccaw mou ah lawkuh cih oh?’ cite nae lungriathae nan sah.
Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh Zenta`ae nynh a ccung`ae paw nynh thua; pawccecize vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh nae hanlan aho cipaw phe a ny.
Thuasalama Pachia peenaw te a dingnaw kha masaty ccung oh, te hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kha pyachih na thua cih oh.
Tukeiccu awkhualan hanlan nae lungriathae nan sah, pawccecize awkhualan nynh amaw elan a lungriathae cih. Nin kheit hanlan kha-e nin e lungriathaenaw tuh phe azaw.
“Nanning tuh byapia na thua khyh nawlan oh ming`ae kha byapia nan oh.
Pawccecize na pianaw oh paw byapianaw thyhte naemaw kha byapia na thua cih oh; te na tounaw oh paw tounawpaw te naemaw kha toupya ru na thua cih oh.
“Te namaw mit kya um paw thingpyng kha tuaku leite pawccemou na unopaw mit kya um paw athupaw taraw kha na dopya?
Tukhyhze, namaw mit kya thingpyng phang a um pite, pawtemou na unopaw kha, ‘Na mit kya-e athupaw kha kae khoipah,’ na ci kho?
Nang cyihruhpaw! Masaty namaw mit kya-e thingpyng kha khoikuh tou; oute nynh na unopaw mit kya-e athupaw kha khoipya lan ccaerarihlan na muih cih.

“Athyaapaw uccaw kha ui`ae pya nan oh; nae kya-e pale`ae kha mah voh`ae malang sawpah nan oh, tuhte na cyi oh ze, minmin nynh mih ccu kaw a syde cih`ae, te ae maeleihnuakuh cih oh zah naemaw kha phe ae phia cih oh.
“Ngia oh lah pya na thua cih oh; ccung oh lah na muih cih oh; khua oh lah thuakaw hungpya na thua cih oh.
Pawccecize a ngia paw miakaw tuh a mue; te a ccung paw tuh a muih; te thuakaw a khua paw tuh hungpya athua cih.
“ Nanning lakuze lukhakheit kha a ccapaw nynh sanlou a ngiaku ze, lung kha a pya cih tou?
Tukhyhze ngasaw kha a ngiaku ze, fuparepaw kha pya ngaw ta?

Tuhte nanning na hoy lei oh pite nae ccaaw`ae kha ahoypaw lasung`ae pawtemou pya lan cipaw na ny oh lanze, vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw nynh amaw kalan a ngiakuh`ae paw kha ahoypaw uccaw`ae kha pawcihmou houh a pya cih`ae?
“Tukeiccu ccungccaw`ae nynh nae tungvaw cyih`ae sah cite na ry oh paw balyn kha minmin tungvaw tuhhawte cyih bua oh; pawccecize hynh-e tuh Kawbya te Profeh`ae ccauh nynh a ho`ae paw nynh thua.
“Abypaw koikua kyate tee oh; pawccecize ronaw kalan a cciakhae paw koikua te laanpi tuh ako, te tuh-e kya a tee paw ccungccaw`ae tuh patae acih.
Pawccemacize hiinnaw kalan a cciakhae paw koikua tuh by zah laanpi tuh aru, te tuh-e a muihkuh paw tuh azya.
“Tuuphua bongkute nae kalan oun thua`ae paw ahme leipaw profeh`ae kha la raeringkuh oh; pawccecize minmin tuh alungkhu lante arepaw suizaw`ae nynh thua`ae.
Minmin kha mih thae`ae liate nae nyh cih oh. Ccungccaw`ae nynh misu thae kha tahty ku`ae kyate lo`ae ta? Tukhyhze thaeku thae kha hingpawku`ae kyate lo`ae ta?
Tuh-e hawte ahoypaw thingku miakaw nynh ahoypaw thingthae kha a thae, thuasalama ahoy leipaw thingku nynh tuh ahoy leipaw thingthae kha nynh a thae.
Ahoypaw thingku nynh ahoy leipaw thingthae thae kho khyh, ahoy leipaw thingku nynh mah ahoypaw thingthae thae kho khyh.
Ahoypaw thingthae a thae leipaw thingku miakaw tuh nge thua zah maee lungkhu lang phung athua.
Tukeiccuze mih thae`ae liate kha-e ahme leipaw profeh`ae kha nae nyh cih oh.
“Kamaw kha, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw,’ cite yn ko paw miakaw nynh vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh`ae, thuasalama vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw rynaw a cyih paw nynh a tee cih.

Tuh-e nin kya ccungccaw patae nynh kamaw kha, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw, na min te profehbya kae ho khyh tou? Na min te raerangsaro kae dee khyh tou? Na min te khuaruaru lan um paw ryalaw patae kae cyih khyh tou?’ oun ci cih`ae.
Oute minmin kha, ‘Nanning kharyh kae nyh boi khyh oh, kawbya zui lei`ae paw nanning ka kyate pou oh,’ ka ci cih`ae.
“Tukeiccu hunghung zemah hynh-e ka hopaw bya`ae hynh thae zah a zui paw ccungccaw tuh lungpi vawlan a inn sakkuh paw ahawpaw ccungccaw te nynh ka losakuh cih.
Khua yn rah zah tui yn le, te khivae yn zaw zah tuh-e inn kha a mung; te kha-e inn tuh lungpi vawlan abingku keiccu pu khyh.
Te hynh-e ka hopaw bya`ae kha thae zah a zui leipaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh laesia vawlan a inn sakkuh paw angaeepaw ccungccaw te nynh alokuh cih.
Te khua yn rah zah tui yn le, te khivae yn zaw zah kha-e inn kha a mung, te kha-e inn tuh phe a pu. Te a pu paw tuh ale raria,” a ci.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu nynh a hopaw kha he a thangsah tuh a ccangpyanaw kya ccungccaw`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua.
Pawccecize aning nynh kawbya ccangpatu`ae hawte thua leite, kawhoinaw a hoi paw lukheit hawte minmin kha a ccangpya`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Mua kyate Jesu he a rungbung tuh ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te dotua, vaethyakaepaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha beik zah, “Bawipaw, na ry lanze kae hynh nae thyaasah kho,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh a kuih dyn zah kha-e paw kha hae zah, “Ka ry, nang thyaa ccavae,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte a vaethyaccinaw tuh phe athyaa.

Te Jesu nynh, “La raeringkuh, hung ccungccaw san la hopah nan; thuasalama la cceih lah ranpibawi kalan namaw kha la dosakuh; te ming`ae kalan ccaekia lang, Mawsi nynh kawpya thyhte silawkunaw kha la rae,” a cipya.
Te Kapernaum khua lungkhu lang Jesu he a tee tuh, rhawbawipaw lukheit amaw kalan yn thua zah,
“Bawipaw, ka rya yn lawpatupaw tuh kuihccuchite ccih zah inn kya phang a huekuh, myarya a ccih,” cite amaw kha a ngiaku.
Te Jesu nynh, “Kae cceih cih zah ka dansah cih,” a cipya.
Rhawbawipaw nynh khung zah, “Bawipaw, ka inn lungkhu lang nang tee lante kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh; thuasalama bya kawkheit kyalya ho lah ka rya yn lawpatupaw tuh a dan cih.

Pawccecize kae mah kawhoinaw zakaw um paw ccungccaw lukheit nynh ka thua, kamaw kuihkaw rhawkaw`ae ka hoi; te lukheitpaw kha, ‘Cceih,’ ka ci ze a cceih; te ccangpaw kha, ‘Rang,’ ka ci ze yn thua; te ka rya yn lawpatu kha, ‘E hynh cyih,’ ka ci ze a cyih,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae tuh a ngaeangthua zah amaw a zui`ae paw kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynhcih alepaw zynnaw tuh Israel`ae kya heize ka muih boi khyh!
Te nanning kae hopya oh, ccungccaw patae tuh nithua langte niccaw langte oun thua cih`ae zah vaawran peenaw kya Abraham ry, Isaak ry, te Jakob ryte a dahung cih`ae.
Thuasalama peenaw ccaaw`ae tuh atolang mohnaw lungkhu lang vua athua cih`ae, tuin kya tuh rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh rhawbawipaw kha, “La cceih ccavae; na zyn hawte na hanlan cyipya athua cih,” a cipya. Te a ryalawpatu tuh tuh-e ccyh ccaccei kya phe a dan.
Te Jesu nynh Piter inn lungkhu lang he a tee tuh, Piter a zu nung tuh a ngesawling te ccih zah a huekupaw kha a muih.
Te Jesu nynh a kuih kha hae zah ngesawlingpaw kha-e nung tuh phe dan; te aning tuh thokuh zah minmin elan ryalawpah vae`ae.
Zete he a thua tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw ccungccaw patae kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae; te aning nynh bya te muisaw`ae kha dee zah ngeccih`ae balyn kha a dansah`ae.
Ou tuhte profeh Isaiah nynh, “Amaw nynh aening nyaanaw`ae kha laah zah aening ccinaw`ae kha a phu,” cite a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
Te Jesu nynh a pepan e ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh khuraw lang zua lan kaw a pya`ae.
Te kawbya ccangpatu lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha, “Ccangpatupaw, na ccianaw miakaw lang kae zui cih,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh amaw kha, “Rang-ui`ae nynh laekarung hoi`ae zah vaaw lang-e pavaw`ae nynh bu a hoi`ae; thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a lu nungnaw sanmah hoi khyh,” a cipya.
Te ccangpaw a zuitupaw nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, masaty ka la cceih sah lah ka paaw kha ka la uh hin sah,” a cipya.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Kamaw yn zui, a chih`ae paw nynh mih michi`ae kha la uh`ae sah,” a cipya.
Te Jesu kohlung lungkhu lang he a tee tuh a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te dotua, rili kya kohlung kha tuileih nynh pung vu lang ciate myarya arupaw khise yn tho, thuasalama Jesu tuh a itheih.
Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun cceih`ae zah amaw kha tho`ae zah, “Bawipaw, kaening oun khumbua! Kae chih vae cih!” a cipya`ae.
Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Pou zynnaw azya`ae paw nanning, pawccemou na ri oh?” a cipya`ae. Oute thokuh zah khise te rili kha a pe, tetuh daebabi vae.
Te ccungccaw`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E paw hynh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw pei, khise te rili nynh heize a kaw a ngae`ae?” a ci`ae.

Te khuhlangraw Kadarene ram lungkhu lang Jesu he a thua tuh raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw ccungccaw luning nynh shawku kyate oun pou`ae zah amaw te a tungkuh`ae; minmin tuh myarya rero`ae keiccu hung ccungccaw sanmah tuh-e laanpi langte cceihngan khyh`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Pachia Ccapaw Jesu, nang kha kaening nynh paw kae cyi mou? Accyh azaw maw kaening hynh vawsaw pya khylan tou hynhlang nae thua?” cite a sia`ae.
Te minmin kyate hary asawnaw lang voh patae`ae phu kheit rangpaekuh`ae paw a um.
Tukeiccu raerangsaro`ae nynh, “Nang nynh kaening hynh nae dee lanze, voh`ae lungkhu lang tee lan oun ua,” cite amaw kha a ngiaku`ae.

Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Cceih oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh pou`ae zah voh`ae lungkhu lang a tee`ae; te dotua, voh`ae tuh mih balynte apangnaw lang thawmawte ccuebung`ae zah rili lungkhu lang pung a phungkuh`ae, te tui kya pung a chih`ae.
Te voh a laetu`ae tuh ccue`ae zah khua lungkhu lang a cceih`ae, te raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw kya acyikuh paw balyn kha a hopya`ae.
Te khuaccaw`ae balyn nynh Jesu te tungku khylan oun pou`ae zah amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh mih ram kyate a pou nawlan amaw kha a ngia`ae.
Te Jesu tuh kohlung lungkhu lang tee zah khuraw po zua zah amaw a khua lang a thua.

Te dotua, iphae vawlan phang i paw a kuihccuchihpaw kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae. Te Jesu nynh mih zynnaw kha he muih tuh, a kuihccuchihpaw kha, “Ka ccapaw, na thawmuin sah, na seinaw tuh ngaethya athua vae,” a cipya.
Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang nynh, “E paw hynh Pachia saryate bya a ho!” cite mih thinlung kya a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh mih tuanaw`ae kha nyte, “Pawccemou nae thinlung kya ahoy leipaw na tua oh?
‘Na seinaw tuh ngaethya athua vae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua? Tukhyhze, ‘Thokuh lah cceih ccavae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua? Paw hynh mou azoihua?

Thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh laephi vawlan seinaw ngaethya lan kawhoinaw a hoi cipaw na ny nawlan oh,” ci zah, kuihccuchihpaw kha, ‘Thokuh, na iphae kha lawkuh lah na inn lang cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
Te aning tuh thokuh zah a inn lang a cceih vae.
Thuasalama ccungccaw zapi nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah khatahawpaw thungnaw ccungccaw`ae a pyatupaw Pachia kha thehoysah`ae.
Te tuin kyate Jesu po a pou tuh Matthai acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit ngunto khoinaw kya a dahung paw kha a muih. Te Jesu nynh, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya. Te aning nynh thokuh zah amaw kha a zui.
Ou tuhcihte inn kya Jesu tuh ae lan ccaboi kya he a dahung tuh, dotua, nguntokhoi`ae paw patae te misei`ae oun thua`ae zah Jesu te a zuitu`ae ryte a dahungkheih`ae.
Te Farasi`ae nynh he a muih`ae tuh, a zuitu`ae kha, “Pawccemou nae ccangpatupaw hynh nguntokhoi`ae paw te misei`ae ryte a aekheih`ae?” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae tuh minmin kha, “A dan`ae paw nynh sibawi peki khyh`ae, thuasalama a ccih`ae paw nynh a peki`ae.

Thuasalama la cceih oh lah, ‘Kae tuh silawkunaw ka ry khyh, ngaethya-umsanaw nynh ka ry,’ acikuh paw kha na nythya nawlan oh la ccangkuh oh. Pawccecize kae tuh adingpaw ko khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama misei`ae nynh a ngaesiku ccaw`ae cite nynh kae thua,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Johan zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Pawccemou kaening te Farasi`ae tuh atu te atu looh-ae kae sung, thuasalama nang na zuitu`ae tuh looh-aesung khyh`ae rei?” a ci`ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Zudy ccangvaepaw tuh a uno`ae ryte a um lungkhu balyn tuh-e a uno`ae tuh mih ngaethah kho ngaw ta? Thuasalama zudy ccangvaepaw kha minmin kyate lawpya nin ccyh yn thua cih, oute minmin tuh looh-ae oun sung vae cih`ae.
Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah arynpaw uccaw kha athawpaw boeibia te bia boi khyh, tuhte a bia lanze bianawpaw nynh arynpaw uccaw kha po laah zah houh aseikuh paleih vae.

Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah athawpaw misutui kha arynpaw misu-saving bung lungkhu lang ruin boi khyh, tuhte a ruin lanze misu-saving bung tuh apaw cih zah misutui tuh azu cih, te misu-saving bung mah aroh cih; thuasalama athawpaw misutui tuh athawpaw misu-saving bung lungkhu lang nynh a ruin`ae, tuhte tuh paryh akhyn`ae,” a cipya`ae.

Hynh-e bya`ae kha minmin kya a hopya`ae cciamang lyakhe, dotua, uktupaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha beik zah, “Ka ccanung tuh atumaw khe nynh a chi, thuasalama rang lah a tungvaw na kuih khang lah aning tuh a hiin cih,” a cipya.
Te Jesu tuh thokuh zah kha-e paw kha a zui, te a zuitu`ae mah a zuikuh bua`ae.
Te dotua, kum haw laening chii lua ccinaw a hoi paw nopinung lukheit amaw nuhlang yn thua zah a boei rae kha a hae.
Pawccecize a boei kha me ka hae ze, kae phe ka dan cih cite a thinlung kyate a tuaku.

Thuasalama Jesu nynh maeleihkuh zah kha-e nung kha he a muih tuh, “Ka ccanung, na thinphang nan sah, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae,” a cipya. Te nopinung tuh tuh-e suimilan ccyh kyate phe a dan vae.
Te uktupaw inn lungkhu lang Jesu he a thua tuh tyngdaw khua`ae paw te a sia a rua`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha muih zah,
“Pou hin oh, pawccecize imohnung tuh chih khyh, thuasalama a ih,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae. Te minmin nynh a nuinse`ae.
Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae he a pou`ae te aning tuh tee zah kha-e nung kha a kuih te tho zah imohnung tuh po a tho vae.
Te hynh-e thungpang tuh tuh-e ram lungkhu balyn po athaan.
Te tuin kyate Jesu he a pou tuh, mitmoh`ae luning nynh zui`ae zah, “David Ccapaw, kaening hynh ngaethya beih oun um sah!” cite a sia`ae.

Te inn lungkhu lang Jesu he a thua tuh mitmoh`ae tuh amaw kalan oun thua`ae; te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “E hynh cyi lan kae tuh a cyih kho cite na zyn oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Ou, kae zyn Bawipaw,” a ci`ae.
Oute aning nynh mih mit kha hae zah, “Nae zynnaw thyhte nae tungvaw cyikuh sah,” a cipya`ae.
Te mih mit`ae tuh oun aw vae; te Jesu nynh, “E hynh hung ccungccaw sanmah la nysah nan oh,” cite minmin kha tyntetyn lang byatawsya`ae.
Thuasalama minmin nynh he a pou`ae tuh amaw thungpang kha kha-e ram balyn kya pung pazaesaku`ae.
Minmin he a pou`ae tuh, dotua, raerangsaro bahkuhpaw bya ho kho leipaw ccungccaw lukheit kha Jesu kalan oun thuakhae`ae.
Te raerangsaro kha deepya he athua tuh, bya ho kho leipaw tuh bya yn ho vae; te ccungccaw zapi tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E tahawpaw Israel kya muihkuh boi khyh!” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Farasi`ae nynh, “Raerangsaro`ae uktupaw liate nynh raerangsaro`ae kha aning nynh a dee,” a ci`ae.

Te Jesu tuh khuapi`ae te khua taraw`ae balyn kalan po khuaccung zah mih sinakok`ae kyakhe a ccangpya`ae; te peenaw thehoypaw kha hopah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae mih ccinaw miakaw te ccihawnaw miakaw kha a dansah`ae.

Thuasalama Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh minmin kha ngaethya-umsah`ae, pawccemacize minmin tuh mih thawbang zah tuuringtu a hoi leipaw tuu`ae hawte phiariphiarae pung um`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Oute a zuitu`ae kha, “Loohrue lanpaw tuh alung ccaccing, thuasalama ryalahtu`ae tuh azya.
Tukeiccu loohruenaw kya-e Bawipaw nynh a loohruenaw lungkhu lang ryalahtu`ae yn saw`ae ccaw nanning sawsang oh,” a cipya`ae.

Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah minmin kha athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae tungvaw thungnaw te dee khonaw, te ccinaw aphuinphuin te ccihawnaw aphuinphuin balyn kha dansah khonaw kaw a pya`ae.
Locceihtu`ae luhaw laening min`ae tuh: masaty, Piter cite a ko`ae paw Simon, te a neitaw Andru, Zebedi ccapaw James, te a neitaw Johan;
Filip te Bartholomew; Thomas te nguntokhoipaw Matthai; Alfeas ccapaw James, te Thadde cikuh paw Lebbe;
Kanaan khua paw Simon, te Jesu a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria nynh thua`ae.
E luhaw laening hynh Jesu nynh saw`ae zah hynhte kaw a pya`ae: “Zenta`ae ccianaw kalan na cceih lan khyh oh, te Samaria`ae khua lungkhu lang na tee lan khyh oh.
Thuasalama Israel minphuin kyaze azopaw tuu`ae kalan palia la cceih oh.
Te na ccia vae oh ze, ‘Vaawran peenaw tuh anae vae,’ cite na la hopah cih oh.
Ngeccih`ae kha la dansah oh, vaethyakae`ae paw kha la thyaasah oh, a chih`ae paw kha la thosah oh, raerangsaro`ae kha la dee oh. Nanning tuh alakaw te nynh na mue oh, te alakaw te la pya oh.
Nae phuabu`ae kya sui thuasah, ngunphua thuasah, daw phua thuasah la sangkuh nan oh.
Nae khuaccungnaw hanlan sohrae, angki zung ning, ccukoh`ae te hoitang`ae mah phukuh nan oh; pawccecize ryalahtupaw tuh loohdang lan accan.
“Te pawtecihpaw khuapi, tukhyhze khua lungkhu lang nanning na tee vae oh ze, tuh-e kya hungmou angaekuh cipaw la khia oh lah tuin kyate na pou mawlaezung oh tuh-e paw inn kya la um oh.
Te nanning nynh inn lungkhu lang he na tee vae oh ze, ‘Daenaw um sah cite,’ la beih oh.
Te inn tuh angaeku ze nae kya-e daenaw tuh tuhe innbyn tungvaw la thua sah; thuasalama angaeku khyh ze, nae kya-e daenaw tuh naemaw kalan la ki sah.
Te hunghung zemah nanning kha innccung ae doih oh zah, nae bya kha mah a ngae khyh ze, tuh-e inn, tukhyhze tuhe khuapi kyate he na pou vae oh ze, nae ccu kya-e laenoi kha la pheihkuhsya oh.
Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, byapia nin kya tuh-e khuapi hanlan laeze Sodom te Komorah ram hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih.
“Dotua oh, suizaw`ae laku tuu`ae saw hawte nanning kha kae saw oh, tukeiccu nanning tuh fupaw`ae hawte nae lunghaw sah lah vafu`ae hawte nae lungne sah.
Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae kha la raeringkuh oh, pawccecize minmin nynh kungsi`ae kalan ae ah cih oh zah mih sinakok`ae kya ae bua cih oh.
Te minmin kalan te Zenta`ae kalan ccaekia na thua nawlan oh kamaw keiccuze ram uktu`ae te siapharan`ae malang nanning kha ae thuakhae cih oh.
Thuasalama minmin nynh he ae thuakhae vae oh ze, pawmou ka ho cih, tukhyhze pawtemou ka ho cih cipaw nae lungvawsaw nan sah. Pawccecize tuh-e ccyh ccaccei kya na ho lan oh paw kha pya athua cih.
Pawccecize a hotupaw tuh nanning thua khyh, thuasalama nae Paaw Pachia kya-e Muisaw nynh nanning kyate a ho.
“Te uno nynh a uno toulou kha chinaw kalan yn ah cih, te paaw nynh a ccaaw kha yn ah cih; te ccaaw`ae nynh nungpaaw`ae kha oun rawse cih`ae zah minmin kha oun chisah cih`ae.
Te kae ka min keiccuze ccungccaw balyn nynh nanning kha ae hua cih oh. Thuasalama athangnaw cia atynpaw ccungccaw tuh khum athua cih.

Thuasalama khua khuakheit kya nanning kha he ae tua ae sah vae oh ze, ccangpaw khua kalan la ccue oh; pawccecize byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thua maw nanning nynh Israel khua`ae kalan na cceih kou lan khyh oh.
“Zuitu tuh a ccangpatu luki um khyh, see mah a bawipaw luki um khyh.
Zuitu hanlan a ccangpatupaw hawte athua ze azaw vae, te see mah a bawipaw hawte athua ze azaw. Minmin nynh inn hoitu kha Beelzebub a ci`ae lanze a innbyn`ae kha pawcihmou houh a ci cih`ae!
“Tukeiccu minmin kha la rih nan oh; pawccecize langsaku lei lante phang khung paw pawsang um khyh, te ny lei lante thurupaw mah um khyh.
“Mohnaw kya kae hopya oh paw kha awnaw kya la ho oh, te nae nakaring kya na thae oh paw kha innccukaly langte la ho oh.
“Te pyn kha theih kho zah hiinnaw-muisaw a theih kho lei`ae paw kha la rih nan oh; thuasalama hiinnaw-muisaw te pyn kha paryhte hell kya aroh khopaw raw kha la rih oh.
Ccithya saning tuh daw phuapia piakheit lang zua thua khyh`ae ta? Te kha-e`ae sakheit sanmah nae Paaw kaw leite laekhu lang ccah lan khyh.
Te nae lu kya-e nae sang`ae kha marya ria athua.
Tukeiccu rih nan oh, nanning tuh ccithya`ae patae laeze nae phutehua.
“Tukeiccu hunghung zemah ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha ccaekia yn khan ze, kha-e paw kha vaawran um paw ka Paaw malang kae nynh mah ccaekia ka khanru cih.
Thuasalama hunghung zemah ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha yn vua paw tuh vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw malang kae nynh mah ka vuaru cih.
“Laephi vawlan daenaw thuakhae khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua cite tua nan oh, daenaw thuakhae khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama thaloi saw khylan nynh kae thua.
“Ccungccapaw kha a paaw rawsesah khylan, te ccanung kha a nung rawsesah khylan, te monung kha a ninnung rawsesah khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua.
Te ccungccapaw a rhaw`ae tuh amaw innbyn kya-e`ae nynh thua cih.
“Kamaw laeze a paaw, tukhyhze a nung a sungsah huapaw ccungccaw tuh kamaw te ngaekuh khyh; te kamaw laeze ccapaw te ccanung a sungsah huapaw ccungccaw tuh kamaw te ngaekuh khyh.
Te amaw a vaelantung puihku leite kamaw yn zui paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw te ngaekuh khyh.
A hiinnaw a muihkuh paw ccungccaw tuh hiinnaw kha a shung cih, te kamaw keiccuze a hiinnaw a shung paw ccungccaw tuh hiinnaw kha bua a muihkuh cih.
“Nanning kha ae thuasah oh paw tuh kamaw kha oun thuasah paw nynh thua, te kamaw oun thuasah paw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a thuasah paw nynh thua.

Profeh min te profeh lukheit kha a thuasah paw tuh profeh kya-e law mee kha a mue cih. Te adingpaw ccungccapaw min te adingpaw ccungccaw kha a thuasah paw tuh adingpaw ccungccapaw kya-e ryalaw mee kha a mue cih.

Te hunghung zemah zuitu lukheit min liate hynh-e imua`ae lukhakheit kha nia lanpaw tuikyaa banang nangkheit a pya lanze, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tuh-e paw tuh a ryalaw mee kha pawpawte mah shung lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte, Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha kawpya paw he a thangsah tuh, tuh-e area kya-e khua`ae kya ccangpya khylan te phungho khylan tuin kyate a pou vae.
Te Johan nynh thunginn kyate Kri a ryalaw`ae kong kha he a thae tuh, a zuitu`ae luning kha saw`ae zah,
Jesu kha, “Nang hynh yn thua lanpaw tuh na thua ta? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou kae la ngaehoi ung cih?” cite bya a khiasah`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah minmin kha, “La cceih oh lah na muih oh paw te na thae oh paw uccaw`ae kha Johan la hopah oh.

Mitmoh`ae nynh ngawmuih`ae zah ccukhou`ae nynh a cceih vae`ae, vaethyakae`ae paw a dan`ae, te nawpang`ae nynh nawthae`ae zah michi`ae tuh thosah athua vae`ae, te ryachi`ae kalan thehoypaw tuh hopya athua vae.
Te kae ka keiccuze a lungthang leipaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin he a pou`ae te Jesu nynh Johan konglang ccungccaw zapi kalan a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Nanning nynh paw do khylan mou rangkaw langkhe na ccia oh? Khivae nynh a he paw phaeku do khylan tou?
Tukhyhze paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Nebaleihpaw uccaw a lawkuh paw ccungccapaw do khylan tou? Dotua oh, nebaleihpaw uccaw a lawkuh`ae paw tuh siapharan inn kya nynh a um`ae.
Tukhyhze paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Profehpaw do khylan tou? Athua, nanning kae hopya oh, profeh lukheit lae heize alesaehua paw nynh athua.
Pawccecize, ‘Dotua, na malang na ccianaw a paccyn cih paw ka zeccuetu kha na malang ka saw,’ cite azeikuh paw kha hynh-e paw kong nynh thua.

“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nopi`ae kyate a pui`ae paw ccungccaw`ae laku Baptisma pyatu Johan laeze alesae huapaw lukheit san pou boi loh khyh; thuasalama vaawran peenaw kya adih huaccepaw ccungccaw tuh aning laeze alesaehua.
Te Baptisma pyatu Johan ryalawnaw ccyh kyate tho zah atu rya cia vaawran peenaw tuh nangsenaw kha teing zah a nangse`ae paw nynh kha-e kha thawzung mangte a luade`ae.
Pawccecize kawbya te profeh`ae ccauh balyn tuh Johan ccyh kyacia nynh profehbya a ho`ae.
Te hynh-e ka bya hynh nanning nynh na lawku ry oh ze, aning tuh yn thua vae cih paw Elijah nynh thua.
Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw nynh tuh thae sah!
“Te hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh pawtemou ka touse cih`ae? E ciihan tuh kungkunaw hmin`ae kya dahung`ae zah mih ban`ae kha,
‘Kaening nynh nanning kha phyly kae tupah oh zah na law khyh oh, nae kalan kae rah kae khui zah na rah na khui khyh oh rei,’ cite a hopah`ae paw imua`ae te nynh aloku`ae.
Pawccecize Johan tuh ae leite nia leite yn thua zah minmin nynh, ‘Aning tuh khozi bahkuhpaw nynh thua,’ a ci`ae.

Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh aete niate yn thua zah minmin nynh, ‘Dotua oh, aemoh paw te misusanphing khu! Ngunto khoitu`ae te misei`ae banpaw khu!’ a ci`ae. Thuasalama hawnaw tuh amaw a ccaaw`ae kyate thyaaccousah athua,” a ci.
Oute athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae alung huacce a langsakunaw kya-e khua`ae nynh a ngaesiku khyh`ae keiccuze Jesu nynh hynhte a pe`ae:

“Khorazin khua, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Bethsaida khua, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Pawccecize nanning kya acyikuh paw athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae kha Tai khuapi te Sidon khuapi kya a la cyiku lanze minmin tuh buri uccaw lawkuh cih`ae zah, buhaw kya toukute khawlya mawte phe a la ngaesikuh vae cih`ae.
Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, byapianaw nin kya nanning hanlan laeze Tai te Sidon hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih.

Te Kapernaum khua, nang tuh vaawran kyacia hangthung na thua zemah Hades lang sawbung na thua cih; pawccecize nang na kya acyikuh paw athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae kha Sodom khuapi kya a la cyiku ze, kha-e tuh atunin rya cia atyn ung cih paw.
Thuasalama nang kae hopya, byapianaw nin kya na hanlan laeze Sodom khuapi hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih,” a ci.

Tuh-e ccyh kya Jesu nynh tho zah, “Vaawran te laephi Bawipaw, Pou Apang, na kalan lungtuabya ka ho; pawccemacize nang nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh a haw`ae paw te a thya`ae paw kyate phe na thuru zah nosi`ae kyakhe na phypya`ae.
Ou tuhmawte nynh athua Apang, pawccecize na mitmuihnaw kya tuh-e tuh ahoypaw nynh thua.

“Ka Paaw nynh pawpaw balyn kha kamaw kalan marya yn ah vae; te Paaw holeite hung ccungccaw nynh san Ccapaw kha nyh khyh; Ccapaw te Ccapaw nynh a phypya ry paw ccungccaw holeite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Paaw kha nyh khyh.
“Riathae`ae paw te phuri`ae paw balyn kamaw kalan rang oh lah hae-ungnaw kae pya cih oh.

Ka taphu hynh nae tungvaw khangkuh oh lah kamaw hynh yn ccangkuh oh; pawccecize kae tuh a lungnepaw te thinlung kya zakawsangsakuhpaw nynh ka thua; oute nae hiinnaw-muisaw hanlan hae-ungnaw kha na mue cih oh.
Pawccecize ka taphu tuh nawre um zah ka phupaw tuh azaw,” a ci.
Tuh-e ccyh lya Jesu tuh Sabbath nin khe loo kya po a cceih; te a zuitu`ae tuh mih vuelaw zah looh avui kha zukuh`ae zah a ae`ae.
Te Farasi`ae nynh he a muih`ae tuh amaw kha, “Dotua, Sabbath nin kya kawbya nynh cyi lan a ua leipaw kha na zuitu`ae nynh a cyi`ae,” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “David nynh amaw ryte a um`ae paw ry mih vuelaw lya, a cyi paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?

Pachia inn lungkhu lang tee zah amaw hanlan te amaw ryte um`ae paw hanlan Kawbya nynh ae lan a ua leipaw, thuasalama ranpibawi`ae kyalya Kawbya nynh a ua paw, Pachia malang nungpyapaw sanlou kha phe a ae cipaw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?
Tukhyhze, tempal kya ranpibawi`ae nynh Sabbath nin kya Sabbath a thusah`ae zemah seibe thua khyh`ae cipaw kha kawbya kya na ria boi khyh oh tou?
Tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, tempal laeze alesaehua paw tuh e kya a um.
Thuasalama, ‘Silawkunaw tuh ka ry khyh, ngaethya-umsanaw nynh ka ry,’ acikuh paw asuilan hynh phe na ny oh lanze, seibe lan accan leipaw hynh nanning nynh sei na be cih lei oh paw.
Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Sabbath Bawipaw ccaccei nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Te tuin kyate Jesu he a pou tuh mih sinakok lungkhu langkhe a tee.

Te dotua, tuin kya a kuih hawkheit lang achihpaw ccungccapaw lukheit a la um. Te minmin nynh Jesu kha a seinaw kae kyngpya ccaw cite, “Sabbath nin kya dansah lan kawbya nynh a ua tou?” cite a khia`ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh tuu sakheit hoi zah kha-e tuh Sabbath nin kya hunghua lungkhu lang phe a ccaw lanze kha-e tuu kha kyng leite, thua leite a um paw na ung cih oh tou?
Tuu laeze ccungccaw tuh pawcihmou houh aphutehua? Tukeiccu Sabbath nin kya ahoypaw cyi lan tuh accanpaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh ccungccapaw kha, “Na kuih kha dyngtua,” a cipya. Te aning nynh a kuih kha dyng zah hawkheit lang-e hawte phe ahoy vae.
Oute Farasi`ae tuh pou`ae zah amaw kha rawsete pawtemou chia lan cipaw khuakhanku`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh kha-e kha he a nyh tuh tuin kyate phe a toikuh. Te ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha zui`ae zah minmin balyn kha a dansah`ae.
Te amaw kha hung nynh thua cipaw na nysah lan khyh oh cite minmin kha bya a tawsya`ae.
Ou tuhte profeh Isaiah nynh a hosyapaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua. A hopaw tuh:
“Ka sungsahpaw, ka pokupaw ka rya oun lawpatu khu dotua oh! Amaw kya ka muisaw a lungrythua; amaw tungvaw ka Muisaw ka nung cih, te aning nynh Zenta`ae kha atazaenaw kong a hopah cih`ae.
“Aning tuh eikuh lan khyh, sia mah sia lan khyh, hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah laanpi kya a roi thae lan khyh.
Atazaenaw kha taenaw kalan a thuakhae makhia aning nynh a vaemaw um paw phaeku kha khya lan khyh zah maeekhuhpaw liarui kha the lan khyh.
Te amaw min kha Zenta`ae nynh a doliakuh cih`ae,” a ci.
Oute raerangsaro nynh bahkuh zah a mitmohpaw, bya ho kho leipaw lukheitpaw kha amaw kalan oun thuakhae`ae; te kha-e paw kha a dansah. Oute mitmoh zah bya ho kho leipaw tuh bya ho zah ngaw a muih vae.
Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E paw tuh David Ccapaw thua khyh ta?” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Farasi`ae nynh he a thae`ae tuh, “E paw nynh khozi`ae uktupaw Beelzebub leite tuh khozi`ae kha dee khyh,” a ci`ae.

Te Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha nyh zah minmin kha, “Amaw te amaw kha rawsekuh zah aphiakuhpaw peenaw miakaw tuh ronaw kalan nynh a thua cih; te amaw te amaw kha rawsekuh zah aphiakuhpaw khuapi, tukhyhze inn miakaw tuh tyn kho lan khyh.
Te Setan nynh Setan kha a dee lanze, aning tuh amaw te amaw a rawsekuhpaw te a phiakuhpaw nynh thua; pawcihtemou a peenaw tuh atyn kho cih?
Te kae nynh Beelzebub liate raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee lanze, nae ccaaw`ae nynh hung liate mou minmin kha a dee`ae? Tukeiccu nae ccaaw`ae tuh nanning byapiatu`ae athua cih`ae.
Thuasalama Pachia Muisaw liate raerangsaro`ae kha kae nynh ka dee ze, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kalan yn thua ccaccing vae.

Tukhyhze ccungccaw lukheit nynh a thawsaepaw ccungccapaw kha masaty a khiide khyh lanze, a inn lungkhu langkhe pawcihtemou a tee kho cih zah a uccaw`ae kha a lua kho cih? A khiidety ze nynh a inn kha a lua kho cih.
Kamaw ryte a um leipaw ccungccaw tuh kae yn rawsepaw nynh thua; te kamaw ryte a sueluakuh bua leipaw tuh phiariphiarae a um paw nynh thua.

“Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, seinaw miakaw te Pachia saryapaw bya hanlan ccungccaw`ae tuh seingaethya athua cih`ae; thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw saryapaw bya a ho paw ccungccaw`ae tuh seingaethya thua lan khyh`ae.

Te Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha rawsete bya a ho paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh seingaethya athua cih, thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw kha rawsete bya a ho paw ccungccaw tuh, atu she kya mah, yn thua lanpaw she kya mah seingaethya thua lan khyh.
“Thingku kha ahoy lang rae lah athae ahoy cih, tukhyhze ahoy lei lang rae lah athae hoy lan khyh, pawccecize thingku tuh athae liate ny athua.
Pou fuparepaw ciihan`ae! Pawcihtemou nanning na hoy lei oh pite ahoypaw uccaw`ae kong kha na ho kho cih oh? Pawccecize thinlung kya phe beihpaw kha nynh khalang nynh a ho.
Ahoypaw ccungccaw nynh thinlung kya-e ahoypaw sisua bung kyate ahoypaw uccaw`ae kha yn poukhae; te ahoy leipaw ccungccaw nynh ahoy leipaw sisua bung kyate ahoy leipaw uccaw`ae kha yn poukhae.
Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, ccungccaw`ae nynh ccakaepaw bya a ho`ae paw miakaw hanlan byapianaw nin kya pawcihte nynh a ho cipaw kha a langsakuh cih.
Pawccecize na bya`ae liate nang tuh thyaaccousah na thua cih zah na bya`ae liate nang tuh seibe na thua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang te Farasi`ae nynh khung`ae zah, “Ccangpatupaw, na kyate muihsanaw ccangkheit kae muihtua ry,” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ahoy leipaw te a ohhuakuhpaw ciihan nynh tuh muihsanaw hynh a ccung, thuasalama profeh Jonah kya-e muihsanaw laelan ccangpaw muihsanaw kha pya thua vae lan khyh.
Pawccecize Jonah tuh nin thung te zi thung ngapi vuebua kya a um hawte, Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah nin thung te zi thung laephi lungkhu a um cih.

Byapianaw kya Nineveh khua-e ccungccaw`ae tuh hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte oun thokuh cih`ae zah hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha sei oun be cih`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh Jonah phunghonaw kya phe a ngaesikuh`ae, te dotua, Jonah laeze alesaehua paw tuh e kya nynh a um.

Byapianaw kya deilang e siapharannung tuh hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte yn thokuh cih zah sei yn be cih`ae, pawccecize aning tuh laephi athangnaw langte Solomon hawnaw bya thae khylan yn thua; te dotua, Solomon laeze alesaehua paw tuh e kya a um.
“Athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh ccungccapaw kyate he a pou tuh aroupaw ahmin`ae lang po a cceih, hae-ungnaw kha ccungkuh zah muihkuh khyh.
Oute aning nynh, ‘Ka poutawnaw ka inn lang ka ki cih,’ a ci; te he a thua tuh kha-e inn tuh phe la phikuh zah a ccunghangpaw te paccaan athua paw kha a muih.

Oute aning tuh cceih zah amaw laeze houh ahoy leipaw ccangpaw muisaw lusari`ae kha amaw ry a hoeibua`ae, te minmin tuh tee`ae zah kha-e paw kya a um`ae; te kha-e ccungccapaw kya-e nyalang acyihkuh paw tuh masaty a umtu laeze houh a seihua. Tuh-e hawte nynh hynh-e ahoy leipaw ciihan kya mah acyikuh bua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Ccungccaw zapi kha bya a hopya cciamang lyakhe, dotua, a nung te a neitapaw`ae tuh atolang khe thadyn`ae zah amaw kha bya hopya lan a ry`ae.
Oute ccungccaw lukheit nynh amaw kha, “Dotua, na nung te na neitapaw`ae, nang ryte byahoku ry`ae zah atolang nynh a thadyn`ae,” a cipya.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh amaw kha-e bya a hopah paw kha, “Ka nung tuh hungmou? Te ka neitapaw`ae tuh hungmou?” cite a khung.
Te a zuitu`ae kalan khe a kuih kha dyng zah, “Ka nung te ka neitapaw`ae hynh dotua oh!
Pawccecize vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw rynaw a cyih paw, kha-e paw kha nynh ka neitapaw, ka ccia, te ka nung tuh athua,” a ci.
Tuh-e nin kya Jesu tuh inn kyate pou zah rili kin khe a dahung.
Te ccungccaw zapi pi tuh amaw kalan a sueluakuh`ae keiccu Jesu tuh kohlung lungkhu lang tee zah a dahung; te ccungccaw zapi khaleih tuh varan langkhe a thadyn`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te bya patae a hopya`ae. A hopaw tuh: “Dotua oh, ccaciivuatu lukheit nynh ccaciivua lan a cceih.
Te ccacii kha he a vua tuh, ccacii abang tuh laanpi pe khe ccah`ae zah pavaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah phe a tuh kou`ae.
Abang tuh laephi zya zah lung alungnaw kya a ccah; te laephi thawkalae lang a um khyh keiccuze taloi a po`ae.
Te khuanin he yn paw tuh minmin kha a rua vae`ae, te tharui a hoi khyh`ae keiccuze karae arou`ae.
Te abang tuh hingpaw`ae laku ccah zah hingpaw`ae nynh lethin`ae zah minmin kha phang reihde`ae.
Thuasalama ccangpaw ccacii`ae tuh ahoypaw lae kya ccah`ae zah abang tuh leih zakheit, abang tuh leih sungtaruh, abang tuh leih sungthung athae a thae`ae.
Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah,” a ci.
Te zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Pawccemou minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te na hopya`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Pawccemacize vaawran peenaw kya-e byakhupaw`ae kha ny lan nanning tuh pya na thua oh, thuasalama minmin tuh pya thua khyh`ae.
Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh pyachih athua cih zah pataepi houh a hoi cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah a hoi leipaw ccungccaw tuh a hoithypaw maw kha lawpya athua cih.
Tukeiccu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te ka hopya`ae; pawccemacize minmin tuh mang a muih`ae pite muih khyh`ae, te mang a thae`ae pite thae khyh`ae, thae mah thaethya khyh`ae.
“Te minmin kya Isaiah nynh a hopaw profehbya tuh accing vae; a hopaw tuh: ‘Thae paw tuh na thae cih oh zah na thaethya lan khyh oh, te muihpaw tuh na muih cih oh zah na nyh lan khyh oh.

Pawccecize hynh-e ccungccaw`ae mih thinlung tuh phe amoh, te mih nakaring`ae tuh karae arua, te mih mit`ae tuh phang masi`ae; tukhyh lanze ccyhkhakheit kya mih mit`ae khate phe a muih cih`ae paw, mih nakaring`ae te phe a thae cih`ae paw, mih thinlung te phe a thaethya cih`ae paw, te phe a paleihkuh cih`ae paw, te minmin kha phe ka dansah cih`ae paw,’ a ci.
“Thuasalama nanning nae mit`ae tuh ngawmuih`ae keiccu hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; te nae nakaring`ae tuh nawthae`ae keiccu hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua.

Pawccecize byaccaccing kae hopya oh, profeh`ae patae te adingpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh na muih oh paw uccaw`ae hynh muih a ry`ae zemah muih bua khyh`ae, te na thae oh paw hynh thae a ry`ae zemah thaebua khyh`ae.
“Tukeiccu ccaciivuatupaw tousenaw phungpaw kong hynh nanning ngaetua oh.

Lukhakheit nynh peenaw kong hopaw bya kha he a thae tuh kha-e kha thaethya khyh, oute mihoy leipaw nynh yn thua zah a thinlung kya vua paw ccacii kha dae a lawpya. Tuh-e paw tuh laanpi zung kya vua paw ccacii a mue paw kha nynh thua.
Te lung alungnaw kya vua paw ccacii kha a mue paw ccungccaw tuh bya kha thae zah vaekheihmawte lungtuate a lawkuh paw kha nynh thua.
Tuhzemah a kya atharui hoi khyh zah sosoh rou nynh atyn, te bya keiccuze vawsawrunaw, tukhyhze tuasakunaw he yn um tuh aro mawze aning tuh phe a maeleihkuh.

Hingpaw`ae laku vua paw ccacii kha a mue paw ccungccaw tuh bya athae paw kha nynh athuabua; te hynh-e laephipi uccaw elan thinphangnaw te lingthyapaw hoirungnaw nynh bya kha phang a reihde pya, te aning tuh athae kha thae kho vae khyh.

Thuasalama ahoypaw lae kya vua paw ccacii kha a mue paw ccungccaw tuh bya kha thae zah kha-e kha a thaethya paw nynh thua; athae kha thae zah abang tuh leih zakheit, abang tuh leih sungtaruh, abang tuh leih sungthung a pousah paw ccungccaw kha nynh thua,” a ci.
Jesu nynh ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Vaawran peenaw tuh a loo kya ahoypaw ccacii a vua paw ccungccaw te nynh aloku.
Te ccungccaw`ae a i`ae lyakhe a rhawpaw nynh yn thua zah chanvui laku khe lonua mung`ae kha vua zah phe a cceih.
Thuasalama chanvui tuh yn po zah avui he yn pou tuh lonua`ae mah oun langkuh bua vae`ae.
Tukeiccu inn hoitu a see`ae nynh a kalan yn thua`ae zah, ‘Bawihaepaw, na loo kya ccacii ahoypaw kha na vua khyh ta? Paw kyate mou lonua`ae hynh oun pou`ae?’ cite a khia`ae.
Kha-e paw nynh, ‘Rhaw lukheit nynh e hynh a cyih,’ a cipya`ae. See`ae nynh, ‘Tuhte lanze kaening nynh ccianua lan zah kha-e`ae kha marya phoh lan na ry ta?’ a ci`ae.
Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Tuhte thua khyh, lonua`ae he na khae lya oh, khae` ae ryte chanvui mah phe na khaebia sei cih oh.

Loohrue ccyh azaw makhia pynkheihlan paryh le`ae sah; te loohrue ccyh kya loohruetu`ae kha, “Nanning lonua`ae kha masaty suelua oh lah maee te rua lan la tung oh, thuasalama chanvui kha ka byng lungkhu lang oun ruin oh,” ka cipah cih`ae,’ a ci,” cite a hopya`ae.
Jesu nynh ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Vaawran peenaw tuh ccungccapaw lukheit nynh lah zah a loo kya a vua paw mungngia cii te nynh aloku.

Mungngia cii tuh ccacii`ae balyn kyaze adih huaccepaw ccaccing nynh thua; thuasalama kha-e nynh he yn le vae tetuh enaw-ekan`ae lakuze ale huapaw lang te thingku lang phe atang; te vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh oun zou`ae zah kha-e aran`ae kyakhe bu a luaku`ae,” a ci.

Ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Vaawran peenaw tuh ransi te nynh aloku; nopi lukheit nynh kha-e kha laah zah vaepoi kee keethung kya a phing paw, tuh-e vaepoi phe a thosah paw ransi te nynh aloku a ci,” a ci.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kalan tousenaw phungpaw`ae te nynh a ho; te tousenaw phungpaw leite minmin kha bya hopah khyh`ae.
Ou tuhte profeh nynh, “Ka khalang ka aw cih zah tousenaw phungpaw`ae kha ka ho cih, laephipi athonaw kyate athurukuh paw uccaw`ae kha ka ho cih,” cite a ho paw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha cciasah`ae zah inn lungkhu lang a tee; te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Loo kya-e lonua`ae tousenaw phungpaw kong kha kaening oun hopah,” a ci`ae.
Aning nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ccacii ahoypaw a vuatupaw tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh thua.
Loo tuh laephipi nynh thua; ccacii ahoypaw tuh peenaw ccaaw`ae nynh thua; thuasalama lonua`ae tuh mihoy leipaw ccaaw`ae nynh thua.
Tuh-e lonua mung`ae a vua paw rhaw tuh diabolos nynh thua; loohrue ccyh tuh laephi she athangnaw nynh thua; te loohruetu`ae tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh thua.
Tukeiccu lonua`ae tuh suelua`ae zah maee kya a rua`ae hawte laephi she athangnaw kya acyikuh bua cih.
Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha yn saw cih`ae zah minmin nynh mingccang`ae a maeleihsakuh`ae paw te kawbya pawlangria lei`ae paw balyn kha a peenaw kyate oun suelua cih`ae.
Te minmin kha maeephupi lungkhu lang a phung cih`ae, tuin kya rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih.
Oute adingpaw ccungccaw`ae tuh mih Paaw peenaw kya khuanin hawte a aw vae cih`ae. Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah!

“Te vaawran peenaw tuh lei kya thurupaw sisua te nynh aloku; kha-e kha ccungccapaw nynh he a muih tuh zya a thuru, te kha-e elan lungtuanaw te cceih zah a hoi paw balyn kha zua zah kha-e lei kha a re.
“Te vaawran peenaw tuh myarya ahoypaw pale`ae a ccungkuh paw kungkupaw te nynh aloku.
Tuh-e paw nynh myarya aphutepaw pale kha he a muih tuh cceih zah a hoi paw balyn kha zua zah kha-e pale kha a re.
“Te vaawran peenaw tuh rili lungkhu lang vua`ae zah ngasaw aphuinphuin akhung paw mia te nynh aloku.
Ngasaw te he abeih tuh mia kha ngasaw kyng`ae nynh varan langkhe a sue`ae, te dahung`ae zah ahoypaw ngasaw`ae kha sua lungkhu lang a sang`ae, thuasalama ahoy leipaw kha a vua`ae.
Tuh-e hawte laephi she athangnaw kya athua cih; vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh oun rung cih`ae zah mihoy lei`ae kha a ding`ae paw laku kyate thohphia cih`ae.
Te minmin kha maee phupi lungkhu lang a vua cih`ae; tuin kya rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih,” a ci.
Jesu nynh, “E uccaw`ae balyn hynh na thaethya oh ta?” cite zuitu`ae kha a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Ou, Bawipaw,” a ci`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh, “Tukeiccu vaawran peenaw kong ccangpya athua vae paw kawbya ccangpatu`ae miakaw tuh amaw a sisua bung lungkhu te athawpaw te arynpaw uccaw`ae yn thuakhae paw inn hoitupaw te nynh aloku,” a cipya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu nynh e tousenaw phungpaw`ae kha he a ho kou tuh tuin kyate phe a pou.

Te amaw a khua lang he a thua tuh a khuaccaw`ae kha mih sinakok kyakhe a ccangpya`ae; minmin tuh myarya mih ngaeangthua zah, “Paw kyate mou e paw nynh hynh-e hawnaw te e athungpaw ryalaw`ae hynh a mue?
E paw tuh lehccamapaw ccapaw thua khyh tou? A nung Meri ci`ae paw thua khyh tou? Te a neitaw`ae tuh James, Joses, Simon te Judas thua khyh`ae tou?
Te a ccia`ae tuh mih balynte aening ryte a um`ae paw kha thua khyh tou? Tuhte lanze paw kyate mou E paw nynh e uccaw`ae balyn hynh a mue?” a ci`ae.
Tuhte minmin tuh amaw kya mih lung athang. Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Profeh lukheit tuh amaw a ram, te amaw a innbyn kya holeite tuh sawtua leite um khyh`ae,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh a zyn khyh`ae keiccuze athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae patae kha khe kya Jesu nynh cyih khyh.
Tuh-e ccyh kya Herod tetrach nynh Jesu thungpang kha thae zah,
a ryalawpatu`ae kha, “E paw tuh Baptisma pyatu Johan nynh thua, aning tuh chinaw kyate nynh a tho vae; tukeiccu nynh hynh-e thungnaw`ae hynh amaw kya alangku,” a cipya`ae.
Pawccecize Herod nynh a neitaw Filip zu Herodia keiccuze Johan kha kyng zah a khii, te thunginn kya a saw.
Pawccecize Johan nynh Herod kha, “Kha-e nung kha na hanlan na lawku lan ccan khyh,” a la cipya.
Te aning nynh Johan kha chia lan a ry zemah ccungccaw zapi raw kha a rih. Pawccemacize minmin nynh Johan kha profeh lukheit hawte a tua`ae paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama Herod a pui nin poi he a tua`ae tuh Herodia ccanung nynh mih malang khe he yn law tuh Herod kha a lungrythuasah.
Tukeiccu kha-e nopinung nynh a ngiakupaw miakaw kha pya lan Herod nynh ccaesakute byakinpyaku.
Te a nung nynh phe a hopyaty vae thyhte, kha-e nung nynh, “Hynhlang hin Baptisma pyatu Johan lu kha pakephepaw te yn pya,” a ci.
Te siapharan tuh a ngaethah; tuhzemah ccaesakupaw keiccu te amaw ryte loohdangkunaw kya a dahungkheih`ae paw keiccuze kha-e nung kha pya lan kaw a pya`ae.
Te ccungccaw saw zah thunginn kya Johan kha a lu paesah`ae.
Te a lu kha pakephepaw kya oun ccyng`ae zah liaccanung taraw kha a pya`ae, te aning nynh kha-e kha a nung kalan a ccyng.
Te Johan zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah a rhua kha laah`ae zah a ccy`ae, te cceih`ae zah Jesu kha a hopya`ae.
Jesu nynh tuh-e kong he a thae tuh tuin kyate a makhaete rangkaw lang kohlung te phe a pou; te ccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh khua kyate mih ccu te amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te Jesu tuh yn pou zah ccungccaw zapi kha he a muih tuh minmin kha ngaethyaumsah` ae zah mih ngeccih`ae kha a dansah`ae.

Te zete he yn thua tuh a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “E kya tuh rangkaw thua zah khuanin phe anae vae, tukeiccu ccungccaw zapi hynh saw`ae lah minmin nynh khua`ae kalan cceih`ae sah lah mimaw elan aepaw a reku ccaw`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Minmin a pou`ae ho khyh, nanning nynh minmin kha ae lanpaw pya oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “E kya sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning rou nynh kae hoi,” a cipya`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Kha-e`ae kha hynhlang kamaw kalan oun ccyng oh,” a ci.

Te ccungccaw zapi kha lonua vawlan dahung lan kaw a pya, te sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning kha laah zah vaawran lang dothung zah lungtuabya a ho, te eih zah sanlou`ae kha zuitu`ae a pya, te zuitu`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kha a pya`ae.
Te minmin balyn tuh ae`ae zah phe byn`ae; te alaepaw a eihpaw kha khuin`ae zah kee haw laening phe abeih.
Te tuh-e a ae`ae paw tuh nopi`ae te imua`ae holeite pise piccang thungpangaw loukaw acih`ae.
Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi a saw lya`ae khe, amaw malang khuraw lang cciaty khylan a zuitu`ae kha vaekheihmawte kohlung lungkhu lang a kaesah`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi kha he a saw`ae koute a makhaete sawsang lan mua muakheit kalan a kaethung; te zete he a thua tuh tuin kya a makhaete a um.
Thuasalama kohlung tuh atu rili ngaelung kya um zah khisang nynh arawsekuh lante a mung keiccu tuileih nynh a hesaku.
Te khuazi santari ccyhpalinaw kya Jesu tuh rili vawlan khe zuitu`ae kalan a cceih.
Te zuitu`ae nynh amaw rili vawlan yn ccia paw kha he a muih`ae tuh rih`ae zah, “Muihsaw nynh thua!” a ci`ae; te minmin tuh a ri`ae keiccuze thawte a sia`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh hopah kanmaw`ae zah minmin kha, “Nae thawmuin sah! Kamaw nynh ka thua, rih nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Piter nynh amaw kha khung zah, “Bawipaw, namaw na thua ze, tui vawlan te na kalan ccia lan kaw yn pya,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh, “Rang,” a ci. Te Piter tuh kohlung kyate sahkuh bung zah Jesu kalan ccia lan tui vawlan khe a cceih.
Thuasalama khisang arupaw kha he a muih tuh a rih vae, te tui kya he yn ccah takaw tuh, “Bawipaw, yn khum!” cite a sia.
Te vaekheihmawte Jesu nynh a kuih kha dyng zah a kyng, te amaw kha, “Pou zynnaw azyapaw nang, pawccemou na lunghiin?” a cipya.
Te minmin nynh kohlung lungkhu lang he oun thua`ae tuh khisang phe adae.
Oute kohlung kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh oun cceih`ae zah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw ccaccing nynh na thua,” ci`ae zah amaw kha a beik`ae.
Te minmin khuraw he oun zua`ae tuh Kenesaret ram lungkhu lang oun thua`ae.
Te tuh-e hmin kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha he a nyh`ae tuh tuh-e area pepan balyn kalan ccungccaw`ae kha saw`ae zah ngeccih`ae balyn kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae.
Te minmin nynh a boei dung sankaw hae lan amaw kha a ngiaku`ae; te a hae paw miakaw tuh marya a dan`ae.
Oute Jerusalem khua e kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae tuh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah,
“Pawccemou na zuitu`ae nynh langmaw-e piccang`ae phung kha a lue`ae? Pawccecize minmin nynh looh a ae`ae ze mih kuih singkuh khyh`ae,” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Pawccemou nanning so nae phung keiccuze Pachia kawpyapaw kha na lue oh?
Pawccecize Pachia nynh, ‘Na paaw te na nung kha sawtua’; te, ‘A paaw khyhze a nung thyalah paw ccungccaw tuh chia thua sah,’ cite kaw a pya.
Thuasalama nanning nynh, ‘Hunghung zemah a paaw khyhze a nung kha, “Pawpaw zemah kamaw liate na mue lanpaw bawngnaw tuh lasung nynh thua,” a ci ze,
a paaw khyhze a nung kha sawtua ho vae khyh,’ na ci oh. Ou tuhte nae phung liate Pachia kawpyapaw kha pawlang um lei lan na rae oh.
Nanning thyaruhthyaphe` ae! Nanning konglang Isaiah nynh hmerarihlan a la hoty vae. A hopaw tuh:
‘E ccungccaw`ae nynh mih khalang te kamaw kalan oun naekuh`ae zah mih mung te saw oun tua`ae; thuasalama mih thinlung tuh kamaw kyate asawkuh.
Te ccungccaw`ae kyae kawpyapaw kha doctrine lang ccangpyate accakaepaw kya kamaw kha oun beik`ae’ a ci,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha ko`ae zah minmin kha, “Ngae oh lah thaethya oh:
Khalang lungkhu lang a tee paw nynh ccungccaw hynh nungsisakuh khyh; thuasalama khalang kyate yn pou paw nynh nynh ccungccaw kha a nungsisakuh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute a zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Hynh-e na hopaw a thae`ae koute Farasi`ae tuh mih lung phe thang cipaw hynh na nyh ta?” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh a ling leipaw aku miakaw tuh marya phoh athua cih.
Minmin tuh khamawte um`ae sah; minmin tuh mitmoh`ae a cciakhaetu`ae mitmoh`ae nynh thua`ae. Te mitmohpaw nynh mitmohpaw kha a cciakhae lanze paryhte hunghua lungkhu lang a ccah cih`ae,” a ci.
Oute Piter nynh khung zah amaw kha, “Hynh-e tousenaw phungpaw hynh kaening oun hopah,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning so thaethya leite tou na um ung oh?
Khalang lungkhu lang a tee paw miakaw tuh vue lungkhu lang ccah zah ia-inn lungkhu lang po a thua cipaw hynh nanning na thaethya la khyh oh tou?
Thuasalama khalang lungkhu te yn pou paw uccaw`ae tuh thinlung kyate yn pou paw nynh thua; te khae` ae nynh ccungccaw kha a nungsisakuh.
Pawccecize ahoy leipaw tuanaw`ae, ccungccaw chianaw, milae zu milae vawpaw seikhaenaw, ohhuakunaw, ahme leipaw ccaekiakhannaw, runaw, te milae thethyahonaw`ae tuh thinlung kyate nynh oun pou.
E uccaw`ae hynh nynh ccungccaw a nungsisakuh; thuasalama kuih singku leite ae paw nynh tuh ccungccaw kha nungsisakuh khyh,” a ci.
Oute tuin kyate Jesu tuh cceih zah Tai te Sidon pee lungkhu lang a tee.

Te dotua, Kanaan nopinung lukheit kha-e ram kyate yn thua zah, “Pou Bawipaw, David Ccapaw, kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah; ka ccanung tuh raerangsaro nynh myarya accih lang a tua,” cite sia zah amaw kha a hopya.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh bya kawkheit san khung khyh. Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan oun cceih`ae zah, “Hynh-e nung hynh cciasah, pawccecize aening nuhlang te pei a sia,” cite amaw kha a ngia`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Israel innbyn kyaze azopaw tuu`ae kalan laelan kae tuh saw ka thua khyh,” a ci.
Oute tuh-e nung nynh yn cceih zah amaw kha beik zah, “Bawipaw, beih yn bawng!” a ci.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccaaw`ae looh kha law lan zah ui taraw`ae vuapya lan ccan khyh,” a cipya.
Te tuh-e nung nynh, “Ahme nyng Bawipaw, tuhzemah ui taraw`ae nynh mih bawi`ae ccaboi kyate accah paw loohmoi`ae kha a ae`ae khaw ta,” a ci.
Oute Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pou nopinung, na zynnaw tuh ale raria! Na ry hawte na kya cyikuh sah,” a cipya. Te a ccanung tuh tuh-e suimilan ccyh ccaccei kyate phe a dan.
Te tuin kyate Jesu pou zah Galilee Rili pe lang a thua; te mua muakheit kalan kaethung zah tuin kyakhe a dahung.

Te ccungccaw zapi nynh mitmohpaw, ccukhoupaw, bya ho kho leipaw, kuihccu khyn leipaw te ccangpaw ngeccih patae kha mimaw ryte amaw kalan oun thuakhae`ae zah Jesu ccu leihpaw khe a nung`ae, te Jesu nynh minmin kha a dansah`ae.

Ou tuhcihte bya ho kho leipaw nynh bya yn ho, kuihccu khyn leipaw nynh yn khyn, ccukhoupaw nynh laanpi cceih zah mitmohpaw nynh ngawmuih paw kha ccungccaw zapi nynh he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua; te minmin nynh Israel Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah, “Ccungccaw zapi hynh thaw ka ccih`ae, pawccemacize minmin tuh kamaw ryte nin thung po um vae`ae zah ae lanpaw hoi khyh`ae, te minmin hynh ae leite ka saw ry khyh`ae, tuhte saw lanze laanpi kya phe a bawsei cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Hynhzeih ccungccaw zapi phe byn lan`ae rangkaw kyahin paw kyate mou sanlou tuh kae mue cih?” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Sanlou hozeihmou na hoi oh?” cite khia`ae zah minmin nynh, “Phe sari, te ngasaw taraw ccapyh nynh kae hoi,” a ci`ae.
Te aning nynh ccungccaw zapi kha lae vawlan dahung lan kawpya`ae.
Te aning nynh sanlou phe sari te ngasaw`ae kha lah zah lungtuabya ho zah kha-e`ae kha a ia, te a zuitu`ae kha pya`ae zah zuitu`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kalan a nee`ae.
Te minmin balyn tuh ae`ae zah mih vueso; te minmin nynh a eihpaw alaepaw kha khuin`ae zah kee sari phe abeih.
Te nopi`ae te imua`ae holeite a ae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh thungpali acih.
Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha a saw`ae, te kohlung kha ccikuh zah Magdala pee lungkhu lang a thua.
Te Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae oun thua`ae zah Jesu kha syntaw khylan vaawran kyate muihsanaw kha minmin langsahpya lan amaw kha a ngia`ae.
Aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Zete ccyh kya, nanning nynh, ‘Vaawlui ase keiccu khua ahoy cih,’ na ci oh.

Te awkhua ccyh kya, ‘Vaawlui se zah mae-ui keiccuze atunin tuh khua hoy lan khyh,’ na ci kho oh. Pou cyihruh`ae! Nanning nynh vaawlui mitmae kha na phiathya oh; thuasalama accyh`ae muihsanaw tuh na thaethya khyh oh.

Ahoy leipaw te a ohhuakuhpaw ciihan nynh tuh muihsanaw kha a ccung; te profeh Jonah kya-e muihsanaw laelan pawpaw muihsanaw sanmah kha-e ciihan kalan langsapya thua vae lan khyh,” a ci. Te minmin kha cciataw`ae zah phe a pou.
Te a zuitu`ae nynh khuraw lang he oun thua`ae tuh sanlou phuku lanpaw kha phe a ning`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae ransi kha do oh lah la raeringkuh oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Aening nynh sanlou ah phuku khyh oh keiccu nynh e bya hynh a ho,” cite mimaw te mimaw kya a hokuh`ae.
Jesu nynh he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Pou zynnaw azya`ae paw nanning, nanning nynh sanlou nae phuku khyh oh keiccuze pawccemou naemaw te naemaw kya tuhte na hoku oh?
Na thaethya loh khyh oh tou? Sanlou phe pangaw kha ccungccaw thungpangaw nynh ae`ae zah kee hozeih nynh na khuin oh cipaw so na nyh vae khyh oh tou?
Sanlou phe sari kha ccungccaw thungpali nynh ae`ae zah kee lepaw te hozeih nynh na khuin oh cipaw so na nyh vae khyh oh tou?
Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae ransi kha nanning na raeringkuh cih oh cite kae hopya oh paw tuh sanlou kong lante thua khyh cipaw kha nanning nynh pawccemou e hynh na thaethya khyh oh?” a cipya`ae.

Oute zuitu`ae nynh sanlou kya-e ransi kha raeringku lan oun hopya ry paw thua khyh, thuasalama Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae ccangpyanaw kong nynh oun hopya ry paw athua cipaw kha minmin nynh oun thaethya vae`ae.
Jesu tuh Sisaria Filipi pee lungkhu lang he yn thua tuh a zuitu`ae kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh kae Ccungccaw Ccapaw hynh hung oun ci`ae mou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Ccungccaw abang nynh nang tuh Baptisma pyatu Johan ae ci`ae; abang nynh Elijah ae ci`ae; te abang nynh Jeremiah khyhze profeh lukhakheit nynh thua, ae ci`ae,” cite a khung`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Thuasalama nanning nynh so kae hynh hung nae ci oh mou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te Simon Piter nynh, “Nang tuh Kri, ahiinpaw Pachia Ccapaw nynh na thua,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Simon Bar-Jonah, nang tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua, pawccecize chii te saw nynh e hynh na kalan ae phypah khyh, thuasalama vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh ae phypah.
Te nang tuh Piter nynh na thua cipaw kha mah kae hopya; te e lungtung vawlan ka kriccawbu kha ka sak cih; te Hades kya-e koikua`ae nynh e hynh tae kho lan khyh.

Te vaawran peenaw toh`ae kha nang kae pya cih; te nang nynh laephi vawlan na khiidepaw miakaw tuh vaawran kya mah khiide athua cih; te laephi vawlan na supya paw miakaw tuh vaawran kya mah supya athua cih,” a cipya.
Oute aning tuh Jesu Kri nynh thua cipaw kha hung ccungccaw sanmah a hopya khyh nawlan`ae a zuitu`ae kha kawpya`ae.

Tuh-e ccyh kyate Jesu nynh Jerusalem lang a ccia lanpaw, piccang`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae, te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kya-e patae a teing lanpaw, te a chia lan`ae paw, te nin thungnaw kya bua yn thothui lanpaw kong kha a zuitu`ae kalan a langsapyaku vae`ae.
Oute Piter nynh Jesu kha ccanglang cciakhae zah, “Tuh-e tuh na kyate sawkuh sah, Bawipaw; tuh-e tuh na tungvaw cyikuh nan sah!” cite amaw kha a pe.
