Thuasalama Jesu nynh Piter kalan maekuh zah, “Setan, ka nuhlang thungkuh! Nang tuh kae ka hanlan yn maeleihsakuhtupaw nynh na thua; pawccecize nang tuh Pachia uccaw`ae kha na peki khyh, thuasalama ccungccaw uccaw`ae kha nynh na peki,” a cipya.
Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Lukhakheit nynh kamaw hynh yn zui ry lanze amaw te amaw kha vuakuh sah lah a vaelantung kha puihkuh sah, te kamaw kha yn zui sah.
Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha a khumkuh ry paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a shung cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha kae ka keiccuze a shung paw tuh a hiinnaw kha bua a muihkuh cih.
Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh laephipi hynh khaleih mue sah lah amaw a hiinnaw-muisaw kha a shung lanze, a hanlan pawmou athane? Tukhyhze a hiinnaw-muisaw hanlan paw uccaw te mou a rulae kho cih?
Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a Paaw phu-enaw kya a vaaw ccungccaw`ae ryte oun thua vae cih; oute ccungccaw miakaw kha a ryalawnaw thyhte ryalaw mee yn pya cih`ae.
“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a peenaw kya yn thua paw kha a muih`ae cia chinaw a tytua cih lei`ae paw abang e kya a um`ae,” a cipya`ae.
Te nin taruh acih koute Jesu nynh Piter, James, te a neitaw Johan kha hoei`ae zah mih makhaete ahangpaw mua muakheit kalan a cciakhae`ae.
Te minmin malang khe Jesu tuh a muinsan rulaekuh. A mae tuh khuanin hawte phaephae ah zah a uccaw tuh awnaw hawte araw.
Te dotua, tuin kya mih kalan Mawsi te Elijah oun langkuh`ae zah amaw ryte byahokuh`ae.
Oute Piter nynh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, e kya um paw tuh ah hanlan ahoy, na ry ze e kya bu ccangthung kae sak sah, na hanlan ccangkheit, Mawsi hanlan ccangkheit, te Elijah hanlan ccangkheit,” a cipya.

Tuhte a ho cciamang lyakhe, dotua, a awpaw maeking nynh minmin kha pung a khung`ae; te dotua, maeking lungkhu te roi nynh, “E paw a kya ka lungry kou thua paw ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw bya kha la ngae oh!” cite maeking kyate roi yn ccae.
Te zuitu`ae nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh bakhung`ae zah myarya a rih`ae.
Te Jesu nynh yn thua zah minmin kha tung`ae zah, “Thokuh oh lah rih nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh he oun dothung`ae tuh Jesu kyalya laelan hung sanmah muih vae khyh`ae.

Te minmin mua kyate he oun rungbung`ae tuh Jesu nynh, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui mawlaezung na muih oh paw vizin hynh hung sanmah la hopah nan oh,” cite zuitu`ae kha kawpya`ae.
Te a zuitu`ae nynh, “Pawccemou kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh Elijah tuh masaty yn thua hahe cih a ci`ae?” cite amaw kha a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Elijah tuh masaty yn thua ccaccing cih zah pawpaw balyn kha bua yn nungthui cih.

Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, Elijah tuh phe thua vae, te ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha nyh khyh`ae, thuasalama minmin nynh a cyi ry`ae paw miakaw kha amaw kalan phe cyi vae`ae. Tuhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah minmin kuih kyakhe yn teing bua vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute zuitu`ae nynh mih kalan Baptisma pyatu Johan kong kha nynh a ho cipaw a thaethya vae`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi kalan minmin he a thua`ae tuh Jesu kalan ccungccaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw malang ccukharutung zah,

“Bawipaw, ka ccapaw tungvaw ngaethya beih umsah, pawccecize aning tuh dungpaw ccinaw hoi zah myarya a teing; te accyh ccyh vae ze maee lungkhu lang phungkuh zah accyh ccyh vae ze tui lungkhu lang a phungkuh.
Te kae nynh na zuitu`ae kalan ka cciakhae zah minmin nynh dansah kho khyh`ae,” a cipya.

Oute Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pou zyn lei`ae te a ccouseikuh`ae paw ciihan`ae, hohse cia mou nae kya ka um ung cih? Hohse cia mou kae ngaesangpah ung cih oh? Imohpaw kha kamaw kalan hynhlang oun cciakhae oh,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh raerangsaro kha pe zah aning tuh kha-e paw lungkhu te a pou; te imohpaw tuh tuh-e suimilan ccaccei kyate phe a dan.
Oute zuitu`ae nynh mih makhaete Jesu kalan oun cceih`ae zah, “Pawccemou kaening nynh amaw kha kae dee kho khyh?” cite a khia`ae.

Te Jesu nynh, “Na zyn khyh keiccu oh; pawccecize nanning byaccaccing kae hopya oh, mungngia mung mungkheit cia zynnaw na hoi oh ze, e mua hynh, ‘E kyate khuhlang khuin nuekuh,’ na ci oh ze a nuekuh cih; te nae hanlan athua kho leipaw pawsang um lan khyh.
Tuhzemah e tahawpaw raerangsaro tuh loohaesungnaw te sawsangnaw leite tuh pou khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Galilee kya minmin a um`ae lyakhe Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kuih kalan oun ah vae cih`ae,
te minmin nynh oun theih cih`ae zah nin thungnaw kya yn thothui cih,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh myaryasangkae mih ngaethah.
Te minmin Kapernaum khua kya he a thua`ae tuh tempal phuakhoi drakma a khoi`ae paw nynh Piter kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Nae Ccangpatupaw hynh tempal phuakhoi pya khyh ta?” a ci`ae.

Piter nynh, “A pya,” a ci. Te Piter inn lungkhu lang he yn tee tuh, Jesu nynh cciadue zah, “Simon, pawte na tua? Laephi siapharan`ae nynh uccaw-phuakhoi, tukhyhze ccungccaw-phuakhoi kha hung`ae kya-e mou a lawku`ae? Mimaw mih ccaaw`ae kya-e tou? Tukhyhze milae`ae kya-e tou?” cite a khia.
Piter nynh, “Milae`ae kya-e nynh a lawku`ae,” a ci. Jesu nynh, “Tuhte lanze ccaaw`ae tuh a lue`ae.

Tuhzemah minmin tuh aening keiccuze a cyisei khyh ccaw`ae, nang rili kalan la cceih lah ngasabaw kha la sah, te masaty yn kae paw ngasaw kha la kyng; te a khalang he na kei te phua shekel ccangkheit na la muih cih, kha-e phua kha laah lah na hanlan te ka hanlan minmin kha la pya`ae,” a cipya.
Tuh-e ccyh kya zuitu`ae Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Vaawran peenaw kya hungmou alesae huacce?” cite a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh imua taraw lukheit kha a kalan ko zah, minmin ngaelung khe imohpaw kha nung zah,
“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning nynh na rulaeku khyh oh zah imua taraw hawte na thua khyh oh ze, vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang kharyh na tee lan khyh oh.
Tukeiccu hunghung zemah e imua taraw hawte amaw te amaw kha zakawsangsaku lanze tuh-e paw tuh nynh vaawran peenaw kya alesae huaccepaw athua.
Te hunghung zemah ka min liate e tahawpaw imua taraw lukheit kha a lehkhan ze kamaw kha yn lehkhan paw nynh thua.

“Thuasalama hunghung zemah kamaw yn zyn paw e imua taraw lukhakheit kha a maeleihsakuh paw tuh a nging kyakhe mianawpaw lung ccangkheit kha sae`ae sah lah rili akhunaw kya phung lanze a hanlan ahoyhua.

Maeleihsakunaw`ae keiccuze laephi ccungccaw`ae hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang! Pawccecize maeleihsakunaw`ae yn thua hahe cih; thuasalama maeleihsakunaw a thuasatupaw tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang!

“Tukeiccu na kuih khyhze na ccu nynh nang kha ae seisah ze thoh tya lah na kyate dae vua; ccukhoute, tukhyhze kuihccu ccing leite hiinnaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh, kuih ccangning, ccu ccangning hoibiate zungzae aruapaw maee lungkhu lang vuaku lanpaw lae na hanlan ahoyhua.

Te na mit nynh nang ae seisah ze poh khoi lah na kyate dae vua; mit ccangning hoite kehenna maee lungkhu lang vuaku lanpaw lae tuh mit ccangkheit te hiinnaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw kha na hanlan ahoyhua.

“E imua taraw`ae lukheit san pawlangria leite na um khyh nawlan oh raeringkuh oh; pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, imua`ae kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh vaawran kya um paw ka Paaw mitmae kha pei a muih`ae.
“Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh azo`ae paw kha khum khylan nynh yn thua.

Pawtemou na tua oh? Ccungccaw lukheit nynh tuu zakheit hoi zah tuhe` ae kyaze sakheit tuh laanpi phe avae sei ze, sungtakua satakua kha cciataw zah kha-e laanpi phe avae paw kha ccung khylan mua`ae kalan cceih lan khyh tou?
Te kha-e tuu kha he a muih lan thua ze, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, laanpi vae lei`ae paw sungtakua satakua tungvaw laeze kha-e kya a lungtuahua.
Tuh-e hawte hynh-e imua taraw`ae kyaze lukheit sanmah aro lanpaw tuh vaawran kya um paw nae Paaw rynaw thua khyh.
“Tuhlaeze na uno nynh na tungvaw a cyisei ze cceih lah namaw te amaw makhae kya a cyiseinaw kha hopah; aning nynh nang kha ae ngaepya ze na uno kha phe na mue.
Thuasalama aning nynh ae ngaepya khyh ze, luning khyhze luthung ccaekia`ae khalang kya-e bya miakaw tuh atyn nawlan namaw ryte lukheit khyhze luning la hoeikuh`ae.
Te aning nynh minmin bya kha a ngae khyh lanze kriccawbu kalan hopah; thuasalama aning nynh kriccawbu bya kha bua a ngae vae khyh lanze amaw kha lawkipaw te nguntokhoipaw hawte la tua ccavae.
“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, pawpaw zemah laephi vawlan na hee oh paw tuh vaawran kya hee athua cih, te pawpaw zemah laephi vawlan na supya oh paw tuh vaawran kya supya athua cih.
“Nanning bua kae hopya oh, nanning kyaze ccungccaw luning nynh lunglokute laephi vawlan uccaw ccangkhakheit kha oun ngiaku`ae ze kha-e kha minmin hanlan vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh a cyipah cih`ae.
Pawccecize luning khyh ze luthung nynh ka min liate pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae kya, tuin kya minmin ngaelaku khe kae ka um,” a cipya`ae.
Oute amaw kalan Piter yn thua zah, “Bawipaw, ka uno nynh ka tungvaw vae hozeihmou sei ngaw zah amaw kha ka ngaethya cih? Vaesari cia tou?” cite a khia.
Jesu nynh, “Nang kha vaesari cia kae cipah khyh; thuasalama sungsari leih sari cia, kae cipya.
Tukeiccu vaawran peenaw tuh a see`ae lae ccazing law a ry paw siapharanpaw lukheit te nynh aloku.
Te ccazing he a laah tuh talent thung haw laeba um paw lukheit kha amaw kalan oun thuakhae`ae.
Thuasalama pya lanpaw a hoi khyh keiccu a bawipaw nynh amaw ry, a zu te a ccaaw`ae ry, te a hoi paw balyn kha zua sah lah lae kha sang sah cite kaw a pya.
“Tukeiccu kha-e see nynh bakhungte amaw kha beik zah, ‘Bawipaw, beih yn ngaethya hin lah marya kae pyaru cih,’ a ci.
Oute tuh-e see a bawipaw nynh ngaethya-umsanaw hoi zah kha-e paw a laeba kha ngaethya zah phe a luesah.

“Thuasalama tuh-e see tuh po pou zah amaw kya denari phua zakheit laeba um paw ryalahkheih`ae paw see lukheitpaw kha a muih; te kha-e paw kha kyng zah a lotharue meih zah, ‘Laeba nae um paw kha yn pya ccavae,’ a cipya.
“Te a banpaw kha-e seepaw nynh a ccu leihpaw bakhung zah amaw kha, ‘Yn ngaethya hin lah marya kae sangru cih,’ cite a ngiaku.
Te aning nynh ngaethya ry khyh, thuasalama cceih zah lae a sang makhia thunginn lungkhu a saw.
Tukeiccu amaw a ban`ae see`ae nynh a cyipaw kha he a muih`ae tuh myarya mih ngaethah, te cceih`ae zah acyikuh paw balyn kha mih bawipaw kalan pung a hopya`ae.
“Oute a bawipaw nynh kha-e see kha a ko koute amaw kha, ‘Pou see hoy leipaw, beih yn ngaethya lah cite nae ngiaku keiccuze na laeba balyn marya kae ngaethya.
Kae nynh na tungvaw ngaethya kae umsah hawte na banpaw see tungvaw ngaethya na umsah lan ccan khyh ta?’ a cipya.
Te a bawipaw tuh a thinria zah kha-e paw nynh a pya lanpaw balyn a pya makhia aning kha vawsaw pyatu`ae kalan a ah.
“Tukeiccu tuhhawte vaawran um paw ka Paaw nynh mah nanning nae uno`ae mih cyiseinaw`ae kha nae thinlung kyate na ngaethya khyh oh ze nae tungvaw tuhhawte a cyih bua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu nynh tuh-e a ccangpya`ae paw kha he a thangsah tuh Galilee kyate pou zah Judea pee Jordan vaw khuraw langkhe a thua.
Te ccungccaw zapi pi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae, te tuin kya minmin kha a dansah`ae.
Farasi`ae mah amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha syntaw khylan, “Ccangkhakheit konglang keiccuze pisepaw nynh a zu kha mya lan kawbya nynh ua tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Atakaw lya a raetu nynh minmin kha pise te nopi nynh a rae cipaw,
te, ‘Hynh-e keiccu pise nynh a paaw te a nung kha a cciataw cih zah a zu kalan a bekuh cih, te minmin luning tuh ngesaw pynkheit athua vae cih`ae,’ acikuh paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?
Tukeiccu minmin tuh luning thua vae khyh`ae, thuasalama pyn kheit nynh thua vae`ae. Tukeiccu Pachia nynh pynkheihlan a suelua vae paw kha ccungccaw nynh phia nan sah,” a ci.
Minmin nynh, “Tuhte lanze pawccemou Mawsi nynh zu te vaw myakunawpaw ccaw kha pya lan zah a zu kha mya lan kaw a pya?” cite a khung`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Nae thinlung akhung keiccu nynh Mawsi nynh nae zu`ae kha mya lan ae ua oh; thuasalama atakaw lya tuhte thua khyh.

Te nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah ohhuakunaw keiccu thua leite a zu kha maah zah ccangpaw zu a hoi paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua; te hunghung zemah a mya`ae paw nopi kha a zu lang a hoeikuh paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
A zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Zu kong pise hanlan tuhte athua lanze zuhoi leipaw tuh san ahoyhua,” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Hynh-e bya hynh ccungccaw balyn nynh lawkuh kho khyh, mih hanlan pya athua`ae paw rou nynh a lawkuh kho`ae.

Pawccecize abang tuh mih nung vue kya mawte tingreihkuh`ae paw a um`ae; te abang tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh tingria`ae paw tingreihkuh`ae paw a um`ae; te vaawran peenaw keiccuze mimaw te mimaw kha tingreihkuh`ae paw a um`ae. E bya hynh a lawkuh khopaw ccungccaw nynh lawkuh sah,” cite a hopya`ae.
Oute mih tungvaw Jesu nynh a kuih a khang ccaw cite, te sawsangpya ccaw`ae cite imua taraw`ae kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae; thuasalama zuitu`ae nynh minmin kha a pe`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Imua taraw`ae kha ka kalan oun cceih`ae sah, kang nan oh; pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh khatahaw`ae paw elan nynh thua,” a ci.
Te imua`ae tungvaw a kuih kha a khang, te tuin kyate a pou.
Te dotua, ccungccaw lukheit amaw kalan yn thua zah, “Ccangpatu hoypaw, zungzae hiinnaw ka hoi nawlan paw uccaw hoypaw mou ka cyih cih?” cite a khia.
Te Jesu nynh, “Pawccemou kamaw hynh ahoypaw cite nae ko? Pachia lukheit laelan ahoypaw hung sanmah um khyh; thuasalama hiinnaw lungkhu lang na tee ry lanze kawpyapaw`ae kha la zui,” a cipya.
Aning nynh, “Paw kha mou?” cite amaw kha a khia. Jesu nynh, “ ‘Ccungccaw na theih lan khyh,’ ‘Milae zu na seikhae lan khyh,’ ‘Na ruh lan khyh,’ ‘Ahme leipaw ccaekia lang tang nan,’
‘Na paaw te na nung kha sawtua,’ te, ‘Na innpaw kha namaw na sungsaku hawte na sungsah cih,’ cikuh paw kha,” a cipya.
Ccangvaepaw nynh, “Tuhe` ae balyn tuh ka ngawphue lya mawte phe ka zui vae; pawmou ka bou ung?” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh accingpaw na thua ry lanze, cceih lah na hoi paw kha la zua, te ryachi`ae kha la pya`ae, te vaawran kya sisua na hoi cih, oute rang lah kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.
Thuasalama ccangvaepaw nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae tuh ngaethyate phe a cceih, pawccecize aning tuh uccaw`ae patae a hoi keiccu nynh thua.
Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, mihoipaw hanlan vaawran peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh kou aru.
Te bua kae hopya oh, mihoipaw hanlan Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw lae tuh kalauk nynh phynbang khu kya tee lan azoihua,” a cipya`ae.
A zuitu`ae nynh kha-e bya kha he a thae`ae tuh myaryasangkae mih ngaeangthua zah, “Tuhte lanze hungmou khumnaw tuh a mue kho cih?” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha do`ae zah, “Ccungccaw lante hynh-e tuh thua kho khyh, thuasalama Pachia lante pawpaw balyn tuh athua kho,” a ci.
Oute Piter nynh khung zah, “Dotua, kaening tuh pawpaw balyn marya kae vuasya zah namaw kha kae zui, tukeiccu pawmou kae mue cih?” a ci.

Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tynre balyn bua raethuinaw ccyh kya Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a phu-enaw suitungkhung kya he yn dahungte kamaw nae zui oh paw nanning mah suitungkhung haw laening vawlan nae dahungbua cih oh zah Israel phin haw laening kha bya nae pia cih oh.

Te kamaw min keiccuze inn`ae, tukhyhze uno`ae, tukhyhze ccia`ae, tukhyhze paaw, tukhyhze nung, tukhyhze zu, tukhyhze ccaaw`ae, tukhyhze lorang kha a cciataw paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh leih zakheit a mueru cih zah zungzae hiinnaw rhoccou cih.
Thuasalama masaty e ccungccaw patae tuh nyathyakou thua cih`ae zah nyathyakou e patae tuh masaty thua cih`ae.
“Pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh a misu khokhu lungkhu lang ryalahtu`ae hoh lan cite awkhua takawte a cceih paw khokhu hoitupaw te nynh aloku.
Te aning nynh nin kheit ze denari kia kheit pya lante ryalahtu`ae ryte nawccawnaw kha rae zah minmin kha a misu khokhu lungkhu lang a saw`ae.
“Te suimilan ccangthungnaw loukaw khe bua pou zah kungkunaw kya pawsang cyi leite a thadyn`ae paw mingccang`ae kha a muih.
Te minmin kha, ‘Nanning mah misu khokhu lungkhu lang la cceihbua oh lah accan thyhte kae pya cih oh,’ a cipya`ae. Te minmin mah a cceihbua`ae.
Suimilan ccangtaruhnaw te ccangtakuanaw loukaw khe bua cceih zah tuhhawte bua a cyi.
Te suimilan haw laekheitnaw loukaw khe bua cceih zah mingccang`ae pawsang cyi leite a thadyn`ae paw kha muih zah, ‘Nanning pawccemou e kya pawsang cyi leite nin balyn na thadyn oh?’ cite a khia`ae.
“Minmin nynh, ‘Hung ccungccaw nynh san oun hohku khyh`ae keiccu,’ a ci`ae. Aning nynh minmin kha, ‘Nanning mah misu khokhu lungkhu lang la cceih oh lah accan thyhte na mue cih oh,’ a cipya`ae.

“Te zete he yn thua tuh misu khokhu hoitupaw nynh a ryaccinkhanpaw kalan khe, ‘Ryalahtu`ae kha ko`ae lah nyathyakou a tee paw kyate tho lah masaty a tee paw kyacia mih ryalaw mee kha pya`ae,’ a cipya.
“Te suimilan haw laekheitnaw loukaw kya ryalaw a tee`ae paw tuh oun thua`ae zah ccungccaw miakaw nynh denari kia kheit cci a mue`ae.
Thuasalama masaty ryalaw a tee`ae paw he oun thua`ae tuh mimaw tuh alunghua kae mue cih cite a tuaku`ae; te minmin mah tuh-e hawte luraveih nynh denari kia kheit cci a mue`ae.
Te khate he a mue`ae tuh minmin nynh khokhu hoitupaw kha ccohnuakuh`ae zah,
‘E`ae nyathyakou oun tee`ae paw tuh suimilan ccangkheit kyalya nynh ryalaw`ae, te minmin kha khuanin so teing`ae zah phupaw a phu`ae paw kaening ryte phe na nginsaku bua`ae,’ a cipya`ae.
“Thuasalama aning nynh minmin kyaze lukheitpaw kha, ‘Ka ban, na kya ka cyihsei khyh, denari kia kheit te ryalaw lan na naw phe ccah khyh tou?
Na ccan paw hynh lawkuh lah la cceih ccavae; hynh-e nyathyakou e paw hynh nang te phe anginkuh lan ka pya ry.
Kamaw uccaw tungvaw ka cyi ry paw cyi lan ka hanlan ccan khyh tou? Kae nynh ka hoy keiccuze nang tuh na eiung tou?’ a cipya.
“Tukeiccu nyathyakou e`ae tuh masaty thua cih`ae zah masaty e`ae tuh nyathyakou thua cih`ae; pawccecize ccungccaw patae tuh ko athua`ae, thuasalama ccapyh nynh po athua`ae,” a ci.
Te Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a cciathung lya laanpi kya zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha mih makhaete cciakhae`ae zah minmin kha,
“Dotua oh, aening tuh Jerusalem lang ah cceihthung oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kalan oun ah cih`ae zah minmin nynh amaw kha chia lan sei oun be cih`ae.
Te amaw kha sarya khylan, bua khylan, te khiade khylan Zenta`ae kalan oun ah cih`ae; te nin thungnaw kya bua yn thothui cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Zebedi ccaaw`ae mih nung tuh a ccaaw`ae ryte Jesu kalan oun thua`ae, amaw kha beik zah a kya-e uccaw ccangkheit a ngiaku.
Te Jesu nynh, “Pawmou na ry?” cite a khia. Nopinung nynh, “Hynh-e ka ccaaw`ae luning nynh na peenaw kya lukheit na ranglang, te lukheit na voilang a dahungbua nawlan`ae oun pyabua,” a cipya.

Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Nanning nynh paw nynh kae ngia cipaw na nyh khyh oh. Nanning nynh ka neih vae cih paw banang kha na neihbua kho cih oh tou? Te kae nynh baptisma ka in lanpaw kha na in bua kho cih oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Kae cyih kho cih,” a ci`ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh ka banang kha na neih ccaccing cih oh zah baptisma ka in lanpaw kya na in bua cih oh; thuasalama ka ranglang te ka voilang dahung lan pya lanpaw tuh ka kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama ka Paaw nynh mih hanlan a paccynpya`ae paw rou nynh pya athua cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
Te zuitu luhaw nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh uno luning tungvaw myarya mih thinria.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha ko`ae zah, “Zenta`ae uktu`ae nynh tuh uknaw kaw khate a uk`ae, te a lesae`ae paw nynh kawhoinaw kha a mang`ae cipaw na ny oh.
Tuhzemah nanning laku tuhte thua lan khyh, thuasalama nanning laku alesaepaw lang a tang ry paw tuh nae rya ae lawpatu oh paw lang tangsah.
Te nanning laku hunghung zemah lupihua lang a tang ry paw tuh nae seepaw lang tangsah.

Tuhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh mah rya lawsaku khylan yn thua khyh, thuasalama ming`ae ryalawpya khylan, te ccungccaw patae sawkhawnaw hanlan a hiinnaw kha pyaku khylan nynh yn thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te Jeriko kyate minmin he a pou`ae tuh ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te dotua, laanpi zung a dahung`ae paw mitmoh`ae luning nynh Jesu po a cceih cipaw he a thae`ae tuh, “Pou Bawipaw, David Ccapaw, kaening hynh thaw beih oun ccih!” cite a sia`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi nynh minmin kha daetedae lang a um ccaw`ae cite a sianua`ae; thuasalama minmin nynh, “Pou Bawipaw, David Ccapaw, kaening hynh thaw beih oun ccih!” cite houh a sia`ae.
Te Jesu tuh a thadyn, te minmin kha ko`ae zah, “Nae hanlan pawmou nae cyisah ry oh?” cite a khia`ae.
Minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, kae mit ngawmuih lanpaw nynh kae ry,” a ci`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu nynh ngaethyaumsah` ae zah mih mit kha a hae, te vaekheihmawte mih mit tuh ngawmuih zah minmin nynh amaw kha a zui vae`ae.
Te Jesu te a zuitu`ae nynh Jerusalem lang naekuh`ae zah Oliv Mua leihpaw Bethfake khua he a thua`ae tuh Jesu nynh zuitu luning kha saw`ae zah,
“Nanning nae malang um paw khua kalan la cceih oh lah lann a khii`ae paw te lann taraw kha ccaheih na la muih cih oh; khae` ae kha oun supah oh lah kamaw kalan oun sue oh.
Te lukhakheit nynh ae khia oh ze, nanning nynh, ‘Bawipaw nynh a peki,’ nae cipah cih oh; te kha-e paw nynh palou ae sawpah cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Profeh nynh a hosyapaw accing nawlan nynh hynh-e`ae balyn tuh marya acyikuh; a hosyapaw tuh:
“ ‘Dotua, na Siapharan tuh anopaw lann taraw kha yn ccikuh zah lungnenaw te na kalan yn cceih cciamang,’ cite Zion ccanung kha hopah oh,” acikuh.
Tukeiccu zuitu`ae tuh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh kawpya`ae hawte a cyi`ae.
Te lann pinung te lann taraw kha oun thuakhae`ae zah lann`ae tungvaw khe mih uccaw`ae kha de`ae zah kha-e`ae vawlan Jesu kha a ccisaku`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi pi nynh mih uccaw`ae kha laanpi kya a phaepya`ae; mingccang`ae nynh thingku kya-e thingran`ae kha loi`ae zah laanpi kya a phaepya`ae.
Oute malang cceih`ae paw te nuhlang te a zuikuh`ae paw ccungccaw zapi nynh, “David Ccapaw, Hosanna! BAWIPAW min te yn thua paw tuh hythuaccou sah! Ahang huanaw kya Hosanna thua sah!” cite a sia`ae.
Te Jesu Jerusalem lungkhu lang he a thua tuh, khualae balyn tuh ngaluin-ngaluin ccae`ae zah, “E paw tuh hungmou?” a ci`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi nynh, “E paw tuh Galilee pee e Nazareth paw profeh Jesu nynh thua,” a ci`ae.

Te Jesu tuh Pachia tempal voidu lungkhu lang cceih zah tempal voidu kya a zua`ae paw te a re`ae paw balyn kha a dee`ae, te phuaru`ae paw mih ccaboi te vafu zua`ae paw tungkhung kha dae dawleihpah`ae zah,
minmin kha, “ ‘Ka inn tuh sawsangnaw inn ci athua cih,’ cite azeikuh. Thuasalama nanning nynh ‘miruh`ae karung’ lang phe na rae oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te mitmohpaw te ccukhoupaw amaw kalan tempal kya oun thua`ae zah minmin kha a dansah`ae.

Te Jesu nynh a cyipaw ngaeang lan um paw uccaw`ae te imua`ae nynh tempal kya, “David Ccapaw kya Hosanna thua sah!” cite a sia`ae paw kha, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh he muih`ae tuh mih thin phe khykuh zah,

amaw kha, “E imua`ae nynh a ho`ae paw tuh na thae tou?” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Ou ka thae. ‘Imua`ae te mateizu`ae paw nosi`ae khalang lungkhu te phe accingpaw thehoysanaw kha na hoi,’ acikuh paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?” cite a khung`ae.
Te minmin kha cciataw`ae zah khualae te pou zah Bethani khua lang a cceih; te tuin kya a rya.
Awkhua khe khualae lang he a ki tuh a vuelaw vae.

Te laanpi pe thaeku ku kha he a muih tuh a ccianua, thuasalama kha-e kya a naw`ae kyalya laelan pawsang muih khyh; te kha-e kha, “Atu te zungzae cia na kya athae la thae nan vae sah,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte thaeku ku tuh karae arou.
Te kha-e kha zuitu`ae nynh he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “Pawtepei thaeku ku karae arou kanmaw?” a ci`ae.

Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, lunghiinnaw hoi leite zynnaw na hoi oh ze, thaeku ku kya acyikuh paw kyalya thua leite, hynh-e mua hynh, ‘Nang nuekuh lah rili lungkhu lang phungkuh,’ na ci oh zemah ou tuhte acyikuh cih.
Te zynte, pawpaw balyn sawsangnaw te na ngia oh paw tuh na mue cih oh,” a cipya`ae.

Te Jesu tempal lungkhu lang thua zah a ccangpya`ae lyakhe, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Paw kawhoinaw te mou hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh na cyi? Te hung nynh mou e kawhoinaw hynh nang ae pya?” cite a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kae mah bya ccangkheit kae khia cih oh, tuh-e tuh nae hopya oh ze, kae mah e uccaw`ae hynh paw kawhoinaw te nynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah ru cih oh:

Johan kya-e baptisma hynh paw kyate mou yn thua? Vaawran kyate tou? Tukhyhze ccungccaw`ae kyate tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh mimaw te mimaw hokuh`ae zah, “ ‘Vaawran kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, aning nynh, ‘Tuhte lanze pawccemou amaw kha na zyn khyh oh,’ oun ci cih.
Thuasalama, ‘Ccungccaw`ae kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, ccungccaw`ae rawri lan a um; pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh Johan tuh profeh lukheit hawte a tua`ae paw nynh thua,” a ciku`ae.
Te minmin nynh Jesu kha, “Kae nyh khyh,” cite a khung`ae. Te aning nynh, “Kae mah paw kawhoinaw te nynh e uccaw`ae hynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah lan khyh oh.

“Thuasalama nanning pawte na tua oh? Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh ccaaw pise luning a hoi; aning nynh masaty e paw kalan cceih zah, ‘Ka ccapaw, atunin ka misu khokhu kya ryalaw lan va cceih vae lou,’ a cipya.
“A ccapaw nynh, ‘Ka cceih lan khyh,’ a ci; thuasalama khuekheih acihte ngaesikuh zah phe a cceih.
“Te luningnaw e paw kalan cceih zah, tuhhawte bua a hopya. Te aning nynh, ‘Ka la cceih vae sah, bawihaepaw,’ cipah zah cceih khyh.

“Tuh-e luning`ae lakuze hung tuh mou a paaw rynaw a cyipah?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Masaty e paw,” a ci`ae. Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nguntokhoi`ae paw te ohhuanung`ae nynh nae malang khe Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang a tee`ae.

Pawccecize Johan tuh dingnaw laanpi kya zuite nanning kalan yn thua zah nanning nynh amaw kha na zyn khyh oh; thuasalama nguntokhoi`ae paw te ohhuanung`ae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae; te nanning nynh kha-e kha na muih oh koute amaw kha na zyn nawlan oh na ngaesikuh khyh oh.

“Ccangpaw tousenaw phungpaw hynh ngaetua oh: Inn hoitu lukheit nynh misu khokhu kha rae zah hohung po a koihlu, te misutui sunawkhu kha karyn zah buhang ccangkheit a sak, te khokhu kha misu ryalahtu`ae hohsakuh`ae zah asawnaw ram lang phe a cceih.
Te misu thae lo ccyh he a thua tuh misu thae`ae kha mue khylan misu ryalahtu`ae kalan khe a ryalahtu`ae kha a saw`ae.
“Te misu ryalahtu`ae nynh a ryalahtu`ae kha kyng`ae zah lukheitpaw kha a bua`ae, te lukheit kha a chia`ae, te lukheit kha lung te a deih`ae.
Aning nynh masaty-e lae alungpaw ccangpaw a ryalahtu`ae kha bua a saw`ae; te minmin nynh khae` ae kha tuhhawte bua a cyi`ae.
Thuasalama nyathyakou tuh, ‘Minmin nynh ka ccapaw tuh sawtua cih`ae,’ ci zah minmin kalan a ccapaw kha a saw.
“Thuasalama misu ryalahtu`ae nynh a ccapaw kha he a muih`ae tuh, ‘E paw tuh rhoccoutu nynh thua, rang oh, amaw hynh theih oh sih lah a rho uccaw hynh lua oh sih,’ cite mimaw te mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
Te kha-e paw kha kyng`ae zah misu khokhu lungkhu te atolang dae vua`ae zah phe a chia`ae.
“Tukeiccu misu khokhu hoitu he yn thua vae ze kha-e misu ryalahtu`ae kha pawtemou a cyih cih`ae?” cite a khia`ae.

Minmin nynh, “Kha-e athaharuhpaw ccungccaw`ae kha phe ccihtheih lante a roh cih`ae zah a misu khokhu kha athae ccyh kya athae a pya cih`ae paw ccangpaw misu ccoutu`ae kalan nynh a hohsakuh vae cih,” a ci`ae.

Jesu nynh minmin kha, “ ‘Lung-inn saktu`ae nynh a nue`ae paw lung tuh inn saknaw kya aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang yn tang, hynh-e tuh BAWIPAW nynh a cyi paw nynh thua, te aening muihnaw kya e tuh ngaeang lan um paw nynh thua,’ acikuh paw kha Ccathyaa kya na ria boi khyh oh tou?
“Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kyate lawpya athua cih zah kha-e peenaw athae thae paw minphuin kalan khe pya athua cih.
Te hunghung zemah hynh-e lung vawlan a ccah paw tuh phe akinkuh cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah e lung nynh a ccawthin paw tuh palae tui lang a mia cih,” a cipya`ae.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh tuh-e tousenaw phungpaw`ae kha he a thae`ae tuh minmin kong nynh oun honua cipaw a nyku`ae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha kyng lan cite he a ccung`ae tuh ccungccaw zapi raw kha a rih`ae; pawccemacize ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw tuh profeh cite a tua`ae paw nynh thua.
Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae kha tousenaw phungpaw`ae te bua a hopya`ae. A hopaw tuh:
“Vaawran peenaw tuh a ccapaw hanlan zudy poi a tua paw siapharanpaw te nynh aloku.
Te zudy poi kalan thuabua lan a ko`ae paw kha kosah lan`ae a see`ae kha a saw`ae; thuasalama minmin tuh oun thua ry khyh`ae.

“Ccangpaw a see`ae kha bua saw`ae zah, ‘Ko athua vae`ae paw kha hynhte la hopah oh, “Dotua oh, ka loohdangkunaw tuh phe ka paccyn kou vae, ka tangnuapaw`ae te athopaw saring`ae kha phe ka chia vae, te pawpaw balyn tuh paccyn athua vae, zudy poi loohdangkunaw kalan rang ccavae oh,” ’ cite a hosapya`ae.
“Thuasalama minmin nynh kha-e kha pawlangria khyh`ae zah mih rynaw lang phe cceih`ae, lukheitpaw nynh a lei kalan cceih zah ccangpaw nynh a kungkunaw lang phe a cceih.
Te tuhlae`ae nynh kha-e see`ae kha kyng`ae zah sarisarya zuenah`ae zah phe a chia`ae.
Thuasalama siapharan nynh kha-e kong kha he a thae tuh myarya a thinria zah a rhawkaw`ae kha saw`ae zah kha-e ccungccatheih`ae kha phe a chiasah`ae, te mih khuapi kha maee te phe a rua`ae.
“Oute a see`ae kha, ‘Zudy poi tuh paccyn phe athua vae, thuasalama ko`ae paw tuh ngaekuh vae khyh`ae.
Tukeiccu nanning nynh laanpi lepaw`ae tungkunaw kalan la cceih oh lah na muih oh paw ccungccaw miakaw kha zudy poi kalan oun ko oh,’ cite a hopya`ae.

Tukeiccu tuh-e see`ae tuh laanpi lepaw`ae tungkunaw lang cceih`ae zah ahoypaw te ahoy leipaw ccungccaw`ae paryhte a muih`ae paw balyn kha pynkheihlan pung a suelua`ae; te zudy poi tuh mikhia`ae ryte phe abeih vae.
“Te siapharanpaw nynh mikhia`ae do lan he yn tee tuh zudy poi uccaw a lawkuh leipaw ccungccaw lukheit kha a muih.
Te kha-e paw kha, ‘Ka ban, pawtemou zudy poi uccaw lawku leite hynhlang nae ccia?’ a cipya. Te aning tuh yccae vae khyh.
“Oute siapharanpaw nynh a see`ae kha, ‘A kuih te a ccu kha hee oh lah cciakhae oh, te rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a umnaw atolang mohnaw lungkhu langkhe dae vua oh,’ a cipya`ae.
“Pawccecize ko paw tuh alung, thuasalama popaw tuh azya,” a ci.
Oute Farasi`ae tuh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh a hopaw kya pawtemou kaangsyakhaw lan cipaw khuakhankuh`ae.

Te minmin nynh Herod ccungccaw`ae ryte mimaw zuitu`ae kha Jesu kalan saw`ae zah, “Ccangpatupaw, nang tuh ahmepaw na thua zah Pachia laanpi kha hmerarihlan na ccangpya, te hung ccungccaw mah pawlang na ria khyh; pawccecize nang tuh ccungccaw`ae mae na do khyh cipaw kae ny.
Tukeiccu kaening oun hopya tua, pawtemou na tua? Sizar kalan ngunto pya lan accan tou, ccan khyh tou?” cite a khiasah`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih thyaruhnaw kha phe nyh zah, “Cyihruh`ae, pawccemou kamaw hynh nae syntaw oh?
Phuakhoi phua kha yn dosah tua oh,” a ci. Te minmin nynh denari kia kheit kha oun ccyngpya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Hynh-e hynh hung muinsan te hung ccawzeipyapaw mou?” cite a khia`ae.
Minmin nynh, “Sizar muinsan te a ccawzeikuh paw,” a ci`ae. Oute Jesu nynh, “Tukeiccu Sizar uccaw`ae kha Sizar kalan pya oh lah Pachia uccaw`ae kha Pachia kalan pya oh,” cite minmin kha a khung`ae.
Minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua; te amaw kha cciataw`ae zah phe a cceih`ae.
Tuh-e nin kya thothuinaw um khyh a cih`ae paw Sadusi`ae tuh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah hynhte a khia`ae:
“Ccangpatupaw, ‘Ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccaaw hoi leite a chi ze a zu kha a neitapaw nynh a umkhae cih, te a upaw hanlan ciihan a pousah ccaw,’ cite Mawsi nynh a hosya.
Atu kaening laku kya uno lusari a umbua`ae; atawccapaw nynh zuhoi zah ccaaw hoi leite phe a chih, a zu kha a neitapaw a cciatawpyasya.
Tuhhawte luningnaw nynh bua a hoi, te luthungnaw kyate lusarinaw kalan phe thua.
Te tuh-e`ae balyn koute tuh-e nopinung mah phe a chih.
Tukeiccu thothuinaw kya tuh-e nung tuh lusari`ae kyaze hung zu lang mou a tang cih? Pawccecize minmin balyn nynh phe a umkhae`ae,” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning phe na me oh, Ccathyaa na nyh khyh oh, Pachia thungnaw mah na nyh khyh oh.
Pawccecize thothuinaw kya tuh zuhoi vae khyh`ae, zudypyaku mah um vae khyh, thuasalama minmin tuh vaawran kya um paw Pachia vaaw ccungccaw`ae hawte nynh athua vae`ae.
Thuasalama a chih`ae paw thothuinaw konglang te Pachia nynh nanning kalan a hosyapaw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou? A hopaw tuh:
‘Kae tuh Abraham Pachia, Isaak Pachia, te Jakob Pachia nynh ka thua,’ a ci. Pachia tuh a chih`ae paw Pachia thua khyh, thuasalama a hiin`ae paw Pachia nynh thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi nynh tuh-e bya he a thae`ae tuh a ccangpyanaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
Thuasalama Sadusi`ae kha Jesu nynh zya a daesah`ae cipaw kha Farasi`ae nynh he a thae`ae tuh pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae.
Te minmin kyaze kawbyathyapaw lukheit nynh Jesu kha syntaw khylan bya a khia. A khia paw tuh:
“Ccangpatupaw, kawbya kya tei-e hynh mou abapi huapaw kawpyapaw athua?” a ci.
Jesu nynh, “ ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha na thinlung balynte, na hiinnaw-muisaw balynte, te na tuanaw balynte na sungsah cih,’ acikuh.
Hynh-e tuh masaty te ale huapaw kawpyapaw nynh thua.
Te ccangningnaw tuh kha-e te alokuh. ‘Na innpaw kha namaw toulou hawte na sungsah cih,’ acikuh.
Kawbya balyn te Profeh`ae balyn tuh hynh-e kawpyapaw`ae ccangning kyahin nynh marya a kyngku,” a cipya.
Farasi`ae pynkheihlan a sueluaku`ae lyakhe Jesu nynh,
“Kri hynh pawtemou na tua oh? Aning tuh hung Ccaaw mou athua?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “David Ccapaw nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Tuhte lanze pawccemou David nynh Muisaw liate amaw kha ‘Bawipaw’ a ci. David nynh a hopaw tuh:
“ ‘BAWIPAW nynh ka Bawipaw kha, “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia, nang tuh ka ranglang khe dahung,” a cipya,’ a ci.
“David nynh Kri kha ‘Bawipaw’ cite a ko lanze, pawtemou aning tuh a Ccapaw athua cih?” cite a khia`ae.
Te bya kawkheit a khung khopaw hung sanmah um khyh; tuh-e nin kyate lukhakheit nynh san byakhia ngan vae khyh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi te a zuitu`ae kha bya a hopya`ae.
A hopaw tuh: “Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh tuh Mawsi tungkhung kya nynh a dahung`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh cyi lan ae hopya oh paw miakaw kha hoyte la tuase oh lah la cyih oh; thuasalama mih cyisahnaw`ae hawte la cyih bua nan oh, pawccecize minmin tuh ho`ae zah cyih khyh`ae.
Pawccecize minmin tuh ri zah phu lan arupaw phupaw kha tung`ae zah ccungccaw`ae mih raw vawlan a khang`ae, thuasalama mimaw tuh mih kuihdung ccangkheit te san nue ry khyh`ae.

“Thuasalama mih ryalaw`ae balyn kha tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh muih`ae sah cite nynh a law`ae. Mih terui kya te mih kuihbaw kya a khiideku`ae paw saving bung kha kosah`ae zah mih angkile`ae adung kha a ccuasaku`ae.
Te poi kya ahoy huaccepaw ahangnaw khaan kha ry`ae zah sinakok`ae kya ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw`ae kha a ry`ae.
Te kungkunaw`ae kya beihkury`ae zah ccungccaw`ae nynh, ‘Rabbi, Rabbi,’ cite koku a ry`ae.
“Thuasalama nanning tuh ‘Rabbi’ cite la kokuh ry nan oh; pawccecize Kri athua paw, nanning Ccangpatu lukheit rou nynh a um; te nanning balyn tuh uteno`ae nynh na thua oh.
Te laephi vawlan hung sanmah ‘Apang’ cite ko nan oh; pawccecize vaawran kya a um paw nae Paaw lukheit rou nynh a um.
‘Ccangpatu’ cite mah la kokuh ry nan oh; pawccecize Kri athua paw, nanning Ccangpatu lukheit rou nynh a um.
Thuasalama nanning laku ale huaccepaw tuh nanning ryalawpatu athua cih.
Te hunghung zemah amaw te amaw a hangthungkuh paw tuh sawbung athua cih; te amaw te amaw zakawsangsakuhpaw tuh hangthung athua cih.

“Thuasalama kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize vaawran peenaw kha ccungccaw`ae elan phe na khaw oh, te naemaw mah na tee khyh oh zah a tee ry`ae paw mah na uapah khyh oh.

Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize numae`ae inn kha na luade oh zah cyisakuthya nawlan saw kha asaepi na sang oh; tukeiccu ale huapaw detahnaw kha na mue cih oh.

“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit a beiknaw rulae khylan rili te laephi kya khua na ccung oh, te he yn rulaekuh tuh kha-e paw kha naemaw laeze leih ning kehenna ccapaw lang na rae oh.

“Cciakhaetu`ae mitmoh`ae, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Nanning nynh ‘Hunghung zemah tempal liate ccaesaku ze, tuh-e tuh pawtua um khyh; thuasalama hunghung zemah tempal kya-e sui liate ccaesakuh paw tuh a tynsah aho,’ na ci oh.
Nanning mingaee`ae te mitmoh`ae! Sui tou abapihua, tukhyhze sui a thyaasah paw tempal tou abapihua? Paw hynh mou abapihua?
Te ‘Hunghung zemah silawhang liate ccaesaku ze, tuh-e tuh pawtua um khyh, thuasalama hunghung zemah kha-e vawlan a um paw silawkunawpaw phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh a tynsah aho,’ na ci oh.
Nanning mingaee`ae te mitmoh`ae! Silawkunawpaw tou abapihua, tukhyhze silawkunawpaw a thyaasahpaw silawhang tou abapihua? Paw hynh mou abapihua?
Tukeiccu silawhang phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh silawhang te kha-e kya um paw uccaw`ae balyn phyate ccaesakuh paw nynh thua.
Te tempal phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh tempal te kha-e kya um paw amaw phyate ccaesakuh paw nynh thua.
Te vaawran phyate ccaesakuh paw tuh Pachia suitungkhung phyate ccaesakuh paw thua zah kha-e vawlan a dahung paw amaw phyate ccaesakuh paw nynh thua.

“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh hangmae, pucinan, te khanmuin kha pumhaw pumkheit na pya oh zah Kawbya kyaze akhingcci huapaw atazaenaw, ngaethyaumsanaw te zyn lan umnaw tuh phe na kawtaw oh; hynh-e`ae hynh na cyi lan oh accanpaw nynh thua, te ccangpaw mah cyi leite na um lan oh paw thua khyh.
Cciakhaetu`ae mitmoh`ae, masihvaekan kha na ryhbia oh zah kalauk kha po na laang oh!

“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh banang te pake kha avawlan kyalya nynh na sing oh, thuasalama a lungkhu tuh luadenaw te alue lante cyipaw nynh phe abeih.
Mitmohpaw Farasipaw, pakekhupaw te banang alungkhu kha masaty singty, ou tuhte ze nynh kha-e`ae avawlan kha mah athyaabua cih.

“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh avaw langte phe apuithya sasaw lante langkuh salamah alungkhu tuh michi`ae ru te athu-anangpaw`ae balynte phe beihpaw arawpaw thuhkuhpaw shawku te nynh na loku oh.
Ou kha-e hawte nanning mah avaw langte tuh ccungccaw`ae malang adingpaw hawte nynh na langku oh, thuasalama nae lungkhu tuh cyiruhnaw te kawbya einaw te nynh phe abia.
“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize profeh`ae shawku kha na raepah oh zah miding`ae shaw lungbing kha na paccaan oh.
Te ‘Kae minpaaw`ae she lyakhe kae la umbua ze, profeh`ae chii luasanaw kya minmin ryte kae umbua lan khyh,’ na ci oh.
Tukeiccu nanning tuh profeh`ae a theih`ae paw minmin mih ccaaw`ae nynh kae thua cite naemaw te naemaw hanlan ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh.
Ou tuhte nae minpaaw`ae cyisahnaw tounawpaw kha na biachih oh.
“Nanning fupaw`ae, fuparepaw ciihan`ae! Pawtemou kehenna kya-e detahnaw kyate na lue kho cih oh?

Tukeiccu, dotua oh, profeh`ae te ahawpaw ccungccaw`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha nae kalan kae saw`ae; te minmin lakuze abang kha na theih cih oh zah na khiade cih oh; te abang kha nae sinakok`ae kya na bua cih oh zah khua khuakheit kyate khuakheit kyacia na tua na sah cih oh.

Ou tuhte adingpaw Abel chii kyate, tempal te silawhang laku na chia oh paw Barachiah ccapaw Zakharia chii kyacia laephi vawlan alua paw adingpaw ccungccaw`ae chii balyn tuh nanning tungvaw a thua nawlan.
Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh hynh-e ccungccaw`ae kyahin oun cyikuh cih.

“Profeh`ae a theih paw, na kalan oun saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha lung te a deih paw, pou Jerusalem, Jerusalem, awpinung nynh a taw`ae kha a sake kawlan a suelua`ae hawte na ccaaw`ae kha pynkheihlan suelua lan pei ka ry, thuasalama nang nynh na ry khyh!
Dotua oh! Nae inn tuh nanning umnaw kho lei lante a um han.
Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, ‘BAWIPAW min liate yn thua paw Ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,’ cite na ho oh makhia atu kyate nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh,” a ci.
Te Jesu tuh cceih zah tempal kyate a pou; te a zuitu`ae nynh tempal kya-e innsakkuhpaw`ae kha muihsah khylan amaw kalan oun thua`ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “E uccaw`ae balyn hynh na muih khyh oh tou? Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tingsah bung leite lung ccangkheit vawlan ccangkheit san a khangthykuh paw e kya um lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.

Te Oliv Mua vawlan a dahung lyakhe zuitu`ae nynh mih makhaete amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “E uccaw`ae hynh hotuhmou yn cyikuh cih? Te nae thuanaw lanpaw te laephi she athangnaw lanpaw paw muihsanaw mou yn langkuh cih? Kaening hynh oun hopah bua,” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Hung ccungccaw nynh san ae ling khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh.
Pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh ka min te oun thua cih`ae zah, ‘Kae tuh Kri nynh ka thua,’ oun ci cih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha oun ling cih`ae.

Te nanning nynh rhawtukkunaw kong te rhawtukkunaw lanpaw kong kha nae thae vae cih oh; tuhzemah nae thinphang nan sah; pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh oun cyikuh hahe cih, thuasalama athangnaw tuh thua loh khyh.
Pawccecize minphuin phuinkheit te phuinkheit, ram ramkheit te ramkheit oun rhawkuh cih`ae; te ccakangnaw yn thua cih, ccinaw yn thua cih, te khyzawvawkaw kya innrui yn suekuh cih.
Hynh-e`ae balyn tuh vawsaw teingnaw athotakawnaw nynh thua.
“Oute ccungccaw`ae nynh nanning kha vawrivawsaw nung khylan ae ah cih oh zah ae theih cih oh; te kamaw min keiccuze minphuin`ae balyn nynh ae hua cih oh.
Oute ccungccaw patae tuh oun maeleihkuh vae cih`ae, lukheit te lukheit yn pheekuh cih`ae zah lukheit te lukheit yn huakuh cih`ae.
Te ahme leipaw profeh`ae patae oun langkuh cih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha oun ling cih`ae.
Te kawngae leinaw alung keiccuze ccungccaw patae kya-e sungsakunaw tuh yn zya bung vae cih.
Thuasalama athangnaw cia atynpaw tuh khum athua cih.
Te hynh-e peenaw thehoypaw hynh minphuin`ae balyn kalan ccaekia lang laephipi balyn kya ho athua cih; oute athangnaw tuh yn thua vae cih.

“Tukeiccu profeh Denial nynh a ho hawte, luathua-ae-ui lang um paw a rohtupaw nynh athyaapaw hmin kya a thadyn paw kha nanning nynh he nae muih vae oh ze, (Ccathyaa a ria paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh thaethya sah);
Judah ram kya um`ae paw nynh mua lang ccue`ae sah.
Inn tungvaw a um paw nynh a inn lungkhu e ccangkhakheit lawku khylan rungbung nan vae sah.
Lei kya um paw ccungccaw nynh mah a boeining lawku khylan ki nan vae sah.
Te tuh-e nin`ae kya ccaawpoipaw nopi`ae te mateizupaw nosi a hoi paw nopi`ae hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang!
Te nanning na ccuenaw oh ccyh tuh khoccih ccyh athua khyh nawlan te Sabbath nin kya athua khyh nawlan saw la sang oh.
Pawccecize laephipi atho takawte atu cia a la um boi leipaw, te a um boi vae cih leipaw alepipaw vawsawrunawpi tuh yn thua cih.
Te tuh-e nin`ae kha dynsah khyh lanze hung sanmah lue lan khyh, thuasalama popaw ccungccaw`ae hanlan kha-e nin`ae kha dynsah athua cih.
“Oute lukhakheit nynh, ‘Dotua, e kya nynh Kri tuh a um!’ tukhyhze khuin nynh a um!’ ae cipya oh ze la zyn nan oh.

Pawccecize ahme leipaw kri`ae te ahme leipaw profeh`ae oun langkuh cih`ae zah athua kho ze alepaw muihsanaw te ngaeangnaw kha oun langsakuh cih`ae; ou khate popaw ccungccaw`ae hei kha oun ling cih`ae.
Dotua oh, nanning kha phe kae hopyaty vae oh.
“Tukeiccu minmin nynh, ‘Dotua, Kri tuh rangkaw nynh a um!’ ae cipya oh ze la cceih nan oh. ‘Dotua, aning tuh akhaan lungkhu nynh a um!’ ae cipya oh ze la zyn nan oh.
Pawccecize khozawlaekuhpaw tuh nithua langte yn laekuh zah niccaw langcia a aw hawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw mah athua cih.
Pawccecize michihrua a umnaw`ae miakaw kya langtaw`ae mah pynkheihlan a sueluakuh bua cih`ae.
“Tuh-e nin`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw koute vaekheihmawte khuanin amoh vae cih zah sawpaw aw vae lan khyh, te awsi`ae tuh vaawlui kyate accah cih`ae zah vaawran kya-e thungnaw`ae tuh oun hy vae cih.

“Oute vaawran kya Ccungccaw Ccapaw muihsanaw yn langkuh cih; oute laephi kya-e minphuin`ae balyn tuh oun rah oun khui cih`ae, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh thungnaw te alepaw phu-enaw ryte vaaw lang-e maeking`ae kya yn rung paw kha oun muih vae cih`ae.

Te myarya accaepaw mungkae roi ryte a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha yn saw cih`ae zah amaw nynh a po`ae paw kha minmin nynh laephi kipali kyate, vaawran athangnaw sang kheit kyate sang kheit kyacia pynkheihlan oun suelua cih`ae.
“Thaeku ku tousenaw phungpaw hynh atu ccangku tua oh; aran ano lya anaw`ae he yn toih tuh hawning ccyh anae vae cipaw na ny oh.
Tuh-e hawte nanning nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn hynh he nae muih vae oh ze Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw tuh anae vae, thuakaw kin cia yn naekuh vae cipaw la nyh ccavae oh.
Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn acyiku kou makhia atu-e ccungccaw`ae zo lan khyh`ae.
Vaawran te laephi tuh azo cih, thuasalama ka bya`ae tuh zo lan khyh.
“Thuasalama tuh-e nin te ccyh tuh hung nynh sanmah nyh khyh, vaawran um paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh mah nyh khyh`ae, thuasalama ka Paaw kyalya nynh a nyh.
Te Noah ccyh lya hawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw mah yn cyikuh cih.
Pawccecize tuipayn a thua maw nin`ae kya, Noah nynh sanphalung lungkhu lang a tee nin cia, minmin tuh aete, niate, zudykute, zudypyakute nynh a um`ae.
Te tuipayn thua zah minmin balyn pung a cciakhae`ae cia raeringku lanpaw kha nyh khyh`ae; tuh-e hawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thua lanpaw kya acyikuh bua cih.
Oute tuh-e ccyh lya lei kya a um paw ccungccaw luning laku lukheit kha law athua cih zah lukheit tuh cciataw athua cih.
Sungmia a mia paw luning laku lukheit kha law athua cih zah lukheit tuh cciataw athua cih.
“Tukeiccu paw suimilan ccyh kya nynh nae Bawipaw tuh yn thua cih cipaw na ny khyh oh keiccuze paccynkute la ngaw oh.
Thuasalama e hynh nyh oh; inn hoitu nynh paw ccyh kya nynh miruhpaw yn thua cih cipaw kha phe a ny lanze a inn kha a kiabia khyh nawlan phe a ngaw cih cipaw na ny oh.
Tukeiccu nanning mah raeringkuh oh, pawccecize na ngaehoi khyh oh ccyh lyakhe Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh yn thua cih.
“Te a bawipaw nynh a inn kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha accyh azaw vae ze ae lanpaw a neetu lang, a inn lungkhu a uktu lang a khang paw zyn lan um paw te ahawpaw see tuh hungmou athua?
Tuhte rya a law paw kha a bawipaw nynh yn thua zah a muihpya paw see tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua.
Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kha-e see kha a uccaw balyn tungvaw uktu lang a tangsah cih.
Thuasalama see hoy leipaw nynh a thinlung kya, ‘Ka bawipaw yn thua lanpaw tuh aro ung cih,’ ci zah,
a ban`ae see`ae kha a bua vae`ae, te a neih`ae paw ryte aete niate a um vae.
Kha-e see nynh a ngaw khyh nin te a ny khyh ccyh lyakhe a bawipaw tuh mang yn thua lanze,
kha-e see kha ccangning lang thoh bae cih zah a hanpaw tuh cyihruh`ae nynh a ccou`ae paw kha a ccoubua cih; tuin kya rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw a um cih.
“Te vaawran peenaw tuh zudy ccangvaepaw kha cciadue lan mih maeekhua`ae kha ccyngkuh`ae zah a cceih`ae paw liaccady luhaw te nynh aloku.
Te minmin kyaze lu pangaw tuh haw`ae zah lu pangaw tuh angaee`ae.
Angaee`ae paw tuh mih maeekhua`ae ccyngkuh`ae zah maeetui ccyngkuh bia khyh`ae.
Thuasalama ahaw`ae paw tuh mih maeekhua ryte a bawng kya maeetui kha a ccyngku bia`ae.
Zudy ccangvaepaw khaw yn ro tuh minmin balyn tuh ngawphukuh`ae zah phe a itheih`ae.
“Te ziraccyng khe, ‘Dotua oh, zudy ccangvaepaw yn thua vae; amaw te tungku lan nanning oun toikuh ccavae oh!’ cite roi accae.
“Oute tuh-e liaccady`ae balyn tuh tho`ae zah mih maeekhua`ae kha a paccynku`ae.
Te angaee`ae paw nynh ahaw`ae paw kha, ‘Nae maeetui abang kha oun pyabua oh, pawccecize kae maeekhua`ae a tui phe athang,’ a cipya`ae.
“Thuasalama ahaw`ae paw nynh, ‘Tuhte thua khyh, kaemaw hanlan te nanning hanlan zaw lan khyh, a zua`ae paw kalan cceih oh lah naemaw hanlan oun rekuh oh,’ a cipya`ae.
“Te minmin nynh maeetui reku lan a ccia`ae lyakhe, zudy ccangvaepaw tuh yn thua vae; te paccynkute um`ae paw tuh amaw ryte zudy poi kalan a tee`ae; te thuakaw kha phe a khaw vae`ae.
“Tuhkoute ccangpaw liaccady`ae tuh mah oun thua`ae zah, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw, kaening mah oun hungpah bua!’ a ci`ae.
Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning kae nyh khyh oh,’ cite a khung`ae.
“Tukeiccu nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw nin te ccyh kha na ny khyh oh keiccu tuh phang la ngaw oh.
“Pawccecize vaawran peenaw tuh ccungccaw lukheit nynh asawnaw ram lang khuaccung lan noukuh zah a see`ae kha ko`ae zah a uccaw`ae kha minmin kalan a ahpaw hawte nynh athua.
Te luraveih kha amaw a cyi khonaw thyhte, lukheit kha talent ccangpangaw a pya, lukheit kha kaw ning a pya, te lukheit kha ccangkheit a pya; oute palou khuaccungtaw`ae.
Oute talent kaw pangaw a ccou paw nynh cceih zah kha-e te kung a ku, te ccangpaw talent kaw pangaw a mue.
Te tuh-e hawte talent ccangning a ccou paw nynh mah ccangpaw talent ccangning a mue.
Thuasalama talent ccangkheit a ccou paw tuh cceih zah laephi kha thae zah a bawipaw phua kha zya a thuru.
“Ccyhsaepi aro koute tuh-e see`ae mih bawipaw tuh yn thua zah minmin ryte ccazing a tua`ae.

Te phua talent kaw pangaw a ccou paw nynh yn thua zah ccangpaw talent kaw pangaw kha yn ccyngbia zah, ‘Bawipaw, nang nynh kae kha talent kaw pangaw nae ah; dotua, kha-e laelan talent kaw pangaw bua ka mue,’ a cipya.

“A bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha, ‘Ahoy, zyn lan um paw see hoypaw, uccaw ccapyhpaw kya nang tuh zyn lan na um, uccaw patae tungvaw uktu lang kae rae cih, na bawipaw kya-e lungtuanaw lungkhu lang teebua,’ a cipya.
“Talent kaw ning a ccou paw mah yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, nang nynh kae kha talent kaw ning nae ah; dotua, kha-e laelan ccangpaw talent kaw ning ka mue,’ a cipya.
“A bawipaw nynh, ‘Ahoy, zyn lan um paw see hoypaw, uccaw ccapyhpaw kya nang tuh zyn lan na um, uccaw patae tungvaw uktu lang kae rae cih; na bawipaw kya-e lungtuanaw lungkhu lang teebua,’ a cipya.

“Oute talent ccangkheit a ccou paw nynh yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, nang tuh myarya a reipaw ccungccaw, na ccouku leinaw kya a ruekuh paw te na vuaku leinaw kya a sueluakuh paw nynh na thua cipaw kha ka ny.
Tukeiccu ka rih, te ka cceih zah na phua talent kha laephi kya ka thuru; dotua na uccaw tuh e kya phang a um,’ a cipya.
“A bawipaw nynh khung zah, ‘Seethya-seeruh paw te thawnawpaw, ka ccouku leinaw kya ka ruekupaw te ka vuaku leinaw kya ka sueluakupaw kha na ny.
Tukeiccu nang nynh ka phua kha phuarutu`ae kalan na nung lan accan, ou tuhte he kae thua te ka phua tuh amia ryte ka mue vae cih.
“Tukeiccu a talent phua kha a kyate laah oh lah talent kaw haw a hoi paw kha pya oh.
Pawccecize a hoi paw ccungccaw miakaw kha pyachih athua cih zah pataepi a hoi cih; thuasalama a hoi leipaw ccungccaw kyate a hoithypaw kha heize lawpya athua cih.
Te nanning nynh ccungkia leipaw see kha rawnaw te hawzynaw a umnaw atolang mohnaw lungkhu langkhe dae vua oh,’ a cipya`ae.
“Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh a phu-enaw te, athyaapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae balyn ryte he yn rung te, a phu-enaw suitungkhung vawlan yn dahung vae cih.
Te amaw malang minphuin`ae balyn tuh oun sueluakuh cih`ae; te tuuringtu nynh a tuu`ae kha mia`ae kyate a phia hawte aning nynh minmin kha lukheit kyate lukheit yn phia cih`ae.
Te tuu`ae kha a ranglang yn nung cih`ae, thuasalama mia`ae kha a voilang khe a nung cih`ae.
“Oute Siapharan nynh a ranglang um`ae paw kha, ‘Ka Paaw kya-e hythuaccou`ae paw nanning rang oh, laephipi athonaw kyate nae hanlan paccynpaw peenaw hynh rhoccou oh.
Pawccecize kae ka vuelaw lya aepaw nae pya oh, ka tuihaw lya nia lanpaw nae pya oh, kae mikhiapaw ka thua lya innccung nae ua oh;
ka sasete ka um lya uccaw nae lawsaku oh, ka ccih zah nae dooih oh, thunginn kya ka um zah nae via oh,’ oun cipah cih`ae.
“Oute a ding`ae paw nynh, ‘Bawipaw, hotuh lya mou na vuelawpaw kae muih zah aepaw kae dang? Tukhyhze na tuihaw zah nia lanpaw kae pya?
Hotuh lya mou mikhiapaw lang na tang paw kha kae muih zah nang kha kae thua sah? Tukhyhze na sasete na um zah uccaw kae lawsaku?
Tukhyhze hotuh lya mou na cci paw te thunginn kya na um paw kha kae muih zah kae paebua?’ cite oun khung cih`ae.

“Te Siapharan nynh a khung cih`ae zah minmin kha, ‘Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e ka uno`ae lakuze adih huapaw lukheit tungvaw na cyi oh paw miakaw kha kamaw kya na cyi oh paw nynh thua,’ a cipah cih`ae.
“Oute a voilang um`ae paw kha mah, ‘Nanning thyalaw`ae paw, diabolos te a vaaw ccungccaw`ae hanlan paccynpya paw zungzae tynpaw maee lungkhu langkhe, kamaw kyate pou oh.
Pawccecize kae tuh ka vuelaw zah looh nae pya khyh oh, ka tuihaw zah nia lanpaw nae pya khyh oh.
Kae tuh mikhiapaw lang ka tang zah nae thuasah khyh oh; sasete ka um zah uccaw nae lawsakuh khyh oh; ka ccih, te thunginn kya ka um zah nae paebua khyh oh,’ cite oun cipah cih`ae.

“Oute minmin nynh mah, ‘Bawipaw, hotuh lya mou na vuelawpaw kae muih, tukhyhze na tuihaw paw, mikhiapaw lang na tang paw, sasete na um paw, na cci paw, thunginn kya na um paw kha kae muih zah na hanlan ryalawpya leite kae um?’ cite oun khung cih`ae.

“Oute aning nynh minmin kha, ‘Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e`ae lakuze adih huaccepaw lukheit tungvaw na cyi khyh oh paw miakaw kha kamaw tungvaw na cyi khyh oh paw nynh thua,’ cite yn khung cih`ae.
“Te hynh-e`ae tuh zungzae detahnaw lungkhu lang nynh a cceih cih`ae, thuasalama a ding`ae paw tuh zungzae hiinnaw lungkhu lang nynh a cceih cih`ae,” a ci.
Ou tuhcihte hynh-e a hopaw balyn hynh Jesu nynh he a thangsah tuh a zuitu`ae kha,
“Nin ning koute Kawtaw Poi a um cipaw kha nanning nynh na ny oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh khiade khylan ah athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae tuh Kaiafas acikuh paw ranpibawi lupi inn maepaw langkhe oun sueluakuh`ae zah,
te minmin nynh Jesu kha lingte kae kyngsah lah kae chia ccaw cite khuakhanku`ae.
Thuasalama, “Ccungccaw`ae oun pookuh sei cih`ae, poi nin tuh thua nan sah,” a ci`ae.
Te Bethani khua kya vaethyakaepaw Simon inn kya Jesu a um lyakhe,
nopinung lukheit nynh myarya aphutepaw mynkhuhpaw satho alabasta lung tuihinbu bukheit kha amaw kalan ccyng zah ae lan cite a dahung lyakhe kha-e kha a lu kya a bu.
Thuasalama a zuitu`ae nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh myarya mih thinria zah, “Pawccemou e hynh alakaw lang a tangsah han?
Pawccecize hynh-e mynkhuhpaw satho hynh phua patae lang zuate ryachi`ae kha pya lanpaw,” a ci`ae.
Kha-e kha Jesu nynh he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Pawccemou nopinung kha vawsaw na pya oh? Pawccecize aning nynh ka tungvaw ahoypaw rya kha phe a law vae.
Pawccecize ryachi`ae tuh nanning kya pei a um`ae, thuasalama kae tuh nae kya pei ka um khyh.
Pawccecize hynh-e mynkhuhpaw satho ka pyn vawlan a bu paw kya aning nynh e hynh ka rhua ccynaw hanlan a paccynpaw nynh thua.
Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, lae vawlan balyn kya hynh-e thehoypaw honaw miakaw kya, hynh-e nopinung nynh a cyipaw hynh mah amaw liathui nawlan hobia athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athua paw, Judas Iskaria acikuh paw tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae kalan cceih zah,
“Aning kha nae kalan kae ah ze pawmou nae pya cih oh?” a ci. Te minmin nynh ngunphua phuaccang sungthung kha a riapya`ae.
Te tuh-e ccyh kyate Judas nynh amaw kha phee khylan ccyhhoy kha a ccungku vae.
Te Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi masaty nin kyakhe zuitu`ae nynh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Kawtaw Poi na ae nawlan pawkyamou na hanlan nae paccynsah ry?” cite a khia`ae.

Te Jesu nynh, “Khua lungkhu lang la cceih oh lah ccungccapaw lukheit kha, ‘Ccangpatu nynh, “Ka ccyh anae vae, na inn kyakhe ka zuitu`ae ryte Kawtaw Poi kae mang cih,” a ci,’ cite la hopah oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te zuitu`ae nynh Jesu nynh a hopya`ae hawte a cyi`ae; te minmin nynh Kawtaw Poi dangkunaw kha a paccyn`ae.
Te zete he a thua tuh aning tuh luhaw laening ryte ae lan a dahung`ae.
Te he a ae`ae tuh Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning laku-e lukhakheit nynh kamaw hynh yn ah cih,” a ci.
Te minmin tuh myaryasangkae mih ngaethah zah, “Bawipaw, tuh-e paw tuh kae ka thua zaw?” cite luraveih nynh amaw kha a khia`ae.
Te aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Kamaw ryte pake kya a kuih a pubua paw ccungccapaw nynh kamaw hynh yn phee cih.

Amaw konglang azeikuh thyhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a cceih ccaccing cih; thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw a pheetupaw ccungccapaw hanlan paw ngaethya lan um babang! Tuh-e paw hanlan a la pui khyh ze ahoyhua cih paw,” a cipya`ae.
Oute amaw a pheetu Judas nynh tho zah, “Rabbi, tuh-e paw tuh kae tou?” a ci. Jesu nynh, “Na ho paw tuh athua,” a ci.
Te he a ae`ae tuh Jesu nynh sanlou kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho, te kha-e kha eih zah a zuitu`ae kha pya`ae zah, “Lawkuh oh, ae oh, e tuh ka pyn nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Te banang kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho koute minmin kha a pya`ae; te, “Nanning balyn e hynh neih oh.
Pawccecize e tuh ccungccaw patae seinaw ngaethyanaw hanlan luasah paw byakin thawpaw kya-e ka chiise nynh thua.
Thuasalama nanning kae hopya oh, ka Paaw peenaw kya nanning ryte athawpaw misutui ka nia nin a thua makhia, atu koute hynhtahawpaw misutui hynh ka neih boi vae lan khyh,” a ci.
Te thehoysanaw law ccangkheit kha a sah kou`ae te minmin tuh Oliv Mua lang a cceih vae`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Atu khuazi kamaw keiccuze nanning balyn tuh nae lung oun thang cih; pawccecize, ‘Tuuringtu kha ka bua cih zah tuuphu`ae tuh pung a phiakuh cih`ae,’ cite azeikuh.
“Thuasalama kae tuh ka thothui koute nae malang Galilee lang ka la cceihty cih,” a cipya`ae.
Piter nynh tho zah, “Nang na keiccuze hynh-e`ae balyn tuh a maeleihku`ae zemah kae tuh kharyh ka maeleihkuh lan khyh,” a ci.
Jesu nynh Piter kha, “Byaccaccing kae hopya, atu khuazi awkhungpaw a khua maw, kamaw hynh vaethung nae vua cih,” a cipya.
Piter nynh, “Namaw ryte phe ka chibua lan zemah nang kha kae vua lan khyh,” a ci. Tuhe hawte zuitu`ae balyn nynh mah a ci`ae.
Oute Jesu tuh minmin ryte Kethsemane a ci`ae paw ahmin kya oun thua zah zuitu`ae kha, “Khuhlang khuin ka la cceih cih zah saw ka sang loukaw nanning e kya la dahung hin oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Piter te Zebedi ccaaw`ae luning kha a hoeibua`ae; te a ngaethah vae zah myarya a lungvawsaw vae.
Oute minmin kha, “Ka hiinnaw-muisaw tuh chi lan ciate myaryasangkae a ngaethah; nanning e kya um oh lah kamaw ryte ngaw oh,” a cipya`ae.

Te ccapyh asawnaw malang rakyh cceih zah bakhung zah, “Pou ka Paaw, athua kho ze e banang nynh kae hynh yn kawtaw sah; tuhzemah kae ka ry hawte thua nan sah, thuasalama na ry hawte thua sah,” cite sawsang.
Te zuitu`ae kalan thua zah a i`ae paw kha a muih, te Piter kha, “Pawte! Kamaw kha suimilan ccangkheit san nae ngaw kho khyh oh tou?
Tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang na phungku khyh nawlan oh ngaw oh lah sawsang oh; muisaw nynh tuh a ry ccaccing, thuasalama pynsaw tuh a thawzya,” a cipya.
Vaeningnaw, bua cceih zah, “Pou ka Paaw, hynh-e banang hynh kae nynh nia leite athua kho khyh ze kamaw hynh yn kawtaw khyh nawlan na rynaw thyhte thua sah,” cite saw bua a sang.
Te yn thua zah zuitu`ae bua a i`ae paw kha a muih; pawccecize mih mit tuh daekuh vae khyh.
Te minmin kha cciataw`ae zah bua a cceih, te bya phe alokuh lante vaethungnaw bua saw a sang.
Oute a zuitu`ae kalan yn thua zah minmin kha, “Na i ung oh zah na hae-ung ung oh tou? Dotua oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh misei`ae kuih kalan ah ccyh yn thua vae.
Tho ccavae oh, cceih ccavae oh sih; dotua oh, kamaw yn pheetupaw tuh yn thua vae,” a cipya`ae.

Te a ho cciamang lya, dotua oh, luhaw laening kyaze lukheitpaw Judas tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae nynh yn saw`ae paw ccungccaw zapi ry thaloi te tungbang pung ccyngkute oun thua vae`ae.
Te amaw a pheetupaw nynh, “Kae nynh kae myng paw ccungccapaw kha tuh Jesu nynh thua, amaw kha kyng oh,” cite minmin kha syntawnaw pya`ae zah a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu kalan palou yn cceih zah, “Rabbi, na dan khaw!” cite beih zah amaw kha a myng.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ka ban, paw khylan mou nae thua?” a ci. Oute minmin nynh oun thua`ae zah Jesu kha kyng`ae zah a cciakhae`ae.
Te Jesu ryte a um`ae paw lukheitpaw nynh a kuih thua zah a thaloi kha dungkuh zah ranpibawi lupi seepaw lukheit kha a nakua thoh pae lang a bae.
Oute Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha, “Na thaloi kha a umnaw kyakhe bua nung; pawccecize thaloi a lawkuh`ae paw balyn tuh thaloi te nynh a chih cih`ae.
Ka Paaw nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha atumaw legion haw laening lae alung yn pya nawlan ka Paaw kalan atu sawsangkuh kho lan khyh cite tou na tua?
Tuhte lanze ‘Hynhte acyikuh cih,’ acikuh paw Ccathyaa tuh pawtemou accing vae cih?” a cipya.

Tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha, “Miruhpaw a kyng`ae hawte kamaw hynh kyng lan thaloi ry, tungbang ryte tou nae ccianua oh? Tempal kya ccangpyate kae tuh nanning ryte nin takyh ka dahung, te nae kyng khyh oh.
Thuasalama profeh`ae kya-e Ccathyaa accing nawlan nynh hynh-e balyn tuh acyikuh,” a cipya`ae. Oute zuitu`ae balyn nynh amaw kha vua`ae zah pung ccuetaw vae`ae.
Te Jesu a kyng`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha kawbya ccangpatu`ae te piccang`ae a sueluakunaw`ae ranpibawi lupi Kaiafas kalan a cciakhae`ae.
Thuasalama Piter nynh ranpibawi lupi maepaw kyacia amaw kha asawpi te a zui. Tuh-e maepaw kalan teebua zah athangnaw kha muih khylan tempal ngawtu`ae kyakhe a dahungbua.
Atu alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae, te Sanhedrin kungsi`ae balyn nynh Jesu kha rawsete chia khylan ahme leipaw ccaekia a ccungpya`ae.
Thuasalama muih khyh`ae; athua, ahme leipaw ccaekia`ae patae athua`ae zemah a seinaw kha muih khyh`ae. Nyathyakou ahme leipaw ccaekia luning oun thua`ae zah,
“Hynh-e paw nynh, ‘Pachia tempal hynh ka roh kho zah nin thung lungkhu ka sakthui kho,’ a ci,” a ci`ae.
Te ranpibawi lupi nynh thokuh zah Jesu kha, “Kaw kheit san na khung khyh`ae rei? Nang ae rawse`ae paw e ccaekia`ae hynh pawte?” a ci.
Thuasalama Jesu tuh daetedae lang nynh a um. Te ranpibawi lupi nynh tho zah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw Kri na thua lanze yn hopya tua, a hiinpaw Pachia liate nang kha ccae kae sahsaku,” a cipya.

Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh mang na ho latu. Tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, atu koute nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh thungnaw ranglang kya a dahung paw te vaawran e maeking`ae kya yn rung paw kha nae muih cih oh,” a cipya.
Oute ranpibawi lupi nynh a uccaw kha ccarae sei zah, “Pachia saryapaw bya kha phe a ho vae, tuh laelan paw ccaekia mou aening aho ung? Dotua oh, atu Pachia a saryapaw bya kha phe na thae vae oh.
Pawte na tua oh?” a ci. Minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning tuh chi lan accan,” a ci`ae.
Oute a mae kya mih tuin te thoi`ae zah a thung`ae, te ccungccaw abang nynh mih kuihphe te bia`ae zah,
“Nang Kri, nang ae bia paw hynh hungmou? Profeh hawte oun hopya tua?” a ci`ae.
Tuhlya Piter tuh atolang maepaw kyakhe a dahung; te ryalawpatu nung taraw lukheit nynh a kalan yn thua zah, “Nang mah Galilee paw Jesu ryte a umbua paw nynh na thua,” a ci.
Thuasalama Piter nynh minmin balyn malang pheikuh zah, “Paw nynh na ho cipaw ka nyh khyh,” a ci.
Te Piter tuh maepaw khunglang he a pou te ccangpaw ryalawpatunung nynh muih zah tuin kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha, “E paw mah Nazareth paw Jesu ryte a umbua paw nynh thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
Thuasalama Piter nynh ccaesaku biate, “Tuh-e paw tuh ka nyh khyh,” cite bua a pheiku.

Te khuekheih aro koute tuin kya a thadyn`ae paw nynh Piter kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Thanccingte nang mah minmin kyaze lukheit nynh na thuabua, pawccecize na byaho nynh namaw kha phe ae langsaku,” a ci`ae.
Oute Piter nynh, “Tuh-e Ccungccapaw tuh ka nyh khyh,” cite thyalawkuh zah byakinku vae. Te awkhungpaw palou a khua vae.
Te, “Awkhungpaw a khua mawze nang nynh vaethung nae vua cih,” cite Jesu nynh a hopya paw bya kha Piter nynh a liathui vae. Te atolang pou zah thawmawte a rah.
Awkhua he a thua tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw piccang`ae balyn nynh Jesu kha rawsete chia lante khuakhan`ae.
Te minmin nynh Jesu kha a hee kou`ae te, cciakhae`ae zah ram uktu Pontias Pilat kalan a ah`ae.
Oute Jesu a pheetu Judas nynh Jesu kha chia lante seibe`ae paw kha he a muih tuh ngaesikuh zah ngunphua phuaccang sungthung kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae kalan bua ccyng zah,
“Seinaw a hoi leipaw chii ka phee paw tuh phe ka sei vae,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Tuh-e tuh kaening te pawmou asekuh? Tuh-e tuh namaw la do,” a ci`ae.
Te aning nynh ngunphua phuaccang`ae kha tempal kya dae vua zah phe a pou; te cceih zah amaw te amaw a nging phe a oku.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh ngunphua phuaccang`ae kha khuin`ae zah, “E`ae tuh chii mee athua keiccuze tempal sisua bung lungkhu lang nung lan ccan khyh,” a ci`ae.
Te minmin nynh khuakhan`ae zah mikhia`ae u nawlan cite lae-ang raetupaw laekua kha tuh-e phua`ae khate a re`ae.
Tukeiccu tuh-e laekua kha, ‘Chii Laekua’ cite atunin cia ko athua.
Ou tuhte profeh Jeremiah nynh, “Israel ccungccaw`ae nynh amee a khya`ae paw amaw mee ngunphua phuaccang sungthung kha minmin nynh laah`ae zah,
BAWIPAW nynh kamaw yn hopyasya thyhhawte, kha-e phua`ae kha lae-ang raetupaw laekua mee lang a pya`ae,” cite a hopaw bya tuh yn ccing vae.
Te Jesu tuh ram uktu malang thadyn zah ram uktu nynh, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite a khia. Te Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh mang na ho latu,” a cipya.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae nynh amaw kha seibe`ae zah kawkheit san khung khyh`ae.
Oute Pilat nynh amaw kha, “Nang kha rawsete minmin nynh ccaekia hozeih nynh a khan`ae cipaw hynh na thae khyh tou?” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh bya kawkheit san khung khyh, tukeiccuze ram uktu tuh myarya a ngaeangthua.
Te Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw zapi nynh a ry`ae paw thungccahpaw lukheit kha ccungccaw`ae kalan ram uktu nynh leih a sawpya`ae.
Ou tuhlya Barabbas acikuh paw a minthaanpaw thungccahpaw lukheit a la um.
Tukeiccu ccungccaw`ae pynkheihlan he oun sueluakuh`ae te Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nae kalan hungmou nae sawsah ry oh? Barabbas tou? Tukhyhze Kri acikuh paw Jesu tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Pawccecize alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh mih eiung keiccu nynh Jesu kha a ah`ae cipaw Pilat nynh phe a ny.

Te byapianaw tungkhung vawlan Pilat he a dahung tuh, a zu nynh a kalan ccungccaw yn saw zah, “Kha-e adingpaw Ccungccapaw kha pawsang mah la cyih nan; pawccecize amaw keiccuze atunin ka maan kya myarya ka teing,” cite a hopya.
Thuasalama alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae nynh Barabbas kha ngiaku lan zah Jesu kha chiasah lan cite ccungccaw zapi kha a hy`ae.
Ram uktu nynh, “Hynh-e luning`ae kyaze hung hynh mou nae kalan nae sawsah ry oh?” cite minmin kha a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Barabbas,” a ci`ae.
Pilat nynh, “Tuhte lanze Kri acikuh paw Jesu hynh pawtemou ka cyih cih,” cite a khia`ae. Minmin balyn nynh, “Amaw tuh khiade thuasah,” a ci`ae.
Te ram uktu nynh, “Pawccemou, paw hoyleinaw mou a cyi?” cite a khia`ae. Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Amaw tuh khiade thuasah,” cite houh a sia`ae.

Pilat nynh pawpawte mah ka tae kho vae lan khyh`ae, thuasalama keisukeilae houh yn um vae cih`ae cipaw kha he a muih tuh tui kha lawkuh zah ccungccaw zapi malang a kuih kha singkuh zah, “Hynh-e adingpaw Ccungccapaw chiise kyate kae tuh ka lue, e tuh nanning la do ccavae oh,” a ci.
Oute ccungccaw balyn nynh khung`ae zah, “Amaw chiise tuh kaening tungvaw te kae ccaaw`ae tungvaw thua vae sah,” a ci`ae.
Oute Pilat nynh Barabbas kha mih kalan a sawpya`ae. Te Jesu kha buasah`ae zah khiade khylan a ah vae.
Oute ram uktu a rhawkaw`ae nynh Jesu kha Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang cciakhae`ae zah rhawkawphu phukheit khaleihte Jesu kalan a sueluakuh`ae.
Te minmin nynh a uccaw kha phae`ae zah asepaw boeikhua kha a zingsah`ae.

Te hingpaw lukhung kha a khepah`ae koute a lu vawlan a khungsah`ae, te a ranglang kuih kya phaeku kha a ccyngsah`ae; te a malang ccukharutung`ae zah, “Jew`ae Siapharanpaw salan kae pya!” cite amaw kha a sarya`ae.
Oute amaw kha mih tuin te a thoi`ae, te phaeku kha lawkuh`ae zah a lu kha a bua`ae.
Te he a sarya kou`ae te minmin nynh boeikhua kha phae`ae zah amaw a uccaw kha bua a lawsaku`ae, te khiade lan a poukhae vae`ae.
Te oun ccia lya`ae, minmin nynh Sairenia khua paw Simon acikuh paw ccungccapaw kha he muih`ae tuh Jesu vaelantung kha puih lan a riase`ae.
Te Luru Hmin a ci`ae paw Golgotha cikuh paw hmin kya he a thua`ae tuh,
akhahpaw ryte apykuhpaw misuriapaw kha nia lan Jesu kha a pya`ae; te he a tangtua tuh neih ry vae khyh.

Te minmin nynh Jesu kha khiade`ae zah amaw a uccaw kha ccungthy dungte a neeku`ae; ou tuhte, “Minmin nynh ka uccaw`ae kha a neeku`ae, te ka uccaw kya minmin nynh ccungthy a dung`ae,” cite profeh nynh a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
Te dahungte minmin nynh khe kya Jesu kha phang a ngaw`ae.
Te, “E PAW TUH JEW`AE SIAPHARAN JESU NYNH THUA,” cite azeikuh paw, amaw seibenawpaw ccaw kha a lu luki khe a tawpya`ae.
Tuh-e ccyh kya damiah`ae luning kha, a ranglang lukheit, te a voilang lukheit amaw ryte a khiade bua`ae.
Te laanpi cceih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha a sarya`ae, mih lu thuhpah`ae zah,
“Tempal kha roh zah nin thung lungkhu phe a sakthui paw nang, namaw te namaw kha khumku tua! Pachia Ccapaw na thua lanze vaelantung kyate yn rungtua,” a ci`ae.
Tuh-e hawte kawbya ccangpatu`ae ryte piccang`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh mah sarya`ae zah,
“Aning nynh ming`ae kha a khum`ae, amaw te amaw tuh khumkuh kho khyh. Aning tuh Israel Siapharan athua lanze atumaw vaelantung kyate yn rungtua sah lah amaw kha kae zyn cih.
Aning tuh Pachia kha a doliakuh, Pachia nynh a ry lanze atumaw amaw kha luesah tua sah; pawccecize, ‘Kae tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh ka thua,’ a ciku,” a ci`ae.
Amaw ryte a khiade bua`ae paw damiah`ae nynh mah tuhhawte a saryabua`ae.
Suimilan ccangtaruhnaw te ccangtakuanaw cia tuh-e ram balyn tuh pung amoh.
Te zete suimilan ccangthung loukaw khe Jesu nynh, “Eli, Eli, lama sabach thani,” cite thawte a sia. Asuilan tuh, “Ka Pachia, ka Pachia, pawccemou kae hynh phe nae vuasya?” cipaw nynh thua.
Tuin kya a thadyn`ae paw ccungccaw abang nynh tuh-e kha he a thae`ae tuh, “E paw hynh Elijah nynh a koku,” a ci`ae.
Te minmin lakuze lukheit nynh vaekheihmawte ccue zah phuesi tungkheit kha laah zah misuriapaw kyakhe a dung, te phaeku kya hede zah nia lan a pya.
Tuhlae`ae nynh, “Amaw khate umtua sah, Elijah tuh e paw khum khylan yn thua ta, yn thua khyh ta dotua oh sih,” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh thawte bua a sia koute, a muisaw kha a ah vae.
Te dotua, tempal kya-e boei zokhawpaw tuh alu te alia cia ccangning lang ccarae seikuh, te innruisuekuh zah lung`ae akoi.
Te shaw`ae hungkuh zah a ih`ae paw mithyaa`ae pyn patae tuh tho`ae zah,
amaw thothuinaw koute, shaw`ae kyate oun toikuh`ae; athyaapaw khuapi lungkhu lang cceih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kalan a langkuh`ae.

Tuhlya rhawbawipaw te amaw ryte a um`ae paw nynh Jesu kha phang ngaw`ae zah innruisuekuh paw te tuh-e acyikuh paw uccaw`ae kha he a muih`ae tuh myarya rih`ae zah, “Thanccingte e paw tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua!” a ci`ae.
Te Galilee ram kyate Jesu kha ryalawpah`ae zah a zui`ae paw nopi`ae patae mah asawpi langte do`ae zah tuin kya a um`ae.
Tuh-e`ae laku Magdala khua nung Meri, te James te Joses mih nung Meri, te Zebedi ccaaw`ae mih nung a umbua`ae.
Zete he yn thua tuh Arimathia khua paw Josef acikuh paw mihoipaw tuh tuhlang yn thua, amaw tuh Jesu zuitu mah a thua.
Tuh-e paw nynh Pilat kalan cceih zah Jesu rhua kha a ngiaku. Oute Pilat nynh Jesu rhua kha pya lan kaw a pya`ae.
Te Josef nynh a rhua kha he a lawkuh koute athyaapaw boeirawpaw khate a lung.
Te lung kya a karyn paw athawpaw amaw shaw kyakhe kha-e kha a ccy; te alepipaw lung kha shaw khu mohrae kalan tounua zah phe a cceih.
Te Magdala khua nung Meri te ccangpaw Meri tuh shaw te ahawiliakuh lante dahung`ae zah tuin kya a um`ae.
Paccynkunaw Nin koute, awkhualan nin kya alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae tuh pynkheihlan Pilat kalan oun sueluakuh`ae zah,
“Bawihaepaw, kha-e ccungccaw lingtupaw nynh a hiin lyaze, ‘Nin thung koute bua ka thothui cih,’ cite a hopaw kha kae syntaw.

Tukeiccu nin thungnaw abia makhia shaw kha varyn ring lan kawpya`ae, tukhyh lanze a zuitu`ae nynh khuazi khe oun cceih cih`ae zah phe oun ruh cih`ae, te ccungccaw`ae kha, ‘Aning tuh chinaw kyate phe tho vae,’ oun cipah cih`ae; tukeiccu nyathyakou e hyngbya tuh masaty-e laeze houh aseihua vae cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
Pilat nynh, “Nanning a ngawtu phang na hoi oh, la cceih oh, na cyi khonaw oh thyhte akhyn lan la ngawsah oh,” a cipya`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin tuh cceih`ae zah lung kha tazeih khiate, te a ngawtu kha nungte shaw kha akhyn lan a rae`ae.
Sabbath nin thang zah lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin khuadae takaw lang he yn cih tuh Magdala khua nung Meri te ccangpaw Meri tuh shaw do lan oun thua`ae.
Te dotua, myarya arupaw innruisuekuh; pawccecize Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh vaawran kyate yn rung zah yn thua, te shaw thufu kyate lung kha tou zah kha-e lung vawlan khe a dahung.
A mitmae tuh khozaw hawte thua zah a uccaw tuh vuiraw hawte araw.
Te amaw rawri`ae keiccuze shaw a ngawtu`ae tuh thyngkuh`ae zah ccungccaw achihpaw hawte nynh thua`ae.
Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh nopi`ae kha, “Nanning rih nan oh, pawccecize nanning nynh a khiade`ae paw Jesu kha na ccung oh cipaw ka ny.
Aning tuh e kya um vae khyh, pawccecize a ho hawte phe a tho vae. Rang oh, Bawipaw a ccynaw`ae hmin hynh oun dotua oh.

Te arangte la cceih oh lah a zuitu`ae kha aning tuh chinaw kyate phe a tho vae cite la hopah oh; te dotua oh, Galilee lang nae malang a cceih cih, tuin kya amaw kha na la muih cih oh; nanning kha kae hopya vae oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te nopi`ae tuh ribiate, lungtuanaw alepi te shaw kyate arangte cceih`ae zah a zuitu`ae kha tuh-e thungpang hopya khylan a ccue`ae.
Te a zuitu`ae kha hopya khylan a ccia`ae lyakhe, dotua, Jesu nynh minmin kha cciadue`ae zah, “Nae lungtua sah!” a ci. Te minmin nynh amaw kalan thua`ae zah a ccu kha pum`ae zah amaw kha a beik`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Rih nan oh; cceih oh lah ka neitapaw`ae kha Galilee lang a ccia ccaw`ae la hopah oh, tuin kya minmin nynh kamaw kha oun muih cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Atu tuh-e nopi`ae a ccia`ae lyakhe, dotua, shaw ngawtu`ae abang nynh khuapi lungkhu lang oun thua`ae zah acyihkuh paw uccaw balyn kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae kalan a hopya`ae.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae tuh piccang`ae ryte sueluakuh`ae zah khuakhan`ae koute rhawkaw`ae kha phua patae pya`ae zah,
“Nanning nynh, ‘Kae itheih lya khuazi khe a zuitu`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah a rhua kha phe a ru`ae,’ nae ci cih oh.
Te hynh-e kong ram uktu nynh yn thae ze amaw kha kae soihbia cih zah nanning kha kae khynsah cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh phua kha lawkuh`ae zah a ccangpya`ae thyhte a cyi`ae; te hynh-e bya tuh Jew`ae laku atunin cia po pazaekuh lan a ho ung`ae.
Oute zuitu luhaw laekheit tuh Galilee ram lang Jesu nynh a tawsya`ae paw mua muakheit kalan a cceih`ae.
Te amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh minmin nynh amaw kha a beik`ae; thuasalama abang tuh mih lunghiin.
Te Jesu nynh yn thua zah, “Vaawran kya te laephi vawlan kawhoinaw balyn tuh kamaw hynh pya athua vae.
Tukeiccu nanning la cceih oh lah minphuin`ae balyn kha zuitu`ae lang la rae oh, minmin kha Paaw, Ccapaw te Thyaa Muisaw min kya baptisma-insah oh.
Nanning kaw kae pyasya oh paw balyn kha a zui nawlan`ae la ccangpah oh; te dotua oh, laephi she athangnaw cia kae tuh nae kya tyty ka um,” cite a zuitu`ae kha a hopya`ae. Amen.
Pachia Ccapaw Jesu Kri thehoypaw athotakawnaw.
Profeh`ae ccauh kya, “Dotua, na ccianaw a paccyn cih paw ka zeccuetu kha na malang ka saw.
Rangkaw kya a sia paw lukheitpaw roi nynh, ‘BAWIPAW a ccianaw kha paccynpah oh, a laanpi kha lawbabinlan raepah oh,’ a ci,” cite azeiku hawte;
Johan nynh rangkaw khe baptisma insah`ae zah seinaw ngaethyanaw hanlan ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kong kha a ho.
Te Judah ram um`ae paw balyn te Jerusalem kya um`ae paw balyn tuh Johan kalan oun cceih`ae zah mih seinaw`ae phykute Jordan Vaw khe amaw kya marya baptisma in`ae.
Te Johan tuh kalauk ming te rae paw uccaw kha lawkuh zah a tae kyakhe saving taesung kha a sungkuh, te tungkhipaw`ae te rangkaw e khoitui kha nynh a ae.
Te aning nynh, “Kae laeze athung huapaw kamaw koute yn thua cih, tuh-e paw ccukoh rui kha bakhungnua lan zah phoupya lan san kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh.
Kae nynh nanning kha tui kya baptisma kae insah ccaccing oh, thuasalama aning nynh tuh Thyaa Muisaw kya baptisma ae insah cih oh,” cite phung a ho.
Ou tuhte tuin nin`ae kyakhe Galilee pee Nazareth khua kyate Jesu yn thua zah Jordan vaw kyakhe Johan nynh baptisma a insah.
Te tui lungkhu te ccahe yn pou tuh vaawran ahungkuhpaw kha muih zah Muisaw nynh vafu hawte amaw tungvaw khe yn ccuh.
Te vaawran kyate roi ccangkheit yn ccae zah, “Nang tuh na kya ka lungrythuapaw ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh na thua,” a ci.
Te vaekheihmawte Muisaw nynh Jesu kha rangkaw langkhe a cciakhae.
Te Jesu tuh rangkaw khe nin sungpali um zah Setan nynh a tuh-ou; te rangsaw`ae ryte umkheih`ae zah vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh a dooih`ae.
Atu Johan kha thung a sah kou`ae te, Jesu tuh Pachia peenaw thehoypaw kha hote, Galilee pee lungkhu lang yn thua zah,
“Accyh phe accing vae, te Pachia peenaw tuh anae vae, nanning ngaesikuh oh lah thehoypaw hynh zyn oh,” a ci.
Te Galilee Rili pe Jesu po a cceih tuh, Simon te a neitaw Andru nynh rili lungkhu mia vua`ae paw kha a muih, pawccecize minmin tuh ngasaw kyngtu`ae nynh thua`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kamaw oun zui oh lah nanning kha ccungccaw kyngtu`ae lang kae rae cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te vaekheihmawte minmin nynh mih mia kha cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te tuin kyate rakyh asawnaw lang he thua tuh, kohlung lungkhu mih mia a thue cciamang`ae paw, Zebedi ccapaw James te a neitaw Johan kha Jesu nynh a muih`ae.
Te minmin kha palou a ko`ae; te minmin nynh a hoh`ae paw ryalawpatu`ae ryte mih paaw Zebedi kha kohlung kya cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te minmin tuh Kapernaum khua lang cceih`ae zah Sabbath nin lya Jesu tuh sinakok lungkhu lang palou tee zah a ccangpya`ae.
Te a thae`ae paw tuh a ccangpyanaw kha mih ngaeangthua, pawccecize kawbya ccangpatu`ae hawte thua leite, kawhoinaw a hoi paw lukheit hawte minmin kha a ccangpya`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Atu mih sinakok kya athyaa leipaw muisaw bahkuhpaw ccungccaw lukheit a um, te tuh-e paw nynh,

“Kae makhaete kae um sah! Nazareth paw Jesu, nang te kaening pawmou kae sekuh? Kaening ro khylan tou nae thua? Nang tuh hung nynh na thua cipaw kae ny, Pachia kya-e Athyaapaw Lukheit nynh na thua!” cite a sia.
Te Jesu nynh pe zah, “Yccae nan, kha-e paw lungkhu kyate toikuh,” a cipya.
Te athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh kha-e paw kha karae ho lang he a reih koute raerae sia zah kha-e paw lungkhu kyate phe a toikuh.

Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E hynh paw ang mou? E hynh paw athawpaw ccangpyanaw aa mou? Pawccecize kawhoinaw te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae heize kawpya zah minmin nynh a kaw phe a ngae`ae ccarei,” cite mimaw te mimaw laku bya a khiakuh`ae.
Te vaekheihmawte a thungpang tuh Galilee pepan balyn pung apazaekuh.
Te sinakok kyate he oun pou`ae te James te Johan ryte Simon te Andru tuh inn lungkhu lang palou a tee`ae.
Thuasalama Simon a zu nung tuh ngesawling te ccih zah a ih cipaw kha minmin nynh Jesu kalan palou a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh cceih zah a kuih te kyng zah a tho, te a ngesawlingpaw vaekheihmawte phe dan zah aning nynh minmin elan ryalawpah vae`ae.
Te zete khuanin he ccah tuh, ccinaw hoi`ae paw balyn te raerangsaro bahkuh`ae paw kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae.
Te khuapi balynte thuakawzung khe oun sueluakuh`ae.
Te ccinaw aphuinphuin te a ccih`ae paw patae kha dansah`ae zah raerangsaro patae a dee; te raerangsaro`ae kha bya ho lan kaw ua khyh`ae, pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh amaw kha a ny`ae.
Te awkhua takaw khuadae maw Jesu tuh tho zah a pou, te ccungccaw um leinaw langkhe cceih zah tuin kya sawsang.
Te Simon te amaw ryte um`ae paw nynh Jesu kha a ccung`ae.
Te amaw kha he muih`ae tuh, “Ccungccaw balyn nynh nang kha ae ccung`ae,” cite amaw kha a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Anaenaw khua`ae kalan cceih oh sih, tuin kya phung ka ho ccaw, pawccecize tuh-e khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua,” a cipya`ae.
Te Galilee pepan balyn mih sinakok`ae kya po phungho zah raerangsaro`ae kha a dee.
Te vaethyakaepaw lukheit nynh a kalan yn thua zah a malang bakhungte, “Na ry lanze kae hynh nae thyaasah kho,” cite Jesu kha a ngiaku.
Te Jesu nynh ngaethya-umsah pawte a kuih kha dyng zah kha-e paw kha hae zah, “Kae nynh ka ry, nang thyaa ccavae,” a cipya.
Te tuhte he a ho kou tuh vaekheihmawte vaethyaccinaw tuh a kyate phe toikuh zah aning tuh phe athyaa vae.

Te Jesu nynh, “Hung ccungccaw sanmah bya kaw kheit san la hopah nan, thuasalama la cceih lah namaw kha ranpibawi`ae kalan la dosakuh`ae, te Mawsi nynh kawpya paw kha-e silawnaw kha minmin kalan ccaekia ccangkheit lang na thyaanaw elan la rae,” cite tyntetyn lang byatawsya zah kha-e paw kha palou a saw.
