Thuasalama Piter nynh kha-e kha bua a ei. Te khuekheih cih koute, tuin a thadyn`ae paw nynh Piter kha, “Thanccingte nang tuh minmin kyaze lukheit nynh na thua; pawccecize nang tuh Galilee paw nynh na thua, te na byaho mah phe alokuh bua,” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Piter nynh, “Na ho oh paw Ccungccapaw tuh ka nyh khyh,” cite thyalawkuh zah byakinku vae.

Te vaeningnaw awkhungpaw a khua. Te, “Awkhungpaw vaening a khua mawze, nang nynh vaethung nae vua cih,” cite Jesu nynh a hopya paw bya kha Piter nynh a liathui vae. Te kha-e kha he a tua tuh a rah vae.
Te awkhua khe alepaw ranpibawi`ae tuh piccang`ae ry, kawbya ccangpatu`ae te kungsi`ae balyn ryte arangte khuakhankuh`ae zah; Jesu kha a hee`ae, te cciakhae`ae zah Pilat kalan a ah`ae.
Te Pilat nynh, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite amaw kha a khia. Te aning nynh, “Na ho hawte nynh thua,” cite a khung.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh amaw kha patae seibe`ae; thuasalama aning nynh kawkheit san khung khyh`ae.
Te Pilat nynh, “Kawkheit san na khung khyh`ae rei? Dotua, nang kha rawsete minmin nynh ccaekia hozeihmou a khan`ae!” cite amaw kha bua a khia.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh kawkheit san bua khung khyh, tukeiccuze Pilat tuh a ngaeangthua.
Te tuh-e Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw`ae nynh a ngiaku`ae paw thungccahpaw lukheit kha Pilat nynh leih a luesah he.
Te doukunaw kya ccungccaw theihtu Barabbas acikuh paw tuh amaw ryte doukunaw a raekheih`ae paw ryte thungccah`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi nynh mimaw kalan leih a cyipya`ae hawte oun cyipya ccaw cite thawte sia`ae zah Pilat kha a ngia`ae.
Thuasalama Pilat nynh, “Jew`ae Siapharanpaw hynh nae kalan kae luesahpya oh ze na ry oh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Pawccecize, alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh mih eiung keiccu nynh Jesu kha a ah`ae cipaw Pilat nynh phe a ny.
Thuasalama Pilat nynh Barabbas kha mih hanlan oun sawpya ccaw cite alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kha phe a hy vae`ae.
Te Pilat nynh bua khung`ae zah, “Tuhte lanze Jew`ae Siapharan na ci oh paw amaw hynh pawtemou nae cyisah ry oh?” cite bua a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Amaw kha khiade!” cite bua a sia`ae.
Oute Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou? Paw ahoy leipaw mou aning nynh a cyi?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Amaw kha khiade!” cite houh a sia`ae.
Te Pilat nynh ccungccaw zapi kha lunghoysah ry zah Barabbas kha mih kalan a sawpya`ae; te Jesu kha buasah`ae zah khiade khylan a ah vae.
Te Jesu kha rhawkaw`ae nynh Praetorium acikuh paw Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang a teekhae`ae; te minmin nynh rhawkawphu khaleih kha a kobua`ae.
Te minmin nynh sekakungpaw uccaw kha zingsah`ae zah hingpaw lukhung kha khepah`ae zah a lu kya a khungsah`ae.
Te, “Jew`ae Siapharanpaw salan kae pya!” cite amaw kha a beih`ae.
Te minmin nynh a lu kha phaekute a bua`ae, te mih tuin te a thoi`ae, te ccukharutungte amaw kha a beik`ae.
Te minmin nynh Jesu kha a sarya kou`ae te sekakungpaw uccaw kha phae`ae zah amaw a uccaw kha bua a lawsaku`ae, te khiade lan a cciakhae vae`ae.
Te Alexanda te Rufas mih paaw, Sairin khua paw, Simon tuh khua taraw langte yn thua zah a cceih paw kha Jesu vaelantung puih lan minmin nynh a riase`ae.
Te minmin nynh Jesu kha Luru Hmin acikuh paw, Golgotha hmin kalan khe a cciakhae`ae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha mura te apykuhpaw misutui kha nia lan a pya`ae; thuasalama aning nynh neih khyh.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha he a khiade`ae tuh milu raveih nynh ccungthy dungte a uccaw`ae kha a neeku`ae.
Te awkhua suimilan ccangtakua ccyh khe minmin nynh amaw kha a khiade`ae.
Te amaw seibenaw`ae paw a luki kya ccawtawpya paw tuh: “JEW`AE SIAPHARAN,” ci nynh thua.
Te amaw ryte damiah`ae luning kha mah, lukheit a ranglang, te lukheit a voilang a khiade bua`ae.
Ou tuhte, “Aning tuh kawbya ei`ae paw ryte ria athua,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa tuh accing vae.
Te khe pe a cceih`ae paw nynh mih lu thuhpah`ae zah, “Ah nopang! Tempal kha roh zah nin thung te phe a sakthui paw nang,
namaw te namaw kha khumkuh lah vaelantung kyate yn rungtua!” cite a sarya`ae.
Tuhhawte alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh mah, “Aning nynh mingccang`ae kha tuh a khum`ae, amaw te amaw tuh khumkuh kho khyh.

Kaening nynh kae muih sah lah kae zyn ccaw Israel Siapharan, Kri tuh atu vaelantung kyate yn rungtua sah,” cite amaw kha saryate mimaw te mimaw laku a ho`ae. Te amaw ryte a khiade bua`ae paw nynh mah amaw kha a saryabua`ae.
Te ninthu suimilan haw laening ccyh he thua te zete suimilan ccangthung ccyh cia ram balyn tuh pung amoh.
Te zete suimilan ccangthung ccyh kya Jesu nynh, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabach thani?” cite thawte a sia. Asuilan tuh, “Ka Pachia, ka Pachia, pawccemou kae hynh phe nae vuasya?” cipaw nynh thua.
Te a pe thadyn`ae paw abang nynh he a thae`ae tuh, “Dotua oh, aning nynh Elijah nynh a koku,” a ci`ae.

Te lukheitpaw nynh ccue zah phuesitung kha misutui ariapaw kya dung zah phaeku dung kya a hede koute nia lan pya zah, “Amaw khate um tua sah; Elijah nynh amaw law lan yn rungnuabung tah yn rungnuabung khyh tah dotua oh sih,” a ci.
Te Jesu tuh thawte sia zah a hy athang vae.
Te tempal lungkhu boei zokhawpaw tuh alu te alia cia ccangning lang ccarae seikuh.
Te amaw malang a thadyn paw rhawbawipaw nynh thawte sia zah a hy athangpaw kha he a muih tuh, “Thanccingte e Ccungccapaw tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua!” a ci.
Asawpi langte a do`ae paw nopi`ae mah a um`ae; tuh-e`ae laku Meri Magdalin, te adih huapaw James te Joses mih nung Meri, te Salomi;
E`ae tuh Jesu Galilee ram kya a um lyaze amaw kha zui`ae zah ryalawpah`ae paw nynh thua`ae, te amaw ryte Jerusalem lang oun cceihkheih`ae paw ccangpaw nopi`ae patae a um`ae.
Te zete he a thua tuh, Paccynkunaw Nin athua keiccuze, tuh-e nin tuh, Sabbath nin thua maw nin nynh thua;
sawtua lan um paw kungsi memba lukheit athua paw, Pachia peenaw kha a ngaehoibua paw, Arimathia khua paw Josef tuh yn thua zah rhawhoyte Pilat kalan tee zah Jesu rhua kha a ngia.
Te Pilat nynh Jesu tuh phe chih kanmaw vae ngaw tang cite a ngaeangthua zah rhawbawipaw kha ko zah aning tuh phe chih ccaccing vae tou cite a khia.
Te rhawbawipaw kyate he a nyh te, Pilat nynh Jesu rhua kha Josef a pya.

Te Josef nynh nebaleihpaw boei kha re zah amaw kha vaelantung kyate sahbung zah boei nepaw khate a lung vae. Te lung kya a karyn`ae paw shaw lungkhu khe ccy zah shaw khu kha lungphepi tounua zah a fusung.
Te Meri Magdalin te Joses a nung Meri nynh a rhua a ccynaw`ae kha a do`ae.
Te Sabbath nin he alia te, Meri Magdalin te James a nung Meri, te Salomi nynh ccia lan zah amaw kha thuh khylan mynkhuhpaw satho kha a re`ae.
Te lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw khuanin thua dyn khe minmin tuh shawku lang a cceih`ae.
Te mimaw te mimaw kya, “Shaw thufu kyate lung kha hung nynh mou aening oun nuepah cih?” cite a hokuh`ae.
Te minmin nynh he a do`ae tuh, lung tuh phe a nuekuh vae paw kha a muih`ae; tuh-e lung tuh myarya alepaw nynh thua.
Te shaw lungkhu lang tee`ae zah arawpaw uccaw ccuabalaepaw a kikuh paw ccangvaepaw lukheit ranglang te a dahung paw kha a muih`ae tuh a rih`ae.
Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Nae ngaeangthua nan sah, a khiade`ae paw Nazareth paw Jesu kha nanning nynh na ccung oh. Aning tuh phe a tho vae! E kya um vae khyh. Amaw a ccynaw`ae hmin kha dotua oh.
Thuasalama la cceih oh lah a zuitu`ae te Piter kha aning tuh nae malang Galilee lang nynh a ccia; nae kya a ho hawte tuin kya amaw kha na la muih cih oh cite la hopah oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin tuh shawku kyate thokuh`ae zah arangte a cceih`ae; minmin tuh thyngkuh`ae zah mih ngaeangthua; a ri`ae keiccuze hung sanmah kharyh hopah khyh`ae.
Atu Jesu tuh lonaw kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw khe he a thothui tuh, a kyate raerangsaro lusari a deepya paw Meri Magdalin kyakhe masaty a langkuh.
Te Meri nynh cceih zah Jesu ryte langmaw lya a umkheih`ae paw nynh khui`ae zah a raw`ae lyakhe, kha-e kong kha a hopya`ae.
Te minmin nynh Jesu tuh a hiin vae cipaw te Meri nynh a muih cipaw he thae`ae tuh zyn khyh`ae.
Tuh-e koute zuitu`ae luning nynh khua taraw lang a ccia lya`ae khe, Jesu tuh ccangpaw muinsan lante mih kalan a langkuh.
Te minmin nynh cceih`ae zah kha-e kha tuhlaepaw kyakhe a hopya`ae; thuasalama minmin nynh kha-e kha zyn lae khyh`ae.

Tuhkoute luhaw laekheit nynh aepaw a koih lya`ae khe Jesu mih kyakhe a langkuh, te a thothuipaw Jesu a muih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae bya kha a zyn khyh`ae keiccuze, mih zyn leinaw te mih lungkhungnaw elan minmin kha a pe`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Laephipi balyn lang nanning la cceih oh lah rae paw miakaw kyakhe thehoypaw la ho oh.
Zyn zah baptisma-in paw ccungccaw tuh khum athua cih; thuasalama a zyn leipaw ccungccaw tuh seibe athua cih.
Te a zyn`ae paw tuh e muihsanaw`ae nynh a zuiding cih`ae: Ka min liate minmin nynh raerangsaro`ae a dee cih`ae; minmin nynh bya thawpaw te a ho cih`ae;
minmin nynh fupaw`ae kha a kyng cih`ae; te a chisah khopaw asy kha a nia`ae zemah, pawtua um lan khyh`ae; ngeccih`ae tungvaw kuih khang cih`ae zah minmin kha a dansah cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Ou tuhte Bawipaw nynh minmin kha a hopah`ae koute amaw tuh vaawran lang lawthung thua zah Pachia a ranglang khe a dahung vae.
Te minmin tuh cceih`ae zah ahmin takyh kya phungho`ae, Bawipaw nynh minmin ryte ryalah zah mih kya a zuikuh paw muihsanaw`ae liate bya kha a tynsah. Amen.
Kaening laku acyikuh paw, zyn athua ccaccing paw, a ho`ae paw uccaw`ae kong kha ccaw te ccakhung khylan ccungccaw patae nynh phe a tho vae`ae.
Tuhhawte atakaw lyaze mit te a muih`ae paw ccaekia`ae te bya hanlan ryalahtu`ae nynh kha-e`ae kha kaening kalan oun hopya`ae.
Tukeiccu kae mah atakaw te pawpaw balyn kha ahoyte phe ka thaethya koute kha-e kha na kalan athua thathyhte zei lan ahoypaw ka losah, sawtua lan um huaccepaw Theophilas.
Ou tuhte phe ae ccangpya vae`ae paw uccaw`ae kong kha ahmepaw ccaccing nynh thua cipaw na ny nawlan nynh thua.
Judah ram e siapharan Herod ccyh lya Abija aphu kya-e paw Zakharia acikuh paw ranpibawi lukheit a um, te a zu tuh Aaron ccanung`ae kya-e thua zah a min tuh Elizabeth nynh thua.
Te minmin luning tuh Bawipaw kawpyapaw`ae balynte phung`ae kha ccaenaw um lei lan marya a zui`ae paw thua zah Pachia malang paryh adingpaw nynh thua`ae.
Te Elizabeth tuh a tin keiccuze minmin tuh ccaaw hoi khyh`ae, te mih luning te paryh mih kum phe atang vae.
Ou tuhte Zakharia tuh amaw a phu`ae ryte Pachia malang ranpibawi rya a law lyakhe,
ranpibawi ryalaw phung thyhte, ccungthy dung`ae zah aning tuh Bawipaw kya-e athyaapaw tempal lungkhu lang tee lan zah mynkhuhpaw-upaw kha u lan accan.
Te mynkhuhpaw-upaw a u ccyh lya tuin ccungccaw zapi balyn tuh athyaapaw tempal atolang khe sawsang`ae.
Te Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh a kalan langkuh zah mynkhuhpaw-upaw ccaboi ranglang khe a thadyn.
Te Zakharia nynh he a muih tuh a lungvawsaw zah rinaw a tungvaw accah.
Thuasalama vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Zakharia, rih nan, pawccecize na sawsangnaw tuh thaepya athua, te na zu Elizabeth nynh ccapaw ae sakpah cih zah a min tuh Johan cite na phu cih.
Te lungtuanaw te lungpawnaw na hoi cih zah a puinaw kya ccungccaw patae mih lungtua cih.
Pawccecize aning tuh Bawipaw mitmuihnaw kya a lesae cih, te misutui te aruikuh khopaw kha neih lan khyh; te aning tuh a nung vue ccaccei kya mawte Thyaa Muisaw te abeih cih.
Te Israel ccaaw`ae patae kha aning nynh mih Pachia Bawipaw kalan a paleih cih`ae.

Te paaw`ae thinlung kha ccaaw`ae hanlan paleih khylan, te kawngae lei`ae paw kha a ding`ae paw hawnaw kalan paleih khylan, Bawipaw hanlan ccungccaw`ae kha raeringkute paccyn khylan aning tuh Elijah kya-e muisaw thungnaw te Bawipaw malang a cceih cih,” a cipya.
Te Zakharia nynh vaaw ccungccapaw kha, “Pawcihtemou e hynh ka nyh cih? Pawccecize kae tuh a taw vae paw ccungccaw nynh ka thua, te ka zu mah a kum phe atang vae,” a cipya.
Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Kae tuh Pachia umnaw kya a thadyn paw Gabriel nynh ka thua; te kae tuh nang kha hynh-e lungtua lan um paw thungpang hynh hopya lan te muihsah khylan saw paw nynh ka thua.
Te dotua, nang tuh e uccaw`ae accing makhia bya na ho lan khyh zah bya ho kho leite na um cih, pawccemacize accyh zawte accing cih paw ka bya`ae hynh na zyn khyh keiccu,” a cipya.
Te ccungccaw`ae nynh Zakharia kha ngaw`ae zah tempal kya khaw aro keiccu mih ngaeangthua.

Te aning he yn pou tuh mih kalan bya ho kho vae khyh; te minmin nynh aning tuh tempal kya vizin nynh a muih cite a tuase`ae; pawccecize aning nynh minmin kha kuih te tangpah`ae zah bya ho kho leite nynh a um vae.
Ou tuhte a ranpibawi ryalawpaw nin`ae he athang tuh Zakharia tuh a inn lang a ki.
Te tuh-e nin`ae koute a zu Elizabeth tuh ccaawpoi vae, te sawpaw sapangaw inn kya a khungkuh.
Te Elizabeth nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae laku te ka maethyanaw kha lawpya khylan kamaw yn do ccyh lya Bawipaw nynh hynhte yn cyipya,” a ci.
Te sawpaw sataruhnaw kya vaaw ccungccapaw Gabriel tuh Pachia kyate Galilee ram e Nazareth acikuh paw khua kalan,
David ciihan paw, a min Josef acikuh paw ccungccapaw kalan a chiapya vae`ae paw liaccady kalan saw athua; tuh-e liaccady a min tuh Meri acikuh.
Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh tuh-e nung kalan thua zah, “Hei, maehoyccou nung, Bawipaw tuh nang ryte a um, nopi`ae lakuze nang tuh hythuaccou nung nynh na thua,” a cipya.
Te Meri nynh he a muih tuh a hopya paw kya a lungvawsaw zah hynh-e tuh pawtecihpaw byabeihkupaw mou athua ngaw cite a thinlung kya a tua.
Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Meri, rih nan, pawccecize nang tuh Pachia kya-e maehoynaw kha na mue.
Te dotua, na vue kya ccaaw na hoi cih zah Ccapaw lukheit na saah cih, te a min kha JESU cite na phu cih.
Aning tuh a lesae cih zah Ahang huaccepaw Pachia Ccapaw cite ko athua cih, te Bawipaw Pachia nynh amaw kha a paaw David suitungkhung kha a pya cih.
Te aning nynh Jakob ciihan tungvaw zungzae a uk cih zah a peenaw tuh thangnaw um lan khyh,” a cipya.
Oute Meri nynh vaaw ccungccapaw kha, “Pise ka nyh leite pawtemou tuh-e tuh athua kho cih?” a cipya.

Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh khung zah, “Thyaa Muisaw na tungvaw yn thua cih zah Ahang huaccepaw thungnaw nynh nang kha ae khung cih; tukeiccuze tuh-e athyaapaw lukheit nang na kyate yn pui cih paw tuh Pachia Ccapaw cite ko athua cih.
Te dotua, na pui oh paw Elizabeth, a tinnung a ci`ae paw mah a kum tang vae mawte ccaawpoi zah atu hynh sawpaw sataruh acih vae.
Pawccecize Pachia ryte tuh athua kho leipaw um lan khyh,” a cipya.
Te Meri nynh, “Dotua, Bawipaw a seenung nynh ka thua, na bya thyhhawte ka tungvaw thua vae sah,” a ci. Te vaaw ccungccapaw tuh Meri kyate phe a pou.
Te tuh-e nin`ae kya Meri tuh thokuh zah mua zung kya a um paw Judah khua langkhe arangte a cceih.
Te Zakharia a inn lungkhu lang tee zah Elizabeth kha a beih.
Ou tuhte Meri nynh bya beih paw kha Elizabeth nynh he a thae tuh, a vue kya neitaw tuh a thohkuh, oute Elizabeth tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih.
Te aning nynh roi accae lante a hopaw tuh: “Nopi`ae lakuze nang tuh hythuaccou nung nynh na thua, te na vue kya-e athae imua mah hythuaccoupaw nynh thua.
Te ka Bawipaw a nung nynh kamaw kalan thua lante pawtemou e hynh kamaw kya acyikuh?
Pawccecize dotua, na bya beih paw roi ka nakaring kya ccahe accae te ka vue kya neitaw nynh a lungtua zah a thohkuh.
Te a zyn paw nopinung tuh hythuaccou nung nynh thua; pawccecize kha-e nung kya Bawipaw nynh a hopya paw bya tuh accing cih paw nynh thua,” a ci.
Te Meri nynh, “Ka hiinnaw-muisaw nynh Bawipaw kha phu-esah,
te ka muisaw tuh ka Khumtu Pachia kya a lungtua.
Pawccecize a seenung kya-e zakawsangnaw kha a tuapya; pawccecize, atu kyate ciihan`ae balyn nynh kae tuh hythuaccou nung cite oun ko vae cih`ae.
Pawccecize athungpaw Bawipaw nynh alepaw uccaw`ae kha kamaw kya phe yn cyipya vae; te a min tuh athyaapaw nynh thua.
Te a ngaethya-umsanaw tuh amaw rawrih`ae paw tungvaw kya ciihan kyate ciihan kyacia atyn.
A kuihthaw te thawzung a langsaku; mih thinlung-tuakunaw kya a tansakuh`ae paw kha pung a phiasaku`ae.
Athungpaw ccungccaw`ae kha mih suitungkhung kyate sahbung`ae zah zakawsangsakuh`ae paw kha a hangthung`ae.
A vuelaw`ae paw kha kou ahoy lang a dang`ae, thuasalama a hoirung`ae paw kha sasete a kisah`ae.
Ah minpaaw`ae kya, Abraham kya, te a ciihan kya zungzae a hosya vae hawte, a ngaethyaumsanaw liathuinaw kya a seepaw Israel kha phe a bawng vae,” a ci.
Te Meri tuh Elizabeth ryte sawpaw sathung loukaw a umkheih`ae koute amaw a inn lang a ki.
Te Elizabeth tuh ccaawpui lan accyh he azaw tuh ccaaw pise lukheit a saah.
Te a innpaw`ae te a vaeccaw`ae nynh alepaw ngaethya-umsanaw kha Bawipaw nynh pawcihte nynh a tungvaw a langsapyaku cipaw he a thae`ae tuh amaw ryte mih lungtua`ae.
Ou tuhte nin taryanaw kya imua vindung aw lan minmin tuh oun thua`ae; te minmin nynh a paaw min thyhte Zakharia cite a min a phu`ae.
Te a nung nynh, “Tuhte thua khyh, thuasalama Johan cite nynh ko lan,” a ci.
Te minmin nynh, “Na pui oh paw kya hynh-e min a phukuh paw lukheit san um boi khyh,” a ci`ae.
Te minmin nynh a paaw kha pawtemou min na phury cite tangpya te a khia`ae.
Te a paaw nynh zei nawlan ccalung kha ngiakuh`ae zah, “A min tuh Johan nynh thua,” cite a zei. Te minmin balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua.
Te a khalang tuh vaekheihmawte yn ua zah a lae apia vae, te bya ho zah Pachia kha thehoysah.
Te mih pe um`ae paw balyn tuh a rih`ae, te hynh-e thungpang tuh Judah pee mua kya um`ae paw balyn kalan po athaan.
Te a thae`ae paw balyn nynh kha-e kha mih thinlung kya ccykekuh`ae zah, “E paw hynh pawtecihpaw imua mou athua ngaw?” a ci`ae. Te Bawipaw kuih nynh imohpaw kha a umkhae.
Te a paaw Zakharia tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah profehbya a ho,
“Israel Pachia Bawipaw tuh thehoysah thuasah, pawccecize a ccungccaw`ae kha paebua zah a sawkhaw`ae.
Te a seepaw David ciihan kyate aening hanlan khumnaw ki kha a langsaku vae.
Laephipi athotakaw te a um paw amaw kya-e athyaapaw profeh`ae khalang kyate a ho hawte,
ah rhaw`ae kyate aening kha khum khylan, te aening oun hua`ae paw balyn kuih kyate luesah khylan,
ah minpaaw`ae kalan byakinpyakupaw ngaethya-umsanaw kha ccingsah khylan, te amaw kya-e athyaapaw byakin kha liathui khylan,
ah paaw Abraham kalan kae pya cih oh cite ccaesakute bya a kinkupaw byakinnaw kha ccingsah khylan,
ah rhaw`ae kuih kyate luesah ah thua vae oh thyhte, Pachia malang ah hiin lungkhu oh balyn, thyaanaw te dingnaw te, rinaw hoi leite aening nynh amaw rya ah lawpya nawlan oh nynh thua.
Te imohpaw, nang tuh Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia profeh cite ko na thua cih, pawccecize nang tuh Bawipaw a laanpi kha paccynpya khylan Bawipaw malang na cceih cih,
mih seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw liate a ccungccaw`ae kalan khumnaw kong nynaw pya khylan;
Ah Pachia kya-e nevyalyapaw ngaethyaumsanaw liate, ou tuh-e liate khuaninpaw paw nynh ahangnaw kyate aening kha oun paebua vae.
Mohnaw te chinaw mynlyh kya a dahung`ae paw kha awnaw pya khylan, daenaw laanpi lungkhu lang aening ccu kha cciakhae khylan nynh thua,” cite a ho.
Te imohpaw tuh lethung zah muisaw kya a thawsae, te Israel`ae kalan a langku nin a thua makhia aning tuh rangkaw nynh a um.
Oute tuh-e nin`ae kya Sizar Aukastas nynh ram pynpi balyn milu ccazing lawku athua cih cite kaw a tho.
E milu ccazing lawkunaw tuh Kuirinias hynh Siria ram uktu athua lyaze masaty ccazing lawkunaw nynh thua.
Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh milu ccazing lawku khylan mimaw mih khua raveih lang a cceih`ae.
Te Josef mah David ciihan athua keiccuze, Galilee pee Nazareth khua kyate Judah pee Bethlehem acikuh paw David khuapi kalan khe,
a zu lang a hoiku paw, ccaaw a poi paw Meri ryte ccazing lawku khylan a cceih`ae.
Te minmin tuin kya a um`ae lyakhe, Meri tuh neitaw pui lan a ninsaw accing.
Te Meri nynh a Ccatawccaaw kha puisah zah nolung uccaw te lung zah saring looh-aenaw kua kya a isah; pawccemacize mikhia thuanaw inn kya minmin hanlan akhaan um vae khyh.
Te tuin ram kya khuazi khe mih tuuphu kha ring`ae zah rangkaw kya a um`ae paw tuuring`ae a um`ae.
Te dotua, Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh mih kalan yn thua zah Bawipaw phu-enaw tuh mih pepan phaephae a aw; te minmin tuh myarya a rih`ae.
Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh minmin kha, “Rih nan oh, pawccecize dotua oh, ccungccaw balyn hanlan myarya lungtua lan um paw thungpang hoypaw kha kae thuakhaepya oh.
Pawccecize atunin David khuapi kya Bawi Kri athua paw Khumtu kha nanning hanlan a pui vae.
Te e hynh nanning hanlan muihsanaw athua cih, nanning nynh nolung uccaw te a lung`ae paw nosi, saring aenaw kua kya a isah`ae paw kha na la muih cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te vaaw ccungccapaw ryte vaawran e vaaw ccungccaw zapi tuh vaekheihmawte oun langkuh`ae zah Pachia kha thehoysah`ae zah,
“Ahang huaccenaw kya Pachia tuh phuesah thua sah, te laephi vawlan daenaw um sah, ccungccaw`ae kalan a ngaethya-umsanaw um sah!” a ci`ae.

Ou tuhte vaaw ccungccaw`ae tuh minmin kyate vaawran lang he a cceih`ae tuh tuuring`ae nynh, “Atu Bethlehem lang cceih oh sih lah Bawipaw nynh aening oun nysah paw hynh-e uccaw acyikuh paw hynh dotua oh sih,” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
Te minmin tuh arangte cceih`ae zah Meri te Josef, te saring looh-aenaw kua kya a ih paw Nosi kha a muih`ae.
Te minmin nynh he a muih`ae tuh kha-e Imohpaw konglang mimaw a hopya`ae paw kha thungpang po athaansah`ae.
Te tuuring`ae nynh a ho`ae paw bya a thae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh e uccaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
Thuasalama Meri nynh e uccaw`ae balyn kha a thinlung kya ccykekuh zah pei a tua a roih.
Te tuurin`ae nynh mimaw kha a hopya`ae hawte a thae`ae paw te a muih`ae paw uccaw`ae balyn hanlan Pachia kha phu-esah`ae zah thehoysah biate a ki`ae.
Te Imua vindung awkunaw hanlan nin tarya he accing te, vue kya a poi mawze vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a phuty vae paw min khate JESU cite min a phu`ae.

Te Bawipaw Kawbya kya, “Ccatawccaaw pise miakaw tuh BAWIPAW kalan athyaa ci athua cih,” cite azeiku hawte, Mawsi Kawbya thyhhawte Meri ccikannaw nin he accing tuh minmin nynh imohpaw kha Bawipaw kalan thuakhae khylan Jerusalem lang a cciakhae`ae.
Te “Vafu saning, tukhyhze valaele” saning te silawnaw rae lan cite Bawipaw Kawbya kya a hoku thyhhawte silawnaw rae khylan a cceih`ae.

Te dotua, a min Simeon acikuh paw ccungccaw lukheit Jerusalem kya a um. Tuh-e paw tuh adingpaw te Pachia kalan a pyakuh paw nynh thua, Israel`ae ngaengannaw kha a ngaehoi paw thua zah Thyaa Muisaw a tungvaw a um.
Te aning tuh Bawipaw kya-e Kri a muih makhia chih la ngaw khyh cite Thyaa Muisaw nynh amaw kha a la phypya.
Te aning tuh Muisaw liate tempal voidu kya a thua; te a nung te a paaw nynh Kawbya phung thyhte a hanlan cyipya lan cite Imua Jesu kha he a teekhae`ae tuh,
Simeon nynh Imua kha a kuih kya dua zah Pachia kha hythuapya zah,
“Lesae huapaw Bawipaw, na bya thyhhawte atu na seepaw hynh daebabilan yn pousah ccavae;
Pawccecize na khumnaw kha ka mit nynh phe a muih vae,
Tuh-e tuh ccungccaw balyn muihnaw malang na paccynpaw;
Zenta`ae a awsah cih paw awnaw te na ccungccaw Israel`ae hanlan phuenaw nynh thua,” cite a ho.
Amaw konglang a ho`ae paw uccaw`ae kya Josef te a nung tuh mih ngaeangthua.

Te Simeon nynh minmin kha hythuapya`ae zah a nung Meri kha, “Dotua, e Imua tuh Israel`ae patae khuliaku nawlan te thoku nawlan, ccungccaw patae thinlung-tuanaw`ae kha a langsaku nawlan thethya oun ho cih`ae paw muihsanaw hanlan paccynde paw nynh thua. Oute thaloi nynh na hiinnaw-muisaw kha mah ae thuin cih,” a cipya.
Te Asher phin, Fanuel ccanung Anna acikuh paw profehnung lukheit a um. Aning tuh a kum phe tang vae, te vawpaw a hoinaw te kum sari cia a vawpaw ryte a umkheih`ae.
Te aning tuh a kum sungtarya kum pali cia numae zah sawsangnaw te loohaesungnaw te khuazi khuadae Pachia rya kha laah zah tempal kyate a pou lei nung nynh thua.
Te aning mah khahlya khe yn tee zah Bawipaw kalan lungtuabya a ho, te Jerusalem kya sawkhawnaw a ngaehoi`ae paw balyn kalan khe kha-e imohpaw kong kha a hopya`ae.
Te a nung te a paaw nynh Bawipaw Kawbya thyhhawte pawpaw balyn kha phe a cyih`ae koute Galilee pee mimaw mih khua Nazareth lang a ki`ae.
Te Imua tuh lethung zah muisaw kya a thawsae, hawnaw te phe abeih; te Pachia thawccinaw tuh a tungvaw a um.
Te a nung te a paaw tuh Kawtaw Poi kya kum takyh Jerusalem lang leih a cceih`ae.
Te Jesu tuh kum haw laening he acihte Kawtaw Poi phung thyhhawte minmin tuh Jerusalem lang a cceihthung`ae.
Te poi nin`ae he athang te a nung te a paaw tuh a ki`ae, Imohpaw Jesu tuh Jerusalem kya zya a umhy ung, te Josef te a nung nynh kha-e kha nyh khyh`ae.
Thuasalama minmin nynh a kikheih`ae paw kya nynh a umbua cih cite tua`ae zah nin kheit laanccia cia a cceih`ae; te mih vaeccaw`ae te a nyhkuh`ae paw kya a ccung`ae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha he a muih vae khyh`ae tuh Jerusalem lang bua ki`ae zah a ccung`ae.
Ou tuhcihte nin thung a ccung`ae koute, minmin nynh amaw kha tempal kya ccangpatu`ae laku dahung zah mih bya kha ngae zah minmin bya a khia`ae paw kha a muih`ae.
Te amaw bya a thae`ae paw balyn nynh a thaethyanaw te a byakhungnaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua; te a nung nynh, “Ka Ccapaw, pawccemou kaening hynh hynhte nae cyi? Dotua, na paaw te kae tuh thinphang te nang kha kae ccung,” a cipya.
Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou kae tuh nae ccung oh? Ka Paaw rya ka law lan accan cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou?” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh mih kya a hopya`ae paw bya kha thaethya khyh`ae.
Te aning tuh a nung ry a paaw ryte cceihbung`ae zah Nazareth kya a thua`ae. Aning tuh minmin kaw a ngae; thuasalama a nung nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae kong balyn kha a thinlung kya a ccykeku.
Te Jesu tuh a pynsaw lethung zah hawnaw kya a kaethung, te Pachia te ccungccaw kya maehoynaw a mue.

Te Tiberias Sizar uknaw kum haw laepangaw lya, Pontias Pilat tuh Judah pee uktu thua zah Herod tuh Galilee pee kya tetrach thua zah a neitaw Filip tuh Iturea pee te Trakhonitis pee kya tetrarch thua zah Lysanias tuh Abilene pee kya tetrach thua zah,
Annas te Kaiafas tuh ranpibawi lupi`ae athua`ae lya, rangkaw kyakhe Pachia bya tuh Zakharia ccapaw Johan kalan yn thua.
Te Johan tuh Jordan vaw pepan ram balyn kya yn thua zah seinaw ngaethyanaw hanlan ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kong kha a ho.
Profeh Isaiah bya`ae kha ccauh kya azeiku thyhhawte, a hopaw tuh: “Rangkaw kya a sia paw lukheitpaw roi nynh, ‘BAWIPAW laanpi kha paccynpah oh, a laanpi kha lawbabinlan raepah oh.
Hunghua miakaw kha bia thua cih zah mua alepaw te mua taraw miakaw tingbung athua cih, te akoupaw laanpi`ae kha dingsah athua cih zah doungih-doungae a um paw laanpi`ae kha hoysah, nginsah athua cih.
Te ccungccaw balyn nynh Pachia kya-e khumnaw kha a muih cih`ae,’ a ci,” a ci.
Oute Johan nynh amaw kyae baptisma-in lan oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw zapi kha, “Pou fuparepaw ciihan`ae, yn thua vae cih paw thinrianaw kyate ccue khylan hung nynh mou nanning kha raering ae pya oh?

Tukeiccu ngaesikunaw te angaekuhpaw athae kha thaetua oh, te naemaw te naemaw kya, ‘Kaening nynh paaw lang Abraham kae hoi,’ cite mazi ci nan oh, pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia tuh hynh-e lung`ae balyn hynh Abraham ccaaw`ae lang a tangsah khopaw nynh thua.
Te atu mah hae tuh thingku leihpaw kya nungde athua vae, tukeiccu ahoypaw athae thae leipaw thingku miakaw tuh nge thua zah maee lungkhu lang phung athua,” a ci.
Te ccungccaw`ae nynh, “Tuhte lanze pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite Johan kha a khia`ae.
Aning nynh khung`ae zah minmin kha, “Angki zung ning a hoi paw nynh a hoi leipaw kha pyabua sah, te aepaw a hoi paw nynh tuh-e hawte cyih sah,” a cipya`ae.
Oute nguntokhoi`ae paw mah baptisma-in lan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Ccangpatupaw, pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae.
Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Nanning kaw ae pya oh paw laelan la khoi nan oh,” a cipya`ae.

Te tuhhawte rhawkaw`ae nynh amaw kha, “Pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae. Te aning nynh minmin kha, “Hung ccungccaw sanmah la luade nan oh, hung sanmah ahme lei lante seibede nan oh, te na mue oh paw amee khate nae lungryachih sah,” a cipya`ae.
Te ccungccaw`ae nynh Johan hynh Kri thua vema, thua khyh vema cipaw mih balynte ngaehoinaw te mih thinlung kya a tua`ae lyakhe;

Johan nynh minmin balyn kha khung`ae zah a hopaw tuh: “Kae nynh nanning kha tui kya baptisma kae insah oh; thuasalama kamaw laeze athung huapaw Lukheit yn thua cciamang, tuh-e paw a ccukoh rui phoupya lan san kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh; aning nynh nanning kha Thyaa Muisaw kya te maee kya baptisma ae insah cih oh.
A zawnawpaw pahraw tuh a kuih kya um zah a sarahmin kha thyaapapinglan a cciccae cih, te chanvui kha a byng lungkhu lang a ruin cih, thuasalama asipaw tuh a chih kho leipaw maee te a rua cih,” a ci.
Te ccangpaw bya patae te thuihei`ae zah thehoypaw kha ccungccaw`ae kalan a hopya`ae.
Thuasalama tetrarch Herod kha a neitaw Filip zu Herodia konglang te Herod nynh a cyi paw ahoy leipaw balyn kha Johan nynh seinaw a muihsaku keiccuze,
Herod nynh a seinaw balyn vawlan, e hynh biachihte Johan kha thunginn kya a saw.
Te tuhcihte ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh baptisma-in`ae zah Jesu mah baptisma-in bua. Te saw he a sang tuh vaawran hungkuh zah,
Thyaa Muisaw tuh vafu hawte pyn lante yn langkuh zah Jesu tungvaw a ccuh, te vaawran kyate roi yn ccae zah, “Nang tuh na kya ka lungrythua paw ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh na thua,” a ci.
Te Jesu kum sungthung loukaw acih tetuh ryalaw a tho. Ccungccaw`ae nynh Josef ccapaw cite a tua`ae; Josef tuh Heli ccapaw,
Heli tuh Matthat ccapaw, Matthat tuh Levi ccapaw, Levi tuh Melkhi ccapaw, Melkhi tuh Janna ccapaw, Janna tuh Josef ccapaw,
Josef tuh Mattathias ccapaw, Mattathias tuh Amos ccapaw, Amos tuh Nahum ccapaw, Nahum tuh Esli ccapaw, Esli tuh Naggai ccapaw,
Naggai tuh Maath ccapaw, Maath tuh Mattathias ccapaw, Mattathias tuh Semei ccapaw, Semei tuh Josef ccapaw, Josef tuh Judah ccapaw,
Judah tuh Joanna ccapaw, Joanna tuh Rhesa ccapaw, Rhesa tuh Zerubbabel ccapaw, Zerubbabel tuh Shealtiel ccapaw, Shealtiel tuh Neri ccapaw;
Neri tuh Melkhi ccapaw, Melkhi tuh Addi ccapaw, Addi tuh Kosam ccapaw, Kosam tuh Elmodam ccapaw, Elmodam tuh Er ccapaw,
Er tuh Joshua ccapaw, Joshua tuh Eliazar ccapaw, Eliazar tuh Jorim ccapaw, Jorim tuh Matthat ccapaw, Matthat tuh Levi ccapaw,
Levi tuh Simeon ccapaw, Simeon tuh Judah ccapaw, Judah tuh Josef ccapaw, Josef tuh Jonan ccapaw, Jonan tuh Eliakim ccapaw,
Eliakim tuh Melea ccapaw, Melea tuh Menan ccapaw, Menan tuh Mattatha ccapaw, Mattatha tuh Nathan ccapaw, Nathan tuh David ccapaw,
David tuh Jessi ccapaw, Jessi tuh Obed ccapaw, Obed tuh Boaz ccapaw, Boaz tuh Salmon ccapaw, Salmon tuh Nahshon ccapaw;
Nahshon tuh Amminadab ccapaw, Amminadab tuh Ram ccapaw, Ram tuh Hezron ccapaw, Hezron tuh Farez ccapaw, Farez tuh Judah ccapaw,
Judah tuh Jakob ccapaw, Jakob tuh Isaak ccapaw, Isaak tuh Abraham ccapaw, Abraham tuh Terah ccapaw, Terah tuh Nahor ccapaw,
Nahor tuh Serug ccapaw, Serug tuh Reu ccapaw, Reu tuh Peleg ccapaw, Peleg tuh Eber ccapaw, Eber tuh Shelah ccapaw,
Shelah tuh Kainan ccapaw, Kainan tuh Arphasad ccapaw, Arphasad tuh Shem ccapaw, Shem tuh Noah ccapaw, Noah tuh Lamek ccapaw,
Lamek tuh Methuselah ccapaw, Methuselah tuh Enok ccapaw, Enok tuh Jared ccapaw, Jared tuh Mahalalel ccapaw, Mahalalel tuh Kainan ccapaw,
Kainan tuh Enos ccapaw, Enos tuh Seth ccapaw, Seth tuh Adam ccapaw, Adam tuh Pachia ccapaw nynh thua.
Te Jesu tuh Thyaa Muisaw te beih zah Jordan vaw kyate a ki, te Muisaw nynh rangkaw langkhe a cciakhae.
Nin sungpali cia diabolos nynh a tuh-ou. Te tuh-e nin`ae kya aning tuh pawpaw sanmah ae khyh, te tuh-e nin`ae he athang tuh a vuelaw vae.
Te diabolos nynh amaw kha, “Pachia Ccapaw na thua lanze e lung hynh sanlou lang a tang ccaw kawpya,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “ ‘Ccungccaw tuh sanlou kyalya te hiin lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia bya miakaw te nynh a hiin cih,’ cite Ccathyaa kya azeikuh,” a cipya.
Te diabolos nynh Jesu kha ahangpaw mua kalan cciakhae thung zah ccyh sosoh kya laephipi peenaw`ae balyn kha marya a muihsah.
Te diabolos nynh Jesu kha, “Kawhoinaw balynte mih phu-enaw tuh kamaw kalan pya athua vae keiccu, ka pya ry paw ccungccaw kha ka pya, te nang kha hynh-e kawhoinaw balyn hynh marya kae pya cih.
Tukeiccu kamaw hynh nae beik lanze hynh-e`ae balyn tuh na kya-e athua cih,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Setan, ka nuhlang thungkuh! Pawccecize, ‘Na Pachia BAWIPAW kha na beik cih, amaw kyalya kha rya na lawpah cih,’ cite Ccathyaa kya azeikuh,” a ci.
Te Setan nynh Jesu kha Jerusalem lang cciakhae zah tempal avawlan paccy kya nung zah amaw kha, “Pachia Ccapaw na thua lanze, namaw te namaw e kyate toikubung tua.
Pawccecize Ccathyaa kya, ‘Nang khynsah khylan, a vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha nang na hanlan kawpya cih`ae.
Na ccu kha lung kya na thuhku khyh nawlan minmin nynh mih kuih te ae dua cih`ae,’ cite azeikuh,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “ ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha nang nynh na syntaw lan khyh,’ cite Ccathyaa nynh a ci,” a cipya.
Te diabolos nynh tuh-ounaw miakaw kha he a thangsah te Jesu kyate ccyh sosoh a poutaw.
Te Jesu tuh Muisaw thungnaw te Galilee lang ki zah amaw the tuh tuin ram pepan balyn po athaan.
Te Jesu nynh sinakok`ae kyakhe ccangpah`ae zah ccungccaw balyn nynh thehoysah`ae.
Te Jesu tuh a lethungnaw khua, Nazareth kyakhe thua zah leih a cyimae hawte, Sabbath nin kya sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah Ccathyaa ria lan a thadyn.
Te profeh Isaiah ccaleih kha amaw kalan a pya`ae. Te Jesu nynh ccaleih kha he a kia tuh hynhte azeikunaw kya a muih:

“BAWIPAW Muisaw tuh kamaw tungvaw a um, pawccemacize aning nynh ryachi`ae kha thehoypaw hopya khylan kamaw kha satho phe yn thuh vae; thinlung a koi`ae paw dansah khylan, ccungccaw`ae nynh a kyng`ae paw kalan sawkhawnaw kong hopya khylan, te mitmoh`ae kha ngawmuihnaw kong hopya khylan, vawsaw teing`ae paw kha luesah khylan,
BAWIPAW kya-e ngaehoi lan um paw kum kha hopya khylan, kamaw kha phe oun saw vae,” acikuh.
Te aning nynh ccaleih kha kue zah a ccytupaw kha a pya, oute a dahung. Te sinakok kya um`ae paw balyn mit nynh amaw kha riri a do`ae.
Te Jesu nynh tho zah minmin kha, “Atunin hynh-e Ccathyaa tuh nae nakaring kya na thae oh hawte phe accing vae,” a cipya`ae.
Te ccungccaw balyn nynh amaw kha ccaekiakhan`ae zah a khalang kyate a toikuh paw thawccinaw bya`ae kya mih ngaeangthua. Te minmin nynh, “E paw hynh Josef ccapaw thua khyh tou?” a ci`ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh, ‘Sibawipaw, namaw te namaw kha dansakuh tua! Kapernaum khua kya na cyipaw kae thae hawkhate hynhe namaw na khua kya mah cyi tua,’ cite e phungtangbya hynh kamaw kalan nae ho ccaccing cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, profeh hung sanmah amaw khua kya tuh maehoynaw mue boi khyh.
Thuasalama thanccingte kae hopya oh, Elijah ccyh lya kum thung te sataruh cia vaawran thuakaw khaw thua zah ram balyn kya myarya ccakangcci lya, Israel ram kya numae`ae patae a um`ae.
Thuasalama tuh-e`ae lukheit kalan san Elijah kha saw thua khyh, thuasalama Sidon ram e Zarephath khua kya um paw numaenung kalan rou nynh saw athua.
Te profeh Elisha ccyh lya Israel ram kya vaethyakaepaw patae a um`ae, thuasalama Siria paw Naaman laelan hung sanmah thyaasah thua khyh,” a ci.
Te sinakok kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh hynh-e bya`ae kha he a thae`ae tuh myarya mih thinria.
Te thokuh`ae zah Jesu kha khua kyate dee`ae zah tuh-e khua a saahnaw`ae mua zung, chiadung lante dae dawleihkuh lang tu lan cite a cciakhae`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu tuh minmin ngaelaku te po pou zah po a cceih.
Oute Galilee ram e Kapernaum khua lang cceihbung zah Sabbath nin kya a ccangpya`ae.
Te kawhoinaw te bya a ho keiccuze ccungccaw`ae tuh a ccangpyanaw kya mih ngaeangthua.
Atu sinakok kya athyaa leipaw raerangsaro muisaw a hoi paw ccungccaw lukheit a um. Te aning nynh,

“Kae makhaete kae um sah! Nazareth paw Jesu, nang ryte kaening pawmou kae sekuh? Nang tuh kaening ro khylan tou nae thua? Nang tuh hung nynh na thua cipaw ka ny, Pachia kya-e Athyaapaw nynh na thua!” cite thawte a sia.
Te Jesu nynh pe zah, “Yccae nan kha-e paw lungkhu kyate pou,” a cipya. Te raerangsaro nynh kha-e paw kha ccungccaw`ae laku kya phe vuasakuh zah maw muihsah leite a kyate phe a pou.

Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E bya hynh pawtecihpaw bya mou! Pawccecize kawhoinaw te thungnaw ryte athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae kha kawpya zah minmin phe a pou`ae,” cite mimaw laku kya a hokuh`ae.
Te a thungpang tuh tuh-e ram pepan e ahmin takyh kya balyn po athaan.
Te Jesu tuh sinakok kyate thokuh zah Simon inn lungkhu lang a tee. Te Simon a zu nung tuh myarya a nge ling zah minmin nynh a hanlan Jesu kha a ngiapya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh kha-e nung pe khe thadyn zah ngelingpaw kha a pe, te kha-e nung tuh phe dan, te nopinung tuh vaekheihmawte thokuh zah minmin elan ryalawpah vae`ae.
Te khuanin he ccah tuh ccinaw aphuinphuin te a ccih`ae paw ngeccih`ae balyn kha amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae, te Jesu nynh tuhe` ae milu raveih tungvaw khe a kuih khang zah minmin kha a dansah`ae.

Te raerangsaro`ae nynh mah, “Nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw Kri nynh na thua,” cite sia`ae zah ccungccaw patae kyate a pou`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha pe`ae zah bya ho lan kaw ua khyh`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh aning tuh Kri nynh thua cipaw kha a ny`ae.
Te khua he yn dae tuh, Jesu tuh pou zah rangkaw langkhe a cceih. Te ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha ccung`ae zah amaw kalan a thua`ae, te minmin kyate a pou khyh nawlan a kang`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pachia peenaw kong hynh ccangpaw khua`ae kalan mah ka ho hahe cih, pawccecize tuh-e khylan nynh kamaw tuh saw ka thua,” a cipya`ae.
Te Galilee pee e sinakok`ae kyakhe phung a ho.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh Kenesaret kuaapi pe thadyn zah ccungccaw`ae nynh Pachia bya ngae khylan amaw kha phang lungnuaku`ae lyakhe,
kuaapi akin lang a um paw kohlung ccangning kha a muih; thuasalama ngasaw kyngtu`ae tuh kohlung kyate pou`ae zah mih mia`ae kha a sing`ae.
Te Jesu tuh kohlung ccangning lakuze ccangkheit, Simon kya-e lungkhu langkhe tee zah kuaapi akin kyate ccapyh nuesaku lan Simon kha a ngia. Te kohlung kya dahung zah ccungccaw`ae kha a ccangpya`ae.
Te bya a hopaw he a thangsah te, Simon kha, “Akhunaw langkhe zaw lah ngasaw kyng khylan nae mia`ae kha vuatua oh,” a cipya.
Te Simon nynh amaw kha khung zah, “Bawipaw, khuazi zidae kae vua zah ccangkheit san kae kyng khyh; thuasala zemah na bya thyhte mia ka vua cih,” a cipya.
Te minmin nynh tuhte he a vua`ae tuh myarya alungpaw ngasaw`ae kha bung`ae zah mih mia tuh vyavya a pae vae.

Te minmin nynh ccangpaw kohlung kya um`ae paw miavuakheih`ae paw kha oun cceih`ae sah lah oun bawng`ae ccaw cite mih kuih te a ko`ae. Te minmin tuh oun thua`ae zah kohlung ccangning te vya phungkuh lan ngasaw kha phe a bia`ae.
Kha-e kha Simon Piter nynh he a muih tuh, Jesu ccukharu kin khe bakhung zah, “Pou Bawipaw, kae tuh a seipaw ccungccaw nynh ka thua, ka kyate beih pou,” a cipya.
Pawccecize Simon te amaw ryte umkheih`ae paw balyn tuh a kyng`ae paw ngasaw`ae kya mih ngaeangthua keiccu nynh thua.
Te Simon ryte a mungkuh`ae paw Zebedi ccaaw`ae James te Johan mah mih ngaeangthua. Te Jesu nynh Simon kha, “Rih nan, atu kyate nang tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh na kyng vae cih,” a cipya.
Te mih kohlung`ae kha laerang lang he thuakhae`ae tuh marya cciataw`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.

Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh khua khuakheit kya a um lyakhe, dotua oh, vaethyaccinaw te phe abeihpaw ccungccapaw nynh Jesu kha he a muih tuh bakhung zah, “Bawipaw, na ry lan thua ze, kae hynh nae thyaasah kho,” cite a ngiaku.
Te Jesu nynh a kuih dyng zah kha-e paw kha hae zah, “Ka ry, nang thyaa ccavae,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte vaethyaccinaw tuh phe athyaa.

Te Jesu nynh, “E kong hynh hung ccungccaw san la hopah nan cite kaw a pya, thuasalama la cceih lah ranpibawi kalan namaw kha la muihsakuh, te Mawsi kawbya thyhhawte minmin kalan ccaekia lang, nang thyaasah na thua paw hanlan silawkunaw kha la rae,” cite bya a tawsya.
Te amaw the tuh houhouh thaan zah ccungccaw zapi pi nynh amaw bya thae khylan te mih ccinaw kyate dan khylan oun sueluakuh`ae.
Te Jesu tuh rangkaw langkhe leih cceih zah saw a sang he.

Ou tuhcihte nin kheit tuh, Jesu nynh a ccangpya`ae lyakhe, Jerusalem kya te Judah pee te Galilee pee e khua`ae balyn kyate oun thua`ae paw Farasi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae tuh a dahung`ae, te minmin dansah khylan Bawipaw thungnaw tuh a langkuh.
Te dotua, ccungccaw`ae nynh kuihccuchihpaw ccungccapaw kha inawpaw te oun puih`ae zah amaw malang khe nung khylan teekhaenaw kha a ccungku`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi keiccuze teekhaenaw he a muih vae khyh`ae tuh, innccukaly lang kaekhae`ae zah innccukaly kha kia`ae zah ngeccih kha inawpaw ryte ccungccaw`ae laku Jesu malang khe a sawbung`ae.
Te Jesu nynh mih zynnaw kha he a muih tuh, ngeccih paw kha, “Ccungccapaw, na seinaw`ae ngaethya athua vae,” a cipya.
Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh, “Pachia sarya paw bya ho paw e paw tuh hungmou? Pachia kyalya laelan hungmou seinaw a ngaethya kho?” cite a hokuh`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Nae thinlung kya pawccemou tuhte na tuaku oh?
‘Na seinaw tuh ngaethya athua vae,’ cipya paw tou azoihua, tukhyhze, ‘Thokuh lah cceih,’ cipya paw tou azoihua?

Thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh laephi vawlan seinaw ngaethya lan kaw a hoi cipaw na ny nawlan oh,” cipah`ae zah, kuihccuchihpaw kha, “Nang kae hopya, thokuh lah na iphae kha lawkuh lah na inn lang cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
Te tuh-e paw tuh minmin malang vaekheihmawte thokuh zah a inawpaw kha lawkuh zah Pachia kha phu-esahte a inn lang a cceih.
Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua zah rinaw te phe beih`ae zah, “Atunin ngaeang lan um paw uccaw`ae phe ah muih vae oh,” ci`ae zah Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.
Te e uccaw`ae koute Jesu tuh pou zah ngunto khoinaw kya a dahung paw, Levi acikuh paw, ngunto khoitupaw kha a muih; te Jesu nynh, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya.
Te aning nynh pawpaw balyn kha cciataw te thokuh zah amaw kha a zui.
Te Levi nynh a inn kya Jesu elan poi pi kha a tuapya, te tuin kya ngunto khoitu`ae patae te ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae um`ae zah Jesu te zuitu`ae ryte aepaw a koihkheih`ae.
Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Pawccemou nanning nynh ngunto khoitu`ae te misei`ae ryte na aekheih oh zah na niakheih oh?” cite a seisah`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “A dan`ae paw nynh sibawi peki khyh`ae; thuasalama a ccih`ae paw nynh a peki`ae.
Kae tuh a ding`ae paw ko khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama misei`ae nynh a ngaesiku ccaw`ae cite nynh kae thua,” cite a khung`ae.

Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Johan zuitu`ae tuh pei looh-aesung`ae zah sawsangnaw a rae`ae. Tuhhawte Farasi`ae zuitu`ae mah a cyihbua`ae, thuasalama nang na zuitu`ae tuh pawccemou ae`ae zah a nia`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Zudy ccangvaepaw ryte a um`ae lya zudy ccangvaepaw a uno`ae kha looh-ae na sungsah kho cih oh tou?
Thuasalama, zudy ccangvaepaw kha a uno`ae kyate lawpya nin ccyh yn thua cih, te tuin nin`ae kya minmin tuh looh-ae a la sung cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.

Te minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae: “Hung nynh sanmah uccaw arynpaw kha uccaw athawpaw te bia boi khyh, tuhte a bia lanze uccaw athawpaw nynh arynpaw kha phe siasahkuh cih, bianawpaw athawpaw tuh uccaw arynpaw te ccawkuhthya khyh.

Te hung nynh sanmah misutui athawpaw kha arynpaw misu-saving bung kya ruin boi khyh, tuhte a ruin lanze misutui athawpaw nynh misu-saving bung kha phae pawsah cih zah misutui pung azu cih, te misu-saving bung mah phe aroh cih.
Thuasalama misutui athawpaw tuh athawpaw misusaving bung lungkhu lang ruin hahe lanpaw nynh thua, oute nynh paryhte akhyn`ae.
Arynpaw misutui kha phe a neih koute tuh hung nynh sanmah athawpaw misutui kha taloi ry he khyh, pawccecize, ‘Arynpaw nynh athuahua,’ a ci,” cite a hopya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte masaty Sabbath athang koute, vaeningnaw Sabbath nin kya Jesu tuh loo kya po cceih zah, a zuitu`ae nynh looh avui kha zukuh`ae zah mih kuih te noi`ae zah a ae`ae.
Te Farasi`ae abang nynh minmin kha, “Sabbath nin kya kawbya nynh cyi lan a ua leipaw kha pawccemou nanning nynh na cyi oh?” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “David nynh amaw ryte um`ae paw ry mih vuelaw lya a cyi paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?

Pachia inn lungkhu lang tee zah ranpibawi laelan hung nynh sanmah ae lan kawbya nynh a ua leipaw Pachia malang nungpyapaw sanlou kha lawkuh zah a ae, te amaw ry um`ae paw kha mah a pyabua`ae paw kha na ria boi khyh oh tou?” cite a khung`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Sabbath Bawipaw mah athua,” a cipya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte ccangpaw Sabbath nin kya Jesu tuh sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah a ccangpya`ae, te tuin kya a ranglang kuih achihpaw ccungccapaw lukheit a la um.
Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh Jesu tungvaw seibenaw ccungpya khylan, Sabbath nin kya kha-e paw kha yn dansah ta, yn dansah khyh ta cite a dokhaw`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha phe nyh zah a kuih achihpaw ccungccapaw kha, “Thokuh lah e kya thadyn,” a cipya. Te aning tuh thokuh zah a thadyn.

Oute Jesu nynh, “Nanning kha ccangkheit kae khia tua cih oh: Sabbath nin kya ahoypaw cyi lan kawbya nynh a ua tou? Tukhyhze ahoy leipaw cyi lan tou a ua? Hiinnaw kha so khum lan a ua tou? Tukhyhze chia lan tou a ua?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin balyn pepan khe do zah, Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha, “Na kuih kha dyngtua,” a cipya. Te aning nynh a kuih kha dyng zah hawkheit lang hawte phe ahoy vae.
Te minmin tuh thinrianaw te phe beih`ae zah Jesu kha pawte cyi lan cipaw lukheit te lukheit byahokuh`ae.
Ou tuhcihte tuin nin`ae kya Jesu tuh sawsang lan mua lang cceih zah zi balyn Pachia kalan sawsangnaw a mang.
Te khua he dae te a zuitu`ae kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah, luhaw laening kha a po`ae, minmin kha locceihtu`ae cite min a phu`ae.
Tuh-e`ae tuh: Piter cite min a phu paw Simon te a neitaw Andru, James te Johan, Filip te Bartholomew,
Matthai te Thomas, Alfeas ccapaw James, Zelot acikuh paw Simon,
James ccapaw Judas, te Jesu a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria nynh thua`ae.

Te minmin ryte Jesu tuh mua kyate rungbung zah bialae kyakhe, a bya ngae khylan te mih ccinaw dan khylan Judah pee balyn kyate, Jerusalem kyate, rili kin um paw Tai khua te Sidon khua kyate oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw zapi te a zuitu`ae pataepi ry,
te athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh vawsaw a pya`ae paw ryte a thadyn`ae. Te minmin tuh dansah athua`ae.
Te Jesu kyate thungnaw pou zah ccungccaw`ae a dan`ae keiccuze ccungccaw zapi balyn nynh amaw kha hae khylan a ccung`ae.
Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kalan khe dothung zah, “Nanning ryachi`ae, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh, pawccecize Pachia peenaw tuh nae kya-e nynh thua.
Atu vuelaw`ae paw nanning, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh, pawccecize nae vue sosah athua cih. Atu a rah`ae paw nanning, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh, pawccecize nae nuin cih oh.
Ccungccaw Ccapaw keiccuze ccungccaw`ae nynh ae hua oh zah mih kyate ae phia oh zah sarisarya ae nung oh zah nae the ae thyasah vae oh ze, nanning tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh.

Kha-e nin kya nanning lungtua oh lah lungpawnaw hanlan thohkuh oh! Pawccecize vaawran kya nae ryalaw mee tuh ale ccaccing; pawccecize kha-e hawte nynh mih minpaaw`ae nynh mah profeh`ae kha a la cyi`ae.
“Thuasalama a hoirung`ae paw nanning, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize nanning tuh ngaengannaw kha phe na mue vae oh.
Vueso`ae paw nanning, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize nae vuelaw cih. Atu a nuin`ae paw nanning, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize nae rah nae khui cih oh.
Ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh thehoy ae ho vae oh ze nanning tuh paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang. Pawccecize mih minpaaw`ae nynh ahme leipaw profeh`ae kha khate a la cyi`ae.
“Thuasalama ka bya a thae`ae paw nanning kae hopya oh, nae rhaw`ae kha sungsah oh lah nanning ae hua oh paw kha ahoypaw cyipah oh.
Nanning thya ae law oh paw kha hythuapya oh lah nanning ae sarya oh paw hanlan sawsangpah oh.
Te na mae hawkheit lang ae bia paw kha ccanglang kha mah tuapakuh; te na angkiccua ae lawpah paw kha na angkile lawku lan mah la kang nan.
Nang ae ngiakuh paw ccungccaw miakaw kha pya lah na uccaw a lawkuh paw ccungccaw kha bua ngia nan vae.
Te naemaw nae kya ccungccaw`ae nynh cyih`ae sah cite na ry oh hawte ming`ae kalan mah cyih bua oh.
“Pawccecize nanning ae sungsah oh paw kha na sungsahru oh ze, paw thehoysahnaw mou na mue cih oh? Misei`ae nynh heize mimaw a sungsah`ae paw kha a sungsahru`ae khaw.
Te nae kya hoynaw a rae`ae paw kalan hoynaw na raeru oh ze, paw thehoysahnaw mou na mue cih oh? Misei`ae nynh heize tuh-e hawte a cyibua`ae khaw.
Te bua yn pyaru cih cite na ngaehoi oh paw ccungccaw`ae kha phua na koisaku oh ze paw thehoysahnaw mou na mue cih oh? Misei`ae nynh heize patae bua mueru lan cite misei`ae kha a koisaku`ae khaw.

Thuasalama nanning nae rhaw`ae kha sungsah oh lah ahoypaw kha cyih oh, te pawpaw sanmah ngaehoi leite phua kha koisakuh oh; te nae ryalaw mee tuh ale cih zah nanning tuh Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia ccaaw`ae na thua cih oh. Pawccecize Pachia tuh lungtuabya ho lan a nyhthya leipaw te mihoy leipaw kalan thawcci thyapaw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu nae Paaw nynh mah ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi hawte nanning mah ngaethya-umsanaw hoi oh.
“Ming`ae kha byapia nan oh lah nanning byapia na thua lan khyh oh, ming`ae kha seibe nan oh lah nanning seibe na thua lan khyh oh, ming`ae seinaw kha ngaethya oh lah nae seinaw ngaethya athua ru cih.

Ming`ae kha pyabua oh lah nanning pyaru na thua cih oh, phe dybiate phe ryhbiate ahoyte toupah oh, te phe aleikuh lante ccungccaw`ae nynh nae by phe thua lang ae pyaru cih oh. Pawccecize na tounaw oh paw ccaccei khate nanning kha mah bua toupya ru na thua cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit hynhte a hopya`ae: “Mitmohpaw nynh mitmohpaw kha cciakhae kho cih ta? Mih luning te paryh hunghua lungkhu lang ccah lan khyh`ae ta?
Siaimua tuh a ccangpatu laeze thyahua khyh, thuasalama phe ccing lang ccangpya athua paw siaimua miakaw tuh a ccangpatupaw hawte athua cih.
Te namaw na mit kya um paw thingpyng kha tuaku leite, pawccemou na unopaw mit kya um paw athupaw taraw kha na dopya?

Namaw na mit kya um paw thingtung kha muihku leite, pawccemou na unopaw kha, ‘Ka unopaw na mit kya-e athupaw taraw kha kae la khoipah,’ cite na ho kho? Pou cyihruh paw, namaw mit kya-e ccungthy kha masaty khoikuh ty lah oute na unopaw mit kya-e athupaw taraw kha khoipya lan ahoyte na muih cih.
“Pawccecize ahoypaw thingku nynh ahoy leipaw athae thae khyh, ahoy leipaw thingku nynh zemah ahoypaw athae thae khyh.
Pawccecize thingku miakaw tuh amaw athae te ny athua. Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh hingpaw ku kyate thaeku lo boi khyh`ae, tahty ku kyate mah misu thae lo boi khyh`ae.

Ahoypaw ccungccaw nynh a thinlung kya-e ahoypaw sisua bung kyate ahoypaw uccaw kha a pousah, te ahoy leipaw ccungccaw nynh a thinlung kya-e ahoy leipaw sisua bung kyate ahoy leipaw uccaw kha a pousah; pawccecize thinlung kya-e phe beihpaw thyhte khalang nynh leih a ho.
“Te ka ho paw kha na cyih lei oh pite, pawccemou, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw,’ cite nae ko oh?
Hunghung zemah kamaw kalan yn cceih zah ka ho paw kha thae zah a cyih paw tuh hung te mou aloku cipaw kae muihsah cih oh:

Aning tuh phe khutheih lang tungkhu ccou zah lung vawlan tungpi bing zah inn a sak paw ccungccaw te nynh aloku; te tuileih tho zah tui nynh kha-e inn kha thawte asoh zemah hy khyh, pawccecize lung vawlan abingku keiccu nynh thua.

Thuasalama ka bya kha thae zah a zui leipaw ccungccaw tuh tungpi bing leite laephi vawlan inn sak paw ccungccaw te nynh aloku; kha-e kha tui nynh thawte he asoh tuh vaekheihmawte phe apu, te kha-e inn tuh khaleih aroh,” a ci.
Te ccungccaw`ae thaenaw kya a bya ho paw balyn kha he a thangsah koute Jesu tuh Kapernaum khua lungkhu lang a tee.
Te rhawbawipaw lukheit a ryalawpatu tuh ccih zah a chih vae cih, aning tuh a bawipaw nynh kou sungsahpaw nynh thua.
Te Jesu kong kha rhawbawipaw nynh he a thae tuh, a rya lawpatu a dansah ccaw cite ngia khylan Jew piccang`ae kha Jesu kalan a saw`ae.
Te minmin nynh Jesu kalan he thua`ae te, “Aning tuh e hynh cyipya lan angaekuhpaw nynh thua a cipya`ae.
Pawccecize aning tuh kaening minphuin hynh sungsah zah kaening elan sinakok oun saahpah paw nynh thua,” cite Jesu kha thawte a ngia`ae.

Oute Jesu tuh minmin ryte a cceihbua. Te inn kyate asaw leinaw kya he a thua tuh rhawbawipaw nynh a ban`ae kha Jesu kalan saw`ae zah, “Bawipaw, namaw te namaw kha vawsaw pyakuh nan; pawccecize ka inn lungkhu lang nang tee lante kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh.
Tuhhawte kamaw te kamaw mah nang na kalan ccia lan ka ngaekuh cite ka tuakuh khyh, thuasalama bya kawkheit ho lah ka rya yn lawpatu tuh a dan cih.

Pawccecize kae mah kawhoinaw zakaw a um paw ccungccaw lukheit nynh ka thua, ka kuihkaw rhawkaw`ae ka hoi zah lukheit kha, ‘Cceih,’ ka ci ze a cceih; te ccangpaw kha, ‘Rang,’ ka ci ze yn thua; te ka rya yn lawpatu kha, ‘E hynh cyih,’ ka ci ze a cyih,” cite a hosapya`ae.

E bya`ae kha Jesu nynh he a thae tuh a ngaeangthua zah nuhlang maeleihkuh zah amaw a zui`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha, “Nanning kae hopya oh, hynhcih alepaw zynnaw tuh Israel`ae kya heize ka muih boi khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Te rhawbawipaw nynh yn saw`ae paw tuh inn lang ki`ae zah accihpaw ryalawpatu tuh phe a dan vae paw kha a muih`ae.
Ou tuhcihte awkhualan Jesu tuh Nain acikuh paw khua kalan cceih zah a zuitu`ae patae te ccungccaw patae nynh a zui`ae.
Te Jesu tuh khua koikua pe he a thua tuh, dotua, lukheit kyalya paw, numaenung ccapaw, achihpaw ccungccapaw oun cciakhae`ae paw a um, te khuapi kya-e ccungccaw patae tuh numaenung ryte oun cceih`ae.
Te Bawipaw nynh kha-e nung kha he a muih tuh ngaethyaumsanaw hoi zah amaw kha, “Rah nan,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh naekuh zah taang kha a hae; te kha-e a puih`ae paw tuh a thadyn`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Ccangvaepaw, nang kae hopya, thokuh,” a ci.
Te achihpaw ccungccaw tuh dahung zah bya yn ho vae. Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha a nung kalan a pya.

Te mih balynte mih ri mih kaw thua zah Pachia kha thehoysah`ae. Abang nynh, “Aening laku alesaepaw profeh nynh yn langkuh vae,” a ci`ae. Te abang nynh, “Pachia nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha yn paebua vae,” a ci`ae.
Te amaw konglang hynh-e thungpang tuh Judah ram balyn te a pepan e ram`ae balyn kalan po athaan.
Te Johan zuitu`ae nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kong kha Johan marya a hopya`ae.
Te Johan nynh a zuitu`ae luning kha ko`ae zah Jesu kalan saw`ae zah, “Nang hynh yn thua lanpaw tuh na thua tou? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou kae la ngaehoi cih?” cite a khiasah`ae.

Tuh-e ccungccaw`ae nynh Jesu kalan he a thua`ae te, minmin nynh, “Baptisma pyatu Johan nynh kaening hynh na kalan oun saw zah, ‘Nang hynh yn thua lanpaw tuh na thua tou? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou kae la ngaehoi ung cih,’ cite bya oun khiasah,” a cipya`ae.
Te tuin ccyh kya Jesu nynh ccungccaw patae kha mih ccihawnaw kyate thuasah, ahoy leipaw ccinaw kyate thuasah, ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae kyate thuasah a dansah`ae. Te mitmoh`ae patae kha ngawmuihsah`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “La cceih oh lah nanning nynh na muih oh paw te na thae oh paw uccaw`ae kha Johan la hopah oh. Mitmoh`ae nynh ngawmuih vae`ae, ccukhou`ae nynh a cceih vae`ae, vaethyakae`ae paw a dan`ae, nawpang`ae nawthae`ae, a chih`ae paw thosah athua vae`ae, ryachi`ae kalan thehoypaw kha hopya athua vae.
Te kae ka keiccuze a maeleihkuh leipaw ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.

Te Johan nynh a saw`ae paw he a pou`ae te, Jesu nynh Johan konglang ccungccaw zapi kalan a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Nanning nynh paw do khylan mou rangkaw langkhe na ccia oh? Khivae nynh a he paw phaeku do khylan tou?

Tukhyhze paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Nebaleihpaw uccaw a lawkuh paw ccungccapaw do khylan tou? Dotua oh, lyccaccu lang uccaw lawkuh`ae zah kou hoy lang um`ae paw tuh siapharan inn kya nynh a um he`ae.
Thuasalama paw do khylan mou na ccia oh? Profeh lukheit do khylan tou? Athua, nanning kae hopya oh, profeh lukheit lae heize alesae huapaw nynh thua.
“Ccathyaa kya, ‘Dotua, na malang na ccianaw ae paccynpah cih paw ka zeccuetu kha na malang ka saw,’ cite azeikuh paw kha kha-e paw kha nynh a honuathepaw athua.

“Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, nopi`ae nynh a saah`ae paw ccungccaw`ae laku Baptisma pyatu Johan laeze alesae huapaw profeh lukheit san um khyh; thuasalama Pachia peenaw kya adih huaccepaw ccungccaw tuh aning laeze a lesaehua,” a ci.
Te amaw bya kha ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh he a thae`ae tuh, ngunto khoitu`ae nynh heize Johan kya-e baptisma kha inte Pachia kha thyaaccousah`ae.
Thuasalama Farasi`ae te kawbya thya`ae paw tuh mih hanlan Pachia khuakhannaw kha ei`ae zah Johan kya-e baptisma kha in khyh`ae.
Te Bawipaw nynh, “E ccungccaw`ae hynh pawtemou ka losakuh cih? Minmin hynh pawtemou aloku`ae?

Minmin tuh kungkunaw hmin kya dahung`ae zah lukheit te lukheit kokuh`ae zah, ‘Phyly kae tupah oh zah na law khyh oh, michi law kae sahpah oh zah mah na rah khyh oh rei,’ cite a cih`ae paw imua`ae te nynh aloku`ae.
“Pawccecize Baptisma pyatu Johan tuh sanlou mah ae leite misutui mah nia leite yn thua zah nanning nynh, ‘Aning tuh khozi bahkuhpaw nynh thua,’ na ci oh.
Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh aete niate yn thua zah nanning nynh, ‘Dotua oh, aemoh paw te misu-sanphing khu! Misei`ae te ngunto khoitu`ae banpaw khu!’ na ci oh.
Thuasalama hawnaw tuh amaw a ccaaw`ae balyn nynh thyaaccousah athua,” a ci.
Te Farasipaw lukheit nynh amaw ryte looh-aekheih lan Jesu kha a ko. Te Jesu tuh Farasipaw inn lang cceih zah ae lan a dahung.
Te dotua, tuh-e khua kya um paw nopinung, miseinung nynh Farasipaw inn kya ae lan Jesu a dahung cipaw kha he a nyh tuh mynkhuhpaw satho alabasta lung tuihinbu bukheit kha ccyng zah,
Jesu nuhlang a ccu leihpaw khe thadyn zah a rah, te a ccu kha a mitphi te singpah zah a lu kya-e a sang te a fupya, te a ccu kha myng zah satho a thuh.

Te aepaw a kopah paw Farasipaw nynh kha-e kha he a muih tuh, “E ccungccapaw hynh profeh athua lanze amaw a hae paw nopinung hynh hung nynh thua cipaw te pawtecihpaw cipaw phe a nyh cih; pawccecize e nung tuh miseinung nynh thua,” a ciku.
Te Jesu nynh, “Simon, kae hopya ry paw ccangkheit a um,” a cipya. Te Simon nynh, “Ccangpatu, ho ccaleih,” a ci.
Jesu nynh, “Phuasawtupaw lukheit la um zah a laeba umtu`ae luning a um`ae; lukheitpaw nynh denari phua zapangaw laeba um zah mingccangpaw tuh sungpangaw laeba um.

Te minmin nynh pyaru lanpaw kharyh he hoi khyh`ae tuh kha-e paw nynh paryh mawte phe a ngaethya`ae. Tukeiccu yn hopya tua, kha-e luning`ae kyaze hung nynh mou phuasawtupaw kha a sungsah hua cih?” cite a khia.
Simon nynh khung zah, “Alunghua a ngaethya paw ccungccapaw kha nynh thua cih cite ka tua,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh, “Hmerarihlan nynh bya na pia,” a cipya.

Te Jesu nynh nopinung kalan maeleihkuh zah Simon kha, “E nopinung hynh na muih tou? Kae tuh na inn lungkhu lang ka tee zah ka ccu singkunaw lanpaw tui nae pya khyh, thuasalama e nung nynh ka ccu hynh a mitphi te yn singpah zah a sang te yn fupya vae.
Nang tuh kae hynh nae myng khyh, thuasalama e nung tuh inn kalan he ka tee ccyh te ka ccu hynh apaekuh lei lan po a myng.
Nang tuh ka lu hynh satho nae thuh khyh, thuasalama e nung nynh ka ccu hynh mynkhuhpaw satho te phe yn thuhpya.

Tukeiccu nang kae hopah, e nung a seinaw`ae pataepi kha ngaethya athua vae keiccu aning tuh pataepi a sungsah; thuasalama ccapyhpaw seinaw ngaethya athua paw ccungccaw nynh tuh ccapyh nynh a sungsah,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh kha-e nung kha, “Na seinaw`ae tuh ngaethya athua vae,” a cipya.
Te amaw ryte ccaboi kya a dahungkheih`ae paw nynh mimaw te mimaw kya, “Seinaw balyn a ngaethya paw hynh-e paw tuh hungmou?” cite a hokuh`ae.
Te Jesu nynh nopinung kha, “Na zynnaw nynh phe ae khum vae, daebabilan la cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
Ou tuhte, tuh-e koute, Jesu tuh Pachia peenaw kong thehoypaw kha hote, phyte khuapi te khua taraw kalan po khua a ccung. Te zuitu`ae luhaw laening tuh amaw ryte a mungkuh`ae.
Te ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae kyate, te ccihawnaw`ae kyate a dan`ae paw nopi`ae abang, raerangsaro`ae lusari a kyate a pou paw Magdalin a ci`ae paw Meri,
te Herod kya-e synriatu Chuza a zu Joanna, te Susanna te mih uccaw`ae khate Jesu a bawng`ae paw ccangpaw nopi`ae patae a umbua`ae.
Te ccungccaw patae tuh khua takyh kyate amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah pynkheihlan he sueluakuh`ae tuh Jesu nynh tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae. A hopaw tuh:
“Ccaciivuatu lukheit nynh a ccacii vua lan a cceih; te he a vua tuh ccacii abang tuh laanpi kin ccah zah ccu te syde thua zah vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh phe a tuh kou`ae.
Te abang tuh lung vawlan ccah zah ccahe a kei takaw mawte laedahpaw a um khyh keiccu karae arou.
Te abang tuh hingpaw`ae laku ccah zah hingpaw`ae ryte pokheih`ae zah hingpaw`ae nynh varyn a reihde`ae.
Te abang tuh laehoy kya ccah zah a po, te leih zakheit athae a thae,” a ci. Te hynh-e kong he a ho koute, “Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh thaesah!” cite a sia.
Te a zuitu`ae nynh, “Hynh-e tousenaw phungpaw asuilan tuh pawmou?” cite amaw kha a khia`ae.

Te Jesu nynh, “Pachia peenaw kya-e byakhupaw`ae kong ny lan nanning tuh pya na thua oh; thuasalama mingccang`ae tuh, ‘mang muih`ae zah nyh khyh`ae, te mang thae`ae zemah a thaethya khyh`ae,’ keiccuze tousenaw phungpaw te hopya athua.
“Atu tousenaw phungpaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: Ccacii tuh Pachia bya nynh thua.

Laanpi kin ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya a thae`ae paw nynh thua, te minmin nynh oun zyn cih`ae zah khumnaw oun muesei cih`ae cite diabolos nynh yn cceih zah mih thinlung kyate Pachia bya phe a lawpya`ae paw kha nynh thua.

Lung vawlan ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya kha he a thae`ae te lungtuate a lawkuh`ae paw nynh thua, te tuh-e`ae tuh sosoh hung zyn`ae zah tuh-ounaw ccyh kya phe khuliakuh`ae paw, atynpaw tharui a hoi lei`ae paw kha nynh thua.

Te hingpaw`ae laku ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya kha a thae kou`ae te cceih`ae zah thinphangnaw hoirungnaw te laephi hiin hoysanaw`ae nynh varyn ve`ae zah piccangthua lan athae thae lei`ae paw kha nynh thua.
Thuasalama laehoy kya ccah`ae paw tuh Pachia bya kha he a thae`ae te athyaapaw, ahoypaw thinlung te ccykekuh`ae zah lungsaenaw te athae thae`ae paw kha nynh thua.
“Hung nynh sanmah maeekhua he a tyh te kee te khung khyh, ikhung kaw lang mah nung khyh, thuasalama oun tee`ae paw nynh awnaw kha a muih ccaw`ae cite maee awnawpaw vawlan nynh a nung.
Pawccecize alangkuh lei lanpaw aphirupaw uccaw pawsang um khyh, ny lei lanpaw te muih lei lanpaw thuru khopaw uccaw pawsang um khyh.

Tukeiccu nanning pawtemou na thae oh cipaw raeringkuh oh, pawccecize hunghung zemah a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh houh pyachih athua cih, te hunghung zemah a hoi leipaw ccungccaw tuh a hoi vosi cipaw hei kha lawpya athua cih,” bua a ci.
Oute a nung te a neitapaw`ae tuh amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah ccungccaw zapi alung keiccuze a kalan naekuh kho khyh`ae.
Te ccungccaw abang nynh, “Na nung te na neitapaw`ae namaw ae muih ry`ae zah atolang nynh phang thadyn`ae,” cite amaw kha a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ka nung te ka neitapaw`ae tuh Pachia bya thae`ae zah a zui`ae paw hynh-e`ae hynh nynh thua,” a ci.
Ou tuhcihte nin kheit tuh Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae ryte kohlung lungkhu lang tee`ae zah minmin kha, “Kuaapipi khuraw lang khuin zua oh sih,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh kohlung te a cceih vae`ae.
Thuasalama kohlung te he a cceih`ae tuh Jesu tuh a ih, te kuaapipi vawlan khise yn tho zah kohlung tuh tui te phe beih zah minmin tuh vawsawpi a tung`ae.

Te zuitu`ae nynh amaw kalan cceih`ae zah a tho`ae; te, “Bawipaw, Bawipaw, aening ah chih vae cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae. Te Jesu nynh thokuh zah khise te tuileih atho paw kha a pe`ae, te tuileih te khise tuh dae zah daebabi vae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nae zynnaw tuh teisangmou?” a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh rih`ae zah mih ngaeangthua, te, “E paw hynh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw aa mou! Khisang te tui balyn kawpya zah minmin nynh a kaw a ngae`ae!” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
Te minmin tuh Galilee ram te arawsekuhpaw Kadarene ram lang a thua`ae.
Te Jesu nynh laerang lang he thua tuh ccyhsaepi cia raerangsaro nynh bahkuh zah angki kiku leite, innvaw mah um leite, shawku kya leih um paw, tuin khua e ccungccapaw nynh yn tungku.
Jesu kha he a muih tuh, raerae sia zah amaw malang khe bakhung zah, “Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia Ccapaw Jesu, nang kha paw kae cyi mou? Kae hynh vawsaw beih yn pya nan cite kae ngiaku,” cite thawte a sia.

Pawccecize Jesu nynh athyaa leipaw muisaw kha kha-e paw kyate pou lan kaw phe a pya vae. Pawccecize kha-e muisaw nynh kha-e paw kha leih a kyng he; te kha-e paw kha sivarui te ccukhiinawpaw te khii`ae zah khia kya a nung`ae; te aning nynh a khiinaw`ae paw kha thoh pae zah raerangsaro nynh rangkaw langkhe leih a dee he keiccu nynh thua.
Te Jesu nynh, “Na min hungmou?” cite a khia. Te aning nynh, “Legion,” a ci; pawccemacize raerangsaro`ae patae tuh amaw lungkhu langkhe a tee`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Te raerangsaro`ae nynh mimaw kha akhunaw lungkhu lang ccia lan kaw a pya khyh nawlan Jesu kha a ngiaku`ae.
Te tuin kya mua vawlan voh`ae phu kheit rangpaekuh`ae paw a um, te minmin nynh khae` ae lungkhu lang tee lan kaw a ua nawlan amaw kha a ngiaku`ae. Te Jesu nynh kaw a ua`ae.
Oute raerangsaro`ae tuh ccungccapaw kyate pou`ae zah voh`ae lungkhu lang a tee`ae; te voh phu tuh apangnaw kyate kuaapi lungkhu lang thawmawte ccuebung`ae zah pung a phungkuh`ae.
Te voh a laetu`ae nynh kha-e acyikuh paw kha he a muih`ae tuh, ccue`ae zah kha-e kong kha khuapi kya te khua taraw lang balyn a ho`ae.

Oute ccungccaw`ae nynh acyikuh paw kha do khylan oun cceih`ae zah Jesu kalan oun thua`ae, te a kyate raerangsaro`ae a pou paw ccungccapaw tuh Jesu ccu leihpaw khe dahung zah uccaw a lawku paw te a thinlung akyh vae paw kha he muih`ae tuh a rih`ae.
Raerangsaro`ae bahkuhpaw ccungccapaw tuh pawcihte nynh a dan cipaw kha a muih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae paw kha a hopyabua`ae.
Oute Kadarene ram kya um`ae paw ccungccaw zapi balyn nynh eih rih kaesy`ae zah mih kyate a pou nawlan Jesu kha a ngia`ae; te Jesu tuh kohlung lungkhu lang tee zah phe a ki.
Te a kyate raerangsaro a pou vae paw ccungccapaw nynh Jesu ryte umbua lan a ngiaku. Thuasalama Jesu nynh,

“Namaw na inn lang la ki lah Pachia nynh na hanlan pawcih alepaw uccaw`ae nynh ae cyipya cipaw kha la ho,” cite hopah zah a saw. Te aning nynh cceih zah Jesu nynh pawcih alepaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a hanlan a cyipya cipaw kha khuapi balyn kya a hopya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu he a ki tuh, ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae, pawccecize minmin balyn nynh amaw kha a ngaw`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Te, dotua, sinakok uktu, Jairu acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit yn thua zah Jesu ccu leihpaw khe bakhung zah a inn lang ccia lan amaw kha a ngiaku.
Pawccecize aning nynh kum haw laening loukaw acih vae paw, ccanung lukheit kyalya hoi zah tuh-e nung tuh vyavya a chih. Thuasalama Jesu he a cceih tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh phang lungnuaku`ae.
Te kum haw laening cia chii lua ccinaw hoi zah a hoi paw balyn sibawi`ae kya marya thangkuh salamah hung kyate san a dan kho vae leipaw nopinung lukheit nynh,
amaw nuhlang khe yn thua zah a boei dung kha zya a hae; te vaekheihmawte a chii lua paw tuh phe akang.

Te Jesu nynh, “Hungmou yn hae?” a ci. Ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh kae nyh khyh he a ci`ae tuh Piter te amaw ryte a umkheih`ae paw nynh, “Bawipaw, ccungccaw zapi nynh phang ae lungnuakuh`ae zah ae bekuh`ae pite, nang nynh, ‘Hungmou yn hae?’ na ci,” cite a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Lukhakheit nynh phe yn hae, pawccecize ka kyate thungnaw a pou paw kha ka ny,” a ci.

Te nopinung nynh kae hynh ka thurukuh kho vae lan khyh cipaw kha he a nyh tuh thyngkute cceih zah amaw malang khe bakhung zah pawkeiccu nynh ka hae cipaw te vaekheihmawte phe a dannawpaw kong kha ccungccaw balyn malang khe a hopya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ka ccanung, na thawmuin sah, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae, daebabilan la cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
Tuhte a ho cciamang lya tuin sinakok uktupaw inn kyate ccungccaw lukheit yn thua zah amaw kha, “Na ccanung kha phe chih vae, Ccangpatupaw kha vawsaw pya nan vae,” a cipya.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh kha-e kha he a thae tuh, “Rih nan, zyn kyalya zyn lah na ccanung tuh a dan cih,” cite sinakok uktupaw kha a hopya.
Te inn kya he a thua tuh, Piter, James te Johan, te imohnung a nung te a paaw laelan hung sanmah inn lungkhu lang tee lan Jesu nynh ua khyh`ae.
Te inn lungkhu e ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh rah`ae zah a khui`ae; thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Rah nan oh, imohnung tuh chih khyh, thuasalama a i,” a ci.
Te a chih cipaw phe ny`ae paw thua zah minmin nynh Jesu kha saryate a nuinse`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin balyn kha pousah`ae zah imohnung kha a kuih te kyng zah, “Imohnung, thokuh,” cite a ko.
Te a muisaw tuh bua thua zah, imohnung tuh vaekheihmawte po a thokuh; te amaw kha aepaw pya oh cite kaw a pya`ae.
Te a paaw te a nung tuh mih ngaeangthua, thuasalama Jesu nynh acyikuh paw kha hung ccungccaw sanmah na hopah lan khyh oh cite minmin kha byatawsya`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae luhaw laening kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah raerangsaro`ae balyn tungvaw thungnaw te ccinaw`ae dansah nawlan minmin kha kawhoinaw a pya`ae.
Te aning nynh Pachia peenaw kong ho khylan te ngeccih`ae dansah khylan minmin kha a saw`ae.
Te minmin kha, “Nae khuaccungnaw hanlan pawsang mah phukuh nan oh, hoitang, zaw, sanlou, phua mah phukuh nan oh.
Te pawtecihpaw inn kya na tee oh thua zemah tuin kyakhe la um oh lah kha-e kyate la pou oh.
Te hunghung zemah nanning kha innccung ae doih oh thua ze, kha-e khua kyate he na pou oh te minmin arawsetu ccaekia lang nae ccu kyate vuiping kha la pheihkuh oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te minmin tuh pou`ae zah thehoypaw kha hote ahmin takyh kya ngeccih dansah biate khua takyh langkhe khua a ccung`ae.
Atu Jesu nynh a cyipaw balyn kha Herod tetrach nynh a thae tuh a ngaeangthua, pawccemacize ccungccaw abang nynh Johan tuh a chih`ae paw kyate phe a thothui vae cite a ho`ae.
Te abang nynh Elijah nynh yn langkuh vae a ci`ae, te mingccang`ae nynh arynpaw profeh`ae lukhakheit nynh bua yn thothui vae a ci`ae.
Te Herod nynh, “Johan tuh kae nynh a lu phe ka paesah vae`ae, thuasalama hynhcihte a thungpang ka thae paw tuh-e paw tuh hungmou athua?” a ci. Tukeiccu Jesu kha muih lan a ccung.

Te locceihtu`ae nynh he oun ki`ae tuh mimaw nynh a cyi`ae paw balyn kha amaw kha a hopya`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha ko`ae zah Bethsaida acikuh paw khua te asekuhpaw rangkaw langkhe mih makhaete a cciakhae`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi nynh kha-e kha he a nyh`ae tuh amaw kha a zui`ae, te Jesu nynh minmin kha lehkhan`ae zah mih kalan Pachia peenaw kong kha a hopya`ae, te dansah ahopaw ccungccaw`ae kha a dansah`ae.

Te khuazi lan he cih tuh, luhaw laening nynh oun thua`ae zah amaw kha, “Ccungccaw`ae hynh hin pepan e khuapi`ae kalan te khua taraw`ae kalan cceih`ae sah lah ryanaw te aepaw a mueku ccaw`ae minmin hynh saw`ae; pawccecize aening tuh e rangkaw kya nynh ah um oh,” cite a hopya`ae.

Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Minmin kha ae lanpaw pya oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Kaening nynh kae cceih cih zah e ccungccaw`ae balyn hanlan aepaw kae re khyh lanze, sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning laelan pawsang kae hoi khyh,” a ci`ae.
Pawccecize tuin kya pise piccang`ae thungpangaw loukaw a um`ae. Te a zuitu`ae kha, “Phu kheit kya sungpangaw ccite minmin kha dahungsah oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te zuitu`ae nynh ou tuhte cyih`ae zah minmin balyn kha a dahungsah`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw zawning kha laah zah vaawran lang dothung zah lungtuabya a ho, te eih zah ccungccaw zapi malang nyapya lan a zuitu`ae kha a pya`ae.
Te minmin balyn tuh ae`ae zah mih vue phe so kou, te alaepaw a eihpaw kha kee haw laening a khuin`ae.
Te ou tuhte Jesu tuh a makhaete sawsang lyakhe, a zuitu`ae oun thuabua`ae zah minmin kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw hynh hung oun ci`ae mou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Baptisma pyatu Johan ae ci`ae, thuasalama abang nynh Elijah ae ci`ae, te mingccang`ae nynh langmaw lya-e profeh lukhakheit nynh bua a thothui vae ae ci`ae,” cite a khung`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Thuasalama nanning nynh so kae hynh hung nae ci oh mou?” cite a khia`ae. Piter nynh, “Nang tuh Pachia kya-e Kri nynh na thua,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh kha-e uccaw kha hung sanmah a hopya khyh nawlan`ae minmin kha kawpya`ae zah tyntetyn lang byataw`ae.

Te, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh patae yn teing hahe cih, te piccang`ae, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh oun vua cih`ae, oun theih cih`ae, te nin thungnaw kya yn thothui cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te mih balyn kyakhe, “Lukhakheit nynh kamaw hynh yn zui ry lan thua ze, amaw te amaw kha yn vuakuh sah lah nin takyh a vaelantung kha puihkuh sah, te kamaw yn zui sah.
Pawccecize hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha a khumkuh ry paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a shung cih, thuasalama hunghung zemah kamaw keiccuze a hiinnaw kha a shung paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a khumkuh cih.
Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh laephipi hynh khaleih a mue ze so amaw te amaw kha a shung lanze, tukhyhze ro athua ze, a hanlan pawmou athane?

Pawccecize hunghung zemah kamaw te ka bya kha a mae yn thyakhae paw tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh amaw phu-enaw, a Paaw phu-enaw te athyaapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae phu-enaw ry he yn thua te kha-e paw kha a maethyakhae ru cih.
Thuasalama nanning kha byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw kha a muih`ae cia chinaw a tytua cih lei`ae paw ccungccaw abang e kya a um`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte e bya a ho koute nin tarya loukaw he acih tuh Jesu nynh Piter, Johan te James kha cciakhae`ae zah sawsang lan mua langkhe a cceihthung.
Te saw he a sang tuh a mae muinsan tuh rulaekuh zah a uccaw arawpaw tuh phaephae a ah.
Te, dotua, ccungccaw luning tuh amaw ryte byahokuh`ae; tuh-e`ae tuh Mawsi te Elijah nynh thua`ae.
Minmin tuh phu-enaw te oun langkuh`ae zah Jerusalem kya Jesu nynh a ccingsah vae cih paw a chi lanpaw kong kha a ho`ae.
Thuasalama Piter te a ban`ae tuh a ngawphukuh`ae; te he a thaekuh`ae tuh, Jesu phu-enaw te amaw ryte a thadyn`ae paw ccungccaw luning kha a muih`ae.

Ou tuhte minmin nynh amaw kyate he phiakuh`ae tuh Piter nynh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, e kya um paw tuh kaening elan ahoy; te bu ccangthung kae sak sah, na hanlan ccangkheit, Mawsi hanlan ccangkheit te Elijah hanlan ccangkheit,” cite paw nynh ka ho cipaw ny leite a hopya.
Tuhte a ho cciamang lya, maeking yn langkuh zah minmin kha pung a khung`ae, te maeking lungkhu lang a tee`ae tuh minmin tuh a rih`ae.
Te maeking kyate roi yn ccae zah, “E paw tuh ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw bya kha la ngae oh,” a ci.
Te roi he adae kou tuh Jesu makhae nynh a muih vae`ae. Te zuitu`ae nynh khahlya a muih`ae paw kha hung kya sanmah ho leite daetedae lang nynh a um`ae.
Ou tuhcihte, awkhualan minmin tuh mua kyate he oun rungbung`ae tuh ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae.
Te, dotua, ccungccaw zapi kyate lukheitpaw nynh sia zah, “Ccangpatupaw, ka ccapaw nae dopya nawlan kae ngiaku, pawccecize aning tuh lukheit kyalya paw ka ccaaw nynh thua.
Te, dotua, muisaw nynh kyng zah vaekheihmawte raerae leih a sia, te a taraphue phe thua lan a reih, te phe ccihtheih lang tua zah a kyate poutaw lan kou arusah.
Te kha-e kha dee lan na zuitu`ae ka ngia`ae zah minmin nynh dee kho khyh`ae,” cite a hopya.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Pou zyn lei`ae te a ccouseikuh`ae paw ciihan`ae, hohse cia mou nae kya ka um ung cih zah kae ngaesangpah ung cih oh? Na ccapaw tuh hynhlang yn cciakhae,” a ci.
Te imohpaw nynh he a cceih tuh raerangsaro nynh laephi kya khulia zah karaehosah. Te Jesu nynh athyaa leipaw muisaw kha pe zah imohpaw kha a dansah, te a paaw kalan bua a pya.
Te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Pachia a lesaenaw kya mih ngaeangthua. Thuasalama Jesu nynh a cyipaw balyn kya ccungccaw miakaw mih ngaeangthua lyakhe, Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha,
“Hynh-e bya`ae hynh nae nakaring lungkhu lang tee sah, pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kuih kalan ah a thua vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama hynh-e a bya hopaw tuh minmin kyate thuru thua zah minmin nynh nyhthya khyh`ae zah thaethya khyh`ae, te tuh-e a bya hopaw konglang minmin nynh amaw khia lan mah phe a rih`ae.
Oute zuitu`ae laku hungmou alesae huacce cih cipaw eikunaw a um.
Te Jesu nynh mih thinlung-tuanaw kha nyte imua lukheit kha laah zah amaw pe khe a nung,

te minmin kha, “Hunghung zemah hynh-e imua taraw hynh ka min te a lawkuh paw tuh kamaw kha yn lawkuh paw nynh thua, te hunghung zemah kamaw kha yn lawkuh paw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a lawkuh paw nynh thua. Pawccecize nanning balyn lakuze adih huaccepaw tuh alesaepaw athua cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te Johan nynh, “Bawipaw, lukheitpaw nynh na min te raerangsaro a dee paw kha kaening nynh kae muih, te aning tuh kaening ryte a zuiku bua khyh keiccu kaening nynh kae khee,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Kha-e paw kha khee nan oh, pawccecize aening kha oun rawse leipaw tuh aening kalan a pang paw nynh thua,” a cipya.
Ou tuhcihte amaw kha vaaw lang lawthung lan accyh he azaw tuh, Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang ccia lan phang a noukuh.
Te zeccuetu`ae kha a malang a saw`ae, te minmin nynh cceih`ae zah amaw hanlan paccyn lan Samaria`ae khua khuakheit lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
Jerusalem lang po suhlue lan a nouku keiccu kha-e khuaccaw`ae nynh amaw kha thua sah khyh`ae.
Te a zuitu`ae James te Johan nynh kha-e kha he muih`ae tuh, “Bawipaw, Elijah nynh a cyi hawte, minmin hynh marya usah khylan vaawran kyate maee ccawsah bung lan kawpya lan nae ry ta?” cite a khia`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh maeleihkuh zah, “Nanning tuh pawtahawpaw muisaw kya-e nynh kae thua cipaw na nyhkuh khyh oh.
Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh ccungccaw`ae hiinnaw ro khylan yn thua khyh, thuasalama khum khylan nynh yn thua,” cite minmin kha a pe`ae. Te minmin tuh ccangpaw khua kalan khe a cceih`ae.
Ou tuhcihte minmin tuh laanpi kya a ccia`ae lyakhe, ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Bawipaw, na ccianaw miakaw lang kae zui cih,” cite a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Rang-ui`ae nynh laekarung a hoi`ae, te vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh bu a hoi`ae, thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a lu nungnaw san hoi khyh,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh mingccangpaw kha, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya. Thuasalama aning nynh, “Bawipaw, masaty ka la cceih sah lah ka paaw kha ka la uh hin sah,” a ci.
Jesu nynh, “A chih`ae paw nynh mih michi`ae kha la uh`ae sah, thuasalama nang tuh cceih lah Pachia peenaw kong kha la ho,” a cipya.
Te mingccangpaw nynh mah, “Bawipaw, namaw kae zui cih, thuasalama masaty ka la cceih sah lah ka inn kya um`ae paw kha ka la beihsya hin`ae,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Hung zemah, thuetung kha kyng zah nuhlang a maeleihkuh paw tuh Pachia peenaw hanlan ngaekuh khyh,” a cipya.
E uccaw`ae koute Bawipaw nynh ccangpaw sungsari kha mah khang`ae zah amaw a cceih vae cihnaw lang khua takyhte ahmin takyh langkhe, minmin kha luning luning ccite amaw malang khe a saw`ae.
Oute minmin kha, “Loohrue lanpaw tuh alung ccaccing, thuasalama loohruetu`ae tuh azya, tukeiccu nanning nynh, loohruetu Bawipaw nynh a loohruenaw lungkhu lang ryalahtu`ae yn saw nawlan sawsang oh.
Nanning la cceih oh; dotua oh, suizaw`ae laku tuu`ae saw hawte nanning kha kae saw oh.
Phuabu thuasah, sohrae thuasah, ccukoh thuasah phukuh nan oh, te laanpi kya hung ccungccaw sanmah la beih nan oh.
“Te pawpaw inn kya na tee oh thua zemah, ‘E inn kya daenaw um sah,’ cite masaty la ho oh.
Te daenaw ccapaw tuh tuin kya a um lanze, na ho oh paw daenaw tuh tuin kya a um cih, a um khyh lanze nae kalan bua yn ki cih.
Te tuh-e inn kyakhe um oh lah ae pya oh paw kha la ae oh lah neih oh, pawccecize ryalahtu tuh a ryalaw mee mue lan accan. Inn kheit kyate inn kheit kalan la cceih nan oh.
“Te pawpaw khua lungkhu lang na tee oh zah ae thuasah oh ze, nae malang ae nyapya oh paw kha la ae oh.
Te khe kya a um paw ngeccih`ae kha la dansah oh lah minmin kha, ‘Pachia peenaw tuh nae kalan yn naekuh vae,’ cite la hopah oh.
Thuasalama pawpaw khua lungkhu lang na tee oh zah ae thuasah khyh oh ze, tuh-e khua kya-e laanpi`ae kalan khe po la cceih oh lah,
‘Kaening kya abekuhpaw nae khua-e vuiping ccaccei hynh nanning rawsete kae pheihku, tuhzemah Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kalan yn naekuh vae cipaw hynh la nyh ccaccing oh,’ cite minmin kha la hopah oh.
Thuasalama tuh-e Nin kya tuh-e khua hanlan laeze Sodom khuapi hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih cipaw nanning kae hopya oh.

“Khorazin, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Bethsaida, nang tuh paw ngaethya lan na um babang! Pawccecize nanning kya acyikuh paw khuaruaru ryalawnaw`ae hynh Tai khua te Sidon khua kyakhe a la cyiku lanze, minmin tuh buri uccaw lawkute buhaw kya dahungte khawlya mawte phe a la ngaesikuh vae cih`ae.
Thuasalama byapianaw kya nanning hanlan laeze Tai te Sidon hanlan ngaesang kho a um hua cih.
Te Kapernaum, nang tuh vaawran phe thua lang hangthung na thua zemah Hades lang sawbung na thua cih.
“Nae bya a ngae paw tuh kamaw bya a ngae paw nynh thua, te nanning ae ei oh paw tuh kamaw kha yn ei paw nynh thua, te kamaw yn ei paw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a ei paw nynh thua,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te sungsari`ae tuh lungtuate bua oun ki`ae zah, “Bawipaw, na min liate raerangsaro`ae nynh heize kae kaw te a um`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Khozawlaekuhpaw hawte Setan tuh vaawran kyate a ccawbung paw kha ka muih.
