Dotua oh, nanning tuh fupaw`ae te zekang`ae syde kho nawlan te nae rhawpaw tae kho nawlan kawhoinaw balyn kae pya oh, te pawpaw nynh sanmah nanning kha maw ae muesah lan khyh oh.
Tuhzemah muisaw`ae nynh nae kaw te a um`ae paw, tuh-e kyakhe nae lungtua nan sah, thuasalama nae min tuh vaawran kya zei athua paw kyahin nae lungtua sah,” a cipya`ae.

Tuh-e ccyh kya Jesu tuh Muisaw kya lungtua zah, “Vaawran te laephi Bawipaw, Pou Apang, nang nynh ahawpaw te athyapaw ccungccaw kyate e uccaw`ae hynh phe na thuru zah imua`ae kalan phe na phy vae keiccu na kalan lungtuabya kae ho. Athua nyng, Apang, hynhte acyikuh paw tuh na mitmuihnaw kya ahoypaw nynh thua.

Pawpaw balyn tuh Apang nynh kamaw kalan marya yn ah vae, te Paaw laelan hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Ccapaw hynh hung nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh, te Paaw hynh hung nynh thua cipaw kha Ccapaw te Ccapaw nynh a phypya ry paw ccungccaw laelan hung nynh san nyh khyh,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kalan maeleihkuh zah, “Atu na muih oh paw uccaw`ae a muih paw mit`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua.

Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, profeh`ae patae te siapharan`ae patae nynh na muih oh paw hynh muih a ry`ae zemah muih khyh`ae, te na thae oh paw hynh thae a ry`ae zemah thaebua khyh`ae,” cite mih makhaete a hopya`ae.
Te, dotua, kawbya thyapaw lukheit nynh thadyn zah, “Ccangpatupaw, zungzae hiinnaw rhoccou khylan pawmou ka cyi cih?” cite Jesu kha a syntawtua.
Jesu nynh, “Kawbya kya pawmou azeikuh? Pawtemou na ria?” a cipya.

Te aning nynh khung zah, “ ‘BAWIPAW na Pachia kha na thinlung balyn te, na hiinnawmuisaw balyn te, na thawzung balyn te, te na tuanaw balynte na sungsah cih; te na innpaw kha namaw toulou hawte na sungsah cih,’ acihkuh,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Na hopaw tuh athua, tuhte la cyih lah na hiin cih,” a cipya.
Thuasalama, aning nynh amaw te amaw kha thyaaccousaku ry zah Jesu kha, “Te ka innpaw tuh hungmou?” a ci.

Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccungccapaw lukheit tuh Jerusalem kyate Jeriko khua lang cceihbung zah damiah`ae laku phe a phungkuh, te damiah`ae nynh a uccaw kha phae`ae zah a bua`ae, te vya chih lante nung`ae zah phe cciataw`ae.
Te kha-e laanpi kyakhe ranpibawi lukheit cceihbung zah kha-e paw kha he a muih tuh ccanglang te phe a sibia.
Te tuhhawte Levi paw lukheit nynh tuh-e kya he a thua tuh kha-e paw kha do zah ccanglang te sibia zah phe a cciataw.
Thuasalama Samariapaw lukheit tuh khuaccung zah tuh-e paw umnaw kyakhe a thua; te he a muih tuh ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi.
Te ccianua zah a vaemaw kha chitui te misutui bupah zah uccaw te a hepya, te amaw a saring tungvaw khe khang zah balah-inn langkhe cciakhae zah a dooih.
Te awkhualan ccia lan he cih tuh denari kianing kha thuakuh zah balah-inn ngawtupaw kha pya zah, ‘E paw hynh la dooih lah tuhlae na thangpaw kha bua kae thua te kae pyaru cih,’ a cipya.
“Tuh-e luthung`ae lakuze hungmou tuh-e damiah`ae laku a phungkuh paw ccungccapaw a innpaw athua ngaw cite na tua?” a ci.
Te kawbyathyapaw nynh, “Tuh-e paw tungvaw ngaethyaumsanaw a hoi paw nynh athua,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh, “La cceih lah nang mah tuh-e hawte la cyihbua,” a cipya.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu te a zuitu`ae tuh khuaccung`ae zah khua khuakheit kya he a tee tuh Martha acikuh paw nopinung lukheit nynh Jesu kha a inn lang a thuasah.
Te Martha nynh Meri acikuh paw a neitanung lukheit a hoi. Tuh-e nung tuh Jesu ccu leihpaw khe dahung zah a bya kha a ngae.

Thuasalama Martha tuh thohae ryasuh paw te a thinlung sokhaekuh, te Jesu kalan cceih zah, “Bawipaw, ka neitanung nynh ka makhaete oun thohae sah paw hynh pawlang nae riapah khyh tou? Tukeiccu kamaw rya bawng lan hopah,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Martha, Martha, nang tuh uccaw patae konglang na lungvawsaw zah na thinphang.
Thuasalama ahoboupaw uccaw ccangkheit rou nynh a um; tuh-e ahoypaw apung kha Meri nynh phe a poku vae, tuh-e apung tuh a kyate lawpya thua vae lan khyh,” a ci.

Ou tuhcihte ahmin sang kheit kya Jesu nynh sawsang zah he a thangsah tuh, a zuitu`ae lukheit nynh, “Bawipaw, Johan nynh mah a zuitu`ae kha a ccangpya`ae hawte, kaening hynh sawsang lan oun ccangpabua,” a cipya.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning saw he na sang vae oh ze: ‘Vaawran kya um paw kaening Paaw, na min sawtuanaw um sah. Na peenaw thua ccavae sah. Vaawran kya na rynaw acyikuh hawte laephi vawlan cyikuh bua sah.
Nin takyh kae aepaw looh kha atunin kaening yn pyabua.

Te kae tungvaw a sei`ae paw miakaw kha kaening nynh mah kae ngaethya`ae keiccu kae seinaw kha oun la ngaethyabua. Te kaening hynh tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang oun cciakhae nan, thuasalama mihoy leipaw kyate oun khungtua,’ cite la ho oh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh ruiban hoi zah ziraccyng khe a banpaw kalan cceih zah, ‘Ka ban, sanlou phethung yn ccoibua hin.
Pawccecize, ka banpaw lukheit tuh a khuaccungnaw kyate ka kya yn thua zah loohdang lanpaw, pawsang mah ka hoi khyh,’ a cipya.

“Te inn lungkhu a um paw nynh, ‘Mithyhmitpaw yn nung nan vae; atu thuakaw phe khawkuh vae, te ka ccaaw`ae mah kamaw ryte ikhung kya phe ih vae`ae, ka tho kho vae khyh zah kae pya kho vae khyh,’ cite a khung cih.
Nanning kae hopya oh, tuh-e paw nynh tho leite um zah a pya khyh zemah, a banpaw athua keiccu umtaw leite banban pei a ngiaku keiccu tuh tho ngaw zah ahobou zeih kha a pya cih.
“Te nanning kae hopya oh, ngia oh lah pya na thua cih oh, ccung oh lah na muih cih oh, khua oh lah hungpya na thua cih oh.
Pawccecize a ngia paw miakaw tuh a mue, te a ccung paw tuh a muih, te thuakaw a khua paw tuh hungpya athua cih.
“Nanning lakuze paaw athua paw lukhakheit nynh, a ccapaw nynh sanlou a ngiaku ze lung kha pya ngaw ta? Tukhyhze ngasaw a ngiaku ze ngasaw hanpaw fuparepaw kha pya ngaw ta?
Tukhyhze awtui kha a ngiaku ze zekang kha pya ngaw ta?

Nanning nynh na hoy lei oh pite, ahoypaw lasung`ae kha nae ccaaw`ae pya lan na ny oh lanze, vaawran um paw nae Paaw nynh amaw kalan a ngiakuh`ae paw kha Thyaa Muisaw kha pawcihmou houh a pya cih`ae?” cite a hopya`ae.
Te bya ho kho leipaw raerangsaro kha Jesu nynh a dee. Ou tuhte raerangsaro he a pou tuh bya ho kho leipaw tuh bya a ho vae, te ccungccaw zapi tuh mih ngaeangthua.
Thuasalama ccungccaw abang nynh, “Aning nynh khozi`ae uktupaw Beelzebub liate nynh khozi`ae kha a dee,” a ci`ae.
Te abang nynh amaw kha syntaw khylan vaawran kyate muihsanaw kha a ngia`ae.
Thuasalama, Jesu nynh mih tuanaw kha phe nyh zah minmin kha, “Amaw te amaw aphiakuhpaw peenaw miakaw tuh aroh cih, te amaw te amaw aphiakuhpaw innbyn tuh a khuliakuh cih.
Te Setan mah amaw te amaw a phiaku lanze pawtemou a peenaw tuh atyn kho cih? Pawccemacize nanning nynh kamaw kha Beelzebub liate nynh raerangsaro`ae a dee nae ci oh.
Te kae nynh Beelzebub liate raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee lanze, hung liate mou nae ccaaw`ae nynh minmin kha a dee`ae? Tukeiccu minmin tuh nanning byapiatu`ae athua cih`ae.
Thuasalama kae nynh Pachia kuihdung liate raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee lanze, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning kya athua ccaccing vae.
“A thawsaepaw ccungccaw nynh zunghe ryte a inn kha a ngaw lya tuh a uccaw`ae akhyn.
Thuasalama amaw laeze a thawsae huapaw nynh he yn thua vae tetuh amaw kha phe a tae cih, te a doliakupaw a zunghe balyn kha a kyate a lawpah cih zah a lua paw uccaw`ae kha pung a nee cih.
Kae ryte a um leipaw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn rawsepaw nynh thua, te kae ryte a sueluakuh bua leipaw ccungccaw tuh a phiakuhpaw nynh thua.
“Athyaa leipaw muisaw nynh ccungccapaw kyate he pou tuh arounaw hmin`ae lang po a cceih, hae-ungnaw kha ccungkuh zah muihkuh khyh, aning nynh, ‘Ka poutawnaw ka inn lang ka ki cih,’ a ci.
Te he a thua tuh, kha-e inn tuh phe la phikuh zah a paccaankuh`ae paw kha a muih.

Oute aning tuh cceih zah amaw laeze houh athahhua`ae paw ccangpaw muisaw lusari`ae kha a hoeibua`ae; te minmin tuh tee`ae zah kha-e paw kya a um`ae; te kha-e ccungccapaw kya-e nyalang acyihkuh paw tuh masaty e laeze houh seihua vae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte, e uccaw`ae kong a ho lyakhe, kha-e phu kya-e nopinung lukheit nynh sia zah Jesu kha, “Nang ae saah paw vue te nang ae kua paw matei tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a cipya.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Athua, Pachia bya kha thae zah a zui`ae paw tuh houh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,” a ci.

Te ccungccaw`ae pataepi a sueluakuh`ae lyakhe, Jesu nynh tho zah, “E ccungccaw`ae tuh ahoy leipaw ciihan nynh thua`ae, minmin nynh muihsanaw kha a ngiaku`ae; te profeh Jonah kya-e muihsanaw laelan ccangpaw muihsanaw tuh pya thua lan khyh`ae.
Pawccecize Jonah tuh Nineveh`ae hanlan muihsanaw athua hawte, Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah e ccungccaw`ae hanlan muihsanaw athua cih.

Byapianaw kya Deilang-e siapharannung tuh e ciihan kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte yn thokuh cih zah minmin kha seibe cih`ae, pawccecize aning tuh laephi athangnaw langte Solomon hawnaw bya kha thae khylan yn thua; te dotua, Solomon laeze alesae huapaw tuh e kya nynh a um.

Byapianaw kya Nineveh khua-e ccungccaw`ae tuh hynh-e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae ryte oun thokuh cih`ae zah hynh e she kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha sei oun be cih`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh Jonah phunghonaw kya phe a ngaesikuh`ae; te dotua, Jonah laeze a lesae huapaw tuh e kya nynh a um.

“Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah maeekhua kha he a tyh vae ze muih leinaw kya nung boi khyh, kee khung he khyh, thuasalama oun tee paw ccungccaw`ae nynh a awpaw kha a muih ccaw`ae cite maee awnawpaw vawlan nynh a nung.
Pyn kya-e awnaw tuh mit nynh thua, tukeiccu na mit he ahoy vae ze na pyn balyn mah awnaw te phe beih, thuasalama na mit he ahoy vae khyh ze, na pyn balyn mah mohnaw te phe beih.
Tukeiccu na kya um paw awnaw tuh mohnaw athua khyh nawlan la raeringkuh.
Te na pyn balyn tuh mohnaw um leite awnaw te phe bia lanze, maeekhua a awpaw nynh awnaw ae pya hawte, na pyn khaleih tuh awnaw te phe beih cih,” a ci.
Te tuhte a ho lya, Farasipaw lukheit nynh Jesu kha aepaw a kopya; te Jesu tuh cceih zah ae lan a dahung.
Te zerya a ae maw a kuih a singkuty khyh paw kha Farasipaw nynh he a muih tuh a ngaeangthua.
Te Bawipaw nynh, “Atu nanning Farasi`ae tuh banang te pake kha avawlan kyalya nynh na sing oh, thuasalama nae lungkhu tuh karangkunaw te hoyleinaw te nynh phe bia.
Nanning mingaee`ae! Avawlan a raetu nynh alungkhu kha mah rae bia khyh tou?
Thuasalama na hoi oh paw uccaw`ae kha ryachi`ae pyabua oh; te dotua, pawpaw balyn tuh nae hanlan athyaapaw nynh thua.

“Thuasalama Farasi`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize, nanning nynh hangmae te pucinan te enaw-ekan`ae balyn kha pumhaw pumkheit na pya oh zah Pachia atazaenaw te a sungsanawpaw kha phe na kawtaw oh; e`ae hynh na cyi lan oh ccan zah ccangpaw mah cyi leite na um lan oh paw thua khyh.
“Farasi`ae, nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh sinakok kya ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw kha na ry oh zah kungkunaw kya sawtuate beihku na ry oh.

“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae, cyihruh`ae, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning tuh alang leipaw shawkhu te nynh na loku oh. Kha-e avawlan cceih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh shawkhu a um paw hei kha nyh khyh`ae,” a cipya.
Oute kawbya thya`ae paw kyaze lukheitpaw nynh khung zah, “ Ccangpatupaw, tuhte na hopaw tuh kaening mah nae sarya paw nynh thua,” a cipya.

Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning, kawbya thya`ae paw mah paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh phu lan myarya aripaw phupaw kha ccungccaw`ae na khang oh zah naemaw tuh nae kuihdung ccangkheit te san na tung khyh oh.
“Nanning paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh profeh`ae shawku kha na raepah oh zah nae minpaaw`ae nynh minmin kha a chia`ae.
Thanccingte nanning nynh nae minpaaw`ae cyisahnaw kha nae nawccah cipaw alang; pawccecize minmin nynh profeh`ae kha phe a chia ccaccing`ae, te nanning nynh shawku`ae kha na raepya oh.
Tukeiccu Pachia kya-e hawnaw nynh mah, ‘Minmin kalan profeh`ae te locceihtu`ae kha ka saw cih`ae, te minmin nynh abang kha theih ngaw`ae zah abang kha a tua-a sah cih`ae,’ a ci.
Ou tuhte laephipi athonaw kyate alua paw profeh`ae balyn chii mee kha hynh-e ciihan`ae kya ngia athua nawlan.
Abel chii kyate tho zah silawhang te tempal laku kya a chia`ae paw Zakharia chii kyacia ngia athua cih`ae. Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e tuh e ccungccaw`ae kya ngia athua cih.
“Kawbya thya`ae paw, paw ngaethya lan na um oh babang! Pawccecize nanning nynh nynawpaw toh kha phe na law oh; naemaw mah na tee khyh oh zah a tee`ae paw kha mah phang na khaw oh,” a ci.
Tuhte hynh-e uccaw`ae kong a hopya`ae lyakhe, kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh bya patae yn hosei ccaw cite Jesu kha thinriasah khylan thawte a ei`ae.
A khalang kyate yn pou paw kha kyngpya lan zah seibe khylan amaw kha phang a dokhaw`ae.

Tuin ccyh lya, riatae lei ccungccaw zapi pi tuh pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah lukheit te lukheit sydekute a um`ae lyakhe, Jesu nynh tho zah a zuitu`ae kha, “Cyiruhnawpaw Farasi`ae ransi kha la raeringkuh oh.
Pawccecize langsaku lei lante bong paw pawsang um khyh; ny lei lante thuruh paw mah um khyh.
Tukeiccu amohnaw kya na ho oh paw miakaw kha a awnaw kya thae athua cih; te alungkhu e akhaan kya nakaring kya na ho oh paw kha innccukaly kyate siakhae athua cih.
“Te ka ban oh, nanning kae hopya oh, pyn kha theih`ae zah tuhkoute pawsang cyih kho vae lei`ae paw raw kha rih nan oh.
Thuasalama hungmou ri lan accan cipaw kae hopah cih oh; pyn a theih koute kehenna maee lungkhu lang vua lan kawhoinaw a hoitupaw raw kha rih oh; athua, nanning kae hopya oh, amaw raw kha rih oh.
“Ccithya sapangaw kha daw phuapia pianing lang khaw a zua`ae? Te kha-e ccithya sakheit sanmah Pachia nynh ning khyh.
Thuasalama nae lu kya-e nae sang`ae heize marya ria athua. Tukeiccu rih nan oh; nanning tuh ccithya`ae patae laeze nae phutehua.
“Nanning kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha ccaekia yn khan paw tuh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang kha-e paw kha ccaekia a khan cih.
Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw kha yn vua paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang vua ru athua cih.
Te hunghung zemah Ccungccaw Ccapaw rawsete bya kawkheit a ho paw tuh ngaethya athua cih; thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw kha rawsete a sarya paw ccungccaw tuh ngaethya thua lan khyh.
“Te nanning kha sinakok`ae kalan, te uktu`ae te kawhoitu`ae kalan he ae thuakhae vae oh ze pawtemou ka khung cih, pawmou ka khung cih, tukhyhze pawmou ka ho cih cipaw nae lungvawsaw nan sah.
Pawccecize Thyaa Muisaw nynh kha-e ccyh ccaccei kyakhe na ho lan oh accanpaw kha ae ccangpah cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi kyate lukheitpaw nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, rho uccaw yn nee bua nawlan ka upaw hynh hopah,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccapaw, hung nynh mou kae hynh nanning tungvaw byapiatu lang, tukhyhze rho neetu lang yn khang?” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Nae lungkyh sah lah karangkunaw hynh raeringkuh oh; pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit hiinnaw tuh phe beih lang a hoi paw uccaw`ae kyakhe um khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae: “Mihoipaw lukheit kya-e lorang tuh looh myarya a voi.
Te a thinlung kya tuakuh zah, ‘Ka looh nungnaw ka hoi vae khyh zah pawmou ka cyih cih?’ a ciku.
“ ‘Te hynhte ka cyih cih, ka ccung-inn`ae kha ka phou cih zah ale huapaw ka sak cih, te tuin kya ka looh`ae te ka uccaw`ae balyn kha ka nung cih.
Te ka hiinnawmuisaw kha, “Ka hiinnaw-muisaw, nang tuh kum patae hanlan uccaw patae kha ccakhungpya na thua vae, hung um ccavae, ae lah neih, te lungtuate um, ka cipah cih,” ’ a ci.

“Thuasalama tuhte a tuaku lyakhe, Pachia nynh kha-e paw kha, ‘Mingaeepaw, atu khuazi ccacceimaw na hiinnaw-muisaw kha lawpya athua cih, te na ccakhung paw uccaw`ae kha hung elan mou a tang cih?’ a cipya.
“Tukeiccu amaw hanlan sisua a ccakhungkuh paw ccungccaw tuh tuh-e paw te nynh aloku, te aning tuh Pachia malang a hoirungpaw thua khyh,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Tukeiccu nanning kae hopya oh, nae hiinnaw hanlan pawmou ka ae cih cite nae thinphang nan sah, nae pyn hanlan mah pawmou ka lawku cih cipaw nae thinphang nan sah.
Pawccecize hiinnaw tuh aepaw laeze sunghua zah pyn tuh uccaw laeze asunghua.

Va-aw`ae kha tuatua oh, pawccecize minmin tuh ccaciivuakuh khyh`ae zah looh mah rue khyh`ae, sua-inn mah hoi khyh`ae zah byng mah hoi khyh`ae, te Pachia nynh minmin kha looh a dang`ae, pavaw`ae laeze nanning tuh pawcihmou houh nae phutehua?
Te nanning lakuze hungmou thinphangnaw liate amaw ahangnaw kha dung kheit a hangchih sahkuh khopaw um?
Tuh-e adih huapaw uccaw san na cyikuh kho khyh oh lanze, pawccemou ccangpaw uccaw hanlan nae thinphang?

“Lilipaw`ae pawcihte nynh a lethung`ae cipaw kha tuatua oh; minmin tuh loopho khyh`ae, law mah su khyh`ae; tuhzemah nanning kae hopya oh, Solomon a phu-enaw balyn nynh heize lilipaw ccangkheit tuhte ccaankuh kho khyh.
Atunin um zah awkhualan tahkuamaee lungkhu lang phung athua paw rangkaw e lonua heize Pachia nynh tuhte a ccaan lan thua ze, nanning kha tuh-e laeze houh ae ccaan lan khyh oh tou? Pou zyn zya`ae?
Pawmou kae ae cih, tukhyhze pawmou kae nia ngaw cite ccung nan oh; lungriathae te mah um nan oh.
Pawccecize laephipi-e minphuin`ae nynh e uccaw`ae balyn hynh a ccung`ae paw nynh thua, te nanning nae Paaw nynh e uccaw`ae hynh nae hanlan aho cipaw phe a ny.
Thuasalama nanning tuh Pachia peenaw palia kha ccung oh; te e uccaw`ae balyn tuh pyachih na thua cih oh.
“Tuuphu taraw`ae, rih nan oh; pawccecize peenaw kha nanning pya lanpaw tuh nae Paaw a lungrythua paw nynh thua.

“Na hoi oh paw kha zua oh lah ryachi`ae kha pyabua oh, te apue kho leipaw phuabu kha raekuh oh, miruh nynh a thuanua kho leinaw te laehaw nynh a ro kho leinaw, vaawran kyakhe athang kho leipaw sisua kha ccykuh oh.
Pawccecize nae sisua umnaw kya nae thinlung mah a umbua cih.
“Nae cce kha taesung sungkuh oh lah, nae maeekhua kha awkuh oh.
Te zudy poi kyate mih bawipaw yn ki ngaw zah he yn thua te, thuakaw kha he a khua tuh vaekheihmawte thuakaw hungpya khylan cite a ngaw`ae paw see`ae hawte naemaw mah la um oh.

See`ae nynh phang a ngaw`ae paw kha mih bawipaw nynh he yn thua te a muih ze, tuh-e see`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua; byaccaccing kae hopya oh, mih bawipaw nynh taesung a sungkuh cih zah minmin kha ccaboi kya koihsah ngaw`ae zah amaw ccaccei nynh loohdang cih`ae.
Te khuazi santari ccyhningnaw kya thuasah, ccyhthungnaw kya thuasah, a bawipaw nynh yn thua zah ou tuhte a muih lanze, tuh-e see`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama e hynh nyh oh, inn hoitupaw nynh paw ccyh kya nynh miruhpaw yn thua cih cipaw kha phe a ny lanze, a inn kha a kiabia khyh nawlan phe a ngaw cih cipaw na ny oh.
Tukeiccu nanning mah raeringkuh oh; pawccecize na ngaehoi khyh oh ccyh lyakhe Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh yn thua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Te Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, e tousenaw phungpaw hynh kaening hanlan tou na ho, tukhyhze ccungccaw balyn hanlan tou?” cite a khia.
Te Bawipaw nynh, “Accyh zaw vae ze mih hanpaw looh neesah lan, a inn kya um`ae paw tungvaw uktu lang, a bawipaw nynh a khang lanpaw, zyn lan um paw te ahawpaw synriatu tuh hungmou?
Tuh-e see nynh tuhte a cyi paw kha a bawipaw nynh he yn thua lya a muih ze, tuh-e see tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua.
Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, a bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha a hoi paw balyn tungvaw uktu lan a khang cih.
Thuasalama tuh-e see nynh a thinlung kyate, ‘Ka bawipaw yn thua lanpaw tuh aro ung cih,’ ci zah see pise`ae te nopi`ae kha bua`ae zah, ae zah neih zah a rui lya,
tuh-e see nynh a ngawdae khyh nin kya te a tua khyh ccyh lya, a bawipaw tuh yn thua lanze, kha-e paw kha ccangning lang thoh bae cih zah a hanpaw kha zyn leitu`ae ryte a nungpah cih.
“Te a bawipaw rynaw kha nyh zah a paccynkuh leipaw, a bawipaw rynaw a cyipah leipaw see tuh ccungbua patae a mue cih.

Thuasalama a bawipaw rynaw kha nyh khyh zah ccungbua lan accanpaw a cyih paw see tuh ccungbua ccapyh nynh a mue cih. Pawccecize patae pya athua paw ccungccaw tuh patae a sangru cih; te pataepi a ccysah`ae paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh patae a ngiaru cih`ae.
“Kae tuh laephi vawlan maee saw khylan nynh kae thua; te ka ry paw tuh, kha-e kha phe la rua ccavae sah ci nynh thua!
Thuasalama ka in lanpaw baptisma ka hoi ung, tuh-e accing mawlaezung tuh pawcih babang mou ka lungriathae!
Laephi vawlan daenaw pya khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua cite tou na tua oh? Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhte thua khyh; thuasalama phiakunaw khylan nynh kae thua.
Pawccecize atu kyate tho ngaw zah inn innkheit kya ccungccaw lupangaw`ae tuh luthung nynh luning kha rawsete, luning nynh luthung kha rawsete a phiakuh cih`ae.

Paaw nynh ccapaw kha rawsete, ccapaw nynh paaw kha rawsete, te nung nynh ccanung kha a rawsete, ccanung nynh nung kha rawsete, te ninnung nynh monung kha rawsete, monung nynh ninnung kha rawsete a phiakuh cih`ae,” a ci.
Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw zapi kha mah, “Nanning nynh niccaw langte maeking a pouthung paw kha na muih vae oh ze, ‘Khua yn rah cih,’ na ci oh; te khua arah sasaw.
Te deilang te khivae azaw paw kha he na muih vae oh ze, ‘Khuanin yn so cih,’ na ci oh; te khuanin aso sasaw.
Cyihruh`ae! Nanning nynh laephi mitmae te vaawlui mitmae kha na phiathya oh; thuasalama pawccemou atu e ccyh hynh na thaethya khyh oh?
“Athua, pawccemou naemaw ccaccei nynh so ahmepaw kha bya na pia khyh oh tou?

Nang ae rawsetupaw ryte byapiatu kalan na cciakheih lya oh laanpi kyakhe, ccawku kho nawlan thawte la zuakuh; tukhyh lanze byapiatu kalan ae cciakhae cih zah byapiatu nynh thung uktu kalan ae ah cih, te thung uktu nynh thung ae saw cih.
Nang kae hopya, na rung lanpaw daw phuapia phe accing lang na pya makhia thung kyate na pou lan khyh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Tuh-e ccyh lya, Galilee`ae mih chii kha mih silawkunaw`ae paw ryte Pilat nynh pung a pyde pya`ae cipaw kong Jesu a hopah`ae paw ccungccaw abang a um`ae.
Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Tuh-e Galilee`ae tuh tuhte a teing`ae keiccuze ccangpaw Galilee`ae balyn laeze a seihua`ae paw cite tou na tua oh?
Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhte thua khyh; thuasalama nanning mah na ngaesiku khyh oh ze, tuh-e hawte nae balynte marya na chih mamin cih oh.
Tukhyhze, Siloam kya innhangpaw nynh mih tungvaw tingthin`ae zah phe chia`ae paw luhaw laetarya`ae kha Jerusalem kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn laeze a seihua`ae paw cite tou na tua oh?
Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhte thua khyh; thuasalama nanning mah na ngaesiku khyh oh ze, tuh-e hawte nae balynte marya na chih mamin cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Jesu nynh e tousenaw phungpaw hynh mah a ho: “Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh a misu khokhu kyakhe thaeku kukheit a la lin; te yn cceih zah kha-e ku kya a thae kha fui zah muih khyh.
Oute misu khokhu ngawtupaw kha, ‘Dotua, kum thung lungkhu hynh-e thaeku ku kalan kae cceih zah athae ka ccung zah ka muih khyh; nge ccavae; pawccemou laephi hynh a thangsah han?’ cite a hopya.
“Te aning nynh khung zah, ‘Bawipaw, atunin kum tuh hynh mawte umhin sah, a pepan lae ka thualeipah cih zah ia ka pungnua ung cih.
Te athae yn thae ze, ahoy; te yn thae vae khyh ze, khahkoute nge vae,’ a cipya,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh Sabbath nin kya sinakok ccangkheit kyakhe a ccangpya`ae.
Te, dotua, kum haw laetarya cia nyaakhaekunaw muisaw a hoi paw nopinung lukheit a um; tuh-e nung tuh a ke karae ky zah kharyh law kho khyh.
Te Jesu nynh kha-e nung kha he a muih tuh ko zah, “Nopinung, na nyakhaekunaw kyate na lue vae,” a cipya.
Te kha-e nung tungvaw a kuih khang zah vaekheihmawte a ke tuh phe alaw vae; te aning nynh Pachia kha phu-esah.

Tuhte Jesu nynh Sabbath nin kya a dansah keiccuze, sinakok uktu nynh thinria te tho zah ccungccaw`ae kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh ryalaw lawkunaw lanpaw nin taruh a um, ou kha-e nin`ae kyakhe oun cceih oh lah dannaw kha oun mue oh, Sabbath nin kya tuh mue nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Bawipaw nynh khung zah, “Cyiruhpaw! Nanning milu raveih nynh Sabbath nin kya nae tangnuapaw, khyh ze nae lann kha a inn kyate na supah oh zah tui nia lan na cciakhae khyh oh tou?
Te, dotua, kum haw laetarya cia Setan nynh phang a hee paw, Abraham ccanung athua paw, e nopinung hynh hynh-e khiinaw kyate Sabbath nin kya supya lan ccan khyh tou?” a ci.
Te hynhte he a ho tuh, amaw rawsetu`ae balyn tuh maethya pung bongkuh`ae; te ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Jesu nynh a cyipaw phu-e lan um paw uccaw`ae hanlan mih lungtua.
Oute Jesu nynh, “Pachia peenaw tuh pawtemou aloku? Te pawtemou ka touse cih?

Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh lawkuh zah a khokhu lungkhu lang a vua paw mungngia mung te nynh aloku; kha-e a mung tuh lethung zah a kupi lang phe a tang, te vawlae-e pavaw`ae nynh kha-e aran`ae kyakhe bu a luaku`ae,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh bua tho zah, “Pachia peenaw tuh pawtemou ka touse cih?
Tuh-e tuh, nopinung lukheit nynh laah zah vaepoi kawthung kya a phing paw, tuh-e vaepoi phe a thosah paw ransi te nynh aloku,” a ci.
Te Jesu tuh khuapi`ae te khua taraw`ae kalan po cceih zah ccangpya biate Jerusalem langkhe khuaccung.
Oute ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Bawipaw, khumnaw a mue`ae paw tuh azya`ae tou?” cite a khia. Te Jesu nynh,
“Abypaw koikua kyate tee lan zuakuh oh; pawccecize, nanning kae hopya oh, ccungccaw patae nynh kha-e kya tee lan oun ccung cih`ae zah tee kho lan khyh`ae.

Inn hoitupaw nynh vaekheit thokuh zah thuakaw kha phe a khaw koute, nanning nynh atolang khe na thadyn oh zah na khua oh, te, ‘Bawipaw, Bawipaw thuakaw oun hungpah,’ na ci oh; te aning nynh nanning kha, ‘Nanning paw kyate nae thua oh paw cipaw kae nynh khyh oh,’ ae cipah cih oh.
Oute nanning nynh, ‘Namaw ry kae ae zah kae neihbua, kae khua laanpi`ae kya nae ccangpah,’ nae ci cih oh.
Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Nanning kae hopya oh, nanning paw kya-e cipaw kae nyh khyh oh; ccouseikunaw ryalahtu`ae nanning balyn kamaw kyate pou oh,’ ae cipah cih oh.
Nanning nynh Abraham, Isaak te Jakob te profeh`ae balyn kha Pachia peenaw kya na muih oh zah naemaw tuh atolang dae vua na thua oh paw kha he nae muih oh tuh rawkhuinaw te hawzynaw oun um cih.
Te minmin tuh nithua, niccaw, palung lang, deilang te oun thua cih`ae zah Pachia peenaw kya oun dahung cih`ae.
Te, dotua, masaty athua cih`ae paw nyathyakou`ae um zah nyathyakou athua cih`ae paw masaty`ae a um,” a ci.
Tuh-e nin kya Farasi`ae abang oun thua`ae zah Jesu kha, “Toikuh lah e kyate pou, pawccecize Herod nynh chia lan ae ry,” a cipya`ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning la cceih oh lah kha-e rang-ui kha, ‘Dotua, kae nynh raerangsaro`ae kha ka dee zah atunin te awkhualan ka dansah`ae, te nin thungnaw kya kae tuh ccingsah ka thua cih,’ cite la hopah oh.
Tuhzemah atunin, awkhualan te sarakheih kae tuh solei ka cceih ung cih; pawccecize Jerusalem atolang khe profeh lukheit a chi lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh.

“Pou Jerusalem, Jerusalem, profeh`ae a theih paw, te na kalan oun saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha lung te a deih paw nang! Awpinung nynh a taw`ae kha a sake kawlan a suelua`ae hawte na ccaaw`ae kha pynkheihlan suelua lan pei ka ry zah nang nynh na ry khyh!

Dotua oh, nae inn tuh nanning umnaw kho lei lante a um han; te byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ‘BAWIPAW min liate oun thua paw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua!’ cite nanning nynh na ho mawlaezung oh nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Sabbath nin kya Jesu nynh aepaw ae lan Farasi lupipaw lukheit inn lungkhu lang he a tee tuh minmin nynh a dophi`ae.
Te, dotua oh, tuipoipaw ccinaw a hoi paw ccungccaw lukheit a malang khe a um.
Te Jesu nynh tho zah kawbya thya`ae paw te Farasi`ae kha, “Sabbath nin kya dansah lan kawbya nynh a ua tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin tuh daebabilan zya um`ae. Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha laah zah a dansah, te a cciasah.
Te minmin kha, “Nanning lakuze a vaetua, tukhyhze a lann kha Sabbath nin kya hunghua lungkhu lang a ccaw ze palou thua leite a um paw hungmou a um cih?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae kya mah bua khung kho khyh`ae.
Te ko paw ccungccaw`ae nynh ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw a poku`ae paw kha he a muih tuh, minmin kha Jesu nynh tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae:
“Nang kha zudy poi kalan lukhakheit nynh ae kobua ze ahoy huaccepaw dahungnaw kya la dahung nan, na dahung lanze, nang laeze sawtua lan um paw ccungccapaw kha kha-e paw nynh a kobua ze,
nang te kha-e paw a kotupaw nynh na kalan yn cceih ngaw zah, ‘E paw hynh dahungnaw pya,’ ae cipya ze, nang tuh maethya te ane huapaw dahungnaw lawku lan yn ccan vae cih.

Thuasalama nang kha ae kobua`ae ze, cceih lah ane huapaw dahungnaw kyakhe la dahung; ou khate nang ae kotupaw he yn thua vae ze, namaw kha, ‘Ka ban, ahang huapaw kalan khe dahung,’ ae cipya ccaw; oute tuh namaw ryte na dahungkheih oh paw malang khe nang tuh sawtuanaw na mue vae cih.
Pawccecize hunghung zemah amaw te amaw a hangthungkuh paw tuh sawbung athua cih, te amaw te amaw zakawsangsakuhpaw tuh hangthung athua cih,” a ci.

Oute Jesu nynh amaw a kotupaw kha mah, “Nang nynh awkhua loohdangkunaw, tukhyhze zete loohdangkunaw na rae vae ze, na ban`ae, na uno`ae, na vaeccaw`ae, a hoirung`ae paw innpaw`ae kha la ko nan`ae; tuhte na ko`ae ze minmin nynh mah bua ae ko ru cih`ae zah amee phe ae sangru cih`ae.
Thuasalama nang nynh poi na tua vae ze, ryachi`ae, kuihccu mitnaw ccing lei`ae paw, ccukhou`ae te mitmoh`ae kha la ko`ae.
Oute nang tuh hythuaccoupaw na thua cih. Pawccecize minmin nynh ae sangru kho khyh`ae keiccu, a ding`ae paw thothuinaw kya nang tuh amee sangru na thua cih,” a cipya.
Te amaw ryte aenaw kya a dahungkheih`ae paw lukheit nynh e bya`ae kha he a thae tuh Jesu kha, “Pachia peenaw kya sanlou a ae cih paw ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua!” a cipya.
Oute Jesu nynh tuh-e paw kha, “Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh zerya poipi kha rae zah ccungccaw patae a ko.
Te ko athua`ae paw kha, ‘Rang ccavae oh, pawpaw balyn atu paccyn athua vae,’ cite hosapya lan zerya ae ccyh kyakhe a seepaw kha a saw.
“Thuasalama minmin balyn nynh pung a seisah`ae. Masaty e paw nynh, ‘Laekua kuakheit ka re zah do lan ka ccia phe aho ung, beih yn ngaethya hin,’ a cipya.
“Te mingccangpaw nynh, ‘Tangnua toi pangaw ka re zah syntawtua lan ka la cceih ung cih, yn ngaethya hin,’ cite a ngiaku.
“Te mingccangpaw nynh, ‘Zu phe ka hoi ung, tukeiccu kae cceih kho la khyh,’ a ci.

“Tukeiccu tuh-e seepaw nynh oun thua zah kha-e`ae kong kha a bawipaw kalan a hopya. Oute inn hoitupaw tuh a thinria zah a seepaw kha, ‘Khuapi e laanpi`ae te laan laku`ae langkhe la cceih kanmaw lah ryachi`ae, te kuihccu mitnaw ccing lei`ae paw, te ccukhou`ae te mitmoh`ae kha hynhlang oun cciakhae`ae,’ a cipya.
“Te a seepaw nynh, ‘Bawipaw, kaw nae pya thyhhawte phe ka cyi vae, tuhzemah akhaan mang accung ung,’ a ci.
“Te a bawipaw nynh a seepaw kha, ‘Laanpi lepaw`ae te ku`ae kalan la cceih lah ka inn phe abia ccaw ccungccaw`ae kha tee lan oun nangse`ae.
Pawccecize nang kae hopya, ko paw ccungccaw`ae hung nynh sanmah ka zerya hynh tangtua lan khyh`ae,’ a cipya,” cite a hopya.
Te ccungccaw zapi pi tuh amaw ryte a cceih`ae. Te Jesu nynh maeleihkuh zah minmin kha,
“Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw kalan yn cceih zah a paaw, a nung, a zu, a ccaaw`ae, a uno`ae, a ccia`ae, te amaw hiinnaw hei kha a hua khyh lanze aning tuh ka zuitu lang thua kho lan khyh.
Te hunghung zemah a vaelantung puihku leite kamaw yn zui paw tuh ka zuitu thua kho lan khyh.
“Pawccecize nanning lakuze lukhakheit nynh innhangpaw innkheit sak lan a paccynku ze, kha-e phe thangsah lan, phua azaw lan hoi ta, cipaw ny khylan masaty dahung leite a um cih tou?
Tukhyh lanze innhangpaw atung-accaw kha phe a bing koute kha-e kha a thangsah kho khyh ze, kha-e a muih`ae paw balyn nynh amaw kha sarya ngaw`ae zah,
‘E ccungccapaw tuh sak lan mang tho zah thangsah kho khyh,’ cite a ci cih`ae.

“Tukhyhze, siapharan lukheit nynh ccangpaw siapharanpaw kha rhawtuk lan a nouku ze, ccungccaw thungkuin te oun thokuh paw siapharanpaw kha ccungccaw thunghaw te ka dou kho ngaw ta cipaw masaty dahungty leite, tuakuty leite um ngaw ta?
A dou kho lan khyh ze, kha-e siapharanpaw laan sawpi a um lyakhe, zeccuetu kha saw zah ccawkunaw kha a ngiaku.
Tukeiccu, tuhhawte nanning laku hunghung zemah a hoi paw balyn khaleih a cciataw leipaw tuh ka zuitu lang thua kho lan khyh.
“Loi tuh ahoy; thuasalama loi nynh a enaw kha phe azo lanze pawtemou esah kho thua ung cih?
Kha-e loi tuh laephi hanlan mah, athupaw pumnaw hanlan mah hoy vae khyh; ccungccaw`ae nynh ccaring a vua vae`ae. Thae nawlan nakaring a hoi paw nynh tuh thae sah!” a ci.
Oute ngunto khoitu`ae balynte misei`ae nynh amaw bya ngae khylan amaw kalan oun naekuh`ae.
Te Farasi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh, “E ccungccapaw hynh misei`ae kha lehkhan zah minmin ryte a aekheih,” cite a ccokuh`ae.
Te Jesu nynh e tousenaw phungpaw hynh minmin kha a hopya`ae:
“Nanning kya tuu zakheit a hoi paw ccungccaw nynh sakheit kha a zosah lanze, sungtakua satakua kha rangkaw khe cciataw zah azopaw kha a muih makhia ccung khyh tou?
Te kha-e kha he a muih vae ze lungtuate a raw vawlan khe a khangku.
Te innvaw he a thua tuh a ban`ae te innpaw`ae kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah minmin kha, ‘Lung oun tuakhae oh, pawccecize azopaw ka tuu kha phe ka muih vae,’ a cipya`ae.
Nanning kae hopya oh, tuhhawte ngaesikunaw aho leipaw adingpaw ccungccaw`ae sungtakua lutakua tungvaw laeze a ngaesikuh paw misei lukheit tungvaw vaawran kya lungtuanaw houh a um hua cih.
“Tukhyhze, nopinung lukheit nynh ngunphua piahaw hoi zah, piakheit phe a zosah lanze maeekhua kha awkuh zah a muih makhia inn kha phi zah ahoyte ccung khyh tou?
Te he a muih tuh a ban`ae te innpaw`ae kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah, ‘Lung oun tuakhae oh, pawccecize ka zosah paw phuapia kha phe ka muih vae,’ cite a hopya`ae.
Tuhhawte, nanning kae hopya oh, a ngaesikuh paw misei lukheit tungvaw Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae umnaw kya lungtuanaw a um,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccapaw lukheit nynh ccapaw luning a hoi.
Te asoipaw nynh a paaw kha tho zah, ‘Apang, rho uccaw`ae kyaze ka ccou lan accanpaw ka hanpaw kha yn pya ccavae,’ a cipya. Te aning nynh a hoi paw uccaw`ae kha minmin a nee`ae.
“Te nin eih aro mawze, asoipaw ccapaw nynh a uccaw balyn kha lawkuh zah asawnaw ram lang khuaccung zah tuin ram kya a uccaw`ae kha keisukeilae phya a mang.
Te a hoi paw balyn marya a mang kou tuh tuh-e ram kya myarya ccakangccih zah aning tuh a ryachi vae.
Te tuh-e ram kya-e ccungccapaw lukheit kalan cceih zah a la umbua, te aning nynh amaw kha voh`ae loohdang lan a loo lungkhu lang a saw.
Te aning tuh voh`ae nynh a ae`ae paw bia kaloh`ae hei kha a vue phe so lang ae a ry zemah hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah looh pya khyh`ae.
“Te amaw te amaw he yn nyhkuh tuh, ‘Ka paaw kya vaeluakuh`ae paw patae tuh sanlou ae tae lei a hoi`ae, te kae tuh vuelaw te ka chih vae cih!
Ka thokuh cih zah ka paaw kalan ka cceih cih zah amaw kha, “Apang, Pachia malang te na malang phe ka sei vae.
Te kae tuh na ccapaw cite ko lan ka ngaekuh vae khyh, na kya vaeluakuh`ae paw lukheit hawte yn nungbua,” ka cipah cih,’ a ciku.
“Te thokuh zah a paaw kalan a cceih. Thuasalama laan sawpi a thua lyakhe a paaw nynh he a muih tuh ngaethya-umsanaw hoi zah ccuenua zah a nging kya pum zah a myng.
Te a ccapaw nynh, ‘Apang, Pachia malang te na malang phe ka sei vae, te na ccaaw cite ko lan kharyh ka ngaekuh vae khyh,’ a cipya.
“Thuasalama a paaw nynh a see`ae kha, ‘Ahoy huaccepaw uccaw kha oun laah oh lah amaw hynh lawsakuh oh, te a kuih kya kuihpu kha pusah oh lah a ccu kya ccukoh nawsah oh.
Te athopaw tohlaw kha hynhlang oun cciakhae oh lah theih oh, te ah ae cih oh zah lungtuanaw ah rae cih oh.
Pawccecize hynh-e ka ccapaw tuh a chih, te bua a hiin, aning tuh azo, te bua muih athua vae,’ a cipya`ae. Te minmin tuh lungtuanaw a tho vae`ae.
“Te a ccapaw atawccapaw tuh loo kya a la um, te yn cceih zah inn pe he a thua tuh tyngdaw te lawpaw roi kha a thae.
Te see`ae lukheit kha ko zah tuhe tuh pawmou cite a khia.
Te aning nynh, ‘Na neitapaw kha phe yn thua vae, te na paaw nynh amaw kha ngedante bua a muihthui keiccuze, athopaw tohlaw kha a chiapya,’ a cipya.
“Te aning tuh a thinria zah inn lungkhu lang tee vae khyh, tukeiccu a paaw nynh yn toikuh zah a soihbia.

Te aning nynh tho zah a paaw kha, ‘Dotua, kum patae cia na rya ka laah, na kawpyapaw mah vaekheit san kae ei boi khyh, tuhzemah ka ban`ae ryte lungtuanaw kae rae ccaw cite mia taraw sakheit san nae pya boi khyh.
Thuasalama ohhuanung`ae ryte na hoi paw uccaw marya a mang kou paw e na ccapaw tuh he yn thua mawte, athopaw tohlaw kha a hanlan na chiapya,’ a ci.
“Te a paaw nynh, ‘Ka ccapaw, nang tuh kamaw ryte tyty na um, te ka hoi paw balyn tuh na kya-e nynh thua.
Lungtuanaw ah rae lan oh ccan zah lungpaw lan accan, pawccecize e na neitapaw tuh chih zah atu a hiinthui vae, te zo zah atu muih thui athua vae,’ a cipya,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha mah a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Mihoipaw lukheit nynh synriatu lukheit a hoi, tuh-e synriatu nynh a bawipaw uccaw`ae kha phya a mang kou cite a bawipaw kalan seibe`ae.
Te a bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha ko zah, ‘Na konglang ka thae paw tuh pawtemou? Synriatu rya na lawnawpaw ccazing kha yn pya, pawccecize synriatu na thua kho vae lan khyh,’ a cipya.
“Oute synriatu nynh a thinlung kya, ‘Pawmou ka cyih vae cih? Ka bawipaw nynh synriatuthuanaw kha ka kyate phe yn lawpya vae, lae thae lan ka thae kho khyh, ngiaku lan ka maethah.
Synriatuthuanaw kyate he ka ccaw vae ze ming`ae nynh mih inn lang oun thuasah nawlan`ae pawte cyi lan cipaw ka nyku vae,’ a ci.
“Te a bawipaw kya-e laeba um`ae paw miakaw kha ko`ae zah, lukheitpaw kha, ‘Ka bawipaw kya hozeihmou laeba na um?’ cite a khia.
“Te aning nynh, ‘Chitui bath zakheit,’ a ci. Te aning nynh, ‘Na ccazing kha lawkuh lah arangte dahung lah sungpangnaw cite zeikuh,’ a cipya.
“Oute mingccangpaw kha, ‘Nang so hozeihmou lae na um?’ cite a khia. Te tuh-e paw nynh, ‘Chanvui kor zakheit,’ a ci. Te aning nynh, ‘Na ccazing kha lawkuh lah sungtarya cite zeikuh,’ a cipya.
Te atazae leipaw synriatu nynh hawrarih lante a cyi keiccu a bawipaw nynh thehoysah. Pawccecize hynh-e laephi ccungccaw`ae tuh mimaw mih she kya awnaw ccungccaw`ae laeze ahawhua`ae.
Te nanning kae hopya oh, he na shung vae oh ze zungzae umnaw lungkhu lang nanning ae lehkhan lan oh paw ruiban`ae kha ading leipaw phuasui khate raekuh oh.
Pyhtaripaw uccaw kya zyn lan um paw tuh pataepi kya mah zyn lan um paw nynh thua, te pyhtaripaw uccaw kya atazae leipaw tuh pataepi kya mah atazae leipaw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu ading leipaw phuasui kya nanning nynh zyn lan na um khyh oh ze, ahmepaw hoirungnaw kha hung nynh mou nae kalan ae ah cih oh?
Te mingccangpaw ccungccaw uccaw kya nanning nynh zyn lan na um khyh oh ze, hung nynh mou nae uccaw kha ae pya cih oh?

“See hung nynh sanmah bawi luning rya la kho khyh; pawccecize bawi lukheit kha a hua lanze lukheit kha a sungsah cih, tukhyhze lukheit kalan a pang ze lukheit kha pawlangria leite a nung cih. Pachia te phuasui kha paryh na ryaa kho khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te phua a ry`ae paw Farasi`ae nynh mah kha-e bya`ae balyn kha thae`ae zah Jesu kha a nuinse`ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning tuh ccungccaw`ae malang naemaw te naemaw na dingsakuh oh paw nynh na thua oh; thuasalama Pachia nynh nae thinlung kha a ny; pawccecize ccungccaw`ae laku myarya ahang lante tua paw uccaw tuh Pachia malang luathua-ae-ui lang um paw nynh thua.
“Kawbya te profeh`ae tuh Johan kyacia hanlan nynh thua. Johan ccyh kyate vae tuh Pachia peenaw thehoypaw kha ho thua vae zah ccungccaw miakaw nynh kha-e peenaw lungkhu lang a nangkuh`ae.
Kawbya kya-e ccafang taraw ccangkheit azo laeze vaawran te laephi zo azoihua.

“Hunghung zemah a zu kha maah zah ccangpaw nopi kha zu lang a hoi paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua; te a vawpaw nynh a mya paw nopinung kha zu lang a hoi paw tuh milae zu a seikhaepaw nynh thua.
“Sekakungpaw uccaw te uccaw nebaleihpaw leih lawkuh zah myarya hoysahte nin takyh leih um paw mihoipaw lukheit a um.
Te milae a ngiakuh paw, Lazaruh acikuh paw lukheit um zah aning tuh vaemaw te a pyn kya phe beih zah mihoipaw sakoih zung khe phang a huekuh.
Te mihoipaw ccaboi kyate accah paw loohmoi`ae kha ae lan a ry; tuhlaeze ui`ae nynh oun cceih`ae zah a vaemaw`ae kha a lya`ae.
“Ou tuhcihte Lazaruh tuh chih zah vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Abraham by vawlan a cciakhae`ae. Mihoipaw mah chih zah a u`ae.
Te Hades kya myarya accih lang teingte, dothung zah asawpi e Abraham te a by vawlan um paw Lazaruh kha a muih.

Te sia zah, ‘Apang Abraham, thaw beih yn ccih lah Lazaruh kha beih yn sawpah, a kuihdung kha tui kya yn dungsah lah ka lae hynh yn kyaasahpya ccaw, pawccecize kae tuh hynh-e maeephu kya myarya accih lang ka teing,’ a ci.

“Thuasalama Abraham nynh, ‘Ka ccapaw, laephi vaw na hiin ccyh lya ahoypaw uccaw`ae kha na mue, te tuhhawte Lazaruh tuh athahpaw uccaw`ae kha a mue cipaw kha liathuitua; thuasalama atu aning tuh ngaengansah athua vae, te nang tuh myarya accih lan teingsah na thua.

Te tuh-e`ae balyn laeze, kaening te nanning alaku kya myarya akhupaw hunghua pi kha rae athua vae. Tukeiccu e kyate nanning kalan a zua ry`ae paw nynh zua kho khyh`ae, khahlang te kaening kalan a zua ry`ae paw mah zua kho khyh`ae,’ a cipya.
“Te mihoipaw nynh, ‘Tuhte lanze, apang, ka paaw inn lang Lazaruh kha yn la sawpah cite kae ngia.
Pawccecize kae tuh uno lu pangaw ka hoi, minmin nynh hynh-e vawsaw teingnaw hmin lungkhu lang oun thuabua khyh ccaw`ae, aning nynh minmin kha a hopya`ae ccaw,’ a ci.
“Abraham nynh, ‘Minmin tuh Mawsi te profeh`ae mang a hoi`ae, minmin bya kha la ngae`ae sah,’ a cipya.
“Thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Apang Abraham, tuhte thua khyh; chinaw kyate lukheit nynh thothui zah minmin kalan a ccia lanze, minmin tuh a ngaesikuh cih`ae,’ a ci.
“Te Abraham nynh, ‘Minmin nynh Mawsi te profeh`ae bya kha a ngae khyh`ae ze lukheit nynh a chih`ae paw kyate a tho zemah minmin tuh soih kho um lae vae lan khyh`ae,’ a cipya,” cite a hopya`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Maeleihsakunaw um leite thua kho lan khyh, thuasalama maeleihsakunaw a thuasah paw ccungccaw tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang!
Hynh-e imua taraw`ae lukhakheit kha a maeleihsaku lae tuh a nging kyakhe mianawpaw lung ccangkheit kha sae`ae sah lah rili lungkhu lang ccaring vua lanze a hanlan ahoyhua cih.
“Naemaw te naemaw kha raeringkuh oh; na uno nynh na tungvaw a cyisei ze amaw kha la pe, te a ngaesiku ze la ngaethya.
Te nin kheit lungkhu na tungvaw vae sari sei zah nin kheit lungkhu vae sari na kalan yn ki zah, ‘Ka ngaesikuh,’ ae cipya ze na la ngaethya cih,” a cipya`ae.
Te locceihtu`ae nynh Bawipaw kha, “Kae zynnaw oun lungsapah,” a ci`ae.

Te Bawipaw nynh, “Nanning nynh mungngia mung mungkheit cia zynnaw na hoi oh ze hynh-e thaeku ku hynh, ‘Na tharui kyate phohkuh lah rili lungkhu lang la bingkuh,’ na cipya oh ze kha-e nynh nae kaw phe ae ngae cih oh.

“Thuasalama nanning lakuze lukhakheit nynh see lukheit hoi zah kha-e see nynh lei a thue ze thuasah, tukhyhze saring a ring ze thuasah, loo kyate he yn thua vae ze, ‘Rang lah ae lan dahung kanmaw,’ cite hung nynh mou na ci cih oh?

Thuasalama kha-e see kha, ‘Ka hanlan zerya yn hyngpah, te na tae kha cciakuh lah phe ka ae kou, phe ka neih kou cia aepaw kha yn dang, ou tuhkoute nynh nang na ae na neih ung cih,’ cite na cipah lan khyh oh tou?
Kawpya thyhhawte see nynh a cyipya keiccu, kha-e see kha a bawipaw nynh a kalan lungtuabya hopah cih ta? Lungtuabya hopah cih cite ka tua khyh.

Tuhhawte nanning mah ryalaw ae naw oh paw balyn kha he na cyi vae oh ze, ‘Aening tuh angae-aduakuh leipaw see`ae nynh ah thua oh, ah cyi lan oh paw rya kyalya nynh ah cyi oh,’ na ci cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang cceih zah Samaria te Galilee laku kyate po a cceih.
Te khua khuakheit lungkhu lang a tee tuh, asawpi lang a thadyn`ae paw, vaethyakae`ae paw ccungccaw luhaw nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae.
Te minmin nynh mih roi saw`ae zah, “Bawipaw Jesu kaening hynh ngaethya oun umsah!” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh he a muih`ae tuh minmin kha, “Cceih oh lah naemaw te naemaw kha ranpibawi`ae kalan la dosakuh oh,” a cipya`ae. Ou tuhcihte minmin nynh he a cceih`ae tuh mih vaethya phe athyaa kou.
Te minmin lakuze lukheitpaw nynh a vaethya phe athyaapaw kha he a muihkuh tuh, ki zah roi accae lante Pachia kha phuesah zah,
Jesu ccu leihpaw khe bakhung zah lungtuabya a ho; te tuh-e paw tuh Samariapaw nynh thua.
Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Vaethya athyaa`ae paw kha luhaw thua khyh ta? Lutakua`ae so teisangmou a um`ae?
Hynh-e minphuin ccangpaw holeite Pachia phu-e pya lan oun ki paw muih lan um khyh rei,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha, “Thokuh, la cceih ccavae, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae,” a cipya.
Te Farasi`ae nynh Pachia peenaw tuh hotuhmou yn thua cih cite Jesu kha he a khia`ae tuh, Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Pachia peenaw tuh mitmuihnaw te yn thua khyh.
‘E kyahin dotua!’ ‘Khuin kya dotua!’ cite mah oun ci lan khyh`ae; pawccecize dotua oh, Pachia peenaw tuh nanning lungkhu nynh a um,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Nanning nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw nin`ae kya-e nin kheit kha muih lan na ry oh ccyh yn thua cih zah na muih lan khyh oh.
Te, ‘E kyahin do! Tukhyhze khuin kya khuin do!’ ae cipah cih oh; la cceih nan oh lah zui nan oh.
Pawccecize khozaw nynh vaawlui sang kheit kaw te laekuh zah ccanglang vawlui kaw lang a aw hawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah amaw nin ccyh kya athua cih.
Thuasalama aning tuh masaty patae a teing hahe cih zah hynh-e ciihan`ae nynh oun vua cih`ae.
“Te Noah ccyh lya a la cyiku hawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw ccyh kya mah oun cyikuh cih.
Noah nynh sanphalung lungkhu lang phe a tee nin kyacia, ccungccaw`ae tuh ae`ae, neih`ae, zu hoeikuh`ae, zudykuh`ae, te tuipayn thua zah minmin balyn kha marya a ro`ae.
“Tuhhawte nynh Lot she lya mah a la cyiku; ccungccaw`ae tuh a ae`ae, a neih`ae, uccaw a re`ae, a zua`ae, thingthae ccou`ae, inn sak`ae.
Thuasalama Lot nynh Sodom khua kyate a pou nin ccaccei khe vaawran kyate maee te kemaee khuarah zah minmin balyn kha marya a ro`ae.
“Ou tuhhawte nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw he yn langku nin kya yn cyikuh cih.
Tuh-e nin kya, inn tungvaw um paw ccungccaw nynh inn lungkhu um paw a uccaw`ae lawku khylan rungbung nan vae sah; te lei kya um paw ccungccaw mah tuhhawte inn lang ki nan vae sah.
Lot a zu kha liathuitua oh.
Hunghung zemah a hiinnaw khumku khylan a ccungkuh paw tuh hiinnaw kha a shung cih, te hunghung zemah a hiinnaw kha a shung paw tuh a hiinnaw kha a khynsah cih.
Nanning kae hopya oh, tuh-e khuazi kya ikhung ccangkheit kya ccungccaw luning um`ae paw kha, lukheit law athua cih zah lukheitpaw kha cciataw athua cih.
Pynkheihlan sungmia`ae paw nopi luning kha, lukheit law athua cih zah lukheit cciataw athua cih.
Lei kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw luning kha, lukheit law thua cih zah lukheit kha cciataw athua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Teilangmou law athua cih`ae Bawipaw?” cite a khia`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Michihrua a umnaw kya, langtaw`ae mah pynkheihlan a sueluakuh bua cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae tuh lungthang leite zungzae sawsang lan accan cite minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae.
A hopaw tuh: “Khuapi khuakheit kya Pachia rawrih khyh zah ccungccaw mah pawlangria leipaw byapiatu lukheit a um.
Te tuh-e khuapi kya numaenung lukheit a la um. Te aning nynh tuh-e paw kalan cceih zah, ‘Kamaw yn rawsetupaw kha ccae yn liapah,’ a cipya.
“Te aning nynh khaw cia cyipya leite a um; thuasalama ou tuhkoute byapiatu nynh amaw te amaw kya, ‘Pachia raw mah ka rih khyh zah ccungccaw mah pawlang ka ria khyh zemah,
hynh-e numaenung nynh vawsaw yn pya keiccu tuh a hanlan ccae ka liapah cih, tukhyh lanze banban pei yn cceih cih zah phe yn bangsah cih,’ a ciku,” a ci.
Te Bawipaw nynh, “Atazae leipaw byapiatu nynh a hopaw kha thae oh.
Te khaw cia a ngaesang zemah, Pachia nynh amaw kalan khuazi khuadae a sia`ae paw, amaw nynh a po`ae paw kha ccaeliapya leite um ngaw ta?
Nanning kae hopya oh, minmin kha arang mawte ccaeliapah cih`ae. Thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw he yn thua vae ze aning nynh laephi vawlan zynnaw hynh muih ung vema?” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh mimaw te mimaw kha a ding`ae paw lang riakuh`ae zah mingccang`ae a dothatheih`ae paw kalan khe e tousenaw phungpaw hynh a ho:
“Ccungccaw luning nynh sawsang lan tempal kalan a cceihthung`ae; lukheit tuh Farasipaw thua zah lukheit tuh ngunto khoitu nynh thua.

Farasipaw nynh thadyn zah a makhaete hynhte sawsangku, ‘Pou Pachia, kae tuh ccungccaw uccaw a luade`ae paw, atazae lei`ae paw, milae zu a seikhae`ae paw, te hynh-e ngunto khoitupaw hawte mah ka thua khyh keiccu, na kalan lungtuabya kae ho.
Lonaw nawkheit ze vaening looh-ae ka sung, ka hoi paw abalyn kya-e pumhaw pumkheit ka pya,’ a ci.
“Te ngunto khoitu tuh asawnaw langkhe thadynte, a mit mah vaawran lang dothung ngan leite, thuasalama a by kha tukuh zah, ‘Pou Pachia, miseipaw kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah!’ a ci.

“Nanning kae hopya oh, tuh-e paw tuh Farasipaw laeze thyaaccoute a inn lang a ki; pawccecize amaw te amaw a hangthungkuh paw miakaw tuh sawbung athua cih; te amaw te amaw kha zakawsangsakuhpaw tuh hangthung athua cih,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh a hae ccaw`ae cite nosi`ae kha mah amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae; thuasalama zuitu`ae nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh minmin kha a pe`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha ko`ae zah, “Imua taraw`ae kha ka kalan oun cceih`ae sah, kang nan oh; pawccecize Pachia peenaw tuh khatahaw`ae paw elan nynh thua.
Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah Pachia peenaw kha imua taraw hawte a lawku khyh ze, tuh-e peenaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh,” a ci.
Te uktu lukheit nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatu hoypaw, zungzae hiinnaw rho ka ccou nawlan pawmou ka cyi cih?” cite a khia.
Te Jesu nynh, “Pawccemou kamaw hynh ahoypaw cite nae ko? Pachia lukheit laelan ahoypaw hung sanmah um khyh.
‘Milae zu seikhae nan,’ ‘Ccungccaw theih nan,’ ‘Ruh nan,’ ‘Ahme leipaw ccaekia lang tang nan,’ ‘Na paaw te na nung kha sawtua,’ acikuh paw kawpyapaw`ae kha na nyh khaw!” a cipya.
Te aning nynh, “Tuh-e`ae balyn tuh ka dih lya mawte phe ka zui kou vae,” a ci.

Te Jesu nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh kha-e paw kha, “Ccangkheit na bou ung, na hoi paw balyn kha zua lah ryachi`ae kha la nee`ae, te vaawran kya sisua na hoi cih, oute rang lah kamaw yn zui,” a cipya.
Te aning nynh hynh-e bya kha he a thae tuh myarya a ngaethah, pawccecize aning tuh myarya a hoirungpaw nynh thua.
Te kha-e paw myarya a ngaethyapaw kha Jesu nynh he a muih tuh, “A hoirung`ae paw nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee lanpaw tuh pawcihmou aru!
Pawccecize mihoipaw nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang a tee lanpaw lae tuh kalauk nynh phynbang khu kya tee lan a zoihua,” a ci.
Te tuh-e a thae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh, “Tuhte lanze hungmou khumnaw a mue kho cih?” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccaw hanlan athua kho leipaw kha Pachia hanlan tuh athua kho,” a ci.
Oute Piter nynh, “Dotua, kaening tuh pawpaw balyn marya kae cciataw zah namaw kha kae zui,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw keiccuze inn thuasah, nungpaaw`ae thuasah, uteno`ae thuasah, zu thuasah, te ccaaw`ae thuasah a cciataw paw tuh,
atu ccyh kya aleih patae mue leite um lan khyh, te yn thua lanpaw she kya zungzae hiinnaw mue leite um lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh zuitu luhaw laening kha ccanglang cciakhae`ae zah, “Dotua oh, aening tuh Jerusalem lang nynh ah ccia oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw te asekuh lante profeh`ae nynh a zei`ae paw balyn tuh marya accing cih.
Pawccecize aning tuh Zenta`ae kalan pya athua cih, sarya athua cih, te dothatheih athua cih zah tuin te thoi athua cih.
Te a tua a sah cih`ae zah a theih cih`ae, te nin thungnaw kya bua a thothui cih,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh hynh-e`ae hynh ccangkheit san thaethya khyh`ae, te hynh-e bya hopaw tuh minmin kyate thuru athua, minmin nynh a hopaw uccaw`ae kong kha nyh khyh`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Jesu tuh Jeriko te anaekunaw lang he a thua tuh, mitmohpaw lukheit tuh ngiakute laanpi pe a dahung.
Te ccungccaw zapi a ccia`ae paw kha he a thae tuh, “Tuh-e tuh pawmou?” cite a khia.
Te minmin nynh Nazareth paw Jesu nynh yn cceih cite a hopya`ae.
Te aning nynh, “David Ccapaw, Jesu kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah!” cite a sia.
Te malang a cceih`ae paw nynh zya a dae ccaw cite kha-e paw kha a sianua`ae, thuasalama aning nynh, “David Ccapaw, kae hynh ngaethya yn umsah!” cite houh a sia.
Te Jesu tuh thadyn zah kha-e paw kha oun cciakhae oh cite kawpya`ae, te a pe lang he a naekuh te Jesu nynh,
“Na hanlan pawmou cyisah nae ry?” cite a khia. Te aning nynh, “Bawipaw, ngawmuih nynh ka ry,” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ngawmuih ccavae, na zynnaw nynh phe ae dansah vae,” a cipya.
Te vaekheihmawte ngawmuih zah Pachia kha phu-esah biate amaw kha a zui; te ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh Pachia kha thehoysah`ae.
Te Jesu tuh Jeriko khua lang tee zah po a cceih.
Te dotua, ngunto khoitu`ae lakuze lupi athua paw, Zakia acikuh paw um zah aning tuh a hoirung.
Te aning nynh Jesu tuh hungmou thua cite muih a ry; te ccungccaw alung keiccuze muih kho khyh, pawccemacize aning tuh ane.
Te malang ccue khaw zah Jesu muih khylan thaeku ku kalan a kae; pawccecize Jesu tuh tuhlang po ccia lan acih vae.
Te tuh-e hmin kya Jesu he a thua tuh dothung zah kha-e paw kha a muih. Te amaw kha, “Zakia, rangsakuh lah yn rungbung, atunin na inn kya ka thua cih,” a cipya.
Te Zakia nynh arangte rungbung zah lungtuate amaw kha a thuasah.
Te ccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e kha he a muih`ae tuh, “Miseipaw lukheit a mikhiapaw lang thua lan nynh phe a ccia vae,” cite mih balynte a ccohkuh`ae.

Te Zakia nynh thadyn zah Bawipaw kha, “Bawipaw, dotua, ka uccaw`ae akhankuh kha ryachi`ae ka pya`ae, te lukhakheit kya-e uccaw ccangkhakheit kha ahme lei lante phe ka lawpyaku ze, leih pali ka pyaru,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “E paw mah Abraham ccapaw athua thyhhawte, atunin hynh-e inn kya khumnaw tuh a thua vae.
Pawccecize Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh azopaw ccung khylan te khum khylan nynh yn thua,” a cipya.

Te hynh-e bya`ae a thae`ae lyakhe, Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a naeku vae keiccu te minmin nynh Pachia peenaw tuh vaekheihmawte yn thua vae cih cite a tua`ae keiccuze Jesu nynh tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit biachih zah a hopya`ae.
Tukeiccu a hopaw tuh: “Bawi lukheit tuh amaw hanlan peenaw kha lawku lan zah bua ki lan cite asawnaw ram langkhe a cceih.
A ccia maw, a see`ae luhaw kha ko`ae zah mina phua kiahaw pya`ae zah, ‘Bua kae thua cia kung la kunah oh,’ a cipya`ae.
“Thuasalama a ramccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e paw kha a hua`ae, te a nuhlang te ccungccaw saw`ae zah, ‘E paw nynh kaening oun uk lanpaw kae ry khyh,’ cite a hosapya`ae.
“Ou tuhcihte, tuh-e bawi tuh peenaw kha yn lawkuh zah he yn ki tuh phua a pyasya`ae paw see`ae nynh hozeihmou mue`ae cipaw ny khylan minmin kha amaw kalan a kosah`ae.
“Oute masaty e paw yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, na mina phua kha mina ccanghaw amia,’ cite a hopya.
“Te aning nynh kha-e paw kha, ‘Ahoy, nang see hoypaw, nang tuh myarya adihpaw uccaw kya zyn lan na um keiccuze khuapi khuahaw tungvaw kawhoinaw la hoi,’ a cipya.
“Te luningnaw e paw yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, na mina phua kha mina pangaw amia,’ cite a hopya.
“Te aning nynh tuhhawte, ‘Nang mah khuapi khuapangaw tungvaw kawhoinaw la hoy,’ a cipya.
“Te ccangpaw lukheitpaw yn thua zah, ‘Bawipaw, pavua kya ka tung zah kae ccypya paw hynh-e na mina phua hynh do.
Pawccecize, nang tuh na ccyku leipaw kha na lawkuh zah na ccouku leipaw kha na ruekuh paw, eih cih kaesypaw ccungccaw na thua keiccu na raw kae rih,’ cite a hopya.
“Te aning nynh, ‘Na khalang kya-e thyhte bya kae pia cih, nang see hoy leipaw, kae tuh ka ccyku leipaw kha ka lawkuh zah ka ccouku leipaw ka ruekuh paw, eih cih kaesypaw cipaw mang na nyh paw nynh,
pawccemou ka phua tuh bank kya na nung khyh? He kae thua vae ze ka phua tuh phuato ryte ka mue cih paw,’ a cipya.
“Te aning nynh a pe thadyn`ae paw kha, ‘A kya-e mina phua kha laah oh lah ccanghaw a hoitupaw kha pya oh,’ a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh, ‘Bawipaw, aning tuh mina ccanghaw a hoi khaw tou,’ a ci`ae.
Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, ‘A hoi paw ccungccaw miakaw kha pyachih athua cih zah a hoi leipaw ccungccaw kyate a hoi thypaw kha heize lawpya athua cih.
Thuasalama kae nynh ka uk lanpaw a ry lei`ae paw ka rhaw`ae kha hynhlang oun cciakhae oh lah ka malang mawhin theih oh,’ a cipya`ae,” a ci.
Te tuhte he a ho koute Jesu tuh malang cceih zah Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
Ou tuhcihte Oliv acikuh paw mua leihpaw, Bethfake te Bethani khua pe he a thua tuh a zuitu`ae luning kha saw`ae zah,

“Nae malang a um paw khua langkhe la cceih oh, tuin kya na teenaw oh kyakhe, hung ccungccaw nynh san a cciku boi leipaw lann taraw a khikuh paw kha na la muih cih oh, kha-e kha oun supah oh lah hynhlang oun cciakhae oh.
Te lukhakheit nynh, ‘Pawccemou na supya oh?’ cite ae khia oh ze, ‘Bawipaw nynh a peki keiccu,’ cite nae hopah cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te a saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh mih kya a hopya`ae hawkhate a muih`ae.
Te lann taraw kha he a supah`ae tuh, a hoitu`ae nynh, “Pawccemou lann taraw kha na supya oh?” a ci`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Bawipaw nynh a peki,” a ci`ae.
Te minmin nynh lann taraw kha Jesu kalan a cciakhae`ae, te minmin nynh lann taraw tungvaw mih uccaw`ae kha de`ae zah Jesu kha a tungvaw a ccisaku`ae.
Te he a cceih tuh ccungccaw zapi nynh mih uccaw`ae kha laanpi kya a phaepya`ae.
Te Oliv Mua kyate rungbungnaw pe kya he a thua tuh zuitu`ae zapi khaleih nynh a muih`ae paw athungpaw ryalaw`ae balyn hanlan mih lungtua zah Pachia kha roi accae lante thehoysah`ae zah,
“BAWIPAW min te yn thua paw Siapharan tuh hythuaccou sah! Vaawran kya daenaw um sah lah ahang huaccenaw kya phu-enaw um sah!” cite a sia`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi laku-e Farasi`ae abang nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, na zuitu`ae hynh pe`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Nanning kae hopya oh, hynh-e`ae nynh daetedae lang a um`ae zemah lung`ae nynh vaekheihmawte a sia cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te Jerusalem pe Jesu he a thua tuh khualae kha do zah kha-e elan a rah:
“Nang na kya-e daenaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae hynh namaw ccyh kya atunin, nang ccaccei nynh na ny lanze ahoy cih paw! Thuasalama atu khae` ae tuh na mit kyate thuru athua.
Pawccecize na rhaw`ae nynh na pepan kya rhawhu ae sahkhaw cih`ae zah ki pali kyate nang kha varyn ae koih cih`ae.

Namaw te na lungkhu e na ccaaw`ae kha laephi te phe ngingkuh lang ae nung cih oh. Te minmin nynh na kya lung ccangkheit vawlan ccangkheit akhanthykuh lante ae cciatawpah lan khyh`ae. Tuhe nin ccyh na tungvaw yn thua cih. Pawccemacize Pachia nynh nang ae paebuanaw ccyh kha na ny khyh keiccu,” a ci.
Te tempal voidu lungkhu lang cceih zah tuin kya a zua`ae paw te a re`ae paw kha dee`ae zah,
minmin kha, “ ‘Ka inn tuh sawsangnaw inn nynh thua,’ cite azeikuh; thuasalama nanning nynh miruh`ae karung lang phe na rae oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh nin takyhte tempal kya a ccangpya`ae. Thuasalama alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te ccungccaw`ae kyaze lupi`ae nynh amaw kha chia lan a ccung`ae.
Tuhzemah ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw bya kha myarya a ngae ry`ae keiccuze, minmin nynh cyi khonaw muihkuh khyh`ae.
Ou tuhcihte nin kheit tuh Jesu nynh tempal kya ccungccaw`ae kha ccangpah`ae zah thehoypaw a ho lyakhe, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae tuh piccang`ae ryte oun thua`ae zah,
amaw kha, “Paw kawhoinaw te mou e uccaw`ae hynh na cyi? Tukhyhze hung nynh mou hynh-e kawhoinaw hynh nang ae pya? Kaening oun hopya tua,” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae mah bya ccangkheit kae khia cih oh zah nae hopah cih oh.
Johan kya-e baptisma kha vaawran kyate tou, tukhyhze ccungccaw`ae kyate tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh mimaw te mimaw hokuh`ae zah, “Aening nynh, ‘Vaawran kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, aning nynh, ‘Pawccemou te amaw kha na zyn khyh oh?’ he oun ci cih.
Thuasalama, ‘Ccungccaw`ae kyate,’ ah ci oh ze, ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh lung te oun deih cih`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh Johan tuh profeh nynh thua cite a zyn`ae,” a ciku`ae.
Oute minmin nynh, “Paw kyate cipaw kae nyh khyh,” cite a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Kae mah paw kawhoinaw te nynh e uccaw`ae hynh ka cyi cipaw kae hopah lan khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh ccungccaw`ae kha hynh-e tousenaw phungpaw hynh a hopya`ae: “Ccungccaw lukheit nynh misu khokhu kha rae zah misu ryalahtu`ae kha a hohsaku`ae, te asawnaw ram lang khaw ro lang khua a ccung.

Te athae lo ccyh kya misu ryalahtu`ae nynh khokhu e misu thae abang kha oun pya ccaw`ae cite mih kalan ryalahtu lukheit a saw; thuasalama misu ryalahtu`ae nynh kha-e paw kha bua`ae zah kuih ccakaete a kisah`ae.
Te ccangpaw ryalahtu kha bua a saw, te minmin nynh kha-e paw kha mah vaemaw phe mue lan bua`ae zah maethya kou um lang tua`ae zah kuih ccakaete bua a kisah`ae.
Te luthungnaw bua a saw ki, te minmin nynh kha-e paw kha mah vaemaw phe mue lan bua`ae zah dae a vua`ae.
“Te khokhu hoitupaw nynh, ‘Pawtepei ka cyih cih? Ka sungsahpaw ka ccapaw nynh ka saw vae cih, minmin nynh amaw kha he oun muih vae`ae ze a saw poh tua kho`ae,’ a ci.
“Thuasalama misu ryalahtu`ae nynh amaw kha he a muih`ae tuh, ‘E paw tuh rhoccoutu nynh thua; rang oh, amaw kha theih oh sih lah a rho uccaw tuh ah kya-e lang a tang ccaw,’ cite mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh amaw kha khokhu kyate atolang dae vua`ae zah phe a chia`ae. Tukeiccu khokhu hoitupaw nynh minmin kha pawtemou a cyih cih`ae?

Khokhu hoitupaw tuh yn thua cih zah tuh-e misu ccoutu`ae kha phe theih cih`ae zah misu khokhu kha mingccang`ae kalan nynh a pya vae cih,” a ci. Te ccungccaw`ae nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh, “Tuhte tuh thua nan sah!” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha do`ae zah, “ ‘Lung-inn saktu`ae nynh a nue`ae paw lung tuh aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang oun tang,’ cite azeikuh paw kha pawmou a hory?
“Hunghung zemah kha-e lung vawlan a ccah paw tuh phe akinkuh cih; thuasalama hunghung zemah kha-e lung nynh a ccawthin paw tuh palae tui lang a mia cih,” a ci.

Tuh ccyh lya alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh kha-e tousenaw phungpaw kha kaening nynh oun honua cipaw a nyku`ae keiccuze amaw kha kyng lan a ccung`ae; tuhzemah minmin nynh ccungccaw`ae raw a rih`ae.

Te minmin nynh Jesu kha dokhaw`ae zah a hopaw a bya kha kyngpya khylan, te ram uktu thungnaw te kawhoinaw kalan ah khylan cite adingpaw ccungccaw`ae lang a tang`ae paw dophitu`ae kha amaw kalan a saw`ae.
Te dophitu`ae nynh Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, nang tuh hmerarihlan na ho zah na ccangpya cipaw kae ny, ccungccaw laesanaw na hoi khyh, Pachia kya-e ccianaw kha hmerarihlan na ccangpya cipaw kae ny.
Kaening nynh Sizar kalan ngunto pya lan accan tou? Ccan khyh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh mih thyaruhnaw kha phe nyh zah minmin kha, “Pawccemou nae syntawtua oh?
Denari kiakheit kha yn dosatua oh. Kha-e kya hung muinsan te hung kya-e ccawzeipyapaw mou a um?” a ci. Minmin nynh, “Sizar kya-e,” cite a khung`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Sizar uccaw`ae kha Sizar kalan pya oh lah Pachia uccaw`ae kha Pachia kalan pya oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh a bya kha ccungccaw`ae malang kyngpah kho khyh`ae, te a khung`ae paw bya kha mih ngaeangthua zah daetedae lang zya um`ae.
Oute thothuinaw um khyh cite a ei`ae paw Sadusi`ae nynh Jesu kalan oun thua`ae zah amaw kha,
“Ccangpatupaw, ‘Zu a hoi vae paw ccungccaw nynh ccaaw hoi leite phe a chi lanze, kha-e a upaw ciihan azo khyh nawlan a zu kha a neitapaw nynh a umkhae cih,’ cite Mawsi nynh kaening kha oun zeipya.
Atu uteno lusari acih`ae paw a um`ae. Atawccapaw nynh zuhoi zah ccaaw saah leite phe a chih.
Te luningnaw nynh kha-e nung kha a zu lang umkhae zah ccaaw leite phe bua a chih.
Te luthungnaw nynh kha-e nung kha bua a umkhae, te tuhhawte lusarinaw nynh mah a umkhae, te minmin tuh ccaaw saah leite phe chih kou`ae.
Tuh-e`ae balyn koute tuh-e nopinung mah phe a chih.
Tukeiccu thothuinaw kya tuh-e nung tuh minmin lakuze hung zu lang mou a tang cih? Pawccecize lusari mawte kha-e nung kha zu lang phe a umkhae`ae,” cite a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Atu she e ccaaw`ae tuh zuvaw tang`ae zah zuvaw tangnaw a rae`ae.
Thuasalama nyalang e she kha thuasah, te a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw kha thuasah ccou lan angaekuh cite tua athua`ae paw nynh tuh zuvaw tang vae khyh`ae zah zuvaw tangnaw mah rae vae khyh`ae.
Minmin tuh kharyh chih kho vae khyh`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae te nynh aloku vae`ae, thothuinaw ccaaw`ae athua vae`ae thyhte Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh athua vae`ae.
Te a chih`ae paw a thothui`ae cipaw tuh Mawsi nynh Bawipaw kha, ‘Abraham Pachia, Isaak Pachia te Jakob Pachia,’ cite thabu kya a ko lyakhe phe a langsaku vae.
Pawccecize Pachia tuh a chih`ae paw Pachia thua khyh, thuasalama a hiin`ae paw Pachia nynh thua, pawccecize ccungccaw balyn tuh amaw kya nynh a hiin`ae,” a ci.
Oute kawbya ccangpatu`ae abang nynh tho`ae zah, “Ccangpatupaw, na ho paw kou ahoy,” a ci`ae.
Tuhkoute tuh minmin nynh byakhia ngan vae khyh`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pawtemou kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh Kri tuh David Ccapaw nynh thua a ci`ae?
Te Sam Ccauh kya David amaw ccaccei nynh, ‘BAWIPAW nynh ka Bawipaw kha, “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia, nang tuh ka ranglang khe dahung,” a cipya,’ a ci.
Tukeiccu David nynh Kri kha ‘Bawipaw’ cite a ko lanze, pawtemou aning tuh a Ccapaw athua cih?” cite a khia`ae.
Oute ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh a thaenaw`ae khe, Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha,

“Kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha raeringkuh oh. Minmin tuh uccaw ccuabalaepaw kikute innlaepae ry`ae zah kungkunaw kya sawtuate byabeihku a ry`ae, te sinakok`ae kya ahoy huaccepaw tungkhung`ae kya dahung ry`ae zah poi kya ahoy huaccepaw akhaan kya um a ry`ae.
Minmin tuh numae`ae inn kha luade`ae zah cyisakuthya nawlan asaepi sawsang`ae; minmin tuh ale huapaw detahnaw kha a mue cih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh ngawdo zah mihoi`ae nynh sisua bung lungkhu lang mih lungsing`ae a sang`ae paw kha a muih.
Te a ryachipaw numaenung lukheit mah tuh-e kya daw phuapia pianing a sang paw kha a muih.
Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e a ryachipaw numaenung nynh minmin balyn laeze alunghua a sang vae.
Pawccecize minmin balyn tuh mih hoirungpaw pataepi kya-e kha Pachia hanlan lungsing lang a sang`ae, thuasalama aning tuh a ryachi pite a vuekuaku nawlan a hoithypaw balyn kha marya a sang vae,” a ci.
Te ccungccaw abang nynh tempal tuh apuithyapaw lung`ae te a hlu`ae paw uccaw`ae ryte paccaan athua paw kong kha a ho`ae; te Jesu nynh,
“Hynh-e uccaw`ae atu na muih oh paw hynh lung ccangkheit vawlan ccangkheit san a khangthykuh paw um vae leite, marya tingsah bung ccyh yn thua cih,” a ci.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Ccangpatupaw, tuh-e uccaw`ae tuh hotuhmou yn cyikuh cih? Te tuh-e uccaw`ae yn thua nin ccyh yn nae vae ze paw muihsanaw mou yn langkuh cih?” cite a khia`ae.

Te Jesu nynh, “Nanning ling na thua khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh, pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh ka min te oun thua cih`ae zah, ‘Kae tuh Kri nynh ka thua,’ cite te, ‘Accyh anae vae,’ oun ci cih`ae; tukeiccu minmin nuhlang la zuikuh nan oh.

Te nanning nynh rhawtukkunaw kong te rhawtukkunaw lanpaw kong kha na thae vae oh ze la rih nan oh, pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh masaty yn thuaty cih, thuasalama athangnaw taloi thua la lan khyh,” a ci.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Minphuin phuinkheit te phuinkheit, ram ramkheit te ramkheit yn rawkuh cih`ae.
Te khyzawvawkaw kya myarya arupaw innruisuekunaw, ccakangnaw te khuarang ccinaw yn thua cih, te vaawran kyate ri lan um paw uccaw te alepaw muihsanaw yn langkuh cih.

“Thuasalama tuh-e`ae balyn acyikuh maw, kae ka min keiccuze ccungccaw`ae nynh ae kyng cih oh zah ae tua ae sah cih oh, sinakok kalan ae cciakhae cih oh zah thunginn lungkhu lang ae phang cih oh, siapharan`ae te uktu`ae malang ae thuakhae cih oh.
Te tuh-e tuh nae hanlan ccaekia lan a tang cih.
Tukeiccu pawtemou kae khung cih cipaw na tuakuty khyh nawlan oh nae thinlung kya la rya ccavae sah.
Pawccecize nanning ae rawsetu oh paw balyn nynh a ei kho lei`ae paw te a khee kho lei`ae paw hawnaw te ho khonaw kha kae nynh kae pya cih oh.
Te nanning kha nungpaaw`ae, uteno`ae te vaeccaw`ae te ruiban`ae nynh ae phee cih oh, te nanning abang kha minmin nynh ae chiasah cih oh.
Te kae ka min keiccuze ccungccaw balyn nynh nanning kha ae hua cih oh.
Thuasalama nae lu kya-e nae sang ccangkheit sanmah roh lan khyh.
Na ngaesangnaw oh liate nae hiinnaw-muisaw kha mue oh.
“Te Jerusalem khuapi kha rhawkaw`ae nynh a koih`ae paw he nae muih vae oh ze, kha-e ronaw tuh anae vae cipaw la nyh ccavae oh.
Oute Judah ram kya a um`ae paw nynh mua lang ccue`ae sah, te khuapi lungkhu a um`ae paw nynh pou`ae sah, te khua taraw kya um`ae paw nynh khuapi lungkhu lang tee nan`ae sah.
Pawccecize Ccathyaa kya azeikuh paw balyn accing nawlan tuh-e nin tuh ccaeliarunaw nin nynh athua.

Tuh-e nin ccyh kya ccaawpoi paw te mateizu paw imua a hoi paw nopi`ae tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang! Pawccecize Judah ram kya alepipaw vawsawrunaw yn thua cih zah hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tungvaw bungpawnaw yn thua cih.
Te minmin tuh ahepaw thaloi te khulia athua cih`ae zah minphuin balyn kalan see lang tang lan cciakhae athua cih`ae; te Jerusalem tuh Zenta`ae ccyh azaw mawlaezung Zenta`ae nynh a syde cih`ae.
“Te khuanin kya, sawpaw kya te awsi`ae kya muihsanaw yn langkuh cih, te laephi vawlan minphuin`ae kya vawsawrunaw te muihsanaw oun um cih, rili te tuileih`ae oun tho cih.
Laephi vawlan oun cyikuh lanpaw uccaw`ae kha ngaehoi paw te ccungccaw`ae thinlung tuh rinaw keiccuze thawzung oun thang cih; pawccecize vaawran kya-e thungnaw`ae tuh oun hy cih.
Oute minmin nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh alepaw phu-enaw te thungnaw ryte maeking kya yn rung paw kha oun muih cih`ae.
Te hynh-e uccaw`ae he yn cyiku takaw vae ze nae lu`ae kha hangthung oh lah dothung oh, pawccecize nanning sawkhawnaw tuh anae vae,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha tousenaw phungpaw ccangkheit a hopya`ae: “Thaeku ku te thingku`ae balyn kha dotua oh.
Anaw he yn toih paw kha na muih vae oh ze hawning ccyh tuh anae vae cipaw na ny oh.
Ou tuh-e hawte, hynh-e uccaw`ae yn cyikupaw he nae muih vae oh ze, Pachia peenaw tuh anae vae cipaw kha la nyh ccavae oh.
“Byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn acyiku kou makhia atu-e ccungccaw`ae zo lan khyh`ae.
Vaawran te laephi tuh azo cih, thuasalama ka bya`ae tuh zo lan khyh.

“Te naemaw te naemaw kha la raeringkuh oh, tukhyh lanze ccyhkhakheit kya, eih rui lan niapaw te, ruinaw te, hynh-e hiinnaw elan thinphangnaw te nae thinlung tuh a vawsaw cih, te tua lei pite tuh-e Nin tuh nae tungvaw yn thua cih.
Pawccecize laephi vawlan khaleih kya a um paw ccungccaw balyn tungvaw khe kaang hawte tuh-e Nin tuh yn thua cih.

Tukeiccu nanning tuh yn thua vae cih paw hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kyate lue lan angaekuh`ae paw na thua nawlan oh, te Ccungccaw Ccapaw malang thadyn lan angaekuh`ae paw na thua nawlan oh zungzae sawsang oh lah la ngaw oh,” a ci.
Oute khuadae ccyh kya Jesu nynh tempal kyakhe a ccangpya`ae, te khuazi ccyh kya pou zah Oliv acikuh paw mua kyakhe a rya.
Te awkhua takawte ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw bya kha ngae khylan amaw kalan tempal voidu lungkhu lang oun thua`ae.
Te Kawtaw Poi a ci`ae paw, Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi tuh anae vae.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae raw a ri`ae keiccuze Jesu kha pawtemou chia lan cipaw a ccung`ae.
Te Setan nynh locceihtu luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athuabua paw Judas Iskaria lungkhu langkhe a tee.
Te kha-e paw nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te tempal ngawtu`ae kalan cceih zah Jesu kha pawtemou kae phee cih cipaw minmin kha bya hokhae`ae.
Te minmin tuh mih lungtua zah phua kae pya cih cite byakinpyaku`ae.
Te aning nynh mah byakinkuh zah ccungccaw zapi a um khyh`ae lyakhe Jesu kha minmin kalan ah khylan ccyhhoypaw kha a ccungku vae.
Oute Kawtaw Poi elan tuutaw chia lan accan nin Ransi py leipaw Sanlou Poi nin ccyh tuh a thua vae.
Te Jesu nynh Piter te Johan kha, “Aening ah ae ccaw oh, la cceih oh lah Kawtaw Poi kha ah hanlan la paccyn oh,” cite hopah`ae zah a saw`ae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Pawkyamou nae paccynsah ry?” cite a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Dotua oh, khua lungkhu lang he na tee oh te tui re yn phu paw ccungccaw lukheit nynh ae la tungkuh cih oh, aning nynh a teenaw inn lungkhu lang amaw kha la zui oh.
Te nanning nynh inn hoitu kha, ‘Ccangpatu nynh ka zuitu`ae ryte Kawtaw Poi kae aenaw lanpaw mikhia khaan tuh teisangmou a um? ae ci,’ cite la hopah oh.
Te aning nynh phe paccynty paw akopaw palung khaan kha ae la muihsah cih oh, tuin kyakhe la paccyn oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh mih kya a hopya`ae hawte a muih`ae, te minmin nynh Kawtaw Poi dangkunaw kha a paccyn`ae.
Te accyh he azawte Jesu tuh locceihtu luhaw laening ryte ccaboi kya a dahung`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka teing maw hynh-e Kawtaw Poi hynh nanning ryte aekheih lan myarya ka peki.
Pawccecize, nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw kya Kawtaw Poi accing makhia e poi hynh ka ae boi vae lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Te banang kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho koute, “E banang hynh lawkuh oh lah naemaw kha neekuh oh.
Pawccecize nanning kae hopya oh, Pachia peenaw yn thua makhia cia, misutui kya-e niapaw hynh ka neih vae lan khyh,” a ci.
Te sanlou kha laah zah lungtuabya a ho, te eih zah minmin kha pya`ae zah, “E tuh nanning hanlan pya paw ka pyn nynh thua, kamaw liathui nawlan e hynh mang oh,” a ci.
Tuhhawte zerya a ae`ae koute, banang kha mah lah zah, “E banang tuh nanning hanlan luasah paw ka chiise kya-e byakin thawpaw nynh thua.
Thuasalama, dotua oh, kamaw yn ahtupaw kuih tuh ccaboi vawlan kamaw ryte a pukheih.
Te laerui-awde athua vae thyhhawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh a cceih ccaccing cih; thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw a pheetupaw tuh paw ngaethya lan um babang!” a ci.
Te zuitu`ae nynh hynh-e uccaw tuh hung nynh mou yn cyih vae cih cipaw mimaw te mimaw laku oun khiakuh vae`ae.
Te zuitu`ae laku hungmou alehua lang tua athua cih cite mimaw kya eikunaw mah a um.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Zenta siapharan`ae nynh uknaw kaw te a uk`ae, te mih tungvaw kawhoinaw a langsakutu`ae paw kha hoynaw oun raepatu cite a ko`ae.
Thuasalama nanning tuh tuhte na cyih lan khyh oh; thuasalama nanning laku ale huapaw ccungccaw tuh ano huapaw hawte thua sah; te cciakhaetu athua paw nynh ryalawpatu hawte thua sah.
Pawccecize aepaw a koih paw ccungccaw tou alehua? Tukhyhze a thohae paw tou alehua? Aepaw a koih paw alehua khazaw? Thuasalama kae tuh nanning laku a thohae paw hawte nynh ka thua.
Nanning tuh tuh-ounaw ka tungnaw kya kamaw ryte po na umbua oh paw nynh na thua oh.
Te ka Paaw nynh peenaw ccangkheit yn pya hawte, kae nynh nanning kha peenaw kae pya oh.
Ka peenaw kya, ka ccaboi kya nanning nynh na ae bua, na nia bua nawlan oh, te Israel phin haw laening kha byapiate suitungkhung vawlan na dahungbua nawlan oh kaw kae pya oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Bawipaw nynh, “Simon, Simon, dotua, chanvui kha pasaryh te ryh hawte nanning kha ryh lan Setan nynh ae peki oh.
Thuasalama na zynnaw aro khyh nawlan na hanlan saw kae sangpah; te ka kalan nae paleihku vae ze na uno`ae kha varyn la tynsah`ae,” a cipya.
Te Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, namaw ryte tuh thunginn lungkhu lang thuasah, chinaw kalan thuasah ccia lan paccynkute ka um,” a cipya.
Te Bawipaw nynh, “Piter, nang kae hopya, nang nynh kamaw hynh ka nyh khyh cite vaethung nae vua maw, atunin awkhungpaw yn khua la lan khyh,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha, “Phuabu, sohrae, ccukoh phuku leite nanning kae saw lya oh kha, ccangkhakheit na ho na bou oh paw um tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Pawsang um khyh,” a ci`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Thuasalama atu tuh phuabu a hoi paw nynh kha-e kha ccyngkuh sah lah sohrae a hoi paw mah tuhhawte ccyngkuh sah, te thaloi a hoi leipaw nynh a uccaw kha zua sah lah thaloi kha rekuh sah.

Pawccecize, nanning kae hopya oh, ‘Aning tuh kawbya zui leitu`ae ryte riakheih athua,’ cite azeikuh paw tuh kamaw tungvaw yn ccing cih, pawccecize ka konglang te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae tuh accing cih,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, dotua, e kya thaloi zung ning a um,” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Azaw vae,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu tuh yn pou zah leih a cyi hawte, Oliv Mua lang a cceih, te a zuitu`ae nynh mah amaw kha a zui`ae.
Te ahmin kya he a thua tuh, minmin kha, “Nanning tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang na tee khyh nawlan oh sawsang oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin kyate lung oi khing loukaw asawnaw langkhe phiatawkuh`ae zah ccukharutung zah sawsang paw tuh:
“Apang, na rynaw athua ze, hynh-e banang hynh ka kyate oun lawpah; tuhzemah kamaw rynaw thua leite, namaw rynaw kha cyikuh sah,” a ci.
Te vaawran langte vaaw ccungccapaw nynh amaw kalan yn langkuh zah amaw kha thawzung a pya.
Te myarya a lungriathae pawte aning tuh thawmawte houh sawsang; te a vaesaw tuh laephi kalan accah paw chii hawte nynh thua.
Te sawsangnaw kyate thokuh zah a zuitu`ae kalan he a thua tuh mih ngaethyanaw keiccuze minmin a i`ae paw kha a muih.
Te minmin kha, “Pawccemou nanning na i oh? Tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang na tee khyh nawlan oh, tho oh lah sawsang oh,” a cipya`ae.

Te tuhte a ho cciamang lyatuin dotua, ccungccaw zapi oun thua`ae, te luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athua paw, Judas acihkuh paw nynh minmin kha oun cciakhae`ae zah Jesu kha myng lan amaw kalan yn naeku.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh, “Judas, Ccungccaw Ccapaw hynh nang nynh myngte tou na phee?” cite a khia.
Te Jesu ryte um`ae paw nynh yn cyikuh lanpaw kha he a muih`ae tuh, Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, kaening nynh thaloi te kae bae cih`ae tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te lukheitpaw nynh ranpibawi paw a seepaw kha thoh bae zah a ranglang nakua thoh apae.
Te Jesu nynh tho zah, “Azaw vae,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh kha-e paw a nakua kha hae zah a dansah.
Oute Jesu nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae paw alepaw ranpibawi`ae, tempal ngawtu`ae, te piccang`ae kha, “Miruhpaw kyng lan a ci`ae hawte thaloi ry tungbang ryte tou nae ccianua oh?
Tempal kya nanning ryte nin takyh ka um he lyaze kamaw kha kyng lan na zuakuh khyh oh; thuasalama atu tuh nanning ccyh te mohnaw kya-e kawhoinaw ccyh nynh athua,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha kyng`ae zah ranpibawi lupi paw inn langkhe a cciakhae`ae. Te Piter nynh asawpi te a zui.
Te minmin nynh inn maepaw angaelung kyakhe maee tua`ae zah pynkheihlan he a dahung`ae tuh Piter mah minmin laku a dahungbua.
Te Piter nynh maee pe a dahung paw kha ryalawpatu liaccanung nynh he a muih tuh ahoy mawte do zah, “E paw mah Jesu ryte a mungkuh`ae paw nynh thua,” a ci.
Te Piter nynh, “Nopinung, amaw kha ka nyh khyh,” cite Jesu kha a vua.
Te khuekheih aro koute mingccangpaw nynh Piter kha muih zah, “Nang mah minmin kya a umbua paw nynh na thua,” a cipya. Te Piter nynh, “Ccungccapaw, ka thua khyh!” a ci.
Te suimilan ccangkheit loukaw aro koute mingccangpaw lukheit nynh, “Thanccingte e paw mah Jesu ryte a mungkuh`ae paw nynh thua, pawccecize aning tuh Galileepaw nynh thua,” cite zynkute a ho.
Te Piter nynh, “Ccungccapaw, paw nynh na ho cipaw ka nyh khyh,” a ci. Te tuhte a ho cciamang lya, vaekheihmawte awkhungpaw a khua.
Te Bawipaw nynh maeleihkuh zah Piter kha a do. Te, ‘Awkhungpaw a khua mawze, nang nynh vaethung nae vua cih,’ cite Bawipaw nynh a hopya paw bya kha Piter nynh a liathui vae.
Te Piter tuh atolang pou zah thawmawte a rah.
Te Jesu a kyng`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha sarya`ae zah a bua`ae.
Te minmin nynh a mae kha phang bong`ae zah a mae kya a bia`ae, te, “Nang ae bia paw hynh hungmou? Hotua!” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha sarisarya lante ccangpaw uccaw kong patae a honua`ae.
Te khua he adae tuh, ccungccaw piccang`ae, alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh sueluakuh`ae zah Jesu kha kungsi zung lungkhu lang cciakhae`ae zah,
“Nang tuh Kri na thua lanze oun hopah,” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning kha kae hopya oh ze, na zyn lan khyh oh.
Te kae nynh mah kae khia oh ze, nae khung lan khyh oh zah saw mah nae saw lan khyh oh.
Thuasalama atu koute Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh Pachia kya-e thungnaw ranglang kya nynh a dahung vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin balyn nynh, “Tuhte lanze nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw tou?” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh, “Ka thua cipaw na ho oh latu,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Paw ccaekia mou ahopaw a um ung? Pawccecize amaw a khalang kya-e aening ccaccei nynh phe ah thae vae oh,” a ci`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi khaleih nynh thokuh`ae zah Jesu kha Pilat kalan a cciakhae`ae.

Te minmin nynh tho`ae zah, “E paw nynh ah minphuin phe a cciakhaesei paw kha kae muih, te Sizar kalan ngunto pya lan a khee, amaw te amaw hynh Kri, Siapharan nynh ka thua a ciku,” cite amaw kha seibe`ae.
Te Pilat nynh, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite Jesu kha a khia. Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Na ho hawte nynh thua,” a ci.
Oute Pilat nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te ccungccaw`ae kha, “E Ccungccapaw nynh a cyiseimenaw ka muih khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin tuh mih thin houh khykuh zah, “Aning nynh Galilee kyate tho zah hynh-e hmin kyacia, Judah ram balyn po ccangpah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha lungtho lan a hy`ae,” a ci`ae.
Pilat nynh Galilee cipaw he a thae tuh tuh-e paw tuh Galileepaw thua ta thua khyh ta cipaw a khia.
