Herod kawhoinaw zakaw kya a um paw nynh thua cipaw ccahe a nyh tuh, Jesu kha Herod kalan a saw; tuh-e ccyh lya Herod mah Jerusalem kya nynh a um.

Te Herod nynh Jesu kha he a muih tuh myaryamaw a lungtua, pawccecize Jesu konglang kha patae thae vae zah langmawpi te Jesu kha muih lan a ry vae paw nynh thua; te Jesu nynh a rae paw muihsanaw ccangkhakheit kha muih lan a ngaehoi.
Oute Herod nynh Jesu kha bya patae a khia; thuasalama Jesu nynh kaw kheit san khung khyh.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh thadyn`ae zah Jesu kha thawmawte seibe`ae.
Te Herod te a rhawkaw`ae nynh Jesu kha pawlangria leite a sarya`ae, te lyccaccupaw uccaw kha lawsakuh`ae zah Pilat kalan bua a saw`ae.
Te tuh-e nin ccaccei kya Pilat te Herod tuh hoyccaw lang a tang`ae; pawccecize langmaw tuh lukheit te lukheit a la rhawkuh`ae paw nynh thua.
Te Pilat nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae, uktu`ae te ccungccaw`ae kha pynkheihlan ko`ae zah,

“Nanning nynh e Ccungccapaw hynh ccungccaw`ae a cciakhaeseipaw hawte ka kalan nae cciakhae oh; te dotua oh, nae malang khe akaw-aleih bya ka khia zah nanning nynh sei na be oh paw konglang te hynh-e Ccungccapaw kya seimenaw ka muih khyh.
Herod nynh mah muih khyh, pawccecize Herod kalan nanning kae sawsah vae oh; te dotua oh, chi lan accanpaw Jesu nynh a cyi paw kharyh um khyh.
Tukeiccu amaw hynh de ka tah cih zah ka luesah cih,” a cipya`ae.
Pawccecize tuh-e Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw`ae kalan lukhakheit kha a sawpya aho.
Te minmin balyn nynh, “E Ccungccapaw tuh theih lah kaening kalan Barabbas kha oun sawpah,” cite vaekheihmawte a sia`ae.
Tuh-e Barabbas tuh khualae kya rhawkunaw a rae keiccu, te ccungccaw a chia keiccuze thung a ccah paw nynh thua.
Te Pilat nynh Jesu kha a luesah ry keiccuze minmin kha bua a hopya`ae.
Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Amaw kha khiade, khiade!” cite a sia`ae.
Te Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou? Paw hoyleinaw mou a rae? Chinaw aphah paw seimenaw amaw kya ka muih khyh, tukeiccu amaw hynh de kae tah sah lah kae luesah,” cite vaethungnaw bua a ci.
Thuasalama minmin nynh Jesu tuh khiade thuasah cite roi accae lante thawmawte a ngia`ae. Te minmin roi te alepaw ranpibawi`ae roi nynh phe a tae.
Te Pilat nynh minmin nynh a ngia`ae hawte thuasah cite bya a pae.
Te khualae rhawkunaw a pousah keiccu te ccungccaw chianaw keiccuze thung a ccah paw, minmin nynh a ngiaku`ae paw kha Pilat nynh a sawpya`ae; thuasalama Jesu kha mih rynaw kalan a ah.
Te minmin nynh Jesu kha he cciakhae`ae tuh, khua taraw langte yn cceih paw, Sairin ram e paw Simon acikuh paw kha kyng`ae zah a tungvaw khe vaelantung kha khang`ae zah Jesu nuhlang te a puihsah`ae.
Te ccungccaw aphupi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae; te amaw elan a rah a khui`ae paw nopi`ae mah a um`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kalan maeleihkuh zah, “Jerusalem ccanung`ae, kae ka hanlan rah nan oh, thuasalama naemaw hanlan te nae ccaaw`ae hanlan palia rah oh.
Pawccecize, dotua oh, ‘Atinpaw, ccaawsaah boi leipaw vue`ae te imua nynh a zu boi leipaw matei`ae tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,’ cite oun ho cih`ae paw nin`ae tuh yn thua cih.
Oute minmin nynh, mua`ae kha, ‘Kaening hynh oun tingthin oh,’ oun cipah cih`ae zah mua taraw`ae kha, ‘Kaening hynh oun nethin oh,’ oun cipah cih`ae.
Pawccecize, ahinpaw thingku kya hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh minmin nynh a cyi`ae lanze aroupaw thingku kya pawmou acyikuh cih?” a ci.
Te ccungccahoy lei`ae luning kha mah Jesu ryte chia khylan a cciakhae bua`ae.
Te Kalvari acikuh paw ahmin kya he a thua`ae tuh, tuin kya Jesu ryte tuh-e ccungccahoy lei`ae kha, a ranglang lukheit, a voilang lukheit a khiade`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh, “Apang, minmin hynh ngaethya`ae, pawccecize paw nynh kae cyi cipaw nyh khyh`ae,” a ci. Te minmin nynh ccungthy dung`ae zah a uccaw kha a neeku`ae.

Te ccungccaw`ae tuh phang dote a thadyn`ae. Te minmin ryte uktu`ae nynh mah nuinse`ae zah, “Aning nynh ming`ae kha a khum`ae; aning tuh Pachia nynh popaw Kri athua lanze amaw te amaw kha khumkuh sah,” a ci`ae.
Te rhawkaw`ae nynh mah amaw kha a sarya`ae, amaw kalan oun cceih`ae zah misutui ariapaw kha pya`ae zah,
“Nang tuh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua ze, namaw te namaw kha khumkuh tua,” a ci`ae.
Te, “E PAW TUH JEW‘AE SIAPHARAN NYNH THUA,” cite Greek, Latin, Hebru ccaw te ccawzeipyapaw kha mah a luki khe a tawpya`ae.
Te ccungccahoy lei`ae luning lakuze lukheitpaw nynh, “Nang tuh Kri na thua ze namaw te namaw kha khumkuh lah kaening hynh mah yn khum,” cite Jesu kha sarisarya a ci.
Thuasalama lukheitpaw nynh kha-e paw kha khung zah, “Nang tuh e paw te phe alokuhpaw detahnaw kya mang na um pite Pachia raw na rih khyh tou?
Aening tuh ah cyisahnaw thyhte angaekuh lante amee ah mue paw thua zah accanpaw nynh thua; thuasalama e Ccungccapaw tuh pawsang mah a cyisei paw um khyh,” cite a pe.
Te aning nynh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, na peenaw lungkhu lang he na thua vae ze kae hynh oun ning nan vae ii,” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing kae hopya, atunin nang tuh kamaw ryte Paradis kya na umbua vae cih,” a cipya.
Te tuh-e ccyh tuh ninthu suimilan haw laening loukaw thua zah zete suimilan ccangthung cia laephipi balyn tuh pung amoh.
Te khuanin phe amoh; te tempal kya zokhawpaw boei tuh zung ning lang aseikuh.
Te Jesu nynh thawte a sia koute, “Apang, ka muisaw hynh na kuih kya kae ah,” a ci. Tuhte he a ho koute a hy athang.
Acyikuh paw kha rhawbawipaw nynh he a muih tuh, “Thanccingte, e paw tuh adingpaw Ccungccaw nynh thua!” cite Pachia kha phu-esah.
Te tuh-e kya a thua paw ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh, khe kya acyikuh paw balyn kha do`ae zah mih by kha tukuh`ae zah a ki`ae.
Te amaw ryte a nyhkuh`ae paw balynte Galilee kyate amaw oun zui`ae paw nopi`ae tuh asawpi langkhe thadyn`ae zah acyikuh paw kha a do`ae.
Te dotua oh, Josef acikuh paw, kungsi memba lukheit um zah aning tuh ahoypaw te adingpaw ccungccaw nynh thua.
Aning tuh kungsi memba`ae khuakhannaw te cyisahnaw kya a nawccahbua khyh; Jew`ae khuapi, Arimathia khua paw thua zah amaw mah Pachia peenaw a ngaehoi paw nynh thua.
E paw nynh Pilat kalan cceih zah Jesu rhua kha a ngiaku.
Te Jesu rhua kha sahbung zah boeirawpaw te a lung, te lung kya a karyn`ae paw, hung ccungccaw sanmah a ccynaw boi lei`ae paw, shawkhu kyakhe a ccy.
Te tuh-e nin tuh Paccynku nin thua zah Sabbath nin thuanaw anae vae.
Te Galilee kyate amaw ryte oun cceihkheih`ae paw nopi`ae mah zuikuh bua`ae zah a rhua kha pawcihte nynh a ccy`ae cipaw shaw kyakhe phe a dobua`ae.
Te minmin tuh ki`ae zah amynthuapaw zimuin te mynkhuhpaw satho kha a paccyn`ae. Te kawpyapaw thyhte Sabbath nin kya tuh a hae-ung`ae.
Te lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw khe, tuh-e nopi`ae tuh ccangpaw nopi`ae ryte, a paccyn`ae paw amynthuapaw kha ccyng`ae zah shaw kalan khe a cceih`ae.
Te minmin nynh shaw kyate lung a nuekuh paw kha a muih`ae.
Te minmin nynh a lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Bawipaw Jesu rhua kha muih vae khyh`ae.
Ou tuhte minmin tuh tuh-e konglang myarya mih ngaeangthua lyakhe, dotua oh, phaephae ahpaw uccaw a lawkuh`ae paw ccungccaw luning tuh mih pe khe a thadyn`ae.
Te nopi`ae tuh rih`ae zah laephi kalan mih mae phang a tebing`ae lyakhe, tuh-e`ae nynh, “Pawccemou a chih`ae paw laku khe a hiinpaw kha nanning nynh na ccung oh?
Aning tuh e kya um vae khyh, phe a tho vae! Galilee pe kya a um lyaze nanning ae hopya oh paw,
‘Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh misei`ae kuih kalan pya athua cih zah khiade athua cih, te nin thungnaw kya bua a tho cih,’ a cipaw kha liathuitua oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te nopi`ae nynh a bya kha a liathui vae`ae.
Te shaw kyate ki`ae zah hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kha luhaw laekheit kalan te tuhlaepaw zuitu`ae balyn kalan a hopya`ae.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong locceihtu`ae kalan a hopah`ae paw tuh: Meri Magdalin, Joanna, James a nung Meri, te minmin ryte a um`ae paw ccangpaw nopi`ae nynh thua`ae.
Te mih bya`ae kha phungpaw huataw olante tua`ae zah locceihtu`ae nynh zyn khyh`ae.
Thuasalama Piter tuh thokuh zah shaw kalan khe a ccue; te baling zah arawpaw uccaw amaw te a um paw kha a muih, te acyikuh paw kha a ngaeangthua zah a inn lang phe a ki.
Te dotua, zuitu`ae luning tuh tuh-e nin kya Jerusalem kyate me sari loukaw asawpaw Emmaus acikuh paw khua langkhe a cceih`ae.
Te minmin tuh acyikuh paw uccaw`ae balyn kong kha lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
Te ou tuhte minmin nynh pynkheihlan byaruakute byahoku`ae lyakhe, Jesu tuh yn naekuh zah minmin ryte a cceihbua.
Thuasalama mih mit tuh phang khaw thua zah amaw kha nyh khyh`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Na cceih lalia lang oh te lukheit te lukheit na hoku oh paw nae bya tuh pawtecihpaw mou? Pawccemou nae ngae a thya?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin kyaze Klopas acikuh paw nynh khung zah, “Nang hynh Jerusalem kya mikhia tou hung na thua, te atu loukaw tuin kya acyikuh paw uccaw`ae kha na nyh khyh tou?” a ci.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Paw uccaw`ae mou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Nazareth paw Jesu kong. Aning tuh Pachia malang te ccungccaw balyn malang cyisahnaw kya te bya kya athungpaw Profeh nynh thua.
Te amaw kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kaening oun uktu`ae nynh a chi ccaw cite seibe khylan ah`ae zah phe khiade`ae.
Thuasalama aning tuh Israel`ae kha oun sawkhaw vae cih paw nynh thua cite kaening nynh kae la ngaehoi; te hynh-e balyn laeze hynh-e uccaw`ae acyikunaw te atunin hynh nin thungnaw nynh thua.
Te kaening kae phu kya-e, awkhua takawte shaw kalan a thua`ae paw, nopi`ae abang nynh kae ngaeang oun thuasah`ae.
Minmin nynh a rhua kha he muih vae khyh`ae tuh oun ki`ae zah Jesu tuh phe a hiin vae cite a hopah`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae kya-e vizin kha mah kae muih cite oun hopya`ae.
Te kaening ry a um`ae paw abang nynh shaw kalan khe cceih`ae zah nopi`ae nynh a ho`ae hawkhate a muih`ae; thuasalama Jesu tuh muih khyh`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pou mingaee`ae, profeh`ae nynh a hosya`ae paw balyn zyn lan thinlung khysung`ae paw!
Kri tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh teing lan te a phu-enaw lungkhu lang tee lan ccan khyh tou?” a cipya`ae.
Te Mawsi kyate tho zah Profeh`ae balyn nynh azei`ae paw, amaw kong te asekuhpaw Ccathyaa balyn kha minmin kalan ccaeteccae lang a hopya`ae.
Te minmin a ccianaw lang`ae khua kya vyavya a thua`ae tuh, Jesu tuh po suhlue lan acih paw hawte a umsaku.
Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Kae kya umbua hin, pawccecize khuanin vyavya nae vae, khua yn zi vae cih,” cite thawmawte a kang`ae. Te aning tuh minmin ryte um lan a teebua.
Te ou tuhcihte minmin ry ccaboi kha ccahe a koih`ae tuh Jesu nynh sanlou kha laah zah hythua a pya, te eih zah minmin kha a pya`ae.
Te mih mit tuh oun aw vae zah amaw kha a ny vae`ae; te aning tuh mih muihnaw kyate phe azo.
Te minmin nynh, “Laanpi kya aening bya oun hopya lya te Ccathyaa oun ccaesapya lya kha aening ah thinlung kya u mawte oun u khazaw?” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
Te tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya minmin tuh thokuh`ae zah Jerusalem lang a ki`ae; te luhaw laekheit te minmin ryte pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae paw, ming`ae kha a muih`ae.
Tuh-e`ae nynh, “Bawipaw tuh phe a thothui ccaccing vae, te Simon kalan phe a langkuh vae!” a ci`ae.
Te minmin nynh laanpi kya acyikuh paw uccaw`ae kong te sanlou a ia lya minmin nynh amaw a ny`ae paw kong kha a ho`ae.
Te tuhte minmin nynh a ho`ae lyakhe Jesu amaw ccaccei tuh minmin ngaelaku khe thadyn zah minmin kha, “Daenaw nae kya um sah,” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama minmin nynh khozithurae hynh sang phe kae muih vae cite tua`ae zah ohsikuh`ae zah a rih`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pawccemou nae lungvawsaw? Pawccemou nae thinlung kya lunghiinnaw a um?
Ka kuih te ka ccu hynh dotua oh! Kamaw sou ka thua, oun haetua oh lah oun dotua oh; pawccecize muisaw nynh tuh, kae nynh ka hoi paw na muih oh hawte, ngesaw te ru`ae hoi khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Te tuhte he a ho koute, a kuih te a ccu kha a dosah`ae.
Te minmin tuh mih ngaeangthua zah mih lungtua keiccu a zyn kho la khyh lya`ae khe, Jesu nynh, “E kya ae lanpaw ccangkhakheit na hoi oh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh aruakuhpaw ngasaw pae kheit te khoilutui kha a pya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh kha-e kha lawkuh zah mih malang khe a ae.

Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Mawsi Kawbya kya thuasah, Profeh`ae ccauh kya thuasah, Sam kya thuasah kamaw te asekuh lante azeikuh paw miakaw tuh marya accing hahe cih cite nanning ryte ka um lyaze nanning kae hopya oh paw bya`ae tuh hynh-e`ae hynh nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin nynh Ccathyaa kha a thaethya ccaw`ae cite mih thinlung-tuanaw kha a hungpya`ae.
Te minmin kha, “Hynhte azeikuh, te hynhte Kri tuh a teing ho zah nin thungnaw kya a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui aho.
Te ngaesikunaw te seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw tuh Jerusalem kyate tho ngaw zah minphuin`ae balyn kalan amaw min liate ho athua cih.
Te nanning tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae kong ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh.
Dotua oh, ka Paaw kya-e Byakinpyakupaw kha nae tungvaw ka saw; thuasalama vaawran kyate thungnaw kha pya na thua oh makhia Jerusalem khuapi kyakhe la umhin oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kha Bethani khua phe thua lang cia a cciakhae`ae, te a kuih kha hangthung zah minmin kha hythuapya`ae.
Ou tuhte, minmin kha hythuapya`ae lyakhe aning tuh minmin kyate phia thua zah vaawran langkhe lawthung athua vae.
Te minmin nynh amaw kha beiksya`ae zah lungtuanaw alepi te Jerusalem lang a ki`ae.
Te Pachia kha thehoysah te, phu-esah te tempal kya pei a um`ae. Amen.
Athotakaw lya Bya a um, te Bya tuh Pachia ryte a um`ae, te Bya tuh Pachia nynh thua.
Tuh-e Bya tuh athotakaw lya Pachia ryte a um`ae.
Tynre balyn tuh amaw liate nynh rae athua, te rae paw hynh amaw leite ccangkheit san a raekuh paw um khyh.
Amaw kya tuh hiinnaw a um, te hiinnaw tuh ccungccaw`ae awnaw nynh thua.
Te awnaw tuh mohnaw kya a aw, thuasalama mohnaw nynh kha-e kha nyhthya khyh.
A min Johan cikuh paw, Pachia kyate saw paw ccungccaw lukheit a um.
Tuh-e paw tuh ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw liate a zyn nawlan`ae, Awnaw kong ccaekiakhan khylan, ccaekia lang nynh yn thua.
Aning tuh tuh-e Awnaw thua khyh, thuasalama tuh-e Awnaw kong ccaekiakhan khylan saw paw nynh thua.
Tuh-e Awnaw tuh ahmepaw Awnaw nynh thua, tuh-e nynh laephipi kalan thuate ccungccaw miakaw kha a awsah.
Aning tuh laephipi kya um zah laephipi tuh amaw liate rae athua, tuhzemah laephipi nynh amaw kha nyh khyh.
Aning tuh amaw ccungccaw`ae kalan yn thua, thuasalama amaw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha lehkhan khyh`ae.
Thuasalama amaw kha lehkhan`ae paw miakaw, amaw min a zyn`ae paw ccaccei kha Pachia ccaaw`ae lang thuanaw kaw aning nynh a pya`ae.
Minmin tuh chiisaw te saah paw thua khyh`ae, pynsaw rynaw te saah paw thua khyh`ae, ccungccapaw rynaw te saah paw mah thua khyh`ae, thuasalama Pachia rynaw thyhte saah paw nynh thua`ae.
Te Bya tuh pynsaw lang yn tang, Paaw nynh lukheit kyalya a saah paw a phu-enaw kha kaening nynh kae muih. Aning tuh thawccinaw te byaccing te phe beih.

Johan nynh tuh-e paw kong kha ccaekiakhan zah, “E paw tuh, ‘Kamaw koute yn thua cih paw ccungccapaw tuh kamaw laeze a lesaehua, pawccecize aning tuh kamaw laeze a umty,’ cite a kong ka hopaw kha nynh thua,” cite thawte a sia.
Te amaw ccingnaw kyate thawccinaw tungvaw thawccinaw kha aening balyn nynh ah mue oh.
Pawccecize Kawbya tuh Mawsi liate pya athua, thuasalama thawccinaw te byaccing tuh Jesu Kri liate nynh oun thua.
Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ccyhkhakheit kya san Pachia kha muih boi khyh, Paaw by vawlan a um paw, lukheit kyalya saah paw Ccapaw rou nynh amaw kha yn langsapya.
Te hynh-e tuh Jew`ae nynh, “Nang hungmou?” cite Johan kha khia khylan, ranpibawi`ae te Levi`ae kha Jerusalem kyate a saw lya`ae ze Johan kya-e ccaekia nynh thua.
Te aning nynh vuankhan zah eikuh khyh, thuasalama, “Kae tuh Kri ka thua khyh,” cite a khung`ae.

Te minmin nynh amaw kha, “Tuhte lanze nang tuh hungmou? Elijah na thua tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te aning nynh, “Ka thua khyh,” a ci. “Nang tuh tuh-e Profeh tou?” cite bua a khia`ae. Te aning nynh, “Ka thua khyh,” a ci.
Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh hungmou? Kaening oun saw`ae paw kalan kae la hopya ccaw`ae namaw te namaw kha hung na ciku mou?” cite a khia`ae.
Johan nynh, “ ‘BAWIPAW a ccianaw kha lawbabinlan raepah oh,’ cite profeh Isaiah nynh a ho vae hawte, kae tuh rangkaw kya a sia paw lukheitpaw roi nynh ka thua,” a ci.
Te a saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Farasi`ae nynh thua`ae.
Te minmin nynh Johan kha khia`ae zah, “Nang tuh tuh-e Kri na thua khyh, Elijah mah na thua khyh, tuh-e Profeh mah na thua khyh lanze, pawccemou nang nynh baptisma na insah`ae?” a cipya`ae.
Johan nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Kae nynh tui kya baptisma ka insah`ae, thuasalama nanning laku a thadyn paw, nanning nynh na ny lei oh paw Lukheit a um.
Aning tuh kamaw koute yn thua paw, kae laeze a lesae huapaw nynh thua, amaw ccukoh rui phoupya lan san kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh,” a ci.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh Jordan vaw khuraw lang, Johan nynh baptisma insahnaw Bethabara khua kya nynh acyiku.
Awkhualan Johan nynh Jesu a kalan yn ccia paw kha muih zah, “Dotua oh, laephipi seinaw cciakhaetupaw Pachia Tuutaw khu!
‘Kamaw koute yn thua cih paw Ccungccapaw tuh kae laeze a lesae huapaw nynh thua,’ cite a konglang ka hopaw kha-e paw lahyn athua, pawccecize aning tuh kae laeze a umty.
Te amaw kha ka la nyh khyh, thuasalama aning tuh Israel`ae kalan langsapyaku athua cih cite ka ny, tukeiccu kae tuh tui kya baptisma insahte kae thua,” a ci.
Te Johan nynh hynhte ccaekiakhan, “Vafu hawte vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw Muisaw kha ka muih, te kha-e nynh amaw tungvaw khe a hae-ung.

Te amaw kha ka la nyh khyh, thuasalama tui kya baptisma-insah lan kamaw yn sawtupaw nynh kae kha, ‘A tungvaw Muisaw rungbung zah a hae-ung paw na muih paw ccungccapaw, kha-e paw tuh Thyaa Muisaw kya baptisma insahtupaw nynh thua,’ cite yn hopya.
Te kae nynh ka muih zah e paw tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cite ccaekia ka khan,” a ci.
Bua awkhualan Johan te a zuitu`ae luning a thadyn`ae koute,
Johan nynh Jesu a ccia paw kha do zah, “Dotua oh, Pachia Tuutaw khu!” a ci.
Te zuitu`ae luning nynh a hopaw kha thae`ae zah Jesu kha a zui`ae.

Te Jesu nynh maeleikuh zah minmin nynh a zui`ae paw kha a muih, te minmin kha, “Pawmou na ccung oh?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Rabbi” (tuh-e tuh he leih lanze Ccangpatu cipaw nynh thua), “Teisangmou na um?” a ci`ae.

Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Rang oh lah oun dotua oh,” a cipya`ae. Minmin nynh cceih`ae zah a umnaw kha a muih`ae, te tuin nin amaw ryte a umkheih`ae, pawccecize khahlya kha suimilan ccanghawnaw loukaw acih vae.
Johan nynh a hopaw thae`ae zah Jesu zui`ae paw luning lakuze lukheit tuh Simon Piter neitapaw Andru nynh thua.
Aning nynh masaty amaw a upaw Simon kha muih zah amaw kha, “Messiah” (Kri cite asuilan leih athua paw) “kha kaening nynh phe kae muih vae,” a cipya.

Te Simon kha Jesu kalan a cciakhae. Te Jesu nynh amaw kha he a muih tuh, “Nang tuh Jonah ccapaw Simon nynh na thua, nang tuh Sefas” (Lungtung cite asuilan leih athua paw) “cite ko na thua cih,” a cipya.
Awkhualan Jesu tuh Galilee pee lungkhu lang ccia ry zah Filip kha a muih, te, “Kamaw yn zui,” a cipya.
Filip tuh Andru te Piter`ae mih khua, Bethsaida paw nynh thua.
Filip nynh Nathania kha muih zah, “Mawsi nynh Kawbya kya zei zah profeh`ae nynh a konglang a zei`ae paw Josef ccapaw, Nazareth paw Jesu kha kaening nynh phe kae muih vae,” cite a hopya.
Te Nathania nynh, “Nazareth lungkhu te ahoypaw uccaw ccangkhakheit pou kho ngaw tou?” cite a khung. Filip nynh, “Rang lah yn dotua,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh amaw kalan Nathania yn ccia paw kha muih zah, “Dotua oh, a kya thyaruhnaw a um leipaw Israelpaw ccaccing khu!” cite a konglang a ho.
Nathania nynh amaw kha, “Pawtemou nang nynh kae hynh nae ny?” a ci. Jesu nynh khung zah, “Filip nynh nang ae ko maw, thaeku ku kaw na um lyakha phe kae muih vae,” a cipya.
Nathania nynh, “Rabbi, nang tuh Pachia Ccapaw, nang tuh Israel Siapharan nynh na thua!” cite a khung.
Jesu nynh khung zah, “ ‘Thaeku ku kaw phe kae muih vae,’ cite kae hopya keiccu tou nae zyn? Hynh-e uccaw`ae laeze ale huapaw nae muih ung cih,” a cipya.

Te Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kae hopya, atu koute vaawran ahungkuhpaw kha nae muih cih zah Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Ccungccaw Ccapaw tungvaw a rungbung`ae paw te a kaethung`ae paw kha nae muih cih,” a cipya.
Te nin thungnaw kya Galilee pee Kana khua kya zudy poi a um; te Jesu a nung tuin kya a umbua.
Te Jesu te a zuitu`ae mah paryhte zudy poi kalan a kobua`ae.
Te misutui he thang tuh, Jesu a nung nynh amaw kha, “Minmin misutui hoi vae khyh`ae,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “Nopinung, nang te kae nynh e kya pawmou ah sekuh bua? Ka ccyh thua loh khyh,” a cipya.
A nung nynh thohae`ae kha, “Aning nynh nanning kalan ae hopya oh paw miakaw kha cyih vae oh lou,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te tuin kya Jew`ae ccikankunawpaw phung thyhte, zungkheit ze galan kawkuin, sungthung accung paw, tui nungnawpaw lungre retaruh a nung`ae.
Jesu nynh thohae`ae kha, “Lungre`ae kha tui bia oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh kha-e`ae kha arae phe thua lan tui a bia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Atu sua oh lah thohae piccangpaw kalan cciakhae oh,” a cipya`ae. Te minmin nynh a cciakhae`ae.

Thohae piccangpaw nynh misutui lang rae athua paw tui kha he a niatua tuh, kha-e kha paw kyate yn thua cipaw nyh khyh, (thuasalama tui sua`ae paw thohae`ae nynh tuh phe ny`ae), thohae piccangpaw nynh zudy ccangvaepaw kha ko zah,

amaw kha, “Ccungccaw miakaw nynh atakaw lya tuh athuapaw misutui kha a nee`ae, te ccungccaw`ae phe a byn`ae koute tuh athua leipaw kha nynh a ruin he`ae, thuasalama nang tuh athuapaw misutui kha atu cia phe na nung,” a cipya.
Hynh-e muihsanaw`ae athotakawnaw hynh Jesu nynh Galilee pee Kana khua kyakhe rae zah a phu-enaw kha a langsapya`ae, te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae.
Hynh-e koute Jesu tuh a nung ry, a neitapaw`ae te a zuitu`ae ryte Kapernaum khua lang a cceihbung`ae, te tuin kya nin patae um khyh`ae.
Te Jew`ae Kawtaw Poi tuh nae vae zah Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
Te tempal voidu kya vaetua tangnua`ae, tuu`ae te valaele`ae a zua`ae paw te phuaru`ae paw a dahung`ae paw kha a muih.
Te adihpaw liarue`ae khate bua`ae zah tuu`ae te tangnua`ae te minmin balyn kha tempal voidu kyate phe a dee`ae, te phuaru`ae paw phua kha phya phaepah`ae zah ccaboi`ae kha phe buleihpya`ae.
Te valaele zua`ae paw kha, “E uccaw`ae hynh e kyate cciakhae oh, ka Paaw inn hynh kungkunaw inn lang rae nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute a zuitu`ae nynh, “Na inn kya-e duanaw rynaw thinlung nynh kamaw kha phe yn ae,” cite azeikuh paw kha a liathui vae`ae.
Oute Jew`ae nynh tho`ae zah Jesu kha, “Nang nynh e uccaw`ae hynhte na cyi paw hynh kaening kalan paw muihsanaw mou nae langsapyaku ngaw?” cite a khia`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah minmin kha, “E tempal hynh roh oh lah nin thung lungkhu ka thosah cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Jew`ae nynh, “Hynh-e tempal saknaw kya sungpali kum taruh aro, te nang nynh e hynh nin thung kya phe nae sakthui cih tou?” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh tuh amaw pyn athua paw tempal kha nynh a ho.
Tukeiccu a chih`ae paw kyate Jesu he thothui te a zuitu`ae nynh e bya, Jesu nynh mih kalan a hopya`ae paw kha a liathui`ae, te minmin nynh Ccathyaa te Jesu nynh a hosyapaw bya kha a zyn`ae.
Atu Jerusalem khua Kawtaw Poi kya Jesu a um lya, poi nin kya, ccungccaw patae nynh Jesu nynh a rae paw muihsanaw kha muih`ae zah amaw min kha a zyn`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh amaw te amaw kha minmin kalan ahkuh khyh, pawccemacize ccungccaw balyn kha marya a ny.
Te ccungccaw lungkhu paw nynh a um cipaw kha phe a ny keiccuze, ccungccaw konglang hung nynh sanmah ccaekiakhan lan hosah khyh.
Jew`ae uktu, Nikodemas cikuh paw Farasipaw ccungccaw lukheit a um.

Tuh-e paw nynh khuazi khe Jesu kalan yn thua zah, “Rabbi, nang tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw ccangpatu nynh na thua cipaw ka ny, pawccecize Pachia nynh a umkhae khyh lanze hynh-e na rae paw muihsanaw`ae hynh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah rae kho lan khyh,” cite a hopya.
Jesu nynh khung zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kha kae hopya, ccungccaw lukheit nynh a puithui khyh lanze Pachia peenaw kha muih kho lan khyh,” a cipya.
Nikodemas nynh, “A kum phe tang vae paw ccungccaw nynh pawtemou bua a pui kho ung cih? A nung vuebua lungkhu lang vaeningnaw bua a tee kho ung cih tou? Te bua pui kho ung ngaw zaw?” cite a khung.
Jesu nynh khung zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kae hopya, ccungccaw lukheit nynh tui te Muisaw te a pui khyh lanze Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang tee kho lan khyh.
Pynsaw kyate pui paw tuh pynsaw thua zah Muisaw kyate pui paw tuh muisaw nynh thua.
‘Nanning na puithui hahe oh aho,’ cite kae hopya paw hynh na ngaeangthua nan sah.

Khisang nynh a rynaw lang azaw he, te nang nynh kha-e roi kha na thae, thuasalama paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw te teilang nynh a ccia cipaw na nyh kho khyh, Muisaw kyate a pui paw miakaw tuh tuh-e hawte nynh athua,” a cipya.
Nikodemas nynh khung zah, “Hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh pawtemou athua kho cih?” a ci.
Jesu nynh khung zah, “Nang tuh Israel`ae ccangpatu na thua pite hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh na nyh khyh tou?
Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nang kae hopya, kaening tuh kae ny paw kha kae ho zah kae muih paw kha ccaekia kae khan, thuasalama kae ccaekia kha nanning nynh na lehkhan khyh oh.
Laephi uccaw`ae kong hynh nanning kae hopah oh zah na zyn lei oh pite vaawran e uccaw`ae kong kae hopya oh ze pawtemou na zyn vae cih oh?
Te hung ccungccaw sanmah vaawran kalan a kaethung paw um khyh, thuasalama vaawran kya a um paw, vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw Ccungccaw Ccapaw rou nynh a kae.
Te Mawsi nynh fupaw kha rangkaw kya a saethung hawte Ccungccaw Ccapaw mah saethung athua cih.
Ou tuhte hunghung zemah amaw a zyn paw tuh aro vae khyh nawlan, thuasalama zungzae hiinnaw a hoi nawlan nynh thua.

“Pawccecize hunghung zemah Pachia Ccapaw a zyn paw tuh aro vae khyh ccaw, thuasalama zungzae hiinnaw a hoi ccaw cite Pachia nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kha myarya a sungsah pawte a hoithypaw a Ccapaw kha oun pya.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kha byapia khylan a Ccapaw kha laephipi kalan yn saw khyh, thuasalama amaw liate laephi ccungccaw`ae hynh khum athua`ae ccaw cite nynh yn saw.
Amaw a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh byapia thua vae khyh, thuasalama a zyn leipaw tuh byapia phe athua vae, pawccemacize Pachia nynh a hoithypaw Ccapaw min kha a zyn khyh keiccu nynh thua.
Te byapianaw tuh hynhte nynh thua; awnaw tuh laephipi kalan yn thua zah ccungccaw`ae nynh awnaw laeze mohnaw kha a ryhua`ae, pawccemacize mih ryalaw`ae tuh aseipaw athua keiccu.
Pawccecize ahoy leipaw a cyih paw miakaw nynh awnaw kha a hua, a cyisahnaw`ae kha yn langsakuh sei cih cite awnaw kalan mah yn thua khyh.
Thuasalama byaccing kha a cyih paw ccungccaw nynh tuh a cyisahnaw`ae tuh Pachia hanlan ryalawpaw nynh thua cite langsaku khylan awnaw kalan nynh yn thua,” a cipya.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae koute Jesu te a zuitu`ae tuh Judah ram lungkhu lang oun thua`ae zah tuin kya minmin ryte um`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha baptismainsah` ae.
Te Johan mah Salim khua te anaekunaw Enon kyakhe baptisma insah`ae. Pawccemacize tuin kya tuh tui alung; te ccungccaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah baptisma in`ae.
Pawccecize Johan tuh thunginn lungkhu lang saw thua loh khyh.
Oute Johan a zuitu`ae abang te Jew`ae laku ccikankunaw kong lante byaeikunaw yn pou.

Te Johan zuitu`ae nynh Johan kalan cceih`ae zah, “Rabbi, Jordan vaw khuraw lang namaw ryte na um oh zah namaw nynh a kong ccaekia na khan paw, dotua, kha-e paw nynh baptisma insah`ae, te ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Johan nynh khung`ae zah, “Vaawran kyate pya athua khyh lanze, ccungccaw lukheit nynh pawsang mah mue kho lan khyh.
‘Kae tuh Kri ka thua khyh,’ thuasalama, ‘Amaw malang saw paw nynh ka thua,’ cite ka hopaw kya, naemaw ccaccei hynh kamaw ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh.

Akaepaw liaccanung a hoitu tuh zudy ccangvaepaw nynh thua, thuasalama zudy ccangvaepaw pe thadyn zah zudy ccangvaepaw roi a thae paw a banpaw tuh amaw roi a thae keiccuze myarya a lungtua; tuhhawte e ka lungtuanaw tuh accing.
Aning tuh a kaethung cih, thuasalama kae tuh ka nyaabung cih.

“Vaawran langte yn thua paw tuh pawpaw balyn kyaze lupihua nynh thua; laephi kya-e ccungccaw tuh laephi ccungccaw thua zah laephi uccaw kong nynh a hothya. Vaawran kyate yn thua paw ccungccaw tuh pawpaw balyn kyaze lupihua nynh thua.
Te aning nynh a muih paw te a thae paw kha ccaekiakhan zah a ccaekiakhan paw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san lehkhan khyh`ae.
A ccaekia kha lehkhan vae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh Pachia tuh ahme cite kha-e kha tazeih phe a khia`ae.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh yn saw paw ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia kya-e bya`ae kha nynh a ho; pawccecize Pachia nynh kha-e paw kha tou kho um lei lan Muisaw kha a pya.
Paaw nynh Ccapaw kha sungsah zah pawpaw balyn kha a kuih lungkhu lang marya a ah vae.
Ccapaw kha a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw kha a hoi, te Ccapaw kha a zyn leipaw ccungccaw tuh hiinnaw kha muih lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia thinrianaw kha a tungvaw atyn,” a ci.
Tukeiccu Johan laeze ccungccaw alunghua kha Jesu nynh zuitu lang tangsah`ae zah baptisma insah`ae cipaw kha Farasi`ae nynh phe thae vae`ae cite Bawipaw nynh he a nyh tuh,
(Jesu amaw ccaccei nynh baptisma-insah khyh`ae, thuasalama a zuitu`ae nynh baptisma insah`ae),
Judah pee kha cciataw zah Galilee ram lungkhu lang Jesu tuh bua a pou.
Te Jesu tuh Samaria ram kha po a cciabia aho.
Oute Jakob nynh a ccapaw Josef a pya paw laekua pe, Samaria ram kya-e Sikha cikuh paw khua kyakhe a thua.
Tuin kya Jakob tuisung a um. Jesu tuh a khuaccungnaw kyate phe a bang keiccuze tuisung pe tuin a dahung. Accyh tuh suimilan ccangtaruhnaw loukaw athua vae.
Tuh-e kalan Samaria nopinung lukheit tui the lan yn thua zah Jesu nynh, “Nia lanpaw tui yn pyabua,” a cipya.
Pawccecize a zuitu`ae tuh aepaw re khylan khua lungkhu lang phe a la cceih`ae.

Oute Samaria nopinung nynh, “Pawtemou nang Jewpaw na thua paw nynh kae Samaria nopinung ka thua paw kya-e nia lanpaw nae ngiakupaw tuh?” a ci. Pawccecize Jew`ae tuh Samaria`ae ryte ccuepekunaw hoi khyh`ae.

Jesu nynh khung zah, “Nang nynh Pachia lasung hynh na la ny lanze thuasah, te, ‘Nia lanpaw tui yn pyabua,’ cite nang ae hopatupaw hynh na ny lanze thuasah, amaw kya-e hynh nang nynh phe na ngiakuh paleih cih zah aning nynh hiinnaw tui kha ae pya cih paw lahyn,” a cipya.
Nopinung nynh, “Bawihaepaw, tui thenaw lanpaw pawsang na hoi khyh, te tuisung tuh akhu; paw kyate mou nang nynh tuh-e hiinnaw tui kha na hoi?
Nang tuh hynh-e tuisung kaening oun pyatupaw, a ccaaw`ae te a saring`ae mah hynh-e kya-e a nia`ae hawte amaw mah a neihbua paw kaening minpaaw Jakob laeze na lesaehua tou?” a cipya.
Jesu nynh khung zah, “Hunghung zemah hynh-e tui a neih paw tuh tui bua a haw cih.

Thuasalama kae nynh ka pya cih paw tui a neih paw ccungccaw tuh a tuihaw boi vae lan khyh; thuasalama kae nynh ka pya cih paw tui tuh kha-e paw kya zungzae hiinnaw hanlan aphyhthung paw tuidy athua cih,” a cipya.
Nopinung nynh, “Bawihaepaw, ka tuihaw vae khyh ccaw, tui the lan hynhlang mah ka ccia vae khyh ccaw tuh-e tui tuh yn pyabua,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “La cceih, na vawpaw kha yn ko lah hynhlang yn thuakhae,” a cipya.
Nopinung nynh khung zah, “Vawpaw ka hoi khyh,” a ci. Jesu nynh, “ ‘Vawpaw ka hoi khyh,’ na cipaw tuh akyhpaw nynh na ho.
Pawccecize nang tuh vawpaw lu pangaw na hoi vae, te atu na hoi paw hynh na vawpaw thua khyh, hynh-e kya nang tuh hmerarihlan nynh na ho,” a cipya.
Nopinung nynh, “Bawihaepaw, nang tuh profeh lukheit nynh na thua cipaw ka tuasethya.
Kaening kae minpaaw`ae tuh hynh-e mua kya nynh a la beik`ae; te nanning Jew`ae nynh tuh ccungccaw nynh beik lan accannaw hmin tuh Jerusalem kya nynh thua na ci oh,” a ci.
Jesu nynh, “Nopinung, kamaw hynh yn zyn, nanning nynh hynh-e mua kya mah thua vae leite, Jerusalem kya mah thua vae leite Paaw kha nae beik vae cih oh paw accyh tuh yn thua cciamang.
Nanning nynh na ny lei oh paw kha na beik oh, kaening tuh kae ny paw kha kae beik, pawccecize khumnaw tuh Jew`ae kyate nynh yn thua.

Thuasalama ahmepaw a beiktu`ae paw nynh Paaw kha muisaw te thuasah, byaccing te thuasah oun beik cih`ae paw ccyh tuh yn thua cih. Tuh-e ccyh tuh atu yn thua cciamang. Pawccecize Paaw nynh khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kha amaw beiktu`ae lang a ccung.
Pachia tuh Muisaw nynh thua; te amaw a beik paw ccungccaw`ae nynh muisaw te thuasah, byaccing te thuasah a beik`ae aho hahe,” a ci.
Nopinung nynh, “Messiah (Kri cikuh paw) yn thua vae cih cipaw ka ny; he yn thua te kaening kha pawpaw balyn pung oun hopah vae cih,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “Na kalan bya a hopaw kae hynh Messiah nynh ka thua,” a cipya.

Tuh ccyh lya a zuitu`ae oun thua`ae zah nopinung ryte byahoku`ae paw kha mih ngaeangthua. Tuhzemah hung nynh sanmah, “Pawmou na peki?” Tukhyhze, “Pawccemou kha-e nung ryte bya na hoku oh?” cite khia khyh`ae.
Oute nopinung nynh a dawre kha phe cciataw zah khua lungkhu langkhe cceih zah ccungccaw`ae kha,
“Ka cyi boi paw balyn marya yn hopah paw Ccungccapaw hynh rang oh lah oun dotua oh, tuh-e paw tuh Kri thua lan khyh tou?” a cipya`ae.
Oute ccungccaw`ae nynh khua lungkhu te pou`ae zah amaw kalan oun thua`ae.
Tuh ccyh lyatuin zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Rabbi, ae hin,” cite a soihbia`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh na ny lei oh paw ae lanpaw looh ka hoi,” a cipya`ae.
Tukeiccu zuitu`ae nynh, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ae lanpaw phe a ccyngpya vae vosi?” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka looh tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw rynaw cyipya lanpaw te a ryalaw thangsah lanpaw hynh nynh thua.

‘Sawpaw sapali a um ung, tuhkoute loohrue ccyh yn thua vae cih,’ na ci khyh oh tou? Dotua oh, nanning kae hopya oh, dothung oh lah loo`ae khu dotua oh, pawccecize kha-e`ae tuh loohrue lan phe azaw vae.

Te loohruepaw ccungccaw tuh ryalaw mee kha mue zah zungzae hiinnaw a thuasah paw athae apaw kha a ccakhung; ou tuhte, ccaciivua paw ccungccaw te loohruepaw ccungccaw pynkheihlan paryh mih lungtua ccaw.
Ou tuhte, ‘Lukheitpaw nynh ccaciivua zah mingccangpaw nynh loohrue,’ cite a hokuh paw bya tuh e kyahin akyh.
Naemaw nynh rya na law leinaw oh kya looh na rue ccaw oh cite nanning kha kae saw oh; ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh ryalah`ae zah nanning tuh minmin mih ryalawnaw lungkhu lang na tee oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te, “Kae nynh ka cyi boi paw balyn pung yn hopya,” cite ccaekiakhan paw nopinung bya liate kha-e khua kya-e Samaria`ae patae nynh Jesu kha a zyn`ae.
Tukeiccu Samaria`ae nynh amaw kalan he thua`ae tuh mimaw ryte a umhin ccaw cite amaw kha a ngia`ae; te Jesu tuh tuin kya nin ning a um.
Te ccungccaw houh alunghua nynh amaw bya keiccuze a zyn`ae.

Nopinung kha, “Atu kaening kae zyn paw tuh nang nynh na hopaw keiccu thua vae khyh; pawccecize kaemaw ccaccei nynh a hopaw hynh phe kae thae vae zah e paw tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae Khumtu athua paw, Kri ccaccing nynh thua cipaw kae ny,” a cipya`ae.
Te nin ning acih koute Jesu tuh tuin kyate pou zah Galilee pee lang a cceih.
Pawccecize, profeh lukheit tuh amaw umnaw ram kya sawtuanaw mue khyh cite Jesu amaw ccaccei nynh ccaekiakhan vae.

Oute Jesu tuh Galilee lang he a thua tuh Galilee ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha lehkhan`ae, pawccecize minmin mah poi kalan cceihbua`ae zah Jerusalem khua poi kya Jesu nynh a cyi paw balyn kha phe a muih bua`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu tuh tui kha misutui lang a raenaw hmin Galilee pee Kana khua lang bua a thua. Te Kapernaum khua kya a ccapaw accihpaw bawi lukheit a um.

Tuh-e paw nynh Judah pee kyate Galilee pee lungkhu lang Jesu yn thua cipaw he a thae tuh, a kalan cceih zah a ccapaw kha dansah khylan cciabung lan thawte a ngia, pawccecize a ccapaw tuh a chih vae cih.
Oute Jesu nynh, “Muihsanaw`ae te ngaeangnaw`ae hynh nanning nynh na muih khyh oh lanze kharyh na zyn lan khyh oh,” a ci.
Tuh-e bawi nynh amaw kha, “Bawihaepaw, ka ccaaw a chi maw beih yn cceihbung,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “La cceih ccavae, na ccapaw mang a hiin,” a cipya. Te tuh-e paw nynh Jesu nynh a kalan a hopaw bya kha zyn zah phe a cceih.
Te aning tuh a cciabung cciamang lyakhe, a see`ae nynh oun cciadue`ae zah, “Na ccapaw mang a hiin,” cite a hopya`ae.
Oute aning nynh minmin kha a ccapaw ahoyhua ccyh kha a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Inkhawnin suimilan ccangsarinaw ccyh kya a ngelingpaw phe ahoy vae,” a cipya`ae.
Tukeiccu a paaw nynh, ou tuh-e ccyh ccaccei kya nynh, Jesu nynh amaw kha, “Na ccapaw mang a hiin,” a cipya ccyh athua cipaw a ny; te amaw ccaccei te a innbyn khaleih nynh a zyn`ae.
Hynh-e tuh Jesu nynh Judah pee kyate Galilee pee lungkhu lang he yn thua te bua a rae paw vaeningnaw muihsanaw nynh thua.
Hynh-e koute Jew`ae poi ccangkheit a um, te Jesu tuh Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
Jerusalem kya Tuu koikua pe Hebru bya te Bethesda acikuh paw kuaa ccangkheit a um, tuh-e kuaa kyatuin saeleih dawkuhpaw ccangpangaw a um.
Tuh-e saeleihdawkuhpaw`ae kya a mitmohpaw, ccukhoupaw, te a ngesawroupaw, te ccinaw hoi paw ccungccaw pataepi nynh tui yn theku lanpaw kha ngawte a huekuh`ae.

Pawccecize, vaaw ccungccapaw nynh ccyhkhakheit kya kuaa lungkhu langkhe rungbung zah tui kha a piasah; ou tuhte tui he a pia koute masaty a phungkuh paw ccungccaw tuh pawpaw tahawpaw ccinaw a hoi zemah phe a dan.
Te sungthung kum tarya cia a ccih paw ccungccapaw lukheit tuin kya a la um.
Kha-e paw phang a huekupaw kha Jesu nynh he muih zah khaw cia a um vae hynhsan cipaw he a nyh tuh, “Na dan ry tou?” cite a khia.

Ngeccih paw nynh, “Bawihaepaw, tui kha piasah he athua vae ze kuaa lungkhu lang kae yn phungbua lanpaw hung ccungccaw san ka hoi khyh, thuasalama he ka ccia lya mingccangpaw nynh ka malang phe a phungku,” cite a khung.
Jesu nynh, “Thokuh, na iphae kha lawkuh lah cceih ccavae,” a cipya.
Te vaekheihmawte tuh-e paw tuh dansah athua vae, te a iphae kha lawkuh zah a cceih vae. Tuh-e nin tuh Sabbath nin nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh dansah athua paw ccungccapaw kha, “Sabbath nin nynh thua, na iphae puihku lan ccan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama aning nynh, “Kamaw yn dansah paw ccungccapaw nynh, ‘Na iphae kha lawkuh lah cceih ccavae,’ yn cipya,” cite a khung`ae.
Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “ ‘Na iphae kha lawkuh lah cceih ccavae,’ ae cipah paw tuh hungmou?” cite a khia`ae.
Thuasalama dansah athua paw ccungccapaw nynh hung nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh; pawccecize tuin kya ccungccaw zapi a um`ae lyakhe Jesu tuh zya a pou vae.
Tuhkoute Jesu nynh kha-e paw kha tempal voidu kya muih zah amaw kha, “Dotua, nang tuh phe na dan vae; houh athah huapaw uccaw na tungvaw a thua khyh nawlan la sei nan vae,” a cipya.
Tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh pou zah amaw kha a dansah paw tuh Jesu nynh thua cite Jew`ae kha a hopya`ae.
Te kha-e uccaw`ae kha Sabbath nin kya phe a cyi keiccuze, Jew`ae nynh Jesu kha a tua-a sah`ae, te chia lan a nouku`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka Paaw tuh atu cia ryalah, te kae mah rya ka lah,” cite a khung`ae.

Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh amaw kha chia lan cite houh a nounuaku`ae, pawkeiccumacize, “Sabbath nin a ro kyalya thua leite Pachia kha mah a Paaw cikuh zah tuhte amaw te amaw kha Pachia ryte a nginsaku,” a ci`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing, nanning kae hopya oh, Ccapaw nynh amaw te amaw pawsang mah cyih kho khyh, thuasalama Paaw nynh a cyi paw a muih paw rou nynh a cyi kho; pawccecize Paaw nynh a cyi paw miakaw kha Ccapaw nynh mah khahawte a cyibua.

Pawccecize Paaw nynh Ccapaw kha sungsah zah amaw ccaccei nynh a cyipaw balyn kha Ccapaw marya a muihsah, te nanning nae ngaeangthua nawlan hynh-e`ae laeze ale huapaw ryalaw`ae kha Ccapaw kha a muihsah ung cih.
Pawccecize Paaw nynh a chih`ae paw kha thosah zah a hiinsah`ae hawte, ou tuhhawte Ccapaw nynh mah a ry paw ccungccaw`ae kha a hiinsah`ae.
Pawccecize Paaw nynh hung ccungccaw sanmah byapia khyh, thuasalama byapianaw miakaw kha Ccapaw kalan khaleih a ah.
Ou tuhcihte ccungccaw balyn nynh Paaw kha sawtua`ae hawte Ccapaw mah sawtua ccaw`ae cite. Ccapaw sawtua leipaw ccungccaw tuh Ccapaw a sawtupaw Paaw kha sawtua leipaw nynh thua.

“Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, ka bya thae zah kamaw yn sawtupaw a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi, te byapia thua vae lan khyh; thuasalama chinaw kyate hiinnaw kalan phe a khung vae.
Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, achihpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Pachia Ccapaw roi oun thae cih`ae zah roi a thae`ae paw nynh oun hiin cih`ae ccyh, tuh-e ccyh tuh atu hynh yn thua cciamang.
Pawccecize Paaw nynh amaw te amaw kya hiinnaw a hoi hawte, Ccapaw nynh amaw te amaw kya hiinnaw a hoi nawlan kaw a pya.
Te aning tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw thua keiccuze byapianaw tungvaw kawhoinaw kha mah amaw kha a pya.
“E uccaw kya nae ngaeangthua nan sah; pawccecize shaw`ae kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh amaw roi kha oun thae cih`ae zah,
oun pou cih`ae paw accyh tuh yn thua cih; ahoypaw a cyih`ae paw tuh hiinnaw thothuinaw kalan, te ahoy leipaw a cyih`ae paw tuh seibyapianaw thothuinaw kalan a pou cih`ae.

Kae tuh kamaw te kamaw liate pawsang ka cyih kho khyh, kae tuh ka thae thyhte nynh bya ka pia; te ka byapianaw tuh ahme, pawccemacize kae tuh kamaw rynaw kha ka ccung khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw rynaw nynh ka ccung.
“Kae nynh kamaw konglang kha ccaekia ka khan lanze ka ccaekia tuh kyh khyh.
Kamaw konglang ccaekiakhantu mingccangpaw a um, te aning nynh kae ka konglang ccaekiakhan paw ccaekia tuh akyh cipaw ka ny.
“Nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae kha Johan kalan na saw oh, te aning nynh byaccing hanlan ccaekia a khan.
Thuasalama kae tuh ccungccaw kyate ccaekia ka mue khyh, thuasalama nanning tuh khum na thua ccaw oh cite nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh ka ho.
Johan tuh aruapaw te a awpaw maeekhua nynh thua: te nanning tuh amaw awnaw kyakhe sosoh hoysah lan na ry oh.

“Thuasalama kae tuh Johan kya-e laeze ale huapaw ccaekia ka hoi; pawccecize Paaw nynh phe thangsah lan kamaw yn pya paw ryalaw`ae kha kae nynh ka law, kha-e ka ryalaw`ae nynh kae tuh Paaw nynh a saw paw cipaw ccaekia a khan.
Te kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw amaw ccaccei nynh mah kamaw konglang ccaekia a khan. Nanning nynh amaw roi kha vaekheit san na thae boi khyh oh, amaw muinsan mah na muih boi khyh oh.
Te amaw bya nanning kya tyn khyh; pawccecize aning nynh a saw paw kha na zyn khyh oh.
“Nanning nynh Ccathyaa kha thawte na ccung oh, pawccecize kha-e`ae kya nynh zungzae hiinnaw kae hoi cite na tuaku oh, te Ccathyaa`ae tuh kamaw konglang ccaekiakhan paw nynh thua.
Te hiinnaw hoi khylan nanning nynh kamaw kalan nae thua ry khyh oh.
“Kae tuh ccungccaw`ae kyate phu-enaw ka ccou khyh.
Thuasalama nanning kya Pachia sungsanaw na hoi khyh oh cipaw ka ny.
Kae tuh ka Paaw min liate kae thua zah nanning nynh leh nae khan khyh oh, mingccangpaw nynh amaw min liate yn thua lanze, kha-e paw kha leh nae khan cih oh.
Lukheit te lukheit kyate thehoynaw kha na ccou oh zah Pachia kyalya kyate yn thua paw thehoynaw na peki lei oh paw nanning nynh pawtemou na zyn kho cih oh?
“Paaw malang kae nynh nanning kha sei kae be cih oh cite tuakuh nan oh, nanning kha sei ae be oh paw lukheit a um, tuh-e paw tuh nanning nynh na ngaehoiku oh paw Mawsi kha nynh thua.
Pawccecize, Mawsi kha na zyn oh lanze, kae hynh phe nae zyn cih oh paw, pawccecize aning tuh kamaw konglang nynh a zei.
Thuasalama aning nynh a zei paw kha nanning nynh na zyn khyh oh ze, pawtemou ka bya`ae hynh na zyn rou cih oh?” a ci.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae koute Jesu tuh Tiberias Rili cikuh paw Galilee Rili khuhlangraw a zua.
Te ccungccaw zapi nynh amaw kha a zui`ae, pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh ngeccih`ae tungvaw Jesu nynh a cyi paw muihsanaw kha a muih`ae keiccu.
Te Jesu tuh mua vawlan khe kae zah tuin kya a zuitu`ae ryte a dahung`ae.
Te Jew`ae poi athua paw, Kawtaw Poi tuh anae vae.
Oute Jesu nynh ngawdo zah ccungccaw zapi a kalan oun thua`ae paw kha he a muih tuh Filip kha, “Hynh-e`ae nynh a ae ccaw`ae teilangmou sanlou ah re cih oh?” a cipya.
Te hynh-e a hopaw tuh Filip kha syntaw khylan nynh a ho, pawccecize paw nynh ka cyi vae cih cipaw amaw ccaccei nynh phe a ny paw nynh thua.
Filip nynh amaw kha khung zah, “Hynh-e`ae milu raveih nynh ccapyh cci a mue nawlan`ae denari phuapia zaning mee sanlou tuh minmin hanlan zaw lan khyh,” a ci.
Amaw zuitu lukheit athua paw, Simon Piter a neitapaw Andru nynh,
“Barli sanlou phe pangaw te ngasaw taraw zawning a hoi paw imohpaw e kya mang a um; thuasalama hynhzeih ccungccaw laku kya e`ae nynh pawlangmou tang cih?” a cipya.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae kha dahungsah oh,” a ci. Tuin kya lonua patae asae, tukeiccu milu lante thungpangaw loukaw acih paw ccungccaw`ae tuh a dahung`ae.
Te Jesu nynh sanlou`ae kha laah zah lungtuabya he ho koute a zuitu`ae kalan ne`ae zah zuitu`ae nynh a dahung`ae paw kha a nee`ae. Te tuhhawte ngasaw`ae kha ccungccaw`ae nynh a ry`ae zeih a nee`ae.
Ccungccaw`ae phe a byn`ae te Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Pawsang avae khyh ccaw, alaepaw a eihpaw kha ccakhung oh,” a cipya`ae.
Tukeiccu zuitu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae nynh a ae`ae paw kyate alaepaw kha ccakhung`ae zah barli sanlou phe pangaw kya-e a eihpaw, alaepaw tuh adihpaw kee haw laening phe abeih.
Ou tuhte Jesu nynh a rae paw muihsanaw kha kha-e ccungccaw`ae nynh he muih`ae tuh, “E paw tuh laephipi kalan yn thua cih paw Profeh ccaccing nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
Ccungccaw`ae nynh oun thua vae cih`ae zah amaw kha siapharan lang tang lan oun nangde cih`ae cipaw Jesu nynh phe a ny keiccuze, Jesu tuh a makhaete mua muakheit kalan bua a cceih.
Te zete he thua tuh a zuitu`ae tuh rili kalan a cceihbung`ae.
Te kohlung lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Kapernaum khua lang rili kha a zua`ae. Te phe moh vae zah Jesu tuh minmin kalan thua loh khyh.
Te myarya arupaw khisang azaw keiccuze, tuileih a tho.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh me thung, me pali loukaw cia he a zaw`ae te, Jesu nynh rili vawlan yn cceih zah kohlung kalan yn naekupaw kha a muih`ae, te minmin tuh a rih vae`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kamaw nynh ka thua, rih nan oh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin nynh amaw kha lungtuate kohlung lungkhu lang a teesah`ae, te kohlung tuh minmin a ccianaw`ae lang varan lang sosoh mawte phe thua kanmaw.

Tuh-e nin koute rili hawkheit lang raw kya a thadyn paw ccungccaw`ae nynh a zuitu`ae nynh a teenaw`ae paw kohlung ccangkheit laelan ccangpaw kohlung um vae khyh cipaw, te Jesu tuh a zuitu`ae ryte kohlung lungkhu lang teebua khyh, thuasalama a zuitu`ae makhae nynh a cceih`ae cipaw kha he a muih`ae tuh,
tuhzemah Bawipaw nynh lungtuabya ho koute sanlou a la ae naw`ae te anaekunaw hmin kalan Tiberias khua kyate ccangpaw adihpaw kohlung`ae oun thua`ae.

Ccungccaw`ae nynh Jesu tuh tuin kya um khyh cipaw, te a zuitu`ae mah um khyh`ae cipaw kha he a muih`ae keiccuze minmin mah kohlung lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Jesu kha ccung khylan Kapernaum khua lang oun thua`ae.
Te minmin nynh Jesu kha rili hawkheit langraw kya he muih`ae tuh, “Rabbi, e kya hotuhmou na thua?” cite a khia`ae.

Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, muihsanaw`ae na muih oh keiccuze nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung khyh oh, thuasalama nanning nynh sanlou`ae na ae oh zah nae vueso keiccu nynh nae ccung oh.

Arohthyapaw aepaw hanlan ryalah nan oh, thuasalama Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh nanning ae pya cih oh paw zungzae hiinnaw kalan cia atynpaw aepaw hanlan ryalah oh; pawccecize amaw kha Paaw Pachia nynh tazeih phe khia vae paw nynh thua,” a ci.
Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Pachia nynh a ry paw ryalaw kae law nawlan, pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Pachia nynh yn saw paw amaw kha na zyn oh paw, kha-e kha nynh Pachia nynh a ry paw ryalaw tuh athua,” cite a khung`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “Kaening nynh kae muih zah nang kae zyn nawlan paw muihsanaw mou nae langsapyaku? Paw rya mou na law?
‘Pachia nynh minmin ae lanpaw sanlou kha vaawran kyate a pya`ae,’ cite azeiku hawte, kaening kae minpaaw`ae nynh manna kha rangkaw kya a ae`ae,” a ci`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Mawsi nynh kha-e sanlou kha vaawran kyate nanning ae pya khyh oh, thuasalama ka Paaw nynh vaawran kyate accaccingpaw sanlou kha nanning ae pya oh.
Pawccecize Pachia kya-e sanlou tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung zah laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan hiinnaw a pyatupaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, tuh-e sanlou tuh pei oun pya,” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh hiinnaw sanlou nynh ka thua. Kamaw kalan yn thua paw ccungccaw tuh a vuelaw boi vae lan khyh, te kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh a tuihaw boi vae lan khyh.
Thuasalama nanning nynh kamaw hynh phang nae muih oh zemah nae zyn khyh oh cite kae hopya vae oh.
Paaw nynh kamaw yn pya paw ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh kamaw kalan oun thua cih`ae; te kamaw kalan yn thua paw ccungccaw tuh kharyh ka dee boi lan khyh.
Pawccecize kae tuh kamaw rynaw kha cyi khylan vaawran kyate kae rungbung khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw rynaw cyi khylan nynh kae rungbung.
Te kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw a rynaw tuh, kamaw yn pya paw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha lukheit san ka zosah khyh nawlan, thuasalama nyathyakou nin kya minmin kha bua thosathui khylan nynh thua.
Te kamaw yn sawtupaw a rynaw tuh, Ccapaw kha muih zah amaw kha a zyn paw miakaw nynh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi ccaw`ae cipaw nynh thua; te nyathyakou nin kya kha-e paw kha kae nynh ka thosah cih,” a ci.
Oute, “Kae tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw sanlou nynh ka thua,” cite a ho keiccuze, Jew`ae nynh amaw kong kha byalung`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “E paw tuh Josef ccapaw Jesu thua khyh tou? A paaw te a nung tuh ah ny oh paw khaw? Pawtemou, ‘Kae tuh vaawran kyate kae rungbung paw,’ a ciku?” a ci`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Naemaw te naemaw laku ccohkuh nan oh.
Kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw nynh a soih khyh lanze hung ccungccaw sanmah kamaw kalan thua kho lan khyh, te yn thua paw ccungccaw kha nyathyakou nin kya ka thosah cih.
‘Te minmin balyn tuh Pachia nynh a ccangpya`ae paw thua cih`ae,’ cite Profeh`ae ccauh kya azeikuh. Tukeiccu Paaw kya-e thae zah a ccangkuh paw ccungccaw miakaw nynh kamaw kalan oun thua`ae.
Pachia kyate yn thua paw aning nynh Paaw kha a muih, aning laelan hung ccungccaw nynh san Paaw kha muih khyh.
Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi.
Kae tuh hiinnaw sanlou nynh ka thua.
Nae minpaaw`ae nynh rangkaw kya manna kha a ae`ae, thuasalama phe chih`ae.
E tuh ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ae sah lah a chi vae khyh ccaw cite vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw sanlou nynh thua.

Kae tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw ahiinpaw sanlou nynh ka thua, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh hynh-e sanlou hynh a ae lanze zungzae a hiin vae cih; te kae nynh ka pya lanpaw sanlou tuh ka ngesaw nynh thua; tuh-e tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae hiinnaw hanlan nynh thua,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh, “Pawtemou e ccungccapaw nynh amaw ngesaw kha aening ae lan yn pya kho cih?” cite mimaw te mimaw laku thawte a eikuh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing nanning kae hopya oh, Ccungccaw Ccapaw a ngesaw kha na ae khyh oh zah a chii kha na nia khyh oh lanze nanning kya hiinnaw na hoi khyh oh.
Hunghung zemah ka ngesaw kha ae zah ka chii a neih paw tuh zungzae hiinnaw a hoi, te kha-e paw kha nyathyakou nin kya ka thosah cih.
Pawccecize ka ngesaw tuh aepaw ccaccing thua zah ka chii tuh niapaw ccaccing nynh thua.
Ka ngesaw kha ae zah ka chii a neih paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw kya um zah kae mah a kya ka um.
Ahiinpaw Paaw nynh kamaw hynh yn saw zah Paaw liate kae ka hiin hawte, kamaw yn ae paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw liate a hiin cih.
E tuh vaawran kyate yn rungbung paw sanlou nynh thua, nae minpaaw`ae nynh manna a ae`ae pite a chi`ae hawte thua leite, hynh-e sanlou a ae paw ccungccaw tuh zungzae a hiin vae cih,” a cipya`ae.
E uccaw`ae kong hynh Jesu nynh Kapernaum khua kya a ccangpya`ae lya sinakok kya nynh a ho.
Tukeiccu a zuitu`ae patae nynh e kong he a thae`ae tuh, “E bya tuh arupaw byaho nynh thua, hung nynh mou a thaethya kho cih?” a ci`ae.
A zuitu`ae nynh tuh-e kong a ccohku`ae paw kha Jesu nynh a lung te he a nyh tuh minmin kha, “Hynh-e bya nynh nanning nae lung ae thangsah oh tou?
Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh langmaw a umnaw kalan a kaethung paw kha na muih oh lanze pawte thua ngaw?
Hiinnaw a pyatu tuh Muisaw nynh thua, pynsaw tuh pawsang ccungkia khyh; nanning kalan ka ho paw bya`ae hynh muisaw thua zah hiinnaw mah athua.

Thuasalama nanning laku a zyn leipaw abang a um,” a cipya`ae. Pawccecize Jesu nynh atakaw lya mawte a zyn lei`ae paw tuh hung`ae nynh thua`ae cipaw te hung nynh amaw kha yn phee cih cipaw kha phe a ny vae.
Te Jesu nynh, “Tukeiccu ka Paaw nynh kawpya khyh lanze hung ccungccaw sanmah kamaw kalan yn thua kho lan khyh cite nanning kalan phe kae hopya vae oh,” a ci.
Tuh-e ccyh kyate a zuitu`ae patae tuh nuhlang ki`ae zah amaw ryte cceihkheih vae khyh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh zuitu luhaw laening kha, “Nanning so na cceihbua ry oh tou?” a cipya`ae.
Oute Simon Piter nynh khung zah, “Bawipaw, hung kalan mou kae cceih cih? Nang nynh zungzae hiinnaw bya`ae na hoi.
Te kaening nynh nang tuh Kri, a hiinpaw Pachia Ccapaw nynh na thua cipaw kae zyn zah kae ny,” a ci.
Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Nanning luhaw laening hynh kamaw nynh kae po khyh oh tou? Tuhzemah nanning lakuze lukheit tuh diabolos nynh thua,” a ci.
A honuapaw tuh Simon ccapaw, Judas Iskaria nynh thua; pawccecize aning tuh luhaw laening kyaze lukheit mang athua pite amaw kha a phee vae cih paw nynh thua.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae koute Jesu tuh Galilee pee kya khua a ccung; pawccecize Jew`ae nynh amaw kha chia lan cite a ccung`ae keiccu Judah pee kya khuaccung ry khyh.
Atu Jew`ae Bu Poi tuh anae vae.
Tukeiccu a neitapaw`ae nynh Jesu kha, “Na zuitu`ae nynh mah na cyi paw ryalaw`ae kha a muih bua ccaw`ae, e kyate toikuh lah Judah pee lungkhu lang cceih ccavae.

Pawccecize amaw te amaw kha oun nyh`ae sah cite a ccungkuh paw ccungccaw nynh tuh pawsang mah aphirute cyih boi khyh. Nang nynh e uccaw`ae hynh na cyi lan thua ze, laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan namaw te namaw kha langku tua,” a cipya`ae.
Pawccecize amaw a neitapaw`ae nynh heize amaw kha zyn khyh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka ccyh thua loh khyh, thuasalama nanning ccyh tuh pei paccynku athua.
Laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh nanning ae hua kho khyh oh, thuasalama kamaw tuh oun hua`ae, pawkeiccumacize mih ryalawnaw`ae tuh aseipaw nynh thua cite kae nynh ccaekia ka khan keiccu.
Tuh-e poi kalan nanning la cceih oh, kae tuh tuh-e poi kalan ka cceih loh lan khyh, pawccecize ka ccyh phe ccing lan thua loh khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Hynh-e bya`ae hynh minmin kalan a ho koute Jesu tuh Galilee pee kya a um ung.
Thuasalama a neitapaw`ae nynh he cceihthung`ae tuh Jesu mah poi kalan a cceihthung bua, thuasalama alangkuh lei lante aphiru lante nynh a ccia.
Oute Jew`ae nynh poi kya amaw kha ccung`ae zah, “Jesu tuh teisangmou a um?” a ci`ae.

Te amaw te asekuh lante ccungccaw zapi laku kya byalungnaw patae a um; pawccecize ccungccaw abang nynh, “Aning tuh ccungccahoypaw nynh thua,” a ci`ae. Mingccang`ae nynh, “Ccungccahoypaw thua khyh, thuasalama aning nynh ccungccaw`ae kha a hyngpya`ae,” a ci`ae.
Tuhzemah Jew`ae rawri`ae keiccuze hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah amaw kong kha alangkuh lante ho khyh`ae.
Atu tuh-e poi akhankuh loukaw he acihte Jesu nynh tempal voidu lungkhu lang cceih zah a ccangpya`ae.
Te Jew`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E ccungccapaw hynh a ccangkuh lei pite pawtepei ccaw a thya?” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ka ccangpyanaw tuh kamaw kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw kya-e nynh thua.
Ccungccaw lukheit nynh Pachia rynaw kha a cyi ry lanze, ka ccangpyanaw kong kha a nyh cih, kha-e tuh Pachia kya-e tou? Tukhyhze kamaw kya-e tou ka ho cipaw a nyh cih.
Amaw te amaw kya-e a ho paw ccungccaw tuh amaw phu-enaw nynh a ccungku; thuasalama a sawtupaw phuenaw a ccung paw ccungccaw tuh ahmepaw thua zah dingleinaw amaw kya um khyh.
Mawsi nynh nanning kha Kawbya ae pya khyh oh tou? Tuhzemah nanning lakuze hung nynh san Kawbya kha na zui khyh oh rei? Pawccemou kamaw hynh chia lan nanning nynh nae ccung oh?” a ci.
Ccungccaw`ae nynh khung`ae zah, “Nang tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw hynh sang na thua, nang chia khylan hungmou ae ccung?” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kae nynh ryalaw ccangkheit ka laah zah nanning balyn nae ngaeangthua.
Mawsi nynh nanning kha vindung awkunaw ae pya oh; kha-e tuh Mawsi kyate yn tho paw thua khyh, thuasalama minpaaw`ae kyate nynh a tho; te nanning nynh Sabbath nin kya ccungccapaw kha vindung na aw oh.

Mawsi Kawbya tuh ro athua khyh nawlan, ccungccapaw lukheit tuh Sabbath nin kya vindung a awkuh lanze, kae nynh Sabbath nin kya ccungccaw lukheit ka dansah keiccu tou nanning nynh ka tungvaw nae thinria?
Muihnaw te byapia nan oh, thuasalama adingpaw byapianaw te byapia oh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Jerusalem khua e ccungccaw abang nynh, “E paw tuh minmin nynh chia lan cite a ccung`ae paw kha thua khyh tou?
Te dotua oh, aning tuh rawhoyte byaho, thuasalama minmin nynh paw bya san khung khyh`ae. Uktu`ae nynh, e paw tuh Kri ccaccing nynh thua cipaw hynh nyh ccaccing`ae vema?
Tuhzemah kaening nynh e paw tuh paw kyate yn thua paw cipaw kae ny; thuasalama Kri tuh he yn thua vae ze, paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw hung ccungccaw nynh san nyh lan khyh,” a ci`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh tempal kya a ccangpya`ae lyakhe thawte sia zah, “Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ny oh, te paw kyate nynh kae thua cipaw mah nae ny oh; kae tuh kamaw ka rynaw te kae thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw tuh ahmepaw nynh thua, amaw kha nanning nynh na nyh khyh oh.
Thuasalama kae tuh amaw kha ka ny; pawccecize kae tuh amaw kyate nynh kae thua, te aning nynh kamaw hynh yn saw,” a ci.
Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha kyng lan a ccung vae`ae; thuasalama hung ccungccaw nynh san amaw kha kyng khyh`ae, pawkeiccumacize amaw ccyh zaw loh khyh.
Te ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha zyn`ae zah, “Kri he yn thua vae ze, hynh-e ccungccapaw nynh a rae paw hynh-e muihsanaw`ae lae muihsanaw alunghua yn rae cih vema?” a ci`ae.
Amaw konglang ccungccaw`ae nynh tuhte pei ccohku`ae paw kha Farasi`ae nynh a thae`ae; te Farasi`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh amaw kha kyng khylan tempal ngawtu`ae kha a saw`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh nanning ryte sosohtari nynh ka um, oute kamaw yn sawtupaw kalan ka cceih cih.
Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung cih oh zah nae muih lan khyh oh, te ka umnaw kalan nae thua kho lan khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.

Oute Jew`ae nynh mimaw te mimaw laku, “Aening nynh ah muih khyh nawlan oh aning tuh teilangmou a cceih vae cih? Greek`ae laku um`ae paw a phiakuh`ae paw Jew`ae kalan aning nynh cceih ngaw zah Greek`ae kha ccangpah ngaw`ae tou?
‘Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung cih oh zah nae muih lan khyh oh; te ka umnaw kalan nae thua kho lan khyh oh,’ cite aning nynh a hopaw hynh paw a horynaw mou athua?” cite a hoku`ae.
Tuh-e poi, alesaepaw nin, nyathyakou nin kya, Jesu nynh thadyn zah, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh a tuihaw lanze kamaw kalan rang sah lah neih sah.
Kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh, Ccathyaa nynh a ho hawte, a lungkhu langte ahiinpaw tuidy alua cih,”cite thawte a sia.
Thuasalama hynh-e a hopaw tuh amaw zyn`ae paw nynh a mue vae cih`ae paw Muisaw kha nynh a honuathe; pawccecize Thyaa Muisaw kha pya thua loh khyh, pawkeiccumacize Jesu tuh phuesah thua loh khyh.
Tukeiccu ccungccaw patae nynh hynh-e bya he thae`ae tuh, “E paw tuh profeh ccaccing nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
Mingccang`ae nynh, “E paw tuh Kri nynh thua,” a ci`ae. Thuasalama abang nynh, “Kri tuh Galilee kyate yn pou ngaw zaw?
Kri tuh David ciihan kyate, David umnaw khua, Bethlehem kyate nynh yn pou cih cite Ccathyaa nynh ho khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
Tukeiccu amaw keiccuze ccungccaw`ae laku phu phiakunaw a um.
Te ccungccaw abang nynh amaw kha kyng lan a ry`ae; thuasalama hung ccungccaw nynh san amaw kha kyng khyh`ae.
Oute tempal ngawtu`ae tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae kalan oun thua`ae; te minmin nynh, “Pawccemou amaw kha nae cciakhae khyh oh?” cite tempal ngawtu`ae kha a khia`ae.
Tempal ngawtu`ae nynh, “E paw nynh a ho hawte hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah bya ho boi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
Oute Farasi`ae nynh, “Nanning so phe ae hyngpyabua vae oh tou?
Uktu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh amaw zyn paw lukheit san a um tou?
Thuasalama Kawbya a nyh lei`ae paw tuh-e ccungccaw zapi tuh thyalaw athua`ae,” cite a khung`ae.
Farasi`ae kyaze lukheit athua paw, langmaw lya khuazi Jesu kalan a thua paw Nikodemas nynh minmin kha,
“Ccungccaw nynh a ho paw kha a thaety leite, a cyi paw a nyhty leite, ccungccaw kha aening ah Kawbya nynh byapia tou?” a cipya`ae.
Minmin nynh, “Nang so Galilee paw tou na thua? Galilee kyate profeh lukheit san pou boi khyh cipaw kha ccung lah dotua,” cite a khung`ae.
Te ccungccaw miakaw mih inn raveih lang phe cceih`ae.
Thuasalama Jesu tuh Oliv Mua kalan a cceih.
Te awkhua takawte tempal voidu kalan bua cceih zah ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw kalan oun thua`ae; te Jesu tuh dahung zah minmin kha a ccangpya`ae.

Te kawbya ccangpatu`ae te Farasi`ae nynh a vawpaw thua leipaw pise ryte a seipaw nopinung lukheit kha kyng`ae zah amaw kalan oun cciakhae`ae, te minmin nynh kha-e nung kha angaelaku kya he a nung`ae koute,
Jesu kha, “Ccangpatupaw, hynh-e nopinung hynh a vawpaw thua leipaw pise ryte a sei cciamang lya kyng paw nynh thua.
Te Kawbya kya khatahawpaw nopi`ae kha lung te deih lan Mawsi nynh kaw oun pya, thuasalama nang pawte na ho cih?” a cipya`ae.
Hynh-e minmin nynh a ho`ae paw tuh amaw kha seibe khylan a syntawnaw`ae paw nynh thua. Thuasalama Jesu nynh baling zah a kuihdung te laephi kya ccaw a zei. A thae leipaw hawte nynh a um.
Minmin nynh amaw kha pei he khia`ae tuh, Jesu nynh thokuh zah minmin kha, “Nanning lakuze seinaw a hoi leipaw ccungccaw nynh kha-e nung kha masaty lung te deih sah,” a cipya`ae.
Te bua baling zah lae vawlan ccaw a zei ki.

Te kha-e bya a thae`ae paw minmin tuh athya-ahoy nynawpaw thinlung nynh mih seinaw kha nysakuh`ae zah kum tang huapaw kyate tho zah nyathyakou um paw kyacia lukheit koute lukheit phya cceih`ae; te Jesu tuh a makhaete cciataw`ae zah nopinung tuh angaelaku kya phang thadyn.
Jesu nynh he thokuh tuh nopinung laelan hung sanmah muih vae khyh, te kha-e nung kha, “Nopinung, nang sei ae be`ae paw teisangmou um`ae? Hung nynh san seibya ae pia khyh`ae tou?” a cipya.
Nopinung nynh, “Hung nynh san yn pia khyh, Bawipaw,” a ci. Te Jesu nynh, “Kae nynh mah nang hynh seibya kae pia khyh; la cceih lah la sei nan vae,” a cipya.
Oute Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh laephipi awnaw nynh ka thua; kamaw yn zui paw ccungccaw tuh mohnaw kya cceih lan khyh, thuasalama hiinnaw kya-e awnaw kha a hoi cih,” cite bua a hopya`ae.
Tukeiccu Farasi`ae nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh namaw konglang namaw nynh ccaekia na khan; na ccaekia tuh kyh khyh,” a cipya`ae.

Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Kae nynh kamaw konglang ccaekia ka khan zemah ka ccaekia tuh akyh; pawccecize kae tuh paw kyate nynh kae thua cipaw ka nyh zah teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw ka ny; thuasalama nanning nynh kae paw kyate nynh kae thua cipaw te teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw na nyh khyh oh.
Nanning tuh ccungccaw lante nynh bya na pia oh; kae tuh hung sanmah bya ka pia khyh.
Tuhzemah kae tuh bya ka pia ze, ka byapianaw tuh ahme, pawccecize kae tuh ka makhae thua khyh, thuasalama kae tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw ka Paaw ryte nynh kae um.
Nae Kawbya kya mah ccungccaw luning ccaekia tuh akyh cite azeikuh.
Kae tuh kamaw konglang ccaekiakhan paw lukheit ka thua, te kamaw yn sawtupaw Paaw nynh kamaw konglang ccaekiakhan,” a ci.

Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Na Paaw tuh teisangmou um?” cite a khia`ae. Jesu nynh, “Nanning nynh kamaw mah nae nyh khyh oh, ka Paaw mah na nyh khyh oh; kamaw hynh phe nae la ny oh thua ze, ka Paaw mah phe na nyh cih oh paw,” a ci.
Jesu nynh e bya`ae hynh tempal voidu kya a ccangpya`ae lya phua nungnaw kyakhe nynh a ho; te hung ccungccaw nynh san amaw kha kyng khyh`ae, pawccecize amaw ccyh zaw loh khyh.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae ka la cceih cih zah nanning nynh kamaw kha nae ccung cih oh, te nae seinaw kya na chih cih oh, ka ccianaw lang nae thua kho lan khyh oh,” bua a cipya`ae.
Oute Jew`ae nynh, “ ‘Ka ccianaw lang nae thua kho lan khyh oh,’ a cipaw tuh amaw te amaw tou a theihkuh cih?” a ci`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning tuh akaw lang-e nynh na thua oh, kae tuh luki lang-e nynh ka thua; nanning tuh hynhe laephipi kya-e nynh na thua oh; kae tuh hynh-e laephipi kya-e ka thua khyh.
Tukeiccu nanning kha, ‘Nae seinaw kya na chih cih oh,’ cite kae hopya oh; pawccecize kae tuh aning nynh ka thua cipaw na zyn khyh oh ze, nae seinaw kya na chih cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh hungmou?” a ci`ae. Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh atakaw lya mawte nanning kae hopya oh hawte nynh ka thua.
Nanning konglang ka ho lanpaw te byapia lanpaw patae a um; thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw tuh ahme, te amaw kyate ka thae paw uccaw`ae kha nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan ka ho,” a cipya`ae.
Paaw kong kha nynh Jesu nynh minmin kha a hopya`ae cipaw minmin nynh nyh khyh`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha nanning nynh he nae saethung vae oh te, kae tuh aning nynh ka thua cipaw nae nyh cih oh, kamaw kaw te pawsang ka cyih khyh cipaw kha nae nyh cih oh; thuasalama ka Paaw nynh yn ccangpya hawte nynh hynhe` ae hynh ka ho.
Te kamaw yn sawtupaw tuh kamaw ryte nynh a um, Paaw nynh ka makhaete yn nungsya khyh, pawccecize amaw lungrythua paw uccaw`ae kha nynh kae tuh pei ka cyi he,” a cipya`ae.
E bya`ae hynh Jesu nynh he a ho tuh ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh amaw zyn`ae paw Jew`ae kha, “Nanning nynh ka bya kya na tyn oh ze, ka zuitu`ae ccaccing na thua cih oh.
Te nanning nynh byaccing kha nae nyh cih oh zah byaccing nynh nanning kha ae luesah cih oh,” a cipya`ae.

Minmin nynh amaw kha, “Kaening tuh Abraham ciihan kae thua zah hung ccungccaw kya-e seetangnaw kya san kae um boi khyh; pawcihtemou nang nynh, ‘Nanning tuh luesah na thua cih oh,’ nae cipaw tu?” cite a khung`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, hunghung zemah seinaw ryalah paw tuh seinaw see nynh athua.
Te see tuh inn kya zungzae um boi khyh; thuasalama ccapaw tuh zungzae a um.
Tukeiccu Ccapaw nynh nanning kha ae luesah oh ze, nanning tuh na lue ccaccing cih oh.
Nanning tuh Abraham ciihan nynh na thua oh cipaw ka ny; thuasalama kamaw chia lan nae ccung oh, pawkeiccumacize ka bya nanning kya umnaw hoi khyh.
Kae tuh ka Paaw kya ka muih paw uccaw kha nynh ka ho; te nanning tuh nae paaw kya na muih oh paw kha na cyi oh,” a ci.
Minmin nynh khung`ae zah amaw kha, “Abraham tuh kaening paaw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae. Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Nanning tuh Abraham ccaaw`ae na thua oh ze, Abraham ryalaw`ae khaw na lahbua cih oh.
Thuasalama Pachia kya-e ka thae paw byaccing kha nanning kalan ae hopah oh paw, Ccungccapaw kamaw hynh chia lan atu nanning nynh nae ccung oh; Abraham tuh hynhte cyih khyh.

Nanning tuh nae paaw cyisahnaw nynh na cyi oh,” a cipya`ae. Oute minmin nynh amaw kha, “Kaening tuh ohhuakunaw kyate a pui paw kae thua khyh, kaening nynh Paaw lukheit kae hoi, tuh-e tuh Pachia nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.

Jesu nynh, “Pachia tuh nae Paaw a la thua ze, kamaw hynh nae sungsah cih oh; pawccecize kae tuh Pachia kyate kae pou zah kae thua, kamaw kaw te kae thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh kamaw hynh yn saw.
Pawccemou nanning nynh ka bya hynh na thaethya khyh oh? Nanning nynh ka bya na thae kho khyh oh keiccu nynh thua.

Nanning tuh nae paaw diabolos kya-e nynh na thua oh, te nae paaw rynaw kha nanning nynh na cyi ry oh. Aning tuh atakaw lya mawte ccungccaw theihtupaw thua zah byaccing kya tyn khyh. Pawccecize amaw kya byaccing um khyh. Hyngbya he a ho vae ze amawthuanaw kha nynh a ho; pawccecize aning tuh mihyngpaw thua zah hyngbya paaw nynh athua.
Te byaccing hynh kae hopya keiccu oh, nanning nynh kamaw nae zyn khyh oh.
Nanning lakuze hung nynh mou kamaw hynh seinaw yn nysakuh? Te kae nynh byaccing ka ho lanze pawccemou nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae zyn khyh oh?
Pachia kya-e ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia bya`ae kha a ngae, nanning tuh Pachia kya-e na thua khyh oh keiccu a bya`ae kha na ngae khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha khung`ae zah, “Nang tuh Samariapaw nynh na thua cipaw te raerangsaro bahkuhpaw nynh na thua cipaw hmerarihlan kae hopah khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kae tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw ka thua khyh, thuasalama ka Paaw hynh saw ka tua, te nanning nynh kamaw hynh saw nae tua khyh oh.
Kae tuh kamaw phu-enaw ka ccung khyh; phu-enaw ccung zah byapia paw lukheit a um.
Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ka bya hynh a ngae lanze chinaw tung boi vae lan khyh,” a ci.

Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw cipaw atu kae ny. Abraham tuh a chih, te profeh`ae mah chih`ae, te nang nynh, ‘Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ka bya a ngae lanze chinaw tung boi vae lan khyh,’ na ci.
Nang tuh a chih vae paw kaening paaw Abraham laeze na lesaehua tou? Profeh`ae mah chih`ae; namaw te namaw hynh hunglangmou na riakuh?” a ci`ae.

Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kamaw te kamaw phu-e ka pyaku ze, ka phu-enaw tuh accakaepaw nynh thua, kamaw phu-e yn pya paw tuh ka Paaw nynh thua; amaw kha nanning nynh, ‘Aning tuh kaening Pachia,’ na ci oh.

Tuhzemah nanning nynh amaw kha na nyh khyh oh, thuasalama kae tuh amaw kha ka ny; te kae nynh, ‘Amaw kha ka nyh khyh,’ ka ci lanze, kae tuh nanning hawte mihyngpaw nynh ka thua cih, thuasalama kae tuh amaw kha ka nyh zah a hopaw kha ka ngae.
Nanning nae paaw Abraham nynh kamaw ninsaw kha muih lan myarya a lungtua; te kha-e kha muih zah a lungtua,” a ci.
Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha, “Nang tuh kum sungpangaw na cih loh leite Abraham tuh phe na muih tou?” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, Abraham a la um mawze kae tuh ka um,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin nynh amaw kha deih lan lung`ae a khuinnuaku`ae; thuasalama Jesu nynh amaw te amaw rekuh zah minmin ngaelaku te cceih zah tempal voidu kyate po a pou.
Te Jesu nynh po a cceih tuh a pui takawte a mitmohpaw ccungccapaw lukheit kha a muih.
Te a zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Rabbi, e paw nynh mitmohte a pui paw hynh, hung nynh sei keiccu mou, amaw tou a sei, tukhyhze a nung te a paaw tou sei`ae?” cite a khia`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “E ccungccapaw mah sei khyh, a nung te a paaw mah sei khyh`ae, thuasalama Pachia ryalaw`ae amaw kya langsaku ry keiccu nynh thua.
Ninthu ccyh lya kamaw yn sawtupaw ryalaw`ae kha ka laah cih; hung ccungccaw nynh san ryalaw kho khyh ccyh khuazi yn thua cih.
Laephipi kya kae ka um lungkhu balyn kae tuh laephipi awnaw nynh ka thua,” a ci.
Tuh-e he a ho koute Jesu nynh laephi kha a tuinthoi zah tuin kyate ccingccua kha rae zah mitmohpaw mit kha ccingccua a thuhpya.
Te amaw kha, “La cceih, Siloam kuaa kya la singkuh,” a cipya. (Siloam cipaw asuilan tuh ‘Saw’ cipaw nynh thua). Tukeiccu aning nynh cceih zah a singku, te ngawmuihte a ki.
Tukeiccu a innpaw`ae te aning tuh mitmohpaw nynh thua cipaw langmaw lya a muih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh, “E paw hynh leih dahung zah a ngiakuh he paw kha thua khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
Ccungccaw abang nynh, “Kha-e paw nynh thua,” a ci`ae; mingccang`ae nynh, “Kha-e paw nynh alo,” a ci`ae; thuasalama amaw nynh, “Kae tuh aning nynh ka thua,” a ci.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh amaw kha, “Pawcihtemou na mit a aw?” a ci`ae.

Aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Jesu acikuh paw ccungccapaw nynh ccingccua rae zah ka mit kya yn thuhpya, te, ‘Siloam kuaa kalan la cceih lah la singkuh,’ yn cipya, te ka cceih zah ka singkuh, te ngaw ka muih,” a ci.
Oute minmin nynh, “Aning tuh teisangmou a um?” cite a khia`ae. Aning nynh, “Ka nyh khyh,” a ci.
Minmin nynh langmaw lya a mitmohpaw kha Farasi`ae kalan a cciakhae`ae.
Te Jesu nynh ccingccua rae zah kha-e paw mit a awsah lyakha Sabbath nin nynh thua.
Oute Farasi`ae nynh mah kha-e paw kha pawcihtemou ngaw na muih cite bua a khia`ae. Aning nynh minmin kha, “Aning nynh ka mit kya ccingccua yn thuhpah zah ka singbiakuh, te ngaw ka muih,” a cipya`ae.

Tukeiccu Farasi`ae abang nynh, “Tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw thua khyh, pawccemacize Sabbath nin sung khyh,” a ci`ae. Mingccang`ae nynh, “Pawcihtemou miseipaw lukheit nynh khatahawpaw muihsanaw a rae kho cih?” a ci`ae. Te minmin laku kya phiakunaw a um.
Minmin nynh mitmohpaw kha, “Na mit ae awsah keiccu tuh-e paw tuh pawtemou na tua?” cite bua a khia`ae. Mitmohpaw nynh, “Aning tuh Profeh lukheit nynh thua,” a ci.
Thuasalama ngaw bua a muih paw a nung te a paaw kha a ko makhia`ae tuh kha-e paw tuh a mitmoh zah ngaw bua a muih paw nynh thua cite Jew`ae nynh zyn khyh`ae.
Te minmin nynh a nung te a paaw kha, “E paw hynh a pui lya mawte a mitmoh na ci oh paw nae ccapaw thua tou? Tuhte lanze atu pawcihtemou ngaw a muih?” cite a khia`ae.
A nung te a paaw nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “E paw tuh kae ccapaw nynh thua cipaw te a pui lya mawte a mitmoh cipaw kae ny.
Thuasalama pawcihte nynh atu ngaw a muih cipaw kae nyh khyh, hung nynh a mit awsah cipaw mah kae nyh khyh; aning tuh piccangthua vae, amaw kha khia oh, amaw hanlan amaw nynh yn hokuh cih,” a ci`ae.

A nung te a paaw nynh Jew`ae rawri`ae keiccu nynh e bya`ae hynh a ho`ae; pawccecize Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite lukhakheit nynh ccaekiakhan lanze tuh-e paw tuh sinakok kyate dee lan cite Jew`ae nynh nawccawnaw phe a rae vae`ae.
Tukeiccu nynh a nung te a paaw nynh, “Aning tuh piccangthua vae, amaw kha khia oh,” a ci`ae.
Tukeiccu mitmohpaw kha minmin nynh bua ko`ae zah, “Pachia hynh phu-enaw pya, kha-e paw tuh miseipaw nynh thua cipaw kaening nynh kae ny,” a ci`ae.
Aning nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning tuh miseipaw athua te thua khyh ka nyh khyh, ccangkheit ka ny paw tuh, kae tuh ka mit a la moh, atu ngaw ka muih vae,” a ci.
Oute minmin nynh, “Aning nynh na tungvaw pawmou a cyi? Na mit pawcihtemou ae awsah?” cite bua a khia`ae.
Aning nynh, “Nanning phe kae hopya vae oh, te na ngae khyh oh, pawccemou bua na thaery oh? Nanning so a zuitu`ae lan na tang ry oh tou?” cite a khung`ae.
Oute minmin nynh amaw kha sarya`ae zah, “Nang nynh amaw zuitu na thua, thuasalama kaening tuh Mawsi zuitu`ae nynh kae thua.
Pachia nynh Mawsi kalan byahopya cipaw kae ny, thuasalama e paw tuh paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw kae nyh khyh,” a ci`ae.
Tuh-e ccungccapaw nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning nynh ka mit phe yn awsah pite, aning tuh paw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw na ny khyh oh paw tuh ngaeang lan um paw uccaw nynh thua.
Pachia nynh misei`ae bya tuh thaepah khyh`ae cipaw aening ah nyh oh; thuasalama lukhakheit nynh Pachia kha beik zah a rynaw kha a cyi lanze, kha-e paw kha Pachia nynh a thaepya.
Mitmohte a pui paw ccungccapaw mit kha ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh phe awsah cipaw laephipi thotakaw te thae boi lan um khyh.
E ccungccapaw tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw a la thua khyh lanze, aning nynh pawsang mah cyi kho lan khyh,” a ci.
Minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Nang tuh seinaw`ae kya khaleih na pui paw nynh na thua, nang nynh tou kaening nae ccangpah?” a ci`ae. Te minmin nynh amaw kha phe a dee`ae.
Farasi`ae nynh mitmohpaw kha phe dee`ae cipaw Jesu nynh a thae; te Jesu nynh mitmohpaw kha he a muih tuh, “Pachia Ccapaw kha na zyn tou?” cite a khia.
Aning nynh, “Bawipaw, kae nynh amaw kha ka zyn lanpaw aning tuh hungmou?” cite a khung.
Te Jesu nynh, “Nang nynh amaw kha phe na muih vae, te nang ryte atu bya hopaw hynh aning nynh thua,” a cipya.
Te aning nynh, “Bawipaw, ka zyn!” ci zah amaw kha a beik.
Te Jesu nynh, “Ngawmuih lei`ae paw kha ngawmuihsah khylan, te ngawmuih`ae paw kha mitmohsah khylan, kae tuh byapia khylan nynh hynh-e laephipi kalan kae thua,” a ci.
Te Jesu ryte a um`ae paw Farasi`ae abang nynh hynh-e bya`ae hynh thae`ae zah amaw kha, “Kaening so kae mitmoh tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Nanning tuh nae mit a la moh lanze seinaw na hoi cih lei oh paw, thuasalama atu nanning nynh, ‘Ngaw kae muih,’ na ci oh; keiccuze nae seinaw tuh phang a um.
“Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, tuu khiaa lungkhu lang sakoih kyate tee leite, ccangpaw kyate a kae paw ccungccaw tuh miruh te damiah nynh thua.
Thuasalama sakoih kyate a tee paw tuh tuu`ae a ringtu nynh thua.
Kha-e paw kha sakoih ngawtupaw nynh sakoih a hungpya, te tuu`ae nynh a roi a syntaw`ae, te a tuu`ae kha mih min te ko`ae zah a poukhae`ae.
Te a tuu`ae kha he a poukhae vae ze, mih malang khe cciapah`ae zah tuu`ae nynh amaw kha a zui`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh a roi kha a syntaw`ae.
Te mikhiapaw kha minmin nynh zui lan khyh`ae, thuasalama kha-e paw kha a ccuetaw cih`ae, pawccecize minmin nynh mikhiapaw roi kha nyh khyh`ae,” a ci.
E tousenaw hynh Jesu nynh minmin kha a hopya`ae, thuasalama aning nynh a hopya`ae paw kha paw kong nynh athua cipaw minmin nynh thaethya khyh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha bua hopah`ae zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kae tuh tuu`ae teenaw sakoih nynh ka thua.
Kamaw malang oun thuaty`ae paw balyn tuh miruh`ae te damiah`ae nynh thua`ae, thuasalama tuu`ae nynh minmin roi kha ngaepah khyh`ae.
Kae tuh sakoih nynh ka thua, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw kyate a tee lanze, aning tuh khum athua cih. Te aning tuh a tee, a pou cih zah rangpaw a muihkuh cih.
Miruh tuh ru khylan, chia khylan te syro khylan rou nynh yn thua; kae tuh tuu`ae nynh hiinnaw a hoi ccaw`ae cite, te kha-e kha phe beih lang a hoi ccaw`ae cite nynh kae thua.
“Kae tuh ahoypaw tuuringtu nynh ka thua; ahoypaw tuuringtu nynh tuh a hiinnaw kha tuu`ae hanlan a pyaku.

Thuasalama tuuringtu athua leipaw, tuu`ae a hoitu athua leipaw, hohpaw ccungccaw nynh tuh suizaw yn thua paw he a muih vae ze, tuu`ae kha cciataw zah phe a ccuetaw, te suizaw nynh tuu`ae kha kyng`ae zah pung phiasaku`ae.
Hohpaw ccungccaw nynh tuh a ccuetaw he, pawccemacize aning tuh hohpaw athua keiccu tuu`ae hanlan tua khyh.
“Kae tuh ahoypaw tuuringtu nynh ka thua, te ka tuu`ae kha ka nyh zah ka tuu`ae nynh mah kamaw kha oun ny`ae.
Kamaw kha ka Paaw nynh yn ny hawte, kae nynh mah ka Paaw kha ka ny, te ka hiinnaw kha tuu`ae hanlan ka pyaku.

Te hynh-e tuu khiaa kya a umbua leipaw ccangpaw tuu`ae kha ka hoi, minmin kha mah ka cciakhae hahe cih`ae zah minmin nynh ka roi a ngae cih`ae; te tuuringtu lukheit zakaw tuuphu phukheit lang oun tang cih`ae.
Kae nynh ka hiinnaw kha ka pyakuh zah ka hiinnaw kha bua ka lawkuh cih keiccuze ka Paaw nynh kamaw kha yn sungsah.

Hung ccungccaw nynh san kha-e hiinnaw kha ka kyate yn lawpah khyh, thuasalama kamaw lungryte nynh kha-e kha ka pyaku. Ka hiinnaw kha pyaku lan kawhoinaw te kha-e kha bua lawku lan kawhoinaw ka hoi. Hynh-e kawpyapaw hynh ka Paaw kyate nynh ka mue,” a ci.
Hynh-e bya`ae keiccuze Jew`ae laku phiakunaw bua a um.
Te minmin lakuze ccungccaw patae nynh, “Aning tuh raerangsaro bahkuh zah angaee, pawccemou amaw bya kha na ngae oh?” a ci`ae.
Abang nynh, “E bya`ae tuh raerangsaro bahkuhpaw bya`ae thua khyh, raerangsaro nynh mitmohpaw mit kha a awsah kho cih tou?” a ci`ae.
Te khoccihsaw lyakhe Jerusalem kya Tempal Ahnaw Poi um zah,
Jesu tuh tempal voidu lungkhu Solomon saeleih dawkuhpaw kya a cceih.
Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha phang koihlu`ae zah, “Hohse cia mou nang nynh kaening hynh lunghiinnaw nae hoisah ung cih? Nang tuh Kri na thua lanze ccaerarihlan oun hopah,” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Nanning phe kae hopya vae oh, te na zyn khyh oh; ka Paaw min te ka cyipaw ryalaw`ae nynh kamaw kong ccaekiakhan`ae.
Thuasalama nanning tuh ka tuuphu lungkhu e na thua khyh oh keiccu nae kalan ka ho vae hawte nanning nynh nae zyn khyh oh.
Ka tuu`ae nynh ka roi kha ngae`ae zah minmin kha ka ny`ae, te minmin nynh kamaw kha oun zui`ae.
Te minmin kha zungzae hiinnaw ka pya`ae, te minmin tuh kharyh roh boi vae lan khyh`ae, hung nynh sanmah minmin kha ka kuih kyate yn lua kho vae lan khyh.
Minmin kha kamaw kalan yn pyatupaw ka Paaw tuh hunghung balyn laeze a lesaehua, te hung nynh sanmah minmin kha ka Paaw kuih kyate lua kho lan khyh.
Kae te ka Paaw tuh ccangkheit nynh kae thua,” a ci.
Oute Jew`ae nynh amaw kha deih lan cite lung bua a khuinnuaku`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Ka Paaw kya-e ahoypaw ryalaw patae kha nanning phe kae langsapyaku vae oh, khae` ae kyaze pawtecihpaw ryalaw keiccu mou nanning nynh lung te deihbia lan nae ci oh?” a ci.

Jew`ae nynh amaw kha khung`ae zah, “Ahoypaw ryalaw keiccu nang kha kae deih lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia thethyasabya na ho keiccu, te nang tuh ccungccaw mang na thua pite namaw te namaw Pachia lang na tangsaku keiccu nynh kae deih cih,” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Nae Kawbya kya, ‘Nanning tuh pachia`ae nynh na thua oh, ka ci,’ cite zeikuh khyh tou?
Pachia bya mih kalan a thua paw minmin kha aning nynh pachia`ae a ci lanze, (te Ccathyaa tuh roh kho lan khyh).
Paaw nynh phe a thyaasah vae paw te laephipi kalan a saw vae paw amaw kha, ‘Kae tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh ka thua,’ ka ci keiccuze, nanning nynh, ‘Nang tuh Pachia thethyasabya na ho,’ nae ci oh tou?
Ka Paaw ryalaw`ae kha ka law khyh lanze, kamaw hynh oun zyn nan oh.
Thuasalama ka law lanze, kamaw hynh nae zyn khyh oh zemah ryalaw`ae kha zyn oh, ou tuhte Paaw tuh kamaw kya um zah kae tuh amaw kya ka um paw kha nae nyh cih oh zah nae zyn oh ccaw,” a ci.
