Tukeiccu minmin nynh amaw kha kyng lan bua a ccung`ae, thuasalama mih kuih kyate phe a lue.
Te Jesu tuh Jordan vaw khuraw langkhe bua cceih zah Johan nynh masaty baptisma insahnaw kyakhe a um.
Te ccungccaw patae amaw kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Johan nynh muihsanaw kharyh langsakuh khyh; thuasalama hynh-e Ccungccapaw konglang Johan nynh a hopaw balyn tuh marya ahme,” a ci`ae.
Te tuin kyakhe ccungccaw patae nynh amaw kha a zyn`ae.
Meri te a unung Martha`ae khua, Bethani khua paw Lazaruh cikuh paw lukheitpaw tuh a la ccih.
Accihpaw Lazaruh a ccianung tuh Bawipaw kha mynkhuhpaw sathothuhpah zah a ccu kha a sang te a fupah paw Meri nynh thua.
Tukeiccu a ccianung`ae nynh Bawipaw kalan ccungccaw saw`ae zah, “Bawipaw, dotua, na sungsahpaw ccungccapaw tuh accih,” cite a hosapya`ae.
Jesu nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh, “Hynh-e ccinaw tuh chinaw phah lanpaw thua khyh; thuasalama Pachia phu-enaw hanlan, ou tuhte Pachia Ccapaw phu-e ccou nawlan nynh thua,” a ci.
Jesu nynh Martha, a neitanung, te Lazaruh kha a sungsah`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu nynh Lazaruh accih cipaw he a thae te, tuin a umnaw kya maw khe nin ning bua a um ung.
Ou tuhkoute Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae kha, “Judah ram lang bua cceih ccavae oh sih,” a cipya`ae.
Zuitu`ae nynh, “Rabbi, Jew`ae nynh atumaw khaw nang kha lung te deih lan ae ccung`ae, te tuhlang tuh ccia lan bua na cih tou?” a cipya`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Khuadae kya suimilan haw laening um khyh tou? Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh khuadae kya a ccia ze thykuh khyh, pawkeiccumacize hynh-e laephipi kya-e awnaw liate ngaw a muihkuh.
Thuasalama ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh khuazi kya a ccia ze a thykuh, pawkeiccumacize amaw kya awnaw um khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
Hynh-e`ae kong hynh Jesu nynh a ho, te he a ho koute, “Ah banpaw Lazaruh tuh a ih, tuhzemah amaw kha tho khylan kae ka cceih cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute a zuitu`ae nynh, “Bawipaw, aning tuh a i lanze, phe yn hoy cih,” a ci`ae.
Tuhzemah Jesu nynh tuh Lazaruh a chinaw kong kha nynh a ho, thuasalama minmin nynh tuh a i ccaccing paw nynh a ho cite a tua`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh, “Lazaruh tuh a chih vae,” cite ccaerarihlan a hopya`ae.
“Te nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh, tuin kya kae ka la um khyh paw tuh nae hanlan ka lungtua, atu amaw kalan aening cceih oh sih,” a ci.
Oute Didymas acikuh paw Thomas nynh, “Bawipaw ryte ah chibua ccaw oh, aening mah cceihbua oh sih,” cite zuitu a ruiban`ae kha a hopya`ae.
Oute Jesu he yn thua tuh, Lazaruh kha shaw lungkhu a ccynaw`ae te nin pali phe acih vae cipaw a ny.
Atu Bethani khua tuh Jerusalem te anaekuh, me ning loukaw nynh asaw.
Te Martha te Meri tuh mih raepaw a chi keiccu minmin kha umkhae khylan Jew`ae patae oun thua`ae.
Oute Martha nynh Jesu yn thua cipaw he a thae tuh, cceih zah Jesu kha a duehaw; thuasalama Meri tuh innvaw nynh phang a dahung.
Oute Martha nynh, “Bawipaw, e kya nang na um lanze, ka rae paw a chih cih leipaw.
Thuasalama atumaw Pachia kalan nang nynh na ngia paw miakaw tuh Pachia nynh ae pya cih cipaw ka ny,” cite Jesu kha a hopya.
Jesu nynh, “Na rae paw bua yn tho cih,” a cipya.
Martha nynh, “Nyathyakou nin kya, thothuinaw kya aning tuh bua yn tho cih cipaw tuh ka ny,” cite a khung.
Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh thothuinaw te hiinnaw nynh ka thua; kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh a chi zemah bua a hiin cih.
Te kamaw yn zyn zah a hiinpaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh chih boi vae lan khyh. Hynh-e bya hynh na zyn tou?” cite a khia.
Martha nynh, “Ou, Bawipaw, nang tuh laephipi kalan yn thua paw, Pachia Ccapaw, Kri nynh na thua cipaw ka zyn,” cite a khung.
Te tuhcihte he a ho koute, Martha nynh cceih zah a neitanung Meri kha aphiru lante zya ko zah, “Ccangpatupaw yn thua vae, te nang kha ae ko,” a cipya.
Tuh-e bya kha Meri nynh he a thae tuh, arangte thokuh zah Jesu kalan a cceih.
Jesu tuh tuh-e ccyh lya khualae lungkhu lang yn thua loh khyh, thuasalama Martha te a tungkunaw`ae kya nynh a um ung.
Innvaw kya Meri a umkhae`ae paw Jew`ae nynh, Meri nynh arangte thokuh zah a ccia paw kha he muih`ae tuh, “Shawku lang raw khylan nynh a ccia,” cih`ae zah amaw kha a zui`ae.
Oute Meri nynh Jesu a umnaw kyakhe thua zah amaw kha he a muih tuh, a ccu leihpaw khe bakhung zah, “Bawipaw, e kya nang na um ze, ka raepaw a chih cih leipaw,” cite a hopya.
Meri te amaw ryte oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae nynh a raw`ae paw kha Jesu nynh he a muih tuh myarya a thinlungccih zah a lungvawsaw.
Te, “Teisangmou Lazaruh kha na ccy oh?” a ci. Minmin nynh, “Bawipaw, rang lah yn dotua,” a ci`ae.
Jesu a rah.
Oute Jew`ae nynh, “Dotua oh, Lazaruh kha pawcih babang mou a sungsah!” a ci`ae.
Te abang nynh, “Mitmohpaw a mit a awsah paw e Ccungccapaw nynh Lazaruh kha chi leite umsah kho khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
Tuhkoute Jesu tuh a thinlungccih ki zah shaw kalan a thua. Tuh-e shaw tuh lungkarung thua zah lung te phang a fu`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Lung kha nue oh,” a ci. Te achihpaw a ccianung Martha nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, atu tuh phe thuh vae cih, pawccecize a chinaw te nin pali acih vae,” cite a hopya.
Jesu nynh Martha kha, “Na zyn lanze Pachia phu-enaw na muih cih cite nang kha kae hopah khyh tou?” a cipya.
Oute minmin nynh achihpaw a ccynaw`ae kyate lung kha a nue`ae. Te Jesu nynh dothung zah, “Apang, ka bya nae thaepya vae keiccu na tungvaw ka lungtua.

Te ka bya hynh nang nynh pei leih nae thaepya cipaw ka ny; thuasalama ka pe thadyn paw ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw tuh nang nynh na saw paw cipaw kha a zyn ccaw`ae cite, minmin khylan nynh hynhte ka ho,” a ci.
Te hynhcihte Jesu nynh he a ho koute, “Lazaruh, yn pou!” cite thawte a sia.
Te achihpaw ccungccapaw tuh yn pou zah a kuih te a ccu kha shaw uccaw te phang vekuh. A mae mah pavua te phang khiidekuh. Te Jesu nynh, “Amaw kha phoupah oh lah cceih sah,” a ci.
Oute Meri kalan oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae patae nynh Jesu nynh a cyi paw uccaw kha muih`ae zah amaw kha a zyn`ae.
Thuasalama ccungccaw abang tuh Farasi`ae kalan cceih`ae zah Jesu nynh a cyi paw uccaw kong kha a hopya`ae.
Oute alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh Sanhedrin kungsi meting ko`ae zah, “Aening nynh pawte cyi lan? Pawccecize e paw nynh muihsanaw`ae patae a langsaku vae.
Amaw kha hynhcihte aening nynh ah sawphah oh lanze, ccungccaw balyn nynh amaw kha oun zyn cih`ae, te Rom`ae nynh oun thua cih`ae zah ah umnaw oh te ah minphuin hynh phe oun lawpah cih`ae,” a ci`ae.
Te minmin lakuze tuh-e kum kya ranpibawi lupi lukheit athua paw Kaiafas nynh, “Nanning pawsang kharyh na nyh khyh oh.
Minphuin khaleih aro khyh nawlan, ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccungccaw`ae hanlan a chi lanpaw tuh aening hanlan ahoyhua cipaw mah na tuase khyh oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te hynh-e bya hynh amaw kaw te ho khyh, thuasalama tuh-e kum kya ranpibawi athua thyhhawte, Jesu tuh kha-e minphuin hanlan yn chih vae cih cipaw te,
kha-e minphuin hanlan kyalya thua leite, phe a phiakuh`ae paw Pachia ccaaw`ae kha pynkheihlan suelua khylan, yn chih cih cipaw profehbya a ho paw nynh thua.
Oute kha-e nin kyate vae tuh amaw kha chia lan minmin tuh khuakhankuh vae`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu tuh Jew`ae laku phe alangkuh lante cceih vae khyh, thuasalama tuin kyate rangkaw te anaekunaw Efrim cikuh paw khua lungkhu lang cceih zah tuin kya a zuitu`ae ryte a um`ae.
Te Jew`ae Kawtaw Poi tuh nae vae zah ccungccaw patae nynh Kawtaw Poi maw mimaw te mimaw ccikanku khylan khua taraw kyate Jerusalem lang oun cceihthung`ae.
Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha a ccung`ae; te tempal kin thadyn`ae zah, “Pawcihte na tua oh? Aning tuh poi kalan yn thuabua lan khyh tou?” cite mimaw te mimaw a hokuh`ae.
Te alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh Jesu kha teikya nynh um cipaw a ny lanze amaw kha kyng khylan, minmin kalan a thaesah cih,” cite kaw phe a pya vae`ae.
Oute Kawtaw Poi azaw maw nin taruh ary kya, phe chih zah a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Lazaruh umnaw Bethani khua khe Jesu yn thua.
Tuin kya minmin nynh amaw kha zerya paccynpah`ae zah Martha tuh a thohae; thuasalama Lazaruh tuh Jesu ryte ccaboi kya a dahung`ae paw kya a umbua.
Oute Meri nynh myarya aphutepaw, accipaw spaiknard satho pound kheit kha lawkuh zah Jesu ccu kha thuh zah a ccu kha a sang te a fupya; te inn tuh satho myn te phe abeih.
Oute a zuitu`ae lukheit athua paw, Jesu kha a phee vae cih paw, Simon ccapaw Judas Iskaria nynh,
“Pawccemou hynh-e spaiknard satho hynh denari phua zathung lang a zua khyh, te ryachi`ae kha a pya khyh?” a ci.
Hynhte a hopaw tuh ryachi`ae hanlan a tua keiccu thua khyh, thuasalama aning tuh miruhpaw athua keiccu phua bawng kha ccy zah kha-e lungkhu lang a sang`ae paw kha leih a lawku keiccu nynh thua.
Oute Jesu nynh, “E nung hynh khamawte um sah; ka rhua ccy nin hanlan hynh-e hynh a cyi paw nynh thua.
Pawccecize ryachi`ae tuh nanning kya pei a um he`ae, thuasalama kae tuh nanning kya pei ka um lan khyh,” a ci.
Oute Jew ccungccaw`ae patae nynh Jesu tuh tuin kya a um cipaw a ny`ae, te minmin nynh Jesu a um keiccu kyalya thua leite a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Lazaruh kha mah muih khylan cite oun thua`ae.
Thuasalama alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh Lazaruh kha mah chia lan cite khuakhanku`ae.
Pawkeiccumacize amaw keiccuze Jew`ae patae nynh pou`ae zah Jesu kha a zyn`ae.
Tuh-e nin koute poi kalan oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw patae nynh Jesu Jerusalem lang yn thua cipaw he a thae`ae tuh,
saruitah ku ange`ae kha ccyngkute Jesu kha duehaw lan cceih`ae zah, “Hosanna! BAWIPAW min te yn thua paw Israel Siapharan tuh hythuaccou sah!” cite a sia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh anopaw lann kha he a muih tuh a tungvaw a cciku; tuh-e tuh;
“Zion ccanung rih nan; dotua, na Siapharan tuh anopaw lann tungvaw ccikute yn thua cciamang,” cite azeiku hawkhate nynh thua.

Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh a zuitu`ae nynh atakaw lya tuh thaethya khyh`ae, thuasalama Jesu phu-esah he athua vae te, hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh amaw konglang azeikuh paw cipaw te hynh-e uccaw`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kalan nynh a cyi`ae cipaw kha minmin nynh a liathui vae`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu nynh shaw lungkhu kya-e Lazaruh kha ko zah a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah lyaze amaw ryte a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kong kha ccaekiakhan`ae.
Kha-e muihsanaw kha aning nynh phe a langsaku cipaw a thae`ae keiccu ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha a cciadue`ae.
Tukeiccu Farasi`ae nynh mimaw te mimaw laku, “Nanning nynh na tae vae lan khyh oh cipaw hynh nykuh oh, dotua oh, laephipi tuh amaw nuhlang nynh a zuiku vae!” cite a hoku`ae.
Te Pachia beik khylan cite poi kalan oun thua`ae paw laku Greek`ae abang a umbua`ae.
Tukeiccu kha-e`ae nynh Galilee pee, Bethsaida khua paw Filip kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Bawihaepaw, kaening nynh Jesu kha kae muih ry,” cite a ngia`ae.
Filip nynh cceih zah Andru kha a hopya; te Andru te Filip nynh Jesu kha bua a hopya`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha phu-esah nawlan accyh athua vae.
Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, chanvui ccacii nynh laephi lungkhu lang ccah khyh zah a chi khyh lanze amawte nynh phang a um; thuasalama a chi lanze athae patae a poukhae.
Amaw hiinnaw kha a sungsahpaw ccungccaw tuh kha-e kha a shung cih; te hynh-e laephipi kya amaw hiinnaw kha a hua paw ccungccaw tuh kha-e kha zungzae hiinnaw hanlan a ccykuh cih.

Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw kha rya yn lawpya ze, kamaw hynh yn zui sah; te kamaw ka umnaw kya, rya yn lawpatu mah a umbua cih; lukhakheit nynh kamaw kha rya yn lawpya ze, kha-e paw kha ka Paaw nynh sawtuanaw a pya cih.
“Atu ka hiinnaw-muisaw a lungriathae, te pawcihte ka ho cih? ‘Apang, hynh-e ccyh kyate yn khum,’ thuasalama e konglang nynh e ccyh kalan ka thua.
Apang, na min hynh phu-esah,” a ci. Oute tuin kya vaawran kyate roi yn ccae zah, “Phe phu ka esah vae, te bua phu ka esah ung cih,” a ci.
Tukeiccu tuin kya a thadyn`ae paw ccungccaw zapi nynh kha-e roi kha thae`ae zah, “Kholung thyh,” cite a ho`ae; abang nynh, “Vaaw ccungccapaw nynh amaw kalan byaho,” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh khung`ae zah, “Kamaw hanlan hynh-e roi tuh yn thua khyh, thuasalama nanning hanlan nynh yn thua.
Atu hynh-e laephipi tuh byapia athua, atu hynh-e laephipi uktu tuh ccaring dee athua cih.
Te kae tuh laephi kyate saethung ka thua vae ze, ccungccaw`ae balyn kha kamaw kalan ka dungbua cih`ae,” a ci.
Hynh-e bya a hopaw tuh pawtahawpaw chinaw te nynh ka chih vae cih cipaw kha a langsapya`ae paw nynh thua.

Ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha khung`ae zah, “Kri tuh zungzae atyn cih cite Kawbya kyate kaening nynh kae thae, te pawcihtemou nang nynh, ‘Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh saethung yn thua cih,’ na cipaw tu? Tuh-e Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh hungmou?” a ci`ae.

Oute Jesu nynh, “Sosohtari kya awnaw tuh nanning kya a um, awnaw na hoi lya oh hin cceih oh, tukhyhze mohnaw nynh ae kyng sei cih oh, pawccecize mohnaw kya a cceih paw ccungccaw tuh teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw nykuh khyh.
Awnaw na hoi lya oh hin awnaw ccaaw`ae na thua oh ccaw, awnaw kha zyn oh,” a cipya`ae. Jesu nynh hynh-e`ae a ho koute minmin kyate pou zah zya a rekuh.
Jesu nynh muihsanaw`ae patae kha minmin malang a langsaku zemah minmin nynh amaw kha zyn khyh`ae.
Profeh Isaiah nynh, “Bawipaw, kaening nynh kae hopaw bya kha hung nynh mou a zyn? BAWIPAW kuihthaw tuh hung kalan mou langsapyakute a um?” cite a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh zyn kho khyh`ae; pawkeiccumacize Isaiah nynh bua a hopaw tuh;

“Minmin nynh mih mit te a muih khyh nawlan`ae, mih thinlung te a thaethya khyh nawlan`ae, mih mit kha mohsah`ae zah mih thinlung kha a khungsah`ae, tukhyh lanze phe paleihkuh cih`ae zah phe ka dansah cih`ae paw,” a ci.
Isaiah nynh Bawipaw phuenaw kha he muih zah amaw konglang a ho lyakhe nynh hynhe bya`ae hynh a ho.
Tuhzemah uktu`ae patae nynh heize amaw kha a zyn`ae; thuasalama Farasi`ae keiccuze minmin nynh kae zyn cite ccaekiakhan khyh`ae. Ccaekiakhan`ae ze sinakok kyate phe a dee cih`ae.
Pawccecize minmin tuh ccungccaw`ae nynh thehoysapaw kha Pachia nynh thehoysapaw laeze a ryhua`ae.
Jesu nynh thawte sia zah, “Kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw kyalya yn zyn paw thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a zyn paw nynh thua.
Te kamaw yn muih paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a muih.
Kamaw yn zyn paw miakaw nynh mohnaw kya pei a um khyh nawlan`ae kae tuh awnaw hawte laephipi kalan kae thua.

“Te ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh ka bya thae zah a zyn khyh ze, amaw kha bya ka pia khyh; pawccecize kae tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae byapia khylan kae thua khyh, thuasalama laephi ccungccaw`ae khum khylan nynh kae thua.
Kamaw kha yn vua zah ka bya a lawkuh leipaw ccungccaw kha byapia cih paw a um; ka hopaw ka bya ccaccei nynh amaw kha nyathyakou nin kya byapia cih.
Pawccecize kamaw kaw te bya ka ho khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw ka Paaw nynh ka ho lanpaw te ka ccae lanpaw kha kaw phe yn pya vae.
Te a kawpyapaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw nynh thua cipaw ka ny, tukeiccu ka hopaw miakaw tuh ka Paaw nynh kamaw kalan yn hopya thyhte nynh ka ho,” a ci.

Kawtaw Poi a thua maw, Jesu nynh hynh-e laephipi kyate Paaw kalan a pou nawlan accyh azaw vae cipaw he a nyh tuh, laephipi kya a um`ae paw amaw a ccungccaw`ae kha sungsah`ae zah athangnaw cia minmin kha a sungsah`ae.
Te zerya a ae`ae koute Jesu kha phee lan diabolos nynh Simon ccapaw Judas Iskaria thinlung lungkhu lang phe a sang vae.
Paaw nynh pawpaw balyn kha amaw kuih lungkhu lang marya a pya vae paw kha thuasah, aning tuh Pachia kyate yn thua paw kha thuasah, te Pachia kalan a ccia lanpaw kha thuasah Jesu nynh a ny pawte,
zerya aenaw kyate thokuh zah avawlan e uccaw`ae kha khakuh zah fukunawpaw pavua kha lawkuh zah a cce kya a veku.
Tuhkoute tui kha pakekhupaw lungkhu lang ccae zah a zuitu`ae ccu kha a singpya`ae, te a cce kya a vekupaw fukunawpaw pavua khate a fupya`ae.
Te Simon Piter kya he a thua tuh, Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, nang nynh ka ccu nae sing cih tou?” a ci.
Te Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ka cyi paw hynh atu nang nynh na nyh khyh, thuasalama nyalang nae nyh cih,” a cipya.
Piter nynh amaw kha, “Nang nynh ka ccu kharyh nae sing lan khyh!” a cipya. Jesu nynh khung zah, “Nang kha kae sing khyh ze, nang tuh kamaw te na sekuh bua lan khyh,” a cipya.
Simon Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, ka ccu kyalya thua leite ka kuih te ka lu kha mah yn sing bia,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “Tui phe singkuh vae paw ccungccaw tuh khaleih phe thyaa vae zah a ccu kyalya nynh sing aho vae; te nanning tuh na thyaa vae oh, thuasalama nae balynte tuh na thyaa khyh oh,” a cipya.
Pawccecize hung nynh amaw kha yn phee cih cipaw phe a ny vae; tukeiccu nynh, “Nae balynte tuh na thyaa khyh oh,” a ci.
Te mih ccu`ae kha phe a sing koute, a uccaw kha lawkuh zah bua a dahung, te, “Nanning kya ka cyi paw hynh na nyh oh tou?
Nanning nynh kamaw hynh Ccangpatu cite, Bawipaw cite nae ko oh; te na ho oh paw tuh akyhpaw nynh thua, pawccecize kae tuh ka thua sasaw.
Oute nae Bawipaw te Ccangpatu ka thua pite, kae nynh nae ccu`ae kha kae singpya oh ze, nanning mah lukheit te lukheit nae ccu`ae na singpyaku oh aho.
Pawccecize nanning kya ka cyi hawte nanning nynh mah na cyibua oh ccaw cite dosuinku lanpaw phe kae pyasya vae oh.
Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, see tuh a bawipaw laeze lehua khyh, saw paw ccungccaw mah a sawtupaw laeze lehua khyh.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh na nyh oh zah na cyi oh lanze nanning tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh.

“Nanning balynte asekuh lante ka ho khyh, ka po`ae paw kha ka ny`ae, thuasalama Ccathyaa accing nawlan, ‘Kamaw ryte sanlou a aekheih paw nynh kamaw kha rawsete a ccu yn hangnua,’ cikuh paw Ccathyaa accing nawlan nynh thua.
Tuh-e he yn cyiku vae ze kae tuh aning nynh ka thua cipaw nae zyn nawlan oh, kha-e acyiku maw atu nanning kae hopya oh.
Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ka saw paw lehkhan paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw kha yn lehkhan; te kamaw yn lehkhan paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha a lehkhan paw nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Jesu nynh tuhte he a ho koute, a muisaw a lungvawsaw zah, “Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning laku-e lukheit nynh kamaw hynh yn ah cih,” cite ccaekiakhan zah a ho.
Oute zuitu`ae tuh lukheit te lukheit dokuh`ae zah hung vema a honuathe cite a tuakuh`ae.
Zuitu`ae laku Jesu nynh a sungsahpaw lukheitpaw tuh Jesu by kya phang a ngeikuh.
Tukeiccu hung vema a honuathe cipaw kha a khia ccaw cite Simon Piter nynh kha-e paw kha syntawnaw a pya.
Oute Jesu by kya a ngeikuh paw nynh, “Bawipaw, aning tuh hungmou athua?” cite Jesu kha a khia.
Jesu nynh, “Aning tuh sanlou paekia kha moh he ka dung te ka pya cih paw ccungccaw nynh athua,” cite a khung. Te sanlou paekia kha moh dung zah kha-e kha Simon ccapaw Judas Iskaria kha a pya.
Te sanlou paekia kha Judas nynh a lawkuh koute Setan nynh a lungkhu lang a tee vae. Te Jesu nynh, “Na cyi paw kha arangte cyih,” a cipya.
Pawkeiccumou e bya hynh kha-e paw kalan a ho cipaw kha ccaboi kya a ae`ae paw laku lukheit nynh sanmah nyh khyh`ae.

Pawccecize Judas Iskaria tuh phua bu a ccytu thua keiccuze, Jesu nynh amaw kha, “Poi kya ah hanlan ahopaw uccaw`ae kha la re,” a cipya, tukhyhze ryachi`ae kha ccangkhakheit a pya ccaw cite nynh, hynhte a hopya cite abang nynh a tua`ae.
Oute Judas Iskaria tuh sanlou paekia kha he a lawkuh koute vaekheihmawte po a pou; tuh-e ccyh tuh khuazi nynh thua.
Tuhte aning he a pou tuh Jesu nynh, “Atu Ccungccaw Ccapaw tuh phu-esah thua vae zah Pachia mah Ccungccaw Ccapaw liate phu-esah athua vae.
Pachia tuh Ccungccaw Ccapaw liate phu-esah thua ze, Pachia nynh mah aning kha amaw ccaccei kya phu-esah cih, te aro mawze Ccungccaw Ccapaw kha phu-esah cih.

“Ccaaw taraw`ae, kae tuh nanning ryte sosoh taraw nynh ka um cih. Nanning nynh kamaw kha nae ccung cih oh, te, ‘Ka ccianaw lang nanning nae thua kho lan khyh oh,’ cite Jew`ae kha ka hopya vae`ae hawte, atu nanning mah kae hopya oh.
“Nanning lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh. Kae nynh nanning kae sungsah oh hawte nanning mah lukheit te lukheit na sungsaku nawlan oh athawpaw kawpyapaw kha nanning kae pya oh.
Nanning nynh lukheit te lukheit sungsakunaw na hoi oh ze, kha-e liate ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh nanning tuh kamaw zuitu`ae cipaw ae nyh cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Simon Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, teilangmou na cceih cih?” cite a khia. Jesu nynh, “Ka ccianaw lang atu nang nynh nae zui kho lan khyh, thuasalama nyalang nang nynh nae zui cih,” cite a khung.
Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, pawccemou atu nang kae zui kho lan khyh? Na hanlan ka hiinnaw ka pyakuh cih,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ka hanlan na hiinnaw tuh na pyakuh cih tou? Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya, nang nynh kamaw hynh vaethung nae vua cia awkhungpaw yn khua la lan khyh.
“Nae thinlung vawsaw nan sah, Pachia kha zyn oh lah kamaw mah oun zyn oh.
Ka Paaw inn kya umnaw khaan patae a um; a um khyh lanze um khyh cipaw phe kae hopah vae cih oh. Nanning hanlan umnaw paccyn khylan ka la cceih cih.
Te kae nynh ka cceih zah nanning hanlan umnaw he kae paccyn vae ze, bua kae thua cih zah nanning kha kamaw kalan kae hoeibua cih oh, ou khate kamaw ka umnaw kya nanning mah na umbua ccaw oh.
Te teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw na nyh oh zah ccianaw kha na ny oh,” a ci.
Thomas nynh, “Bawipaw, teilang nynh na ccia cipaw kae nyh khyh, te pawtemou ccianaw tuh kae nyh kho cih?” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh laanpi byaccing te hiinnaw nynh ka thua; kamaw leite tuh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Paaw kalan thua kho khyh.
“Nanning nynh kamaw hynh phe nae ny oh ze, ka Paaw kha mah phe na nyh cih oh paw; te atu kyate Paaw kha na nyh oh zah amaw kha phe na muih vae oh,” a ci.
Filip nynh, “Bawipaw, Paaw kha kaening oun muihsah lah tuh-e tuh kaening hanlan azaw vae,” a cipya.

Jesu nynh, “Nanning ryte kae tuh khaw cia ka um vae, te kamaw hynh nae nyh loh khyh oh tou Filip? Kamaw phe yn muih vae paw ccungccaw tuh Paaw kha mah phe a muih vae; te pawcihtemou nang nynh, ‘Paaw kha kaening oun muihsah,’ na cipaw tuh?
Kae tuh Paaw kya ka um zah Paaw tuh kamaw kya a um cipaw hynh na zyn khyh tou? Nanning kalan ka hopaw bya`ae hynh kamaw kaw te ka ho khyh, thuasalama kamaw kya a um paw Paaw nynh ryalaw a lah.
Kae tuh Paaw kya ka um cipaw te Paaw tuh kamaw kya a um cipaw hynh oun zyn oh, tukhyh zemah kha-e ryalaw`ae keiccu kamaw hynh oun zyn oh.

Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, kamaw yn zyn paw ccungccaw tuh ka cyi paw ryalaw`ae kha a cyihbua cih; te hynh-e`ae lae alepaw ryalaw kha mah a cyi cih; pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih.
Te Paaw tuh Ccapaw kya phu-e a ccou nawlan nanning nynh ka min te nae ngia oh paw miakaw kha kae cyipah cih oh.
Nanning nynh ka min te ccangkhakheit nae ngia oh ze, nae ngia oh paw kha kae cyipah cih oh.
“Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah oh ze ka kawpyapaw`ae hynh zui oh.
Te kae nynh Paaw kha kae ngia cih zah aning nynh ccangpaw Pangkhaetu kha nanning ae pya cih oh, ou tuhte aning tuh nanning ryte zungzae a um ccaw.

Aning tuh byaccing nysatupaw Muisaw nynh thua, tuh-e Muisaw tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh ccou kho khyh`ae, pawkeiccumacize amaw kha muih khyh`ae zah nyh khyh`ae; thuasalama nanning nynh amaw kha na ny oh, pawccecize aning tuh nanning ryte um zah nanning kya a um cih.
Ngawraw`ae hawte nanning kha kae cciataw lan khyh oh; nanning kalan bua kae thua cih.
Sosoh acih koute laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw hynh oun muih vae lan khyh`ae, thuasalama nanning nynh tuh nae muih cih oh, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka hiin, nanning mah na hiinbua cih oh.
Tuh-e nin kya kae tuh ka Paaw kya ka um paw te nanning kamaw kya na um oh paw, te kae nanning kya ka um paw kha nanning nynh nae nyh cih oh.

Ka kawpyapaw`ae kha hoi zah kha-e`ae a zui paw ccungccaw tuh kamaw yn sungsahpaw nynh thua, te kamaw yn sungsahpaw kha ka Paaw nynh a sungsah cih, te kae nynh mah ka sungsah cih zah kamaw kha a kalan ka muihsakuh cih,” a ci.
Iskaria athua leipaw, ccangpaw Judas nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, namaw kha laephi ccungccaw`ae muihsaku leite pawcihtemou kaening kha nae muihsakuh vae cih?” a cipya.

Jesu nynh khung zah, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh kamaw yn sungsah lanze, ka bya`ae kha a ngae cih; te ka Paaw nynh amaw kha a sungsah cih, te kaening nynh amaw kalan kae thua cih zah amaw ryte umnaw kae raekuh cih.
Kamaw yn sungsah leipaw ccungccaw nynh tuh ka hopaw bya kha ngae khyh, te na thae oh paw bya hynh kamaw kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama kamaw yn sawtupaw ka Paaw kya-e nynh thua.
“Nanning ryte phang ka um lya hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh nanning kae hopya vae oh.
Thuasalama ka min liate Paaw nynh yn saw lanpaw Pangkhaetu, Thyaa Muisaw nynh pawpaw balyn ae ccangpah cih oh zah nanning kae hopya oh paw miakaw kha ae liathuisah cih oh.
Daenaw nanning kya kae cciatawpya oh, ka kya-e daenaw kha nanning kae pya oh; laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a pya`ae hawte nanning kae pya khyh oh. Nae thinlung vawsaw nan sah lah ri mah rih nan sah.

“ ‘Kae ka la cceih cih zah nanning kalan bua kae thua cih,’ cite kae hopya oh paw kha phe na thae vae oh. Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah oh ze, ‘Paaw kalan ka cceih cih,’ ka ci keiccu tuh nae lungtua cih; pawccecize ka Paaw tuh kae laeze a lesaehua.
Te kha-e he yn cyiku vae ze, nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh, kha-e acyiku maw atu nanning kha phe kae hopya vae oh.
Atu koute kae tuh nanning ryte bya patae ka ho vae lan khyh, pawccecize hynh-e laephipi uktupaw tuh yn thua cciamang, tuhzemah aning nynh kamaw kya pawsang mah kaw hoi khyh.

Thuasalama kae nynh Paaw kha ka sungsah cipaw te, Paaw nynh kamaw kha kaw yn pya thyhhawte kae nynh ka cyi cipaw kha laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a ny nawlan`ae nynh thua. Thokuh oh, e kyate cceih ccavae oh sih.
“Kae tuh misu ku ccaccing nynh ka thua, te ka Paaw tuh khokhu dooihtupaw nynh thua.
Kamaw kya athae thae leipaw aran miakaw kha aning nynh phya bae kou, te athae thae paw aran miakaw kha houh a thae nawlan teihpah zah a ccikanpya.
Kae hopya oh paw bya liate atu nanning tuh na thyaa vae oh.
Kamaw kya tyn oh lah kae mah nanning kya ka tyn cih. Aran nynh misu ku kya atyn khyh lanze amaw te amaw athae thae kho khyh hawte, nanning mah kamaw kya na tyn khyh oh ze na thae kho lan khyh oh.
“Kae tuh misu ku, nanning tuh aran`ae; kamaw kya atynpaw ccungccaw tuh kae mah amaw kya ka tyn, kha-e paw tuh athae patae thae; pawccecize kamaw leite nanning nynh pawsang na cyih kho khyh oh.

Ccungccaw lukheit nynh kamaw kya atyn khyh lanze aning tuh aran hawte ccaring vua athua, te karae arou; khahtahawpaw aran`ae kha ccungccaw`ae nynh suelua`ae zah maee lungkhu lang moh phung`ae, te maee nynh pung a u.
Nanning nynh kamaw kya na tyn oh zah ka bya`ae nynh nanning kya atyn ze, na ry oh paw kha nae ngia cih oh zah kha-e kha nanning hanlan cyipya athua cih.
Nanning nynh athae patae na thae oh liate ka Paaw tuh phu-esah athua, ou tuhte nanning tuh ka zuitu`ae na thua cih oh.
“Paaw nynh kamaw kha yn sungsah hawte nanning kha kae sungsah oh; ka sungsanaw kyahin tyn oh.
Kae nynh ka Paaw kawpyapaw`ae kha ka zui zah a sungsanaw kya ka tyn hawte nanning nynh ka kawpyapaw`ae hynh na zui oh ze ka sungsanaw kya na tyn cih oh.
Nanning kya ka lungtuanaw a um nawlan te nae lungtuanaw phe accing nawlan nynh hynh-e bya`ae hynh kae hopya oh.
Ka kawpyapaw tuh e hynh nynh thua, kae nynh nanning kae sungsah oh hawte nanning mah lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh.
Ccungccaw lukheit nynh a ban`ae hanlan a hiinnaw pyakupaw, hynh-e lae ale huapaw sungsakunaw tuh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah hoi khyh.
Kaw kae pya oh paw miakaw kha nanning nynh na cyi oh ze nanning tuh ka ban`ae nynh na thua oh.

Atu te nanning hynh see`ae kae ci vae khyh oh; pawccecize see nynh tuh a bawipaw nynh a cyi paw kha nyh khyh; thuasalama nanning kha ka ban`ae kae ci vae oh; pawccecize ka Paaw kyate ka thae paw balyn kha nanning kalan marya kae nysah oh.

Nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae pokuh khyh oh; thuasalama kae nynh nanning kha kae po oh; te nanning nynh na cceih oh zah athae na thae nawlan oh, te nanning nae thae tuh atyn nawlan, te nanning nynh ka min te Paaw kya-e na ngiaku oh paw miakaw aning nynh ae pya nawlan oh nanning kha kae khang vae oh.
Nanning lukheit te lukheit na sungsaku nawlan oh hynh-e`ae hynh kaw kae pya oh.
“Laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh nanning kha ae hua oh ze, nanning kha ae hua maw oh khe kamaw kha oun hua`ae cipaw la nyh oh.

Nanning tuh laephipi kya-e na thua oh ze, laephipi nynh amaw kya-e tuh a sungsah cih; thuasalama nanning tuh laephipi kya-e na thua khyh oh keiccu, te kae nynh laephipi kyate phe kae po vae oh, tukeiccu nynh laephipi nynh nanning kha ae hua oh.

‘See tuh a bawipaw laeze lehua khyh,’ cite kae hopya oh paw ka bya kha liathui oh. Minmin nynh kamaw kha oun tua oun sah`ae ze nanning kha mah ae tua ae sah cih oh; minmin nynh ka bya kha a ngae`ae ze nanning bya kha mah a la ngae cih`ae.
Thuasalama kamaw min keiccuze minmin nynh hynh-e`ae balyn hynh nanning kalan a la cyi cih`ae, pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh kamaw yn sawtupaw kha nyh khyh`ae.
Kae nynh kae thua khyh zah mih kalan ka la ho khyh zetuh minmin tuh seinaw la hoi lan khyh`ae paw, thuasalama atu mih seinaw hanlan a dansaku nawlan`ae paw hoi khyh`ae.
Kamaw yn hua paw ccungccaw tuh ka Paaw kha mah a hua paw nynh thua.

Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah a cyi leipaw ryalaw`ae kha minmin laku kae nynh phe ka la cyi khyh ze, minmin tuh seinaw la hoi lan khyh`ae paw, thuasalama atu minmin nynh phe muih vae`ae zah kamaw te ka Paaw kha paryh oun hua`ae.
Thuasalama, ‘Akong um leite kamaw hynh minmin nynh oun hua`ae,’ cite mih Kawbya kya azeikuh paw bya accing nawlan nynh hynh-e hynh acyikuh.
“Thuasalama Paaw kyate nanning kalan kae nynh kae saw lanpaw, Paaw kyate yn pou paw, byaccing Muisaw athua paw, Pangkhaetu tuh he yn thua vae ze, aning nynh kamaw kong kha ccaekia yn khan cih.
Te atakaw te kamaw ryte na um oh keiccuze nanning mah ccaekia na la khan cih oh.
“Nanning nae lungthang khyh nawlan hynh-e bya`ae hynh kae hopya oh.
Minmin nynh nanning kha sinakok kyate ae dee cih oh; athua, nanning ae theih oh paw ccungccaw nynh Pachia rya nynh ka law cite a tuaku ccyh tuh yn thua vae cih.
Te minmin nynh Paaw kha nyh khyh`ae zah kamaw mah oun ny khyh`ae keiccuze hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh oun cyih cih`ae.

Thuasalama accyh he yn thua te hynh-e`ae kong kha phe kae hopya vae oh cipaw nanning nynh na liathui nawlan oh hynhe` ae hynh nanning kae hopya vae oh. Te kae tuh nanning ryte ka um keiccuze atakaw lyakha hynh-e`ae hynh nanning kae hopah khyh oh.
“Thuasalama atu kamaw yn sawtupaw kalan ka cceih cih; te nanning lakuze hung nynh sanmah, ‘Teilangmou na cceih cih?’ cite kamaw hynh nae khia khyh oh.
Thuasalama hynh-e uccaw`ae kong nanning kalan phe kae hopya vae oh keiccuze nae thinlung kya ngaethyanaw phe abeih.

Tuhzemah byaccing kha nanning kae hopya oh, nanning thanenaw hanlan ka la cceih cih; pawccecize kae nynh ka ccia khyh ze Pangkhaetu nanning kalan yn thua lan khyh, thuasalama ka ccia ze amaw kha nae kalan kae saw cih.
Te aning he yn thua te, aning nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae kha seinaw kong, dingnaw kong te byapianaw kong kha oun nysakuh cih`ae.
Minmin nynh kamaw kha yn zyn khyh`ae keiccuze seinaw kong kha a nysakuh cih`ae.
Kae nynh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih zah nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh keiccuze dingnaw kong kha a nysakuh cih`ae.
Hynh-e laephipi uktupaw tuh byapia athua vae keiccuze byapianaw kong kha a nysakuh cih`ae.
“Nanning kalan ho lanpaw patae ka hoi ung, thuasalama nanning nynh kha-e`ae kha atu na lawkuh kho loh khyh oh.

Tuhzemah byaccing kya-e Muisaw he yn thua te nanning kha byaccing balyn lungkhu lang ae cciakhae cih oh, pawccecize aning nynh amaw a kaw te yn ho lan khyh; thuasalama aning nynh a thae paw miakaw kha yn ho cih; te yn thua lanpaw uccaw`ae kha ae hopah cih oh.
Aning nynh kamaw kha phu-enaw yn pya cih, pawccecize aning nynh kamaw kya-e kha yn lawkuh cih zah kha-e kha nanning kalan ae hopah cih oh.
Paaw nynh a hoi paw uccaw balyn tuh kamaw kya-e cci nynh thua; tukeiccu, ‘Aning nynh kamaw kya-e kha yn lawkuh cih zah kha-e kha nanning kalan ae hopah cih oh,’ cite kae hopya oh.
“Sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh; te sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh bua nae muih cih oh, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih,” a ci.

Oute amaw zuitu`ae abang nynh, “ ‘Sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh, te sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh bua nae muih cih oh, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka cceih cih,’ cite aening kalan hynh-e a ho paw hynh pawmou a hory?” cite mimaw te mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “Aning nynh, ‘Sosoh cihte,’ cite hynh-e a hopaw hynh pawmou a hory? A hopaw bya hynh ah nyh khyh oh,” a ci`ae.

Minmin nynh amaw kha byakhia a ry`ae cipaw Jesu nynh phe nyh zah minmin kha, “ ‘Sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh, te sosoh cihte nanning nynh kamaw hynh bua nae muih cih oh,’ cite ka hopaw kong naemaw te naemaw tou na khiakuh oh?

Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, nanning tuh nae rah nae khui cih oh, thuasalama laephi ccungccaw`ae tuh mih lungtua cih; te nanning tuh nae ngaethah cih, thuasalama nae ngaethyanaw tuh lungtuanaw lang yn tang cih.

Nopinung nynh neitangia he cci vae ze ngaethyanaw a hoi, pawccemacize amaw ccyh phe azaw vae, thuasalama imua ccahe yn pui vae tetuh a vawsawnaw kha kharyh liathui vae khyh, pawccecize laephipi kalan ccungccaw lukheit a pui paw lungtuanaw keiccu nynh thua.

Tukeiccu nynh nanning mah atu ngaethyanaw na hoi oh; thuasalama kae nynh nanning kha bua kae muih cih oh zah nae lung oun tua cih, te nae lungtuanaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san nae kyate ae lawpah lan khyh oh.

Te tuh-e nin kya nanning nynh kamaw hynh pawsang nae khia vae lan khyh oh. Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya oh, ka min te nanning nynh Paaw kalan nae ngiaku oh paw miakaw kha aning nynh ae pya cih oh.
Atu cia nanning nynh ka min te pawsang na ngia khyh oh, nae lungtuanaw phe accing nawlan ngia oh lah na mue cih oh.

“Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nanning kalan tousenaw bya te nynh kae hopya oh; thuasalama nanning kalan tousenaw bya te kae hopya vae khyh oh ccyh yn thua cih, thuasalama Paaw kong kha ccaerarihlan kae hopah cih oh.
Tuh-e nin kya nanning nynh ka min te nae ngia cih oh; te nanning hanlan Paaw kalan kae ngiapah cih oh cite nanning kae hopah khyh oh;
pawccecize Paaw amaw ccaccei nynh nanning kha ae sungsah oh, pawkeiccumacize nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah oh zah kae tuh Pachia kyate nynh kae thua cipaw kha na zyn oh.
Kae tuh Paaw kyate kae pou zah laephipi kalan kae thua vae; laephipi kyate bua ka pou cih zah Paaw kalan ka cceih ung cih,” a cipya`ae.
A zuitu`ae nynh amaw kha, “Dotua, atu nang tuh tousenaw bya mang vae leite ccaerarihlan nynh na ho.

Nang tuh pawpaw balyn na nyh zah hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah nang hynh byakhia ho vae khyh cipaw atu kae ny vae. Hynh-e liate nang tuh Pachia kyate nae thua paw cipaw kaening nynh kae zyn,” a cipya`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha khung`ae zah, “Atu na zyn oh tou?

Dotua oh, nanning milu raveih nynh naemaw umnaw raveih lang nae phiakuh cih oh zah ka makhaete nae ccuetaw cih oh paw ccyh tuh yn cceih zah atu yn thua vae; tuhzemah kae tuh ka makhae thua khyh, pawkeiccumacize kamaw kha Paaw nynh yn umkhae.

“Nanning nynh kamaw kya daenaw na hoi nawlan oh hynh-e bya`ae hynh nanning kae hopya oh, laephipi kya nanning nynh vawsawnaw na la tung cih oh; thuasalama nae thawmuin sah; laephipi tuh phe ka tae vae,” a ci.
Hynh-e bya`ae hynh he a ho koute Jesu nynh vaawran lang dothung zah, “Apang, accyh phe azaw vae; na Ccapaw nynh namaw kha phu ae esah nawlan na Ccapaw hynh phu-esah.
Ccungccaw balyn tungvaw kya kawhoinaw kha amaw phe na pya vae hawte, nang nynh Ccapaw kalan na pya`ae paw ccungccaw miakaw kha Ccapaw nynh zungzae hiinnaw a pya nawlan Ccapaw hynh phuesah.
Te zungzae hiinnaw tuh e hynh nynh thua, ahmepaw Pachia nang kyalya te nang nynh na saw paw Jesu Kri hynh minmin nynh a ny`ae paw kha nynh thua.
Laephi vawlan namaw kha kae nynh phu phe kae esah vae; ka cyi lanpaw, nae pya paw ryalaw kha phe ka thangsah vae.
Te Pou Apang, laephipi a um mawze namaw ryte ka hoi vae paw phuenaw khate namaw ccaccei nynh atu phu yn esah.
“Laephipi kyate nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae kalan na min kha phe ka langsah vae, minmin tuh na kya-e thua`ae zah kamaw kha nae pya; minmin nynh na bya kha a ngae`ae.
Nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw balyn tuh namaw kyate nynh yn thua cipaw kha atu minmin nynh phe a ny vae`ae.

Pawccecize nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw bya`ae kha kae nynh minmin kha ka pya`ae, te minmin nynh a lawku`ae, te kae tuh namaw kyate ka thua paw cipaw phe nyh ccaccing`ae zah kae tuh namaw nynh nae saw cipaw minmin nynh a zyn`ae.
Minmin hanlan saw ka sang; laephi ccungccaw`ae hanlan saw ka sang khyh; thuasalama nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae hanlan nynh saw ka sang, pawccecize minmin tuh namaw kya-e nynh thua`ae.
Te kamaw kya-e balyn tuh namaw kya-e thua zah na kya-e tuh ka kya-e nynh thua, te minmin kya kae tuh phu-esah ka thua.

Te atu te kae tuh laephipi kya ka um vae lan khyh, thuasalama minmin tuh laephipi kya nynh um`ae, te kae tuh namaw kalan kae cceih cih. Athyaapaw Apang, aening tuh ccangkheit ah thua hawte, nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae nynh ccangkheit athua nawlan`ae minmin kha namaw min kya khynsah`ae.

E laephipi kya minmin ryte ka um lyaze minmin kha na min kya ka khynsah`ae; ronaw ccapaw holeite nang nynh nae pya`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha ka khynsah`ae zah hung sanmah ka zosah khyh, ou tuhte Ccathyaa accing nawlan.
“Te atu na kalan kae cceih vae cih zah minmin nynh kamaw kya-e lungtuanaw hynh mimaw kya phe beih lang a hoi nawlan`ae hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh laephipi kya ka ho.
Na bya kha minmin phe ka pya vae`ae; te laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh minmin kha a hua`ae, pawkeiccumacize kae tuh laephipi kya-e ka thua khyh hawte minmin mah laephipi kya-e thua khyh`ae.
Laephipi kyate minmin hynh nang nynh na law ccaw`ae cite kae ngia khyh, thuasalama ahoy leipaw kyate minmin kha na khynsah ccaw`ae cite nynh kae ngia.
Kae tuh laephipi kya-e ka thua khyh hawte minmin mah laephipi kya-e thua khyh`ae.
Na byaccing liate minmin hynh thyaasah`ae. Na bya tuh byaccing nynh thua.
Nang nynh kamaw hynh laephipi kalan nae saw hawte kae nynh mah minmin hynh laephipi kalan ka saw`ae.
Te byaccing liate minmin mah thyaasah athua nawlan`ae, minmin hanlan kamaw te kamaw kha ka thyaasaku.
“Hynh-e`ae hanlan kyalya saw ka sang khyh, thuasalama minmin mih bya liate kamaw oun zyn cih`ae paw hanlan mah saw ka sang.

Nang nynh kamaw hynh nae saw cipaw laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a zyn nawlan`ae, Apang, nang tuh kamaw kya na um zah kae tuh namaw kya ka um hawte, minmin mah aening kya pynkheit athua nawlan`ae, minmin balyn tuh pynkheit athua nawlan`ae saw ka sang.
Te aening tuh pynkheit ah thua hawte, minmin mah pynkheit athua nawlan`ae nang nynh nae pya vae paw phuenaw kha kae nynh minmin ka pya`ae.

Minmin tuh pynkheit kya ccingsah athua nawlan`ae, kae minmin kya ka um zah nang kamaw kya na um, te nang nynh kamaw hynh nae saw cipaw te nang nynh kamaw hynh nae sungsah hawte minmin mah na sungsah`ae cipaw laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh a ny nawlan`ae, saw ka sang.

Apang, nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ka phu-enaw kha minmin nynh a muih bua ccaw`ae, nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae mah ka umnaw kya kamaw ryte a umbua ccaw`ae ci ka ry, pawccecize laephipi atho mawze nang nynh kamaw hynh phe nae sungsah vae.
Pou adingpaw Apang! Laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh namaw hynh ae nyh khyh`ae, thuasalama kae nynh namaw kha kae nyh zah nang nynh kamaw hynh nae saw cipaw hynh-e`ae nynh a ny`ae.
Nang nynh kamaw nae sungsanawpaw sungsanaw tuh minmin kya a um nawlan, te kae minmin kya ka um nawlan, na min kha minmin kalan kae nynh phe ka nysah vae`ae zah bua ka nysah cih`ae,” a ci.
Hynh-e bya`ae hynh Jesu nynh he a ho koute, a zuitu`ae ryte Kedron vaw khuraw lang a zua`ae, tuin kya khokhu ccangkheit um zah a zuitu`ae ry tuh-e lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
Te amaw a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria mah tuh-e ahmin kha a nyh; pawccecize Jesu tuh a zuitu`ae ryte khalang khe pei leih a tungkuh he`ae.
Oute Judas tuh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Farasi`ae nynh oun saw`ae paw tempal ngawtu`ae te rhawkawphu phukheit kha oun cciakhae`ae zah maeekhua ry, maeeccaw ry zunghe`ae ryte khalang khe oun thua`ae.
Jesu nynh amaw tungvaw yn thua lanpaw uccaw balyn kha marya a ny keiccu cceih zah minmin kha, “Hungmou na ccung oh?” cite a khia`ae.
Minmin nynh, “Nazareth paw Jesu,” cite a khung`ae. Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kae tuh tuh-e paw nynh ka thua,” a cipya`ae. Te amaw a pheetupaw Judas Iskaria mah minmin ryte a thadyn bua.
Minmin kha, “Kae tuh tuh-e paw nynh ka thua,” cite he a hopah`ae tuh, minmin tuh nuhlang thungkuh`ae zah laephi kya a khuliakuh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh, “Hungmou na ccung oh?” cite minmin kha bua a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Nazareth paw Jesu nynh kae ccung,” a ci`ae.
Jesu nynh, “Kae tuh tuh-e paw nynh ka thua cite phe kae hopya vae oh, tukeiccu nanning nynh kamaw hynh nae ccung oh ze, hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh la cceih`ae sah,” cite a khung`ae.
“Nang nynh kamaw nae pya paw ccungccaw`ae kha hung sanmah ka zosah khyh`ae,” cite amaw nynh a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh hynhte a ho.
Oute Simon Piter nynh a ccyngkupaw thaloi kha thuakuh zah ranpibawi a seepaw kha thoh bae zah a ranglang nakua thoh pae. Tuh-e seepaw a min tuh Malkhas acikuh.
Oute Jesu nynh Piter kha, “Na thaloi kha a bu lungkhu lang sang, ka Paaw nynh kamaw yn pya paw banang tuh ka neih lan khyh tou?” a cipya.
Oute rhawkawphu`ae, rhawbawi`ae te Jew`ae kya-e tempal ngawtu`ae nynh Jesu kha kyng`ae zah a khii`ae.
Te Annas kalan masaty a cciakhae`ae, pawccecize Annas tuh tuh-e kum kya ranpibawi lupi Kaiafas a zu paaw nynh thua.
Atu Kaiafas tuh ccungccaw`ae hanlan ccungccaw lukheit nynh a chi lanze ahoyhua cite Jew`ae kalan khuakhankhaetu kha nynh thua.
Te Simon Piter te ccangpaw zuitu lukheit nynh Jesu kha a zui`ae; tuh-e zuitu tuh ranpibawi lupi nynh a ny paw thua zah Jesu ryte ranpibawi lupi umnaw maepaw lungkhu lang a tee`ae.
Thuasalama Piter tuh thuakaw pe atolang khe a thadyn. Tukeiccu ranpibawi lupi nynh a ny paw tuh-e ccangpaw zuitu tuh pou zah thuakaw a ngawtu nopinung kha hopah zah Piter kha a teekhae.
Oute thuakaw a ngawtu nopinung nynh Piter kha, “Nang so hynh-e ccungccapaw zuitu`ae kyaze lukheit na thuabua khyh tou?” cite a khia. Piter nynh, “Ka thua khyh,” a ci.
Te see`ae te tempal ngawtu`ae tuh maeehue maeetuakuh`ae zah tuin kya a thadyn`ae; pawccecize tuh ccyh lya tuh akyaa, te minmin tuh maee ekuh`ae, te Piter tuh minmin ryte thadyn zah maee ekuhbua.
Oute ranpibawi lupi nynh Jesu kha a zuitu`ae konglang te a ccangpyanaw konglang bya a khia.

Jesu nynh, “Laephi ccungccaw`ae kalan alangkuh lante phe ka ho vae; Jew`ae pynkheihlan pei leih tungkunaw`ae sinakok kya, te tempal voidu kya pei ka ccangpah`ae zah aphiru lante pawsang mah ka ho khyh.
Pawccemou kamaw hynh nae khia? Kae nynh minmin kalan paw nynh ka ho cipaw kha kamaw kya-e a thae paw ccungccaw`ae kha khia`ae; dotua, minmin nynh ka hopaw kha a ny`ae,” cite a khung.
Te tuhte he a ho tuh a pe thadyn paw tempal ngawtu lukheit nynh, “Nang nynh ranpibawi lupi kha tuhte cceih na khung ii?” cite Jesu kha a kuihphe te a bia.
Jesu nynh, “Kae nynh ahoy leipaw ka ho ze ahoy khyhnaw kong ccaekia yn langsapah; thuasalama ahoypaw ka ho ze pawccemou nang nynh nae bia?” cite a khung.
Te Annas nynh Jesu kha phang a hee`ae mawte ranpibawi lupi Kaiafas kalan a ky.
Tuh ccyh lya Simon Piter tuh thadyn zah maee a ekuh. Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “Nang mah amaw zuitu`ae kyaze lukheit na thuabua khyh tou?” cite a khia`ae. “Ka thua khyh,” cite Piter nynh bua a ci.
Piter nynh a nakua thoh pae lang a bae paw, vaeccaw athua paw ranpibawi see`ae lukheit nynh, “Nang tuh Jesu ryte khokhu kya na um oh paw kha kae muih khyh ngaw ii?” a ci.
Oute Piter nynh bua a ei, te vaekheihmawte awkhungpaw a khua.

Oute minmin nynh Jesu kha Kaiafas kyate Byapianaw Khaan lang a cciakhae`ae; te tuh ccyh tuh awkhua takaw nynh thua, te mimaw tuh Kawtaw Poi toobua lan a nouku`ae pawte phe kae thusei cih cite Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang teebua khyh`ae.
Tukeiccu Pilat nynh minmin kalan toikuh zah, “Hynh-e ccungccapaw tungvaw paw seibenaw mou na hoi oh?” a ci.
Minmin nynh khung`ae zah, “Aning tuh ccungccahoy leipaw athua khyh lanze na kalan kaening nynh kae ah lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.

Oute Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Amaw hynh nanning nynh lawkuh oh lah nae kawbya thyhte amaw kha byapia oh,” a cipya`ae. Tukeiccu Jew`ae nynh, “Kaening tuh hung ccungccaw sanmah chianaw kaw kae hoi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
Tuhte a ho`ae paw tuh, Jesu nynh pawtahawpaw chinaw te nynh amaw kha ka chih vae cih cipaw a muihsah paw, Jesu nynh a hopaw bya accing nawlan nynh thua.
Oute Pilat tuh Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang bua tee zah Jesu kha ko zah, “Nang hynh Jew`ae Siapharan na thua tou?” cite a khia.
Jesu nynh, “Hynh-e bya hynh namaw lungte na ho paw tou? Tukhyhze mingccang`ae nynh tou kamaw kong hynh nang ae hopah`ae?” cite a khung.
Pilat nynh, “Kae tuh Jew paw lukheit ka thua tou? Na ccungccaw`ae te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh nang kha kamaw kalan ae ah`ae, nang nynh pawmou phe na cyi?” cite a khia.

Jesu nynh, “Ka peenaw tuh hynh-e laephipi kya-e thua khyh, ka peenaw tuh hynh-e laephipi kya-e athua ze kae tuh Jew`ae kalan ah ka thua khyh nawlan ka ccungccaw`ae nynh rhaw phe oun tukpah cih`ae; thuasalama atu ka peenaw tuh hynh-e kya thua khyh,” cite a khung.

Tukeiccu Pilat nynh amaw kha, “Tuhte lanze nang tuh siapharan tou na thua?” a cipya. Jesu nynh, “Siapharan nynh ka thua cipaw na ho latu. Byaccing kalan ccaekiakhan khylan kae tuh kae pui zah hynh-e khylan nynh laephipi kalan kae thua. Byaccing te asekuhpaw ccungccaw miakaw nynh ka bya hynh a ngae,” cite a khung.
Pilat nynh, “Byaccing tuh pawmou?” cite a khia. Te hynh-e a ho koute Pilat tuh Jew`ae kalan bua cceih zah minmin kha, “Amaw nynh a cyiseimenaw kharyh ka muih khyh.

“Thuasalama Kawtaw Poi kya ccungccaw lukheit kha nanning kalan kae luesahpya he oh paw aphung kha na hoi oh; tukeiccu Jew`ae Siapharanpaw hynh nanning kalan kae luesahpya oh ze na ry oh tou?” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin balyn nynh, “Hynh-e paw kae luesah ry khyh, thuasalama Barabbas nynh kae luesah ry,” cite bua sia`ae. Tuh-e Barabbas tuh damiah nynh athua.
Oute Pilat nynh Jesu kha lawsah`ae zah liarue te a buasah`ae.
Te rhawkaw`ae nynh hingpaw lukhung kha khepah`ae zah a lu vawlan khungsah`ae, te minmin nynh sekakungpaw boeikhua kha a tungvaw zingsah`ae zah
“Jew`ae Siapharanpaw salan kae pya!” a ci`ae. Te minmin nynh mih kuih te amaw kha a bia`ae.
Tukeiccu Pilat nynh bua toikuh zah, “Dotua oh, amaw kya cyiseimenaw kharyh ka muih khyh cipaw nanning nynh na ny nawlan oh amaw hynh nae kalan kae cciakhae,” a cipya`ae.
Oute Jesu tuh hingpaw lukhung khungkuh zah sekakungpaw boeikhua zingkute yn pou. Te Pilat nynh minmin kha, “E ccungccapaw hynh la do oh!” a cipya`ae.

Tukeiccu alepaw ranpibawi`ae te tempal ngawtu`ae nynh Jesu kha he muih`ae tuh, “Amaw kha khiade oh, amaw kha khiade oh!” cite a sia`ae. Pilat nynh minmin kha, “Nanning nynh amaw hynh lawkuh oh lah khiade oh, kae tuh amaw kya cyiseinaw kharyh ka muih khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Jew`ae nynh, “Kaening nynh kawbya ccangkheit kae hoi, te kae kawbya liate aning tuh chi lan accan, pawkeiccumacize aning nynh amaw te amaw kha Pachia Ccapaw a ciku,” cite a khung`ae.
Tukeiccu Pilat nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh houh a rih.
Te Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang bua tee zah Jesu kha, “Nang hynh paw kyate mou nae thua?” cite a khia. Thuasalama Jesu nynh kaw kheit san khung khyh.
Oute Pilat nynh amaw kha, “Kamaw kalan bya na ho khyh tou? Kae tuh nang khiadenaw kaw te luesanaw kaw ka hoi paw hynh na nyh khyh tou?” a cipya.

Jesu nynh, “Vaaw langte nang hynh kawpya athua khyh ze nang nynh ka tungvaw kya paw kaw sanmah na hoi kho khyh, tukeiccu nang na kalan kamaw yn ah paw ccungccaw tuh ale huapaw seinaw a hoi,” cite a khung.

Te tuin ccyh kyate tho zah Pilat nynh Jesu kha luesanaw a ccung; thuasalama Jew`ae nynh, “E ccungccapaw hynh nang nynh na luesah lan thua ze, nang tuh Sizar banpaw na thua khyh; hunghung zemah amaw te amaw siapharan lang a tangsakuhpaw tuh Sizar kha rawsete bya ho paw nynh thua,” cite a sia`ae.
Tukeiccu Pilat nynh tuh-e bya he a thae tuh Jesu kha poukhae zah Hebru bya te Gabbatha cikuh zah, ‘Lungphae’ a ci`ae paw, byapianaw tungkhung kya a dahung.
Te tuh-e ccyh tuh Kawtaw Poi hanlan paccynnaw nin thua zah suimilan taruhnaw loukaw nynh thua, te Pilat nynh Jew`ae kha, “Nae Siapharanpaw hynh dotua oh!” a cipya`ae.

Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Amaw kha poukhae oh, amaw kha poukhae oh, amaw kha khiade oh!” cite a sia`ae. Pilat nynh, “Nae Siapharanpaw tuh ka khiade cih tou?” cite a khia`ae. Alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh, “Sizar laelan kaening siapharan kae hoi khyh!” cite a khung`ae.
Tukeiccu Pilat nynh Jesu kha khiade khylan rhawkaw`ae kalan a ah. Te minmin nynh Jesu kha lawkuh`ae zah a cciakhae`ae.
Te Jesu tuh a vaelantung puihkute ‘Luru hmin’ a ci`ae paw ahmin kalan a cceih, tuh-e hmin tuh Hebru bya te ‘Golgotha’ cikuh.
Tuin kya minmin nynh Jesu kha ccangpaw ccungccaw luning ryte a khiade`ae, te a voilang lukheit a ranglang lukheit, Jesu tuh angaelaku nynh a um.
Te Pilat nynh ccawtawpya paw ccangkheit zei zah vaelantung vawlan khe a taw. Ccawtawpya paw kya azeikuh paw tuh, “JEW`AE SIAPHARAN, NAZARETH PAW JESU,” ci nynh thua.
Oute hynh-e ccawtawpya paw hynh Jew`ae patae nynh a ria`ae. Pawccecize Jesu a khiadenaw`ae ahmin tuh khua kyate anaekuh, te tuh-e ccawtawpyapaw tuh Hebru bya, Greek bya, Latin bya te zei athua.
Oute Jew`ae kyaze alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh Pilat kha, “ ‘Jew`ae Siapharanpaw,’ cite zei nan, thuasalama aning nynh, ‘Kae tuh Jew`ae Siapharan nynh ka thua,’ a ci, cite zei,” a cipya`ae.
Pilat nynh, “Phe ka zei vae paw tuh phe ka zei vae,” cite a khung`ae.

Oute rhawkaw`ae nynh Jesu kha he a khiade`ae koute a uccaw`ae kha lawkuh`ae zah zung pali lang phia`ae zah lukheit ze zungkheit cci te a neeku`ae, te a angkiccua kha mah a khah`ae; tuh-e angkiccua tuh asuikunaw um leite alu te alia cia akuakuhpaw nynh thua.

Tukeiccu minmin nynh, “E tuh phia nan oh sih, thuasalama hungmou a ccou cih cipaw ccungthy dung oh sih,” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae. Tuh-e tuh, “Minmin nynh ka uccaw kha a neeku`ae, te ka uccaw kya minmin nynh ccungthy a dung`ae,” cite Ccathyaa nynh a hopaw accing nawlan nynh thua. Tukeiccu nynh rhawkaw`ae nynh hynhte a cyi`ae.
Tuh ccyh lya Jesu vaelantung pe khe Jesu a nung, a nung neitanung, Kleofas zu Meri, te Meri Magdalin a thadyn`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu nynh a nung te amaw nynh a sungsahpaw zuitu a thadyn`ae paw kha he a muih tuh, a nung kha, “Nopinung, na ccapaw kha la do!” a cipya.
Oute zuitu kha, “Na nung kha la do!” a cipya. Te tuh-e suimilan ccyh kyate tuh-e zuitu nynh a nung kha amaw a inn lang a cciakhae.
Hynh-e koute, pawpaw balyn tuh atu marya accing vae cipaw Jesu nynh nyte, Ccathyaa accing nawlan, “Ka tuihaw,” a ci.

Te tuin kya ariapaw misutui phe beihpaw lungre zungkheit a um, te minmin nynh phuesi tungkheit kha ariapaw misutui lungkhu lang moh dung`ae zah hyssop aran kya hede`ae zah Jesu a mung kalan a nungde`ae.
Tukeiccu Jesu nynh ariapaw misutui kha a lyatua koute, “Athang vae,” a ci; te a lu tuh ting zah a muisaw kha a ah vae.

Tuh-e nin tuh Paccynku Nin thua zah awkhualan Sabbath nin tuh nin lesaepaw athua keiccuze, Jew`ae nynh michi rhua`ae kha Sabbath nin kya tuh vaelantung vawlan phang a um vae khyh ccaw cite, mih ccu`ae kha khyasah lan te mih rhua`ae kha law athua ccaw cite Pilat kha a ngiaku`ae.
Oute rhawkaw`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah Jesu ryte a khiade`ae paw lukheitpaw ccu kha a khya`ae, te ccangpaw ccu kha mah a khya`ae.
Thuasalama minmin nynh Jesu kya he thua`ae tuh phe chih vae cipaw kha muih`ae zah a ccu kha khya vae khyh`ae.
Thuasalama rhawkaw`ae kyaze lukheit nynh a naw kya ccoi te thuin zah chii te tui palou a pou.
Te kha-e a muih paw ccungccaw nynh ccaekiakhan, te a ccaekia tuh ahme, te nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh aning nynh a hopaw tuh ahme cipaw kha aning nynh a ny.
Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae acyikupaw tuh, “Amaw a ru ccangkheit san khya thua lan khyh,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa accing nawlan nynh thua.
Te ccangpaw kya Ccathyaa nynh, “A thuin`ae paw ccungccapaw kha ccungccaw`ae nynh oun do cih`ae,” bua a ci.

Te hynh-e koute, Jew`ae rawri keiccu aphiru lante Jesu zuitu athua paw, Arimathia khua paw Josef nynh Jesu rhua kha lawku lan Pilat kha a ngiaku, te Pilat nynh a ua. Tukeiccu aning nynh cceih zah Jesu rhua kha a lawku.
Te langmaw lya khuazi Jesu kalan a thua paw Nikodemas mah pound zakheit loukaw aripaw mura te aloe a pydekuhpaw mynkhuhpaw kha yn ccyng zah tuhlang yn thuabua.
Oute minmin nynh Jesu rhua kha laah`ae zah Jew`ae rhuaccykunaw phung thyhte, mynkhuhpaw ryte boei nebaleihpaw te a rhua kha a lung`ae.
Atu Jesu a khiadenaw`ae hmin kya khokhu ccangkheit a um, te tuh-e khokhu kya ccungccaw lukheit san a ccynaw boi loh lei`ae paw athawpaw shaw ccangkheit a um.
Jew`ae Paccynku Nin athua keiccu te shaw tuh anae keiccu tuin kyakhe Jesu rhua kha minmin nynh a ccy`ae.
Lonaw nawkheit kyaze masaty nin awkhua takaw, phang amoh ung lyakhe Meri Magdalin tuh shaw kalan yn thua zah a fu`ae paw lung kha shaw kyate phe a nuekuh paw kha a muih.

Oute Meri tuh ccue zah Simon Piter te Jesu nynh a sungsahpaw ccangpaw zuitu kalan thua zah minmin kha, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh Bawipaw rhua kha shaw kyate phe a law vae`ae, te paw kya nynh amaw kha a nung`ae cipaw kae nyh khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Tukeiccu Piter te tuh-e ccangpaw zuitu tuh thokuh`ae zah shawku kalan a cceih`ae.
Te mih luning te paryh ccue`ae zah ccangpaw zuitu nynh Piter kha po thoih zah shaw kalan masaty a thua.
Te baling zah a do tuh nebaleihpaw boei phang a um paw kha a muih, tuhzemah a lungkhu lang tee khyh.
Oute Simon Piter tuh yn dekuh bua zah yn thua, te shaw lungkhu lang po tee zah uccaw rawpaw amaw te phang a um paw kha a muih.
Te a lu henawpaw pavua tuh nebaleihpaw boei ryte pynkheihlan um leite a makhaete phang bikuh paw kha a muih.
Oute shaw kalan masaty a thua paw, tuh-e ccangpaw zuitu mah teebua zah a muih tuh a zyn.
Pawccecize aning tuh a chih`ae paw kyate bua a tho hahe cih cipaw Ccathyaa kha minmin nynh la nyh loh khyh`ae.
Oute zuitu`ae tuh mimaw mih inn lang bua a ki`ae.
Thuasalama Meri tuh shaw atolang khe rawte phang thadyn, te a rah lalia lante baling zah shaw lungkhu lang a do.
Te Jesu rhua a ccynaw`ae kyakhe, a lu lang lukheit, a ccu lang lukheit, vaaw ccungccaw`ae luning nynh arawpaw uccaw lawkute a dahung`ae paw kha a muih.

Te minmin nynh Meri kha, “Nopinung, pawccemou na raw?” a cipya`ae. Meri nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae nynh ka Bawipaw kha phe a law vae`ae, te pawkya nynh a nung`ae cipaw ka ny khyh keiccu nynh ka raw,” cite a khung`ae.
Te tuhte aning nynh he a ho koute, nuhlang khe maeleihkuh zah Jesu a thadyn paw kha a muih, tuhzemah Jesu nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh.

Jesu nynh, “Nopinung, pawccemou na raw? Hungmou na ccung?” a cipya. Meri nynh khokhu ngawtupaw vosi cite tua zah amaw kha, “Bawihaepaw, hynh-e kyate amaw kha phe na cciakhae vae thua ze, teisangmou na nung kamaw hynh beih yn hopah lah kae nynh amaw kha ka lawkuh cih,” a cipya.
Jesu nynh, “Meri!” cite a ko. Meri nynh maeleihkuh zah amaw kha, “Rabboni!” a ci, (tuh-e tuh Ccangpatu cipaw nynh thua).

Jesu nynh, “Yn tung nan hin, pawccecize kae tuh ka Paaw kalan ka kaethung loh khyh, thuasalama ka neitaw`ae kalan la cceih lah, kae tuh ka Paaw te nanning nae Paaw, ka Pachia te nanning nae Pachia kalan ka kaethung cih cipaw kha minmin kha la hopah`ae,” a cipya.
Meri Magdalin nynh cceih zah Bawipaw kha phe ka muih vae cipaw, te Bawipaw nynh hynh-e bya`ae hynh ka kalan yn hopya cipaw kha zuitu`ae kalan a hopya`ae.

Oute lonaw kyaze masaty nin athua paw tuh-e nin kya zete he athua tuh, Jew`ae rawri keiccuze zuitu`ae pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae kya thuakaw`ae kha pung he a khaw`ae tuh, Jesu yn thua zah angaelaku khe thadyn zah minmin kha, “Daenaw nae kya um sah,” a cipya`ae.
Te tuhte he a ho te, a kuih te a naw kha minmin kalan a muihsah`ae. Oute zuitu`ae nynh Bawipaw kha he muih`ae tuh mih lungtua.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Daenaw nae kya um sah; ka Paaw nynh kamaw hynh yn saw hawte, nanning kha kae saw oh,” bua a cipya`ae.
Te hynh-e he a ho koute, Jesu nynh minmin tungvaw hysaw zah, “Nanning nynh Thyaa Muisaw hynh mue oh;
nanning nynh ccungccaw lukhakheit seinaw`ae kha na ngaethya oh ze, mih seinaw`ae tuh ngaethya athua, nanning nynh lukhakheit seinaw`ae kha na tynsah oh ze, mih seinaw`ae tuh phang atyn,” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama luhaw laening kyaze lukheit athua paw Didymas cikuh paw Thomas tuh Jesu a thua lya zuitu`ae ryte umbua khyh.

Tukeiccu ccangpaw zuitu`ae nynh, “Kaening nynh Bawipaw kha phe kae muih vae,” cite a hopya`ae. Thuasalama aning nynh, “A kuih kya-e thingkhia vaemaw ka muih khyh ze, thingkhia vaemaw lungkhu lang ka kuihdung te ka putua khyh ze, a naw lungkhu lang ka kuih te ka putua khyh ze ka zyn lan khyh,” a ci.

Te nin tarya acih koute a zuitu`ae tuh inn lungkhu lang bua um`ae zah Thomas mah minmin ryte a umbua, thuakaw`ae tuh phang khawkuh pite Jesu yn thua zah angaelung khe thadyn zah, “Daenaw nanning kya um sah,” a ci.

Oute aning nynh Thomas kha, “Na kuihdung kha hynhlang yn putua lah ka kuih`ae hynh dotua, te na kuih kha hynhlang yn dyng lah ka naw lungkhu lang putua, te zyn leite um nan, thuasalama zyn ccavae,” a cipya.
Te Thomas nynh, “Ka Bawipaw te ka Pachia,” cite amaw kha a khung.
Jesu nynh, “Thomas, nang tuh kamaw hynh nae muih keiccuze na zyn, kamaw hynh yn muih leite a zyn`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua,” a cipya.
Te hynh-e ccauh kya azeikuh leipaw ccangpaw muihsanaw`ae patae kha mah Jesu nynh a zuitu`ae mitmuihnaw kya a langsaku ccaccing.
Thuasalama Jesu tuh Kri, Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cipaw nanning nynh na zyn nawlan oh, te tuhte na zyn oh zah amaw min liate nanning nynh hiinnaw na hoi ccaw oh cite nynh hynh-e`ae tuh zei athua.
Hynh-e`ae koute Tiberias rili pe khe Jesu nynh zuitu`ae kalan amaw te amaw kha bua a langkuh, te a langkupaw tuh hynhcihte nynh athua:
Simon Piter te Didymas cikuh paw Thomas, te Galilee pee Kana khuapaw Nathania, te Zebedi ccaaw`ae, te ccangpaw a zuitu`ae luning pynkheihlan la um`ae.

Simon Piter nynh minmin kha, “Ngasaw kyng lan ka cceih cih,” a cipya`ae. Minmin nynh, “Kaening mah kae cceihbua cih,” a ci`ae. Minmin tuh cceih`ae zah kohlung lungkhu lang vaekheihmawte a tee`ae, te kha-e khuazi tuh zawkheit san kyng khyh`ae.
Thuasalama khua he yn dae tuh Jesu tuh varan langkhe phang thadyn; thuasalama zuitu`ae nynh Jesu nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Ka ccaaw oh, ae lanpaw ccangkhakheit san na hoi oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Minmin nynh, “Kae hoi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Kohlung ranglang khe mia kha vua oh lah na kyng cih oh,” a cipya`ae. Tukeiccu minmin nynh mia kha vua`ae zah ngasaw eih lung keiccu mih mia kha sue kho vae khyh`ae.

Tukeiccu Jesu nynh a sungsah paw tuh-e zuitu nynh Piter kha, “E tuh Bawipaw nynh thua,” a cipya. Tukeiccu Simon Piter nynh Bawipaw nynh thua cipaw he a thae tuh avawlan e angki kha kikuh zah, (pawccecize ryalaw lya angki phe phaeku), rili lungkhu lang a sakuh bung.
Te ccangpaw zuitu`ae tuh ngasaw`ae kha mia ryte oun dungbia`ae zah kohlung taraw te oun thua`ae, pawccecize minmin tuh varan langte eih sawkuh khyh`ae, dung zaning loukaw nynh a sawkuh`ae.
Varan lang he oun thua`ae tuh tuin kya maeehue maee-e, te kha-e vawlan ngasaw ruakuh paw, te sanlou kha a muih`ae.
Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Atu na kyng oh paw ngasaw abang kha oun cciakhae oh,” a cipya`ae.
Simon Piter nynh kohlung kalan kae zah alepaw ngasaw zakheit sungpangaw zawthung te phe beihpaw mia kha varan langkhe a dung, te ngasaw patae aci zemah mia tuh pae khyh.

Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Rang oh lah awkhua looh hynh oun ae oh,” a cipya`ae. Bawipaw nynh athua cipaw kha a ny`ae keiccu zuitu`ae kyaze hung nynh sanmah, “Nang hungmou na thua?” cite khia ngan vae khyh`ae.
Oute Jesu nynh yn thua zah sanlou kha laah zah minmin kha a pya`ae, tuhhawte ngasaw kha mah a pya`ae.
Hynh-e tuh Jesu a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui koute a zuitu`ae kalan amaw a langkupaw vaethungnaw nynh thua.

Awkhua looh kha a ae`ae koute Jesu nynh Simon Piter kha, “Jonah ccapaw, Simon, hynh-e`ae nynh oun sungsah`ae laeze kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite a khia. Simon nynh, “Ou, Bawipaw, nang kae sungsah cipaw namaw phang na nyh,” a ci. Jesu nynh, “Ka tuutaw`ae kha looh la dang`ae,” a cipya.

Jesu nynh, “Jonah ccapaw, Simon, kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite vaeningnaw bua a khia. Simon nynh amaw kha, “Ou, Bawipaw, nang kae sungsah cipaw namaw phang na nyh,” a cipya. Jesu nynh, “Ka tuu`ae kha la dooih`ae,” a cipya.

Jesu nynh, “Jonah ccapaw, Simon, kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite vaethungnaw bua a khia. Bawipaw nynh, “Kamaw hynh nae sungsah tou?” cite vaethung cia a khia keiccu Piter a thinlungccih. Te Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, nang tuh pawpaw balyn marya na ny, nang kae sungsah cipaw namaw phang na nyh,” a cipya. Jesu nynh, “Ka tuu`ae kha looh la dang`ae.

Byaccaccing, byaccaccing kae hopya, na no lya tuh namaw te namaw na cciakuh cih zah na rynaw lang na cceih cih, thuasalama he nae taw vae tetuh na kuih`ae kha na zo cih zah ming`ae nynh ae hede cih`ae zah na ry leinaw lang ae cciakhae cih`ae,” a cipya.

Jesu nynh hynh-e a hopaw tuh pawtahawpaw chinaw te nynh Piter nynh Pachia kha phu yn esah cih cipaw a langsapya paw nynh thua. Te hynhte he a ho koute, Jesu nynh Piter kha, “Kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.

Oute langmaw lya zerya aenaw kya Jesu by kha ngeikuh zah, “Bawipaw, nang ae phee cih paw tuh hungmou?” cite a khiatu, Jesu nynh a sungsahpaw zuitu mah yn zuiku bua paw kha Piter nynh maeleihkuh zah a muih.
Kha-e paw kha Piter nynh he a muih tuh Jesu kha, “Bawipaw, hynh-e paw so pawcihte athua cih?” cite a khia.
Jesu nynh, “Kamaw kae thua cia aning kha ka umsah ry ung ze, nang te pawmou asekuh? Nang tuh kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.

Oute hynh-e bya tuh uteno`ae laku kya, “Tuh-e zuitu tuh chih lan khyh a ci,” cite athaan; thuasalama aning tuh chih lan khyh cite Jesu nynh a kalan ho khyh, thuasalama, “Kamaw kae thua cia aning kha ka umsah ry ung ze, nang te pawmou asekuh?” cite rou nynh a ho.
Hynh-e`ae kong ccaekiakhan paw tuh tuh-e zuitu thua zah hynh-e`ae kong a zeitu nynh thua, te a ccaekia tuh ahme cipaw kaening nynh kae ny.
Te Jesu nynh a cyi paw ccangpaw uccaw mah patae a um ung, kha-e`ae kha khaleih zei athua ze, zeinaw lanpaw ccauh`ae kha laephipi nynh heize ccung kho lan khyh cite nynh ka tua. Amen.
Pou Theophilas, Jesu nynh a popaw locceihtu`ae kalan Thyaa Muisaw liate kaw a pya`ae koute, amaw lawthung athua nin cia, a cyi paw te a ccangpyapaw balyn kha langmaw lya-e ccaw kya phe ka zei vae.

A teing koute kha-e locceihtu`ae kalan khe a sei kho leipaw ccaekia`ae patae te amaw a hiinnawpaw kong kha a langsapya`ae, nin sungpali cia minmin nynh a muih`ae, te Pachia peenaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kong kha a hopya`ae.

Te locceihtu`ae ryte pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah minmin nynh Jerusalem kyate a pou khyh nawlan`ae, thuasalama Paaw kya-e Byakinpyakupaw kha a ngaw nawlan`ae minmin kha kawpya`ae. “Tuh-e tuh, nanning nynh ka kyate phe na thae vae oh;
pawccecize Johan nynh tui kya baptisma a insah ccaccing`ae, thuasalama nanning tuh atu te nin patae aro maw Thyaa Muisaw kya baptisma-insah nae thua cih oh,” a cipya`ae paw kha nynh thua.
Tukeiccu locceihtu`ae nynh pynkheihlan he sueluakuh`ae tuh amaw kha, “Bawipaw, atu lyahin nang nynh peenaw kha Israel`ae kalan bua na pyathui cih`ae tou?” cite a khia`ae.
Te Jesu nynh minmin kha, “Paaw nynh amaw kawhoinaw kya a nung paw ccyh te kumvaelori tuh nanning nynh ny ho khyh.

Thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw nanning tungvaw he yn thua te nanning nynh thungnaw kha nae mue cih oh; te nanning tuh Jerusalem kya, Judea ram balyn kya, Samaria ram kya te laephi adianaw kyacia kamaw ccaekia`ae na la thua cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te hynh-e bya`ae he a ho koute minmin nynh a do`ae cciamang lyakhe Jesu tuh lawthung thua zah maeking nynh minmin mitmuihnaw kyate amaw kha zya a law.
Khahte lawthung athua paw Jesu kha locceihtu`ae nynh vaawran lang riri a do`ae cciamang lyakhe ccungccaw luning nynh arawpaw uccaw kha lawkute minmin pe khe oun thadyn`ae.

Te kha-e`ae nynh, “Galilee ccungccaw`ae, pawccemou nanning nynh vaawran langkhe na dothung oh? Hynh-e paw Jesu, nanning kyate vaawran lang lawthung athua paw na muih oh hawte ou khahcihte bua yn thua cih,” a cipya`ae.
Oute minmin tuh Jerusalem kyate Sabbath ninkheit laanccia asawpaw Oliv cikuh paw mua kyate Jerusalem lang a ki`ae.

Te minmin nynh he thua`ae tuh Piter, James, Johan, Andru, Filip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthai, Alfeas ccapaw James, Simon Zelot, te James neitaw Judas tuh a thuanaw`ae inn palung khaan langkhe a kaethung`ae.
Hynhe` ae balyn tuh Jesu a nung Meri te a neitaw`ae ry, nopi`ae ryte lunglokute sawsangnaw kya thawte a pyakuh`ae.
Te tuh-e ccyh kya milu lante zakheit lukuin loukaw acih`ae paw zuitu`ae laku Piter nynh thadyn zah,
“Uteno`ae, Jesu a kyng`ae paw kha a cciakhaetu Judas konglang Thyaa Muisaw nynh David khalang kyate a hoty paw Ccathyaa hynh accing aho.
Pawccecize aning tuh aening ryte riabua thua zah hynh-e Pachia ryalaw hynh a muebua.
“Atu kha-e paw nynh cyiseimenaw amee te laekua sang kheit a re; te a lutabing lante ccahbung zah a vue ngaelung te phae paw zah a ring balyn pung toikuh.
Te tuh-e kong Jerusalem kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh pung a ny`ae, tukeiccu mimaw mih bya te kha-e laekua kha, ‘Akeldama,’ a ci`ae, asuilan tuh, ‘Chii laekua,’ cipaw nynh thua.

“Pawccecize Sam ccauh kya hynhte azeikuh: ‘Aning umnaw hmin tuh ccungccaw um leinaw lang tangsah lah hung ccungccaw nynh san khe kya um nan sah’; te, ‘Amaw ryalaw kha mingccangpaw nynh lawkuh sah,’ cite azeikuh.

“Tukeiccu Johan nynh baptisma insahnaw kyate tho zah Jesu tuh aening kyate lawthung athua nin cia, Bawipaw Jesu nynh aening laku tee zah pou te a um ccyh lya, aening ryte po a mungkuh bua`ae paw hynh-e ccungccaw`ae kyaze lukheit tuh amaw thothuinaw kong ho lan aening ryte ccaekia athua hahe aho,” a ci.
Te minmin nynh ccungccaw luning, Jastas cite minphu`ae paw Barsabas cite a ko`ae paw Josef te Matthias kha a po`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Ccungccaw balyn thinlung a nyhtu, Bawipaw, nang nynh hynh-e luning`ae kyaze hungmou na po cipaw oun langsapakuh cite sawsang`ae.
Ou khate Judas nynh amaw ungnaw lang ccia khylan cyiseimenaw liate phe a ccuetaw paw hynh-e ryalawnaw te locceihtuthuanaw kha na popaw ccungccaw nynh a muebua ccaw,” cite sawsang`ae.
Te minmin nynh ccungthy kha dung`ae zah ccungthy tuh Matthias nynh a mue; te aning tuh locceihtu luhaw laekheit ryte riabua athua vae.
Te Pentikos nin he thua tuh minmin balyn tuh ahmin sang kheit kya pynkheihlan pung a um`ae.
Te myarya arupaw khise hawte roi ccangkheit tuh vaawran langte vaekheihmawte tuin kya yn thua zah minmin a umnaw`ae kha-e inn kyakhe phe abeih.
Te maee lo zah akuekuhpaw lae`ae tuh minmin kya oun langkuh zah milu raveih tungvaw kya accah.
Te minmin balyn tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih`ae zah Muisaw nynh honaw a pya`ae thyhhawte minmin nynh ccangpaw bya te a ho`ae.
Te tuh-e ccyh lya vaawran zakaw um paw minphuin miakaw kyaze Pachia kalan a pyakuh`ae paw Jew`ae tuh Jerusalem kya a la um`ae.
Tuh-e roi tuh he accae te ccungccaw zapi tuh pynkheihlan oun thua`ae zah zuitu`ae nynh a ho`ae paw kha mimaw mih bya raveihte a thae`ae keiccuze mih ngaeangthua.
Te minmin balyn tuh mih ngaeangthua, mih khuaruaru zah, “Dotua oh, hynh-e`ae balyn tuh Galilee bya a ho`ae paw thua khyh`ae tou?
Te pawcihtemou aening nynh ah puikhae oh paw ahmaw bya raveihte ah thae oh paw tuh?
Parthian`ae, Medes`ae, Elamit`ae te Mesopotamia ram kya, Judah ram kya, Kapadosia ram kya, Pontas ram kya, Asia ram kya,
Frikia ram kya, Pamfilia ram kya, Izip ram kya, te Libia ram kya, Sirene pepan kya um`ae paw te Rom ram kya-e mikhia`ae, Jew`ae te beiknaw kalan a tee thaw`ae paw,
Kretan`ae te Arab`ae nynh a ho`ae paw bya`ae hynh aening nynh ahmaw bya te ah thae oh paw tuh khuaruaru lan um paw Pachia ryalaw nynh athua,” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin balyn tuh mih khuaruaru, mih ngaeangthua zah, “Hynh-e hynh paw suilan mou?” cite lukheit te lukheit a hokuh`ae.
Ccungccaw abang nynh, “Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh athawpaw misutui te nynh phe bia`ae,” cite sarisarya lante a ci`ae.

Thuasalama Piter nynh luhaw laekheit ryte thadynte a roi saw zah minmin a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Judah ccungccaw`ae, nanning te Jerusalem kya na um oh paw nae balynte hynh-e hynh nyh oh lah ka bya hynh oun ngaepya tua oh.
Pawccecize hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh nanning nynh na tua oh hawte rui khyh`ae, pawccecize atu tuh awkhua suimilan ccangthungnaw rou nynh acih ung.
Thuasalama hynh-e tuh profeh Joel nynh a la hosyapaw kha nynh athua. A ho paw tuh:

‘Pachia nynh, nyathya nin kya hynhcihte yn cyikuh cih, minphuin balyn tungvaw kya ka Muisaw kha ka bu cih; te nae ccapaw`ae te nae ccanung`ae nynh profehbya ho cih`ae, te nae ccangvae`ae nynh vizin oun muih cih`ae, te nae pawpi`ae nynh maan oun sah cih`ae.
Tuh-e ccyh kya ka seepaw`ae te ka seenung`ae tungvaw ka Muisaw ka bu cih zah minmin nynh profehbya ho cih`ae.
Te luki lang vaawlui kya ngaeangnaw ka langsah cih zah akaw lang laephi vawlan chii, maee te maeekhuh muihsanaw`ae ka langsah cih.
BAWIPAW kya-e alesaepaw te ri lan umpaw nin a thua maw khuanin tuh mohnaw lang tang cih zah sawpaw tuh chii lang yn tang cih.
Te ou tuhcihte hunghung zemah BAWIPAW min a ko paw ccungccaw tuh khum athua cih,’ a ci.

“Israel ccungccaw`ae, hynh-e bya`ae hynh ngaetua oh; naemaw nynh mah na ny oh hawte, Nazareth paw Jesu tuh nanning laku kya Pachia nynh nawccawkhaepaw ccungccaw nynh thua, amaw liate nynh nanning laku kya Pachia nynh ngaeang lan um paw ryalaw`ae, khuaruarunaw`ae te muihsanaw`ae kha a langsaku.
Pachia kya-e nytynaw te paccynty paw khuakhannaw liate Jesu tuh ah athua, nanning nynh na kyng oh zah kawbya zui lei`ae paw kuih te na khiade oh zah phe na chia oh.
Aning tuh chinaw kya-e ccinaw nynh phang kyngde lan athua kho khyh keiccuze kha-e ccinaw kyate Pachia nynh supah zah amaw kha phe a thosah vae.
Pawccecize amaw konglang te David nynh a hopaw tuh: ‘Ka mitmaevaw kya BAWIPAW kha pei ka muih, pawccecize kae ka pia khyh nawlan aning tuh ka ranglang kya a um.
Tukeiccu ka thinlung a lungpaw zah ka lae tuh a lungtua; tuhlaeze ka ngesaw mah ngaehoinaw kya a hae-ung cih.
Pawccecize nang nynh ka hiinnaw-muisaw kha Hades kya na nungsya lan khyh zah, namaw kya-e Athyaapaw kha mah na thuhsah lan khyh.
Nang nynh kamaw kha hiinnaw laanpi phe nae nysah vae. Na umnaw kya kamaw kha lungtuanaw te phe nae biasah cih,’ a ci.
“Uteno`ae, ciihan kyaze paaw athua paw David kong hynh rhawhoyte kae hopya tua oh, David tuh chih zah u athua, te a shawku tuh aening kya atunin cia phang a um.
Aning tuh profeh athua keiccu, pynsaw lante amaw ciihan lungkhu te Kri kha Pachia nynh yn thosah cih zah amaw suitungkhung vawlan dahungsah lan amaw kya Pachia nynh byakankupaw byakan kha phe a ny.
Hynh-e hynh muihty te, Kri thothuinaw kong kha, a muisaw tuh Hades kya cciataw thua khyh, a ngesaw nynh mah thuhnaw kha muih khyh, cite a ho.
Hynh-e Jesu hynh Pachia nynh phe thosah vae, hynh-e konglang kaening balyn tuh ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua.
Tukeiccu aning tuh Pachia ranglang khe hangthung thua vae zah byakinpyakupaw Thyaa Muisaw kha Paaw kyate phe mue vae zah atu nanning nynh na muih oh zah na thae oh paw hynh-e hynh phe a bu vae.

“Pawccecize David tuh vaawran lang kae khyh; thuasalama David nynh amaw a hokupaw tuh: ‘ “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia cia, nang tuh ka ranglang khe dahung,” cite BAWIPAW nynh ka Bawipaw kha a cipya.’
“Tukeiccu nanning nynh na khiade oh paw Jesu ccaccei kha Pachia nynh Bawi lang te Kri lang phe a rae vae cipaw kha Israel minphuin balyn nynh ccaerarihlan nyh oh,” cite Piter nynh a ci.
Atu hynh-e bya kha minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh mih bung kya sua`ae zah Piter te ccangpaw locceihtu`ae kha, “Uteno`ae, pawmou kae cyih cih?” cite a khia`ae.
Oute Piter nynh minmin kha, “Nae seinaw ngethya athua nawlan, ngaesikuh oh lah nanning milu raveihte Jesu Kri min kya baptisma-in oh, ou khate Thyaa Muisaw lasung kha na mue cih oh.
Pawccecize byakinpyakupaw tuh nanning hanlan, nanning nae ccaaw`ae hanlan te asaw lang um`ae paw kya ah Bawipaw Pachia nynh a ko`ae paw balyn hanlan nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Te ccangpaw bya patae te ccaekiakhan zah, “Thinlung kyh leipaw hynh-e ciihan kyate khumnaw muebua oh,” cite thawte a hy`ae.
Oute a bya kha lungtuate a lawkuh paw ccungccaw`ae tuh baptisma-in`ae; te tuh-e nin kya ccungccaw thungthung loukaw biachih athua.
Te minmin tuh locceihtu`ae ccangpyanaw kya te vaeccawkunaw kya, sanlou ianaw kya te sawsangnaw kya tynkaring lang po a umbua`ae.
Te ccungccaw miakaw nynh rinaw a hoi`ae, te ngaeangnaw patae te muihsanaw`ae kha locceihtu`ae nynh a langsaku`ae.
Te a zyn`ae paw balyn tuh pynkheihlan um`ae zah pawpaw balyn kha a hoikheih`ae.
Te mih hoi paw te mih uccaw`ae kha zua`ae zah ccungccaw miakaw kalan ahobou thyhte a nee`ae.
Te minmin tuh tempal kya nin takyh pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah inn kheit koute inn kheit sanlou iathungku te, thinlung pynkheit te, lungtuate mih looh kha leih a ae`ae.
Pachia kha thehoysah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae balyn malang maehoynaw kha a mue`ae. Te Bawipaw nynh khumnaw mue`ae paw kha nin takyhte kriccawbu kalan a biachih.
Zete suimilan ccangtakuanaw sawsang ccyh lyakhe Piter te Johan tuh tempal kalan pynkheihlan a cceihthung`ae.

Te a nung vue kya mawte a ccukhoupaw ccungccapaw lukheit kha oun puih`ae; tempal lungkhu lang a tee`ae paw kha bawngnaw ngiaku khylan ‘Puithya’ acikuh paw sakoih pe khe kha-e paw kha nin takyh leih a nung`ae.
Tempal lungkhu lang tee lan cih vae`ae paw Piter te Johan kha kha-e paw nynh he a muih tuh, ‘Yn pyabua oh’ cite a ngiaku`ae.
Te Piter nynh Johan ryte kha-e paw kha rirido zah, “Kaening hynh oun dotua,” a cipya.
Te aning nynh minmin kyate ccangkhakheit ka mue vae cih cite ngaehoite minmin kha a do.
Oute Piter nynh, “Phua te sui ka hoi khyh; thuasalama ka hoi paw kha nang kae pya; Nazareth paw Jesu Kri min te thokuh lah cceih,” a cipya.
Te a ranglang kuih te kyng zah a tho; te vaekheihmawte a ccu te a ccukhilua ru`ae tuh thawzung a mue`ae.
Te aning tuh thohkuh zah a thadyn, te cceih zah minmin ryte tempal lungkhu lang a tee`ae; laanpi cciate, thohkute Pachia kha thehoysah.
Tuhte cciabiate Pachia thehoysah te a um paw kha ccungccaw balyn nynh a muih`ae.

Te minmin nynh aning tuh tempal voidu kya Puithya Sakoih zung khe bawngnaw ngiaku lan leih dahung paw nynh athua cipaw kha a nyh`ae, te amaw kya acyikuh paw kong kha mih khuaruaru zah mih ngaeangthua.
Te dansah athua vae paw ccukhoupaw nynh Piter te Johan kyakhe phang a bekuh tuh ccungccaw balyn nynh myarya ngaeangthua te mih kalan Solomon maepaw acikuh paw maepaw langkhe pynkheihlan a ccue`ae.

Te kha-e kha Piter nynh he a muih tuh ccungccaw`ae kha, “Israel ccungccaw`ae, nanning pawccemou hynh-e hynh nae ngaeangthua? Hynh-e paw hynh kaening nynh kaemaw thungnaw te, Pachia phe kae zyn keiccuze kae cciasah khopaw hawte nanning nynh kaening hynh pawccemou raerae nae do oh?

Abraham, Isaak te Jakob Pachia, ah minpaaw`ae Pachia nynh a Ccapaw Jesu kha phu-esah vae; kha-e Jesu kha nanning nynh Pilat kalan na ah oh zah aning nynh saw lan he a noukuh tuh nanning nynh amaw kha saw lan phe na ei oh.
Thuasalama nanning nynh Athyaapaw te Adingpaw kha na vua oh zah ccungccaw theihtupaw kha nae kalan sawpya lan na ngiaku oh.
Te hiinnaw Bawipaw kha nanning nynh na chia oh, kha-e Bawipaw kha Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kyate phe a thosah vae, ou kha-e konglang kaening tuh ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua.

Te Jesu min zynnaw liate, tuh-e amaw min nynh na muih oh zah na ny oh paw hynh-e paw hynh a thawsae sah. Athua, amaw kyate mue paw zynnaw nynh nanning balyn malang hynh-e paw hynh accingpaw dannaw kha a pya.
“Te atu mah, uteno`ae, nanning ae uk oh paw uktu`ae nynh a cyi`ae hawte nanning nynh mah na ny khyh oh keiccu nynh na cyi oh cipaw ka ny.
Thuasalama Kri tuh a teing cih cite langmaw lya Pachia nynh a profeh`ae balyn khalang kyate a langsaty paw kha, hynhte a ccingsah paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Bawipaw mitmuihnaw kyate thawzung thawsanaw ccyh yn thuasah nawlan, nae seinaw khawsungpya athua nawlan te,
nanning hanlan a khang vae paw Jesu Kri kha Pachia nynh yn saw nawlan ngaesikuh oh lah lung paleihkuh oh.
Laephipi thotakaw te amaw kya-e athyaapaw profeh`ae khalang kyate Pachia nynh a hosyapaw uccaw balyn bua nungthuinaw a thua mawlaezung vaawran nynh kha-e Kri kha a lehkhan cih.

Pawccecize Mawsi nynh ah minpaaw`ae kalan, ‘BAWIPAW nae Pachia nynh nae uno`ae kyate kamaw yn lopaw Profeh lukheit kha nanning hanlan yn pousah cih. Aning nynh nanning kalan a hopaw miakaw kha na la ngae cih oh.
Te ou tuhte kha-e Profehbya a ngae leipaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh amaw ccungccaw`ae laku kyate khaleih ro athua cih,’ a cipya`ae.
“Athua, profeh Samuel kyate tho zah amaw koute a ho paw profeh`ae balyn nynh mah a la ho`ae hawte hynh-e nin`ae kong hynh a hoty`ae.

Nanning tuh profeh`ae ccaaw nynh na thua oh; te Pachia nynh Abraham kalan, ‘Na ciihan kyate laephi kya-e minphuin balyn nynh hythuaccou cih`ae,’ cite a hopaw, ah minpaaw`ae ryte a rae paw byakin te asekuh`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
Nanning milu raveih nynh cyiseinaw kyate na paleihku oh paw kya, nanning kha hythuapya khylan, Pachia nynh a Ccapaw Jesu kha thosah zah masaty nanning kalan yn saw,” cite Piter nynh a hopya`ae.
Te locceihtu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kalan a hopya`ae lyakhe ranpibawi`ae, tempal ngawtu`ae te Sadusi`ae tuh oun thuabua`ae zah,
locceihtu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kha ccangpah`ae zah Jesu liate a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw kong a ho`ae keiccuze myarya mih lungvaw a saw.
Te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae kha kyng`ae zah tuhlya khuazi vae keiccuze minmin kha awkhualan cia thunginn kya a nung`ae.
Tuhzemah mih phunghopaw kha a thae paw ccungccaw patae nynh a zyn`ae; tuhte a zyn`ae paw tuh milu lante thungpangaw loukaw acih`ae.
Ou tuhte awkhualan he athua tuh uktu`ae, piccang`ae, te kawbya ccangpatu`ae,
te ranpibawi lupi Annas, te Kaiafas, Johan, Alexanda te ranpibawi ciihan`ae balyn tuh Jerusalem kya pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae.
Te minmin nynh Piter te Johan kha angaelung kya nung`ae zah, “Paw thungnaw te mou, tukhyhze hung min liate mou nanning nynh hynh-e hynh na cyi oh?” cite a khia`ae.
Oute Piter tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah minmin kha, “Ccungccaw uktu`ae te Israel piccang`ae nanning,
a cyikuh kho leipaw ccungccapaw hanlan rae paw ahoypaw ryalaw keiccu, pawcihte nynh aning tuh a dan cipaw keiccu, atunin kaening tuh akaw-aleih bya nae khia oh athua lanze;

nanning nynh na khiade oh zah Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Nazareth paw Jesu Kri min liate, amaw liate nynh hynh-e ccungccapaw tuh nanning malang ngedan te a thadyn cipaw hynh nanning balynte Israel ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh nyh oh.
Hynh-e tuh, ‘Nanning inn saktu`ae nynh na nue oh paw lung, aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang yn tang paw kha nynh thua.’
Mingccangpaw kya khumnaw kharyh um khyh; pawccecize Jesu min laelan aening oun khum kho lanpaw vaawran zakaw ccungccaw`ae laku ccangpaw min um khyh,” cite a hopya`ae.

Atu Piter te Johan kya-e rawthungnaw kha minmin nynh muih`ae zah minmin tuh ccawthya lei`ae, huataw ccungccaw`ae cipaw kha he nyh`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua. Te minmin luning tuh Jesu ryte po umkheih`ae paw cipaw kha bua a nythui`ae.
Te dansah athua paw ccungccapaw nynh minmin ryte phang a thadyn paw kha a muih`ae tuh rawsete pawsang ho kho vae khyh`ae.
Thuasalama locceihtu`ae kha kungsi zung kyate pou lan kaw a pya`ae koute minmin nynh mimaw laku byahokuh`ae.
“Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh pawte ah cyih cih oh? Minmin kyate raerae alangkuh paw muihsanaw kha Jerusalem kya um`ae paw balyn kalan phe langkuh vae zah aening nynh kha-e kha ah ei kho vae khyh oh.
Thuasalama kha-e kha ccungccaw`ae laku kya houh apazaeku khyh nawlan, atu te hung ccungccaw sanmah hynh-e min te a hopya vae khyh ccaw`ae minmin kha thawte ah khee ngaw oh,” cite a hokuh`ae.
Te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae kha ko`ae zah Jesu min liate kharyh a ho khyh nawlan`ae te a ccangpya khyh nawlan`ae kawpya`ae.
Thuasalama Piter te Johan nynh minmin kha, “Pachia kawngae laeze nanning kawngae hua lanpaw tuh Pachia malang akyh cih tou, kyh lan khyh tou cipaw naemaw nynh byapia oh.
Pawccecize kaening tuh kae muih paw te kae thae paw uccaw`ae kong kha ho leite kae um kho khyh,” cite a khung`ae.

Te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae tungvaw detahnaw lanpaw pawsang he muih khyh`ae tuh furawsya ki`ae zah phe a cciasah`ae. Pawccecize kha-e acyikuh paw hanlan ccungccaw balyn nynh Pachia kha thehoysah`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Pawccecize hynh-e dannaw muihsanaw a tungvaw kya alangkuh paw ccungccapaw tuh kum sungpali lae acih vae.
Te he a cciasah`ae te locceihtu`ae tuh mimaw mih phu kalan cceih`ae zah alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae nynh mih kalan a hopya`ae paw balyn kha a thaesah`ae.
