Te minmin nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh, pynkheih lante Pachia kalan roisaw`ae zah, “Bawipaw, nang tuh vaawran te laephi te rili te kha-e kya um paw balyn a raetupaw Pachia nynh na thua.
Nang nynh na seepaw David khalang kyate, ‘Pawccemou minphuin`ae nynh mih bungpaw zah ccungccaw`ae nynh ccakaepaw uccaw kong hynh a pheeku`ae?
Laephi siapharan`ae nynh thadyn`ae zah uktu`ae nynh BAWIPAW te a Kri kha rawsete pynkheihlan a sueluakuh`ae,’ cite phe na hoty vae.

“Langmaw lya na kuih nynh cyi lan cite a paccynpaw te na eenaw nynh cyi lan a la paccyn vae paw miakaw kha cyi khylan, satho phe na thuh vae paw, athyaapaw na Ccapaw Jesu kha Herod te Pontias Pilat nynh Zenta`ae te Israel ccungccaw`ae ryte e khuapi kyahin pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah a rawse`ae paw tuh thangccingpaw nynh thua.
Te pou Bawipaw, atu minmin kya-e furawnaw hynh dotua. Na bya hynh rawhoy te kae ho kho nawlan rawthungnaw oun pyabua.
Athyaapaw na Ccapaw Jesu min liate muihsanaw te ngaeangnaw`ae a langku nawlan, ngeccih dansah khylan na kuih yn dyngtua,” cite sawsang`ae.
Te minmin sawsang`ae koute pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae ahmin tuh ahy; te minmin balyn tuh Thyaa Muisaw te beih`ae zah Pachia bya kha rawhoy te a ho`ae.

Te a zyn`ae paw ccungccaw zapi tuh thinlung ccangkheit te hiinnaw-muisaw ccangkheit hoi`ae zah hung nynh sanmah a uccaw ccangkhakheit kha kamaw kya-e ci vae khyh; thuasalama pawpaw balyn kha a mangkheih`ae.
Te Bawipaw Jesu thothuinaw kong kha locceihtu`ae nynh alepipaw thungnaw te ccaekiakhan`ae zah alepipaw thawccinaw tuh minmin balyn tungvaw kya a um.
Minmin laku ahoboupaw ccungccaw hung sanmah um khyh; pawccecize laekua hoi`ae paw te inn hoi`ae paw balyn nynh kha-e`ae kha zua`ae zah, a zuanaw`ae paw amee kha oun ccyng`ae.
Locceihtu`ae ccu leihpaw khe a pung`ae; te lukhakheit hanlan ahobou thyhte ccungccaw miakaw kha a nee`ae.
Te Barnabas cite locceihtu`ae nynh minphu`ae paw, (tuh-e asuilan tuh thawzungpyanaw ccapaw cipaw), Saiparas ram e paw Levi ciihan paw Joses tuh,
a hoi paw laekua kha zua zah kha-e a zuanaw mee phua kha yn ccyng zah locceihtu`ae ccu leihpaw khe a nung.
Thuasalama Ananias cikuh paw ccungccapaw nynh a zu Sapphira ryte a hoi`ae paw laekua kha a zua`ae.
Te amee abang kha a zu mah a nyhbua lante a nungkubang. Te abang kha yn ccyng zah locceihtu`ae ccu leihpaw khe a nung.
Te Piter nynh, “Ananias, Thyaa Muisaw kha hyngpya khylan te laekua na zuanaw mee abang nungkubang khylan pawccemou Setan nynh na thinlung kha phe ae biasah?

Kha-e kha na zua maw, na kya-e thua khyh tou? Kha-e kha na zua koute namaw kaw khya khyh tou? Pawccemou na thinlung kya hynhcihte na poi? Ccungccaw`ae kha na hyngpah khyh lahyn, thuasalama Pachia lakha na hyngpya,” a ci.
Te Ananias tuh hynh-e bya he a thae tuh khuliakuh zah phe a chih; te hynh-e kong a thae`ae paw ccungccaw balyn tuh myarya a rih`ae.
Te ccangvae`ae nynh thokuh`ae zah Ananias kha ah lung`ae koute poukhae`ae zah a u`ae.
Te tuh-e koute suimilan ccangthung loukaw he aro koute a zu tuh paw nynh acyiku cipaw ny leite yn tee.
Te Piter nynh, “Laekua kha tuhzeih mawte tou na zua oh? Kamaw hynh yn hopya tua,” a cipya. Te aning nynh, “Athua, tuhzeih mawte nynh kae zua,” a ci.

Oute Piter nynh amaw kha, “Bawipaw Muisaw syntaw khylan pawcihtemou pynkheihlan nae lung aloku? Dotua, na vawpaw a uh`ae paw mih ccu tuh thuakawzung nynh a um ung, te nang kha mah ae cciakhae cih`ae,” a cipya.
Oute Sapphira tuh Piter ccu leihpaw khe vaekheihmawte khuliakuh zah phe a chih; te ccangvae`ae nynh tee`ae zah a chi paw kha he muih`ae tuh cciakhae`ae zah a vawpaw pe khe a uubua`ae.
Te hynh-e kong a thae paw ccungccaw patae te kriccawbu balyn tuh myarya a rih`ae.
Te locceihtu`ae kuih liate ccungccaw`ae laku muihsanaw`ae te khuaruarunaw`ae patae langsaku athua. Te minmin balyn tuh Solomon Maepaw kya pynkheihlan a um`ae.
Te tuhlaepaw hung ccungccaw sanmah minmin kalan pykuh bua ngan khyh`ae; thuasalama ccungccaw`ae nynh minmin kha kou a hothung`ae.
Te nopi ry, pise ry ccungccaw zapi zyntu`ae kha Bawipaw kalan houhouh biachih athua.
Piter nynh po yn ccia vae ze a mynlyh nynh san lukhakheit tungvaw kya a khaw ccaw cite ngeccih`ae kha laanpi lang oun cciakhae`ae zah ikhung te iphae vawlan a nung`ae.
A pepan e khua`ae kyate ccungccaw zapi mah Jerusalem lang oun thua`ae zah ngeccih`ae te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae nynh vawsaw pya`ae paw kha oun cciakhae`ae; te minmin balyn tuh marya dansah athua`ae.
Oute ranpibawi lupi te amaw ryte umkheih`ae paw, Sadusi`ae balyn tuh thokuh`ae zah thinrianaw te phe beih`ae.
Te locceihtu`ae kha kyng`ae zah ranzae thunginn lungkhu khe a saw`ae.
Thuasalama khuazi khe Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh thunginn thuakaw`ae kha hung zah minmin kha poukhae`ae zah,
“Cceih oh, tempal kya thadyn oh lah hynh-e hiinnaw bya`ae balyn hynh ccungccaw`ae kalan hopah oh,” a cipya`ae.

Te minmin nynh kha-e kha he a thae`ae tuh awkhua takaw khe tempal lungkhu lang tee`ae zah a ccangpya`ae. Thuasalama ranpibawi lupi te amaw ryte umkheih`ae paw nynh oun thua`ae zah kungsi`ae te Israel ccungccaw`ae kya-e piccang`ae balyn kha ko`ae zah locceihtu`ae kha mih kalan cciakhae khylan ccungccaw`ae kha thunginn lang a saw`ae.
Thuasalama tempal ringtu`ae nynh thunginn kya thua`ae zah zuitu`ae kha he muih vae khyh`ae tuh ki`ae zah,

“Thunginn tynkaringlan akhawkuh paw kha kae muih ccaccing, te thung a ngawtu`ae mah thuakaw malang atolang khe a la thadyn`ae; thuasalama thuakaw he kae hung tuh a lungkhu kya hung ccungccaw sanmah kae muih khyh!” cite a ho`ae.
Atu ranpibawi lupi, te tempal ngawtu lupi te alepaw ranpibawi`ae nynh kha-e kong kha he thae`ae tuh paw vema yn cyikuh cih cite mih khuaruaru.
Oute ccungccaw lukheit yn thua zah, “Dotua oh, nanning nynh thunginn kya na saw oh paw ccungccaw`ae tuh tempal kya thadyn`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha a ccangpya`ae!” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
Oute tempal ngawtu lupi tuh tempal ngawtu`ae ryte cceih`ae zah locceihtu`ae kha reihi- reih-ae nung leite a cciakhae`ae; pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh lung te oun deihsei cih`ae cite a rih`ae.
Te minmin kha cciakhae`ae zah kungsi`ae malang khe a nung`ae. Te ranpibawi lupi nynh,

“Hynh-e min te na ccangpah lan khyh oh cite tyntetyn lang nanning kha kaw kae pya khyh oh tou? Te dotua oh, nanning nynh Jerusalem kya nae doctrine te phe na biasah oh zah hynh-e Ccungccapaw chii hynh kaening tungvaw thuasah lan na paccynku oh!” cite minmin kha a khia`ae.
Oute Piter te ccangpaw zuitu`ae nynh, “Ccungccaw`ae bya laeze Pachia bya hynh kaening tuh kae ngae hua aho.
Nanning nynh thing vawlan na sae oh zah na chia oh paw Jesu kha aening ah minpaaw`ae Pachia nynh phe thosah vae.
Israel`ae kha ngaesikunaw te seingaethyanaw pya khylan Pachia nynh amaw kha uktu Bawi lang te Khumtu lang khang zah a ranglang khe phe a hangthung vae.
Te kaening tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae konglang a ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua; te Pachia nynh amaw kaw a ngae paw ccungccaw`ae kha a pya paw Thyaa Muisaw mah ccaekia nynh athuabua,” a ci`ae.
Tuh-e bya he thae`ae tuh mih bungpaw zah minmin kha chia lan khuakhanku`ae.
Oute ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh sawtua`ae paw, kawbya ccangpatu, Kamaliel acikuh paw, Farasipaw nynh kungsi kya thadyn zah locceihtu`ae kha atolang sosoh pousah lan kawpya`ae.
Te ccungccaw`ae kha, “Israel ccungccaw`ae nanning, hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tungvaw cyi lan na paccynku vae oh paw hynh hoyte tuakuh oh.

Pawccecize anuhlang lya Theudas acikuh paw nynh thokuh zah amaw te amaw kha ccungccaw lukheit nynh ka thuabua cite a pooku. Te ccungccaw zapali loukaw amaw kalan a mungkuh bua`ae. Aning tuh chia thua zah amaw kawngae`ae paw balyn tuh pung phiakuh`ae zah pawlang tang khyh`ae.

Tuh-e paw koute milu ccazing law ccyh lyakhe Judas acikuh paw Galilee paw nynh thokuh zah ccungccaw patae kha amaw nuhlang a zuisahku`ae. Aning mah phe chih zah amaw a zui`ae paw balyn mah pung phiakuh`ae.
Te atu nanning kha kae hopya oh, hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh sibia oh lah mimaw um lan um`ae sah; pawccecize hynh-e khuakhannaw te hynh-e ryalawnaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kya-e athua ze pawlang tang lan khyh.
Thuasalama e tuh Pachia kya-e athua lanze nanning nynh na roh kho lan khyh oh; naemaw kha Pachia rawsetu`ae lang poh nae tang sei paleih oh zya,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te tuh-e bya tuh minmin nynh mih nawccah; te minmin nynh locceihtu`ae kha ko`ae zah a bua`ae koute Jesu min te phung na ho vae lan khyh oh cite kawpya`ae zah minmin kha a cciasah`ae.
Locceihtu`ae tuh Jesu min hanlan maethyanaw teing lan angaekuh`ae cite oun tuabua`ae cikuh`ae zah kungsi`ae mitmuihnaw kyate lungtuate a pou`ae.
Te Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite tempal kya te inn takyh kya ccangpyanaw te phunghonaw kha nin takyh dae khyh`ae.

Te tuh-e ccyh lya zuitu`ae he a pungthung`ae tuh Helenih`ae nynh Hebru`ae kha rawsete ccohnuakunaw yn pou; pawccecize Helenih`ae mih numae`ae kha nin takyh looh pyanaw kya pyabua khyh`ae cite a ccohnuaku`ae.
Oute locceihtu luhaw laening nynh zuitu`ae patae kha ko`ae zah, “Aening nynh Pachia bya hynh cciataw te ccaboi rya hynh ah law lan oh ccan khyh.
Tukeiccu uteno`ae, Thyaa Muisaw te, hawnaw te phe beihpaw, thehoyccoupaw ccungccaw lusari kha nanning laku ccung oh, hynh-e ryalaw hanlan minmin kha ah khang oh ccaw.
Thuasalama aening tuh sawsangnaw kalan te Pachia bya ryalawnaw kalan hynh pei ah pyakuh ngaw oh,” a ci`ae.

Te tuh-e bya nynh ccungccaw zapi khaleih kha lungrythuasah. Te minmin nynh zynnaw te, Thyaa Muisaw te, phe beihpaw Stifen, te Filip, Prokhoras, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, te Antiok khua paw Jew beiknaw kalan a paleikuh paw Nikolas kha a po`ae.
Khae` ae kha locceihtu`ae malang a nung`ae; te locceihtu`ae nynh sawsangpah`ae zah mih kuih kha minmin tungvaw a khan`ae.
Te Pachia bya tuh pazaekuh zah zuitu`ae tuh Jerusalem kya houh pungthung`ae; te ranpibawi`ae patae pi nynh zynnaw kaw a ngae`ae.
Te Stifen tuh zynnaw te, thungnaw te, phe beihpaw thua zah myarya alepaw khuaruaru ngaeangnaw te muihsanaw kha ccungccaw`ae laku kya a langsaku.
Oute a lue`ae paw kya-e Sinakok a ci`ae paw kyate Sairenia`ae, Alexandria`ae, Silisia ram e te Asia ram e ccungccaw`ae abang nynh thokuh`ae zah Stifen ryte a eikuh`ae.
Tuhzemah Stifen nynh a honawpaw hawnaw te Muisaw kha minmin nynh khee kho khyh`ae.
Oute, “Hynh-e paw nynh Mawsi te Pachia kha alue lante bya a ho paw kaening nynh phe kae thae,” cite a ho lanpaw ccungccaw`ae kha minmin nynh aphiru lante zya a soih`ae.
Te minmin nynh ccungccaw`ae, piccang`ae te kawbya ccangpatu`ae kha a hy`ae; te Stifen kha ccianua`ae zah a kyng`ae, te kungsi zung lang a cciakhae`ae.
Te minmin nynh ahme leipaw ccaekia`ae kha konua`ae zah, kha-e`ae nynh, “Hynh-e paw nynh hynh-e athyaapaw hmin te Kawbya hynh alue lante bya pei a ho;

pawccecize, ‘Nazareth paw hynh-e Jesu nynh hynh-e hmin hynh yn roh cih zah Mawsi nynh aening oun pya paw phungbya kha yn rulae cih,’ cite hynh-e paw nynh a hopaw kha kaening nynh phe kae thae,” a ci`ae.
Te kungsi zung kya a dahung`ae paw balyn nynh Stifen kha rirido`ae tuh a mae kha vaaw ccungccapaw mae hawte a muih`ae.
Te ranpibawi lupi nynh, “Tuh-e bya`ae tuh tuhte thua tou?” cite a khia.
Te Stifen nynh, “Uteno`ae te paaw`ae, la ngaetua oh: Ah minpaaw Abraham nynh Haran kya a um maw, Mesopotamia ram kya a um lyaze phu-enaw Pachia nynh a kya langkuh zah,
‘Na umnaw ram kyate pou lah na puithua`ae kha poutaw`ae lah kae nynh kae muihsah cih paw ram kalan khe cceih,’ a cipya.
“Oute Abraham tuh Kaldian ram kyate toikuh zah Haran kyakhe a um; te tuin kyate a paaw he chih tuh atu nanning na umnaw oh hynh-e ram kalan hin Pachia nynh a nuesaku.

Te e ram kya ccuphelyh sanmah Pachia nynh amaw kha rho lang pya khyh; tuhzemah Abraham nynh ccaaw lukheit san a saah mawze amaw te a ciihan`ae hanlan e ram hynh rho lang kae pya cih cite Pachia nynh bya phe kinpyaku vae.
Te Pachia nynh hynhte a ho: A ciihan`ae tuh ram ccangpaw kya a khia a vekuh cih`ae, te minmin tuh seetangnaw kalan cciakhae athua cih`ae zah kum zapali cia ming`ae nynh a tua a sah cih`ae.
‘Te minmin seetangnaw kya a nung`ae paw minphuin kha kae nynh bya ka pia cih,’ Pachia nynh a ci; ‘ou tuhkoute minmin tuh a pou cih`ae zah hynh-e hmin kya kamaw kha rya yn lawpah cih`ae,’ a ci.

Te Pachia nynh vindung awkunaw te asekuhpaw byakinnaw kha Abraham kalan a pya. Tukeiccu Abraham nynh Isaak kha saah zah nin taryanaw kya vindung awpya, te Isaak nynh Jakob a saah, te Jakob nynh ciihan kyaze phinthonaw paaw`ae luhaw laening kha a saah.
“Te ciihan kyaze paaw`ae nynh eiungnaw hoi`ae zah Josef kha Izip ram lang a zua`ae. Thuasalama Pachia tuh Josef ryte um zah,
a vawsawnaw balyn kyate amaw kha luesah zah Izip siapharan Pharoh malang maehoynaw te hawnaw kha a pya; te Pharoh nynh Izip ram uktu lang te a innbyn balyn uktu lang Josef kha a khang.
“Oute Izip ram balyn te Kanaan ram balyn kya ccakangnaw te alepipaw vawsawnaw um zah ah paaw`ae tuh ae lanpaw hoi vae khyh`ae.
Thuasalama Jakob nynh Izip ram kya looh a um cipaw he a thae tuh ah minpaaw`ae kha masaty a saw`ae.
Te vaeningnaw kya Josef nynh a u`ae kha a nysaku`ae; te Josef puithua`ae kha Pharoh kalan a nysah`ae.
Oute Josef nynh a paaw Jakob kha byataw zah a puithua`ae balyn sungsari lu pangaw kha amaw kalan a kobua`ae.
Te Jakob tuh Izip ram lang cceihbung zah tuin kya amaw te ah minpaaw`ae tuh phe chih`ae.
Te minmin kha Shekem khua lan cciakhae`ae zah Shekem kyaze paaw athua paw Hamor a ccaaw`ae kya-e Abraham nynh phua te a re paw shawku kyakhe a ccy`ae.
“Thuasalama Pachia nynh Abraham kya byakinpyakupaw byakinnaw ccyh thuanaw he anae tuh kha-e ccungccaw`ae tuh Izip ram kya pungthung`ae zah,
Josef kha a nyh leipaw ccangpaw siapharan alangkuh cia a pungthung`ae.
Kha-e paw nynh aening ah puithua`ae kha phee`ae zah mih ccaaw taraw`ae kha a chi ccaw`ae cite ccaring na vua cih oh cite ah minpaaw`ae kha a tua a sah`ae.
“Ou tuh-e ccyh lya tuin myarya apuithyapaw Mawsi tuh pui zah a paaw inn kya sathung cia a kua`ae.
Te aning kha ccaring he vua`ae te Pharoh ccanung nynh khuinkuh zah amaw a ccapaw lang a kuaku.
Te Mawsi tuh Izip ccungccaw`ae kya-e hawnaw balyn kha marya ccangkuh zah byahonaw kya te ryalawnaw kya a thungpaw nynh thua.
“Te aning nynh kum sungpali he accing tuh Israel ccungccaw`ae a uno`ae kalan pae rynaw thinlung yn hoi.
Te a unopaw lukheit kha Izippaw nynh a tua a sah paw kha he a muih tuh pangkhaw zah a hanlan ccaeliarupya, te Izippaw kha phe a buatheih.
Te Pachia nynh minmin kha hynh-e paw kuih liate yn luesah cih`ae cipaw kha a uno`ae nynh mang a nyhthya cih`ae cite Mawsi nynh a tuaku; thuasalama minmin nynh nyhthya khyh`ae.
Te awkhualan mimaw te mimaw a pekuh`ae paw kalan khe cceih zah, ‘Ccungccaw`ae pi hynh lou, nanning tuh uteno khaw na thua oh, pawccemou naemaw te naemaw na peku oh?’ cite minmin kha a phia`ae.
“Thuasalama a innpaw paw kha atazae leite a cyihtupaw nynh Mawsi kha daetu zah, ‘Hung nynh mou nang hynh kaening tungvaw uktu lang te byapiatu lang ae khang?
Inkhawnin Izippaw na chia hawte kamaw hynh chia lan nae ry tou?’ a ci.
“Tuh-e bya kha Mawsi nynh he a thae tuh ccue zah Midian ram kyakhe mikhiapaw lang a tang, tuin kya ccapaw luning a saah.
“Te kum sungpali he aro tuh Sinai Mua kin rangkaw khe thabu kya aruapaw maeesoi kyakhe Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh Mawsi kalan a langkuh.
Kha-e kha Mawsi nynh he a muih tuh a ngaeangthua zah a pe lante do lan cite he a naekuh tuh Bawipaw kyate roi nynh a kalan yn ccae zah,
‘Kae tuh na minpaaw`ae Pachia, Abraham Pachia, Isaak Pachia te Jakob Pachia nynh ka thua,’ a cipya. Te Mawsi tuh thyngkuh zah do ngan vae khyh.
Oute BAWIPAW nynh, ‘Na phanah kha na ccu kyate khahkuh, pawccecize na thadynnaw hmin tuh athyaapaw laekua nynh thua.

Izip ram kya um`ae paw ka ccungccaw`ae kya-e vawsaw riathaenaw kha phe ka muih ccaccing vae, te minmin nynh a siaruanaw`ae paw roi kha phe ka thae vae zah minmin kha thua khylan nynh kae rungbung; atu rang lah nang kha Izip ram lang kae saw cih,’ a cipya.

“ ‘Hung nynh mou nang hynh uktu lang te byapiatu lang ae khang?’ cite minmin nynh a nue`ae paw kha-e Mawsi ccaccei kha Pachia nynh uktu lang te luesatu lang thabu kya yn langkuh paw vaaw ccungccapaw liate a saw paw nynh thua.
Aning nynh Israel ccungccaw`ae kha poukhae`ae zah Izip ram kya, Rili Se kya te rangkaw kyakhe kum sungpali lungkhu khuaruaru ngaeangnaw te muihsanaw kha a langsapya`ae.

“Tuh-e paw tuh Israel ccungccaw`ae kalan, ‘BAWIPAW nae Pachia nynh nae uno`ae kyate kamaw alopaw Profeh lukheit kha nanning hanlan yn pousah cih, amaw bya kha na ngae cih oh,’ cite a hotupaw Mawsi nynh athua.

“Aning tuh rangkaw kya pumkunaw kya thuasah, Sinai Mua kya amaw kalan bya a hopah paw vaaw ccungccapaw ryte thuasah, aening ah minpaaw`ae ryte thuasah a la um paw, aening kalan pya lanpaw ahiinpaw byaphy kha a mue paw nynh thua.
Amaw bya kha aening ah minpaaw`ae nynh la ngae khyh`ae, thuasalama phe a nue`ae. Te mih thinlung kyate Izip ram lang bua ki a ry`ae keiccu,

Aaron kha, ‘Kaening malang a cceih lanpaw pachia`ae kha kaening hanlan yn raepah; Izip ram kyate kaening oun cciakhaetupaw hynh-e Mawsi kya pawcihte nynh acyiku cipaw kae nynh vae khyh,’ cite a hopya`ae.
Te tuh-e nin kya minmin nynh vaetua tohlaw kha rae`ae zah kha-e zohtuh kalan silawkunaw a rae`ae. Mimaw mih kuih te a rae`ae paw kya mih lungpaw.
Profeh`ae ccauh kya, ‘Pou Israel ccungccaw`ae, nanning nynh rangkaw kya kum sungpali cia na chia oh paw saring`ae te silawkunaw`ae kha kamaw kalan tou nae pya oh?

Nanning nynh Moloh e bu te nae pachia Remphan kya-e awsi, beik lan na raeku oh paw azuh`ae kha phe na lawku vae oh; tukeiccu kae mah nanning kha Babilon khuapi khunglang kae cciakhae cih oh,’ cite azeikuh hawte, Pachia nynh paleihtawkuh`ae zah vaawran kya-e uccaw`ae kha beik khylan minmin kha phe a vua vae`ae.

“Mawsi nynh a muih paw pungsan thyhte ccaekia te asekuhpaw beikbuu kha na rae cih cite Pachia nynh Mawsi kha a hopya hawte, rangkaw kya ccaekia te asekuhpaw beikbuu kha aening ah minpaaw`ae nynh a hoi`ae.

Nuhlang te a thua`ae paw aening ah paaw`ae nynh kha-e beikbuu kha Zenta`ae nynh a peenaw`ae ram lungkhu lang Joshua ryte a teekhae`ae. Kha-e Zenta`ae kha Pachia nynh David she kyacia aening ah minpaaw`ae kyate a deepya`ae.
David tuh Pachia kya-e maehoynaw kha mue zah Jakob Pachia umnaw lanpaw ahmin muepya lan a peki.
Thuasalama Solomon nynh Pachia hanlan tempal kha a sak.
“Tuhzemah Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia tuh kuih te rae paw tempal kya um khyh.

“ ‘Vaawran tuh ka suitungkhung thua zah laephi tuh ka ccusynaw nynh thua; pawtahawpaw inn mou nanning nynh nae sakpah cih oh?’ BAWIPAW nynh a ci. ‘Tukhyhze ka hae-ungnaw ahmin tuh pawtahawpaw mou athua?
Hynh-e`ae balyn tuh ka kuih nynh a rae paw thua khyh tou? a ci,’ cite profeh nynh a ho hawte nynh thua.
“Lungkhung`ae zah thinlung kya te nakaring kya vindung awkuh lei`ae paw nanning! Thyaa Muisaw kha pei na rawse oh; nae minpaaw`ae nynh a cyi`ae hawte nanning mah na cyibua oh.

Nae minpaaw`ae nynh hung profeh kha mou tuasah leite a nung`ae? Adingpaw Ccungccapaw yn thuanaw lanpaw kong a hopaty`ae paw kha minmin nynh phe chia`ae; atu nanning tuh kha-e Adingpaw a pheetu`ae te a theihtu`ae nynh na thua oh.
Nanning tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae paccynpyanaw liate kawbya kha na mue oh zemah na zui khyh oh,” cite Stifen nynh a ci.
Minmin nynh hynh-e bya`ae kha he a thae`ae tuh mih bungpaw zah Stifen kha mih hawzynua`ae.
Thuasalama Stifen tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah vaawran langkhe riridothung zah Pachia phu-enaw te Pachia ranglang a thadyn paw Jesu kha a muih.
Te Stifen nynh, “Dotua oh, vaawran ahungkuhpaw te Ccungccaw Ccapaw nynh Pachia ranglang a thadyn paw kha ka muih,” a ci.
Oute minmin nynh roi accae lante thawte sia`ae zah mih nakaring kha huhkuh`ae zah pynkheih lante Stifen kha a ccuenua`ae,
te khuapi atolang khe ccaring vua`ae zah lung te a deih`ae. Te ccaekia`ae nynh mih uccaw`ae kha Saul acikuh paw ccangvaepaw ccu leihpaw khe a pung`ae.
Te minmin nynh lung te a deih`ae lyakhe, Stifen nynh Bawipaw kha ko zah, “Bawipaw Jesu, ka muisaw hynh yn lawpah,” a ci.
Te a ccukharutung zah, “Bawipaw, hynh-e seinaw hynh minmin kya ccuinpah nan`ae,” cite roi accae lante a sia. Te hynh-e he a ho koute zya a ih vae.

Te Stifen a chianaw`ae kya Saul mah a nawccahbua. Tuh ccyh lya Jerusalem kya um paw kriccawbu kya alepipaw tuasahnaw a um; te locceihtu`ae holeite, kriccaw`ae balyn tuh Judah pee te Samaria pee kya po phiariphiarae pung a um`ae.
Te beiknaw lante a zuakuhpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Stifen kha uh`ae zah a hanlan thawmawte a raw a khui`ae.
Saul nynh tuh kriccawbu thawte ronaw kha a rae. Inn takyh lungkhu lang tee zah nopi`ae, pise`ae kha sue`ae zah thunginn kya a sang`ae.
Tukeiccu phiariphiarae um`ae paw nynh ahmin takyh lang cceih`ae zah Pachia bya kha a ho`ae.
Oute Filip tuh Samaria khuapi lang cceihbung zah Kri thehoypaw kha a hopya`ae.
Te ccungccaw zapi nynh thae`ae zah Filip nynh a langsakupaw muihsanaw`ae kha he muih`ae tuh a hopaw bya kha pynkheihlan a ngae`ae.
Pawccecize athyaa leipaw muisaw bahkuhpaw ccungccaw`ae lungkhu te athyaa leipaw muisaw`ae tuh raerae sia`ae zah a pou`ae; te kuihccuchihpaw patae te a ccukhou`ae paw patae tuh a dan`ae.
Te tuh-e khuapi kya alepipaw lungtuanaw a um.

Thuasalama Simon acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit nynh tuh-e khuapi kya langmaw lya mitleihthyanaw la pia he zah amaw tuh alesaepaw ccungccaw nynh ka thua la cikuh zah Samaria khuapi kya-e ccungccaw`ae kha mih ngaeang la thuasah`ae.
Te adih huapaw kyate alehua paw kyacia, minmin balyn nynh amaw kalan khe mih nawtua`ae zah, “E ccungccapaw tuh Pachia kya-e alepaw thungnaw nynh thua,” cite a ho`ae.
Te mitleihthyanaw te minmin kha khaw cia mih ngaeangthuasah vae`ae keiccuze minmin nynh amaw kalan mih nawtua`ae.
Thuasalama Filip nynh Pachia peenaw konglang te Jesu Kri min kong a hopaw kha minmin nynh he a zyn`ae tuh nopi ry, pise ry baptisma-in`ae.
Oute Simon amaw mah a zyn bua vae; te baptisma-in koute Filip kya zuikuh bua zah alangkuh paw khuaruaru lan um paw ryalaw`ae te muihsanaw`ae kha muih zah a ngaeang myarya thua.
Te Jerusalem kya um paw locceihtu`ae nynh Pachia bya kha Samaria`ae nynh phe ccoubua vae`ae cipaw kha he a thae`ae tuh Piter te Johan kha minmin kalan a saw`ae.
Tuh-e`ae nynh he thua`ae tuh Samaria`ae nynh Thyaa Muisaw a ccoubua ccaw`ae cite mih hanlan sawsangpya`ae.
Pawccecize minmin tuh Bawipaw Jesu min kya kyalya baptisma-in`ae zah minmin kyaze hung tungvaw sanmah Thyaa Muisaw ccah bang loh khyh.
Oute Piter te Johan nynh mih kuih kha mih tungvaw khang`ae zah minmin nynh Thyaa Muisaw kha a mue`ae.
Te locceihtu`ae kuih khangnaw liate Thyaa Muisaw tuh mue athua cipaw kha Simon nynh he a muih tuh minmin kha phua pya`ae zah,
“A tungvaw kuih ka khang paw miakaw nynh Thyaa Muisaw a ccoubua nawlan kae mah hynh-e kawhoinaw kha yn pyabua oh,” a cipya`ae.
Thuasalama Piter nynh, “Pachia lasung tuh phua te re kho lan cite na tuaku keiccuze na phua tuh namaw ryte rohsah!
Nang tuh hynh-e kya na sekuh bua khyh; pawccecize na thinlung tuh Pachia mitmuihnaw kya hme khyh.
Tukeiccu hynh-e na hoyleinaw kong hynh ngaesikuh lah na thinlung-tuanaw kha ngaethya na thua nawlan Pachia kalan sawsangkuh.
Pawccecize nang tuh khyanaw kya-e sanyngkhaw kya te hoyleinaw kya-e seetangnaw kya nynh na um cipaw ka ny,” a cipya.
Oute Simon nynh, “Hynh-e na hopaw uccaw`ae hynh ka tungvaw kya ccangkheit san a thua khyh nawlan nanning nynh ka hanlan Bawipaw kalan saw oun sangpah bua oh,” cite a khung.
Te minmin nynh ccaekiakhan`ae zah Bawipaw bya kha he a ho`ae koute Jerusalem lang ki`ae zah Samaria`ae khua patae kya thehoypaw kha a ho`ae.
Te Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh Filip kha, “Thokuh lah Jerusalem kyate Gaza lang a cceihbung paw rangkaw laanpi khate alia langkhe cceihbung,” cite a hopya. Tuh-e tuh rangkaw nynh thua.

Te Filip tuh thokuh zah a cceih. Te dotua, Ethiopia siapharannung Kandas kuihkaw alepipaw kawhoinaw hoitu, siapharannung sisua balyn dooihtu tingreihkuh paw Ethiopiapaw tuh Pachia beik lan cite Jerusalem lang cceih zah,
he a ki lyakhe, amaw vaetualee kyakhe dahung zah profeh Isaiah ccauh kha a ria.
Te Muisaw nynh Filip kha, “Cceih, naekuh lah hynh-e vaetualee kalan kaebua,” a cipya.
Te Filip nynh a kalan khe ccue zah, tuh-e paw nynh profeh Isaiah ccauh a ria paw kha he a thae tuh, “Na ria paw kha nang nynh na thaethya tou?” cite a khia.
Te aning nynh, “Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh yn hopya khyh lanze pawtemou kae nynh ka thaethya kho cih?” a ci. Te aning nynh Filip kha amaw ryte dahungkheih lan yn kaebua cite a ko.
Kha-e paw nynh a ria paw Ccathyaa tuh: “Sawtheihtupaw kalan a cciakhae`ae paw tuu hawte amaw kha a cciakhae`ae; te tuutaw nynh a mingngotupaw malang sia leite a um hawte aning tuh a mung kha a myh.
Zakaw a sangsakunaw kya ming`ae nynh atazae lei lante amaw kha byapia`ae; amaw hiinnaw kha laephi kyate lawpya athua keiccuze hung nynh mou a ciihan`ae kha a thaesah vae cih?” a cikuh.
Tuh-e tingreihkuh paw nynh, “Hynh-e hynh profeh nynh hungmou a honuathe? Amaw tou? Tukhyhze mingccangpaw tou a honuathe? Beih yn hopah,” cite Filip kha a khia.
Oute Filip nynh kha-e Ccathyaa khate tho zah Jesu kong kha a hopya.
Minmin nynh tuhte laanpi kya he a cceih`ae tuh tui umnaw sang kheit kya a thua`ae; te tingreihkuh paw nynh, “Dotua, hynh-e kya tui phang um; baptisma-in lan pawnynh mou kamaw hynh yn khaw?” a ci.
Te Filip nynh, “Nang nynh na thinlung balynte na zyn thua ze na in kho,” a cipya. Te aning nynh, “Jesu Kri tuh Pachia Ccapaw cipaw ka zyn,” cite a khung.
Te vaetualee kha thadyn sah lan kawpya zah minmin paryhte, Filip te tingreihkuh paw, tui lungkhu lang cceihbung`ae zah Filip nynh kha-e paw kha baptisma-in sah.
Te minmin nynh tui kyate he oun pou`ae tuh Bawipaw kya-e Muisaw nynh Filip kha po zoukhae zah tingreihkuh paw nynh muih vae khyh; te aning tuh a ccianaw laanpi kya lungtuate a cceih.
Thuasalama Filip tuh Azotas khua kyakhe langkuh zah tuin kyate Sisaria khua kyacia khua takyh kalan khe cciate thehoypaw kha a ho.
Te Saul tuh Bawipaw zuitu`ae kha rawsete furawnaw te chianaw kha hy lang sue zah ranpibawi lupi kalan khe cceih zah,

pise zemah, nopi zemah e Ccianaw kya-e lukhakheit kha a muih ze kyng lan zah Jerusalem lang cciakhae khylan cite Damaskas khua kya um paw sinakok uktu`ae kalan pya lanpaw ccaw`ae kha amaw kyakhe a ngiaku.
Te tuhte khuaccung zah Damaskas khua pe yn thua; te vaawran kyate awnaw nynh amaw po voilu lan vaekheihmawte phaephae a ah.
Te aning tuh laephi kya a khuliakuh; te, “Saul, Saul, pawccemou nang nynh kamaw hynh nae tua nae sah?” cite a hopah paw roi kha a thae.
Te Saul nynh, “Bawipaw, nang tuh hungmou?” cite a khung. Te Bawipaw nynh, “Kae tuh na tua na sah paw Jesu nynh ka thua; ccungzuing kha na sy lanze na hanlan arupaw nynh thua,” a cipya.
Te aning nynh thyngkute a ngaeangthua zah, “Bawipaw, pawmou nae cyisah ry?” a ci. Te Bawipaw nynh, “Thokuh lah khualae lungkhu langkhe cceih lah na cyi lanpaw kha ae la hopah cih`ae,” a cipya.
Te amaw ryte khuaccung`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh yccae leite a thadyn`ae, roi kha a thae`ae zemah hung ccungccaw san muih khyh`ae.
Te Saul tuh laephi kyate thokuh zah a mit he dae tuh hung sanmah muih kho vae khyh; te minmin nynh a kuih te kyng`ae zah Damaskas khua lungkhu lang a cciakhae`ae.
Te aning tuh nin thung cia ngawmuih khyh zah looh mah ae khyh, tui mah neih khyh.
Te Damaskas khua kya Ananias acikuh paw zuitu lukheit a um; Bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kalan vizin kyate, “Ananias,” cite a ko. Te aning nynh, “Bawipaw, dotua e kya mang ka um,” a ci.
Te Bawipaw nynh, “Thokuh lah Adingpaw cite minphu`ae paw laanpi langkhe cceih lah Judas inn kyakhe Tarsuh khua paw Saul acikuh paw kha la ccung, pawccecize aning tuh sawsang cciamang.
Ananias acikuh paw nynh yn tee zah a mit ngawmuih nawlan amaw tungvaw a kuih khang paw kha vizin kyate phe a muih vae,” a cipya.
Oute Ananias nynh, “Bawipaw, kha-e paw nynh Jerusalem kya na mithyaa`ae tungvaw hoyleinaw kha pawcih nynh a rae cipaw kha ccungccaw patae nynh a ho`ae paw ka thae.
Te na min a ko paw balyn kha kyng kho nawlan, e kya kawhoinaw kha alepaw ranpibawi`ae kyate a mue,” a ci.
Thuasalama Bawipaw nynh, “La cceih, pawccecize aning tuh Zenta`ae, siapharan`ae te Israel ccungccaw`ae malang kamaw min ccaekiakhan khylan kamaw nynh ka popaw uccaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize aning tuh kamaw min keiccuze pawcih nynh vawsaw teing cih cipaw kae nynh amaw kha ka langsapah cih,” a cipya.

Te Ananias tuh cceih zah inn lungkhu lang a tee; te a kuih kha Saul tungvaw khang zah, “Ka neitaw Saul, nae ccia lya laanpi kya na kalan yn langkuh paw Bawipaw Jesu ccaccei nynh, nang ngaw na muih nawlan te Thyaa Muisaw te phe na bia nawlan kamaw hynh yn saw,” a cipya.
Te vaekheihmawte Saul mit kyate ngasawkaleih akhuakuh paw hawte thua zah ngawmuih vae, te thokuh zah baptisma-in.
Te aning tuh aepaw ae zah a thaw yn sae vae. Oute Saul tuh Damaskas khua kya um paw zuitu`ae ryte nin khaw cia a umkheih`ae.
Te Paul nynh sinakok kyakhe, “Jesu tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua,” cite Kri kong kha palou a ho kanmaw vae.

Te a hopaw kha a thae paw balyn nynh mih ngaeangthua zah, “E paw hynh Jerusalem kya Bawipaw min te sawsang`ae paw kha a rohtu te minmin kha hee lan zah alepaw ranpibawi`ae kalan cciakhae khylan cite hynhlang yn cceihtupaw kha thua khyh tou?” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Saul tuh a thaw houhouh sae zah hynh-e Jesu tuh Kri ccaccing nynh thua cite he a ccaesah tuh Damaskas khua kya um paw Jew`ae kha mih ngaeangthuasah`ae.
Te nin patae aro koute Jew`ae nynh Saul kha chia lan cite khuakhanku`ae.
Thuasalama kha-e mih khuakhannaw kha Saul nynh phe a ny. Te minmin nynh Saul kha kae chia ccaw cite koikua kha khuazi, khuadae pei a ngaw`ae.
Tukeiccu zuitu`ae nynh Saul kha khuazi khe laah`ae zah sua kya phang`ae zah khua lungrua vawlan te a sawbung`ae.
Te Saul nynh Jerusalem lang he a thua tuh zuitu`ae kalan mungku bua lan a noukuh; thuasalama minmin balyn nynh aning tuh zuitu nynh athua cipaw zyn khyh`ae zah amaw kha a rih`ae.

Thuasalama Barnabas nynh amaw kha hoei zah locceihtu`ae kalan a cciakhae. Te aning nynh Bawipaw kha laanpi kya pawcihte nynh a muih cipaw, Bawipaw nynh a kalan byahopya paw te aning nynh Damaskas kya Jesu min te rawhoy te phungho cipaw kha a hopya`ae.
Te Saul tuh Jerusalem kya locceihtu`ae ryte teekheih`ae zah a poukheih vae`ae.
Te Saul nynh Bawipaw Jesu min te rawhoy te phung a ho; te Helenih`ae ryte bya a eikuh`ae; te minmin nynh Saul kha chia lan a nouku`ae.
Kha-e kha uteno`ae nynh he nyh`ae tuh Saul kha Sisaria khua lang cciakhae bung`ae zah Tarsuh khua lang a saw`ae.
Oute Judah ram, Galilee ram te Samaria ram balyn kya kriccawbu`ae tuh daenaw hoi`ae zah tynsathung athua`ae. Te Bawipaw rawrinaw kya te Thyaa Muisaw ngaengansanaw kyakhe um`ae zah a pungthung`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Piter tuh ahmin takyh kalan po khuaccung zah Luda khua kya a um paw mithyaa`ae kalan po a thua.
Te tuin kya kum tarya cia a iphae kya huekuh zah a kuihccuchihpaw Aenias acikuh paw ccungccapaw kha a muih.
Te Piter nynh, “Aenias, Jesu Kri nynh nang kha ae dansah, thokuh lah na iphae kha kuekuh,” a cipya. Te aning tuh vaekheihmawte po a thokuh.
Te Luda khua te Saron khua kya um`ae paw balyn nynh khae paw kha muih`ae zah Bawipaw kalan a paleihkuh`ae.

Joppa khua kya Tabitha acikuh nung zuitu lukheit a um; Tabitha cipaw asuilan tuh Dorkas cipaw nynh thua. Tuh-e nopinung tuh ahoypaw ryalaw te thuasah, pyanaw cyisahnaw te thuasah phe beihpaw nynh thua.
Te tuh-e nin ccyh lya aning tuh ccih zah phe a chih; tui he a sing`ae koute palung khaan kyakhe a nung`ae.

Te Luda khua tuh Joppa khua te anaekuh paw thua zah tuh-e khua kya Piter a um cipaw kha zuitu`ae nynh he thae`ae tuh Piter nynh mih kalan arangte yn ccia ccaw cite ccungccaw luning kha Piter kalan saw`ae zah a kosah`ae.

Oute Piter tuh thokuh zah minmin ryte a cceih`ae. He a thua tuh palung khaan lang a kaekhae`ae; te numae`ae balyn nynh a pe khe thadynte rah`ae zah minmin ryte Dorkas nynh a um lyaze a kua paw angki te uccaw`ae kha a muihsah`ae.

Thuasalama Piter nynh minmin balyn kha pung a pousah`ae; te ccukharutung zah sawsang. Te kha-e a rhua kalan khe maeleihkuh zah, “Tabitha, tho,” a ci. Te kha-e nung nynh a mit kha dae zah Piter kha he a muih tuh thokuh zah a dahung.
Te Piter nynh a kuih kha pya zah po a tho; te mithyaa`ae te numae`ae kha ko`ae zah a hiin vae paw kha-e nung kha a muihsah`ae.
Te kha-e kong kha Joppa khua kya po a ny`ae, te ccungccaw patae nynh Bawipaw kha a zyn`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Piter tuh Joppa khua kyakhe Simon acikuh paw saphua uccaw raetupaw ryte nin patae cia a umkheih`ae.
Sisaria khua kya Itali rhawkawphu acikuh paw kyaze rhawkaw zakheit uktu rhawbawipaw Kawnelia acikuh paw ccungccapaw lukheit a um.
Tuh-e paw tuh amaw inn kya um`ae paw balyn ryte Pachia kalan a zuakuhpaw te Pachia rawrihpaw thua zah ccungccaw`ae kha patae pya zah Pachia kalan tyty sawsangpaw nynh thua.
Nin kheit tuh zete suimilan ccangtakuanaw loukaw khe Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a kalan yn cceih zah, “Kawnelia!” cite a ko paw kha aning nynh vizin kya ccaerarihlan phe a muih.

Te vaaw ccungccapaw kha riri he a do tuh rih zah, “Bawipaw, e tuh pawmou?” cite a khia. Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Na sawsangnaw te ryachi`ae na bawngnawpaw tuh liathuinaw lante Pachia malang phe a thua vae.
Atu Joppa khua langkhe ccungccaw`ae kha saw lah Piter acikuh paw Simon kha kokuh.
Aning tuh saphua raetupaw Simon inn kya nynh a thua, a inn tuh rili kin nynh a um. Aning nynh na cyi lanpaw kha ae la hopah cih,” a cipya.
Te bya a hopah paw vaaw ccungccapaw he a pou koute, Kawnealia nynh a inn kya-e see`ae luning te amaw kha pei ryalawpah`ae paw kyaze Pachia kalan a zuakuhpaw rhawkapaw kha a ko`ae.
Te kha-e uccaw`ae kong balyn kha a hopah`ae koute minmin kha Joppa khua lang a saw`ae.
Awkhualan minmin tuh cceih`ae zah khua kalan he oun naekuh`ae tuh, Piter tuh suimilan ccangtaruhnaw khe sawsang khylan inn tungvaw langkhe a kae.
Te myarya a vuelaw zah aepaw a ae ry; thuasalama aepaw a dopya`ae lyakhe Piter tuh ngawphukuh zah,
vaawran ahungkuhpaw te arae sangpali kya a khii`ae paw alepipaw boeiphae alopaw uccaw tuh amaw kalan yn rungbung zah laephi kalan yn sawbung`ae paw kha a muih.
Tuh-e uccaw kya ccupali asae paw laephi kya-e rangsaw`ae phin, sarepaw`ae phin te vue te a vaw`ae paw phin balyn, te vawlae-e pavaw`ae phin a um.
Te roi ccangkheit a kalan yn thua zah, “Piter, thokuh, theih lah ae,” a cipya.
Thuasalama Piter nynh, “Bawipaw, thua kho lan khyh. Pawccecize huatawpaw te athyaa leipaw uccaw`ae hynh vaekheit sanmah ka ae boi khyh,” a ci.
Te vaeningnaw roi nynh, “Pachia nynh phe a thyaasah vae paw kha nang nynh huatawpaw ci nan,” a cipya.
Hynhcihte vaethung cia acyikuh koute tuhe uccaw tuh vaawran lang bua lawthung athua.

Piter nynh a muih paw vizin hynh paw suilan mou athua ngaw cite he a tuaku cciamang lyakhe, Kawnelia nynh yn saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Simon inn kha oun zaahbia`ae zah sakoih malang khe a thadyn`ae.
Te Piter cite min thawpaw a hoi paw Simon kha e kya a thua tou cite khia lan a ko`ae.
Piter nynh vizin kong a tua cciamang lyakhe, Muisaw nynh, “Dotua, ccungccaw luthung nynh nang kha ae ccung`ae.
Tukeiccu thokuh lah rungbung, lunghiinnaw kharyh hoi leite minmin ryte cceihbua, pawccecize minmin tuh kamaw nynh kae saw`ae paw nynh thua,” a cipya.
Oute Piter tuh Kawnelia nynh yn saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kalan khe rungbung zah, “Dotua oh, kae tuh nanning nynh na ccung oh paw nynh ka thua, paw konglang mou nanning nae thua oh?” a ci.

Te minmin nynh, “Pachia rawrih zah Jew minphuin balyn laku thehoyccoupaw te adingpaw, rhawbawipaw Kawnelia tuh nang kha amaw inn lang kosah lan zah na bya thae khylan athyaapaw vaaw ccungccapaw nynh phe a hopya vae,” a cipya`ae.
Te Piter nynh minmin kha inn lungkhu lang ko`ae zah tuin kya a thuasah`ae. Te awkhualan Piter tuh minmin ryte cceihbua zah Joppa khua e uno`ae abang mah a zuikuh bua`ae.
Te awkhualan koute minmin tuh Sisaria khua lungkhu lang a tee`ae. Te Kawnelia nynh minmin kha la ngaw`ae zah a vaeccaw`ae te a ruiban`ae kha a kobua`ae.
Te Piter he yn tee tuh Kawnelia nynh cciadue zah a ccu leihpaw khe bakhungte a beik.
Thuasalama Piter nynh aning kha tho zah, “Thadyn, kae mah ccungccaw nynh ka thua,” a cipya.
Te Kawnelia ryte byahokuh`ae zah he a tee tuh ccungccaw patae pynkheihlan a um`ae paw kha a muih.

Te Piter nynh, “Jew ccungccaw lukheit hanlan minphuin ccangpaw kalan ccia lanpaw te kungku lanpaw tuh aphung thua khyh cipaw nanning nynh na ny oh. Tuhzemah hung ccungccaw kha sanmah huatawpaw, thyaa khyh cite ka ci vae khyh nawlan Pachia nynh kae kha phe yn langsapya vae.
Tukeiccu kae kha he oun ko`ae tuh mya leite kae cceih; tukeiccu pawkeiccumou kamaw hynh nae kosah oh cipaw kae khiatua ry oh?” a cipya`ae.

Te Kawnelia nynh, “Nin pali aro vae, atu suimilan ccyh kyacia kae tuh looh-ae ka sung; suimilan ccangtakuanaw ccyh kya ka inn kyakhe saw ka sang, te dotua, uccaw phaephae ahpaw alawkuh paw ccungccapaw nynh ka malang khe thadyn zah,
‘Kawnelia, na sawsangnaw tuh thaepya thua zah ryachi`ae na bawngnawpaw tuh Pachia malang syntaw athua vae.

Tukeiccu Joppa khua lang ccungccaw saw lah Piter acikuh paw Simon kha kokuh; aning tuh rili kin kya saphua raetupaw Simon inn kya nynh a thua. Aning nynh he yn thua vae ze nang kha ae hopah cih,’ yn cipya.

Tukeiccu kae nynh arangte na kalan kae saw`ae, te nang nynh nae thua paw tuh kou hoy lan na cyi vae. Tukeiccu Pachia nynh nang ae hopya paw balyn kha ngae khylan kaening balyn tuh atu Pachia malang kae thua vae,” a ci.
Oute Piter nynh a khalang kha aw zah, “Thanccing langte Pachia tuh ccungccaw maedo khyh cipaw ka ny.
Thuasalama minphuin takyh kya amaw kha rawrih zah ahmepaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh amaw nynh lehkhan.
Pawpaw balyn kyaze Bawi athua paw, Jesu Kri liate daenaw thehoypaw kha hote, Israel ccungccaw`ae kalan Pachia nynh a saw paw bya,
Johan nynh a ho paw baptisma koute Galilee ram kyate tho zah Judah ram balyn kya po thaesah athua paw kha-e bya kha nanning nynh na ny oh.

Tuh-e tuh Pachia nynh Thyaa Muisaw te thuasah, thungnaw te thuasah Nazareth paw Jesu kha satho a thuh; Pachia nynh a umkhae keiccuze aning tuh ahoypaw rya kha lawte, diabolos nynh vawsaw a pya`ae paw balyn kha dansah te khua a ccung cipaw na ny oh.
Te kaening tuh Jew`ae ram kya te Jerusalem kya Jesu nynh a cyi paw uccaw`ae balyn konglang ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua; amaw kha minmin nynh thing vawlan saete a chia`ae.
Amaw kha Pachia nynh nin thungnaw kya thosah zah a muihsah`ae;

ccungccaw balyn kha muihsah khyh`ae, thuasalama Pachia nynh a poty vae paw ccaekia`ae athua paw, a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui koute amaw ryte aekheih`ae zah a neihkheih`ae paw, kaening kha nynh oun muihsah.
Te aning tuh a chihpaw te a hiinpaw byapiatu lang cite Pachia nynh sathothuhpaw nynh athua cipaw ccaekiakhan khylan te ccungccaw`ae kha hopya khylan kaening hynh aning nynh kaw oun pya.
Hunghung zemah amaw kha a zyn paw tuh amaw min liate seingaethyanaw kha a mue cih cite profeh`ae balyn nynh amaw kong kha ccaekiakhan`ae,” a ci.
Piter nynh tuh-e bya a ho cciamang lyakhe bya a thae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn tungvaw khe Thyaa Muisaw accah.
Te Zenta`ae tungvaw kya mah Thyaa Muisaw lasung tuh ccaenua athuabua keiccuze Piter ryte oun cceihkheih`ae paw vindung awkuh`ae paw zyntu`ae tuh mih ngaeangthua.
Pawccecize khae` ae nynh bya ccangpaw te ho`ae zah Pachia phu-esah`ae paw kha minmin nynh a thae`ae.
Oute Piter nynh, “Aening hawte Thyaa Muisaw a muebua`ae paw e ccungccaw`ae nynh baptisma-in khyh nawlan`ae hung nynh mou tui kha a khee kho cih?” a ci.
Te Bawipaw min kya baptisma-in lan minmin kha kawpya`ae. Oute nin sosoh a umhin ccaw cite Piter kha a kangku`ae.
Te Judah ram kya um`ae paw locceihtu`ae te uteno`ae nynh Zenta`ae mah Pachia bya lehkhan bua vae`ae cipaw kha a thae`ae.
Te Piter tuh Jerusalem kya he yn thua tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh,
“Nang tuh vindung awkuh leipaw ccungccaw`ae kalan na cceih zah minmin ryte na aekheih oh,” cite a seisah`ae.
Thuasalama Piter nynh kha-e konglang kha athonaw te atue te hynhte a hopya`ae:
“Kae tuh Joppa khua kya saw ka sang lyakhe, ka ngawphukuh zah alepipaw boeiphae alopaw uccaw ccangkheit tuh vaawran kyate kipali kyate oun sahbung`ae zah ka kalan yn thua paw kha vizin kya ka muih.
Kha-e kha riri ka do zah he ka tua tuh, ccupali asaepaw laephi kya-e lorangsaw`ae te sarepaw`ae te vue te a vaw`ae paw phin te vawlae-e pavaw`ae kha ka muih.
Te, ‘Piter, thokuh, theih lah ae,’ cite kamaw yn hopah paw roi kha ka thae.
Thuasalama kae nynh, ‘Thua kho lan khyh, Bawipaw! Pawccecize huatawpaw te athyaa leipaw uccaw`ae hynh vaekheit sanmah ka khalang lungkhu lang tee boi khyh,’ ka ci.
Thuasalama vaawran kyate roi nynh, ‘Pachia nynh phe a thyaasah vae paw kha nang nynh huatawpaw ci nan,’ cite bua yn khung.
Hynhcihte vaethung cia acikuh koute khae` ae balyn kha vaawran lang bua lawthung athua.
Te dotua, tuh-e ccyh lya tuin Sisaria khua kyate kamaw kalan oun saw`ae paw ccungccaw`ae luthung tuh ka umnaw inn malang oun thua`ae.
Te lunghiinnaw kharyh hoi leite, minmin ryte cciakheih lan Muisaw nynh kae kha yn hopya. Tuhlaeze hynh-e uno`ae lutaruh nynh kamaw ryte cceihbua`ae zah tuh-e ccungccapaw inn lungkhu lang kae tee.
Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a inn malang thadyn zah Kawnelia kha, ‘Joppa khua lang ccungccaw`ae saw lah Piter acikuh paw Simon kha kosah`ae.
Tuh-e paw nynh nang te na inn kya um`ae paw balyn nynh khumnaw na mue nawlan oh paw bya kha ae hopah cih oh,’ cite a hopya paw kha aning nynh kaening kha bua yn hopya.
Te kae nynh phung he ka ho tuh, atakaw lya aening tungvaw a ccaw hawte Thyaa Muisaw tuh minmin tungvaw kyakhe a ccahbua.
Oute, ‘Johan nynh tuh tui kya baptisma-insah ccaccing`ae, thuasalama nanning tuh Thyaa Muisaw te baptisma-insah na thua cih oh,’ cite Bawipaw nynh a ho paw a bya kha kae nynh ka liathui vae.

Bawipaw Jesu Kri a zyn`ae paw aening kha Pachia nynh lasung oun pya hawte minmin kha mah a pyabua`ae paw nynh thua; Pachia kha khee kho nawlan kae tuh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw mou ka thua?” cite Piter nynh a ci.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh zyadae`ae zah, “Tuhte lanze Pachia nynh Zenta`ae kha mah hiinnaw muesabua lan ngaesikunaw a pyabua`ae latu,” cite Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.

Oute Stifen konglang te atho paw vawsaw riathaenaw keiccuze phiariphiarae a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Finisia, Saiparas, te Antiok khua phe thua lang cia cceih`ae zah Bawipaw bya kha hung kalan sanmah ho leite, Jew`ae kalan kyalya nynh a hopya`ae.
Te kha-e`ae kyaze abang tuh Saiparas te Sairenia khua e ccungccaw`ae thua`ae zah Antiok khua kya he a thua`ae te Greek bya a ho`ae paw kalan Bawipaw Jesu kong kha a hopya`ae.
Te Bawipaw kuih tuh minmin ryte um zah ccungccaw patae nynh zyn`ae zah Bawipaw kalan a paleihkuh`ae.
Te kha-e thungpang kha Jerusalem kya um paw kriccawbu nynh he a thae tuh Antiok khua lang po a ccia ccaw cite minmin nynh Barnabas kha a saw`ae.
Aning nynh he a thua tuh Pachia thawccinaw kha muih zah a lungtua, te eenaw a hoi paw thinlung te Bawipaw kya po atyn nawlan`ae minmin balyn kha thawzungpya`ae.
Pawccecize aning tuh ccungccahoypaw thua zah Thyaa Muisaw te thuasah, zynnaw te thuasah phe beihpaw nynh thua. Te ccungccaw pataepi kha Bawipaw kalan biachih athua`ae.
Oute Barnabas tuh Saul kha ccung khylan Tarsuh khua lang a cceih.

Te he a muih tuh Antiok khua lang a cciakhae. Ou tuhcihte minmin tuh kum kheit lungkhu kriccawbu ryte umkheih`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha leih a ccangpya`ae. Te Antiok khua kyakhe nynh zuitu`ae kha Kriccaw`ae cite masaty ko athua`ae.
Te tuh-e nin`ae kya profeh`ae abang tuh Jerusalem kyate Antiok khua lang oun thua`ae.

Te minmin lakuze Akabus acikuh paw lukheit nynh thadyn zah, “Laephipi balyn kya myarya alepaw ccakangnaw yn thua vae cih,” cite Muisaw liate a hoty. Ou tuh-e ccakangnaw tuh Sizar siapharan Klaudias ccyh lya nynh athua.
Oute zuitu`ae, luraveih nynh a taeningnaw thyhte Judah ram kya um`ae paw uno`ae kha bawngnaw kybua lan`ae cite byapaeku`ae.
Tuhte minmin nynh cyih`ae zah Barnabas te Saul kyate kha-e kha kriccaw piccang`ae kalan a ky`ae.
Tuh-e ccyh lya Herod siapharan nynh kriccawbu kya-e abang kha vawsaw pya khylan a kyng`ae.
Te aning nynh Johan a upaw James kha thaloi te phe a chia.
Te kha-e nynh Jew`ae lungrythuasah cipaw kha he a muih tuh Piter kha mah ranoih a kyngsah`ae. Tuh lya tuh ransi py leipaw sanlou poi nin nynh thua.
Te Piter kha kyngsah`ae zah Kawtaw Poi koute ccungccaw`ae kalan thuakhae lan cite tuakuh zah Piter kha a ngawtu`ae rhawkaw haw laetaruh kuih kalan ah zah thunginn kya a saw.
Tukeiccu Piter tuh thunginn kya a um; thuasalama kriccawbu nynh amaw hanlan apaekuh lei lante Pachia kalan sawsangnaw te a ngiapya`ae.
Te Herod nynh Piter kha pousah lan a cidyn, kha-e khuazi khe, Piter tuh sivarui zung ning te hee`ae zah rhawkaw luning laku khe a i; thuakaw ngawtu`ae nynh thuakaw malang te thunginn kha a ngaw`ae.

Te Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw tuh yn langkuh zah thunginn kya phaephae yn aw; te Piter a napang kha phah bia zah, “Arangte tho kanmaw!” cipah zah Piter kha a tho. Te sivarui`ae tuh Piter kuih kyate pung accah.

Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh Piter kha, “Taesung sungkuh lah na phanah kha nawkuh,” a cipya. Te Piter nynh a ho hawte a cyi. Te vaaw ccungccapaw nynh, “Na boei kha zingkuh lah kamaw hynh yn zui,” a cipya.
Te Piter nynh cceih zah amaw kha a zui, tuhzemah vaaw ccungccapaw nynh a cyi paw tuh thanccingpaw nynh thua cipaw nyh khyh, thuasalama vizin nynh ka muih cite nynh a tuaku.

Minmin nynh ccangkheitnaw te ccangningnaw a ngawtu`ae kha he a lue`ae te khua lungkhu lang a tee paw sivaw koikua kalan a thua`ae tuh, tuh-e koikua tuh amaw hung lan ahungkuh; te minmin tuh toikuh`ae zah laanpi ccangkheit kya a ccia lya`ae khe vaaw ccungccapaw tuh vaekheihmawte Piter kyate phe a pou.

Te Piter nynh he a nyhkuh tuh, “Atu Bawipaw nynh a vaaw ccungccapaw yn saw zah Herod kuih kyate thuasah, Jew`ae balyn nynh ngaehoinaw kyate thuasah kamaw hynh phe yn luesah vae cipaw ccaerarihlan atu phe ka ny,” a ciku.
Te kha-e kong kha a tua lyakhe, ccungccaw patae nynh pynkheihlan sueluakuh`ae zah sawsangnaw`ae, Marka acikuh paw, Johan a nung Meri inn lang yn thua.
Te Piter nynh koikua kalan e thuakaw kha he a khua tuh Rhoda cikuh paw nopinung taraw nynh nawngae lan yn cceih.
Te Piter roi cipaw he a nyh tuh a lungtua pawte thuakaw kha hung vae leite ccue kanmaw zah, “Koikua malang Piter phang thadyn,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Nang tuh na ngae,” cite kha-e nung kha a ci`ae. Thuasalama aning nynh, “Thanccingpaw nynh thua,” cite thawte a ho. Te minmin nynh, “Piter a vaaw ccungccapaw nynh athua cih,” a ci`ae.
Thuasalama Piter nynh banban pei khua zah minmin nynh thuakaw kha he hung`ae tuh amaw kha muih`ae zah mih ngaeang pung thua.

Thuasalama Piter nynh minmin kha zya a dae ccaw`ae cite a kuih te piapah`ae zah Bawipaw nynh amaw kha pawcihte nynh a poukhae cipaw kha minmin kalan a hopya`ae. Te Piter nynh, “Cceih oh lah hynh-e`ae kong hynh James te uno`ae kha la hopah oh,” a ci. Oute toikuh zah ccanglang khe a cceih.
Te khua he yn dae tuh Piter kya acyikuh paw konglang khate rhawkaw`ae laku ngaluinngaluin ccaenaw alepi a um.

Te Herod nynh Piter kha ccung zah he muih khyh tuh a ngawtu`ae kha akaw-aleih byakhia`ae zah minmin tuh chia lan accan cite kaw a tho. Te Herod tuh Judah ram kyate Sisaria khua lang cceihbung zah tuin kya a um.

Te Herod tuh Tai khua e ccungccaw`ae te Sidon khua e ccungccaw`ae elan myarya a thinria; thuasalama minmin nynh pynkheihlan a kalan oun thua`ae zah Blastas acikuh paw siapharanpaw kya-e ryaccinkhantu kha zya hykuh`ae zah a lungdae nawlan a ngiasah`ae. Pawccecize mih ram tuh siapharanpaw ram nynh a kuabua paw nynh thua.
Te a khya`ae paw nin kyakhe Herod tuh siapharan uccaw te ccaankuh zah a suitungkhung vawlan dahungte minmin kha byahopya`ae.
Te ccungccaw`ae nynh, “E roi tuh ccungccaw roi thua khyh, pachia roi nynh thua,” cite a sia`ae.
Te Pachia kha phu-e a pya khyh keiccuze Bawipaw kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh vaekheihmawte Herod kha a bua; te aning tuh zangpaw`ae nynh ae`ae zah phe a chih.
Thuasalama Pachia bya tuh lethung zah houh a pungthung.
Te Barnabas te Saul tuh mih ryalaw phe a thangsah`ae koute Jerusalem kyate ki`ae zah Marka acikuh paw Johan kha mah a hoeibua`ae.

Antiok khua kya a um paw kriccawbu kya profeh`ae te ccangpatu`ae a la um`ae. Tuhe` ae tuh: Barnabas, Nika cite a ko`ae paw Simeon, Sairenia pee e paw Lusias, tetrarch Herod ryte a lethung kheih`ae paw Manaen, te Saul nynh thua`ae.
Minmin nynh Bawipaw rya kha lah`ae zah looh-ae he sung`ae tuh, Thyaa Muisaw nynh, “Ka konua`ae paw ryalaw law khylan Barnabas te Saul kha kamaw hanlan accangte oun phiapah oh,” a ci.
Te minmin nynh looh-aesung`ae zah sawsang`ae, te minmin tungvaw mih kuih khang`ae zah minmin kha a saw`ae.
Tuhte minmin tuh Thyaa Muisaw nynh a saw`ae thyhte Selusia khua lang cceih`ae zah tuin kyate Saiparas tuikoih kalan sanphalung te a cceih`ae.
Te Salamis khua kya a um`ae lyakhe minmin nynh Jew`ae sinakok kyakhe Pachia bya kha a ho`ae; te minmin bawngtu lang Johan kha mah a hoeibua`ae.
Te minmin nynh tuikoih kya po cceih`ae zah Pafo khua he thua`ae tuh, nawthyapaw ahme leipaw profeh, Barjesu acikuh paw Jew paw lukheit kha a muih`ae.
Tuh-e paw tuh ram uktupaw, myarya ahawpaw Serkias Paulu ryte nynh a um`ae; Paulu nynh Pachia bya kha thae a ry keiccuze Barnabas te Saul kha a koku`ae.
Thuasalama nawthyapaw Elimas (pawccecize tuh-e tuh a min asuilan nynh thua) nynh ram uktupaw kha zynnaw kyate paleihsaku khylan zuakuh zah locceihtu`ae kha a rawse`ae.
Oute Paul cite mah a ko`ae paw Saul tuh Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih zah kha-e paw kha rirido zah,
“Thyaruhnaw balyn, hyngpyanaw balynte phe beihpaw diabolos ccapaw, dingnaw`ae balyn rhawpaw lou, nang tuh Bawipaw kya-e ahmepaw laanpi kha rosah leite na ung kho khyh tou?

Atu maw, dotua, Bawipaw kuih tuh na tungvaw a thua cih, te nang tuh na mitmoh cih zah ccyh sosoh khuanin na muih lan khyh,” a cipya. Te vaekheihmawte a mit pung zi zah a tungvaw mohnaw a thua; te a kuih te a dungbua lanpaw ccungccaw kha a zaahku.
Oute ram uktupaw nynh kha-e acyikuh paw kha he a muih tuh zyn zah Bawipaw kya-e ccangpyanaw kha a ngaeangthua.
Paul te a cceihkheih`ae paw tuh Pafo khua kyate rili kalan sahkuh`ae zah Pamfilia ram Perka khua khe he thua`ae tuh, Johan tuh minmin kyate pou zah sanphalung te Jerusalem lang a ki.
Thuasalama minmin tuh Perka khua kyate toikuh`ae zah Pisidia ram kya Antiok khua khe a thua`ae, te Sabbath nin kya sinakok lungkhu lang tee`ae zah a dahung`ae.

Te Kawbya te Profeh`ae ccauh kha a ria`ae koute sinakok uktu`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kha oun saw`ae zah, “Uteno`ae, nanning nynh ccungccaw`ae thawzungpya lanpaw bya na hoi oh ze, hopah oh,” cite a hosapya`ae.
Te Paul nynh thadyn zah a kuih te piapah`ae zah, “Israel ccungccaw`ae te Pachia rawrih`ae paw nanning, ngaetua oh:
Hynh-e Israel ccungccaw`ae Pachia nynh aening ah minpaaw`ae kha po`ae zah Izip ram kya mikhia`ae hawte a um`ae lyakhe a hangthung`ae, te athungpaw a kuih te minmin kha kha-e ram kyate a poukhae`ae.
Te ccyh kum sungpali loukaw cia rangkaw kyakhe minmin ozia kha phang a ngaesang.
Te Kanaan ram kya-e minphuin`ae phin sari kha phe a ropah kou`ae te, kha-e`ae mih ram kha ccungthy dungte Israel`ae kha a nee`ae.
“Te tuh-e`ae koute profeh Samuel alangku maw kum zapali sungpangaw loukaw cia byapiatu`ae kha Pachia nynh mih hanlan a pya`ae.
Tuhkoute minmin nynh siapharan kha ngiakuh`ae zah Pachia nynh Kish ccapaw Saul, Benjamin ciihan paw kha minmin hanlan kum sungpali cia a pya`ae.

Te kha-e paw kha he a nue koute David kha mih siapharan lang a khanpya`ae; David konglang te Pachia nynh ccaekiakhan zah a hopaw tuh: ‘Ka rynaw balyn a ccingsah cih paw, ka thinlung yn tung paw ccungccapaw, Jessi ccapaw David kha phe ka muih vae,’ a ci.
Hynh-e ccungccapaw ciihan kyate, byakinpyakupaw thyhte Pachia nynh Khumtu Jesu kha Israel`ae hanlan phe a langsaku vae.
Amaw yn thua maw, Johan nynh ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kong kha Israel ccungccaw balyn kalan phe a hoty vae.

Te Johan nynh a ryalaw a thangsah dyn khe, ‘Kae hynh hung cite mou nae tua oh? Kae tuh kha-e paw ka thua khyh. Thuasalama dotua oh, kamaw nuhlang yn cceih paw Lukheit a um; kha-e paw a ccukoh khahpya lan sanmah kae tuh ka ngaekuh khyh,’ cite a ho.
“Abraham ciihan athua paw uteno`ae, te nanning laku kyaze Pachia rawrih`ae paw, nanning kalan nynh hynh-e khumnaw bya tuh saw athua.

Pawccecize Jerusalem kya um`ae paw te mih uktu`ae nynh amaw kha thuasah, Sabbath nin takyh kya a ria`ae paw profeh`ae bya kha thuasah a ny khyh`ae keiccuze, amaw kha seibenaw`ae liate minmin nynh profeh`ae bya kha a ccingsah`ae.
Amaw kya chi lan accansah paw cyiseinaw ccangkheit san a muih lei`ae pite, Pilat nynh a chia ccaw cite minmin nynh a ngia`ae.
Te amaw konglang azeikuh paw balyn kha minmin nynh phe a ccingsah`ae koute amaw rhua kha vaelantung kyate lah`ae zah shaw lungkhu a ccy`ae.
Thuasalama Pachia nynh amaw kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah.
Te aning tuh Galilee ram kyate Jerusalem lang amaw ryte a cceihkheih`ae paw kalan nin patae cia a langkuh, tuh-e`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae kalan amaw ccaekia`ae nynh thua`ae.
Te minpaaw`ae kalan a rae paw byakinpyakupaw te asekuhpaw thungpang hoypaw kha kaening nynh nae kalan kae hopya oh.

Sam ccangningnaw kya, ‘Nang tuh ka Ccapaw nynh na thua, atunin nang kha phe kae saah vae,’ cite azeiku hawte; Pachia nynh Jesu kha bua a thosathuinaw liate ah minpaaw`ae kya byakinpyakupaw kha mih ccaaw`ae aening hanlan a ccingsah.
Te ronaw kalan kharyh a ki vae khyh nawlan, amaw kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah cipaw kha hynhcihte bua a ho; ‘David kya-e phe ariapaw thawccinaw kha nanning kae pya cih oh,’ a ci.
Tukeiccu ccangpaw Sam kya mah, ‘Namaw kya-e Athyaapaw kha ronaw kalan thua lan na ua lan khyh,’ cite bua a ho.
“David tuh amaw she lungkhu Pachia rynaw kha phe a rae koute, phe i zah a minpaaw`ae kya phe a ccybua`ae keiccu ronaw kalan phe a thua.
Thuasalama Pachia nynh bua a thosah paw aning tuh ronaw kalan thua vae khyh.
Tukeiccu uteno`ae, tuh-e Bawipaw liate nynh seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw kong kha nanning kalan hopya athua cipaw te,
Mawsi Kawbya nynh thyaa ae ccousah kho khyh oh paw kyate, a zyn paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh amaw liate pawpaw balyn kyate thyaaccou`ae cipaw hynh nanning nynh nyh oh.
Tukeiccu, profeh`ae kya ho athua paw uccaw kha nae tungvaw a thua khyh nawlan raeringkuh oh; a ho paw tuh:

‘Ccungccaw sarya`ae paw nanning, dotua oh, nae ngaeangthua sah lah roh oh! Pawccecize nanning ccyh lya ryalaw ccangkheit kha kae nynh ka law, kha-e ryalaw kha ccungccaw lukheit nynh nanning kalan ae hopya oh zemah nanning nynh kharyh na zyn lan khyh oh,’ acikuh,” cite Paul nynh a hopya`ae.
Te Jew`ae tuh sinakok kyate he a pou`ae te, Zenta`ae nynh kha-e bya`ae kha malang Sabbath nin kya bua nae hopah ung cih oh cite a ngiaku`ae.

Pumkunaw he athang te Jew`ae patae te Jew beiknaw kalan a tee thaw`ae paw, beiknaw lante azuakuh`ae paw nynh Paul te Barnabas kha a zui`ae; kha-e`ae nynh minmin kha hopah`ae zah Pachia thawccinaw kya atyn nawlan`ae a hy`ae.
Te malang Sabbath nin kya Pachia bya kha ngae khylan a khuapi balynte vya ccing lang pynkheihlan oun thua`ae.
Thuasalama Jew`ae nynh ccungccaw zapi kha he muih`ae tuh eiungnaw te phe beih`ae; te Paul nynh a ho paw kha rawse`ae zah a ei`ae, alue lante byaho`ae.

Oute Paul te Barnabas nynh, “Pachia bya hynh masaty nanning hopya lan accanpaw nynh thua; thuasalama nanning nynh kha-e kha na vua oh zah zungzae hiinnaw tuh kae ngaekuh khyh cite bya na piaku oh keiccu, do oh, kaening tuh Zenta`ae kalan kae maeleihkuh vae.

Pawccecize Bawipaw nynh, ‘Laephi athangnaw cia nang tuh khumnaw hanlan na thua nawlan, Zenta`ae hanlan awnaw lang nang kha phe kae khang vae,’ cite kaening kha kaw phe oun pya vae,” cite rawhoy te a ho`ae.
Te kha-e bya kha Zenta`ae nynh he thae`ae tuh mih lungtua zah Bawipaw bya kha phuesah` ae; te zungzae hiinnaw hanlan khang athuapaw miakaw nynh a zyn`ae.
Te Bawipaw bya tuh ram balyn kya khaleih apazaekuh.
Thuasalama beiknaw lante a zuakuh`ae paw, sawtua lan um paw nopi`ae, te khualae e pise lupi`ae kha Jew`ae nynh hy`ae zah Paul te Barnabas tuasahnaw kha a pousah`ae; te mih ram kyate a deesah`ae.
Thuasalama Paul te Barnabas nynh mih ccu kya-e laenoi kha pheihnuakuh`ae zah Ikoniam khua langkhe a cceih`ae.
Te zuitu`ae tuh lungtuanaw ryte Thyaa Muisaw te phe beih`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Ikonia khua kya minmin luning tuh paryhte Jew`ae sinakok lungkhu lang tee`ae zah phungho`ae; oute Jew`ae te Greek`ae ccungccaw zapipi nynh a zyn`ae.
Thuasalama a zyn leipaw Jew`ae nynh Zenta`ae kha hy`ae zah uno`ae kha rawse khylan mih thinlung kha ahoy leipaw lan a rae`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin tuh khaw cia um`ae zah Bawipaw liate rawhoy te phung a ho`ae, Bawipaw nynh a thawccinaw bya hanlan ccaekia pya`ae zah muihsanaw te khuaruaru ngaeangnaw kha minmin kyate a langsaku.
Thuasalama khualae e ccungccaw zapi tuh thoh phiakuh`ae zah abang tuh Jew`ae kalan pang`ae zah abang tuh locceihtu`ae kalan a pang`ae.
Te Zenta`ae te Jew`ae nynh mih uktu`ae ryte locceihtu`ae kha zia lan`ae zah lung te deih lan`ae cite vaekheihte oun ccuenua`ae cipaw kha,
locceihtu`ae nynh he nyh`ae tuh Lykonia ram kya um paw Lystra khua te Derbe khua lang, te tuin pepan um paw khua lang a ccue`ae.
Tuin kya thehoynaw kha a ho`ae.
Te Lystra khua kya a nung vue kya mawte a ccukhoupaw, laanpi kharyh cceih boi leipaw, ccungccapaw lukheit tuh la dahung zah,
Paul nynh a hopaw bya kha a thae. Paul nynh kha-e paw kha rirido zah, phe dan lan ciate aning nynh zynnaw a hoi cipaw he a nyh tuh,
“Na ccu te lawbabinlan thadyn,” cite roi accae lante a hopya. Te aning tuh thokuh zah laanpi a cceih.
Te Paul nynh a cyi paw kha ccungccaw`ae nynh he muih`ae tuh, “Khozi-pachia`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae alo lante aening kalan oun rungbung`ae,” cite Lykonia bya te mih roi saw`ae zah a ho`ae.
Te minmin nynh Barnabas kha Zeus cite ko`ae zah Paul tuh phunghotu lupi athua keiccuze Herme cite a ko`ae.
Te tuh-e khua malang a um paw tempal a hoitu Zeus a ranpibawi nynh vaetua tangnua`ae te haetapawsi`ae kha koikua kalan yn cciakhae, ccungccaw zapi ryte silawkunaw rae lan cite a ry`ae.
Kha-e kha locceihtu`ae Barnabas te Paul nynh he a thae`ae tuh mih uccaw`ae kha ccahrae sei`ae zah ccungccaw`ae laku lang ccue`ae zah,

“Ccungccaw oh, pawccemou hynhte na cyi oh? Kaening mah nanning hawte ccungccaw`ae nynh kae thua, nanning nynh hynh-e accakaepaw uccaw`ae kyate vaawran te laephi, rili te kha-e`ae kya um paw miakaw balyn raetu, a hiinpaw Pachia kalan na paleihku oh ccaw cite kaening tuh nae kalan thehoypaw kae hopaw nynh kae thua.
Langmaw lya tuh Pachia nynh minphuin`ae balyn kha mimaw mih laanpi kya ccia lan a la ua`ae.

Tuhzemah ahoypaw oun cyipya paw kya amaw a um paw kha ccaekia langsaku leite um khyh, vaawran kyate khua oun rawsapya zah thingthae-eccang a pousah paw kumvaelori kha oun pya, ah thinlung kha aepaw te oun byngsah zah lungtuanaw te phe oun biasah,” cite thawmawte a sia`ae.
Te hynh-e byaho`ae paw khate mih kalan silawkunaw a rae khyh nawlan`ae ccungccaw zapi kha minmin nynh kou ru lante a khee kho`ae.
Te Jew`ae abang tuh Antiok te Ikonia khua`ae kyate tuhlang oun thua`ae zah ccungccaw zapi kha hy`ae zah Paul kha lung te a deih`ae, phe chih vae cite tua`ae zah khua atolang khe a sue`ae.
Tuhzemah zuitu`ae nynh a pe phang thadynlu`ae lyakhe, Paul tuh thokuh zah khua lungkhu lang bua a tee. Awkhualan tuh Barnabas ryte Derbe khua lang a cceih`ae.
Tuh-e khua kya thehoypaw kha he ho`ae zah ccungccaw patae kha zuitu`ae lang a rae`ae koute, minmin tuh Lystra khua, Ikonia khua te Antiok khua lang bua a ki`ae.
Zuitu`ae thinlung kha thawzung pyate, zynnaw kya atyn nawlan`ae minmin kha hyte, “Aening tuh vawsawrunaw patae tungbiate nynh Pachia peenaw lungkhu lang ah tee hahe cih oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te kriccawbu takyh kya piccang`ae kha khang`ae zah looh-aesung te sawsang`ae koute, minmin nynh a zyn`ae paw Bawipaw kalan minmin kha a ah`ae.
Te minmin tuh Pisidia ram kha po a khung`ae koute Pamfilia ram lungkhu lang a thua`ae.
Te minmin nynh Perka kya Bawipaw bya kha a ho`ae koute Attalia khua lang a cceihbung`ae.
Te tuin kyate minmin nynh phe a lyng vae`ae paw ryalaw hanlan Pachia thawccinaw kalan mimaw kha a ahnaw`ae Antiok khua langkhe sanphalung te a cceih`ae.
He thua`ae zah kriccawbu`ae kha pynkheihlan he suelua`ae koute Pachia nynh minmin ryte a cyi paw balyn, te Zenta`ae elan zynnaw thuakaw kha pawcihte nynh a hungpya`ae cipaw kha bua a hopyathui`ae.
Te tuin kya minmin tuh zuitu`ae ryte khaw cia a umkheih`ae.
Te Judah ram kyate Antiok lang oun thua`ae paw ccungccaw abang nynh, “Mawsi phungbya thyhhawte vindung aw na thua khyh oh ze khumpaw na thua kho lan khyh oh,” cite uteno`ae kha a ccangpya`ae.

Tukeiccu Paul te Barnabas tuh tuh-e`ae ryte lungloku leinaw alepi hoi`ae zah eikunaw he a hoi`ae tuh, uteno`ae nynh Paul, Barnabas te minmin kyaze ccangpaw uno`ae abang tuh tuh-e konglang, locceihtu`ae te piccang`ae kalan Jerusalem lang cciathung lan accan cite byapae`ae.
Te kriccawbu nynh laanpi langkhe saw`ae zah Paul te Barnabas tuh Finisia te Samaria ram kha po a khung`ae, Zenta`ae rulaekunaw kong kha a hopya`ae; te uteno`ae balyn kha myarya mih lungtuasah`ae.
Te minmin Jerusalem kya he thua`ae tuh locceihtu`ae, pastor`ae te kriccawbu nynh lehkhan`ae, te Pachia nynh minmin mangte a cyi paw balyn kha minmin nynh bua a hopya`ae.
Thuasalama Farasi`ae phu kyate a zyn`ae paw abang nynh thadyn`ae zah, “Zenta`ae kha vindung ah aw oh ho zah Mawsi Kawbya zui lan kaw ah pya oh aho,” a ci`ae.
Oute locceihtu`ae te pastor`ae tuh tuh-e kong tuakheih lan a sueluakuh`ae.

Te eikunaw patae he a um tuh Piter nynh thadyn zah, “Uteno`ae, Zenta`ae nynh ka khalang kyate thehoypaw bya a thae nawlan`ae te a zyn nawlan`ae anuhlang lyakhe aening laku Pachia nynh yn po cipaw kha na ny oh.
Te thinlung a nyh paw Pachia nynh Thyaa Muisaw kha aening oun pya hawte minmin kha mah pyate minmin hanlan ccaekia a langsah.
Te zynnaw liate mih thinlung kha ccikan te, aening te minmin laku laesanaw umsah khyh.
Tukeiccu atu aening nynh mah thuasah, ah minpaaw`ae nynh mah thuasah ah phu kho lei oh paw taphu kha zuitu`ae nging vawlan khang lante pawccemou Pachia kha na syntaw oh?
Thuasalama Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw liate minmin tuh khum athua`ae hawte aening mah khum ah thuabua cih oh cite ah zyn oh,” cite a hopya`ae.

Oute ccungccaw zapi balyn tuh daebabilan um`ae zah Barnabas te Paul nynh mimaw kha Pachia nynh mangte ngaeang lan um paw ryalaw`ae te khuaruarunaw`ae Zenta`ae laku a langsakupaw kong a ho`ae paw kha a ngae`ae.
Te minmin tuh daetedae lang a um`ae koute, James nynh tho zah, “Uteno oh, ka ho paw hynh oun ngaepya tua oh:
amaw min hanlan Zenta`ae kyate ccungccaw phinkheit kha poh thua khylan Pachia nynh masaty Zenta`ae kha pawcihte nynh a pae`ae cipaw kha Simeon nynh phe a ho vae.
Te tuh-e bya te profeh`ae bya tuh accawkuh, Ccathyaa kya hynhte azeikuh hawte:
‘Hynh-e koute kae tuh bua kae ki cih zah phe a pu vae paw David bu kha bua ka sakthui cih, te kha-e aronahpaw kha bua ka sakthui cih zah bua ka thadynsah cih;

Ou tuhte kamaw min liate ko athua`ae paw, Zenta`ae balyn mah athua`ae paw tuhlaepaw ccungccaw`ae nynh BAWIPAW kha a ccung`ae ccaw cite, hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn a raetupaw BAWIPAW nynh a ci,’ cite azeikuh.
“Laephipi thotakaw te Pachia nynh a ryalaw balyn kha marya a ny.
Tukeiccu kae nynh ka hory paw tuh, Zenta`ae laku kyate Pachia kalan oun paleihkuh`ae paw kha aening nynh vawsaw pya nan oh sih.
Thuasalama zohtuh`ae nynh a nungsisaku`ae paw kha thuasah, ohhuakunaw kha thuasah, nging-o te a chia`ae paw kha thuasah, chii kha thuasah minmin nynh a sung nawlan`ae aening nynh ccaw ky oh sih.
Pawccecize Mawsi nynh langmaw lya mawte khua takyh kya a kawbya a ho`ae paw kha phe a hoi vae keiccu, Sabbath nin takyh sinakok`ae kya a kawbya tuh ria athua,” a ci.

Oute mimaw phu kyaze po athua`ae paw, uteno`ae lakuze cciakhaetu`ae Barsabas acikuh paw Judas te Sailas kha Antiok khua lang Paul te Barnabas ryte saw lan a ci`ae paw bya nynh locceihtu`ae, piccang`ae te kriccawbu khaleih kha mih lunghoysah.

Te ccaw zei`ae zah minmin kyate a ky`ae paw tuh, “Locceihtu`ae, piccang`ae te uteno`ae nynh Antiok khua kya te Siria ram te Silisia ram kya na um oh paw Zenta`ae na thua oh paw uteno`ae kha kae beihlang oh!

Kaening nynh kaw kae pya lei`ae paw, kaening kyate oun cceih`ae paw ccungccaw abang nynh nanning kha, ‘Vindung na awku oh ho zah Kawbya na zui oh aho,’ cipaw bya khate nanning kha vawsaw ae pya oh, nae lungria ae thaesah oh cipaw kaening nynh kae thae pawte,

ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min hanlan mih hiinnaw chihchih hiinhiin acih`ae paw ccungccaw`ae, kae sungsahpaw Paul te Barnabas ryte, popaw ccungccaw`ae kha nanning kalan saw lan kaening nynh lunglokute kae tungkuh zah ahoy kae ci.
Tukeiccu kaening nynh Judas te Sailas hynh nae kalan kae saw`ae, minmin nynh kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha mih khalang te ae la hopah cih oh.
Pawccecize hynh-e ahopaw uccaw`ae laelan nanning tungvaw khe ari huapaw phupaw khang lanpaw tuh Thyaa Muisaw hanlan te kaening hanlan ahoypaw thua khyh.

Tuh-e ahopaw uccaw`ae tuh: nanning nynh zohtuh kalan silawnawpaw`ae kha thuasah, chii kha thuasah, nging-ote a chia`ae paw kha thuasah, ohhuakunaw kha thuasah la sung oh. Kha-e`ae kha na sungku oh ze, kou ahoypaw nynh thua. Ngedan te.” cite a zei`ae.
Tuhte minmin kha he a cciasah`ae tuh Antiok khua lang a thua`ae; te ccungccaw zapi kha pynkheihlan a suelua`ae koute ccaky kha a pya`ae.
Kha-e ccaw kha minmin nynh he a ria`ae tuh thawzung pyanawpaw athua keiccu mih lungtua.
Te Judas te Sailas mimaw mah profeh`ae athua`ae thyhte bya pataepi te uteno`ae kha thawzungpya`ae zah lungthawsaesah`ae.
Te minmin tuh tuin kya ccyh khuekheih a um`ae koute uteno`ae nynh locceihtu`ae kalan ngaengante a kisah`ae.
Tuhzemah Sailas tuh tuin kya umhy lanze ahoy cih cite a tuaku.
Paul te Barnabas mah Antiok khua kya um`ae zah ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae patae ryte Bawipaw bya kha ccangpah`ae zah a hopya`ae.
Te nin khaw aro koute Paul nynh Barnabas kha, “Aening nynh Bawipaw bya ah honaw khua takyh kya um`ae paw uteno`ae nynh pawcihtemou a um`ae cipaw ah dotua ccaw ki sih lah paebua sih`ae,” a cipya.
Te Barnabas nynh Marka acikuh paw Johan kha mimaw ryte hoeibua lan phe a la tuaku vae.
Thuasalama Paul nynh Pamfilia ram kyate, minmin kyate ki zah ryalawnaw kalan minmin ry a cceihbua vae leipaw Marka kha hoeibua lan ccang khyh cite varyn a tuaku.
Tuhte minmin laku lungloku leinaw tuh eih ru keiccu lukheit te lukheit phiakuh`ae zah Barnabas nynh Marka kha hoei zah Saiparas tuikoih kalan kohlung te a cceih`ae.
Te uteno`ae nynh Paul kha Bawipaw thawccinaw kalan he ah`ae te Paul nynh Sailas kha pokuh zah a pou.
Te kriccawbu`ae kha thawzung pyate Siria te Silisia ram lang po a cceih.

Oute Paul tuh Derbe khua te Lystra khua lang a thua. Te dotua, tuin kya Timote acikuh paw zuitu lukheit a la um. A nung tuh a zyn paw Jew nopinung nynh thua, thuasalama a paaw tuh Greek paw nynh thua.
Timote tuh Lystra khua te Ikonia khua kya um`ae paw uteno`ae nynh thehoyccousah`ae paw nynh thua.
Paul nynh kha-e paw kha amaw ryte cciasabua lan a ry. Te a paaw tuh Greek minphuin athua paw kha tuh-e ram kya um`ae paw Jew`ae balyn nynh phe a ny`ae keiccuze Timote kha hoei zah vindung a aw pya.
Te minmin nynh khua`ae kalan po cceih`ae zah Jerusalem kya um`ae paw locceihtu`ae te piccang`ae nynh byapaenaw`ae paw ccaw`ae kha a zui ccaw`ae cite po a nebia`ae.
Ou tuhte kriccawbu`ae tuh zynnaw kya tynsah thua`ae zah nin takyh milu akaethung.
Te Frikia te Galati ram kha po he a cceih`ae tuh Asia ram kya Pachia bya ho lanpaw kha Thyaa Muisaw nynh phe a khee`ae.
Te Mysia ram kalan he thua`ae tuh Bithynia ram lungkhu lang ccia lan a noukuh`ae, thuasalama Muisaw nynh ua khyh`ae.
Te minmin tuh Mysia ram kha po cciakhung`ae zah Troas khua lang a thua`ae.
Te khuazi khe Paul kalan vizin yn langkuh. Mesidonia paw lukheit nynh thadyn zah, “Mesidonia ram lang po yn cceih lah kaening hynh oun bawng,” cite Paul kha a ngia.
Te vizin kha a muih koute, Mesidonia ram lang ccia lan palou kae paccynkuh vae; minmin kalan thehoypaw ho khylan Bawipaw nynh kaening kha oun ko cite kae tuakuh.
Tukeiccu Troas khua kyate kohlung te kae thokuh zah Samothrasia tuikoih kalan dingrarihlan kae cceih zah awkhualan tuh Neapolis khua kya kae thua.
Te tuin kyate Mesidonia ram sang kheit kya abapihua paw khua, Rom koloni athua paw, Filipi khua kya kae thua zah tuin kya nin khaw cia kae um.
Te Sabbath nin kya kaening tuh khua akhunglang sawsangnaw leih raenaw`ae vawkhu kin langkhe kae cceih zah kae dahung, te tuhlang oun thua`ae paw nopi`ae kha kae hopya`ae.

Te sekakungpaw uccaw a zuatu, Thiatira khua e Lidia acikuh paw nopinung lukheit tuh Pachia a beik paw thua zah kaening kong kha yn thae; te Paul nynh a ho paw uccaw`ae kha hoyte ngae khylan Bawipaw nynh kha-e nung thinlung kha a hung.

Te kha-e nung te a innbyn`ae tuh baptisma-in kou`ae te, aning nynh, “Kae tuh Bawipaw hanlan zyn lan um paw cite nae tua oh ze ka inn lang rang oh lah umhin oh,” cite kaening kha thawte oun ngia. Te kaening kha thawte oun kang.

Ou tuhte kaening tuh sawsangnaw kalan kae ccia lya, malang e konglang hothyanaw a hoi paw muisaw bahkuhpaw seenung taraw lukheit nynh kaening kha yn cciadue. Malang yn cyikuh lanpaw kong a hotynaw liate a bawi a zua`ae kha patae a muepya`ae.
Kha-e nung nynh Paul te kaening kha yn zui zah, “Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh aening kha khumnaw laanpi oun muihsah`ae paw, ahang huaccepaw Pachia see`ae nynh thua`ae,” cite thawte a sia.

Te aning nynh khate nin patae cia a cyi. Thuasalama Paul nynh thinlung ccite nuhlang maeleihkuh zah muisaw kha, “Kha-e nung lungkhu te pou, Jesu Kri min te kaw kae pya,” a cipya. Te tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya mawtuin aning tuh po a pou.
Te kha-e nung a bawi`ae nynh a muenaw`ae paw ngaehoinaw tuh um vae khyh cipaw kha he muih`ae tuh Paul te Sailas kha kyng`ae zah uccaw zuanaw hmin kalan kawhoitu`ae kalan khe a dung`ae.
Te minmin kha khuabawi`ae kalan cciakhae`ae zah, “Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh Jew`ae mang athua`ae pite ah khua kha myarya vawsaw oun pya`ae.
Te Rom`ae athua paw aening nynh lawku lan accan leipaw te zui lan accan leipaw phung`ae kha oun ccangpya`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te minmin kha rawsete ccungccaw zapi tuh pynkheihlan a thokuh`ae, te khuabawi`ae nynh mih uccaw`ae kha ccarae sei`ae zah minmin kha tungbang te bua lan kawpya`ae.
Te minmin nynh avae patae a bua`ae koute minmin kha thunginn lungkhu lang sah`ae zah ahoyte ring lan thung uktupaw kha byatawsya`ae.
Khate byatawsya`ae thyhte thung uktupaw nynh minmin kha alungkhu-e thunginn lungkhu lang phang`ae zah mih ccu kha tunglua te phang khii`ae.
Te ziraccyng khe Paul te Sailas nynh sawsang`ae zah Pachia thehoysanaw lawsah`ae; te thungccah`ae nynh a ngae`ae.
Te tua lei pite thawte innruisuekuh zah thunginn leihpaw tuh pung ahy; te vaekheihmawte thuakaw`ae balyn pung hungkuh zah thungccah`ae miakaw kya-e sivarui`ae tuh pung phoukuh.

Te thung uktupaw tuh a inaw kyate yn thaekuh zah thunginn thuakaw`ae pung ahungkuhpaw kha he a muih tuh thungccah`ae pung ccue vae cih`ae cite tua zah amaw te amaw chiaku lan vae cite a thaloi kha a thuaku.
Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Namaw te namaw kha vawsaw pyakuh nan, pawccecize kae balynte e kya pung kae um,” cite thawte sia zah a hopya.
Oute thung uktu nynh maee kha kokhae`ae zah arangte tee zah Paul te Sailas malang thyngkute a bakhung.
Te minmin kha poukhae`ae zah, “Bawihaepaw oh; khumnaw mue khylan pawmou ka cyi cih?” cite a khia`ae.
Te minmin nynh, “Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha zyn lah nang tuh khum na thua cih, te na innbyn`ae mah khum athua cih`ae,” a cipya`ae.
Te minmin nynh kha-e paw te a inn kya um`ae paw balyn kha Bawipaw bya a hopya`ae.
Te aning nynh Paul te Sailas kha tuh-e khuazi, tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya mawtuin cciakhae`ae zah mih vaemaw kha a singpya`ae; te aning te a innbyn`ae balyn tuh palou baptisma-in`ae.
Te aning nynh minmin kha a inn lungkhu lang hoei`ae zah looh a dang`ae; te a innbyn`ae balyn ryte Pachia a zyn`ae pawte kou a lungtua.
Te khua he yn dae tuh khuabawi`ae nynh palih bawi`ae kha saw`ae zah, “Kha-e ccungccaw`ae kha cceih`ae sah,” a cipya`ae.
Te thung uktu nynh kha-e bya kha Paul kalan hopah zah, “Khuabawi`ae nynh nanning kha la saw ccavae oh cite ccungccaw`ae oun saw`ae, tukeiccu atu pou oh lah daebabilan la cceih ccavae oh,” a cipya.

Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Rom`ae athua paw kaening hynh ahoyte akaw-aleih byakhia leite minmin nynh zapi malang oun bua`ae zah thunginn lungkhu lang oun saw`ae; te atu aphirute tou hung oun saw cih`ae? Tuhte ccei soh! Mimaw ccaccei oun cceih`ae sah lah kaening hynh oun thua`ae sah,” cite minmin kha a hopya`ae.
Te palih bawi`ae nynh kha-e bya kha khuabawi`ae kalan a hopya`ae; te Paul te Sailas tuh Rom`ae nynh thua`ae cipaw minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh a rih vae`ae.
Te khuabawi`ae tuh oun cceih`ae zah minmin kha thawte bohkuh`ae zah a poukhae`ae; te kha-e khua kyate pou lan a ngia`ae.
Te Paul te Sailas tuh thunginn kyate pou`ae zah Lidia inn lang a tee`ae; te minmin nynh uteno`ae kha he muih`ae tuh thawzungpya`ae zah a pou`ae.
Te Paul te Sailas tuh Amfipolis khua te Apollonia khua kha po khung`ae zah Thesalonika khua lang a thua`ae, tuh-e kya Jew`ae sinakok ccangkheit a um.
Te Paul tuh leih a cyimae hawte, minmin kalan teebua zah Sabbath nin ninthung cia minmin ryte Ccathyaa kya-e kha a hokuh`ae.
Kri tuh a teing ho zah a chih`ae paw kyate bua a thothui aho cite ccaesapah`ae zah a langsapya`ae. Te, “Nae kalan kae nynh ka hopaw hynh-e Jesu tuh Kri nynh athua,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te abang ccungccaw tuh zyn`ae zah Paul te Sailas ryte a mungkuh bua`ae; te beiknaw lante azuakuh`ae paw Greek ccungccaw zapipi te abapi huapaw nopi`ae patae mah a mungkuh bua`ae.

Thuasalama a zyn leipaw Jew`ae nynh mih eiung zah kungkunaw hmin kya-e ccungccahoy lei`ae kha a hoeinua`ae, te a khia a vekuh`ae paw kha suelua`ae zah khualae balyn kha siarisiarae a umsah`ae; te Jason a inn kha koih`ae zah minmin kha ccungccaw`ae malang poukhae lan a ccung`ae.
Minmin kha he muih khyh`ae tuh Jason te uno`ae abang kha khua uktu`ae kalan dung`ae zah, “Laephipi kubuleih`ae paw hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh hynhlang mah oun thua`ae.
Jason nynh minmin kha thuasah`ae, te minmin balyn nynh, ‘Jesu acikuh paw ccangpaw Siapharan a um,’ ci`ae zah Sizar siapharan awda`ae kha a rawse`ae,” cite thawte a sia`ae.
Te minmin nynh kha-e bya a thae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae te khua uktu`ae kha lungvawsawsah`ae.
Te Jason te mingccang`ae kyate aamahkhan pyakunawpaw a lawkuh`ae koute minmin kha a cciasah`ae.
Te uteno`ae nynh vaekheihmawte Paul te Sailas kha khuazi khe Beria khua lang a saw`ae; tuh-e khua kya he thua`ae te Jew`ae sinakok lungkhu lang a tee`ae.

Beria khuaccaw`ae tuh Thesalonika khuaccaw`ae laeze mih lung-ua hua, minmin tuh pekinaw thinlung te Pachia bya kha lawkuh`ae zah tuh-e uccaw`ae tuh akyh vema, kyh khyh vema cipaw kha nin takyhte Ccathyaa te a dokhia`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin kyaze ccungccaw patae nynh a zyn`ae; sawtua lan um paw Greek nopi`ae te pise`ae patae mah a zyn`ae.
Thuasalama Thesalonika khua kya-e Jew`ae nynh Beria khua kya Paul nynh Pachia bya a ho cipaw he a nyh`ae tuh, tuhlang tuin cceih`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kha a hy`ae.
Oute uteno`ae nynh vaekheihmawte Paul kha rili kalan ccia lan a saw`ae; thuasalama Sailas te Timote tuh tuin kya a um ung`ae.
Te Paul a saw`ae paw nynh Athen khua kyacia a saw`ae; te Sailas te Timote kha arangte a kalan oun cceih`ae sah cipaw kawpyapaw a mue`ae koute minmin tuh a ki`ae.
Paul nynh Sailas te Timote kha Athen khua kya a ngaw`ae lyakhe, kha-e khua tuh zohtuh`ae te phe abeih cipaw kha he a muih tuh a lung vawsaw.
Tukeiccu sinakok kyakhe Jew`ae te Pachia beik`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha thuasah, kungkunaw hmin kya leih a tungkuh`ae paw kha thuasah nin takyh bya a hokhae`ae.

Oute Epikurian te Stoik filosofa`ae abang tuh Paul te a khungkuh`ae. Te abang nynh, “E paw katua-katua ccohkuh paw hynh pawmou a hory?” a ci`ae. Paul nynh Jesu te thothuinaw kong kha a hopya`ae keiccuze mingccang`ae nynh, “Aning tuh ramccangpaw pachia`ae kong a hopatupaw nynh alo,” a ci`ae.
Te minmin nynh Paul kha hoei`ae zah Areopakas lang cciakhae`ae zah, “Nang nynh na hopaw hynh-e ccangpyanaw athawpaw hynh kaening nynh kae nybua ze so?
Pawccecize nang nynh kae nakaring te thae boi leipaw uccaw`ae kha nae thuakhae; tukeiccu hynh-e uccaw`ae asuilan tuh pawmou athua cipaw kae nyhry,” cite a hopya`ae.
Pawccecize Athen khuaccaw`ae balynte tuin kya um`ae paw mikhia`ae tuh athawpaw thungpang ho lanpaw te ngae lanpaw kya laelan mih ccyh kha thangsah he khyh`ae.
Oute Paul tuh Areopakas kungsi kyakhe thadyn zah, “Athen ccungccaw`ae, pawpaw balyn kya nanning tuh beiknaw kou na peki oh cipaw ka ny.

Pawccecize po ka cceih zah na beik oh paw kha he ka do tuh, ‘NY LEIPAW PACHIA KALAN,’ cite ccawtawkuh paw silawhang ccangkheit kha ka muih. Tukeiccu nanning nynh ny leite na beik oh paw Pachia kong kha kae nynh kae hopya oh.
Laephipi te tuin kya um paw uccaw balyn a raetupaw Pachia, aning tuh vaawran te laephi Bawipaw athua thyhhawte kuih te rae paw tempal`ae kya um khyh.
Aning tuh ccungccaw balyn kha hiinnaw, hy te pawpaw balyn a pyatupaw athua thyhhawte, pawsang mah a hanlan ho khyh zah ccungccaw`ae kuih te lawpyaku mah a hanlan ho khyh.
Te aning nynh laephi vawlan balyn um lan ccungccaw phin miakaw kha chii phinkheit kyate a rae; te mih ccyh ccangsapaw kha thuasah, mih umnaw ramri kha thuasah a khyapya`ae.
Ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae nynh Bawipaw kha a ccung`ae ccaw cite, amaw tuh aening lu raveihte ah sawkuh khyh oh zemah, amaw kha zah`ae sah lah a muih`ae ccaw cite.
Pawccecize aening tuh amaw kya nynh ah hiin oh, ah pia oh zah ah um oh; nanning lakuze ccawphuatu`ae abang nynh, ‘Aening mah amaw ciihan nynh ah thua oh,’ cite a phua`ae hawte nynh thua.
Ou tuhte Pachia kya-e ciihan ah thua oh keiccu, ccungccaw cyithyanaw te tuanaw liate rae paw sui, khyh ze phua, khyh ze lung te nynh Pachiathuanaw tuh aloku cite aening nynh ah tua lan oh ccang khyh.
Te hynh-e nynaw hoi khyh ccyh kha Pachia nynh a muih leipaw olante a um pya`ae, thuasalama atu tuh ahmin takyh kya um paw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha ngaesiku lan kaw a pya`ae.

Pawccemacize, Pachia nynh phe a khang vae paw Ccungccapaw liate laephi ccungccaw`ae kha dingnaw kya byapia cih paw nin, nin kheit kha phe a khyade vae. A chih`ae paw kyate amaw kha a thosahnaw liate ccungccaw balyn hanlan zyn lan um paw ccaekia kha phe a pya vae,” cite Paul nynh a ho.
Te minmin nynh a chih`ae paw thothuinaw kong kha he a thae`ae tuh abang nynh a sarya`ae; mingccang`ae nynh, “Hynh-e kong hynh kaening nynh na bya bua kae ngae ung cih,” a ci`ae.
Ou tuhkoute Paul tuh minmin laku kyate phe a pou vae.
Tuhzemah ccungccaw abang tuh Paul kalan pang`ae zah a zyn`ae; tuh-e`ae kya Dionisias cikuh paw Areopakas memba paw, Damaris cikuh paw nopinung lukheit te ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae a umbua`ae.
Hynh-e`ae koute Paul tuh Athen khua kyate pou zah Korin khua kyakhe a thua.

Te Jew`ae balyn tuh Rom khuapi kyate marya a pou cih`ae cite Klaudias siapharanpaw nynh kawpya keiccuze, aro mawze Itali ram kyate a la thua paw, Pontas ram kya a pui paw Akuila acikuh paw Jew paw te a zu Prisilla kha Paul nynh muih`ae zah minmin kyakhe a thua.
Te Paul tuh alokuhpaw ryalaw a lah paw athua keiccu minmin kya umbua zah rya a lahbua; pawccecize mih ryalaw tuh anuekuh thya paw ryabuu a raetu`ae nynh thua`ae.
Te Sabbath nin takyh Paul nynh sinakok kya bya hokhae`ae zah Jew`ae te Greek`ae kha a hy`ae.
Thuasalama Sailas te Timote Mesidonia ram kyate he oun thua`ae tuh Muisaw nynh Paul kha a lungthosah zah Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite Jew`ae kalan ccaekiakhan vae.

Te Jew`ae nynh rawse`ae zah alue lante bya he honua`ae tuh, Paul nynh a uccaw kha thyng zah, “Nae chii tuh naemaw nae lu vawlan thua vae sah, kae tuh ka thya; atu kyate kae tuh Zenta`ae kalan nynh ka cceih vae cih,” cite minmin kha a cipya`ae.
Te tuin kyate Paul tuh pou zah Pachia a beik paw, Jastas acikuh paw ccungccapaw inn lungkhu langkhe a tee; tuh-e paw inn tuh sinakok te phang abekuh.
Te sinakok uktupaw Krispas tuh amaw innbyn`ae balyn ryte Bawipaw kha a zyn`ae, te Korin khuaccaw`ae patae mah thae`ae zah a zyn`ae, te baptisma-in`ae.
Oute khuazi khe Bawipaw nynh Paul kalan vizin te bya hopah zah, “Rih nan, thuasalama ho ccaleih lah dae nan.
Pawccecize kae na kya ka um zah nang kha vaemaw muesah lan hung nynh san ae zia lan khyh; pawccecize hynh-e khua kya ccungccaw patae ka hoi,” a cipya.
Te Paul nynh minmin kha Pachia bya ccangpyate kum kheit sataruh cia khe kya a um.
Te Kalio tuh Akhai ram mangki lang a tang lya, Jew`ae nynh lungnging te Paul kha rawse`ae zah byapianaw tungkhung malang thuakhae`ae zah,
“Hynh-e paw nynh Kawbya te arawsekuh lante Pachia kha beik khylan ccungccaw`ae a soih`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.
