Te Paul nynh a khalang aw lan he a noukuh tuh, Kalio nynh Jew`ae kha, “Pou Jew`ae, hynh-e tuh aseipaw uccaw te ahoy leipaw uccaw athua lanze nanning kha kae ngaesangpya nawlan oh akonglang a um cih.

Thuasalama hynh-e tuh bya konglang, min konglang te nae kawbya konglang te byakhianawpaw athua zetuh naemaw te naemaw la piakuh oh; pawccecize tuhtahawpaw konglang kae byapia lan ka ry khyh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te minmin kha byapianaw tungkhung kyate pung a dee`ae.
Oute Greek`ae balyn nynh sinakok uktupaw Sosthene kha kyng`ae zah byapianaw tungkhung malang khe a bua`ae. Te Kalio tuh kha-e uccaw`ae kha pawlangria leite hung a ung.

Te Paul tuh tuin kya khaw a um ung. Te uteno`ae kyate akhue lawkuh zah tuin te Siria ram lang Prisilla te Akuila ryte sanphalung te a cceih`ae. Byakinkunaw phe a rae keiccuze Kenkhrea khua kyakhe a sang phe a ngokusya.
Te Efesa khua a thua`ae tuh Paul nynh minmin kha tuin kya a cciataw`ae; thuasalama amaw tuh sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah Jew`ae ryte byahokuh`ae.
Te minmin nynh mimaw ryte khaw umkheih lan Paul kha he a ngia`ae tuh Paul tuh a nawccah khyh.

Thuasalama minmin kha beihsya`ae zah, “Atu yn um lanpaw hynh-e poi kha pawpawte thua zemah Jerusalem kya nynh ka la mangbua cih; thuasalama Pachia rynaw athua ze nanning kalan bua kae ki cih,” a cipya`ae. Te Efesa kyate sanphalung te a cceih.
Te aning tuh Sisaria khua kya he a thua tuh khualae lang kaethung zah kriccawbu kha a beih`ae, te Antiok lang a cceihbung.
Te tuin kya azawlya a um koute Paul tuh pou zah Galati ram kyate Frikia ram kya po khuaccung zah zuitu`ae balyn kha thawzungpya`ae.
Te Alexandria khua kya a pui paw, byaho kou apuakuh paw, Ccathyaa kou nyh paw, Apollos cikuh paw Jew paw lukheit tuh Efesa khua lang yn thua.

Tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh Bawipaw laanpi kya thuihei paw nynh athua; muisaw kya lungthawsae paw thua zah aning nynh Bawipaw kya-e uccaw`ae kong kha ho zah hmerarihlan a ccangpya; tuhzemah Johan baptisma kong rou kha nynh a ny.
Te aning nynh sinakok kyakhe rawhoyte yn ho vae. Akuila te Prisilla nynh a hopaw kha he a thae`ae tuh, kha-e paw kha mih kalan hoei`ae zah Pachia laanpi kha houh ahme lante a ccaesapya`ae.

Te aning nynh Akhai ram lang po he a cceih ry tuh amaw kha lehkhan ccaw`ae cite uteno`ae nynh zuitu`ae kalan ccawzeipya`ae; te aning nynh he a thua tuh thawccinaw liate a zyn`ae paw kha patae a bawng`ae;
pawccecize Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cipaw kha Ccathyaa kyate langsapyate ccungccaw zapi malang Jew`ae kha rawhoy te phe a ei kho`ae.
Ou tuhcihte Apollos tuh Korin khua kya a um lyakhe, Paul tuh thalang-e ram kha po yn cciakhung zah Efesa khua kya yn thua, te zuitu`ae abang kha a muih`ae.
Te minmin kha, “He na zyn lya oh te Thyaa Muisaw na mue vae oh tou?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Thyaa Muisaw a um cipaw heize kae thae boi khyh,” cite a khung`ae.
Te Paul nynh, “Tuhte lanze paw baptisma mou na in oh?” cite a khia`ae. Te minmin nynh, “Johan kya-e baptisma,” a ci`ae.

Oute Paul nynh, “Johan nynh tuh ngaesikunaw te asekuhpaw baptisma kha insah`ae zah amaw koute yn thua lanpaw kha a zyn`ae ccaw cite ccungccaw`ae kha a hopya`ae, tuh-e paw tuh Kri Jesu kha nynh thua,” a cipya`ae.
Minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh, Bawipaw Jesu min kya baptismain` ae.
Te Paul nynh minmin tungvaw a kuih he a khang tuh Thyaa Muisaw minmin tungvaw yn thua; te minmin tuh bya ccangpaw te ho`ae zah profehbya a ho`ae.
Tuh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh abalynte luhaw laening loukaw acih`ae.
Te Paul tuh sinakok lungkhu lang tee zah sawpaw sathung cia Pachia peenaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kong kha hokhae`ae zah soihbiate rawhoy te a ho.

Thuasalama ccungccaw abang tuh mih lungkhung zah zyn khyh`ae, ccungccaw zapi malang kha-e Ccianaw kong kha thethya he a ho`ae tuh Paul tuh minmin kyate pou zah zuitu`ae kha a poukhae`ae, te Tirannas kya-e siainn kyakhe nin takyh bya hokhae`ae.
Te tuhcihte kum ning cia aro, tukeiccu Asia ram kya um paw ccungccaw balyn, Jew`ae mah Greek`ae mah Bawipaw Jesu bya kha a thae`ae.
Te Pachia nynh Paul kuih mangte acyikuh boi leipaw athungpaw ryalawnaw`ae kha a langsaku.
Ou tuhte Paul a pyn kya-e pavua, tukhyhze taeccia uccaw ccangkhakheit kha ngeccih`ae kalan ccyngpah`ae zah ccinaw`ae tuh minmin kyate phe a pou, te ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae mah phe toikuh`ae.

Oute ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae adeethya`ae paw, a khia a vekuh`ae paw Jew`ae abang nynh, “Paul nynh a hopaw Jesu liate nanning kha kae dee oh,” cite ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae nynh a ccungnua`ae paw tungvaw khe Bawipaw Jesu min kha konua lan a lawku`ae.
Jew ranpibawi alepaw Skeva cikuh paw ccaaw`ae lusari a la um`ae, minmin nynh tuhte a cyih`ae.
Te ahoy leipaw muisaw nynh, “Jesu tuh ka nyh, Paul mah ka nyh, thuasalama nanning tuh hungmou na thua oh?” cite a khung`ae.
Te ahoy leipaw muisaw bahkuhpaw ccungccapaw nynh minmin tungvaw thohnuakuh`ae zah phe a tae`ae, te phe a risah`ae keiccu, minmin tuh kha-e inn kyate sasete ccue`ae zah vaemaw a muebia`ae.
Te hynh-e tuh Efesa kya um`ae paw Jew`ae te Greek`ae balyn nynh marya a ny`ae; te minmin balyn nynh rih`ae zah Bawipaw Jesu min kha phu-esah`ae.
Te a zyn paw ccungccaw patae oun thua`ae zah mih cyisahnaw`ae kha langsakuh`ae zah seiphykuh`ae.

Mitleihthya`ae paw patae nynh mah mih ccauh`ae kha marya oun ccyng`ae zah ccungccaw balyn malang khe maee te a rua`ae. Kha-e ccauh`ae mee kha tua`ae zah ngunphua thung sungpangaw mee acih cipaw a muih`ae.
Ou tuhte Pachia bya tuh thungnaw te lethung zah a tae.

Hynh-e`ae acyikuh koute, Paul nynh Mesidonia ram te Akhai ram kha po he a khung koute Jerusalem lang ccia lan a thinlung kya noukuh zah, “Tuin kya he ka thua koute Rom khuapi mah ka muih hahe aho cih,” a ci.
Tukeiccu amaw ryalawpah`ae paw luning, Timote te Erastas kha Mesidonia ram lang a saw`ae, thuasalama amaw tuh Asia ram kya sosoh a umhy ung.
Tuh ccyh lya tuh-e Ccianaw konglang te byalungnaw alepi apou.
Pawccecize Demetrias cikuh paw phualaeetupaw lukheit nynh Artemis khozinung kya-e phua-inn taraw`ae kha rae zah phualaeetu`ae kha patae leih a muesah`ae.
Tuh-e paw nynh phualaeetu`ae te tuhtahawpaw ryalah paw ccungccaw`ae kha ko`ae zah, “Ccungccaw oh, hynh-e ryalawnaw kya nynh aening muenaw tuh a um cipaw na ny oh.

Te hynh-e Paul nynh, ‘Kuih te rae paw tuh pachia thua khyh,’ cite ho zah Efesa khua kya kyalya thua leite Asia ram balyn mah ccungccaw patae kha soih`ae zah a paleihsaku`ae paw kha na muih oh zah na thae oh.

Ou tuhte aening phualaeepaw thyanaw hynh ccakaepaw lang yn tang cih cipaw thinphang lan a um kyalya thualeite alesaepaw khozinung Artemis kya-e tempal mah pawlangria vae lan khyh`ae zah Asia ram balynte laephipi nynh a beik`ae paw amaw phu-e lesaenaw mah yn roh cih cipaw thinphang lan a um,” cite a hopya`ae.
Minmin nynh tuh-e bya kha he a thae`ae tuh myarya mih bungpaw zah, “Efesa`ae kya-e Artemis tuh alesaepaw nynh thua!” cite a sia`ae.
Te khualae balyn tuh byalungnaw te phe beih zah Paul ryte khuaccungkheih`ae paw Mesidonia ccungccaw`ae Kaias te Aristarkhas kha kyng`ae zah poidonaw inn lungkhu langkhe lungngingte po a teekhae`ae.
Te Paul nynh ccungccaw`ae kalan teebua lan he a noukuh tuh zuitu`ae nynh ua khyh`ae.
Te Asia ram kyaze lupi athua`ae paw, Paul a ruiban`ae abang nynh poidonaw inn lungkhu lang amaw te amaw a phungkuh bua khyh nawlan a kalan ccungccaw saw`ae zah a soihbiasah`ae.

Ccungccaw sueluakuh`ae paw tuh keisukeilae pung a um keiccuze abang nynh ccangte sia`ae zah abang nynh phinccang lante a sia`ae, alunghua tuh pawkeiccu nynh pynkheihlan kae thua cipaw mah nyh khyh`ae.
Te Jew`ae nynh Alexanda kha malang toisakuh`ae zah ccungccaw zapi kyate a poukhae`ae. Alexanda nynh a kuih kha dyngpah`ae zah ccungccaw`ae kalan amaw hanlan hokunaw rae lan a ry.
Thuasalama minmin nynh aning tuh Jew paw cipaw he a nyh`ae tuh mih balyn mawte, “Efesa`ae kya-e Artemis tuh alesaepaw nynh thua!” cite suimilan ccangning loukaw cia roi kheit lante thawte a sia`ae.

Te khua ccazipaw nynh ccungccaw`ae kha a daesah`ae koute, “Efesa ccungccaw`ae, Efesa khua tuh alesaepaw Artemis khozinung a tempal te Zeus pachia kyate yn ccah paw zohtuh a ringtu nynh thua cipaw hynh a nyh leipaw hungmou a um?
Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh ei kho leipaw athua keiccu, daetedae lang na um oh ho zah na rangsah lan oh ccan khyh.
Pawccecize tempal uccaw mah a luade`ae paw thua khyh zah nae khozinung mah thethyaho`ae paw athua leipaw hynh-e ccungccaw`ae hynh nanning nynh hynhlang nae thuakhae oh.
Tukeiccu Demetrias thuasah, amaw ryte um`ae paw phualaeetu`ae nynh thuasah lukhakheit tungvaw byalungnaw a hoi`ae ze byapia zung um zah vuethoh`ae mah a um; mimaw te mimaw thuakhaekuh`ae sah.
Thuasalama nanning nynh ccangpaw akong hory paw na hoi oh ze, aphung thyhte khuapumkunaw kya nynh byapae lanpaw athua.

Pawccecize atunin e byalungnaw keiccu aening hynh byakhianaw kya oun ko cih`ae cipaw ri lan a um, pawccecize hynh-e atazae leipaw sueluakunaw hanlan aening nynh ah hoku lan oh paw oun hoi lan khyh oh,” a ci.
Hynhte he a ho koute a pumkuh`ae paw kha phe a pousah`ae.
Tuh-e byalungnaw adae koute Paul nynh zuitu`ae kha amaw kalan ko`ae zah a beihsya`ae koute Mesidonia ram lang ccia lan a thokuh.
Te tuh-e pee kya po cceih zah zuitu`ae kha thawzung pyanaw bya patae a hopah`ae koute Greece ram lang a thua.
Te tuin kya sawpaw sathung a um. Te Siria ram lang sanphalung te ccia lan vae cite he a noukuh tuh Jew`ae nynh phee lan a nounuaku`ae keiccu Mesidonia ram langte ki lan a tuaku vae.
Te Beria khua paw Sopater, Thesalonika khua paw Aristarkhas te Sekundus, Derbe khua paw Kaias te Timote, te Asia ram kya-e Taichikas te Trofimas tuh Paul kya Asia ram lang a cceihbua`ae.
Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh malang la cceihty`ae zah Troas khua kyakhe kaening kha oun la ngaw`ae.
Te Ransi phing leipaw Sanlou Poi he athang koute kaening tuh Filipi khua kyate sanphalung te kae cceih zah nin pangaw cihte minmin umnaw`ae Troas khua kae thua, tuin kya nin sari kae um.
Te lonaw kyaze masaty nin kya zuitu`ae nynh sanlou ia lan pynkheihlan he oun thua`ae tuh, Paul tuh awkhualan thoku lan phe a noukuh vae keiccuze minmin kha phung hopah`ae zah ziraccyng cia po a pia.
Te minmin nynh pynkheihlan a sueluakunaw`ae palung khaan kya maeekhua patae a aw`ae.

Te Utikhas cikuh paw ccangvaepaw tuh thanlang-aw kin kya dahung zah bubu a la ngawphukuh; Paul nynh khaw cia phung he ho tuh, tuh-e paw tuh a ngawphukuh lante khaan thungnaw kyate boh ccah zah phe chihpaw kha a khuin`ae.
Te Paul tuh rungbung zah kha-e paw tungvaw a bakhung thing, te varyng pum zah, “Nae lungvawsaw nan sah, pawccecize a hiinnaw tuh amaw kya phang a um,” a ci.
Te Paul tuh bua kaethung zah sanlou kha eih zah a ae`ae, te khua phe dae lang cia, khaw cia bya a ho koute phe a pou.
Te minmin nynh ccangvaepaw kha a hiin te cciakhae`ae zah myarya mih ngaengan.

Te kaening tuh sanphalung kalan kae cceihty zah Assos khua kalan sanphalung te kae cceih, tuin e Paul kha hoeibua lan vae cite kae noukuh; pawccecize aning tuh ccu te ccia lan cite phe a la noukuh vae keiccu khahcihte a paccynpaw athua.
Aning tuh kaening ryte Assos khua kya he kae tungkuh tuh amaw kha kae hoeibua zah Mitylen khua lang kae cceih.

Te tuin kyate sanphalung te kae cceih zah awkhualan tuh Khios tuikoih te adekunaw kya kae thua. Te ccangpaw nin kya Samos tuikoih kya kae thua zah Trokilliam tuikoih pe kae hae-ung. Te ccangpaw nin kya Miletas khua kae thua.
Paul nynh Pentikos Nin kya athua kho ze Jerusalem kya phe thua lante a rangsaku keiccuze Asia ram kya khaw aro ry khyh pawte Efesa khua kha po cciakhung lante phe a tuakuty vae.
Te Miletas khua kyate Paul nynh Efesa khua lang ccungccaw saw zah kriccawbu kya-e pastor`ae kha a ko`ae.
Te minmin nynh a kalan he oun thua`ae tuh Paul nynh, “Asia ram lungkhu lang kae thua takaw nin kyate nanning ryte ka um lungkhu balyn pawcihte nynh ka um cipaw nanning nynh na ny oh,
zakawsangsakunaw thinlung balyn te, mitphi patae lua te, Jew`ae kya-e pheenaw keiccu ka tungvaw thua paw syntawnaw`ae kha teingbiate Bawipaw rya ka law paw kha na ny oh.
Nae hanlan athane paw, pawsang mah ka thuru bang khyh, ccungccaw zapi kya thuasah, inn kheit koute inn kheit thuasah nanning kha kae hopah oh zah kae ccangpya oh.
Pachia kalan ngaesikunaw kong te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya zynnaw kong kha Jew`ae kalan te Greek`ae kalan mah ccaekia ka khan paw kha mah na ny oh.
Te atu, dotua, kae tuh Muisaw liate hede ka thua zah Jerusalem lang ka cceih, tuin kya ka tungvaw paw nynh yn thua cih cipaw ka nyh khyh.
Heedenawpaw te vawsaw riathaenaw nynh kamaw kha phang yn ngaw cite Thyaa Muisaw nynh khua takyh kya kamaw kong ccaekiakhan paw rou nynh ka ny.

Thuasalama Pachia thawccinaw te asekuhpaw thehoypaw kha ccaekiakhan khylan Bawipaw Jesu kyate ka mue paw ryalaw athua paw te ka ryalaw kha lungtuate ka thang kho nawlan kha-e vawsaw riathaenaw`ae kha pawlang ka ria vae khyh zah ka hiinnaw mah ka duakuh vae khyh.
“Te atu, kae nynh ka cceih zah Pachia peenaw kong kae hopya oh paw nanning balyn nynh ka mae hynh nae muih vae lan khyh oh cipaw ka ny.
Tukeiccu kae tuh ccungccaw balyn chii kyate ka thya cipaw atu nin nanning kalan ccaekia ka khan.
Pawccecize Pachia khuakhannaw balyn kha nanning kalan phy lan ka syngkuh khyh.

Tukeiccu naemaw te naemaw raeringkuh oh lah Pachia nynh amaw a chii te a re paw Pachia kriccawbu kha dooih khylan Thyaa Muisaw nynh nanning kha dooihtu`ae lang ae khangnua oh paw tuuphu`ae balyn kha mah la raering oh.
Pawccecize kamaw phe ka pou koute rehahanpaw suizaw`ae nynh tuuphu`ae kha haangbang leite nanning laku lang oun tee cih`ae cipaw hynh ka ny.
Zuitu`ae kha mih kalan soih khylan ahme leipaw bya a ho paw ccungccaw`ae kha naemaw ccaccei kyate mah oun pou cih`ae.
Tukeiccu raeringkuh oh lah kum thung lungkhu khuazi khuadae mitphi ryte ccungccaw miakaw kha raeringpya lan ka dae khyh paw kha la ning nan oh.

“Te uteno`ae, atu nanning kha Pachia kalan te amaw thawccinaw bya kalan kae ah oh; tuh-e nynh nanning kha ae lethungsah kho oh zah thyaasah athua vae`ae paw balyn ryte nanning kha rho uccaw ae pya kho oh.
Kae tuh hung ccungccaw kya-e phua, sui, uccaw`ae mah ka dua bang khyh.
Athua, hynh-e ka kuih`ae nynh kamaw elan ahoboupaw hanlan te kamaw ryte um`ae paw hanlan ryalawpya cipaw naemaw ccaccei nynh phe na ny oh.

Hynh hawte ryalaw lawte thawzungzya`ae paw kha nanning nynh na bawng oh aho cipaw nanning kalan marya kae langsapya vae oh. Te, ‘Mue paw laeze pya paw nynh hythua a um hua,’ cite Bawipaw Jesu nynh a hopaw bya kha la liathui oh,” cite Paul nynh a hopya`ae.
Te tuhte he a ho koute a ccukharutung zah minmin balyn ryte sawsang`ae.
Te minmin balyn tuh thawmawte rah`ae zah Paul a nging kha pum`ae zah a myng`ae,
amaw mae kha nae muih vae lan khyh oh cite a hopaw bya keiccu mih ngae houh athah. Te Paul kha sanphalung kyacia a dohaw`ae.

Ou tuhcihte minmin ryte kae phiakuh koute sanphalung te kae cceih, dingrarihlan kae cceih zah Kos tuikoih kya kae thua, awkhualan tuh Rhodes tuikoih kya kae thua, te tuin kyate Patara khua kya kae thua.
Te Finisia ram lang cceih paw sanphalung kha kae muih zah kae ccikuh bua zah kae cceihbua.
Saiparas tuikoih kha he kae muih tuh voilang khe kae cciataw zah Siria ram lang kae cceih zah Tai khua kya a hae-ung, pawccecize sanphalung nynh a phupaw uccaw kha tuin kya saw lan a cih.
Te zuitu`ae kha kae muih`ae zah tuin kya nin sari kae um. Jerusalem lang a cciathung khyh nawlan minmin nynh Paul kha Muisaw liate a hopya`ae.
Te nin sari he aro te kae pou zah he kae cceih tuh minmin balyn nynh mih zu mih ccaaw`ae ryte khua khunglang cia oun dohaw`ae. Te rili kin kya ccukharutungte saw kae sang.
Lukheit koute lukheit kae beihkuhsya zah kaening tuh sanphalung vawlan kae kae, te minmin tuh inn lang a ki`ae.
Te Tai khua kyate kae khuaccungpaw he kae thangsah tuh Tolemai khua kya kae thua, te uteno`ae kha kae beih`ae zah minmin ryte nin kheit kae umkheih.
Te awkhualan nin kya Paul ryte kae pou zah Sisaria khua kya kae thua, te evangelist lusari kyaze lukheit athua paw Filip inn lungkhu lang kae tee zah amaw ryte kae um.
Tuh-e paw nynh profehbya ho`ae paw liaccady ccanung lu pali a hoi.
Te tuin kya nin patae kae um tuh Akabus cikuh paw profeh lukheit Judah ram kyate yn thua.

Te kaening kalan he yn thua tuh Paul kya-e taesung kha lawkuh zah a kuih te a ccu kha heekuh zah, “ ‘Hynh-e taesung a hoi paw ccungccapaw hynh Jerusalem kya Jew`ae nynh hynh hawte a khii cih`ae zah Zenta`ae kuih kalan a ah cih`ae,’ cite Thyaa Muisaw nynh a ho,” a ci.
Te tuh-e bya tuh he kae thae tuh kaening ry tuh-e hmin kya um`ae paw ry, Jerusalem lang a ccia khyh nawlan Paul kha kae soihbia.
Oute Paul nynh tho zah, “Pawccemou na rah oh zah ka thinlung nae koisah oh? Bawipaw Jesu min hanlan Jerusalem kya khiiku lanpaw kyalya thua leite chi lan heize paccynkute ka um,” a ci.
Te hopya kho he a um khyh tuh kaening tuh zya kae dae zah, “Bawipaw rynaw thyhte thua vae sah,” kae ci.
Tuh-e koute kae uccaw`ae kha kae lawkuh zah Jerusalem lang kae cceihthung.
Sisaria khua e zuitu`ae abang mah kaening ryte a cceihbua`ae, te minmin nynh kaening kae thua cihnaw Mnason cikuh paw Saiparaspaw, a kum tang vae paw zuitu kha oun hoeibua`ae.
Te Jerusalem kya he kae thua tuh uteno`ae nynh lungtuate leh oun khan`ae.
Awkhualan Paul tuh kaening ryte James kalan cceihbua zah kriccaw piccang`ae balyn a la um`ae.
Te Paul nynh minmin kha beih`ae zah amaw a ryalawnaw liate Pachia nynh Zenta`ae laku a cyipaw kha marya a hopya`ae.

Te minmin nynh tuh-e he a thae`ae tuh Bawipaw kha phu-esah`ae, te Paul kha, “Kae neitaw, a zyn paw Jew`ae milu athung asang hozeih nynh a um`ae cipaw kha na muih, te minmin balyn tuh Kawbya kalan a zuakuh`ae paw nynh thua`ae.

Te Zenta`ae laku um`ae paw Jew`ae balyn nynh mih ccaaw`ae vindung aw ho vae khyh, aphung thyhte mah zui ho vae khyh cite na cipah`ae zah Mawsi kawbya kha vua khylan na ccangpya`ae cipaw na kong kha minmin nynh phe a thae vae`ae.
Tukeiccu pawte cyi lan? Ccungccaw zapi tuh oun sueluakuh mamin cih`ae, pawccecize nang na thua cipaw kha phe a thae cih`ae.
Tukeiccu hynh-e nang kae hopya paw hynh cyih. Byakinkunaw phe a rae vae`ae paw ccungccaw lupali kae hoi`ae.

Minmin kha cciakhae`ae lah minmin ryte ccikankuh oh, mih sang a ngoku ccaw`ae amee kha la pyapah`ae; ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh na konglang a thae`ae paw kha accakaepaw nynh thua cipaw a ny ccaw`ae, te namaw mah kawbya na zui zah kawbya thyhte na um cipaw kha oun nyh cih`ae.

Thuasalama a zyn paw Zenta`ae konglang tuh khahtahawpaw kha zui ho khyh, zohtuh kalan silawnaw`ae paw, chii, ngingmae te chia paw te ohhuakunaw kyate rou nynh mimaw te mimaw kha a sungku`ae aho cite ccaw kae zei zah bya phe kae pae vae`ae,” cite a hopya`ae.

Oute Paul nynh kha-e ccungccaw`ae kha a cciakhae`ae, te awkhualan khe minmin ryte amaw kha a ccikankuh koute, ccikankunaw nin tuh phe accing vae cipaw kha thaesah khylan`ae tempal lungkhu lang a tee, tuh-e ccyh kya nynh minmin lu raveih hanlan silawkunaw tuh rae lanpaw athua.
Te nin sari vyavya he acihte Asia ram kyate oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae nynh Paul kha tempal kya he muih`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae balyn kha hy`ae zah a kyng`ae,

“Israel ccungccaw`ae oun bawng oh, hynh-e paw tuh ah ccungccaw`ae kha thuasah, Kawbya kha thuasah, te hynh-e hmin kha thuasah, rawsete ahmin takyh kya ccungccaw balyn kha a ccangpah paw nynh thua, te tuhlaeze Greek`ae kha mah tempal lungkhu lang teekhae`ae zah hynh-e athyaapaw hmin hynh phe a thusah vae,” cite a sia`ae.
(Pawccecize langmaw lya khua lungkhu khe Paul ryte Efesa khuapaw Trofimas kha minmin nynh muih`ae zah kha-e paw kha tempal lungkhu lang Paul nynh a teekhae cite a tua`ae keiccu nynh thua).
Khualae balyn ngaluinngaluin accae; te ccungccaw`ae nynh pynkheihlan oun ccue`ae zah Paul kha kyng`ae zah tempal voidu kyate po poukhae`ae, te vaekheihmawte thuakaw`ae kha phe a khaw`ae.
Te minmin nynh Paul kha chia lan cite a nounuaku`ae lyakhe Jerusalem khua balyn kya byalungnaw a um cipaw thungpang kha rhawkaw thungkheit uk paw rhawbawipaw nynh he a thae tuh,
rhawkaw`ae te rhawkaw zakheit uktupaw rhawbawi`ae kha arangte ko`ae zah minmin kalan a ccuenua bung`ae. Te minmin nynh rhawbawipaw te rhawkaw`ae kha he muih`ae tuh Paul kha bua vae khyh`ae.
Oute rhawbawipaw nynh Paul pe langkhe cceih zah a kyng, sivarui ccangning te khii lan kawpya`ae; te aning tuh hungmou, pawmou a cyi cipaw kha a khia`ae.

Te ccungccaw zapi laku abang nynh ccangte sia`ae zah abang nynh ccanglang te a sia`ae keiccu, rhawbawipaw nynh accaccingpaw kha a ny kho khyh keiccuze Paul kha rhawkaw inn lungkhu lang phang oh cite kawpya`ae.
Te nawkui kya he a thua tuh ccungccaw`ae myarya so`ae keiccuze rhawkaw`ae nynh Paul kha hang`ae zah a cciakhae`ae.
Pawccecize ccungccaw zapi nynh, “Theih oh!” cite sia`ae zah a zuibia`ae.
Te rhawkaw inn lungkhu lang teedyn khe Paul nynh, “Nang kha bya kae hopya ze?” cite rhawbawipaw kha a khia. Rhawbawipaw nynh, “Greek bya na hothya tou?
Nang hynh anuhlang lyaze ccungccaw na rawse zah damiah thung pali kha rangkaw lang a cciakhae paw Izip ccungccapaw kha na thua khyh tou?” cite a khia.

Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Kae tuh Silisia ram, Tarsuh khua kya a pui paw Jew paw nynh ka thua, anyaa leipaw khuapi kya um paw nynh ka thua, e ccungccaw`ae kalan byahonaw kaw yn pyabua, kae ngiaku,” a cipya.
Rhawbawipaw nynh kaw pya zah Paul tuh nawkui vawlan thadyn zah ccungccaw`ae kha a kuih te syntawnaw a pya`ae. Te khaw cia daebabilan he a um`ae te Paul nynh Hebru bya te hynhte a ho:
“Uteno`ae te paaw`ae, nanning kalan atu ka thungkhawkunawpaw bya hynh la ngaetua oh,” a ci.
Te Hebru bya te a ho paw kha minmin nynh he a thae`ae tuh houh daebabilan a um`ae. Te Paul nynh,

“Kae tuh Silisia ram Tarsuh khua kya a pui paw Jew ccungccaw nynh ka thua, tuhzemah hynh-e khua kya ka lethung zah Kamaliel ccu leihpaw kya paaw`ae kawbya phung thyhte phe ccing lan a ccangpya`ae paw te atunin nanning balyn hawte Pachia kalan myarya a zuakuhpaw nynh ka thua.
Pise mah nopi mah ka hee`ae zah thunginn lungkhu lang ka saw`ae; hynh-e Ccianaw kha chinaw phe phah lang cia ka tua ka sah.

Tuhte ranpibawi lupi te piccang`ae phu balyn mah kae ka ccaekia`ae nynh thua`ae, minmin kyate uteno`ae kalan a ky`ae paw ccaw kha kae mah ka ccyng zah Damaskas khua kya um`ae paw, kha-e beiknaw a beik`ae paw kha detah khylan sivarui te hee lan`ae zah Jerusalem lang ky lan`ae cite Damaskas lang ka cceih.
“Ou tuhte kae tuh khua ka ccung zah Damaskas khua lang vyavya ka thuadyn, ninthuccyng loukaw khe, vaawran kyate alepipaw awnaw tuh vaekheihmawte ka pepan khe phae yn aw.
Te kae tuh laephi kalan ka khuliakuh zah, ‘Saul, Saul, pawccemou nang nynh kamaw hynh nae tua nae sah?’ cite a hopaw roi kha ka thae.
Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, nang tuh hungmou?’ cite ka khung. Te aning nynh, ‘Kae tuh nang nynh na tua na sah paw Nazareth paw Jesu nynh ka thua,’ yn cipya.
“Te kamaw ryte a cceihbua`ae paw nynh awnaw kha phe muih bua ccaccing`ae zah a rih`ae, thuasalama ka kalan bya ho paw kha-e paw roi kha minmin nynh thaebua khyh`ae.
Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, pawmou ka cyih cih?’ ka ci. Te Bawipaw nynh, ‘Thokuh lah Damaskas khua lungkhu langkhe cceih, tuin kya na cyi lanpaw balyn kha ae hopah cih`ae,’ yn cipya.
Te tuh-e awnaw phu-enaw keiccuze kae tuh ngaw he ka muih kho khyh tuh, kamaw ryte a cceihbua`ae paw nynh mih kuih te oun cciakhae`ae zah Damaskas khua lungkhu lang ka thua.
“Te tuin kya um`ae paw Jew`ae balyn nynh thehoyccousah`ae paw, Kawbya thyhte kou a zuakuhpaw ccungccapaw Ananias nynh,
ka kalan yn thua zah ka pe thadyn zah, ‘Ka neitaw Saul, ngawmuih ccavae,’ yn cipya. Tuh-e suimilan ccyh kya amaw kha ka dothung zah ka muih.
Te aning nynh, ‘Nang nynh Pachia rynaw kha na ny nawlan, te Midingpaw kha na muih nawlan, te amaw khalang kya-e roi kha na thae nawlan cite ah minpaaw`ae Pachia nynh nang kha phe ae po vae.
Pawccecize na muih paw te na thae paw kha ccungccaw`ae balyn kalan ho lan nang tuh amaw ccaekia na thua cih.
Te atu pawccemou phang na ngaw? Thokuh lah baptismain, te Bawipaw min kha kote na seinaw`ae kha la singkuh,’ yn cipya.
“Ou tuhcihte Jerusalem lang bua ka ki zah tempal voidu lungkhu kya saw ka sang cciamang lyakhe, kae tuh phe ka la ngawphukuh zah,
kamaw kha, ‘Rangsakuh lah Jerusalem kyate arangte pou; pawccecize kamaw konglang nang nynh ccaekia na khan paw kha minmin nynh lehkhan lan khyh`ae,’ cite yn hopatupaw kha ka muih.
Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, nang ae zyn`ae paw kha sinakok miakaw kya ka bua`ae zah thung ka saw`ae cipaw kha minmin nynh a ny`ae.
Te namaw e sawlangchia athua paw Stifen a chii lua lyakha kae mah a pe ka thadynbua zah a chinaw kya ka nawccahbua, te amaw theih`ae paw mih uccaw`ae kha a ngawpah`ae paw nynh ka thua,’ ka ci.
Te aning nynh, ‘La cceih; pawccecize nang kha Zenta`ae kalan e kyate asawnaw lang kae saw cih,’ yn cipya,” cite Paul nynh a ci.
Te minmin nynh kha-e bya kha he a ho cia a ngaepya`ae, oute mih roi saw`ae zah, “Tuhtahawpaw ccungccaw tuh laephi kyate ccaring vua oh; pawccecize aning tuh hiin lan ngaekuh khyh!” a ci`ae.
Ou tuhte minmin nynh a sia`ae, mih uccaw phaekuh`ae zah vuiping kha he a theithung`ae tuh,
rhawbawi lupi nynh Paul kha pawccemou tuhte a sianua`ae cipaw ny khylan, rhawkaw-inn lungkhu lang phang oh lah ziabua te byakhia thuasah cite kaw a pya`ae.
Te minmin nynh saphuarui te he a hee`ae tuh Paul nynh a pe a thadyn paw rhawbawipaw kha, “Rom ccungccaw athua paw te seibe lan um leipaw ccungccaw hynh nanning nynh ziabua lan accan tou?” a cipya.
Tuh-e tuh rhawbawipaw nynh he a thae tuh cceih zah rhawbawi lupi kha, “Na cyi dyn khe raeringkuh vae lou; pawccecize hynh-e paw tuh Rom ccungccapaw nynh athua,” cite a hopya.
Oute rhawbawi lupi nynh yn cceih zah Paul kha, “Nang hynh Rom ccungccapaw na thua tou? Oun hopah,” a cipya. Paul nynh, “Ka thua,” a ci.
Te rhawbawi lupi nynh, “Phua patae pyate nynh kae tuh Rom ccungccawthuanaw hynh ka mue,” a ci. Te Paul nynh, “Thuasalama kae tuh puinaw kyate nynh ka mue,” a ci.

Oute Paul kha byakhia lan acih`ae paw tuh a kyate vaekheihmawte phe pou`ae; te aning tuh Rom paw nynh athua cipaw kha thuasah, te amaw a khiidepaw kha thuasah rhawbawi lupi nynh he a nyh tuh a rih vae.

Awkhualan, Jew`ae nynh pawkeiccumou Paul kha seibe`ae cipaw phe ria lan a ny ry keiccuze rhawbawi lupi nynh Paul kha supah zah alepaw ranpibawi`ae te kungsi`ae balyn kha tungku lan kawpya`ae, te Paul kha cciakhae bung zah mih malang khe a nung.
Te Paul nynh kungsi`ae kha rirido`ae zah, “Uteno`ae kae tuh atunin cia Pachia malang mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung ahoypaw te nynh ka hiin,” a ci.
Te ranpibawi lupi Ananias nynh Paul a mung kha bua oh cite a pe thadyn`ae paw kha kawpya`ae.

Oute Paul nynh, “Arawpaw sithuh`ae paw lungrua! Pachia nynh nang kha ae bua vae cih. Pawccecize nang tuh kae kha Kawbya thyhte byapia lan khaw na dahung, te Kawbya te arawsekuh lante kae kha bua lan kaw na pya`ae tou?” a ci.
Te a pe thadyn`ae paw nynh, “Nang nynh Pachia kya-e ranpibawi lupi kha na sang tou?” a ci`ae.
Oute Paul nynh, “Uteno`ae, aning tuh ranpibawi lupi cipaw ka nyh khyh; pawccecize, ‘Na ccungccaw`ae uktupaw kha a thethya na ho lan khyh,’ cite azeikuh,” a ci.

Thuasalama tuh-e`ae kya phu kheit tuh Sadusi`ae thua zah ccangpaw phu tuh Farasi`ae nynh thua cipaw kha Paul nynh he a nyh tuh, “Uteno`ae, kae tuh Farasipaw nynh ka thua, Farasipaw ccapaw nynh ka thua, a chih`ae paw thothuinaw te ngaehoinaw kong keiccu nynh kae tuh byapia ka thua,” cite kungsi`ae kyakhe thawte a sia.
Ou tuhte he a ho tuh Farasi`ae te Sadusi`ae laku byaeikunaw yn pou zah ccungccaw zapi tuh phe phiakuh`ae.
Pawccecize Sadusi`ae nynh tuh thothuinaw um khyh, vaaw ccungccaw um khyh, muisaw mah um khyh a ci`ae; thuasalama Farasi`ae nynh tuh paryh a um a ci`ae.

Te siaruanaw pipi yn pou. Te Farasi`ae kalan a pang`ae paw kawbya ccangpatu`ae nynh thokuh`ae zah thawte a ei`ae: “Hynh-e paw kya a seipaw kharyh kae muih khyh. Muisaw nynh thuasah, vaaw ccungccaw nynh thuasah a kalan byahopya lan thua ze, Pachia hynh rawsete dou nan oh sih,” a ci`ae.

Te thawmawte eikunaw he a um tuh, ccungccaw`ae nynh Paul kha oun sue cih`ae zah phe oun paethungku cih`ae cite rhawbawi lupi nynh a thinphang keiccuze rhawkaw`ae kha cciabung lan te minmin laku kyate Paul kha thawte poukhae lan zah rhawkawinn lungkhu lang teekhae lan kaw a pya`ae.
Te awkhualan khuazi kya Bawipaw nynh Paul pe khe thadyn zah, “Paul, na thawmuin sah; pawccecize Jerusalem kya kamaw kong ccaekia na khan hawte Rom khuapi kya mah ccaekia na khan ung cih,” a cipya.
Te khua he adae tuh Jew`ae abang nynh aphu te um`ae zah, “Aening nynh Paul kha ah chia mawlaezung oh ae lei lan zah tui mah nia lei lan,” cite mimaw te mimaw kha thyalawkute byakanku`ae.
Tuh-e pheenaw a rae`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh milu sungpali lae acih`ae.
Te minmin nynh alepaw ranpibawi`ae te piccang`ae kalan oun thua`ae zah, “Paul kae chia makhia pawsang mah kae ae lan khyh cite kaemaw te kaemaw thyalawkute bya phe kae kanku vae.

Tukeiccu awkhualan rhawbawi lupi nynh Paul kha nanning kalan yn cciakhae ccaw, amaw kha houh aria lan byakhia aho vae cih paw olante oun cih oh lah, nanning nynh kungsi`ae ryte rhawbawi lupi kha oun hopah oh; te Paul tuh nanning kalan yn thua maw khe kaening tuh amaw kha chia lan paccynkute kae um vae,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te Paul a ccianung ccapaw nynh kha-e minmin nynh a buih`ae paw kong kha he a thae tuh cceih zah rhawkaw-inn lungkhu lang tee zah Paul kha phe a hopya.
Oute Paul nynh rhawbawi lukheit kha ko zah, “Hynh-e ccangvaepaw taraw hynh rhawbawi lupi kalan la cciakhae, pawccecize amaw kha a hopya lanpaw uccaw a um,” a cipya.

Tukeiccu rhawbawipaw nynh kha-e ccangvaepaw kha rhawbawi lupi kalan cciakhae zah, “Thungccahpaw Paul nynh kae kha a kalan yn ko zah, nang na kalan ccangkheit hopya lanpaw a hoi paw e ccangvaepaw hynh na kalan beih la cciakhae cite yn naw,” a cipya.
Oute rhawbawi lupi nynh ccangvaepaw tuh a kuih te kyng zah a makhaete zya cciakhae zah, “Pawmou hopya lan nae ry paw tuh?” cite a khia.
Te aning nynh, “Nang nynh awkhualan Paul kha kungsi`ae kalan nae cciakhae ccaw cite, Jew`ae nynh Paul kha houh aria lan byakhia aho ung paw olante namaw kha ngia lan cite mih naw phe accah vae`ae.

Thuasalama nang nynh minmin kha ngaepah nan`ae; pawccecize Paul kha kae chia mawlaezung ae paw kae ae lan khyh zah tui kae neih lan khyh cite mimaw te mimaw thyalawkute byakankuh`ae paw Jew`ae sungpali lae nynh Paul kha phang a buih vae`ae; te na kyate byakinpyakupaw kha ngaw`ae zah atu paccynkute a um vae`ae,” a cipya.
Tukeiccu rhawbawi lupi nynh ccangvaepaw kha pousah zah, “Hynh-e uccaw nae hopya cipaw hynh hung ccungccaw sanmah la hopah nan vae lou,” cite byatawsya.

Te aning nynh rhawbawi`ae luning kha ko`ae zah, “Sisaria khua lang ccia lan rhawkaw zaning te marang ccikuhpaw sungsari te ccoi kyng`ae paw zaning kha atu awkhua suimilan ccangthungnaw kya pou lan paccyn oh.
Te Paul a cciku lanpaw saring kha khangpah oh lah ram uktu Felik kalan khyndadyhlan cciakhae oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Te aning nynh hynhcihte ccaw ccangkheit a zei:
“Klaudias Lysias nynh, ahoy huaccepaw ram uktu Felik, nang kha kae beihlang.

Hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh Jew`ae nynh kyng`ae zah chia lan vae cite he a nouku`ae lyakhe; aning tuh Rom ccungccapaw nynh thua cipaw kae nynh ka ny pawte, rhawkaw`ae ryte kae cceih zah amaw hynh kae luesah.
Te pawkeiccumou minmin nynh amaw hynh seibe`ae cipaw ka ny ry pawte, amaw hynh kungsi`ae kalan ka thuakhae.
Chi lan accanpaw seinaw, thungsaw lan accanpaw seinaw keiccu seibe`ae paw thua leite, mimaw kawbya te asekuhpaw byakhianaw`ae keiccu nynh seibe`ae cipaw kha ka ny.

Te Jew`ae nynh e paw hynh phang a buih`ae cipaw kha he oun hopah`ae tuh, na kalan palou kae ky zah amaw seibetu`ae kha mah paw kong nynh seibe`ae cipaw na malang a la ho ccaw`ae cite kaw kae pya`ae. Ngedan te,” cite ccaw a ky.
Oute rhawkaw`ae tuh kawpya athua hawte Paul kha thua`ae zah khuazi khe Antipatris khua lang a cciakhae`ae.
Awkhualan marang ccikuh paw ccungccaw`ae kha Paul ryte ccia lan cciataw`ae zah mimaw tuh rhawkaw-inn lang phe a ki`ae.
Te marang ccikuh`ae paw nynh Sisaria khua kya he thua`ae tuh ram uktu kalan ccaky kha a pya`ae; Paul kha mah a malang khe a ah`ae.
Te ram uktu nynh ccaky kha he a ria koute paw pee kya-e mou na thua cite Paul kha a khia. Te aning tuh Silisia pee kya-e paw cipaw he a nyh tuh,
“Nang sei ae betu`ae paw he oun thua`ae te na kong tuh ka thae cih,” a cipya. Te Paul kha Herod Byapianaw Khaan kya ngaw lan kawpya`ae.
Te nin pangaw acih koute ranpibawi lupi Ananias tuh piccang`ae ry, Tertullas cikuh paw byahothya paw ryte Sisaria khua lang a cceihbung`ae; minmin nynh Paul kha rawsete ram uktu kha a hopya`ae.

Te Paul kha he a ko`ae te Tertullas nynh tho zah hynhte seibe: “Aphu-e huapaw Felik, namaw liate nynh kaening tuh alepipaw daenaw kha kae mue zah malang elan na muih khonaw liate nynh hynh-e minphuin tuh kaethungnaw a um cipaw kha muihte, ahmin takyh kya balyn lungtuabya hote kha-e kha kae ccou.
Tuhzemah na hanlan ngaemyng phe um paw ka thua khyh nawlan adynnaw te kae ho cih paw bya hynh lungsaenaw te nae la ngaepya nawlan kae ngiaku.
Pawccecize Nazareth`ae beiknaw phu kya cciakhaetu lang tang zah laephipi ahmin takyh kya Jew`ae balyn kha phiakunaw rae lan a hytupaw hynh-e ccungccahoy leipaw hynh kaening nynh kae muih.
Aning tuh tempal thethyasah lan a zuakuhpaw nynh thua, te kaening nynh kae kyng zah kaemaw kawbya thyhhawte byapia lan kae ry.
Thuasalama rhawbawi lupi Lysias nynh rhawkaw`ae ryte oun thua`ae zah kae kuih kyate po cciakhaede zah,
amaw seibetu`ae kha na kalan ccia lan kaw oun pya; te amaw hynh akaw-aleih bya nae khia cih zah kaening nynh sei kae benawpaw balyn tuh namaw marya phe nae nyh kho cih,” a cipya.
Te Jew`ae nynh mah tuh-e bya`ae tuh thanccingpaw nynh thua cite nawccawkhae`ae.

Oute ram uktu nynh Paul kha bya ho lan kuih te syntawnaw a langsapah koute Paul nynh, “Nang tuh hynh-e minphuin kya kum patae cia byapiatu na thua paw ka ny pawte kamaw hanlan lungpaw thawmuinte ka hokuh ngan,
pawccemacize Pachia beik khylan Jerusalem lang ka cciathung paw hynh nin haw laening rou nynh aro ung cipaw phang na nyh mamin cih.

Tempal voidu lungkhu hung ccungccaw te sanmah kae eikupaw minmin nynh oun muih boi khyh`ae, sinakok kya thuasah, khua lungkhu thuasah ccungccaw`ae keisukeilae um lan mah ka hy`ae paw oun muih boi khyh`ae.
Atu minmin nynh kamaw sei oun be`ae paw mah ccaekia langsakuh kho lan khyh`ae.

Thuasalama minmin nynh ahme leipaw ccangpyakunaw a ci`ae paw Ccianaw thyhte kae paaw`ae Pachia kha kae nynh ka beik cipaw na malang vuan ka khanku. Kawbya kya azeikuh paw te Profeh`ae ccauh kya azeikuh paw balyn kha ka zyn.
Te adingpaw te ading leipaw paryh chinaw kyate thothuinaw a um vae cih cite minmin nynh a ngaehoi`ae hawte kae mah Pachia kya ngaehoinaw a hoi paw nynh ka thua.
Hynh-e keiccu, Pachia malang thuasah, ccungccaw`ae malang thuasah aluepaw cyiseinaw um leite mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung ka hoi kho nawlan thawte pei ka zuakuh.
“Kum patae aro koute, atu ka minphuin`ae kalan ryachi`ae bawngnawpaw te Pachia kalan hlupaw ccyng khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua.
Khahlya tempal voidu lungkhu kya ka ccikankupaw kha Asia ram kyate oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae abang nynh phe oun muih`ae, ccungccaw zapi um khyh, keisukeilae um paw mah um khyh.
Minmin nynh kamaw kya seibe lanpaw a um lanze na malang ccaccei oun be lan`ae paw nynh thua.

Tukhyhze, kae kungsi`ae malang ka thadyn lyakha, minmin laku ka thadyn zah, ‘A chih`ae paw thothuinaw konglang te nynh kae tuh atunin nanning nynh akaw-aleih bya nae khia oh paw athua,’ cite ka sia paw bya kawkheit laelan, ahoy leipaw ccangkhakheit ka cyipaw ka tungvaw a muih`ae lanze, atu hynh-e kya a um`ae paw nynh hotua`ae sah,” cite Paul nynh a ci.

Tuh-e bya`ae kha Felik nynh he a thae tuh, tuh-e Ccianaw kha houh a nyhthya paw athua thyhhawte, kha-e kha nungbia ung zah, “Rhawbawi lupi Lysias yn thua te nynh nae bya hynh kae pia ung cih oh,” a cipya`ae.
Te Paul kha ring khylan te luenaw pya khylan, te a ruiban`ae nynh ccangkhakheit cyipya lanpaw khyh ze a kalan paebua lanpaw kha a khee khyh nawlan rhawbawipaw kha kaw a pya.
Te nin sosoh aro koute, Felik tuh Jew nopinung athua paw a zu Drusilla ryte he oun thua`ae tuh Paul kha a kosah`ae, te Kri kya zynnaw konglang bya kha a ngae.

Te Paul nynh dingnaw kong, mawtemaw sungkunaw kong te yn thua vae cih paw byapianaw kong kha he a hopah`ae tuh Felik tuh rih zah, “Atu tuh la ki hin, accanthyapaw ccyh he kae mue te bua kae ko cih,” cite Paul kha a cipya.
Aning nynh yn luesah ccaw cite Paul nynh phua yn pya be mah cite a ngaehoi keiccuze Paul kha pei leih kosah`ae zah bya leih hokhae.
Thuasalama kum ning acih koute Porsias Festas nynh Felik ryalaw kha a mue; te Felik nynh Jew`ae lunghoynaw a rae ry pawte Paul kha thungsawsya.
Festas tuh tuh-e pee kalan he a thua te, nin thung acih koute Sisaria kyate Jerusalem lang a cceihthung.
Oute ranpibawi lupi te Jew`ae kyaze piccang lupi`ae nynh Paul kha rawsete bya hopya`ae.
Minmin nynh Paul kha laanpi kya buih lan zah chia lan cite a paccynku`ae keiccuze Jerusalem lang bua yn sawpya ccaw cite thohkhannaw a ngiaku`ae.
Thuasalama Festas nynh, “Paul tuh Sisaria kya nynh thunginn kya a um, te kamaw mah aro mawze tuhlang ka cceih vae cih.
Tukeiccu nanning lakuze a cceihbua khopaw nynh kamaw ryte cceihbua oh lah Paul kya seinaw a um lanze sei na be cih oh,” cite a khung`ae.
Te minmin ryte nin haw lae he a um koute Sisaria khua lang a cceihbung. Te awkhualan tuh byapianaw tungkhung vawlan dahung zah Paul kha oun cciakhae`ae sah cite kawpya`ae.
Te Paul he yn thua tuh Jerusalem kyate oun thua`ae paw Jew`ae nynh a pe khate koihlu`ae zah ccaekia a langsaku kho lei`ae paw, alepaw seinaw patae kha Paul tungvaw a khang`ae.
Paul nynh a hanlan khungkuh zah, “Kae tuh Jew`ae kawbya kya mah ka sei khyh, tempal voidu lungkhu kya mah ka sei khyh, Sizar siapharan kya mah ka sei khyh, pawpaw kya sanmah ka sei khyh,” a ci.
Thuasalama Festas nynh Jew`ae lunghoynaw a rae ry pawte, Paul kha, “Jerusalem lang cciathung lan zah tuin kya hynh-e`ae kong ka malang byapiaku lan na ry tou?” cite a khia.
Oute Paul nynh, “Kae tuh Sizar kya-e byapianaw tungkhung malang nynh ka thadyn, tuin kya nynh byapia lan mah ka ccan; namaw nynh hoyte phe na ny thyhhawte Jew`ae kya pawsang ka seinaw um khyh.

Kae tuh a seipaw ka thua ze, tukhyhze chi lan ccangpaw seinaw ka rae lanze, chi lan ka eikuh lan khyh; thuasalama hynh-e`ae nynh sei yn be`ae paw tuh kharyh akyh khyh lanze, hung nynh sanmah kae hynh minmin kalan yn ah kho khyh`ae. Sizar kalan azu ka khan,” a ci.
Oute Festas nynh kungsi`ae ryte phe a hokuh`ae koute, “Nang tuh Sizar kalan ii azu na khan? Sizar kalan sou na la cceih cih,” a cipya.
Te nin sosoh aro koute, Siapharan Akrippa te a zu Bernis tuh Festas kha beih khylan Sisaria khua lang oun thua`ae.
Te minmin tuh tuin kya khaw um`ae koute Festas nynh Paul konglang kha siapharan kalan hynhte a hopya: “Felik nynh thungsawsya paw ccungccapaw lukheit a um.
Kae Jerusalem kya ka um lya alepaw ranpibawi`ae te Jew piccang`ae nynh kha-e paw kong kha oun hopah`ae zah amaw kha rawsete byapia lan oun ngia`ae.

Kae nynh, ‘Seibe`ae paw ccungccaw tuh seibetu`ae ryte hawiliakute a tungku`ae maw, te a tungvaw seibe`ae paw konglang a hoku maw tuh hunghung zemah ronaw kalan ah thua lan khyh cite Rom`ae phung a um,’ cite ka khung`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin nynh hynhlang he oun thua`ae te aro lei lante, awkhualan kya kae tuh byapianaw tungkhung vawlan ka dahung zah tuh-e paw kha thuakhae lan kaw ka pya`ae.
Amaw kha rawsete seibetu`ae nynh thadyn`ae zah kae nynh ka tua paw seibenaw kha ccangkheit san thuakhae khyh`ae.
Thuasalama mimaw beiknaw kong te Jesu cikuh paw, tuh-e paw tuh chih zah bua a hiinthui cite Paul nynh a ho paw kong kha byaeikunaw`ae a hoi`ae.
Te tuh-e byaeikunaw kong kha kae nynh ka nythya khyh keiccuze, Jerusalem lang ccia lan zah hynh-e kong hynh byapiaku lan ry ngaw ta ry ngaw khyh ta cipaw Paul kha ka khia.
Thuasalama Aukastas nynh byapae ccaw cite Paul nynh azukhan keiccuze, Sizar kalan amaw kha ka ky mawlaezung balyn tuh thungsaw thuasah cite kaw ka pya`ae,” a cipya.
Oute Akrippa nynh Festas kha, “Kae kamaw mah tuh-e paw bya tuh thaebua lan ka ry,” a cipya. Felik nynh, “Awkhualan na thae cih,” a cipya.

Te awkhualan Akrippa te Bernis tuh lyccaccu lante oun thua`ae zah rhawbawi lupi`ae ry, khua kya-e minthaanpaw ccungccaw`ae ryte Byapianaw Khaan lungkhu lang tee`ae zah Festas kaw te Paul kha oun teekhae`ae.

Te Festas nynh, “Siapharanpaw Akrippa te e kya kaening ry na um oh paw ccungccaw`ae balyn, hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh na muih oh, Jerusalem kya thuasah, e khua kya thuasah Jew`ae zapi balyn nynh hynh-e paw kong kamaw hynh thawte oun ngia`ae zah aning tuh hiin lan kharyh ngaekuh khyh cite a sia`ae.
Thuasalama kae nynh chi lan accanpaw seinaw a cyi paw kharyh um khyh cipaw he ka muih tuh amaw ccaccei nynh mah Aukastas kalan azu a khan pawte a kalan ky lan bya ka pae.

Kha-e paw konglang phe riapaw kae nynh ka bawipaw kalan ka zei lanpaw um khyh. Tukeiccu nynh amaw hynh nanning malang kae poukhae, abapi lante Siapharanpaw Akrippa nang na malang, akaw-aleih bya phe na khia oh koute kae nynh zei lanpaw ka hoi ccaw cite nynh kae poukhae.
Pawccecize thungccahpaw lukheit kha rawsete seibe`ae paw langsapya leite saw lanpaw tuh angaekuh cite ka tua khyh,” a ci.
Oute Akrippa nynh Paul kha, “Namaw hanlan na hokuh kho vae,” a cipya. Oute Paul nynh a kuih kha dyng zah a hanlan hynhte a hoku:
“Siapharanpaw Akrippa, Jew ccungccaw`ae nynh kae sei oun be`ae paw kong balynte asekuh lante atunin na malang kamaw hanlan hoku khonaw ka mue vae cih keiccu ka vehoy cite ka tuaku.
Abapi lante nang tuh Jew`ae phung te Jew`ae byakhianaw te asekuhpaw balyn kya myarya na thya cipaw ka ny keiccu ka vehoy cite ka tuaku. Tukeiccu lungsaete nae la ngaepya nawlan kae ngiaku.
“Atakaw lya mawte ka minphuin`ae laku Jerusalem kya ka um zah ka ngawphue lyate ka hiinnaw ozia kha Jew`ae balyn nynh pung a ny`ae paw nynh thua.
Kae beiknaw kyaze kae tuh asi-asah aru huapaw phu Farasi lukheit ka thua paw kha minmin nynh ccaekiakhanry`ae ze atakaw lya mawte phe oun ny`ae paw nynh thua.
Te kae minpaaw`ae kalan Pachia nynh a rae paw byakinpyakupaw ngaehoinaw keiccu nynh atu kae tuh ka thadyn zah bya oun pia`ae paw athua.

Tuh-e byakinpyakupaw kha mue lan cite ngaehoi`ae zah kae minphuin phin haw laening nynh Pachia rya kha khuazi khuadae a law`ae. Siapharanpaw Akrippa, tuh-e ngaehoinaw kong keiccu nynh kae tuh Jew`ae nynh sei oun be`ae.
Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kha a thosah cipaw tuh pawccemou nanning nynh zyn kho um leipaw lante na tua oh?
“Nazarethpaw Jesu min te arawsekuh lante uccaw patae ka cyi aho cite kae mah ka la tuaku ccaccing.

Tuh-e kha Jerusalem kya ka la cyi, te alepaw ranpibawi`ae kyate kawhoinaw kha ka mue zah mithyaa`ae patae kha thunginn kya ka saw`ae; te minmin kha he a chia vae`ae ze minmin kha rawsete ka nawccahbua.

Pachia alue lante bya ho ccaw`ae cite minmin kha ka suase`ae zah sinakok takyh kyakhe minmin kha pei de ka tah`ae; te minmin tungvaw myarya ka thinria zah ramccangpaw khua`ae kyacia minmin kha ka tua ka sah`ae.
“Tuhte alepaw ranpibawi`ae kyate kawhoinaw te kawpyanaw ryte Damaskas khua lang he ka cceih tuh,
Pou siapharanpaw, ninthuccyng lya laanpi kyakhe vaawran kyate awnaw kha ka muih, tuh-e tuh khuanin a awpaw laeze awhua zah kae, te kae cceihkheih`ae paw kae pepan kya phaephae a aw.

Te kae balynte laephi kalan he kae khuliakuh tuh kamaw kalan a hopaw roi ccangkheit ka thae zah Hebru bya te, ‘Saul, Saul, pawccemou nang nynh kamaw hynh nae tua nae sah? Ccungzuing sy lanpaw tuh na hanlan arupaw nynh thua,’ cite yn hopya.
Te kae nynh, ‘Bawipaw, nang tuh hungmou?’ ka ci. Te aning nynh, ‘Kae tuh nang nynh na tua na sah paw Jesu nynh ka thua.

Thuasalama thokuh lah na ccu te thadyn tua; pawccecize nang kha ka ryalahtu lang rae khylan, te na muih paw hynh-e uccaw`ae kong te na kalan kae langsakuh cih paw uccaw`ae kong ccaekiakhantu lang rae khylan nynh kae tuh na kalan kae langku.
Nang kha Jew ccungccaw`ae kyate thuasah, Zenta`ae kyate thuasah kae luesah cih, minmin kalan atu nang kha kae saw;

mih mit awsah khylan, mohnaw kyate awnaw kalan paleihsaku khylan, Setan kawhoinaw kyate Pachia kalan paleihsaku khylan, mih seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw a muebua nawlan`ae, te kamaw kya zynnaw liate thyaasah athua`ae paw laku rho uccaw a muebua nawlan`ae nang kha kae saw,’ yn cipya.
“Tukeiccu Siapharanpaw Akrippa, vaawran kyate yn thua paw tuh-e vizin kya kae tuh kawngae leipaw ka thua khyh.

Thuasalama Damaskas kya um`ae paw kalan masaty ka ho, te Jerusalem kya, oute Judah pee kya balyn, te Zenta`ae kalan balyn, minmin nynh a ngaesiku nawlan`ae te Pachia kalan paleihku khylan, ngaesikunaw te angaekuhpaw ryalaw law khylan ka hopya`ae.
Hynh-e`ae konglang keiccuze Jew`ae nynh kamaw kha tempal voidu kya oun kyng`ae zah chia lan oun nounuaku`ae.

Tuhzemah Pachia kyate bawngnaw ka mue keiccu nynh atu nin cia ka hiinbua ung. Kri tuh a teing cih cite, aning tuh a chih`ae paw kyate masaty a tho paw athua cih cite, te Jew ccungccaw`ae kalan te Zenta`ae kalan awnaw bya kha a thaesah cih`ae cite profeh`ae te Mawsi nynh oun cyikuh lanpaw a ho`ae paw laelan ccangpaw kha ho leite, adihpaw te alepaw ccungccaw`ae kalan ccaekiakhante ka um,” a ci.
Tuhte Paul nynh amaw hanlan bya he a hokuh tuh, Festas nynh roi accae lante, “Paul, nang tuh na lungccing vae khyh. Patae na ccangkupaw nynh phe ae ngaesah vae!” a cipya.
Thuasalama Paul nynh, “Aphu-e huapaw Festas, kae tuh ka ngae khyh lahyn; thuasalama byaccing bya te lungkyhpaw bya`ae nynh ka ho.

Pawccecize siapharanpaw nynh hynh-e`ae hynh phe a ny paw nynh thua, amaw malang khe kae nynh rawhoy te ka ho; pawccecize hynh-e uccaw tuh akin-akae kya cyi paw thua khyh keiccu hynh-e`ae tuh aning nynh a ny leipaw um khyh cipaw phe ka ny.
Siapharanpaw Akrippa, profeh`ae bya kha na zyn tou? Na zyn cipaw ka ny,” a ci.
Te Akrippa nynh Paul kha, “Kriccaw thua lan vyathy nae zynsah,” a cipya.

Te Paul nynh, “Hynh-e sivarui`ae holeite, nang kyalya thua leite atunin ka bya a thae`ae paw balyn mah kamaw hawte vyathy kyalya thua leite kamaw hawte phe na thua ccaccing nawlan oh Pachia kalan saw ka sang,” a cipya.
Te tuhte he a ho koute siapharanpaw, ram uktupaw te Bernis, te minmin ryte a dahungkheih`ae paw tuh thokuh`ae zah,
ccanglang he a pou`ae te, “Hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh chi lan accanpaw, tukhyhze thungccaw lan accanpaw pawsang a cyi paw um khyh,” cite mimaw te mimaw laku a hokuh`ae.
Oute Akrippa nynh Festas kha, “Hynh-e ccungccapaw hynh Sizar kalan azukhan khyh lanze phe luesah lanpaw,” cite a hopya.
Oute kaening tuh Itali ram lang sanphalung te ccia lan cite bya he pae`ae tuh, minmin nynh Paul te ccangpaw thungccah`ae kha Aukastas rhawkawphu kyaze rhawbawipaw, Julias kalan khe a ah`ae.
Te Adramyttium sanphalung lungkhu lang kae tee zah Asia ram rili kin lang po ccia lan vae cite eenaw te kae thokuh. Mesidoniapaw, Thesalonika khua-e paw Aristarkhas tuh kaening ryte a cceihbua.
Te awkhualan tuh Sidon khua kya kae thua. Te Julias nynh Paul kha thawccih zah a ban`ae kalan ccia lan te minmin dooihnaw mue lan luenaw a pya.
Te tuin kyate he kae thokuh tuh khivae nynh arawsekuh lante azaw keiccuze Saiparas tuikoih rekunaw kalan kae cceih.
Te Silisia ram te Pamfilia ram e rili vawlan po kae cceih zah Lysia ram e Myra khua kya kae thua.
Te tuin kya rhawbawipaw nynh Itali ram lang yn cceih paw Alexandria sanphalung kha muih zah tuh-e kya kaening kha oun teesah.
Te byabyate nin patae he kae cceih tuh vawsawte Kanidas khua pe kae thua, khivae nynh po ccia lanpaw oun ua khyh pawte, Salmone khua te arawsekuhpaw Krete tuikoih rekunaw kalan kae cceih.
Kha-e kha vawsawte kae lue koute, Lasia khuapi pe, ‘Puithya Hae-ungnaw’ cikuh paw ahmin kya kae thua.
Ccyh khaw he aro te, Looh-aesung nin tuh phe athang vae keiccuze atu sanphalung te khuaccungpaw tuh ri lan um paw athua pawte, Paul nynh ccungccaw`ae kha tuanaw pya`ae zah,
“Ccungccaw`ae, atu e khuaccungpaw tuh sanphalung te uccaw`ae kyalya thua leite, ah hiinnaw mah shungnaw te ronaw pipi oun tung vae cih oh cipaw ka ny,” a cipya`ae.
Tuhzemah rhawbawipaw nynh Paul bya laeze sanphalung a mungtu te a hoitu bya kha a zynhua.

Te tuh-e sanphalung hae-ungnaw tuh khoccihsaw hanlan accanthya khyh keiccu, Finisia lang phya kho ze phya lan, tuin kya khoccihsaw um lan cite ccungccaw alunghua nynh bua ccia lan tuanaw pya`ae. Finisia tuh Krete tuikoih kya um paw sanphalung hae-ungnaw thua zah niccaw-deilang te niccawthalang nynh a hawi.
Te deilang e khivae nynh byabyate he yn zaw tuh mih eenaw phe kae mue vae cite tuakuh`ae zah, sanphalung kha supah`ae zah Krete tuikoih pe lang a cciasah`ae.
Thuasalama khaw aro mawze Euroklydon cikuh paw myarya rupaw khise yn tho zah sanphalung kha yn mung vae.
Te sanphalung nynh khivae kha taening kho vae khyh zah khivae nynh po he a cciakhae tuh kaening mah khivae zawnaw lang yn mungbia vae.
Te Klauda cikuh paw tuikoih taraw pe a ccue lya, kohlung taraw kha myarya thawbang te kae khynsah.

Kohlung kha sanphalung kalan a khang`ae koute liarue`ae kha mang`ae zah sanphalung kha a khiide`ae; te Syrtis tuideinaw kya yn khangkuh sei cih cite a ri`ae pawte sanphalung boeidaw kha khah`ae zah khivae nynh hung mungbia vae.
Khise nynh myarya oun hebia pawte awkhualan tuh sanphalung kya-e phupaw`ae kha a vuabang`ae.
Te nin thungnaw kya sanphalung uccaw`ae kha kae kuih te kae vua vae.
Te nin khaw cia khuanin te awsi`ae langkuh vae khyh`ae zah khise zawpaw po aru ung keiccu kae lue cih cite kae ngaehoi paw balyn tuh phya azo vae.

Thuasalama aepaw ae leite khaw kae um koute, Paul nynh minmin ngaelung te thadyn zah, “Ccungccaw`ae, nanning nynh ka bya kha na la ngae oh zah Krete kyate ah ccia khyh oh ze hynh-e sungnaw te ronaw pipi kyate phe ah lue cih oh paw.
Te atu zemah lungngaengante um oh; pawccecize sanphalung holeite hung ccungccaw sanmah a hiinnaw a shung paw um lan khyh.
Pawccemacize kamaw yn hoitupaw te kae nynh ka beik paw Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw nynh atu khuazi kya ka pe yn thadyn zah,
‘Paul, rih nan, nang tuh Sizar malang thuakhae na thua cih. Te dotua, nang ryte sanphalung kya na cceihkheih oh paw balyn kha Pachia nynh phe ae pya vae,’ cite yn hopya.
Tukeiccu, ccungccaw`ae ngaengante um oh; pawccecize kae yn hopya thyhhawte yn cyikuh cih cite Pachia kha ka zyn.
Tuhzemah tuikoih ccangkhakheit vawlan aening kha oun lae mamin cih,” cite a hopya`ae.
Thuasalama zi haw laepali he cih tuh kaening kha Adria rili kya oun khiakhaekuh bungthung lya, ziraccyng loukaw khe, laerou kalan kae naekuh vae cite sanphalung ryalahtu`ae nynh a tua`ae.
Tui kha he a toutua`ae tuh lang kuin akhupaw kha a muih`ae; te rakyh asawnaw lang he a cceih`ae te bua toutua`ae zah lang haw laepangaw akhupaw kha a muih`ae.
Oute lungpi kha phe kae diasei cih cite rih`ae zah sanphalung nuhlang te sivawhinpi ccangpali kha tui lungkhu lang a saw`ae, te khuadae ccaw vae cite sawsang`ae.
Te sanphalung ryalahtu`ae nynh sanphalung kyate zya ccue lan noukuh`ae zah kohlung kha rili lungkhu lang he sahbung`ae tuh, sanphalung malang te sivawhinpi`ae a sah`ae paw olante a umsaku`ae.
Paul nynh rhawbawipaw te rhawkaw`ae kha, “Hynh-e sanphalung ryalahtu`ae nynh sanphalung kya a um khyh`ae ze, nanning na lue kho lan khyh oh,” cite a hopya`ae.
Oute rhawkaw`ae nynh kohlung rui`ae kha phya bae`ae zah phe a ccawsah`ae.

Te khua vyavya yn dae tuh, Paul nynh ccungccaw`ae balyn kha looh ae lan thawte hopah`ae zah, “Nanning nynh phang na ngaw oh zah aepaw leite, pawsang ae leite na um oh paw atunin nin haw laepalinaw nynh thua vae.
Tukeiccu aepaw ae ccavae oh cite kae ngia oh, pawccecize aepaw tuh nae ngedannaw hanlan nynh thua; pawccecize nanning laku hung sanmah a sangrua ccangkheit khuakuh lan khyh,” a cipya`ae.
Tuhte he a ho koute Paul nynh sanlou kha lawkuh zah minmin balyn malang khe Pachia kalan lungtuabya hote sanlou kha eih zah a ae vae.
Oute minmin balyn mah mih lungngaengan zah looh a ae bua vae`ae.
Tuh-e sanphalung kya a um`ae paw kae balynte zaning sungsari lu taruh kae cih.
Te minmin nynh phe byn lan a ae`ae koute chanvuiphaw kha rili lungkhu lang vua`ae zah sanphalung kha phupaw a zawsah pya`ae.

Te khua he yn dae tuh kha-e lorang kha nyh khyh`ae; thuasalama akouleihnaw sang kheit kya sanphalung umnaw a um paw kha a muih`ae, athua kho ze tuhlang khe sanphalung kha cciasah lan cite a paccynku`ae.
Te sivawhinpi`ae kha supah`ae zah rili kyakhe a cciataw`ae, te zawnawpaw khiidenawpaw liarue`ae kha phou`ae zah malang e boeidaw kha a dawpya`ae, oute varan langkhe khivae a mungsah bia`ae.

Te rili sanning te atungkunaw hmin kya mangthua`ae tuh minmin nynh sanphalung kha varan lang a khangsakuh`ae, te sanphalung malang tuh varan lang kha mohdia zah phang abingkuh tuh nuekuh kho vae khyh; thuasalama anuhlang tuh rili tuileih eih aru keiccuze phe a khya.
Te thungccah`ae nynh tui oun zeih cih`ae zah oun lue cih`ae cite mih thinphang paw te rhawkaw`ae nynh thungccah`ae kha chia lan cite a paccynku`ae.
Thuasalama rhawbawipaw nynh Paul kha a luesah ry pawte minmin paccynkunaw kha khee zah tuizeih khopaw nynh masaty toikuh`ae sah lah varan lang zua`ae sah;
te tuhlaepaw nynh thingphe`ae te sanphalung akhyanahpaw thing`ae te zua`ae sah cite kaw a pya`ae. Ou tuhte minmin balyn tuh khyndadyhlan laerou kalan pung a zua`ae.
Tuhte he a zua`ae te tuh-e tuikoih tuh Malta tuikoih nynh thua cipaw minmin nynh a ny`ae.
Te tuin kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh kaening kha thawccinaw alepi oun langsapya`ae; pawccecize tuhlya khuarah zah eih akyaa keiccuze maee oun tuapah`ae zah kaening balyn kha oun thuasah`ae.
Te Paul nynh ccungparei`ae ccekheit khui zah maee vawlan he a phungbia tuh maee aso keiccuze fupaw sakheit yn pou zah Paul kuih kya phang vekuh.

Te tuin kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh Paul kuih kya fupaw phang vekuh paw kha he a muih`ae tuh; “E ccungccapaw tuh ccungccaw theihtupaw nynh athua mamin cih, rili kyate a lue zemah hiin khylan Dingnaw nynh ua vae khyh,” cite mimaw te mimaw a hokuh`ae.
Tuhzemah Paul nynh fupaw kha maee lungkhu lang valah he zah ccapyh sanmah vaemaw mue khyh.

Tuhzemah aning tuh pung yn phin vae cih, tukhyhze vaekheihmawte yn khuliakuh cih zah phe yn chih cih cite minmin nynh phang a do`ae. Thuasalama khaw cia do`ae zah Paul tuh pawtua um khyh paw kha a muih`ae tuh mih lung paleih`ae zah, “Aning tuh khozipachia nynh thua,” a ci`ae.
Tuh-e lorang kya Publias acikuh paw, tuikoih kya khuabawi paw laephi a um; tuh-e khuabawi paw nynh kaening kha oun thuasah zah nin thung cia hoyte oun dooih.
Ou tuhlya, Publias a paaw tuh ngelingpaw te chii te toikupaw te a la ikhaekuh. Te Paul nynh a kalan tee zah a tungvaw a kuih khangte sawsangpah zah phe a dan.
Hynh-e he acyihkuh koute, tuh-e tuikoih kyaze ccinaw hoi`ae paw mingccang`ae mah oun thua`ae zah phe a dan`ae.
Tuh-e`ae nynh kaening kha sawtuanaw patae oun pya`ae, te kaening he kae thokuh tuh kae hanlan ahoboupaw miakaw kha oun phusaku`ae.
Te sawpaw sathung acih koute, kha-e tuikoih kyakhe khoccihsaw phe a thangsah paw, Apheipaw Uno`ae pungsan akepaw Alexandria sanphalung khate kaening tuh bua kae thokuh.
Te Sirakus khua kya kae thua zah tuin kya nin thung kae um.
Te tuin kyate po kae ve zah Rezium khua kya kae thua; nin kheit kae um koute deilang e khivae yn zaw zah nin ningnaw kya Puteoli khua kya kae thua.
Tuin kya uteno`ae kha kae muih`ae zah minmin nynh nin sari um lan oun ngia`ae thyhte kae um. Tuhkoute Rom khuapi lang kae cceih.

Te Rom khua e uteno`ae nynh kaening the kha he a thae`ae tuh kaening kha cciadue khylan Appias Kungkunaw khua te Balah-inn Innthung khua phe thua lang cia oun cceih`ae. Te Paul nynh minmin kha he a muih`ae tuh Pachia kha thehoysah zah a thawmuin.
Te Rom khuapi kya he kae thua tuh rhawbawipaw nynh thungccah`ae kha a ngawtupaw lupipaw kalan a ah`ae, thuasalama Paul tuh a makhaete amaw a ngawtupaw rhawkapaw ryte um lan a ua.

Ou tuhte nin thung acih koute Paul nynh Jew`ae piccang`ae kha pynkheihlan a ko`ae. Te minmin nynh pynkheihlan he oun thua`ae te, Paul nynh minmin kha, “Uteno`ae, ah ccungccaw te arawsekuh lante thuasah, ah paaw`ae phung te arawsekuh lante thuasah pawsang ka cyi paw a um lei pite nynh thung oun sah`ae zah Jerusalem kyate Rom ccungccaw`ae kuih kalan oun ah`ae.
Rom ccungccaw`ae nynh kamaw kha akaw-aleih bya he oun khia`ae tuh luesah oun ry`ae; pawccecize kamaw kya chinaw aphah paw seinaw um khyh.
Thuasalama Jew`ae nynh kha-e kha he a ei`ae tuh Sizar kalan azukhan lan ka umkhaekuh kho vae khyh, tuh-e tuh ka minphuin`ae kha seibe lanpaw ccangkhakheit ka hoi cipaw thua khyh.
Hynh-e keiccu nynh nanning kha kae ko oh, nanning muih khylan te nanning ryte byahoku khylan nynh kae ko oh; Israel`ae ngaehoinaw keiccu nynh kae tuh hynh-e sivarui te oun khii`ae,” a ci.
Te minmin nynh, “Nang te asekuh lante Judah ram kyate ccaw`ae kae mue khyh, oun thua`ae paw uno`ae hung nynh sanmah na thethya a phy paw, a ho paw mah um khyh.
Thuasalama na tua paw kha paw nynh thua cipaw thaetua kae ry; pawccecize hynh-e beiknaw tuh ahmin takyh kya a rawse`ae paw beiknaw nynh thua cipaw kae ny,” cite a khung`ae.

Te minmin nynh nin kheit kha khyapah`ae zah Paul a ryanaw kalan ccungccaw patae oun thua`ae. Paul nynh minmin kha Pachia peenaw kong ccaekiakhanpya`ae, Jesu konglang minmin kha zynsah khylan Mawsi Kawbya kya-e te Profeh`ae bya kha awkhua te zete cia a hopya`ae.
Te abang nynh kha-e bya a hopaw kha zyn`ae zah abang tuh zyn khyh`ae.

Tuhte mimaw te mimaw laku mih lung he lokuh khyh tuh phe a pou`ae; tuhlya Paul nynh bya kawkheit a hopya`ae paw tuh: “Thyaa Muisaw nynh ah minpaaw`ae kalan profeh Isaiah kyate hmerarihlan a hopaw tuh:
‘Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae kalan khe cceih lah, “Nanning nynh thae paw tuh mang na thae cih oh zah na thaethya lan khyh oh; muihpaw tuh mang na muih cih oh zah na nyhthya lan khyh oh.

Pawccecize hynh-e ccungccaw`ae thinlung tuh marae moh, mih nakaring tuh karae rua zah mih mit phe masi`ae; tuhkhyh lanze mih mit te ngawmuih cih`ae zah mih nakaring te a thae cih`ae. Te mih thinlung te a thaethya cih`ae, te phe rulaekuh cih`ae zah kae nynh phe ka dansah cih`ae paw,” cite hopah`ae,’ a ci.
“Tukeiccuze Pachia kya-e khumnaw tuh Zenta`ae kalan ky phe thua vae zah minmin nynh a thae vae cih`ae cipaw hynh nanning nyh ccavae oh!” cite Paul nynh a ci.
Te hynh-e bya`ae kha he a ho koute, Jew`ae tuh pou`ae zah mimaw te mimaw laku thawte eikunaw a hoi`ae.
Te Paul tuh amaw nynh a hohkupaw inn kya kum ning phe ccing lang um zah amaw kalan oun thua`ae paw balyn kha a thuasah`ae.
A kheetu um leite, rawhoy te Pachia peenaw kha hopyate, Bawipaw Jesu Kri kong kha ccangpyate nynh a um.
Locceihtu cite ko athua paw, Jesu Kri seepaw, Paul tuh Pachia thehoypaw hanlan thoh phia athua.
Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh athyaapaw Ccathyaa`ae kya amaw profeh`ae liate langmawpi te bya phe la kinty vae`ae.
Tuh-e tuh pynsaw lante David ciihan lang rae athua paw, aening ah Bawipaw, Pachia Ccapaw Jesu Kri konglang nynh athua.
Te a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw liate, thyaanaw kya-e Muisaw lante, thungnaw ryte aning tuh Pachia Ccapaw cite phy athua.
Minphuin`ae balyn laku zynnaw kalan kawngaenaw hanlan te Jesu a min hanlan, amaw liate kaening tuh thawccinaw te locceihtuthuanaw kha kae mue.
Tuh-e`ae laku nanning mah Jesu Kri kya-e kopaw nynh na thuabua oh.
Pachia nynh sungsah`ae paw, mithyaa`ae cite ko na thua oh paw, Rom khuapi kya na um oh paw balyn kalan ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um vae sah.
Nanning nae zynnaw tuh laephipi khaleih po athaan keiccuze nanning balyn hanlan Jesu Kri liate ka Pachia kalan masaty lungtuabya ka ho.
Pawccecize ka sawsangnaw kya nanning kha apaekuh lei lante pei kae lia oh cipaw tuh a Ccapaw kya-e thehoypaw honaw kya ka muisaw te rya ka lawpyapaw Pachia tuh ka ccaekia nynh thua.
Atu eih aro maw Pachia rynaw liate yn ccangthya ze nanning kalan thua kho nawlan, khuaccungnaw ka hoi kho nawlan saw ka sangkuh.
Pawccecize nanning nynh varyn na tyn nawlan oh, muisaw lasung abang kha nanning kae neethung ccaw oh cite nanning kha myarya kae muihry oh.
Tuh-e tuh nanning kya-e zynnaw te kae ka kya-e zynnaw paryh liate nanning ryte pynkheihlan ka ngaengan bua ccaw cipaw nynh thua.

Uteno`ae, kae nynh ccangpaw Zenta`ae kyate athae abang ka mue hawte; nanning kyate mah athae abang ka mue ccaw cite nanning kalan ccia lan pei ka noukuh paw hynh nanning ny leite na um lan oh paw ka ry khyh, thuasalama atu cia yn khaw paw pei a um.
Kae tuh Greek`ae kalan te apuathopaw ccungccaw`ae kalan, ahawpaw kalan, te angaeepaw kalan paryh laeba umtu nynh ka thua.
Tukeiccu, kae ka kya a um thyhte, Rom khuapi kya na um oh paw nanning kalan mah thehoypaw hopya lan kae tuh paccynkute ka um.

Pawccecize kae tuh Kri kya-e thehoypaw hanlan ka maethah khyh; pawccecize hynh-e tuh Jew`ae hanlan masaty, te Greek`ae hanlan mah, a zyn paw ccungccaw miakaw hanlan khumnaw mue nawlan Pachia kya-e thungnaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize, “Adingpaw ccungccaw tuh zynnaw liate nynh a hiin cih,” cite azeiku hawte, tuh-e zynnaw kya nynh Pachia kya-e dingnaw tuh zynnaw kyate zynnaw kalan langsapya athua vae.
Pawccecize byaccing kha dingleinaw kya a ccyngkuh paw ccungccaw`ae kya-e dingleinaw te Pachia pawlangria leinaw balyn kha rawsete Pachia thinrianaw tuh vaawran kyate yn langkuh.
Pawkeiccumacize ny lan accanpaw Pachia konglang tuh minmin kyakhe phe langsah athua vae, pawccecize Pachia nynh kha-e kha minmin kalan phe a langsapya vae`ae.

Pawccecize, a rae paw uccaw`ae liate Pachia kya-e zungzae thungnaw te Pachiathuanaw athua paw, muih kho leipaw Pachia uccaw`ae kha laephipi raenaw kyate tho zah ccaerarihlan muih thua vae zah thaethya phe athua vae, tukeiccuze minmin tuh ngaethya kho thua lan khyh`ae.

Pawkeiccumacize, minmin nynh Pachia phang nyh`ae pite, Pachia kha phu-esah lan accan thyhte phu-esah khyh`ae; Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho khyh`ae, thuasalama accakaepaw tuanaw kha hoi`ae zah angaeepaw mih thinlung tuh phe amoh.
Mimaw te mimaw kha hawsakuh`ae zah mingaee`ae lang nynh a tang`ae,
te arohthya leipaw Pachia kya-e phu-enaw kha arohthyapaw ccungccaw muinsan lang, pavaw`ae te ccupali sae paw lorangsaw`ae te avawpaw lorangsaw`ae muinsan lang minmin nynh a rulae`ae.
Tukeiccu Pachia nynh mah minmin kha mimaw te mimaw kya mih pyn kha thethyasah khylan mih thinlung kya-e duanaw thyhte athyaa leipaw kalan minmin kha phe a ah`ae.
Minmin tuh Pachia kya-e byaccing kha hyngbya lang phe a rulae`ae paw te Raetu Pachia laeze rae paw uccaw kha a beik`ae paw nynh athua`ae. Tuh-e Raetu Bawipaw tuh zungzae thehoysah athua. Amen.

Hynh-e keiccu Pachia nynh minmin kha maethyaziachi lan um paw ryduanaw kalan phe a ah`ae, pawccecize mih nopi`ae ccaccei nynh mah aphungpaw te arawsekuh lante aphung thua leite mih kya-e kha a mang`ae.

Te tuhhawte pise`ae nynh mah nopi kya-e mang paw aphungpaw kha cciatawte, lukheit te lukheit kalan ryduanaw maee rua zah pise te pise nynh maethya lan ung paw rya kha a law`ae; te mimaw mih cciaseinaw thyhte seidetahnaw kha a mue`ae.
Te minmin nynh Pachia maw kharyh a ny ry khyh`ae keiccu, angaekuh leipaw uccaw`ae cyi khylan Pachia nynh minmin kha duarynawpaw thinlung kalan a ah`ae thyhte; minmin tuh,
dingleinaw, ohhuakunaw, hoyleinaw, karangkunaw, othyanaw, eiungnaw, ccungccaw chianaw, eikunaw, lingkunaw, ming`ae do ry leinaw, thethyahonaw tuh-e`ae balynte phe beih`ae zah,
ccungccaw thanho`ae paw, Pachia a huatu`ae, ccungccaw pawlangria lei`ae paw, a tansakuh`ae paw, a pookuh`ae paw, ahoy leipaw uccaw raetu`ae, nungpaaw kawngae lei`ae,
thaethyanaw hoi lei`ae paw, kawbya rohtu`ae paw, aphungpaw thyhte sungsanaw hoi lei`ae paw, lung-umtungpah`ae paw, ngaethya-umsanaw hoi lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Hynhtahawpaw uccaw`ae a cyih`ae paw tuh chi lan accan`ae cipaw Pachia byapianaw kha phang a nyh`ae pite khahtahawpaw kha a cyi`ae apiaze, khahtahawpaw a cyih`ae paw tungvaw kya mih lungrythua.

Tukeiccu ming`ae byapiatupaw, pou ccungccapaw, nang tuh hung ccungccaw na thua zemah ngaethya kho na thua lan khyh; pawccecize nang nynh bya na pianua paw uccaw ccacceimaw kha namaw nynh bua na cyibua keiccu, ming`ae bya na pianaw`ae kya namaw te namaw sei na bekuhpaw nynh na thua.
Thuasalama Pachia byapianaw tuh byaccing thyhte khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae a rae`ae paw te arawsekuh cipaw kaening nynh phe kae ny ccaccing.
Te khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae a cyih`ae paw kha bya na pia zah kha-e ccaccei bua a cyih bua paw, pou ccungccapaw, nang tuh Pachia byapianaw kyate ka lue cih cite tou na tuaku?
Tukhyhze Pachia a hoynawpaw nynh nang kha ngaesikunaw kalan ae cciakhae cipaw ny leite, a hoynawpaw te a ngaesangnaw, te a lungsaenaw`ae kha nang nynh pawlangria leite tou na ung?
Thuasalama na lungkhungnaw te ngaesiku ry leinaw thinlung keiccu, Pachia kya-e adingpaw byapianaw langsapyaku nin, thinrianaw nin kya namaw hanlan thinrianaw kha na ccyku.
Pachia nynh ccungccaw miakaw kha a cyisahnaw thyhte cyinaw mee kha a pya cih.
Ahoypaw ryalaw kha pei lah zah phu-enaw, sawtuanaw te chi kho leinaw a ccung`ae paw tuh zungzae hiinnaw kha a pya cih`ae.
Thuasalama eikumang`ae zah byaccing kawngae leite ding leinaw kawngae`ae paw tuh bungpawnaw te thinrianaw kha a tung cih`ae.
Masaty Jew`ae, ou tuhkoute Greek`ae mah hoyleinaw a cyih paw ccungccaw miakaw tungvaw kya tuh runaw te vawsaw riathaenaw kha a tung cih`ae.
Thuasalama masaty Jew`ae, ou tuhkoute Greek`ae mah ahoypaw ryalah paw ccungccaw miakaw kha phu-enaw, sawtuanaw te daenaw kha a pya cih`ae.
Pawccecize Pachia kya ccungccaw laesahnaw cipaw um khyh.
Pawccecize Kawbya leite a sei`ae paw miakaw tuh Kawbya leite a roh cih`ae; te Kawbya kya a sei`ae paw miakaw mah Kawbya liate byapia athua cih`ae.
Pawccecize Kawbya a thae`ae paw hynh Pachia malang a ding`ae paw thua khyh, thuasalama Kawbya a zui`ae paw kha nynh thyaaccousah athua cih`ae.
Pawccecize Kawbya hoi lei`ae paw Zenta`ae nynh Kawbya hoi lei`ae pite Kawbya kya um paw uccaw`ae kha aphung lante a zui`ae tuh kha-e kha mih hanlan kawbya lang oun tang.

Tuh-e nynh mih thinlung kya azeikuh paw Kawbya ryalawnaw kha a langsaku, mimaw nykunaw thinlung nynh mah ccaekiakhan zah mih tuanaw nynh mah lukheit te lukheit kha seibekuh`ae, tukhyhze athungkhawku`ae.
Kae nynh ka hopaw thehoypaw thyhte Pachia nynh Jesu Kri liate ccungccaw`ae kya-e aphiru cyisahnaw`ae kha bya yn pia cih nin kya tuhte byapia cih.
Dotua, nang tuh Jew paw cite ko na thua zah Kawbya kya na doliakuh paw te Pachia kya na pookuh paw nynh na thua.
Pachia rynaw kha na nyh zah Kawbya te thuihei na thua thyhte phe ahoytheih paw uccaw`ae kha na phiathya,
te nang tuh mitmoh`ae kha laanpi cciakhaetu, te mohnaw kya um`ae paw kha awnaw muihsatu nynh ka thua.
Te mingaee`ae kha a thuiheitu, imua`ae kha a ccangpatu, Kawbya kya um paw byaccing te nynaw a hoi paw nynh ka thua cite na zynku lanze,
tukeiccu mingccang`ae a ccangpatupaw nang, pawccemou namaw te namaw na ccangpyaku khyh? Ccungccaw tuh ru lan ccan khyh cite phunghopaw nang, namaw so na ruh tou?
Ccungccaw tuh milae zu seikhae lan ccan khyh cite a ho paw nang, namaw so milae zu na seikhae tou? Zohtuh kha luathua-aeui lang a ria paw nang, namaw so zohtuh-tempal uccaw kha na luade tou?
Kawbya liate a pookuh paw nang, kawbya ronaw liate Pachia tuh the na thyaasah tou?
Pawccecize, “Nanning keiccuze Pachia min tuh Zenta`ae laku kya thethya ccousah athua,” cite a zeiku hawte nynh thua.
Pawccecize, nang nynh Kawbya kha na zui lanze, vindung awkupaw tuh athane ccaccing; thuasalama nang tuh Kawbya a rohtu na thua ze, na vindung awkupaw tuh vindung awku leipaw lang nynh phe a tang.
Tukeiccu vindung awkuh leipaw nynh Kawbya kya-e dingnaw kha a zui lanze, a vindung awku leipaw tuh vindung awkupaw lang riapya thua lan khyh tou?

Te pynsaw lante vindung awkuh leipaw nynh aphung lante Kawbya kha a ccingsah lanze, azeikuh paw Kawbya te vindung awkupaw mang a hoi pite Kawbya kha a ccingsah leipaw nang kha bya ae pia lan khyh tou?
Pawccecize atolang te kyalya Jew athua paw tuh Jew paw ccaccing thua khyh; ngesaw kya atolang te kyalya vindung awkupaw mah vindung awkupaw ccaccing thua khyh;

thuasalama alungkhu langte Jew athua paw nynh Jew paw ccaccing athua, te vindung awkupaw mah kawbya kya thua khyh, Muisaw kya thinlung kyate vindung awkupaw nynh athua; tuh-e paw thehoysanaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia kya-e nynh athua.
Tuhte lanze, Jewthuanaw nynh paw thanenaw mou a ung? Tukhyhze vindung awkupaw nynh pawmou accungkia?
Ccungkianaw patae a um. Abapi lante Jew`ae kalan nynh Pachia kya-e bya`ae tuh pya athua.
Minmin abang nynh a zyn khyh`ae paw tuh pawte ho lan? Minmin a zyn leinaw`ae nynh Pachia kya-e zyn lan umnaw kha thanesah leite um ngaw ta?
Tuhte thua khyh. “Athua, na hopaw kya nang tuh na ding zah bya ae pia vae`ae ze nang tuh na tae,” cite azeiku hawte Pachia tuh ading, thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw tuh ahyngpaw nynh thua.

Thuasalama aening ah dingleinaw oh nynh Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha a langsaku lanze, pawte ah ho cih oh? Aening kha thin oun rianuapaw Pachia tuh ding khyh tou? (Hynhte ka hopaw tuh ccungccaw hawte nynh ka ho.)
Tuhte thua khyh. Tuhte athua lanze Pachia nynh laephi ccungccaw`ae hynh pawtemou byapia cih?
Pawccecize kae ka hyngnaw liate Pachia kya-e byaccing tuh a phu-enaw kalan houh a lungsathung ze, kae kha miseipaw hawte pawccemou bya oun pia`ae?

Te, “Ahoypaw a langku nawlan ahoy leipaw kha cyih oh sih,” cite ccungccaw abang nynh kaening kha thethya oun ccousahry`ae pawte, nanning nynh na ho oh oun ci`ae. Kae ho thyhte a ho cih`ae tou? Tuhte a ho`ae paw tuh seibe lan accan`ae.

Tuhte lanze pawcihte? Aening Jew`ae tuh minmin laeze ah hoyhua oh tou? Ccapyh sanmah ah hoyhua khyh oh; pawccecize Jew`ae te Greek`ae balyn tuh paryhte seinaw marya hoi`ae cite langmaw phe kae langsaku vae.
Hynhte azeiku hawte, “Adingpaw hung san um khyh, lukheit sanmah um khyh.
A thaethya paw hung san um khyh, Pachia kha a ccung paw hung san um khyh.
Ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh laanpi pung me vae`ae, mih balyn mawte ccungkia vae khyh`ae, ahoypaw a cyih paw hung san um khyh, lukheit sanmah um khyh.
Mih lotharue tuh ahungkuhpaw shawku nynh thua, mih lae te pheenaw a mang`ae, fuparepaw sy tuh mih mung lungkhu a um.
Mih khalang tuh thyalawnaw bya te byakhahpaw te nynh phe abia.
Mih ccu tuh chii luasah lan a khyrang;
mih ccianaw laanpi kya ronaw te runaw a um.
Te daenaw laanpi kha minmin nynh nyh khyh`ae.
Mih mitdae kya Pachia rawrinaw cipaw kharyh um khyh,” cite azeikuh.
Kawbya nynh a hopaw miakaw tuh Kawbya zakaw a um`ae paw hanlan nynh a ho cipaw ah ny oh, ou tuhte khalang miakaw nynh bya ho ngan lei lante laephi ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh Pachia malang seibe athua`ae.
Tukeiccu Kawbya cyisahnaw liate hung ccungccaw sanmah Pachia malang thyaaccou kho lan khyh; pawccecize Kawbya liate nynh seinaw kha nyku athua.
Thuasalama atu Kawbya te Profeh`ae bya nynh ccaekiakhan`ae thyhhawte Kawbya te asekuh leipaw Pachia kya-e dingnaw tuh phe yn langkuh vae.

Tuh-e dingnaw tuh Jesu Kri kha zynnaw liate a zyn paw ccungccaw balyn hanlan te tuh-e`ae balyn tungvaw kya a um paw Pachia kya-e dingnaw ccaccei kha nynh athua; pawccecize laesakunaw cipaw kharyh um khyh.
Pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh phe sei vae`ae zah Pachia phu-enaw kalan phah kho vae khyh`ae.
Kri Jesu kya um paw sawkhawnaw liate Pachia thawccinaw keiccu nynh alakaw te thyaaccouku.

Pachia nynh a ngaesangnaw liate langmaw-e seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw hanlan, a dingnaw kha langsaku khylan, atu ccyh lya a dingnaw kha phy khylan, Jesu a zyn paw ccungccaw kha thyaaccousatupaw thua khylan te amaw tuh adingpaw athua nawlan, Jesu chii kha zynnaw liate kha-e Kri kha lungdaesapaw silawkunaw lang Pachia nynh phe a khang vae.
Tuhte lanze pookunaw tuh pawkyamou? Pookunaw lanpaw umbua khyh. Paw kawbya te mou a nue? Cyisahnaw kawbya te tou? Thua khyh, thuasalama zynnaw kya-e kawbya liate nynh a nue.
Tukeiccu ccungccaw tuh Kawbya cyisahnaw um leite zynnaw liate nynh thyaaccouku cite kae thangsah.
Pachia tuh Jew`ae Pachia kyalya tou? Zenta`ae Pachia so thuabua khyh tou? Athua, Zenta`ae Pachia mah athuabua.
Vindung awkupaw kha zynnaw liate, te vindung awku leipaw kha zynnaw liate thyaa a ccousah cih paw tuh Pachia ccangkheit nynh thua.
Tuhte lanze zynnaw liate aening nynh Kawbya tuh thanesah leite tou a ung oh? Tuhte thua khyh, Kawbya kha ah tynsah oh paw nynh thua.
Tuhte lanze pawtemou ah ho cih oh? Aening ah minpaaw Abraham tuh pynsaw lante paw thanenaw mou a mue?
Abraham tuh cyisahnaw liate thyaaccou athua ze, a pooku lanpaw a hoi, thuasalama Pachia malang hoi khyh.
Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh pawtemou a ho? “Abraham nynh Pachia kha zyn zah a zynnaw kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua,” a ci.
Ryalah paw ccungccaw tuh thawccinaw liate cite riapakuh khyh, thuasalama atekuhpaw ryalaw mee nynh a ccou.
Thuasalama ryalah leipaw, Pachia nyh leipaw ccungccaw kha thyaaccousatupaw kha a zyn paw tuh, kha-e a zynnaw kha dingnaw lang riapya athua.
Tuhhawte cyisahnaw um leite Pachia nynh dingnaw a bebua paw ccungccapaw kya-e hythuanaw kong kha David nynh a ho paw tuh:
“A cyiseimenaw`ae ngaethya athua`ae paw te mih seinaw`ae khawpya athua`ae paw tuh lungtua`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
BAWIPAW nynh sei a be leipaw ccungccapaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua,” a ci.

Tuhte lanze, hynh-e hythuanaw tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw tungvaw kyalya tou a thua? Tukhyhze vindung awkuh lei`ae paw tungvaw so thuabua khyh tou? Pawccecize, Abraham hanlan a zynnaw kha a dingnaw lang riapya athua ah ci oh.
Tuhte lanze tuh-e tuh pawcihtemou riapya athua? Vindung a awku maw tou, tukhyhze vindung a awkuh koute tou? A awkuh koute riapya paw thua khyh, a awku maw riapya paw nynh thua.
Vindung awkupaw syntawnaw leite a zyn paw ccungccaw`ae kha dingnaw lang riapya nawlan thuasah, Abraham tuh a zyn paw ccungccaw`ae balyn paawthuanaw lang thuasah,

te vindung awkuh`ae paw paaw kyalya thua leite, ah minpaaw Abraham nynh vindung a awku mawze a hoi paw zynnaw ccusy a zui`ae paw, vindung awkuh lei`ae paw paaw mah athua nawlan thuasah, Abraham nynh vindung awku mawze a hoi paw zynnaw kya-e dingnaw tazeih athua paw vindung awkupaw kya-e syntawnaw kha a mue.

Pawccecize aning tuh laephipi rhoccoutu a thua cih cite byakinpyakupaw tuh Abraham kalan mah thuasah, a ciihan`ae kalan mah thuasah Kawbya liate thua khyh, thuasalama zynnaw kya-e dingnaw liate nynh athua.
Pawccecize Kawbya te asekuh`ae paw nynh rhoccoutu`ae athua ze, zynnaw tuh alakaw vae, byakinpyakupaw mah paw ccungkia vae khyh.
Pawkeiccumacize Kawbya nynh tuh thinrianaw kha a thuakhae; thuasalama Kawbya um leinaw tuh cyiseimenaw um khyh.

Tukeiccu byakinpyakupaw tuh Kawbya te asekuh`ae paw hanlan kyalya thua leite, aening balyn paaw athua paw Abraham kya-e zynnaw te asekuh`ae paw hanlan mah athuabua nawlan, Abraham ciihan`ae balyn kalan phe ria nawlan, thawccinaw liate nynh dingnaw tuh a ccouku cipaw aria nawlan zynnaw liate nynh a mueku.

“Nang kha minphuin pataepi paaw lang phe kae rae vae,” cite azeiku hawte; a chih`ae paw a thosatu te a um loh leipaw uccaw`ae kha a um vae paw hawte a ho paw Pachia, amaw nynh a zyn paw Pachia ccaccei malang Abraham tuh aening balyn paaw nynh athua.
“Na ciihan tuh tuhhawte nynh athua cih,” cite a hopya paw bya thyhhawte Abraham nynh kae tuh minphuin pataepi paaw lang ka tang cih cite ngaehoinaw hoi lan accan lei pite zyn zah a ngaehoi.
Te zynnaw kya thawzya leite, amaw kum tuh kum zakheit loukaw a ci vae zemah amaw pyn kha a chih vae paw hawte tuakuh khyh zah a zu Sarah vuebua mah phe a chih vae cite tua khyh.
Zyn leinaw liate Pachia nynh byakinpyakupaw kha lunghiinnaw hoi khyh, thuasalama zynnaw kya thawsae zah Pachia kha phu-enaw a pya.
Pachia nynh bya yn kinpyakupaw tuh yn ccingsapya kho cite varyn a zyn.
Tukeiccu, “A zynnaw kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua.”
Tuhte “A hanlan riapya athua” cite Abraham elan kyalya azeikuh paw thua khyh.
Thuasalama aening hanlan mah azeikuh paw nynh thua. A chih`ae paw kyate ah Bawipaw Jesu a thosatupaw kha aening nynh ah zyn oh ze kha-e zynnaw kha aening dingnaw lang riapya athua cih.
Bawipaw Jesu tuh aening seimenaw keiccuze ccungccaw`ae kalan a ah`ae, te aening thyaaccounaw hanlan bua thosathui athua.
Tukeiccu zynnaw liate thyaaccou ah thua vae oh zah ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate aening tuh Pachia te ccawkunaw ah hoi oh.
Aening ah thadynnaw oh kya hynh-e thawccinaw lungkhu lang amaw zynnaw liate nynh aening naeku khonaw ah hoi oh, te Pachia kya-e phu-enaw kha ngaehoinaw liate aening ah lungtua.
Te hynh-e kya kyalya thua khyh, vawsawrunaw kya mah aening ah lungtua; pawccecize vawsawrunaw nynh ngaesangnaw kha a thuakhae.
Te ngaesangnaw nynh tungpaw muihpaw kha thuakhae zah, tungpaw muihpaw nynh ngaehoinaw kha a thuakhae;
Ngaehoinaw nynh maethyanaw kha poukhae khyh, pawkeiccumacize aening kalan pya athua paw Thyaa Muisaw liate aening ah thinlung lungkhu lang Pachia sungsahnaw kha ccaenua phe athua vae.
Pawccecize aening tuh thawzung leite ah um ccyh lya oh, accyh he zaw lyakhe Kri tuh Pachia nyh lei`ae paw hanlan a chih.
Pawccecize adingpaw ccungccaw hanlan a chipah cih paw ccungccaw kou akhing cih, tuhzemah ccungccahoypaw hanlan a chih ngan paw poh um ccamah ny lei.
Thuasalama aening tuh misei`ae ah thua cciamang lya oh khe, Kri nynh aening hanlan a chi paw tuh Pachia nynh aening kha pawcih nynh oun sungsah cipaw oun langsapyaku.
Tuhlae lanze, atu amaw chii liate thyaaccoukuh vae zah amaw liate Pachia thinrianaw kyate aening tuh ah lue vae cih oh.

Pawccecize aening tuh rhaw`ae ah thua lya oh khe, a Ccapaw chinaw liate Pachia kalan ah ccawkuthui vae oh thua ze, tuhlae lanze phe ah ccawkuthui vae oh pawte amaw hiinnaw liate aening tuh khum ah thua vae cih oh.
Te tuh-e kyalya thua leite, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate aening tuh ccawkuthuinaw atu phe ah mue vae oh zah amaw liate Pachia kya lungtuanaw ah hoi oh.

Pawccemacize ccungccapaw lukheit liate seinaw tuh laephipi lungkhu lang tee zah seinaw liate chinaw a tee thyhhawte, ccungccaw balyn tuh pung aseikuh vae keiccuze chinaw nynh marya pung yn thuanua vae.
Pawccecize Kawbya pya athua maw balyn laephipi kya seinaw tuh phe a um vae; thuasalama Kawbya a um maw e seinaw tuh riapya thua loh khyh.

Tuhzemah Adam kyate Mawsi kyacia chinaw nynh phe a uk vae; Adam nynh kawngae khyh hawte a sei bua lei`ae paw tungvaw mah phe a uk, tuh-e Adam tuh nyalang yn thua vae cih paw kya-e langsakupaw muinsan nynh athua.

Thuasalama cyiseimenaw te alakaw te mue paw lasung tuh lokuh khyh. Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit cyiseimenaw keiccu ccungccaw patae tuh a chi`ae lanze, tuhlae lanze, Pachia kya-e thawccinaw te ccungccaw lukheit athua paw Jesu Kri liate thawccinaw lasung tuh ccungccaw patae hanlan houh alung.

Te a seipaw ccungccapaw lukheit liate yn thua paw te thawccinaw lasung tuh lokuh khyh, pawccecize ccungccapaw lukheit liate byapianaw nynh seibenaw kha a thuakhae, thuasalama thawccinaw lasung tuh cyiseimenaw pataepi mawte thyaaccousanaw nynh thua.

Pawccecize ccungccapaw lukheit seinaw keiccuze, tuh-e paw liate chinaw nynh a uk lanze, tuhlae lanze, thawccinaw phe beih lang a ccou`ae paw te dingnaw lasung a ccou`ae paw nynh tuh lukheitpaw Jesu Kri liate hiinnaw kya houh a uk cih`ae.
Tukeiccu lukheitpaw cyiseimenaw keiccu ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh seibyapianaw a tungkuh, tuhhawte lukheitpaw dingnaw liate ccungccaw`ae balyn tungvaw kya hiinnaw te asekuhpaw thyaaccounaw a muekuh.
Pawccecize ccungccapaw lukheit nynh kawngae leinaw liate ccungccaw patae tuh misei`ae lang tangsah athua`ae hawte lukheitpaw kawngaenaw liate ccungccaw patae tuh miding`ae lang tangsah athua cih`ae.
Tuhlae lanze, cyiseimenaw houh alung nawlan nynh Kawbya tuh yn tee, thuasalama seinaw alungnaw kya thawccinaw houh alunghua;
tuh-e tuh, seinaw nynh chinaw kya a uk hawte ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate thawccinaw nynh dingnaw liate zungzae hiinnaw kya a uknaw lanpaw nynh thua.
Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Thawccinaw houh alung ccaw cite seinaw tou banban pei ah rae cih oh?
Tuhte thua khyh. Seinaw kalan a chih vae`ae paw aening tuh pawcihtemou tuh-e kyatuin ah hiin ung cih oh?
Kri Jesu lungkhu lang baptisma-in vae`ae paw aening balyn tuh a chinaw lungkhu lang baptisma- inkuh vae cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou?

Tukeiccu a chinaw lungkhu lang baptisma-inkunaw liate aening tuh amaw ryte ah uhkuh bua oh. Ou tuhte Kri tuh Paaw phu-enaw thungnaw liate a chih`ae paw kyate thosathui athua hawte, aening mah hiinnaw athawpaw kya ah cciabua nawlan oh nynh thua.
Pawccecize a chinaw kya alokuh lante aening tuh pynkheihlan ah bingkuh bua oh athua ze, a thothuinaw kya mah pynkheihlan phe lokuh lante ah bingkuh bua cih oh.
Aening ah ccungccaw rynpaw kha amaw ryte khiade athua paw tuh sei pyn hynh ro khylan nynh thua cipaw ah ny oh, ou tuhte aening nynh seinaw rya ah law vae khyh nawlan oh.
Pawccecize a chih vae paw ccungccaw tuh seinaw kyate phe a lue vae.
Atu aening tuh Kri ryte ah chi oh thua ze, amaw ryte ah hiin cih oh cite mah ah zyn oh.
