Pawccecize, Kri tuh a chih`ae paw kyate thosah he athua te chih lae vae khyh, chinaw nynh a tungvaw kya uknaw kaw hoi kho vae khyh cipaw ah ny oh.
Pawccecize Kri nynh a chi paw tuh seinaw hanlan vaekheit rou nynh a chi, thuasalama a hiinpaw tuh Pachia hanlan nynh a hiin.
Tuhhawte nanning mah seinaw kalan tuh phe kae chih ccaccing cite tuakuh oh, thuasalama Pachia kalan tuh ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu liate kae hiin cite naemaw te naemaw kha la tuakuh oh.
Tukeiccu, nae pynsaw ryduanaw kawngaenaw khylan a chihthyapaw nae pyn kya seinaw nynh la uk nan vae sah.

Nae pyn kya-e`ae mah seinaw hanlan ding leinaw zunghe lante la pyakuh nan oh; thuasalama a chih`ae paw kyate bua a hiin`ae paw ccungccaw`ae hawte naemaw te naemaw kha Pachia kalan pyakuh oh lah nae pyn kya-e`ae kha mah dingnaw zunghe lante Pachia kalan pyakuh oh.
Pawccecize nanning tuh Kawbya zakaw na um vae khyh oh, thuasalama thawccinaw zakaw nynh na um oh; tukeiccu seinaw nynh nanning tungvaw kawhoinaw hoi vae lan khyh.
Tuhte lanze pawcihtemou? Aening tuh Kawbya zakaw ah um vae khyh oh, thuasalama thawccinaw zakaw ah um vae oh keiccu tuh ah sei cih oh tou te? Tuhte thua khyh.

Nanning nynh chinaw te asekuhpaw seinaw kalan na pyakuh oh zemah, tukhyhze dingnaw te asekuhpaw kawngaenaw kalan na pyakuh oh zemah, lukhakheit kalan naemaw te naemaw kha see`ae lang na pyaku oh lan thua ze, nanning tuh tuh-e paw a kaw na ngae oh paw see`ae nynh kae thua cipaw na nyhkuh khyh oh tou?

Thuasalama Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho lan accan. Pawccecize nanning tuh seinaw kya-e see`ae nynh na la thua oh paw, thuasalama atu tuh nae kalan phy athua paw doctrine kha nae thinlung kyate phe na lawku vae oh.
Seinaw kyate luesah phe na thua vae oh thyhte, nanning tuh dingnaw see`ae lang nynh na tang vae oh.

Nae pynsaw lante na ccing khyh oh keiccu nynh ccungccaw phung lante kae hopya oh; pawccecize nae pyn kya-e`ae kha seimenaw hanlan, athyaa leipaw kalan te seimenaw kalan see`ae lang na la pyakuh oh hawte atu mah nae pyn kya-e`ae kha thyaanaw hanlan, dingnaw kalan see`ae lang pyakuh oh.
Pawccecize nanning tuh seinaw see`ae na la thua lya oh kha dingnaw kyate na la lue oh.
Tuhte lanze atu nanning nynh nae maethyakhaekupaw tuh-e uccaw`ae kya paw thanenaw mou na mue oh? Pawccecize tuh-e uccaw`ae athangnaw tuh chinaw nynh thua.
Thuasalama atu nanning tuh seinaw kyate luesah na thua oh zah Pachia see`ae lang na tang oh thyhte thyaanaw hanlan thanenaw kha na mue oh, te athangnaw lang zungzae hiinnaw kha na mue cih oh.
Pawccecize seinaw mee tuh chinaw nynh thua; thuasalama Pachia kya-e lasung tuh ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu liate zungzae hiinnaw nynh thua.
Kawbya a nyh`ae paw uno`ae, nae kalan kae hopya oh. Kawbya nynh ccungccaw lukheit tungvaw a hiin lungkhu balyn uknaw kaw a hoi cipaw kha nanning na nyh khyh oh tou?
Pawccecize vawpaw a hoi vae paw nopinung tuh a vawpaw a chi makhia Kawbya liate a vawpaw kalan hede athua; thuasalama a vawpaw tuh a chi lanze a vawpaw te asekuhpaw kawbya kyate aning tuh a lue.

Tukeiccu tuh a vawpaw phang a hiin lyakhe, ccangpaw pise kha a umkhae lanze aning tuh vawpaw tungvaw ohhuakuhnung cite ko athua cih; thuasalama a vawpaw tuh a chi lanze, aning tuh kawbya kyate a lue, tukeiccu pise ccangpaw a umkhae zemah vawpaw tungvaw ohhuakuhnung thua vae khyh.

Ou tuhhawte ka uno`ae, nanning mah Kri pyn liate Kawbya kya chisah na thua oh, pawtecize a chih`ae paw kyate a thothuipaw, mingccangpaw Kri kalan zu lang na tang nawlan oh, te Pachia hanlan athae ah thae nawlan oh nynh thua.
Pawccecize aening tuh pynsaw kya ah um lya oh tuh seinaw te asekuhpaw ryduanaw`ae nynh Kawbya liate oun thokuh zah chinaw hanlan athae poukhae khylan aening ah pyn kya-e`ae kya rya a lah he.
Thuasalama atu tuh Kawbya kya-e arynpaw kya thua vae leite, Muisaw kya-e athawpaw kya aening nynh rya ah law nawlan oh aening tuh ah chih oh zah phang oun khiidepaw Kawbya kyate phe ah lue vae oh.

Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Kawbya tuh a sei tou? Tuhte thua khyh! Kawbya leite tuh seinaw hynh ka la nyh lan khyh, thuasalama Kawbya liate nynh ka ny. Pawccecize Kawbya nynh, “Na dua lan khyh,” cite a la ho khyh ze, kae tuh duanaw kong hynh ka la nyh lan khyh.
Thuasalama seinaw nynh kawpyapaw liate akhue mue zah duanaw aphuinphuin balyn kha kae ka kya a poukhae; pawccecize Kawbya leite seinaw tuh a chih.
Langmaw lya Kawbya leite nynh kae tuh ka la hiin, thuasalama kawpyapaw he yn thua tuh seinaw nynh a hiin vae, kae tuh ka chih.
Hiinnaw hanlan khang paw tuh-e kawpyapaw tuh chinaw a thuakhae paw kha ka muih.
Pawccecize seinaw tuh kawbya liate akhue mue zah kae kha yn ling, te kha-e liate kae kha phe yn chia.
Tukeiccuze Kawbya tuh athyaa, te kawpyapaw mah athyaa, ding zah ahoy.

Tuhte lanze tuh-e ahoypaw nynh kae ka hanlan chinaw tou yn raepya? Tuhte thua khyh! Thuasalama seinaw nynh seinaw kha a langsaku ccaw cite ahoypaw uccaw liate kae ka kya chinaw rya kha a law; tuh-e tuh seinaw hynh kawpyapaw liate tuh myarya a seipaw lang a tang nawlan nynh thua.
Pawccecize Kawbya tuh muisaw lante asekuhpaw nynh thua cipaw ah ny oh; thuasalama kae tuh pynsaw ccungccaw, seinaw see tang khylan zua paw nynh ka thua.
Pawccecize ka cyi paw kha ka thaethyapaw thua khyh. Ka cyi ry paw kha ka cyih khyh, thuasalama ka hua paw kha nynh ka cyi.
Tuhte ka ry leipaw kha ka cyi lan thua ze Kawbya tuh ahoy cite Kawbya kalan ka nawccah.
Tuhte lanze atu kha-e a cyih paw tuh kae ka thua vae khyh, thuasalama kae ka kya um paw seinaw nynh a cyih.
Pawccecize kae ka kya, ka pynsaw kya ahoypaw kharyh um khyh cipaw ka ny; pawccecize kae ka kya cyirynaw a um, thuasalama ahoypaw kha pawcihte nynh cyi lan cipaw ka muih khyh.
Pawccecize ka cyi ry paw ahoypaw kha ka cyih khyh, thuasalama ka cyi ry leipaw ahoy leipaw kha nynh ka cyi.
Ka cyi ry leipaw kha atu ka cyi lan thua ze, kha-e a cyih paw tuh kae ka thua vae khyh, thuasalama ka kya um paw seinaw nynh a cyih.
Tuhte ahoypaw ka cyi ry lya ahoy leipaw yn cyisah paw ka kya a um cite kawbya ccangkheit ka muih.
Pawccecize kae tuh alungkhu lang-e ka ccungccaw lante Pachia Kawbya kya ka lungrythua.

Thuasalama ka pyn kya-e`ae kya, ka thinlungtuanaw kya-e kawbya kha doute a rawsepaw te ka pyn kya-e`ae kya um paw seinaw kawbya kalan, seetangnaw lungkhu lang kae kha yn cciakhae paw ccangpaw kawbya kha ka muih.
Pawcih ngaethya lan um paw babang mou kae hynh! Hynh-e chinaw pyn kyate hung nynh mou kae hynh yn luesah cih?
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate yn luesatupaw Pachia kha ka thehoysah. Ou tuhte ka thinlung tetuh Pachia Kawbya rya kha ka lah, thuasalama ka pynsaw lante seinaw kawbya rya nynh ka law.
Tukeiccu atu Kri Jesu kya a um`ae paw ccungccaw`ae tuh seibenaw um vae khyh, minmin tuh pynsaw rynaw thyhte hiin vae khyh`ae, thuasalama Muisaw rynaw thyhte nynh a hiin`ae.
Pawccecize Kri Jesu kya um paw hiinnaw kya-e Muisaw kawbya nynh seinaw kawbya kyate thuasah, chinaw kawbya kyate thuasah kae kha phe yn luesah vae.

Pawccecize pynsaw liate Kawbya tuh thawzya zah a cyi kho leipaw kha Pachia nynh cyipya khylan, a seithyapaw pynsaw muinsan lante seinaw hanlan amaw a ccapaw kha yn saw zah pynsaw kyakhe seinaw kha sei a be.
Tuhte pynsawthuanaw thyhte a hiin lei`ae paw, thuasalama Muisaw rynaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw aening kya Kawbya kya-e dingnaw tuh accing nawlan nynh thua.
Pawccecize pynsawthuanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw nynh tuh pynsaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a tua`ae; thuasalama Muisawthuanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw nynh tuh Muisaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a tua`ae.
Pynsaw tuanaw tuh chinaw nynh thua, thuasalama muisaw tuanaw tuh hiinnaw te daenaw nynh thua.
Pawkeiccumacize pynsaw tuanaw tuh Pachia te arawsekuh, pawccecize pynsaw tuanaw tuh Pachia Kawbya kha zui khyh, zui mah zui kho khyh.
Tukeiccu pynsaw kya um`ae paw nynh tuh Pachia lung tung kho khyh`ae.

Thuasalama Pachia Muisaw tuh nanning kya a um lan thua ze, nanning tuh pynsaw kya na um khyh oh, Muisaw kya nynh na um vae oh. Atu lukhakheit nynh Kri kya-e Muisaw kha a hoi khyh lanze, aning tuh Kri te sekuh khyh.
Te Kri tuh nanning kya a um lanze, pyn tuh seinaw keiccuze a chih, thuasalama Muisaw tuh dingnaw keiccuze a hiin.

Thuasalama Jesu kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosatupaw, a Muisaw kha nanning kya a um lanze, Kri kha chinaw kyate a thosatupaw nynh nanning kya a um paw amaw Muisaw liate a chihthyapaw nae pyn kha ae hiinsah cih oh.
Tukeiccu uteno`ae, aening tuh pynsawthuanaw thyhte hiin khylan pynsaw kalan lae um`ae paw ah thua vae khyh oh.
Pawccecize pynsaw thyhte na hiin oh athua ze na chih vae cih oh; thuasalama Muisaw liate pyn kya-e cyisahnaw kha na chisah oh ze na hiin cih oh.
Pawccecize Pachia kya-e Muisaw nynh a cciakhae`ae paw miakaw tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh thua`ae.
Pawccecize nanning nynh a rihthya paw seetangnaw kya-e muisaw kha bua na mue khyh oh, thuasalama ccaawthuanaw Muisaw kha phe na mue vae oh, ou tuh-e te nynh, “Abba, Apang,” cite ah ko oh.
Aening tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh cipaw Muisaw amaw ccaccei nynh aening muisaw ryte ccaekia a khan.

Te ccaaw`ae ah thua oh ze rhoccoutu`ae nynh ah thua vae oh, Pachia kya-e rhoccoutu`ae te Kri ryte rhoccoukheihtu`ae nynh ah thua oh; amaw ryte ah teingkheih oh ze, pynkheihlan phu-esah ah thuabua cih oh.
Pawccecize aening kya yn langkuh vae cih paw phu-enaw te atu lya e teingnaw`ae tuh khingkhia lan sanmah ngaekuh khyh cite nynh ka tua.
Pawccecize rae paw uccaw`ae nynh Pachia ccaaw`ae oun langku nawlan`ae paw kha myaryasangkae ngaehoinaw te phang a ngawdae`ae.
Pawccecize rae paw uccaw`ae tuh accakaepaw lang nynh rae athua`ae. Tuhte raeku a ry`ae paw thua khyh; thuasalama a raetupaw nynh ngaehoinaw kya tuhcihte a rae keiccu nynh tuhte athua`ae.
Pawkeiccumacize rae paw uccaw`ae maw mah ronaw seetangnaw kyate Pachia ccaaw`ae kya-e aphu-epaw luenaw lungkhu lang poh thua athua cih`ae.
Pawccecize rae paw uccaw`ae balyn tuh atu cia pynkheihlan hawkhaekuh`ae zah neitangia teing`ae cipaw ah ny oh.
Minmin kyalya thua leite, Muisaw thae`ae kya-e masaty a hoi`ae paw aening kha mah ccaawthuanaw athua paw ah pyn sawkhawnaw kha ngaehoibiate ahmaw lungkhu kya ah hawkhaekuh oh.

Pawccecize aening tuh ngaehoinaw liate khum ah thua oh; thuasalama phe muih vae paw ngaehoinaw tuh ngaehoi paw thua vae khyh; pawccecize lukhakheit nynh phe a muih vae paw uccaw kha pawccemou a ngaehoi ung cih?
Thuasalama aening nynh ah muih lei oh paw kha ah ngaehoi oh ze, kha-e kha aening nynh lungsaete ah ngaw oh.

Tuhhawte aening ah ccing leinaw oh kya Muisaw nynh mah yn bawng; pawccecize sawsang lan ah ccang oh thyhte, pawcihte nynh sawsang lan cipaw ah nyh khyh oh; thuasalama aening sawsang lan bya te ho kho leipaw hawkhaekunaw khate Muisaw amaw ccaccei nynh aening hanlan yn ngiapya.
Thinlung a ccungtupaw nynh tuh Muisaw tuanaw kha a ny; pawkeiccumacize Muisaw nynh mithyaa`ae hanlan Pachia rynaw thyhte a ngiapya`ae.
Pachia kha a sungsah`ae paw, amaw a eenaw thyhte a ko paw ccungccaw`ae hanlan pawpaw balyn tuh pynkheihlan ahoy lante cci nynh acyiku cipaw aening nynh ah ny oh.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh a Ccapaw kha uteno`ae pataepi lakuze ccatawccaaw lang atang ccaw cite Pachia nynh phe a nyty paw ccungccaw`ae kha a Ccapaw muinsan te aloku nawlan phe a syntawty`ae.
Tuhte phe a syntawty paw minmin kha ko mah a ko`ae; te a ko`ae paw kha thyaaccousah`ae; te thyaaccousah`ae paw kha phu-e ccousah bua`ae.
Tuhte lanze hynh-e uccaw`ae kya pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Pachia tuh aening ryte a um ze hung nynh mou aening kha oun rawse kho ung cih?
Amaw a Ccapaw heize hang leite aening balyn hanlan oun pyatupaw Pachia nynh Ccapaw ryte pawpaw balyn kha alakaw te aening pya leite ung ngaw tou?
Pachia nynh a po`ae paw kha hung nynh mou sei a be cih? Thyaaccousatupaw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
Seibetupaw tuh hungmou? Chih zah a chi kyalya thua leite bua a thothuipaw, Pachia a ranglang ccaccei kya a um paw, aening hanlan oun ngiapatupaw tuh Kri ccaccei nynh thua.

Kri kya-e sungsanaw kyate hung nynh mou aening kha oun phiasakuh cih? Vawsawrunaw nynh tou? Thinlungccinaw nynh tou? Tuasakunaw nynh tou? Ccakangnaw nynh tou? Ccakaete umnaw nynh tou? Ronaw nynh tou? Zunghe nynh tou oun phiasakuh cih?
“Nang na keiccuze kaening tuh a nin ninlang oun chiabia`ae; chia lan a nungde`ae paw tuu`ae lang nynh kaening kha oun ria`ae,” cite a la zeiku hawte nynh thua.
Oun phia kho lanpaw um khyh. Aening kha oun sungsahtupaw amaw liate, aening tuh hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn kya, taetu`ae pasing nynh ah thua oh.
Pawccecize chinaw thuasah, hiinnaw thuasah, vaaw ccungccaw`ae thuasah, lupithuanaw thuasah, thungnaw thuasah, atu a um paw uccaw`ae thuasah, oun thua vae cih paw uccaw`ae thuasah;
ahangnaw thuasah, akhunaw thuasah, ccangpaw rae paw uccaw thuasah, ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu kya um paw Pachia kya-e sungsakunaw kyate aening kha oun phia kho lan khyh cite kae ka lungtyn.
Kri kya byaccing nynh ka ho, ka hyng khyh. Kamaw nykunawpaw thinlung nynh mah Thyaa Muisaw ryte kamaw kalan te ccaekiakhan paw tuh:
Kae tuh alepipaw lungriathaenaw ka hoi zah ka thinlung kya ngaethyanaw apaekuh lei lan ka hoi.
Pawccecize pynsaw lante ka puipaw vaeccaw`ae athua paw ka uno`ae hanlan kamaw te kamaw tuh Kri kyate thyalawnaw ccou lan cia heize ka ry.
Tuh-e`ae tuh Israel`ae nynh thua`ae. Te ccaawthuanaw, phu-enaw, byakin`ae, te Kawbya pyanaw, te Pachia ryalawnaw, te byakinpyakupaw`ae te asekuh`ae paw,
minpaaw`ae te asekuh`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Pynsaw lante Kri tuh minmin kyate nynh yn thua. Tuh-e Kri tuh tynre balyn kyaze kawhoitu thua zah zungzae hythuapyatu Pachia nynh thua. Amen.
Tuhzemah Pachia bya tuh atyn leipaw hawte ka hopaw thua khyh. Pawccecize Israel athua`ae paw balyn hynh Israel marya thua khyh`ae.
Abraham kyate a tho`ae paw balyn mah Abraham ccaaw`ae marya thua khyh`ae; thuasalama, “Na ciihan tuh Isaak kya rou nynh ko athua cih,” acihkuh.
Tuhte a hopaw tuh pynsaw ccaaw`ae tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae thua khyh cinawpaw nynh thua; thuasalama byakinpyakupaw kya-e ccaaw`ae kha nynh ciihan lan ria athua.
Byakinpyakupaw kya-e bya tuh hynhte acikuh: “Atu kae hopya ccyh yn thua te kae kae thua cih zah Sarah nynh ccapaw yn hoi cih,” a ci.
Tuh-e kyalya thua khyh, Rebeka nynh lukheitpaw, ah paaw Isaak liate ccaaw a poi lyakhe,
ccaaw`ae a pui maw`ae, ahoypaw te athahpaw mah a rae maw`ae khe, Pachia paccynnaw tuh ryalawnaw liate thua khyh, thuasalama a kotupaw nynh a ponaw thyhte athua nawlan,
Rebeka kalan khe, “Atawccapaw nynh asoipaw see lang yn tang cih,” cite a hopya.
Tuhhawte, “Jakob tuh ka sungsah, thuasalama Esau tuh ka hua,” cite azeikuh.
Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Pachia tuh taza khyh tou? Tuhte thua khyh.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh Mawsi kalan, “Ngaethya ka umsah ry paw kha ngaethya ka umsah cih zah thaw ka cciry paw kha thaw ka ccih cih,” cite a hopya.
Tukeiccu a ry paw ccungccaw kya-e thua khyh, a ccue paw ccungccaw kya-e mah thua khyh, thuasalama ngaethyaumsanaw a langsakutupaw Pachia kya-e nynh thua.

Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh Faro kalan a ho paw tuh, “Ka thungnaw kha nang na kya langsaku khylan, te ka min hynh laephipi kya balyn po thaansah khylan, hynh-e paccynnaw elan nynh nang kha kae hangthung,” a cipya.
Tukeiccu Pachia nynh ngaethya-umsah ry paw kha ngaethya-umsah zah lungkhungsah ry paw kha a lungkhungsah.
Tuhte lanze, “Pawccemou Pachia nynh cyiseimenaw yn muihpya? Hung nynh mou a rynaw kha a khee boi?” cite nae cipah cih tou.
Pachia kha rawsete a khung paw, pou ccungccapaw, nang tuh hungmou na thua? Rae paw uccaw nynh a raetupaw kha, “Pawccemou hynhcihte nae rae,” cite a hopah cih tou?
Ang raetupaw nynh anglae tungvaw kya kawhoi khyh tou? Anglae pumkheit mawkhate zung kheit kha ang hoypaw lang, te zung kheit kha anghoy leipaw lang raenaw kaw hoi khyh tou?

Pachia nynh amaw thinrianaw kha langsaku lan te a thungnaw kha nysah lan`ae mang a ry pite, ronaw hanlan a paccyn vae paw a thinrianua paw ang`ae kya lungsaenaw pipi te phang a ngaesang lanze pawmou ho lan ung?
Te Pachia nynh phu-enaw hanlan a paccynty vae paw, ngaethyaumsanaw ccou`ae paw ang`ae tungvaw kya a phu-enaw kya-e hoirungnaw kha langsaku khylan a cyi paw nynh thua.
Tuh-e ang`ae tuh Jew`ae kyate kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh Zenta`ae kyate oun ko paw aening so ah thua khyh oh tou?
Hosia kya mah Pachia nynh, “Ka ccungccaw`ae athua leipaw kha, ‘Ka ccungccaw`ae,’ cite ka ko cih`ae zah ka sungsah nung athua leipaw kha, ‘Ka sungsah,’ cite ka ko cih.”
“Ou tuhcihte, ‘Nanning tuh ka ccungccaw`ae na thua khyh oh,’ cite a honaw`ae kyakhe, minmin tuh a hiinpaw Pachia ccaaw`ae cite ko athua cih`ae,” cite a ho.
Israel`ae te asekuh lante Isaiah nynh mah, “Israel ccaaw`ae milu tuh rili kya-e laesia hawte athua zemah, alaepaw rou nynh khum athua cih`ae.
Pawccecize ryalaw kha a thangsah cih; dingnaw kya adynsah cih; pawkeiccumacize BAWIPAW nynh adynpaw ryalaw kha laephi vawlan a rae cih,” cite a sia.

Tuhhawte Isaiah nynh langmaw lya, “Sabaoth BAWIPAW nynh aening hanlan ccacii kha yn hangpya khyh lanze aening tuh Sodom khuapi hawte ah thua cih oh zah Komorah khuapi te phe ah lokuh vae cih oh,” cite a ho.
Tuhte lanze pawcihte ah ho cih oh? Dingnaw kha a zui lei`ae paw Zenta`ae nynh dingnaw kha phe a phya vae`ae, tuh-e dingnaw tuh zynnaw kya-e nynh thua.
Thuasalama dingnaw kawbya a zui`ae paw Israel`ae nynh dingnaw kawbya kha phah khyh`ae.
Pawccemou? Pawkeiccumacize zynnaw liate zui khyh`ae, thuasalama Kawbya cyisahnaw liate a zui`ae keiccu nynh thua. Pawkeiccumacize kha-e thykupawkunawpaw lung kya phe thykuh`ae.
“Dotua oh! Thykupawkunawpaw lung te seisanawpaw lung kha Zion mua kya ka nung, te hunghung zemah amaw kha a zyn paw tuh maethya ccou vae lan khyh,” cite azeikuh hawte nynh thua.
Uteno`ae, Israel`ae hanlan ka thinlung kya-e ka rynaw te Pachia kalan ka sawsangnaw tuh minmin nynh khumnaw a ccoubua ccaw`ae ci nynh thua.
Pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia kalan lungzuanaw a hoi`ae, thuasalama nythyanaw thyhte thua khyh cipaw minmin elan ccaekia ka khan.
Pawccecize minmin tuh Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha ny lei pite, mimaw kya-e dingnaw kha tynsah khylan a zuaku`ae keiccu Pachia kya-e dingnaw kalan mimaw te mimaw kha pyakuh vae khyh`ae.
Pawccecize a zyn paw ccungccaw miakaw hanlan Kri tuh dingnaw lang Kawbya accingnaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize Mawsi nynh, “Kha-e`ae a cyih paw ccungccaw tuh kha-e`ae liate nynh a hiin cih,” cite Kawbya te asekuhpaw dingnaw kong kha a zei.

Thuasalama zynnaw te asekuhpaw dingnaw kong tuh hynhte nynh a ho. “ ‘Hungmou vaawran lang a kaethung cih?’ cite na thinlung kya ho nan,” (Tuh-e tuh Kri kha sawbung khylan hungmou a kaethung cih cirypaw nynh thua)
tukhyhze, “ ‘Hungmou akhunaw lang a rungbung cih?’ cite mah na thinlung kya ho nan,” (Tuh-e tuh Kri kha a chih`ae paw kyate bua poukhae khylan hungmou a rungbung cih cirypaw nynh thua) a ci.
Thuasalama paw a ci mou? “Bya tuh nang te anaekuh, na khalang kya te na thinlung kya anaekuh,” a ci. (Tuh-e tuh kaening nynh kae hopaw, zynnaw bya hynh nynh thua.)
Pawtecize Bawipaw Jesu kha na khalang te ccaekia na khan zah amaw tuh a chih`ae paw kyate Pachia nynh phe a thosah vae cite na zyn lanze, nang tuh khum na thua cih.
Pawccecize dingnaw hanlan ccungccaw nynh thinlung kya a zyn, te khumnaw hanlan khalang te ccaekiakhannaw a rae.
Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh, “Hunghung zemah amaw a zyn paw balyn tuh maethya ccou vae lan khyh,” a ci.
Pawccecize Jew te Greek phin laku laesanaw um vae khyh, pawccecize ccungccaw balyn luki Bawipaw lukheit rou nynh a um. Amaw kha a ko`ae paw balyn hanlan aning tuh myarya a hoirung.
Pawccecize, “Hunghung zemah BAWIPAW min a ko paw miakaw tuh khumnaw a mue cih.”

Tuhzemah minmin nynh a zyn lei`ae paw kha pawcihtemou a ko cih`ae? Te minmin nynh a konglang a thae lei`ae paw kha pawcihtemou a zyn cih`ae? Te phunghotu um leite pawcihtemou minmin nynh a thae cih`ae?

Te minmin kha a saw khyh`ae lanze minmin nynh pawcihtemou phungho cih`ae? Tuhhawte, “Daenaw kong thehoypaw phungho`ae paw te ahoypaw kong lungtua lan um paw thehoypaw oun phu`ae paw mih ccu tuh pawcih babang apuithya!” cite azeikuh.
Thuasalama minmin balyn nynh thehoypaw kha ngae khyh`ae. Pawccecize Isaiah nynh, “Bawipaw, kaening nynh kae ho paw kha hung nynh mou a zyn?” cite a ho.
Tukeiccu zynnaw tuh thaenaw kyate nynh yn thua, te thaenaw tuh Pachia bya kyate nynh thua.
Thuasalama, minmin tuh la thae loh khyh`ae tou? ka ci. Phe a thae ccaccing vae`ae. “Minmin mih roi tuh laephi balyn kyacia phe thua vae zah mih bya tuh laephipi athangnaw kyacia phe thua vae,” a ci.

Thuasalama kae nynh, “Israel`ae nynh nyh khyh`ae tou?” ka ci. Masaty Mawsi nynh, “Ria bua athua leipaw minphuin liate nanning kha eiungnaw kae hoisah cih oh zah angaeepaw minphuin liate nae thin kae riasah cih oh,” cite a la ho.
Thuasalama Isaiah tuh myarya a rawhoy zah, “Kamaw kha oun ccung lei`ae paw nynh kae kha phe oun muih vae`ae; ka konglang oun khia lei`ae paw kalan kae phe ka langkuh vae,” cite a ho.
Thuasalama Israel`ae kalan Isaiah nynh, “Kawngae leipaw te a ei khopaw minphuin kalan khe ninlang ka kuih ka dyng,” cite a ho.
Tuhte lanze, Pachia nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha ccaring vua vae tou? ka ci. Tuhte thua khyh! Pawccecize kae mah Israel lukheit nynh ka thua, Abraham ciihan, Benjamin phin nynh ka thua.

Pachia nynh phe a nyty vae paw a ccungccaw`ae kha ccaring vua khyh. Elijah konglang Ccathyaa nynh a hopaw kha na nyh khyh oh tou? Israel`ae te arawsekuh lante aning nynh Pachia kalan a ngiakupaw tuh pawtemacize,
“BAWIPAW, minmin nynh na profeh`ae kha phe theih`ae zah na silawhang`ae kha phya a ro vae`ae, te ka makhae nynh alaepaw ka um vae, te ka hiinnaw kha oun ccung`ae,” a ci.
Thuasalama Pachia nynh a kalan a khung paw tuh: “Baal pachia kalan ccukharutung lei`ae paw ccungccaw thungsari kha kamaw hanlan phang ka haangkuh bang ung,” a cipya.
Ou tuhhawte atu ccyh lya mah thawccinaw liate ponaw thyhte a po`ae paw alaepaw a um.

Te thawccinaw liate athua ze, ryalawnaw liate kharyh thua vae khyh; athua lanze thawccinaw tuh thawccinaw thua vae lan khyh. Thuasalama cyisahnaw liate athua lanze thawccinaw liate thua vae khyh; athua lanze cyisahnaw tuh cyisahnaw thua vae khyh.
Tuhte lanze pawcihtemou? Israel`ae nynh a ccung`ae paw kha mue khyh`ae, thuasalama po`ae paw nynh kha-e kha a mue`ae, te tuhlaepaw`ae tuh mih mit pung moh`ae.
Tuh-e tuh, “Mit`ae nynh ngawmuih khyh nawlan`ae, te nakaring`ae nynh nawthae khyh nawlan`ae Pachia nynh minmin kha ngawthuanawpaw muisaw kha a pya`ae, atunin cia,” cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
Te David nynh, “Mih ccaboi tuh mih hanlan kaang lang te tahphung lang tang sah, thykupawku nawlan te ccaeliaru nawlan tang sah.
Mih mit tuh ngawmuih kho lei lan moh sah lah mih ke tuh pei ky sah,” a ci.
Tuhte lanze Israel`ae tuh a khuliaku ccaw`ae cite phe thykuh`ae tou? ka ci. Tuhte thua khyh. Thuasalama minmin eiungnaw lang minmin cyiseimenaw liate khumnaw tuh Zenta`ae kalan yn thua vae.
Atu Israel`ae cyiseimenaw tuh laephipi hoirungnaw lang yn tang zah minmin nyaabungnaw tuh Zenta`ae hoirungnaw lang a tang ze, minmin ccingnaw tuh pawcihmou houh alung cih!
Tuhzemah kae tuh Zenta`ae locceihtu ka thua thyhhawte, ka ryalawnaw kha ka hothung zah Zenta`ae nanning kae hopya oh.
Ccangkhakheit te ka vaeccaw`ae kha mih lungthonaw ka rae zah minmin abang kha khumnaw ka ccousah bua ccaw`ae ci nynh thua.
Pawccecize minmin kha ccaring vuanawpaw tuh laephi ccungccaw`ae ccawkuthuinaw lang a tang ze, minmin kha bua lehkhannaw tuh a chih`ae paw kyate hiinthuinaw lang thua lan khyh tou?
Te masaty ccathae tuh athyaa ze vaepoi balyn mah athyaa cih; te atharui tuh athyaa ze aran`ae mah athyaa bua cih.
Te aran`ae abang kha khya`ae zah rangkaw e oliv thingku athua paw, nang kha minmin kya ae piade`ae zah aran`ae ryte pynkheihlan oliv thingku kya-e atharui te athotui kha na ccoubua lanze,
a khya`ae paw aran`ae tungvaw la ponuakuh nan, thuasalama na pooku lan thua ze, nang nynh atharui kha na phu khyh, thuasalama atharui nynh nynh nang kha ae phu.
Tuhte lanze nang nynh, “Kae kha yn piade nawlan`ae nynh aran`ae kha a khya`ae,” na ci ngaw rei.
Athua rou; zyn leinaw keiccuze minmin tuh khya`ae zah nang tuh zynnaw liate na thadyn. Tansakuh nan, rinaw palia kha hoi.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh a umty paw aran`ae hei kha a haang khyh lanze nang mah ae haanglae lan khyh.

Tukeiccu Pachia a hoynaw te phe ccihtheihpaw byapianaw kha dotua; a khuliakuh`ae paw tungvaw phe ccihtheihpaw byapianaw kha a thuasah, thuasalama nang tuh a hoynaw kya na tyn ze Pachia kya-e hoynaw kha na kalan a thuasah cih, tuhzemah a hoynaw kya na tyn khyh lanze nang mah thoh bae na thua cih.
Te minmin mah zyn leinaw kya pei a tyn khyh`ae ze piade bua athua cih`ae; pawccecize minmin kha bua piade lan Pachia tuh a cyih kho.

Pawccecize rangkaw amaw po lan popaw oliv thingku kyate nang kha thoh ae bae`ae zah ahoypaw oliv thingku kya athuanaw te accawkuh lei pite piade na thua lanze, a umtypaw aran`ae athua paw minmin kha mimaw oliv thingku kya houh piade thua lan khyh`ae tou?

Pawccecize uteno`ae, naemaw na tuakunaw oh kya na hawsaku khyh nawlan oh, Zenta`ae kya-e ccingnaw a tee makhia Israel`ae abang kya mohnaw tuh a thua, tuh-e mohnaw athua paw, hynh-e byakhupaw hynh ny leite na um lan oh paw kha ka ry khyh.
Tuhcihte azeiku hawte Israel`ae balyn tuh khumnaw mue cih`ae; “Zion mua kyate Luesatupaw yn thua cih zah aning nynh Pachia pawlangria leinaw kha Jakob ciihan`ae kyate a nuepah cih`ae.
Te mih seinaw`ae kha he ka lawpah`ae te hynhe tuh minmin hanlan kamaw byakin nynh athua,” cite azeikuh.
Thehoypaw te asekuh lante nanning keiccuze minmin tuh rhaw`ae nynh thua`ae, thuasalama Pachia ponaw te asekuh lante tuh minpaaw`ae keiccuze minmin tuh sungsah`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Pawccecize Pachia kya-e lasung`ae te Pachia konaw tuh rulae kho leipaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize langmaw lya nanning tuh Pachia kawngae lei`ae na la thua oh salamah atu tuh minmin kawngae leinaw liate ngaethya-umsanaw kha na ccou oh hawte,
tuhhawte nanning na ccou oh paw ngaethyaumsanaw liate minmin mah ngaethya-umsanaw a ccoubua nawlan`ae nynh minmin mah atu kawngae khyh`ae.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh ccungccaw balyn tungvaw kya ngaethya-umsanaw kha a hoi nawlan minmin balyn kha kawngae leinaw kya pung a khung`ae.
Pachia kya-e hawnaw te nynaw paryh tuh myarya khu zah eih ko kaesy ccarei! A byapianaw`ae tuh thaethya kho um khyh zah a ccianaw`ae tuh muih kho um khyh ccarei!
“Pawccecize BAWIPAW a tuanaw-thinlung kha hung nynh mou phe a nyh? Tukhyhze hungmou amaw khuakhankhaetu lang a tang boi?”
“Tukhyhze Pachia nynh bua a pyaru nawlan hung nynh mou amaw kha masaty a pya tou?”
Pawccecize pawpaw tynre balyn tuh amaw kyate, amaw liate, amaw hanlan nynh thua. Amaw kya phu-enaw zungzae umsah. Amen.

Tukeiccu uteno`ae, nae pyn kha ahiinpaw, athyaapaw te Pachia kalan douccahpaw silawku nawlan na pyaku nawlan oh Pachia kya-e ngaethya-umsanaw liate nanning kha kae ngia oh; tuh-e pyakupaw rya tuh nanning nynh na cyi lan oh accanpaw rya nynh thua.

Te nanning nynh hynh-e she kya-e muinsanke nan oh, thuasalama ahoypaw uccaw, ry lan um paw, accingpaw uccaw cihkuh`ae paw, Pachia rynaw tuh paw hynh nynh thua cipaw na langsaku thya nawlan oh, nae thinlung bua thawsanaw liate muinsan rulaekuh oh.

Pawccecize nanning laku ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw te amaw kha a tuaku lan accannaw laelan la tuakuh nan sah, thuasalama Pachia nynh milu raveih kha zynnaw tounawpaw a pya thyhte amaw kha kou ngaekuh lante a tuaku nawlan, ka mue paw thawccinaw liate nanning kha kae hopya oh.
Pawccecize aening nynh pyn pynkheit kya pyn kyae` ae patae ah hoi oh zah pyn kya-e`ae balyn tuh alokuhpaw ryalaw cci a hoi khyh`ae hawte,
tuhhawte patae cih`ae paw aening mah Kri kya pyn kheit ah thua oh zah lu raveihte pyn kya-e`ae nynh ah thua oh.
Tuhte aening yn pyapaw thawccinaw thyhte alokuh leipaw lasung`ae kha ah mue oh zah profehbyahonaw a mue paw nynh zynnaw a hoi zeihte profehbya ho sah.
Beiknaw ryalawnaw a mue paw nynh ryalawnaw kya tyn sah, te a ccangpatu nynh ccangpyanaw kya tyn sah,
a hytupaw nynh hynaw rya kha lah sah, a pyatupaw nynh hysanaw te pya sah, a uktupaw nynh zuakunaw te uk sah, ngaethya-umsanaw a langsatupaw nynh lungtua thawmuinte langsah sah.
Sungsakunaw kya tuh cyiruhnaw um nan sah. Athahpaw kha luathua-ae-ui lang ria oh lah ahoypaw kha varyn bekuh oh.
Uteno`ae, u te neitaw sasaw hawte lukheit te lukheit kha thawccikute sungsakuh oh; sawtuakunaw kya lukheit te lukheit sawtuakuh hua oh;
thawzung thuanaw kya thawnaw leite thinlung thanccingte Bawipaw rya kha lah oh;
ngaehoinaw kya lungtua oh; vawsawrunaw kya lungsae oh; sawsangnaw kya pei tyn oh;
mithyaa`ae kha mih hobounaw kya la bawngbua oh; mikhia dooihnaw kha kou hoy lante la rae oh.
Nanning ae tua ae sah oh paw kha hythuapya oh, hythuapya oh lah thyalaw nan oh.
Lungtua`ae paw ryte lungtuabua oh lah a rah`ae paw ryte la rah bua oh.
Lukheit te lukheit lunglokute la um oh. Tuanaw-thinlung kya tansakuh nan oh, thuasalama a nyaa`ae paw ryte vaeccawtang oh. Naemaw tuakunaw kya hawsakuh nan oh.
Hunghung sanmah athahpaw hanlan athahpaw te ccaeliaru nan oh, ccungccaw balyn mitmuihnaw kya ahoypaw uccaw tuanaw hoi oh.
Athua kho lanze, naemaw kya ccawkunaw a um thyhhawte, ccungccaw`ae balyn ryte ccawkute la um oh.

Sungsah`ae paw, naemaw nynh naemaw hanlan ccaeliaru nan oh, thuasalama Pachia thinrianaw hanlan nungpah oh, pawccecize Bawipaw nynh, “Ccaeliarunaw tuh kamaw kya-e, kamaw nynh ka liaru cih,” a ci cite azeikuh.
Tukeiccu, “Nang na rhawpaw kha a vuelaw ze looh la dang; a tuihaw ze nia lanpaw kha la pya; pawccecize tuhte na cyinaw kya nang nynh kha-e paw lu vawlan maee-e`ae kha na pungpah cih.”
Athahpaw khate la taesakuh nan, thuasalama athahpaw kha ahoypaw te la tae.
Uknaw lante kawhoi`ae paw kalan ccungccaw miakaw nynh kawngae`ae sah. Pawccecize Pachia kyate laelan tuh kawhoinaw cipaw um khyh, kawhoinaw`ae tuh Pachia nynh khang paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu hunghung zemah kawhoinaw kha a rawsepaw tuh Pachia khangnaw kha a rawsepaw nynh thua, te tuhte a rawsepaw tuh mimaw tungvaw seibyapianaw a ing cih`ae.

Pawccecize uktu`ae tuh ahoypaw ryalah`ae paw hanlan ri lanpaw thua khyh, thuasalama ahoy leipaw ryalah`ae paw nynh a ri lan`ae paw nynh thua. Kawhoi`ae paw kha ri leite tou na um ry? Ahoypaw rya kha lah lah kawhoinaw kyate thehoysanaw kha na ccou cih.

Pawccecize aning tuh nang na hoynaw hanlan Pachia kya-e ryalahtu nynh thua. Thuasalama ahoy leipaw rya na law ze la rih; pawccecize aning tuh thaloi kha alakaw lang ccyng khyh; pawccecize ccungccaw tungvaw thinrianaw thuakhae zah ccaeliarutupaw Pachia kya-e ryalahtu nynh thua.
Tukeiccuze thinrianaw keiccu kyalya nanning nynh kaw na ngae lan oh paw thua khyh, thuasalama ahmaw te ahmaw nykunaw thinlung keiccu mah kaw na ngae lanpaw nynh thua.
Hynh keiccuze nanning mah ngunto pya oh, pawccecize uktu`ae tuh Pachia ryalahtu`ae thua`ae zah hynh-e mih ryalaw hanlan mimaw kha pei pyakuh`ae paw nynh thua.

Tukeiccu ccungccaw miakaw kha mue lan a ccan`ae thyhte la pya oh; ngunto accanpaw kha ngunto pya oh; ngunkhoi accanpaw kha ngunkhoi pya oh, rawri lan accanpaw kha rawrih oh; sawtua lan accanpaw kha sawtua oh.
Lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lanpaw laelan hung kalan sanmah laeba um nan oh; pawccecize mingccangpaw a sungsahpaw ccungccaw tuh Kawbya kha phe a ccingsah vae.

Pawccecize, “Milae zu la seikhae nan,” “Ccungccaw la theih nan,” “La ruh nan,” “Ahme leipaw ccaekia la khan nan,” “Milae uccaw la dua nan,” cikuh paw laelan ccangpaw kawpyapaw a um lan zemah, “Na innpaw kha namaw na sungsaku hawte la sungsah,” cikuh paw hynh-e kawpyapaw nynh marya a khung.
Sungsakunaw nynh tuh a innpaw kya ahoy leipaw rae boi khyh. Tukeiccu sungsakunaw tuh Kawbya ccingnaw nynh thua.
Te, accyh kha nybiate, atu tuh inaw kyate tho ccyh phe zaw vae; pawccecize aening ah zyn lya oh laeze khumnaw tuh atu nynh aening kalan anaeku hua.
Khuazi tuh vyavya thang zah khuadae thua lan cih vae, tukeiccu aening nynh mohnaw ryalaw`ae kha vua ccavae oh sih lah awnaw rhawuccaw kha lawkuh ccavae oh sih.
Zu-ae hoysanaw, ruinaw, ohhuakurynaw, ccouseikunaw, ziakubuakunaw, te eiungkunaw, hynh-e`ae kya um leite, ninthu ccyh hawte aening nynh kou ngaekuh lante hiin oh sih.
Thuasalama Bawipaw Jesu Kri khate ccaankuh oh lah pynsaw ryduanaw ccingsah khylan pynsaw hanlan uapah nan oh.
Zynnaw kya thawzyapaw ccungccaw kha lehkhan oh, thuasalama lunghiin lan um paw eikunaw kha raekhae nan oh.
Pawccecize aepaw miakaw tuh ae lan accan cite lukheit nynh a zyn, thuasalama thawzyapaw nynh tuh enaw-ekan rou kha a ae.
Marya a ae paw nynh a ae leipaw kha dothatheih nan sah, te a ae leipaw nynh a ae paw kha byapia nan sah, pawccecize Pachia nynh kha-e paw kha lehkhan vae paw nynh thua.

Ming`ae seepaw kha byapiatupaw nang tuh hungmou na thua? Aning tuh a thadyn zemah amaw a bawipaw hanlan, a khuliaku zemah amaw a bawipaw hanlan khaw. Athua, aning tuh thadynsah athua cih, pawccecize Pachia nynh aning kha a thadynsah kho.
Ccungccaw lukheit nynh nin kheit tuh ccangpaw nin laeze asunghua cite a tua, mingccangpaw nynh nin miakaw tuh phe lokuh lante a tua. Ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw thinlung kya phe ccaesakuh sah.

Ninsaw kha a sung paw ccungccaw tuh Bawipaw maedote nynh a sung, ninsaw kha a sung leipaw ccungccaw mah Bawipaw maedote nynh a sung khyh; a ae paw ccungccaw mah Bawipaw maedote nynh a ae, pawccecize Pachia kalan lungtuabya a ho; te a ae leipaw ccungccaw mah Bawipaw maedote ae khyh zah Pachia kalan lungtuabya a ho.
Pawccecize aening kyaze hung sanmah amaw hanlan kyalya a hiinpaw um khyh, hung sanmah amaw hanlan chih khyh.

Pawccecize aening tuh ah hiin oh zemah Bawipaw hanlan nynh ah hiin oh; ah chi oh zemah Bawipaw hanlan nynh ah chi oh; tukeiccu ah hiin oh zemah, ah chi oh zemah aening tuh Bawipaw kya-e nynh ah thua oh.
Pawccecize Kri tuh a chihpaw te a hiinpaw paryh Bawipaw lang a tang ccaw cite chih zah a thothui, te a hiin.
Thuasalama pawccemou nang nynh na uno kha bya na pia? Pawccemou na uno kha pawlangria leite na um? Pawccecize aening balyn tuh Kri a byapianaw tungkhung malang pung ah thadyn cih oh paw nynh thua.
Pawccecize, “BAWIPAW nynh ka hiin thyhhawte ka malang ccungccaw miakaw ccukharutung cih`ae zah mimaw mih lae te Pachia kalan ccaekiakhan cih`ae a ci,” cite azeikuh.
Tukeiccu aening luraveih tuh ahmaw cyisahnaw ccazing thyhte Pachia kalan ah thuakhae cih oh.

Tukeiccu aening lukheit te lukheit kharyh byapiakuh nan vae oh sih, thuasalama hynhte palia bya la pae oh; hung nynh sanmah a uno ccianaw kya thykupawkunaw, tukhyhze khuliasakunaw kha nungkhaw nan sah.
Pawpaw aepaw sanmah huataw tetuh thu khyh cipaw kae nynh Bawipaw Jesu liate ka zynkuh zah ka ny; thuasalama ccangkhakheit kha thyaa khyh cite a tua paw ccungccaw hanlan tuh kha-e kha a hanlan athu.
Thuasalama na uno tuh na aepaw keiccu a thinlungcci lanze nang tuh sungsakunaw thyhte na hiin khyh. Kri nynh a hanlan a chipya paw kha nang nynh na aepaw te la roh nan.
Ou tuhte nae kya-e ahoypaw kha athahpaw hawte thethya la hosah nan`ae.
Pawccecize Pachia peenaw tuh aepaw te niapaw kya um khyh, thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw kya dingnaw, daenaw te lungpawnaw kya nynh a um.
Pawccecize hynhcihte Kri rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia malang douccah zah ccungccaw`ae nynh nawccawkhae`ae paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu daenaw a thuasah paw te lukheit te lukheit thawzung lang tangsah paw uccaw`ae kha aening nynh deesui oh sih.
Pachia ryalaw kha aepaw keiccuze roh nan. Aepaw balyn tuh athyaa ccaccing; thuasalama ming`ae khuliasaku nawlan te a ae paw ccungccaw hanlan tuh ahoy leipaw nynh thua.
Na uno a khuliasakuhpaw, a maeleihsakuhpaw, te a thawzyasahpaw athua zetuh, saw ae paw te misutui nia paw mah ae khyh ze, nia khyh ze, pawpaw san cyi khyh ze nynh ahoy.
Zynnaw na hoi tou? Na hoi ze Pachia malang namaw hanlan hoi. Amaw nynh a cyi paw kya amaw te amaw kha seibekuh khyh zah lungccingkhaekuhpaw ccungccaw tuh lungtua paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama lunghiinnaw a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh a ae lanze, zynnaw leite a ae keiccu seibe athua; pawccecize zynnaw leite cyipaw miakaw tuh seinaw nynh thua.
Oute thawsae`ae paw aening nynh thawzya`ae paw kya-e thawzyanaw kha ah ngaesang oh aho, ahmaw te ahmaw lungrythuasaku lanpaw thua khyh.
Aening luraveih nynh ah innpawpaw hoynaw hanlan, tynsathung nawlan aning kha lungrythuasah oh sih.
Pawccecize Kri nynh heize amaw lungrythuasakuh khyh. Thuasalama, “Nang ae sarya`ae paw kya-e saryanaw bya`ae tuh kae ka tungvaw kya nynh accaw,” cite azeiku hawte nynh athua.
Pawccecize Ccathyaa kya a um paw ngaesangnaw te ngaengannaw liate aening nynh ngaehoinaw ah hoi nawlan oh langmaw lya-e azeikuh paw miakaw tuh aening thuiheinaw hanlan nynh zei athua.
Ngaesangnaw te ngaengansahnaw Pachia nynh Kri Jesu rynaw thyhte lukheit te lukheit lunglokunaw ae pya vae oh sah.
Ou tuhte nanning nynh ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw athua paw Pachia ccaccei kha lunglokute pynkheihlan roisaw te phu na esah nawlan oh nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Kri nynh mah Pachia kya-e phu-enaw kalan aening kha leh oun khan hawte nanning mah lukheit te lukheit lehkhankuh oh.
Atu Jesu Kri tuh Pachia kya-e byaccing liate minpaaw`ae kalan pyapaw byakinpyakupaw`ae kha ccingsah khylan, vindung awkuh`ae paw kya-e ryalahtu nynh thua cite ka ho.

Te Zenta`ae nynh Pachia ngaethya-umsanaw hanlan Pachia kha phu-esah nawlan`ae nynh thua; tuh thyhhawte, “Hynh-e keiccu Zenta`ae laku nang kha kae thehoysah cih zah na min kya law ka sah cih,” cite azeiku hawte.
Te, “Zenta`ae nanning, amaw ccungccaw`ae ryte lungtua oh,” cite bua a ho.
Te, “Zenta`ae, nanning balyn BAWIPAW kha thehoysah oh, nanning ccungccaw`ae balyn amaw kha thehoysah oh,” bua a cikuh.
Te Isaiah nynh, “Jessi kya-e atharui yn pou cih zah Zenta`ae kha uk khylan yn langkuh cih paw, amaw kha Zenta`ae nynh a ngaehoikuh cih`ae,” bua a ci.
Atu nanning nynh Thyaa Muisaw thungnaw liate, ngaehoinaw kya phe na bia nawlan oh, ngaehoinaw Pachia nynh lungtuanaw te phe ae biasah oh sah lah zynnaw kya daenaw te ae la biasah oh sah.
Te ka uno`ae, nanning tuh hoynaw te phe na beih oh, nynaw balynte phe na beih oh zah lukheit te lukheit na thuiheikuh kho oh cipaw nanning konglang kae mah phe ka nyh ccaccing.
Tuhzemah uteno`ae Pachia nynh kae yn pya paw thawccinaw liate nanning kha tuasah thui khylan houh rawhoy te nae kalan ccaw kae zei paw tuh,
Thyaa Muisaw liate thyaasah athua paw, Zenta`ae kya-e silawkunaw tuh douccaw nawlan, kae tuh Pachia thehoypaw rya kha lawbiate, Zenta`ae hanlan Jesu Kri ryalahtu ka thua nawlan nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Pachia kalan te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kya Kri Jesu liate kae ka pookunaw lanpaw a um.
Pawccecize Zenta`ae nynh bya te thuasah, cyisahnaw te thuasah kawngae nawlan`ae, Kri nynh muihsanaw te khuaruarunaw`ae kha kae ka kyate a cyi paw laelan, pawsang mah ka ho ngan khyh.
Pachia Muisaw thungnaw liate nynh kae tuh Jerusalem kyate tho zah Ilyrikam ram pepan kyacia Kri thehoypaw kha phe ccing lang ka ho.
Ccangpaw ccungccaw nynh bing zah a thonaw tungvaw kae nynh ka sak khyh nawlan, Kri min a phy boi leinaw`ae hmin kya thehoypaw bya ho lan thawte ka zuakuh.
Thuasalama, “Amaw konglang a hopya lei`ae paw ccungccaw`ae nynh a muih cih`ae zah a thae lei`ae paw nynh a thaethya cih`ae,” cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
Hynh keiccu nanning kalan ccia lanpaw yn khaw paw patae a um.
Thuasalama atu tuh hynh-e hmin`ae kya ryalawnaw kaw ka hoi vae khyh zah nanning kalan ccia lan kou ka ry paw mah kum patae aro vae hawte,

Spain ram lang khua he kae ccung vae ze nanning kalan kae cceih cih; pawccecize ka khuaccungnaw kya nanning kha kae muih cih oh. Te nanning ryte sosoh ah umkheih oh koute, nanning nynh tuh-e kalan bua nae saw cih oh cite ka ngaehoi.
Thuasalama atu tuh mithyaa`ae ryalawpya khylan Jerusalem lang ka la cceih cih.
Pawccecize Mesidonia ram e ccungccaw`ae te Akhai ram e ccungccaw`ae tuh Jerusalem kya um`ae paw mithyaa`ae laku ryachi`ae paw hanlan neethungbuanaw kha rae`ae zah mih lungrythuakhaekuh.

Minmin tuh tuhte a cyi`ae paw kya mih lungrythua ccaccing, te minmin tuh Jew`ae kalan lae um`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Pawccecize Zenta`ae nynh Jew`ae kya-e muisaw uccaw`ae kha a ccoubua`ae ze pynsaw uccaw`ae kya mah Jew`ae hanlan a cyipya`ae aho.
Tukeiccu hynh-e rya hynh he ka thangsah zah a hlu`ae paw kha he ka ccysya koute, nanning kalan te Spain ram lang kae cceih cih.
Te nanning kalan he kae thua vae ze, Kri thehoypaw te asekuhpaw hythuanaw phe beihpaw ryte nynh kae thua cih cipaw ka ny.
Atu uteno`ae ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate, Muisaw sungsanaw liate nanning nynh kamaw ryte pynkheihlan sawsangnaw kya na zuakuh oh zah kamaw hanlan Pachia kalan saw na sang nawlan oh kae ngia oh;
ou tuhte Judah pee kya-e kawngae lei`ae paw kyate kae ka lue nawlan, te Jerusalem khuapi hanlan ka hoi paw ka ryalaw kha mithyaa`ae nynh oun lawpyaku nawlan`ae nynh thua;
Pachia rynaw thyhte lungtuanaw ryte nanning kalan kae thua nawlan, te nanning ryte bua ka lungpaw nawlan sawsang oh.
Daenaw Pachia tuh nanning balyn ryte atu la um sah. Amen.
Kenkhrea khua kya a um paw kriccawbu kya-e ryalawpatu nung athua paw, kaening ccianung Fibi kha nanning kalan kae nynh kae sawpya oh.

Pawtecize mithyaa`ae nynh cyi lan angaekuh hawte nanning nynh amaw kha Bawipaw kya leh la khan oh lah bawngnaw ahobounaw miakaw kya nanning kyate la bawng oh, pawccecize aning tuh ccungccaw patae bawngtu te kamaw mah yn bawngtu nynh thua.
Kri Jesu kya kamaw yn bawngtu`ae Prisilla te Akuila kha la beihlang oh.
Minmin tuh kamaw hiinnaw hanlan mimaw mih nging kha a pyakuh`ae paw nynh thua; minmin kalan kae kyalya nynh lungtuabya ka ho khyh, Zenta kriccawbu`ae balyn nynh mah lungtuabya ho`ae.
Mih inn kya um paw kriccawbu kha mah la beihlang oh. Akhai ram kyate Kri kalan masaty athae athua paw ka sungsahpaw Epainetan kha la beihlang oh.
Kaening tungvaw ryalaw myarya oun lawpah paw Meri kha la beihlang oh.
Kamaw ryte thungccah`ae paw kamaw vaeccaw`ae athua paw Andronikan te Junia kha la beihlang oh. Minmin tuh locceihtu`ae laku minthaan`ae paw nynh thua`ae, kamaw laeze Kri kya umty paw mah athua`ae.
Bawipaw kya ka sungsahpaw Ampliatan kha la beihlang oh.
Kaening ry Kri kya ryalahtu, Urbanan te ka sungsahpaw Stakhung kha la beihlang oh.
Kri kya nawccawkhaepaw Apelen kha la beihlang oh. Aristobulo innbyn`ae kha la beihlang oh.
Ka vaeccaw athua paw Herodia kha la beihlang oh. Bawipaw kya um`ae paw Narkissu innbyn`ae kha la beihlang oh.
Bawipaw kya a ryalah`ae paw Trufaena te Trufosa kha la beihlang oh. Bawipaw kya thawte ryalah paw, sungsahpaw Persida kha la beihlang oh.
Bawipaw kya popaw Rufas te a nung athua paw ka nung kha la beihlang oh.
Asukrito, Flegon, Herme, Patroba, Herme, te minmin ryte um`ae paw uteno`ae kha la beihlang oh.
Filoloko te Julia, Neria te a ccianung, te Olumpa te minmin ryte um`ae paw mithyaa`ae balyn kha la beihlang oh.
Athyaapaw myngkunaw te lukheit te lukheit la beihkuh oh. Kri kya-e kriccawbu`ae balyn nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
Uteno`ae nanning nynh na ccangku vae oh paw doctrine te arawsekuh lante, bu phianaw te seimenaw a thuasah paw ccungccaw`ae kha na syntaw nawlan oh atu kae ngia oh; te minmin kha la sibia oh.

Pawccecize khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae tuh ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri rya kha lah khyh`ae, thuasalama mimaw vuebua hanlan nynh a law`ae; ahoypaw bya`ae te anepaw bya`ae khate ccungccahoy`ae thinlung kha a ling he`ae.

Pawccecize nae kawngaenaw tuh ccungccaw balyn kalan po athaan. Tukeiccu nanning hanlan ka lungtua, thuasalama nanning nynh ahoypaw kya nae lunghaw nawlan te ahoy leipaw kya seinaw hoi lei`ae paw na thua nawlan oh ka ry.
Te daenaw Pachia nynh aro maw Setan kha nae ccu kaw yn miade cih. Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nanning kya la um sah. Amen.
Kamaw ry rya kae lahkheihpaw Timote, te Lukia, te Jason te Sawsipater te ka vaeccaw`ae nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
Hynh-e ccaky a zeitupaw kae, Terti nynh Bawipaw kya nanning kha kae beihlang oh.
Kamaw thuasah, kriccawbu khaleih thuasah mikhia dooihtu Kaias nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh. Khuapi suaccytu Erastas te nae uno Kuartas nynh ae beihlang oh.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nanning balyn kya la um sah. Amen.

Laephipi thotakaw te thuru athua paw, thuasalama atu langsaku athua vae paw, akhupaw kya-e byaphy thyhte, zungzae tynpaw Pachia kya-e kawpyapaw thyhte, profeh`ae kya-e Ccathyaa`ae liate, zynnaw te asekuhpaw kawngaenaw hanlan minphuin`ae balyn kha phe nysah athua vae thyhte Jesu Kri kong phunghonaw te kamaw nynh ka hopaw thehoypaw thyhte nanning kha ae tynsah kho oh paw,
amaw makhae kyalya ahawpaw Pachia tuh Jesu Kri liate zungzae cia phu-esah. Amen.
Pachia rynaw liate Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu cite ko athua paw Paul te ka unopaw Sosthene nynh,

Korin khuapi kya a um paw kriccawbu kalan te Kri Jesu kya thyaasah athua paw, mithyaa`ae cite ko athua`ae paw kalan te ahmin takyh kya Jesu Kri min a ko`ae paw balyn kalan ccaw kae ky oh. Jesu Kri tuh minmin Bawipaw te aening Bawipaw paryh athua.
Ah Paaw Pachia kyate, Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae tungvaw la um vae sah!
Jesu Kri liate nanning pya athua paw Pachia thawccinaw hanlan, nanning liate ka Pachia kalan zungzae lungtuabya ka ho.
Kri kya-e ccaekia tuh nanning kya tynsah athua thyhhawte, nanning tuh amaw liate pawpaw kya balyn, ho khonaw kya balyn, nynaw kya balyn hoirungsah na thua oh.
Tukeiccu nanning tuh ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thua lanpaw kha ngaehoite phang na ngaw lya oh lasung na shung oh paw um khyh.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri nin kya nanning tuh ccaenaw na hoi khyh nawlan oh amaw nynh nanning kha athangnaw cia ae tynsah cih oh.
Pachia tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua. Amaw liate nynh nanning tuh a Ccapaw, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e vaeccawkunaw kalan ko na thua oh.

Uteno`ae, nanning laku phiakunaw a um khyh nawlan, nanning balyn nynh phe alokuhpaw bya na ho nawlan oh; thuasalama alokuhpaw thinlung kya, te alokuhpaw tuanaw kya pynkheihlan phe na ccing nawlan oh, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min liate nanning kha kae ngia oh.
Pawccecize, ka uno`ae nanning laku eikunaw a um cite Khaloi innbyn`ae kyate nanning konglang kamaw kalan phe yn thaesah vae`ae.

Atu nanning lu raveih nynh, “Kae tuh Paul zuitu nynh ka thua,” “Kae tuh Apollos zuitu nynh ka thua,” “Kae tuh Sefas zuitu nynh ka thua,” “Kae tuh Kri zuitu nynh ka thua,” na ci oh pawte nynh e hynh ka ho.
Kri tuh a phiakuh tou? Paul tuh nanning hanlan khiade`ae ta? Tukhyhze Paul min kya nanning baptisma na in oh tou?
Krispas te Kaias laelan nanning kyaze hung sanmah baptisma kae insah khyh oh pawte Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
Tukhyh lanze Paul nynh amaw min kya baptisma a insah cite a ho paw a um sei cih.
Te Stefanas innbyn`aekheih baptisma ka insah`ae, tuhlaelan mingccang`ae baptisma ka insah paw hung sanmah ka nyh khyh.

Pawccecize Kri nynh kae hynh baptisma-insah khylan yn saw khyh, thuasalama thehoypaw ho khylan nynh yn saw. Tuhzemah Kri a vaelantung tuh paw ccungkia leipaw athua khyh nawlan hawnaw bya`ae te yn hosah khyh.
Pawccecize vaelantung kong phunghopaw tuh aroh`ae paw hanlan ngaeenaw bya nynh thua, thuasalama khum athua`ae paw aening hanlan hynh-e tuh Pachia kya-e thungnaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize, “Ahaw`ae paw hawnaw kha ka roh cih zah a thaethya`ae paw thaethyanaw kha accakaepaw lang ka tangsah cih,” cite azeikuh.
Ahawpaw tuh teisangmou a um? Kawbya ccangpatu tuh teisangmou a um? Hynh-e she kya-e bya a eikuh khopaw tuh teisangmou a um? Pachia nynh hynh-e laephipi kya-e hawnaw tuh ngaeenaw lang rae khyh tou?
Pawccecize tuhkoute Pachia kya-e hawnaw kya, laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh hawnaw liate Pachia kha nyh khyh`ae, phunghopaw kya-e ngaeenaw liate a zyn`ae paw ccungccaw`ae kha khum lan Pachia a lungrythua.
Pawccecize Jew`ae nynh muihsanaw a ngia`ae, te Greek`ae nynh hawnaw kha a ccung`ae.
Thuasalama kaening tuh a khiade`ae paw Kri kha nynh kae ho, tuh-e tuh Jew`ae hanlan thykupawkunaw thua zah Zenta`ae hanlan ngaeenaw nynh thua.
Thuasalama ko`ae paw Jew`ae te Greek`ae paryh hanlan Kri tuh Pachia kya-e thungnaw, te Pachia kya-e hawnaw nynh thua.
Pawkeiccumacize Pachia kya-e ngaeenaw tuh ccungccaw`ae hawnaw laeze ahawhua, te Pachia kya-e nyaanaw tuh ccungccaw`ae thawsaenaw laeze a thawsaehua.
Pawccecize uteno`ae, nanning konawpaw konglang hynh tuaku tua oh; pynsaw lante ahawpaw ccungccaw`ae patae, athungpaw ccungccaw`ae patae, sawtua`ae paw patae tuh ko thuabua khyh`ae.
Thuasalama Pachia nynh ahawpaw maethyasah khylan laephipi kyaze angaeepaw uccaw`ae kha a po`ae, te Pachia nynh athungpaw maethyasah khylan laephipi kyaze anyaapaw uccaw`ae kha a po`ae.
Te a um paw uccaw`ae hynh accakaepaw lang tangsah khylan, Pachia nynh laephipi kyaze pawlang um leipaw uccaw`ae, pawlangria lei`ae paw, te a um leipaw uccaw`ae kha a po`ae.
Ou tuhte amaw malang hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah a pooku khyh nawlan.
Thuasalama amaw liate nynh nanning tuh Kri Jesu kya na um oh. Kri amaw tuh aening hanlan hawnaw, dingnaw, thyaasahnaw te sawkhaw nawlan Pachia nynh phe a rae vae.
Ou tuhte, “A pookuh paw ccungccaw tuh BAWIPAW kyakhe pookuh sah,” cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
Te uteno`ae kae nynh nae kalan kae thua lya, Pachia kya-e ccaekia nanning kae hopya oh lyakha, myarya byahothyanaw te, hawnaw te, kae thua khyh.
Pawccecize Jesu Kri te amaw tuh a khiade`ae cipaw laelan, nanning laku pawsang mah ny vae lei lante bya phe ka pae vae.
Te kae tuh nanning ryte ka um lyakha, nyaanaw te, rinaw te, myarya thyngkunaw te nynh ka um.

Te nae zynnaw tuh ccungccaw`ae hawnaw kya athua khyh nawlan, thuasalama Pachia kya-e thungnaw kya athua nawlan, ka byaho te ka phungho tuh ccungccaw hawnaw te asekuhpaw soihnawpaw bya`ae khate thua khyh, thuasalama Muisaw kya-e langsakunaw kya te thungnaw kya-e nynh thua.

Tuhzemah piccang athua vae`ae paw laku kaening nynh hawnaw bya kha nynh kae ho. Tuhzemah hynh-e she kya-e hawnaw kha thua khyh, accakaepaw lang a tang`ae paw hynh-e she kya-e bawi`ae hawnaw kha mah thua khyh.
Thuasalama byakhupaw kya-e Pachia hawnaw kha nynh kae ho, tuh-e tuh laephipi a um maw, aening phu-enaw hanlan Pachia nynh phe a paccynde vae paw thuru athua paw hawnaw kha nynh thua.
Tuh-e hawnaw tuh hynh-e she kya-e uktu`ae hung nynh sanmah nyh khyh`ae, phe a la ny`ae thua ze, phu-enaw Bawipaw kha minmin nynh a la khiade cih lei`ae paw.
Thuasalama, “Pachia nynh amaw a sungsah`ae paw hanlan a paccynpaw uccaw`ae kha mit nynh muih khyh, nakaring nynh thae khyh, ccungccaw thinlung lungkhu lang mah tee khyh,” cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
Thuasalama Pachia nynh khae` ae kha amaw Muisaw liate aening kalan phe yn phypya vae. Pawccecize Muisaw nynh tuh pawpaw balyn kha marya a zaah, athua, Pachia kya-e byakhupaw kha mah phe a zaah.
Pawccecize ccungccaw uccaw`ae kha ccungccaw kya a um paw ccungccaw muisaw laelan hung nynh mou a nyh? Tuhhawte Pachia uccaw`ae kha Pachia Muisaw laelan hung nynh san nyh khyh.
Atu Pachia nynh alakaw te oun pya paw uccaw`ae kha ah ny nawlan oh aening nynh laephipi kya-e muisaw kha ah mue khyh oh, thuasalama Pachia kyate yn thua paw Muisaw kha nynh ah mue oh.
Tuh-e uccaw`ae tuh mah ccungccaw hawnaw nynh ccangpyapaw bya`ae te kae ho khyh, thuasalama Thyaa Muisaw nynh ccangpyapaw bya thyhte, muisaw uccaw`ae kha muisaw bya te khingkhia te nynh kae ho.

Thuasalama laephi ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia kya-e Muisaw uccaw`ae kha mue khyh; pawccecize kha-e paw hanlan kha-e uccaw`ae tuh ngaeenaw nynh thua. Kha-e uccaw`ae kha ny mah nyh kho khyh, pawccemacize kha-e uccaw`ae tuh muisaw lante nynh phiathya athua.
Thuasalama muisaw ccungccaw nynh tuh pawpaw balyn kha akaw-aleih byakhia kho, tuhzemah amaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san akawaleih byakhia kho khyh.
Pawccecize, “Bawipaw kha a thuihei nawlan, hung ccungccaw nynh mou BAWIPAW thinlung kha a nyh?” Thuasalama aening tuh Kri thinlung kha ah hoi oh.
Te uteno`ae, kae nynh nanning kha muisaw ccungccaw`ae hawte kae hopah kho khyh oh, thuasalama pynsaw ccungccaw`ae hawte, Kri kya imua taraw`ae kalan hopya hawte nynh kae hopya oh.
Nanning kha samatei te nynh kae kua oh, looh tangpaw kae dang khyh oh; pawccecize atu cia kha-e kha na ae kho khyh oh, atu mah na ae kho la khyh oh.

Pawccecize nanning tuh pynsaw ccungccaw`ae nynh na thua ung oh. Pawccecize nanning laku eiungkunaw, peku maekunaw, te phiakunaw`ae phang a um paw tuh pynsaw ccungccaw`ae na thua khyh oh tou? Laephi ccungccaw`ae hawte khaw na umbua oh?
Pawccecize lukheit nynh, “Kae tuh Paul zuitu nynh ka thua,” ci zah mingccangpaw nynh, “Kae tuh Apollos zuitu nynh ka thua,” a ci; tuhte na ci oh paw tuh pynsaw ccungccaw`ae na thua khyh oh tou te?
Paul tuh hungmou athua? Apollos tuh hungmou athua? Bawipaw nynh ccungccaw miakaw kha a pya thyhhawte, kaening tuh nanning kha zynnaw kalan ae thuakhae oh paw Pachia ryalahtu`ae nynh kae thua.
Kae nynh ka lin, Apollos nynh tuibu, thuasalama Pachia nynh a lesahthung.
Tukeiccu a lintupaw hynh pawsang thua khyh, tuibupaw mah pawsang thua khyh, thuasalama a lesathungtupaw Pachia rou nynh a cyih kho.
Atu a lintupaw te tuibupaw tuh pynkheihpaw nynh thua, te milu raveih nynh amaw a ryalawnaw thyhte a ryalaw mee kha a mue cih.
Pawccecize kaening tuh Pachia ryte pynkheihlan ryalahtu`ae nynh kae thua, nanning tuh Pachia loo nynh na thua oh, te Pachia kya-e sak paw inn nynh na thua oh.

Kamaw pya athua paw Pachia thawccinaw thyhte, ahawpaw innsakthya paw inn saktu lukheit hawte kae nynh innthonaw kha phe ka bing vae. Te mingccangpaw nynh kha-e vawlan a sak. Thuasalama kha-e vawlan pawcihte nynh ka sak cipaw ccungccaw miakaw nynh raeringkuh sah.
Pawccecize Jesu Kri athua paw, phe abingkuh vae paw innthonaw laelan ccangpaw innthonaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah bing kho vae khyh.
Atu lukhakheit nynh kha-e innthonaw vawlan khe sui te, phua te, aphutepaw lung`ae te, thing te, lonuaku te, ccatanphue te a sak lanze;

milu raveih ryalaw tuh ccaerarihlan alangkuh cih; pawccecize tuh-e Nin nynh kha-e kha pung a langsakuh cih. Pawkeiccumacize kha-e kha maee te langsaku athua cih; te milu raveih ryalaw kha pawtahawpaw ryalaw nynh thua cipaw maee nynh a syntaw cih.
Lukhakheit nynh kha-e innthonaw vawlan a sak paw a ryalaw tuh atyn lanze, aning tuh ryalaw mee a mue cih.
Lukhakheit ryalaw tuh maee nynh phe a u lanze, aning tuh phe a shung cih; thuasalama maee kyate lue hawte amaw te amaw tuh khum athua cih.
Nanning tuh Pachia kya-e tempal na thua oh paw te Pachia Muisaw nanning kya a um paw kha na nyh khyh oh tou?
Lukhakheit nynh Pachia kya-e tempal kha a nungsisaku lanze, khe-e paw kha Pachia nynh a roh cih. Pawccecize Pachia kya-e tempal tuh athyaa; tuh-e tempal tuh nanning nynh na thua oh.
Hung nynh sanmah amaw te amaw kha lingkuh nan sah. Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh hynh-e she kya ka haw cite a tuaku lanze, aning tuh ahaw ccaw, angaeepaw lang tangsah.
Pawccecize hynh-e laephipi kya-e hawnaw tuh Pachia malang ngaeenawpaw nynh thua. Pawccecize, “Pachia nynh ahaw`ae paw kha mimaw thyaruhnaw kyakhe a kyng`ae,” cite azeikuh.
Te, “Ahaw`ae paw mih tuanaw tuh pawlang um khyh cipaw BAWIPAW nynh a ny,” cite bua azeikuh.
Tukeiccu hung nynh san ccungccaw`ae kya pookuh nan sah. Pawccecize pawpaw balyn tuh nae kya-e nynh thua.

Paul athua zemah, Apollos athua zemah, Sefas athua zemah, laephipi athua zemah, hiinnaw athua zemah, chinaw athua zemah, a um paw uccaw`ae athua zemah, oun thua vae cih paw uccaw`ae athua zemah, pawpaw balyn tuh nae kya-e nynh thua.
Te nanning tuh Kri kya-e nynh na thua oh; te Kri tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Kri kya-e ryalawpatu`ae te Pachia byakhupaw`ae synriatu`ae hawte ccungccaw nynh kaening hynh yn tua sah.
Tuhlaeze synriatu`ae kya e hynh aho, synriatu tuh zyn lan um paw athua cih.

Thuasalama nanning nynh bya nae pia lan oh paw, tukhyhze ccungccaw byapianaw nynh bya yn pia lanpaw tuh ka hanlan myarya adihpaw uccaw nynh thua. Thanccingte, kae nynh kamaw te kamaw hei bya ka piakuh khyh.
Pawccecize kamaw te kamaw arawsepaw pawsang ka nyh khyh, tuhzemah kae tuh tuh-e liate thyaa ka ccou khyh; thuasalama kae yn sihseitupaw tuh Bawipaw nynh thua.

Tukeiccu mohnaw kya-e thurupaw uccaw`ae kha awnaw kalan a thuakhae cih paw te thinlung kya-e tuakunaw`ae a langsakuh cih paw Bawipaw yn thua mawlaezung accyh azaw maw pawsang byapia nan oh. Oute ccungccaw miakaw nynh Pachia kyate thehoysanaw kha a ccou cih`ae.

Uteno`ae, azeikuh paw Ccathyaa kha alue lante tua khyh nawlan kaening kya na ccangku nawlan oh, nanning kyaze hung nynh sanmah mingccangpaw kha rawsete lukheit hanlan a pooku khyh nawlan, nanning hanlan nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh kamaw kalan te Apollos kalan tousenaw lante ka paleih.
Pawccecize mingccangpaw te alokuh lei lante nang kha hung nynh mou ae rae? Te na mue leipaw na hoi paw pawmou a um? Te na mue lan thua ze, na mue leipaw olante pawccemou na poku?

Atu nanning tuh phe beih lang na hoi vae oh! Na hoirung vae oh! Kaening kae um khyh lya siapharan`ae hawte na uk oh; kaening mah nanning ryte kae uk bua nawlan, nanning nynh phe la uk ccaccing oh lah ci ka ry.

Pawccecize chia lan seibe`ae paw ccungccaw`ae hawte kaening locceihtu`ae hynh nyathyakou Pachia nynh phe oun langsaku vae cite nynh ka tua. Pawccecize kaening tuh laephipi kalan, vaaw ccungccaw`ae kalan te ccungccaw`ae kalan nuinthua lan um paw dopaw nynh kae thua.

Kaening tuh Kri keiccuze mingaee`ae nynh kae thua, thuasalama nanning tuh Kri kya ahawpaw nynh na thua oh. Kaening tuh anyaa`ae paw nynh kae thua, thuasalama nanning tuh nae thawsae. Nanning tuh sawtua lan um paw nynh na thua oh, thuasalama kaening tuh dothatheih paw nynh kae thua.
Atu ccyh cia hei kaening tuh kae vuelaw, kae tuihaw, kae uccaw apue, oun zia oun bua`ae zah inn leite nynh kae um.
Kaemaw kae kuih`ae te thawte rya kae lah. Oun sang oun ruin vae`ae ze hythua kae pya`ae; oun tua oun sah vae`ae ze phang kae ngaesang.
Thethya oun ccousah`ae ze kae soihbiaku`ae. Kaening tuh laephipi kya-e athu-anangpaw hawte thuasah, pawpaw balyn kya-e athupaw`ae hawte thuasah atu cia kae thua.
Hynh-e`ae hynh nanning maethyasah khylan ka zei khyh, thuasalama ka sungsahpaw ccaaw`ae hawte raeringkunaw nynh kae pya oh.
Pawccecize Kri kya ccangpatu`ae thung haw na hoi oh zemah paaw`ae patae na hoi khyh oh; pawccecize thehoypaw liate Kri Jesu kya nanning kha kae nynh phe kae saah vae oh.
Tukeiccu kamaw hynh oun dosuinkuh oh cite nanning kha kae ngia oh.

Hynh-e keiccu nynh Bawipaw kya zyn lan um paw, ka sungsahpaw ka ccapaw Timote kha nanning kalan kae saw. Teiteikya balyn kriccawbu takyh kya ka ccangpya hawte, Kri kya ka hiinzia kha aning nynh ae la liathuisah cih oh.
Kae tuh nanning kalan kae thua vae lei lanpaw olante abang nynh tua`ae zah a tansaku`ae.
Thuasalama Bawipaw nynh a ry ze nae kalan taloi kae thua cih. Te a tansakuh`ae paw bya kha ka nypah lan khyh`ae, thuasalama mih thungnaw kha nynh ka nyh cih.
Pawccecize Pachia peenaw tuh bya kya um khyh, thuasalama thungnaw kya nynh a um.
Pawmou na ry oh? Nae kalan tungbang te tou kae thua cih? Tukhyhze sungsakunaw te, nebaleihpaw thinlung te tou kae thua cih?
Nanning laku ohhuakunaw a um cite ccungccung athaan. Ccungccaw lukheit nynh a paaw zu a umkhae cipaw, tuhtahawpaw ohhuakunaw tuh Zenta`ae laku heize thae boi lan um khyh.
Te nanning nynh na tansakuh oh zah khate a cyih paw ccungccaw kha nanning laku kyate dae dee athua nawlan, na rah na khui khyh oh.
Pawccecize kae tuh pynsaw lante nanning ryte ka um khyh zemah muisaw lante ka um, nanning ryte ka um paw hawte, kha-e cyisahnaw a cyih paw kha-e paw kha bya phe ka pia vae.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min kya nanning pynkheihlan he na sueluakuh vae oh ze, kae ka muisaw a umbua, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri thungnaw liate,
kha-e paw a muisaw tuh Bawipaw Jesu nin kya khum athua nawlan, a pynsaw tuh ro athua ccaw amaw kha Setan kalan ah oh cite bya ka pia.
Nanning na pooku oh paw tuh hoy khyh. Ccapyhtaripaw ransi nynh vaepoi khaleih a thosah cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou?

Tukeiccu nanning tuh ransi py leipaw na thua oh hawte, athawpaw vaepoi na thua nawlan oh, arynpaw ransi kha marya cciccae oh. Pawccecize aening Kawtaw Poi athua paw Kri tuh aening hanlan silawnaw phe thua vae.
Tukeiccu arynpaw ransi ryte thua leite, athah-aruhpaw te ahoy leipaw ransi ryte thua leite, thuasalama thinlung thanccingte, byaccing te ransi py leipaw poi kha tua oh sih.
Ka ccaky kya a ohhuakuh`ae paw ryte na mungku khyh nawlan oh nae kalan phe ka zei vae.

Tuhzemah hynh-e laephipi kya-e a ohhuakuh`ae paw ry, akarangkuh`ae paw ry, ccungccaw a luade`ae paw ry, zohtuhbeik`ae paw ryte kharyh na umkheih ngaw khyh oh cite ka hory paw thua khyh. Tuhte ka ho lanze nanning tuh laephipi kyate na pou oh aho vae cih.

Thuasalama atu uno cite ko athua paw lukhakheit tuh a ohhuakuhpaw, tukhyhze a karangkuhpaw, tukhyhze zohtuhbeikpaw, tukhyhze ccungccaw a sang a ruinpaw, tukhyhze aruipaw, tukhyhze ccungccaw a luadepaw athua ze, khahtahawpaw ccungccaw ryte na mungkuh lan khyh oh, ae mah na aekheih lan khyh oh cite kae nynh nae kalan phe ka zei vae.
Atolang e ccungccaw`ae kha mah byapia lanpaw tuh kae nynh pawmou ka se? Alungkhu e ccungccaw`ae kha nanning nynh bya na pia khyh oh tou?
Thuasalama atolang-e ccungccaw`ae kha Pachia nynh byapia cih`ae. Tukeiccu kha-e ccungccahoy leipaw kha naemaw laku kyate dae dee oh.
Nanning lukheit te lukheit byathan na hoi vae oh ze mithyaa`ae malang thuakhaeku leite ading lei`ae paw malang thuakhaeku lan hungmou a zynkuhpaw a um?
Laephipi hynh mithyaa`ae nynh byapia cih`ae cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou? Te laephipi tuh nanning nynh bya na pia cih oh athua lanze, adih huapaw byathan`ae kha byapia lan na ccan khyh oh tou?
Vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha aening nynh byapia lan cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou? Hynh-e hiinnaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kha pawcihmou byapia lan houh ah ccan oh?
Tuhte hynh-e hiinnaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kha byapia lanpaw na hoi oh ze, kriccawbu kya pawlang um hua lei`ae paw kha byapia lan la khang oh.
Nae maethya ccaw cite nynh tuhte ka ho. Nanning laku ahawpaw ccungccaw lukheit san um khyh tou? A uteno`ae laku byapia kho lanpaw lukheit san um khyh tou?
Thuasalama uteno nynh uteno kha zyn leitu`ae malang a thuakhae ccarei!

Tukeiccu atu nanning nynh lukheit te lukheit byapiaku lan na cciakhaeku oh paw tuh phe na cyisei mawrou oh. Pawccemou cyiseinaw kha na ua paleih khyh oh? Pawccemou hyngpyakupaw kha nanning nynh na teing paleih khyh oh?
Thua khyh, naemaw mah na cyihsei oh zah ming`ae kha na hyngpya oh, te nae uno`ae kalan khate na cyi oh.

Ading leipaw ccungccaw`ae tuh Pachia peenaw kha rhoccou lan khyh`ae cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou? Lingsakuh nan oh. A ohhuakuh`ae paw, zohtuhbeik`ae paw, milae zu milae vawpaw a seikhae`ae paw, nopi lang raekute a sei`ae paw, pise te pise a sei`ae paw,
miruh`ae, a karangkuh`ae paw, a rui`ae paw, ccungccaw a sang a ruin`ae paw, ccungccaw a luade`ae paw mah Pachia peenaw rhoccou lan khyh`ae.

Te nanning kyaze abang tuh khatahaw`ae paw nynh na la thua oh. Thuasalama atu Bawipaw Jesu min kya te ah Pachia kya-e Muisaw liate nanning tuh singpya na thua vae oh, thyaasah na thua vae oh zah thyaaccou na thua vae oh.
Pawpaw balyn tuh ka hanlan cyi kho athua, thuasalama pawpaw balyn tuh marya athane paw thua khyh. Pawpaw balyn tuh ka hanlan cyi kho athua, thuasalama ccangkhakheit thungnaw zakaw ka um sae lan khyh.

Aepaw tuh vue hanlan thua zah vue tuh aepaw hanlan nynh thua. Thuasalama Pachia nynh kha-e`ae kha paryh mawte a roh cih. Atu pyn tuh ohhuakunaw hanlan thua khyh, thuasalama Bawipaw hanlan nynh thua, te Bawipaw tuh pyn hanlan nynh thua.
Te Pachia nynh Bawipaw kha a thosah, te aening kha mah amaw kya-e thungnaw liate oun thosah bua cih.
Nae pyn tuh Kri pyn kya-e`ae nynh thua cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou? Oute Kri pyn kya-e`ae kha ka laah cih zah ohhuanung pyn kya-e`ae lang ka rae cih tou? Tuhte ccei soh.
Pawte? Ohhuanung te a kyngkuh paw tuh tuh-e nung ryte pyn kheit nynh athua vae`ae cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou? Pawccecize Pachia nynh, “Minmin luning tuh ngesaw kheit lang a tang cih`ae,” a ci.
Thuasalama Bawipaw te a kyngkuh paw tuh amaw ryte muisaw ccangkheit nynh athua vae`ae.
Ohhuakunaw kha ccuetaw oh. Ccungccaw nynh a cyi paw seinaw miakaw tuh pyn atolang e nynh thua, thuasalama ohhuakunaw a rae paw tuh amaw a pyn kha rawsete a seipaw nynh thua.
Pawte? Nae pyn tuh Pachia kyate na mue oh paw nae kya a um paw Thyaa Muisaw tempal nynh thua cipaw, te nanning tuh naemaw kya-e na thua khyh oh cipaw hynh na nyh khyh oh tou?
Pawccecize nanning tuh amee te re paw nynh na thua oh. Tukeiccu Pachia kya-e athua paw nae pyn kya thuasah, nae muisaw kya thuasah Pachia kha phu-esah oh.
Atu nanning nynh kamaw kalan nae zei oh paw uccaw te asekuh lante: Pise nynh nopi tung leipaw tuh ahoypaw nynh thua.
Tuhzemah, ohhuakunaw kha sibia khylan pise miakaw nynh amaw zuhoi sah lah nopi miakaw nynh amaw vawpaw hoi sah.
Vawpaw nynh a zu nynh accanpaw rynawpaw kha langsapah sah; tuhhawte zu nynh mah vawpaw kha cyipah sah.
Zu nynh amaw pyn kya kawhoinaw hoi khyh, thuasalama vawpaw nynh a hoi. Tuhhawte vawpaw nynh mah amaw pyn kya kawhoinaw hoi khyh, thuasalama zu nynh a hoi.

Nanning nynh naemaw te naemaw kha loohaesungnaw kalan te sawsangnaw kalan na pyaku nawlan oh, ccyh sosoh nawccawpaw kya laelan, lukheit te lukheit kangkuh nan oh; te nanning na sungku kho leinaw oh keiccu Setan nynh ae tuh-ou khyh nawlan oh pynkheihlan bua um oh.
Thuasalama hynh-e hynh kawpyapaw liate thua leite, akhue-ua paw liate nynh ka ho.

Pawccecize pise`ae balyn tuh kamaw hawte thua`ae sah ci ka ry. Thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw nynh, Pachia nynh pya paw, amaw lasung a hoi. Lukheit nynh hynhtahawpaw lasung hoi zah mingccangpaw nynh khahtahawpaw a hoi.
Tukeiccu zu vawpaw a hoi lei`ae paw kalan te numae`ae kalan kae nynh ka ho paw tuh: Kae hawte minmin nynh a um`ae zetuh mih hanlan ahoy.
Thuasalama minmin nynh a sungku kho khyh`ae ze, zu vawpaw hoi`ae sah; pawccecize sahpaw eih ry te phang um paw lae tuh zu vawpaw hoi paw ahoyhua.
Te zu vawpaw a hoi`ae paw kalan kae nynh kaw ka pya`ae, tuhzemah kae ka thua khyh, thuasalama Bawipaw nynh kawpya`ae: Zu nynh a vawpaw kha poutaw nan sah.
Thuasalama aning nynh a poutaw lanze vawpaw hoi leite um sah, tukhyhze a vawpaw te bua ccawkuhthui`ae sah. Te vawpaw nynh a zu kha maah nan sah.

Thuasalama mingccang`ae kalan, Bawipaw nynh thua leite, kae nynh ka hopaw tuh: Uno lukhakheit nynh a zyn leipaw zuhoi zah kha-e a zu nynh a vawpaw ryte umkheih lan a ry ze, aning nynh a zu kha maah nan sah.
Tuhhawte nopi lukheit nynh a zyn leipaw vawpaw hoi zah kha-e a vawpaw nynh a zu ryte umkheih lan a ry ze, aning nynh a vawpaw kha maah nan sah.
Pawccecize a zyn leipaw vawpaw tuh zu liate thyaasah thua zah a zyn leipaw zu tuh vawpaw liate thyaasah athua. Tukhyh lanze nae ccaaw`ae tuh thyaa lan khyh`ae, thuasalama atu minmin tuh athyaa`ae.

Thuasalama a zyn leipaw nynh a poutaw ze, pou ccaleih sah. Rae lukheit, khyh ze ccia lukheit tuh tuhtahawpaw kya seetangnaw zakaw um lanpaw thua khyh. Thuasalama Pachia nynh aening tuh daenaw kalan nynh yn ko.
Pawccecize, Pou zu, na vawpaw kha nang nynh na khum cih, na khum lan khyh cipaw pawtemou na ny? Tukhyhze, Pou vawpaw, na zu kha nang nynh na khum cih, na khum lan khyh cipaw pawtemou na ny?
Thuasalama Pachia nynh ccungccaw miakaw kha a neethung thyhhawte, Bawipaw nynh ccungccaw miakaw kha a ko thyhhawte, aning nynh tuhte um sah. Te kriccawbu`ae balyn kha kae nynh tuhte kaw ka pya.
Vindung awkuh paw kha ko paw a um zaw? Vindung awkuh leipaw lang tang nan sah. Vindung awkuh leipaw kha ko paw a um zaw? Vindung awkuh paw lang tang nan sah.
Vindung awkupaw paw ccungkia khyh zah vindung awku leipaw mah paw ccungkia khyh. Thuasalama Pachia kya-e kawpyapaw`ae zui paw nynh azici.
Ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw konaw kya, kha-e konaw kyakhe khamawte po tyn sah.
Nang tuh see phang na thua pite ko na thua tou? Kha-e hanlan na thinphang nan sah; thuasalama nang tuh luesah kho na thua ze, kha-e luenaw kha mangkuh.
Pawccecize, Bawipaw kya ko athua paw ccungccaw tuh see mang athua pite Bawipaw kya-e a luepaw ccungccaw nynh thua. Tuhhawte ko athua paw ccungccaw mah mang alue pite Kri kya-e see nynh thua.
Nanning tuh amee te re vae paw nynh na thua oh; ccungccaw`ae see lang tang nan vae oh.
Uteno`ae, ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw konaw, kha-e kyakhe Pachia ryte po um sah.
Atu zu, vawpaw a hoi lei`ae paw te asekuh lante Bawipaw kya-e kawpyapaw ka hoi khyh; tuhzemah kae tuh Bawipaw a ngaethya-umsanaw kya zyn lan um paw lukheit ka thua hawte tuanaw kae pya oh.
Tuhte atu lya-e vawsawnaw keiccuze pise lukheit nynh tuhmawte po a um lanze, tuh-e tuh ahoypaw nynh thua cite ka tua.
Nang tuh zu te hede na thua tou? Suku lan ccungkuh nan. Nang tuh zu kyate supya na thua tou? Zu kha ccungkuh nan vae.

Thuasalama nang tuh zu na hoi lanze, na sei khyh; te liaccady nynh vawpaw a hoi ze, aning tuh sei khyh. Tuhzemah khate zu, vawpaw a hoi paw tuh pynsaw kya vawsawnaw a tung cih`ae, thuasalama nanning kha kae haang ry oh.
Thuasalama uteno`ae, e hynh kae hopya oh, accyh tuh adyn vae; tukeiccu atu te vae tuh zu a hoi`ae paw nynh zu a hoi lei`ae paw hawte um`ae sah;
a rah`ae paw nynh a rah lei`ae paw hawte, te lungtua`ae paw nynh lungtua lei`ae paw hawte, te uccaw a re`ae paw nynh a hoi lei`ae paw hawte;
te hynh-e laephipi a mang`ae paw nynh alue lan a mang lei`ae paw hawte um`ae sah; pawccecize hynh-e laephipi muinsan tuh azo avae cciamang.
Thuasalama nanning tuh lungriathae leite na um lan oh ka ry. Zuhoi leipaw nynh tuh Bawipaw hynh pawtemou a lungry ka tung cih cite Bawipaw te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kha nynh a tua.
Thuasalama zuhoi paw nynh tuh a zu kha pawtemou a lungry ka tung cih cite laephi uccaw`ae kong kha nynh a tua.

Vawpaw a hoi paw te liaccady laku mah alaenaw a um. Vawpaw a hoi leipaw nopi nynh tuh a pyn kya te a muisaw kya athyaa nawlan Bawipaw kya-e uccaw`ae kha nynh a tua. Thuasalama vawpaw a hoi paw nopi nynh tuh pawtemou ka vawpaw a lungry ka tung cih cite laephi uccaw`ae kong kha nynh a tua.

Te hynhte ka hopaw tuh nanning kha khia kya kae saw oh ccaw cite thua khyh, nae hanlan athane nawlan nynh ka ho. Te kou angaekuh lante na um nawlan oh te lungronaw um leite nanning nynh Bawipaw kha rya na lawpya nawlan oh nynh hynhte ka ho.

Thuasalama pisepaw lukhakheit nynh a liaccanung tungvaw dohoy lei lante nynh ka um cite a tuaku ze, tuh-e nung a liaccawnaw kum tuh alia vae lanze, vawpaw hoi aho vae thua ze, a ry hawte cyih sah. Aning tuh sei khyh; minmin tuh zuvaw lang tang`ae sah.

Tuhzemah a thinlung kya varyn atynpaw, zuhoi hosah leite, amaw rynaw tungvaw kaw hoi zah a ccangvaethuanaw kha tuhte po tynsah lan cite a thinlung kya phe a tuakuh paw ccungccaw tuh kou hoy lang nynh a cyi.
Tukeiccu zuhoi paw ccungccaw tuh kou hoy lang nynh a cyi. Thuasalama zuhoi leipaw ccungccaw tuh houh hoy lang nynh a cyi.
Zu tuh a vawpaw a hiin lungkhu balyn kawbya liate hede athua. Thuasalama a vawpaw tuh a chi lanze, amaw nynh a ry paw pise zu lang tang khylan, Bawipaw kya kyalya nynh aning tuh alue.
Thuasalama aning tuh vawpaw hoi leite khamawte a um lanze a lungtua huapaw nynh thua cite nynh ka tua. Te kae mah Pachia kya-e Muisaw ka hoi cite ka tuakuh.
Atu zohtuh`ae kalan pyapawuccaw` ae konglang te, aening balyn nynaw ah hoi oh cipaw ah ny oh. Nynaw tuh a tansakuh, thuasalama sungsakunaw nynh thawzung atynsah.
Te lukhakheit nynh ccangkhakheit ka nyh cite a tuaku lanze, ny lan accan hawte pawsang nyh loh khyh.
Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh Pachia kha a sungsah lanze kha-e paw tuh Pachia nynh a ny paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu zohtuh kalan silawnaw`ae paw uccaw`ae aenaw konglang te, laephipi kya zohtuh tuh pawsang thua khyh cipaw te Pachia ccangkheit laelan ccangpaw um lae vae khyh cipaw kha ah ny oh.
Pawccecize (pachia`ae patae te bawi`ae patae a um paw hawte), vaawran kya thuasah, laephi vawlan thuasah pachia`ae a ci`ae paw a la um heize mah,

aening hanlan tuh Paaw, Pachia ccangkheit rou nynh a um. Amaw kyate nynh pawpaw balyn tuh a um, te aening tuh amaw hanlan nynh thua. Te Bawipaw lukheit Jesu Kri rou nynh um. Amaw liate nynh pawpaw balyn tuh a um, aening mah amaw liate nynh ah um oh.

Tuhzemah tuh-e nynaw tuh ccungccaw miakaw kya um khyh. Abang ccungccaw nynh zohtuh nynawpaw thinlung te atu cia zohtuh kalan pyapaw kha a ae`ae. Te mimaw nykunawpaw thinlung tuh a thawzya keiccu a nungsisakuh`ae.
Thuasalama aepaw nynh aening hynh Pachia malang maehoy yn pya khyh. Pawccecize ah ae oh zemah houh ahoyhua lae khyh oh; ah ae khyh oh zemah houh athah-aruhhua lae khyh oh.
Thuasalama nanning kya-e hynh-e luenawpaw kha thawzya`ae paw hanlan thypawku nawlan a tang khyh nawlan la raeringkuh oh.

Pawccecize nynaw mang na hoi paw nang nynh zohtuh nungnaw kya aepaw na koih paw kha lukhakheit nynh ae muih lanze, amaw nykunawpaw thinlung thawzyapaw ccungccaw nynh zohtuh`ae kalan pyapawuccaw` ae kha ae lan a rawthung lan khyh tou?
Te na nynaw keiccuze, Kri nynh a hanlan a chipya paw, thawzyapaw uno tuh arohhang cih tou?
Thuasalama nanning nynh uteno`ae kha rawsete tuhte he na sei oh tuh, thawzyapaw mimaw nykunawpaw thinlung kha vaemaw na muesah oh, tetuh Kri rawsete na sei vae oh.
Tukeiccu, aepaw nynh ka uno kha a maeleihsaku lanze, ka uno kha ka maeleihsaku khyh nawlan saw kharyh ka ae boi vae lan khyh.
Kae tuh locceihtu ka thua khyh tou? Kae tuh a luepaw ka thua khyh tou? Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha kae nynh phe ka muih khyh tou? Nanning tuh Bawipaw kya ka ryalaw na thua khyh oh tou?

Kae tuh mingccang`ae kalan locceihtu ka thua khyh zemah, lunghiinnaw um leite nanning kalan locceihtu ka thua. Pawccecize nanning tuh Bawipaw kya kae locceihtu ka thuanawpaw syntawnaw nynh na thua oh.
Kamaw hynh akaw-aleih bya oun khia`ae paw kalan ka khungnaw`ae paw bya tuh hynhte nynh thua:
Kaening tuh ae lan, nia lan kaw kae hoi khyh tou?
Ccangpaw locceihtu`ae hawte, Bawipaw a neitaw`ae te Sefas hawte, kaening so a zyn paw zu lukheit hoeiku bua lan kaw kae hoibua khyh tou?
Tukhyhze Barnabas te kae kyalya tou ryalaw law leite um lan kaw kae hoibua khyh?
Hungmou amaw kya-e thangkute rhawkaw rya a lah paw a um? Hungmou misu khokhu ccou zah kha-e athae ae leite a um? Tukhyhze hungmou tuuphu kha ring zah tuu matei kha nia leite a um?
Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh ccungccaw huataw lukheit hawte tou kae nynh hung ka ho? Tukhyhze tuh-e hawte kawbya nynh soh ho bua khyh tou?
Pawccecize Mawsi Kawbya kya hynhte azeikuh, “Ccatan a tin paw tangnuapaw`ae mung kha na baccyh lan khyh,” acikuh. Pachia nynh tangnuapaw`ae kha tuapah tou?

Tukhyhze kha-e kha aening hanlan balyn so Pachia nynh ho ta? Lunghiinnaw hoi leite aening hanlan nynh aho. Leithue paw ccungccaw nynh ngaehoinaw te a thue nawlan, te ngaehoinaw te ccatan tin paw nynh a ngaehoinaw kha a muebua paw athua nawlan nynh hynh-e tuh azeiku.
Kaening nynh muisaw uccaw`ae kha nanning kya phe kae ccou zah nae kya-e pynsaw uccaw`ae kha kae rue lanze, alepaw uccaw thua zaw?

Mingccang`ae nynh nanning tungvaw kha-e kaw kha a muebua`ae ze, kaening tuh houh muebua lan kae ccan khyh tou? Tuhzemah kaening tuh kha-e kaw kha kae mang khyh; thuasalama Kri thehoypaw kha phang kae khaw sei khyh nawlan pawpaw balyn kha phang kae ngaesang.
Athyaapaw uccaw`ae hanlan ryalah`ae paw tuh tempal voidu kya-e kha nynh a ae`ae cipaw, te silawhang kya ryalah`ae paw tuh silawhang kya-e kha nynh a ccoubua`ae cipaw kha na nyh khyh oh tou?
Ou tuhhawte thehoypaw a ho`ae paw tuh thehoypaw honaw kyate nynh a hiin cih`ae cite Bawipaw nynh kaw phe a pya vae.

Thuasalama hynh-e`ae hynh kharyh ka mang khyh, kamaw hynh tuhte nae cyipya oh ccaw cite mah hynh-e`ae kong hynh ka zei khyh. Pawccecize ka pookunawpaw kha lukhakheit nynh accakaepaw lan a tangsah lae tuh ka chi lanze ka hanlan ahoyhua.

Pawccecize thehoypaw kha ka ho zemah pooku lanpaw pawsang ka hoi khyh. Pawccecize cyi lan ahopaw kha ka tungvaw kya khang athua. Athua, thehoypaw kha ka ho khyh lanze, kae tuh pawcih ngaethya lan um paw pei ka thua cih!
Pawccecize kae nynh e rya hynh lungthote ka law ze, ryalaw mee ka hoi; thuasalama ka rynaw kha rawsete ka law lanze, kae tuh yn zyn zah synriatu ryalaw yn ah paw nynh thua.

Tuhte lanze ka ryalaw mee tuh pawmou? Thehoypaw he ka ho vae ze, Kri thehoypaw kha amee ho leite ka ho nawlan, thehoypaw honaw kya ka kawhoinaw kha alue lante ka mang khyh nawlan ka law paw kha nynh thua.
Pawccecize kae tuh ccungccaw balyn kyate ka lue zemah ccungccaw`ae kha houh ka mue nawlan, ccungccaw balyn hanlan kamaw te kamaw kha see lang nynh ka raekuh.

Te Jew`ae kha ka mue`ae ccaw cite Jew`ae kya kae tuh Jew paw lukheit hawte nynh ka thua; Kawbya zakaw um`ae paw kha ka mue`ae ccaw cite Kawbya zakaw um`ae paw kya kae tuh Kawbya zakaw um paw hawte nynh ka thua.

(Pachia malang kawbya leite a um leipaw, Kri malang kawbya zakaw um paw ka thua zemah), kawbya leite um`ae paw kha ka mue nawlan, kawbya leite um`ae paw kya kae tuh kawbya leite um paw hawte nynh ka um.
Thawzya`ae paw kha ka mue nawlan, thawzya`ae paw kya kae tuh thawzyapaw hawte nynh ka um. Ccungccaw abang kha aphuinphuin te ka khum ccaw cite ccungccaw balyn hanlan kae tuh atyn-are nynh ka thua.
Nanning ryte thehoypaw a neethungkuh bua paw ka thua nawlan, thehoypaw khylan nynh tuhte kae nynh ka cyi.
Ccuetaekunaw kya a ccue`ae paw tuh mih balynte nynh a ccue`ae, thuasalama lukheit nynh tae mee lasung kha a mue cipaw na nyh khyh oh tou? Na muebua nawlan oh ou tuhte ccuebua oh.

Taekunaw kya a taekuh bua paw miakaw nynh tuh tynre balyn kya a sungkuh. Anaanarohthyapaw haetapaw lukhung mue khylan nynh khate a cyi`ae. Thuasalama aening tuh anaanarohthya leipaw lukhung mue khylan nynh thua.
Tukeiccu kae ka ccuebua, hung ka ccue huataw khyh; kae ka thungkuh bua, khivae athungpaw hawte ka thung khyh.
Thuasalama mingccang`ae kha ka hopah`ae koute, kamaw tuh dae a nue`ae paw ka thuasei khyh nawlan, ka pyn hynh ka reihkuh zah ka taekuh.
Tuhlaeze uteno`ae, ah minpaaw`ae balyn tuh maeking kaw la um`ae zah mih balynte rili kha po la zua`ae,
maeking kya te rili kya mih balynte Mawsi kya baptismain` ae,
mih balynte phinkheitpaw muisaw looh kha la ae`ae,

mih balynte phinkheitpaw muisaw tui kha a la neih`ae cipaw kha ny leite na um lan oh paw ka ry khyh. Pawccecize minmin nuhlang te azuikuh paw kha-e muisaw Lungpi kyate a pou paw muisaw tui kha nynh a nia`ae, te tuh-e Lungpi tuh Kri nynh thua.
Thuasalama minmin kyaze alunghua tungvaw kya Pachia a lungrythua khyh, tukeiccu mih rhua`ae tuh rangkaw kya phiariphiarae pung a um.
Minmin nynh ahoy leipaw uccaw`ae kha a dua`ae hawte aening nynh ah dua khyh nawlan oh, atu hynh-e`ae tuh aening hanlan dosuinku lanpaw nynh thua`ae.
“Ccungccaw`ae tuh ae lan te nia lan dahung`ae zah zue khylan bua a thokuh`ae,” cite azeikuh hawte; minmin abang tuh zohtuhbeik`ae paw athua`ae hawte nanning thuabua nan oh.
Minmin abang tuh ohhuakunaw rae`ae zah nin kheit lungkhu thungkuin thungthung phe khuliakuh`ae zah a chi`ae hawte, aening tuh ohhuakunaw rae nan oh sih.
Minmin abang nynh Pachia syntaw`ae zah fupaw nynh phe a ro`ae hawte, aening tuh Kri kha syntaw nan oh sih.
Minmin abang nynh ccae-ihccaethua-um`ae zah a rohtupaw nynh phe a ro`ae hawte, nanning tuh ccae-ihccaethua umbua nan oh.
Aening dosuinku lanpaw lang nynh hynh-e`ae balyn tuh minmin kya acyikuh. She athangnaw nynh a thuanua paw aening thuiheinaw hanlan nynh kha-e`ae tuh zei athua.
Tukeiccu ka thadyn cite a tuakuh paw nynh tuh a khuliaku sei khyh nawlan raeringkuh sah.

Ccungccaw nynh a tung he paw tuh-ounaw rou kha nynh na tungbua oh. Thuasalama Pachia tuh zyn lan um paw athua thyhhawte, na taening lei oh paw tuh-ounaw kha nae kya thuasah lan khyh. Thuasalama na teing kho nawlan oh tuh-ounaw ryte poutawnawpaw laanpi kha mah amaw nynh ae raepah cih oh.
Tukeiccu ka sungsah`ae, zohtuhbeik paw kha ccuetaw oh.
Ahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kalan ho hawte nynh kae hopya oh. Ka hopaw hynh nanning nynh la tuasekuh oh.
Hythua ah pya oh paw hythuanaw banang tuh Kri chii kya-e zerya mangnaw kha thua khyh tou? Ah ia oh paw sanlou tuh Kri pyn kya-e zerya mangnaw kha thua khyh tou?
Pawccecize aening tuh patae ah ci oh zemah sanlou phe kheit te pyn pynkheit nynh ah thua oh; pawccecize aening balyn tuh kha-e sanlou phe kheitpaw kha nynh ah mangkheih oh.
Pynsaw lante Israel athua`ae paw kha dotua oh; silawnaw`ae paw a ae`ae paw minmin tuh silawhang kya-e a neethungkuh bua`ae paw thua khyh`ae tou?
Tuhte lanze ka hory paw tuh pawmou? Zohtuh tuh ccangkhakheit nynh thua ka ci tou? Tukhyhze zohtuh kalan pyapaw tuh ccangkhakheit nynh thua ka ci tou?
Thuasalama Zenta`ae nynh silawnaw`ae paw tuh Pachia kalan thua leite raerangsaro`ae kalan nynh silaw`ae cipaw kha nynh thua. Te raerangsaro`ae ryte vaeccawtangnaw na hoi lan oh paw kha ka ry khyh.
Bawipaw kya-e banang te raerangsaro`ae banang kha na neih kho khyh oh; Bawipaw kya-e ccaboi te raerangsaro`ae kya-e ccaboi kha na mangkheih kho khyh oh.
Bawipaw kha a thinriasah lan aening nynh ah hy ry oh tou? Aening tuh amaw laeze ah thawsaehua tou?
Pawpaw balyn tuh ka hanlan cyi kho athua, thuasalama pawpaw balyn tuh marya athanepaw thua khyh; pawpaw balyn tuh ka hanlan cyi kho athua, thuasalama pawpaw balyn nynh tynsahthung khyh.
Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah amaw hanlan ccungkuh nan sah; thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw nynh mingccang`ae hoy nawlan ccung sah.
