Ahmaw nykunaw thinlung keiccu byakhia leite, saw zuanaw kya a zua`ae paw miakaw kha ae oh;
pawccecize, “Laephi te kha-e kya um`ae paw balyn tuh BAWIPAW kya-e nynh thua.”
A zyn lei`ae paw lukhakheit nynh nanning kha ae kobua oh zah ccia lan na ry oh ze, ahmaw nykunaw thinlung keiccu byakhia leite nae malang a nya`ae paw miakaw kha ae oh.

Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh, “E tuh zohtuh`ae kalan pyapaw nynh thua,” cite ae hopya oh ze, khate ae hopah paw keiccu te ahmaw nykunaw thinlung keiccu kha-e kha ae nan oh; pawccecize, “Laephi te kha-e kya um`ae paw balyn tuh BAWIPAW kya-e nynh thua.”

“Ahmaw nykunaw thinlung,” ka cipaw hynh namaw kya-e kha ka hory paw thua khyh, thuasalama mingccang`ae kya-e kha nynh ka hory. Pawccemou ccungccaw ccangpaw kya-e nykunaw thinlung nynh kamaw ka luenaw kha bya yn pia lanpaw tuh?
Thuasalama lungtuabya hote ka ae lanze, lungtuabya hote ka mang paw kha-e keiccu pawccemou kae tuh thethya oun ho`ae?
Tukeiccu na ae oh zemah thuasah, na nia oh zemah thuasah, pawpaw na cyi oh zemah, pawpaw balyn tuh Pachia phu-e nawlan cyih oh.
Jew`ae kha thuasah, Greek`ae kha thuasah, Pachia kriccawbu kha thuasah lungrosanaw pya nan oh.
Ccungccaw`ae nynh khumnaw a muebua`ae ccaw cite, kae nynh kamaw elan amia ccungku leite, ccungccaw patae elan amia ka ccung zah pawpaw kya balyn ccungccaw balyn lung ka hoysah hawte, cyih bua oh.
Kae nynh Kri kha ka dosuinku hawte nanning mah kamaw hynh oun dosuinkuh oh.
Uteno`ae, nanning nynh pawpaw kya balyn kamaw kha nae liathui oh zah nanning kalan kae ahpya oh paw thyhhawte phungzae`ae kha na zui oh pawte kae thehoysah oh.
Thuasalama pise miakaw lu tuh Kri thua zah nopi lu tuh pise nynh thua cipaw te Kri lu tuh Pachia nynh thua cipaw kha kae nysah ry oh.
Pise miakaw nynh a lu phang bongkute sawsang ze thuasah, profehbyaho ze thuasah, amaw a lu kha thethyasah paw nynh thua.

Thuasalama nopi miakaw nynh a lu bongku leite sawsang ze thuasah, profehbya ho ze thuasah, amaw a lu kha thethyasah paw nynh thua; pawccecize tuhte a cyi lanze aning tuh a lu phe naepaw te nynh aloku.
Pawccecize nopi nynh a lu kha a bongku khyh ze, a sang ngokuh sah; thuasalama nopi lukheit hanlan sang ngokupaw, lu naekupaw tuh maethya lan um ze, a lu kha bongkuh sah.
Pise tuh Pachia kya-e muinsan te a phuenaw athua keiccuze a lu bongku lan ccan ccaccing khyh. Thuasalama nopi tuh pise kya-e phu-enaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize pise tuh nopi kyate thua khyh; thuasalama nopi tuh pise kyate nynh thua.
Pise tuh nopi hanlan rae paw mah thua khyh; thuasalama nopi tuh pise hanlan rae paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu vaaw ccungccaw`ae keiccuze nopi nynh amaw a lu vawlan kawhoinaw syntawnaw a hoi aho.
Tuhzemah Bawipaw kya nopi leite pise um khyh, pise leite nopi mah um khyh.
Pawccecize nopi tuh pise kyate athua hawte, pise mah nopi liate nynh a um; thuasalama pawpaw balyn tuh Pachia kyate nynh thua.
Nopi lukheit nynh lu bongku leite Pachia kalan sawsangpaw tuh angaekuh tou, ngaekuh khyh tou? Naemaw te naemaw va tuasekuh oh.
Pise lukheit nynh a sang a hangku ze, a hanlan maethyaum cipaw phung mawhei nynh nanning kha ae ccangpah khyh oh tou?
Thuasalama nopi lukheit nynh a sang a hangku ze, a hanlan phu-enaw nynh thua. Pawccecize nopi sang tuh amaw bongkunawpaw nynh thua.
Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh a ei ry ze, tuhtahawpaw phung ah hoi khyh oh, Pachia kya-e kriccawbu`ae mah hoi khyh`ae.
Nanning nynh ahoy huapaw hanlan thua leite, houh ahoy leipaw elan na sueluaku oh keiccu, atu hynh-e thuiheinaw pyanaw kya, nanning kha kae thehoysah khyh oh.
Pawccecize masaty lanze, nanning nynh kriccawbu kya na sueluaku vae oh ze, nae laku phiakunaw a um cite ka thae. Athua ze athua cih cite ka zyn.
Pawccecize nanning laku nawccawkhaepaw ccungccaw`ae kha langsaku khylan, nanning laku bu phiakunaw mah a um cih.
Tukeiccu nanning nynh ahmin sang kheit kya he na sueluaku vae oh ze, tuh-e tuh Bawipaw zerya mang khylan na sueluaku oh paw thua khyh.
Pawccecize aenaw kya nanning lu raveih nynh naemaw aepaw kha na lawkuty oh; lukheit tuh a vuelaw zah mingccangpaw tuh a rui.

Pawmou na cyi oh? Aenaw lanpaw te nianaw lanpaw inn na hoi khyh oh tou? Tukhyhze Pachia kriccawbu kha pawlangria leite na um oh zah pawsang hoi lei`ae paw kha mae na thyasah oh tou? Nae kalan pawte ka ho cih? Hynh-e kya kae thehoysah cih oh tou? Kae thehoysah khyh oh.
Pawccecize nanning kalan kae ahpya oh paw hynh Bawipaw kyate ka mue paw nynh thua: Bawipaw Jesu nynh amaw a phee lya`ae kha-e khuazi khe sanlou kha laah zah,
lungtuabya a ho koute, sanlou kha eih zah, “Hynh-e sanlou tuh nanning hanlan ia athua paw ka pyn nynh thua, lawkuh oh lah ae oh; kamaw liathui nawlan e hynh ae oh,” a ci.
Tuhhawte zerya a mang kou`ae te banang kha mah laah zah, “Hynh-e banang tuh ka chii kya athawpaw byakin nynh thua. E hynh na nia oh takyhte kamaw liathui nawlan neih oh,” a ci.
Pawccecize nanning nynh hynh-e sanlou kha leih na ae oh zah hynh-e banang kha leih na nia vae oh ze, Bawipaw a chinaw kha amaw yn thua cia na phy oh paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu hunghung zemah Bawipaw sanlou te banang kha angaekuh lei lante ae zah a neih paw ccungccaw tuh Bawipaw a pyn te a chii kya seinaw a hoi paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw te amaw kha phe tuakuhty sah, te sanlou kha ae sah lah banang kha mah neih sah.
Pawccecize angaekuh lei lante ae zah a neih paw ccungccaw tuh Bawipaw pyn kha a nythya khyh keiccuze amaw tungvaw seibyapia nawlan ae zah a neih paw nynh thua.
Hynh-e keiccu nanning laku ccungccaw patae tuh thawzya`ae zah dan khyh`ae. Te patae tuh a chih`ae.
Pawccecize aening nynh ahmaw te ahmaw kha bya ah piaku oh ze, aening tuh bya oun pia vae lan khyh`ae.
Thuasalama aening tuh bya oun pia vae`ae ze, laephi ccungccaw`ae ryte seibe ah thua khyh nawlan oh Bawipaw nynh aening kha phe oun thuihei vae.
Tukeiccu ka uteno`ae ae lan pynkheihlan he na thua vae oh ze, lukheit te lukheit la ngawkuh bua oh.
Te he na pumku vae oh ze byapianaw kalan ae thuakhae khyh nawlan oh, lukhakheit nynh a vuelaw ze, amaw inn kya la ae sah. Te tuhlaepaw tuh he kae thua te kou angaekuh lante kae khan cih.
Uteno`ae nanning nynh muisaw lasung`ae konglang ny leite na um lan oh paw ka ry khyh.
Nanning tuh Zenta`ae na la thua oh paw, ae la cciakhae oh zah byahothya leipaw e zohtuh`ae kalan ae la thuakhae oh paw kha na ny oh.

Tukeiccu Pachia Muisaw liate a ho paw ccungccaw hung nynh sanmah Jesu kha thyalaw kho khyh, te Thyaa Muisaw liate holeite hung nynh sanmah Jesu tuh Bawipaw nynh thua cite ho kho khyh cipaw kha kae nysah oh.
Lasung`ae aphuinphuin a um, thuasalama Muisaw ccangkheit nynh a um.
Pachia ryalawnaw aphuinphuin a um, thuasalama Bawipaw lukheit nynh a um.
Te ryalawpaw aphuinphuin a um, thuasalama pawpaw kya balyn marya ryalah paw Pachia ccangkheit rou nynh a um.
Thuasalama ccungccaw balyn thanenaw hanlan Muisaw kya-e langsapyakunaw kha milu raveih pya athua.
Pawccecize Muisaw liate lukheitpaw kha hawnaw bya pya athua; kha-e Muisaw liate mingccangpaw kha nynaw bya pya athua.
Kha-e Muisaw liate mingccangpaw kha zynnaw pya athua; kha-e Muisaw liate mingccangpaw kha dansanaw lasung`ae pya athua.

Mingccangpaw kha ngaeangnaw ryalaw khonaw a pya, mingccangpaw kha profehbya ho khonaw a pya, mingccangpaw kha muisaw`ae phiathyanaw a pya; mingccangpaw kha bya`ae aphuinphuin hothyanaw a pya, mingccangpaw kha bya`ae asuilan leihthyanaw a pya.
Thuasalama hynh-e`ae balyn hynh kha-e Muisaw ccangkheit nynh ryalawpaw nynh thua, a ry hawte milu raveih kha lukheitcci te a neethung`ae.
Pawccecize pyn tuh pynkheit thua zah pyn kya-e`ae patae a hoi, thuasalama tuh-e pyn pynkheit kya-e`ae balyn tuh patae mang ci`ae zemah pyn tuh pynkheit athua hawte, tuh-e hawte nynh Kri mah athua.

Pawccecize Jew`ae athua zemah, Greek`ae athua zemah, see`ae athua zemah, a luepaw athua zemah, Muisaw ccangkheit liate aening balyn tuh pyn pynkheit lungkhu lang baptisma-in sah ah thua oh; te ah balynte Muisaw ccangkheit lungkhu lang niasah lan rae athua oh.
Pawccecize pyn tuh pyn kya-e ccangkheit kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama patae a um.
Ccu nynh, “Kae tuh kuih ka thua khyh keiccu, kae tuh pyn kya-e ka thuabua khyh,” a ci lanze, tuhte a ci keiccu pyn kya-e thuabua khyh tou?
Te nakua nynh, “Kae tuh mit ka thua khyh keiccu, kae tuh pyn kya-e ka thuabua khyh,” a ci lanze, tuhte a ci keiccu pyn kya-e thuabua khyh tou?
Pyn khaleih tuh mit athua lanze pawkyamou thaenaw tuh a um vae cih? Pyn khaleih tuh nakua athua lanze paw kyate mou amyn tuh a sue vae cih?
Thuasalama atu Pachia nynh pyn kya miakaw kha amaw a lungry hawte mimaw thathyhte pung a nung.
Te minmin balyn tuh pyn kya-e ccangkheit kyalya athua lanze, pyn tuh pawkyamou a um vae cih?
Atu pyn kyae` ae tuh patae um zemah pyn tuh pynkheit rou nynh a um.
Te mit nynh kuih kha, “Nang kae peki khyh,” ci kho lan khyh. Tuhhawte lu nynh ccu kha, “Nang kae peki khyh,” ci kho lan khyh.
Tuhlaeze, thawzya huapaw alopaw pyn kya-e`ae tuh houh ahoboupaw nynh thua`ae.
Te pyn kyaze sawtua lan eih um khyh cite ah tua oh paw kha houh sawtuanaw ah pya oh; te ah pyn kyaze dohoy leipaw kha houh puithya lan ah ccaan oh.
Thuasalama ah pyn kyaze dohoypaw kha tuh ccaan ho vae khyh. Thuasalama pyn kyaze sawtuanaw aboupaw kha sawtuanaw alehua pyate Pachia nynh pyn kha a rae;
ou tuhte pyn kya laesakunaw kharyh a um khyh nawlan; thuasalama pyn kya-e`ae nynh alokuhpaw dooihkunaw a hoi`ae ccaw cite nynh tuhte a rae.
Te pyn kya-e ccangkheit nynh a teing vae ze, pyn kya-e`ae balyn pung a teing bua`ae; pyn kya-e ccangkheit tuh sawtua athua ze, pyn kya-e`ae balyn pung mih lungtuabua.
Atu nanning tuh Kri pyn nynh na thua oh; te lu raveihte a pyn kyae` ae nynh na thua oh.

Te Pachia nynh hynh-e`ae kha kriccawbu kya a khang`ae; tuh-e`ae tuh: masaty locceihtu`ae, ccangningnaw profeh`ae, ccanthungnaw ccangpatu`ae, tuhkoute athungpaw ryalaw`ae, ou tuhkoute ngeccih dansanaw lasung`ae, ming`ae bawngnaw`ae, ukthyanaw`ae, bya aphuinphuin hothyanaw`ae kha a pya`ae.
Mih balynte locceihtu`ae thua zaw? Mih balynte profeh`ae thua zaw? Mih balynte ccangpatu`ae thua zaw? Mih balynte athungpaw ryalaw lahtu`ae thua zaw?
Mih balynte ngeccih dansanaw lasung`ae a hoi`ae zaw? Mih balynte bya aphuinphuin ho`ae zaw? Mih balynte byaleih`ae zaw?
Thuasalama ahoy huaccepaw lasung`ae kha myaryasangkae pekikuh oh. Te houh ahoy huaccepaw ccianaw kha kae muihsah ung cih oh.
Ccungccaw`ae bya te vaaw ccungccaw`ae bya kha ka ho salamah sungsakunaw ka hoi khyh ze, kae tuh dawkhua roiccaepaw te langchi khuapaw hawte nynh ka thua.

Te kae nynh profehbyaho khonaw lasung ka hoi zah byakhupaw`ae balyn te nynaw balyn kha ka thaethya zemah thuasah; te mua`ae phe ka nue kho lan cia zynnaw balyn ka hoi zemah, sungsakunaw ka hoi khyh ze kae tuh accakaepaw nynh ka thua.
Te ka hoi paw balyn kha ryachi`ae loohdang nawlan khaleih ka pya zemah thuasah, te ka pyn hynh maee te uku lan ka pyaku zemah, sungsakunaw ka hoi khyh ze, tuh-e nynh kae pawsang yn thanesah khyh.
Sungsakunaw tuh a lungsae zah thawccithya; sungsakunaw tuh eiung khyh; sungsakunaw tuh pookuh khyh, tansakuh khyh;
umtuzia dothah lante um khyh, amaw thanenaw hanlan ccungkuh khyh, zoikadeih lang a thinria khyh, ahoy leipaw kha tua khyh;
atazae leipaw kya a lungtua khyh, thuasalama byaccing kya nynh a lungtua;
pawpaw balyn kha a ngaesang kho, pawpaw balyn kha a zyn, pawpaw balyn kha a ngaehoi, pawpaw balyn kha phang a ngaesang.
Sungsakunaw tuh athang ci um boi khyh. Thuasalama profehbyaho khonaw`ae a um zemah azo cih; bya aphuinphuin hothyanaw a um zemah adae cih; nynaw a um zemah phe azo cih.
Pawccecize aening tuh abangasung nynh ah ny oh, abangasung nynh profehbya ah ho oh.
Thuasalama accingpaw he yn thua vae te tuh, abang-asung paw kha tuh phya zosah athua vae cih.
Ka imua lya, imua hawte nynh bya ka ho, imua hawte nynh ka ny, imua hawte nynh ka tua; thuasalama piccang he ka thua vae tuh imua uccaw`ae kha phya ka vua kou vae.

Pawccecize atu aening tuh muinsado kya valyvaly te nynh ah muih oh; thuasalama tuin vae tuh mitmae hawiliakute muih lan vae. Atu kae tuh abang-asung nynh ka ny, thuasalama tuin vae tuh kamaw hynh ny ka thua hawte kae mah ka nyh vae cih.
Te atu zynnaw, ngaehoinaw, sungsakunaw, hynh-e ccangthung hynh atyn; thuasalama hynh-e`ae kyaze abapi huaccepaw tuh sungsakunaw nynh thua.
Sungsakunaw kha pei zui oh lah muisaw lasung`ae kha peki oh, abapi lante profehbya na ho nawlan oh peki oh.

Pawccecize ccangpaw bya a ho paw ccungccaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kalan ho khyh, thuasalama Pachia kalan nynh a ho. Pawccecize a hopaw kha hung nynh sanmah thaethya khyh; tuhzemah byakhupaw`ae kha muisaw kya nynh a ho.
Thuasalama profehbya hopaw tuh thawzung tynsanaw, thawte hynawpaw te ngaengansanaw bya kha ccungccaw`ae kalan nynh a ho.
Ccangpaw bya a ho paw tuh amaw te amaw nynh thawzung tynsaku. Thuasalama profehbya hopaw tuh kriccawbu kha thawzung a tynsah.

Nanning balyn nynh ccangpaw bya`ae ho oh ci ka ry, thuasalama nanning nynh profehbya na ho nawlan oh houh ka ry. Pawccecize ccangpaw bya`ae a ho paw nynh kriccawbu thawzung tynsah nawlan asuilan aleih khyh ze aning laeze profehbya ho paw tuh aphutehua.

Uteno`ae, atu kae nynh ccangpaw bya hote nae kalan kae thua zemah, byaphy liate, khyhze nynaw liate, tukhyhze profehbyahonaw liate, tukhyhze ccangpyakunaw liate kae hopya khyh oh ze nae hanlan pawmou athane cih?

Te hiinnaw hoi leipaw uccaw`ae phyly khyhze tintang hei kha, roiccaesah vae`ae ze roiccaesah paw alaenaw um khyh ze, phyly tou a tu`ae, tukhyhze tintang tou a khua`ae cipaw kha pawtemou ny kho a um cih?
Pawccecize mungkae nynh akyh leipaw roi khate accae lanze, hung nynh mou rhawtuk lan a paccynkuh cih?
Tuhhawte nanning mah thaethya lan azoipaw bya`ae khate na ho khyh oh ze, na ho oh paw kha pawtemou a nyh cih`ae? Khivae kalan nynh hung na ho han cih oh.
Laephipi kya bya`ae aphin patae a um cih, te kha-e`ae kyaze ccangkheit sanmah asuilan hoi leite um khyh.
Tukeiccu bya asuilan kha kae nynh ka ny khyh ze, kha-e bya a ho paw hanlan kae tuh ramccangpaw nynh ka thua vae cih, a hotupaw mah kae ka hanlan ramccangpaw nynh athua cih.
Tuhhawte nanning mah muisaw lasung`ae myarya a peki paw na thua oh hawte, kriccawbu thawzung tynsanaw elan houh mue lan ccung oh.
Tukeiccu ccangpaw bya a ho paw nynh kha-e kha asuilan aleih kho nawlan sawsangkuh sah.
Pawccecize kae nynh ccangpaw bya te saw ka sang ze, ka muisaw nynh sawsang, thuasalama ka thaethyanaw tuh pawlang um khyh.
Tuhte lanze pawte? Kae tuh muisaw te saw ka sang cih zah thaethyanaw te mah saw ka sang cih; muisaw te law ka sah cih zah thaethyanaw te mah law ka sah cih.

Tukhyh lanze, nang nynh muisaw te hythua na pya ze, a nyhbua lei`ae paw phu kya a umbua paw ccungccaw nynh, nang nynh lungtuabya na ho paw kha paw nynh na ho cipaw a thaethya khyh ze pawcihtemou “Amen” a cithya cih?
Pawccecize nang nynh tuh ahoyte lungtuabya na ho ccaccing, thuasalama mingccangpaw tuh thawzung tynsah thuabua khyh.
Nanning balyn laeze kae tuh ccangpaw bya`ae ka ho keiccu ka Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
Tuhzemah kriccawbu kya ccangpaw bya te bya thung haw ka ho laeze, mingccang`ae kha mah ka ccangpya nawlan`ae, ka thaethyanaw te bya kaw pangaw ho ka ry hua.
Uteno`ae, thaethyanaw kya imua`ae thua nan oh; tuhzemah athah-aruhpaw tuanaw kya imua taraw`ae thua oh, thuasalama thaethyanaw kya tuh piccang`ae thua oh.
Mawsi Kawbya kya hynhte azeikuh: “Ccangpaw bya te, ccangpaw mung te hynhe ccungccaw`ae kalan bya ka ho cih, tuhzemah minmin nynh ka hopaw hynh ngaelae lan khyh`ae,” cite Bawipaw nynh a ci.

Tukeiccu ccangpaw bya`ae tuh a zyn`ae paw hanlan thua khyh, a zyn lei`ae paw hanlan muihsanaw nynh thua; thuasalama profehbya hopaw tuh a zyn lei`ae paw hanlan thua khyh, a zyn`ae paw hanlan nynh thua.

Tukeiccu kriccawbu khaleih nynh sang kheit kya pynkheihlan na thua oh zah nae balynte ccangpaw bya na ho oh ze, a thaethya lei`ae paw te a zyn lei`ae paw nynh oun teebua`ae ze, minmin nynh nanning kha na ngae vae oh ae ci lan khyh oh tou?
Thuasalama nae balynte profehbya na ho oh ze, a zyn leipaw, tukhyhze a thaethya leipaw lukheit nynh yn teebua ze, nae balynte a seinaw na muihsakuh oh zah aning kha na zynsah bua oh.
Ou tuhte a thinlung kya-e aphiru`ae kha langsapyaku athua vae cih; oute aning nynh bakhungte Pachia kha a beik vae cih zah Pachia tuh nae kya a um ccaccing cite a ho vae cih.

Uteno`ae, tuhte lanze pawtemou? Nanning nynh pynkheihlan na thua he vae oh ze, Sam law a mue paw, ccangpyanaw a mue paw, ccangpaw bya a mue paw, byaphy a mue paw, asuilan leihthyanaw a mue paw lu raveih na um oh. Pawpaw balyn tuh thawzung tynsah nawlan cyi thua sah.
Lukhakheit nynh ccangpaw bya a ho ze, luning, khyh ze alunghua luthung cih`ae sah, te lukheit koute lukheit ho`ae sah; te lukheit nynh asuilan leih sah.
Thuasalama asuilan a leihtu a um khyh lanze tuh-e paw tuh kriccawbu kya daebabilan um sah lah amaw te amaw kalan te Pachia kalan palia ho sah.
Profeh`ae luning khyh ze luthung nynh ho`ae sah lah mingccang`ae nynh hoyte tuase`ae sah.
A pe dahung paw mingccangpaw kalan ccangkhakheit phypya athua ze, masaty a ho paw kha daebabilan umhin sah.
Pawccecize balynte ccangku kho athua nawlan, balynte thawzungpya athua nawlan, nanning balyn nynh lukheit koute lukheit profehbya na ho kho oh.
Te profeh`ae kya-e muisaw`ae tuh profeh`ae zakaw nynh a um.
Pawccecize mithyaa`ae kya-e kriccawbu`ae balyn kya athua hawte, Pachia tuh nua-ihnua-aepaw a umsah paw thua khyh, thuasalama daenaw umsah paw nynh thua.
Kriccawbu`ae kya nae nopi`ae tuh daetedae lang um`ae sah; pawccecize minmin tuh bya ho lan kaw ua thua khyh. Thuasalama Kawbya nynh mah a ho hawte zakawsangsakuh`ae sah.
Te minmin nynh ccangkhakheit a ccangkury`ae ze, innvaw kya mih vawpaw`ae kha khiakuh`ae sah; pawccecize nopi`ae nynh kriccawbu kya bya ho lanpaw tuh maethya lan um paw nynh thua.
Pachia bya tuh nanning kyate tou yn pou? Tukhyhze nanning kalan kyalya tou yn thua?

Lukhakheit nynh amaw te amaw kha profeh lukheit nynh ka thua, tukhyhze muisaw ccungccaw nynh ka thua cite a tuaku lanze, nae kalan ka zei`ae paw hynh Bawipaw kya-e kawpyapaw`ae nynh thua cipaw kha la nyh sah.
Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh a ny khyh lanze, ny lei mawte la um sah.
Tukeiccu, uteno`ae, profehbyaho lanpaw hynh thawmawte peki oh lah ccangpaw bya`ae ho lanpaw kha la khee nan oh.
Pawpaw balyn tuh ccipapya lante, kou angaekuhlante cyi thua sah.
Tuhlaeze, uteno`ae, phe kae hopya vae oh paw thehoypaw kha nanning bua kae hopya oh; kha-e kha nanning nynh mah na lawkuh oh zah kha-e kya na thadyn oh;
kae hopya oh paw bya kha nanning nynh accakae paw kya na zyn khyh oh zah varyn na kyngku oh thua ze, nanning tuh kha-e thehoypaw liate khum na thua oh.
Pawccecize kae nynh mah ka mue paw kha nanning kalan masaty kae hopyabua oh; tuh-e tuh: Ccathyaa thyhte Kri tuh aening seinaw hanlan a chih cipaw;
te aning tuh u thua zah Ccathyaa thyhte nin thungnaw kya bua a thothui cipaw;
te Sefas nynh amaw kha a muih koute luhaw laening nynh a muih`ae cipaw kha nynh thua.
Tuhkoute, uteno`ae zapangaw lae nynh amaw kha vaekheihte a muih`ae. Tuh-e`ae kyaze alunghua tuh atu cia a hiin ung`ae; thuasalama abang tuh phe ih vae`ae.
Tuhkoute James nynh amaw kha a muih; oute locceihtu`ae balyn nynh a muih`ae.
Te nyathyakou, accyh phe alue vae paw kya a pui paw hawte athua paw kae nynh mah amaw kha ka muih.
Pawccecize kae tuh Pachia kya-e kriccawbu kha a tua a sah paw ka thua keiccuze locceihtu cite ko lan angaekuh bua leipaw, locceihtu`ae lakuze anyaa huapaw nynh ka thua.

Thuasalama Pachia thawccinaw liate nynh kae tuh ka thua thyhte kae ka thua. Te kae yn pya paw a thawccinaw tuh alakaw thua khyh. Thuasalama locceihtu`ae balyn laeze kae tuh thawte rya ka lah hua, tuhzemah kae ka thua khyh, thuasalama kae ka kya a um paw Pachia thawccinaw nynh thawte ryalah.
Tukeiccu kae thuasah, minmin thuasah, tuhte kaening nynh phung kae ho, te nanning nynh na zyn oh.
Atu Kri tuh a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui cite Kri kong kha ho athua ze, a chih`ae paw thothuinaw um khyh cite nanning lakuze abang nynh pawccemou a ci`ae?
Thuasalama a chih`ae paw thothuinaw a um khyh lanze, Kri tuh thothui khyh cinawpaw nynh thua.
Te Kri tuh a thothui khyh lanze, kaening nynh phung kae ho paw tuh accakaepaw, te nanning zynnaw mah accakaepaw nynh thua vae.

Athua, kaening tuh Pachia kya-e ahme leipaw ccaekia`ae lang nynh oun muih vae`ae; pawccemacize, a chih`ae paw tuh a thothui khyh`ae ccaccing ze, Pachia nynh Kri kha thosah khyh cinawpaw, Pachia nynh Kri kha a thosah vae cite kaening nynh Pachia kong ccaekia kae khan.
Pawccecize a chih`ae paw tuh a thothui khyh`ae ze, te Kri tuh thothui vae khyh.
Te Kri tuh a thothui khyh ze, nanning zynnaw tuh accakaepaw nynh thua vae; nanning tuh nae seinaw`ae kya nynh phang na um ung oh.
Oute Kri kya a ih vae`ae paw mah arohhang vae`ae.
Atu e hiinnaw kya kyalya aening nynh Kri kya ngaehoinaw ah hoi oh lanze, ccungccaw`ae balyn kyaze aening tuh ngaethya-um huacce`ae paw nynh ah thua cih oh.
Thuasalama atu Kri tuh a chih`ae paw kyate thothui zah a ih vae`ae paw kyaze masaty athae lang phe a tang vae.
Pawccecize ccungccaw liate chinaw tuh yn thua hawte, a chih`ae paw thothuinaw mah ccungccaw liate nynh yn thua.
Pawccecize Adam kya ccungccaw balyn a chi`ae hawte, Kri kya ccungccaw balyn hiinsah athua cih`ae.
Thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw amaw ccyh kya a thua cih; Kri tuh masaty athae nynh thua, tuhkoute Kri he yn thua vae ze, Kri kya-e ccungccaw`ae a tho cih`ae.
Oute Kri nynh uknaw balyn, te kawhoinaw balyn, te thungnaw kha marya he a tae koute, peenaw kha Paaw Pachia kalan he a ah koute laephi she athangnaw yn thua vae cih.
Pawccecize rhaw`ae balyn kha a ccuphe kaw a nung kou cia, Kri nynh a uk hahe cih.
Ro athua cih paw nyathyakou rhaw tuh chinaw nynh thua.

Pawccecize, “Pachia nynh pawpaw balyn kha Kri ccuphe kaw marya a nung.” Thuasalama, “Pawpaw balyn kha amaw zakaw a nung,” cite a ho paw kya, pawpaw balyn amaw zakaw a nungtupaw tuh umbua khyh cipaw alangkuh.
Te pawpaw balyn tuh Kri zakaw umsah he athua te, pawpaw balyn kha amaw zakaw a nungtupaw Pachia tuh tynre balyn kya tynre athua nawlan Ccapaw amaw mah Paaw a zakaw umsah athuabua cih.
Tukhyh lanze, a chih`ae paw tuh kharyh a tho khyh`ae ze, a chih`ae paw hanlan baptisma-in`ae paw tuh pawte cyih vae cih`ae? A chih`ae paw hanlan pawccemou minmin nynh baptisma-in`ae te?
Te pawccemou kaening so suimilan ccyh takyh vawsawrunaw kya kae thadyn?
Ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu kya ka hoi paw, nanning kya ka pookunaw liate kae tuh nin takyhte ka chih cite tyntetyn lang ka ho ngan.

Efesa khuapi kya ccungccaw cyisahnaw lante kae tuh sarepaw`ae ryte kae douku ze so, ka hanlan pawmou athane cih? A chih`ae paw tuh a thothui khyh`ae ze, “Aening ae oh sih lah neih oh sih, pawccecize awkhualan ah chih cih oh!” ci hawte nynh thua vae.
La lingsakuh nan oh: “Ahoy leipaw ry mungkupaw nynh ahoypaw ziazae kha a rosah.”
Dingnaw kalan tho ccavae oh lah sei nan vae oh; pawccecize abang nynh Pachia nynaw hoi khyh`ae. E hynh nae maethya ccaw cite nynh ka ho.
Thuasalama, “A chih`ae paw nynh pawtemou a tho cih`ae? Pawtahawpaw pyn te mou minmin nynh oun langkuh cih`ae?” cite lukhakheit nynh a ci cih.
Nang mingaeepaw, na ccou paw ccacii nynh a chi khyh lanze, hiin lan khyh.
Te ccacii na tu vae ze, yn um lanpaw a pyn kha na tu khyh, thuasalama chanvui thuasah, ccangpaw ccacii thuasah ccacii maw kha nynh na tu.
Thuasalama Pachia nynh a ry hawte pyn kha a pya, ccacii miakaw kha amaw aphin thyhte pyn kha a pya.
Ngesaw balyn tuh alokuhpaw ngesaw cci thua khyh; thuasalama ccungccaw ngesaw phin kheit, rangsaw`ae ngesaw phin ccangpaw, ngasaw`ae ngesaw phin ccangpaw, te pavaw`ae ngesaw phin ccangpaw nynh thua.
Vaawran te asekuhpaw pyn`ae um zah laephi te asekuhpaw pyn`ae mah a um. Thuasalama vaawran te asekuhpaw phu-enaw tuh phin kheit thua zah laephi te asekuhpaw phuenaw tuh phin ccangpaw nynh thua.
Khuanin phu-enaw phin kheit, sawpaw phu-enaw ccangpaw, te awsi`ae phu-enaw mah ccangpaw nynh thua; pawccecize awsi ccangkheit te ccangkheit phu-enaw kya alae.
Tuh-e hawte nynh a chih`ae paw thothuinaw mah athua. Pyn tuh aroh khopaw kya ccou thua zah aroh kho leipaw kya nynh thosathui athua.
Sawtua leinaw kya ccou thua zah phu-enaw kya thosathui athua. Nyaanaw kya ccou thua zah thungnaw kya thosathui athua.
Puikhaepaw pyn kha ccou athua, muisaw pyn kha thosathui athua; puikhaepaw pyn um zah muisaw pyn a um.
Tukeiccu, “Masaty ccungccaw Adam tuh a hiinpaw ccungccaw lang yn tang,” cite azeikuh. Nyathyakou Adam tuh hiinnaw a pya paw muisaw nynh thua.
Tuhzemah muisaw pyn hynh masaty thua khyh, thuasalama puikhaepaw pyn nynh a umty, tuhkoute nynh muisaw pyn tuh a um.
Masaty ccungccaw tuh laephi kyate thua zah laenoi te rae paw nynh thua; luningnaw ccungccaw tuh vaawran kyate a um paw Bawipaw nynh thua.
Laephi ccungccaw`ae tuh laephi ccungccapaw hawte nynh thua`ae. Vaawran e`ae mah vaawran kya-e paw hawte nynh thua`ae.
Te aening tuh laephi muinsan ah ke oh hawte, vaawran ccungccapaw muinsan mah ah ke cih oh.
Uteno`ae, chiisaw nynh tuh Pachia peenaw kha rhoccou kho lan khyh cite atu e hynh kae hopya oh; aroh khopaw nynh aroh kho leipaw kha rhoccou kho lan khyh.
Dotua oh, byakhupaw ccangkheit kae hopah oh: Aening ah balynte marya i lei lan, thuasalama aening balyn tuh

nyathyakou mungkae yn ccae te, sosohtari kya, mitsiphalah kya marya rulae ah thua cih oh. Pawccecize mungkae roi yn ccae cih zah a chih`ae paw kha aroh kho leipaw kya thosathui thua cih`ae zah aening tuh rulae ah thua cih oh.
Pawccecize hynhe aroh khopaw nynh aroh kho leipaw khate a ccaanku hahe ho zah hynh-e a chih khopaw nynh a chih kho leipaw khate a ccaanku hahe aho.

Tukeiccu hynh-e aroh khopaw nynh aroh kho leipaw khate he a ccaankuh te, hynh-e a chih khopaw nynh a chih kho leipaw khate he a ccaankuh vae te tuh, “Chinaw tuh taenaw nynh po a laang vae,” cite azeikuh paw Ccathyaa tuh accing vae cih.
“Pou chinaw, na zunghe tuh teisangmou a um? Pou Hades, na taenaw tuh teisangmou a um?”
Chinaw kya-e zunghe tuh seinaw nynh thua; te seinaw kya-e thawzung tuh kawbya nynh thua.
Thuasalama ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate aening taenaw yn pyatupaw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho thua sah.
Tukeiccu ka sungsahpaw uteno`ae, Bawipaw kya nae ryalaw tuh alakaw thua khyh cipaw kha nyte, tynkaring lang, nue kho um lei lante um oh lah Bawipaw rya kha pei lah oh.
Atu mithyaa`ae hanlan khoipyapaw kong lante, Galati ram e kriccawbu`ae kalan kaw ka pya vae`ae hawte nanning mah la cyih bua oh.
He kae thua te khoi lanpaw a um vae khyh ccaw, lonaw kyaze masaty nin khe nanning milu raveih nynh hythua na ccou oh thyhte nae kya-e kha ccangte la nung oh lah la khoi oh.
Te he kae thua te hunghung zemah ccaw te naw na ccawkhae oh paw kha nae lasung cciakhae khylan Jerusalem lang ka saw cih`ae.
Te kae mah ccia lan accan ze, minmin tuh kamaw ryte a cceihbua cih`ae.
Atu Mesidonia ram po he ka khung koute nanning kalan kae thua cih (pawccecize Mesidonia ram kha po kae khung cih).
Te ka khuaccungnaw kya, teiteilang ka ccia zemah nanning nynh nae cciakhae ccaw oh, nae kya ka um ze ka um cih, tukhyhze khoccihsaw hei nanning ry po ka um kho.
Pawccecize laanpi kya atu nanning kha hung kae muih ry khyh oh; thuasalama Bawipaw nynh yn ua ze, nanning ryte khaw umkheih lan ka ngaehoi.
Thuasalama Pentikos poi kyacia Efesa khua kya kae um ung cih.
Pawccecize alepipaw te athanepaw thuakaw tuh kamaw elan hungpya athua, te rawsetu`ae mah patae a um.
Te Timote nae kalan yn thua ze rinaw um leite aning tuh nanning ry a umbua ccaw la raeringkuh oh; pawccecize aning tuh kae hawte Bawipaw ryalaw a lah paw nynh thua.

Tukeiccu hung nynh sanmah amaw kha dothatheih nan sah. Thuasalama aning nynh kamaw kalan yn thua nawlan, a khuaccungnaw kya daebabilan amaw kha oun saw oh; pawccecize uteno`ae ryte yn thua lanpaw amaw kha phang ka ngaw.

Te kae unopaw Apollos konglang tuh uteno`ae ryte nae kalan yn thuabua ccaw cite thawte amaw kha ka hopah, thuasalama atu ccyh lya tuh aning nynh thua lan kharyh ry khyh; tuhzemah accyh he yn ccanthya te yn thua cih.
Raeringkute ngawdo oh, zynnaw kya tynkaring lang thadyn oh, pise`ae hawte nae rawthung sah, nae thawsae sah.
Pawpaw balyn kha nanning nynh sungsakunaw te cyih oh.
Uteno`ae, Stefanas a innbyn`ae tuh Akhai ram kyaze masaty thae paw athae`ae thua zah minmin tuh mithyaa`ae kya-e ryalawnaw kalan mimaw te mimaw kha a pyakuh`ae cipaw na ny oh.
Khatahaw`ae paw kalan, te kaening ryte ryalaw thawte a lah`ae paw miakaw kalan nanning nynh naemaw te naemaw kha na pyaku nawlan oh thawte kae ngia oh.
Stefanas, Fortunatas te Akhaikus oun thua`ae paw kong ka lungtua. Pawccecize nanning kalan te na bou oh paw kha minmin nynh a pya`ae.
Pawccecize minmin nynh ka muisaw te nae muisaw kha bua thawmuinsah`ae. Tukeiccu khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kha nanning nynh la luung oh.
Asia ram-e kriccawbu`ae nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh. Akuila te Prisilla nynh mih innbyn kya um paw kriccawbu ryte Bawipaw kya nanning kha thinlung ccaccingte ae beihlang oh.
Uteno`ae balyn nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh. Athyaapaw myngkupaw te lukheit te lukheit beihlangkuh oh.
Kae Paul kya-e beihlangnaw tuh kamaw ka kuih te nynh ka zei.
Lukhakheit nynh Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha a sungsah khyh lanze, aning tuh thyalaw thua sah. Maranatha.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae kya la um sah.
Kri Jesu kya kae sungsanaw oh paw tuh nae balyn tungvaw la um sah. Amen.
Pachia rynaw liate Jesu Kri locceihtu athua paw Paul, te kae unopaw Timote nynh Korin khuapi kya a um paw Pachia kya-e kriccawbu kya te Akhai ram balyn kya um paw mithyaa`ae balyn kya ry:
Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah!
Ngaethya-umsanaw Paaw te ngaengansanaw balyn Pachia athua paw, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw, Pachia tuh thehoy te um sah.
Pachia nynh aening ahmaw ngae oun ngansanawpaw, ngaengansahnaw khate vawsawnaw a tung`ae paw kha aening nynh ngae ah ngansah nawlan oh, ah vawsawnaw balyn kya aening kha ngae oun ngansah.
Pawccecize Kri kya-e teingnaw tuh aening kya myarya alung hawte, Kri liate aening kya-e ngaengannaw mah myarya alung.

Te kaening tuh vawsaw kae teing zemah, tuh-e tuh nae ngaengannaw hanlan te khumnaw hanlan nynh thua. Kaening nynh kae teingpaw, kha-e teingnaw`ae phang ngaesangnaw tuh accungkiapaw nynh thua. Tukhyhze kaening tuh ngaengansah kae thua ze, tuh-e tuh nae ngaengannaw hanlan te khumnaw hanlan nynh thua.
Te nanning hanlan kaening ngaehoinaw tuh tynkaring. Nanning tuh teingnaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw nynh na thua oh cipaw kae ny hawte, ngaengannaw mah a neethungkuh bua`ae paw nynh na thua oh.

Pawccecize uteno`ae, Asia ram kya kaening kya yn thua paw vawsawnaw kha nanning ny leite na um lan oh paw kae ry khyh. Tou kho um lei lan, thawzung nynh taening lei lan, hiinnaw heize ngaehoi um vae lei lan kaening tuh phuripaw nynh oun ne.
Kaening nynh kaemaw te kaemaw kae doliaku khyh nawlan, thuasalama a chih`ae paw a thosah paw Pachia kha kae doliaku nawlan, kaemaw tuh chi lan byapae vae paw nynh kae thua.
Tuh-e Pachia nynh khacih alepaw chinaw kyate kaening kha oun luesah zah atu mah oun luesah. Amaw nynh bua oun luesah ung cih cite amaw kha kae doliakuh.
Ccungccaw patae nynh kaening oun pya`ae paw lasung hanlan, ccungccaw patae nynh kaening ccelang lungtuabya a ho nawlan`ae nanning nynh mah sawsangnaw te pynkheihlan nae bawng oh.

Pawccecize kaening kae pookunaw tuh e hynh nynh thua, pynsaw hawnaw te thua leite, thuasalama Pachia thawccinaw liate, lungthyaanaw te, te thanccingte Pachia rawrinaw te nynh laephipi kyahin kae um cipaw tuh kaemaw nykunawpaw thinlung nynh ccaekiakhan; nanning kya khate nynh houh kae um.
Pawccecize nanning nynh na ria oh zah phe na thaethya vae oh paw laelan, ccangpaw uccaw kha nanning kalan kae zei khyh; athangnaw cia hei nanning nynh khaleih na thaethya cih oh cite ka ngaehoi.
Nanning nynh kaening hynh abang te nae thaethya vae oh hawte, Bawipaw Jesu nin kya nanning tuh kaening kae pookunaw na thua oh hawte, kaening mah nanning na pookunaw oh paw nynh kae thua.
Te nanning nynh vaeningnaw thanenaw na hoi ccaw oh cite hynh-e zynkunaw kya, kae tuh nanning kalan thuaty lan ka tuakuh.

Te nanning kha po cciakhung lan zah Mesidonia ram lungkhu lang ccia lan, te Mesidonia ram kyate nanning kalan bua thua lan zah nanning nynh Judah ram lang ka khuaccungnaw kya nae cciakhae ccaw oh cite ka tuakuh.
Tukeiccu tuhte ka tuaku lyakha zawphalae lang tou ka cyi? Tukhyhze ka paccynkupaw uccaw kha kamaw kya Athua, Athua, ci lante Thua khyh, Thua khyh, hung ci lan cite ccungccaw lante tou ka paccynku?
Thuasalama Pachia tuh zyn lan um paw athua thyhte, nae kya kae hopaw bya tuh, Athua te Thua khyh cipaw thua khyh.
Pawccecize kaening, kamaw, Silvanas te Timote nynh kae hopaw Pachia Ccapaw Jesu Kri tuh Athua, Thua khyh, cipaw thua khyh, thuasalama amaw kya tuh Athua ci mawcci.
Pawccecize amaw kya Pachia kya-e byakinkupaw balyn tuh Athua, ci thua zah aening liate Pachia phuenaw hanlan amaw kya tuh Amen, ci nynh thua.
Atu nanning ryte kaening kha Kri kya oun tynsah paw te aening satho oun thuh paw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
Tuh-e Pachia nynh aening kha tazeih phe oun khia vae pyatypaw lante Thyaa Muisaw kha ah thinlung kya phe yn pya vae.
Tuhlaeze nanning kha vawsaw kae pya ry khyh oh pawte nynh kae tuh Korin khuapi kalan kae thua vae khyh cipaw ka hiinnaw-muisaw tungvaw ccaekia lang Pachia kha ka koku.
Nae zynnaw vawlan uknaw kaw kae hoi paw thua khyh, thuasalama nae lungtuanaw elan ryalahkheihtu`ae nynh kae thua; pawccecize zynnaw liate nynh nanning tuh na thadyn oh.
Thuasalama ngaethyanaw ryte nanning kalan bua kae thua lan khyh cite kamaw te kamaw bya phe ka paeku vae.
Pawccecize kae nynh nanning kha ngae kae thyasah oh ze, kae nynh ngae ka thyasah paw nanning laelan hungmou kae lung yn tuasah paw tuh?

Te he kae thua vae ze, lungtuanaw hoi lan ka ccan paw ccungccaw`ae kyate ngaethyanaw ka hoi sei khyh nawlan nynh hynh-e ccaccei hynh nae kalan ka zei; ka lungtuanaw tuh nae balyn lungtuanaw nynh thua cipaw nae balyn kya zynkunaw ka hoi.

Pawccecize vawsawnaw pataepi kyate, lungriathaenaw kyate, mitphi patae ryte nynh nae kalan ka zei, nae thinlung cci ccaw cite ka zei khyh, thuasalama nanning kha pawcih nynh kae sungsah oh cipaw na ny oh ccaw cite nynh ka zei.

Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh thinlungccinaw a pousah lanze, kamaw hynh thinlung yn ccisah khyh, thuasalama nae balynte azawnaw thinlung ae ccisah oh; ou tuhte nae balyn tungvaw eih a reipaw ka thua khyh nawlan.
Ccungccaw lunghua nynh a pya`ae paw detahnaw tuh khahtahawpaw ccungccaw hanlan azaw.
Phin ccang lante, nanning nynh kha-e paw kha ngaethya paleih oh lah soihbia paleih oh; tukhyh lanze khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha eih ngaethyanaw nynh phe a laangsei cih.
Tukeiccu kha-e paw na sungsanaw oh paw kha nanning nynh la langsapah oh cite kae ngia oh.
Pawccecize pawpaw balyn kya nanning tuh kaw na ngae oh ta cipaw ka ny ry keiccu nynh hynhte ka zei.
Nanning nynh ccangkhakheit na ngaethya oh paw ccungccaw kha kae nynh mah ka ngaethya; pawccecize kae nynh ccangkhakheit kha ka ngaethya ze, kha-e paw kha Kri malang nanning liate nynh ka ngaethya.
Tukhyh lanze, Setan nynh aening kya ccyhhoypaw kha a lawkuh sei cih; pawccecize a thyaruhnaw kha ny leite ah um khyh oh.
Tuhlaeze, Kri thehoypaw ho lan Troas khua lang he ka thua tuh Bawipaw nynh kae kha thuakaw yn hungpya.
Ka neitaw Titu kha ka muih khyh keiccuze ka lungdae khyh; te minmin kha akhue ka dyhkuh`ae zah tuin kyate Mesidonia lang ka cceih.
Atu Kri kya taenaw kalan aening kha pei yn cciakhae paw te ahmin takyh kya aening liate amaw nynaw mynkhuhpaw a langsakuh paw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho thuasah.
Pawccecize kaening tuh khum athua`ae paw kya thuasah, aroh`ae paw kya thuasah, Pachia kalan Kri kya-e mynkhuhpaw nynh kae thua.
Lukheitpaw hanlan chinaw kyacia chinaw kya-e mynkhuhpaw nynh kae thua; mingccangpaw hanlan hiinnaw kyacia hiinnaw kya-e mynkhuhpaw nynh kae thua. E uccaw`ae hanlan hungmou a zaw paw a um?
Pawccecize kaening tuh ccungccaw patae hawte, Pachia bya kha amia lang a zuakuh`ae paw kae thua khyh; thuasalama Pachia kya-e`ae hawte thinlung thanccingte, Kri kya Pachia malang nynh kae ho.
Kaening tuh kaemaw te kaemaw tou bua kae thehoysakuh? Tukhyhze nanning kalan thehoysanawpaw ccaw`ae khyh ze nanning kyate thehoysanawpaw ccaw`ae kha, mingccang`ae abang hawte kaening kae peki tou?
Nanning tuh kae thinlung kya azeikuh paw ccaw, ccungccaw balyn nynh nyh`ae zah a ria`ae paw, kaening ccaw nynh na thua oh.

Ccatui te zei paw na thua khyh oh, thuasalama a hiinpaw Pachia Muisaw te zei paw nynh na thua oh; lung ccalung kya zei na thua khyh oh, thuasalama thinlung kya-e ngesaw ccalung kya zei paw na thua oh zah kaening ryalawnaw liate raerae alangkuh lan phy paw Kri kya-e ccaw nynh na thua oh.
Te kaening tuh Kri liate Pachia kalan tuhtahawpaw doliakunaw kae hoi.
Ccangkhakheit kha kaemaw kyate oun thua paw tuaku lan kaemaw te kaemaw phe kae ccing cipaw thua khyh, thuasalama kaening kya-e ccingnaw tuh Pachia kyate nynh thua.

Tuh-e Pachia nynh byakin thaw kya-e ryalahtu`ae olante kaening kha phe oun rae vae; ccaw kya-e thua khyh, thuasalama Muisaw kya-e nynh thua; pawccecize ccaw nynh tuh a chia, thuasalama Muisaw nynh tuh hiinnaw a pya.
Thuasalama azo avae paw Mawsi mitmae phu-enaw keiccuze, Israel ccungccaw`ae nynh a mae kha riri a do kho lei lan`ae cia, lungphe vawlan khiate zei paw, chinaw ryalawnaw tuh a phu-e lan thua ze,
Muisaw ryalawnaw tuh houh phu-esah thua lan khyh tou?
Pawccecize seibenaw rylawnaw nynh phuenaw a hoi lanze, dingnaw ryalawnaw tuh phu-enaw te houh abeih cih.
Pawccecize tuh-e phe beihpaw phu-enaw keiccu, langmaw phu-esah a la thua paw hei kha phu-enaw hoi vae khyh.
Pawccecize azo avae paw nynh a phu-e lanze, po atynpaw tuh houh a phu-e.
Tuhte khahtahawpaw ngaehoinaw kae hoi keiccuze kaening tuh rawhoy te nynh kae ho.
Te azo lyaccya paw uccaw athangnaw kha Israel`ae nynh riri a do kho khyh`ae ccaw cite a mae a khungkuhpaw Mawsi hawte kae thua khyh.
Thuasalama mih tuanaw-thinlung tuh phe amoh; pawccecize atunin cia Byakin Ryn rianaw kya tuh-e khungkupaw tuh lawpya leite phang a um ung; tuh-e khungkupaw tuh Kri kya nynh zosah athua.
Thuasalama atunin cia hei Mawsi kawbya kha he a ria vae `ae ze, mih thinlung kha khungkupaw nynh phang a bong ung.
Tuhzemah lukheit nynh Bawipaw kalan he a paleihkuh tuh khungkupaw kha lawpya athua vae.
Te Bawipaw tuh Muisaw nynh thua; te Bawipaw kya-e Muisaw a umnaw tuh luenaw a um.

Thuasalama aening balyn tuh lyngpyapaw mitmae lyngpya te muinsado kya do hawte, Bawipaw phu-enaw kha ah do oh; Bawipaw Muisaw liate rulaepaw hawte, aening tuh phu-enaw kyate phu-enaw kalan alokuhpaw muinsan lungkhu lang rulae ah thua cciamang oh.
Tukeiccu kaening tuh ngaethya umsanaw kha kae ccou hawte, hynh-e ryalawnaw hynh kae hoi thyhte kae lungthang khyh.

Thuasalama thyaruhnaw te hiin leite, Pachia bya kha ccungccaw ling nawlan mang leite, maethya lan um paw thuruh paw uccaw`ae kha phya kae vua vae. Thuasalama byaccing langsapyakunaw liate, Pachia malang ccungccaw miakaw mawtemaw nykunaw kalan kaemaw te kaemaw kha kae ahkuh.
Thuasalama kaening kya-e thehoypaw tuh phang khung athua heize, tuh-e tuh azo lya ccya`ae paw kalan nynh phang khungpya athua.
Pachia muinsan athua paw, Kri kya-e aphu-epaw thehoypaw awnaw nynh a zyn lei`ae paw kya a aw khyh nawlan, kha-e`ae tuanawthinlung kha atu she e pachia nynh phe amohsah.
Pawccecize kaening nynh kaemaw kong kha kae ho khyh, thuasalama Kri Jesu tuh Bawipaw nynh athua cipaw, te Jesu keiccuze kaening tuh nanning see`ae nynh kae thua cipaw kha kae ho.
Pawccecize mohnaw kyate awnaw awsah khylan, kawpyatupaw Pachia nynh Jesu Kri mae kya Pachia kya-e phuenaw nynawpaw awnaw kha pya khylan, ah thinlung kya phe a awsah vae.
Thuasalama thungnaw kya-e lesae huaccenaw tuh kaening kya-e thua leite, Pachia kya-e athua nawlan, laephi ang`ae kya hynh-e sisua hynh kaening nynh kae hoi.
Hawlang hawlang te vawsaw kae tung, tuhzemah phe miade kae thua khyh; kae lungvawsaw, thuasalama kae lungthang khyh;
oun tua oun sah`ae, thuasalama ccaring vuasya kae thua khyh; oun khulia`ae zemah ro kae thua khyh.
Jesu a hiinnaw kha mah kae pyn kya a langku ccaw cite Bawipaw Jesu a chinaw kha kae pyn kya pei kae phubia.
Pawccecize Jesu a hiinnaw kha mah a chihthyapaw kae pynsaw kya a langku ccaw cite, Jesu keiccuze a hiin`ae paw kaening kha chinaw kalan pei oun thuakhae`ae.
Tukeiccu kaening kya tuh chinaw nynh ryalah, thuasalama nanning kya tuh hiinnaw nynh ryalah.
Te, “Kae tuh ka zyn, tukeiccu nynh ka ho,” cite azeiku thyhte, alokuhpaw zynnaw muisaw kha kae hoi pawte, kaening mah kae zyn, tukeiccu nynh kae ho.
Bawipaw Jesu kha a thosatupaw nynh Jesu liate kaening kha mah oun thosabua cih zah nanning ryte amaw kalan oun umsah bua cih cite kae ny.
Pawccecize ccungccaw patae nynh lungtuabya honaw liate, Pachia phu-enaw hanlan, paepaeluipaw thawccinaw tuh phe abia ccaw cite, pawpaw balyn tuh nanning hanlan nynh thua.
Tukeiccu kae lungthang khyh. Atolang-e kae ccungccaw tuh rohsah lazemah, alungkhu lang-e ccungccaw tuh nin kheit koute nin kheit thawsah athua.
Pawccecize sosoh kyalya teing athua paw, zawbahaepaw kae kya-e vawsawnaw nynh myaryasangkae akhingccipaw zungzae phu-enaw kha kae hanlan houh oun raepya.
Tukeiccu muih paw uccaw`ae kha kae do khyh, thuasalama muih leipaw uccaw`ae kha nynh kae do; pawccecize muih paw uccaw`ae tuh sosoh nynh atyn, thuasalama muih leipaw uccaw`ae tuh zungzae atyn.
Pawccecize a laephi inn, hynh-e bu hynh ro athua lanze, kuih te rae leipaw inn, Pachia nynh sak paw inn, zungzae atynpaw vaawran kya ah hoi oh cipaw ah ny oh.
Pawccecize vaawran a um paw aening umnawpaw ryte ccaanku lanpaw kha myarya ah peki oh pawte, e laephi inn kya aening tuh ah hawkhaekuh oh.
Tuhte phe ah ccaanku vae oh ze, aening tuh ah sahse te oun muih vae lan khyh`ae.

Pawccecize e bu kya ah um oh paw aening tuh phupaw nynh phang oun ne pawte ah hawkhaekuh oh; uccaw te ah ccaankuh ry khyh oh keiccu thua khyh; thuasalama a chihthyapaw kha hiinnaw nynh po a laang ccaw cite, aening tuh houh ccaan ah thua oh.
Atu hynh-e uccaw ccaccei hanlan aening oun paccyntupaw tuh Pachia nynh thua. Tuh-e Pachia nynh Muisaw athua paw pyatypaw kha mah phe oun pya vae.
Tukeiccu aening tuh pyn inn kya ah um lya oh tuh, Bawipaw kya ah um khyh oh cipaw kha nybiate, pei ah zynku oh.
Pawccecize aening tuh zynnaw liate nynh ah hiin oh, muihnaw liate ah hiin khyh oh.
Pyn kya um vae leite, Bawipaw ryte umkheih lanpaw kha ah ry oh zah ah zynku oh.
Tukeiccu aening tuh ah um oh zemah, ah um vae khyh oh zemah, amaw lungrythuasah lanpaw kha nynh ah paccynku oh.
Pawccecize ahoypaw thuasah, athahpaw thuasah pynsaw kya a cyi paw thathyhte milu raveih nynh a cyi paw kha a mue nawlan, aening balyn tuh Kri byapianaw tungkhung malang marya ah langkuh hahe cih oh.
Tukeiccu Bawipaw rawrinaw kha nybiate, ccungccaw`ae kha kae soih`ae; thuasalama kaening tuh Pachia nynh hoyte ny paw nynh kae thua, naemaw nykunaw thinlung kya ny paw mah kae thua cite ka zyn.

Pawccecize nanning kalan kaemaw te kaemaw kha bua kae thehoysakuh khyh. Thuasalama thinlung kya thua leite mitmuihnaw kya a pookuh`ae paw kha na khung kho nawlan oh, kaening hanlan na pooku nawlan oh ccyhhoypaw kha kae pya oh.
Pawccecize kaening tuh lungkyh lei`ae paw kae thua ze, Pachia hanlan nynh thua, tukhyhze kaening tuh lungkyh`ae paw kae thua ze, nanning hanlan nynh thua.
Pawccecize, ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccungccaw balyn hanlan a chi lanze, ccungccaw balyn tuh a chih`ae cite;

te a hiin`ae paw nynh atu te mimaw hanlan hiin vae leite, mih hanlan chih zah bua a thothuipaw hanlan a hiin ccaw `ae cite nynh aning tuh ccungccaw balyn hanlan a chi cite kae tua pawte, Kri kya-e sungsakunaw nynh kaening kha umkhaeku kho lei lan rya oun naw.
Tukeiccu atu te vae tuh hung ccungccaw sanmah pynsaw lante kae nyh vae khyh; pynsaw lante Kri kha kae la ny zemah atu te vae tuh tuhte kae nyh vae khyh.
Tukeiccu lukhakheit tuh Kri kya a um lanze, aning tuh raethawpaw ccungccaw nynh thua; arynpaw uccaw`ae tuh marya azo vae; dotua, pawpaw balyn tuh athawpaw lang oun tang vae.
Te pawpaw balyn tuh Pachia kyate nynh thua; amaw kalan aening kha Jesu Kri liate bua oun ccawsakuthui zah bua ccawkuthuinawpaw ryalaw kha kaening oun pya;

tuhe tuh, Pachia tuh Kri kya um zah, laephi ccungccaw`ae mih cyiseinaw`ae kha ccuinpya vae leite, minmin kha amaw kalan bua a ccawsakuthui`ae cipaw kha nynh thua, te bua ccawsakuthuinawpaw bya kha kaening kalan phe oun ahpya vae.

Oute atu kaening tuh Kri hanlan locceihtu`ae nynh kae thua; kaening liate Pachia nynh ae hy oh paw hawte, nanning tuh Pachia kalan bua ccawkuthui oh cite Kri ccelang kaening nynh nanning kha kae ngia oh.
Pawccecize aening tuh Kri kya Pachia dingnaw ah thua nawlan oh, seinaw a nyh leipaw amaw kha Pachia nynh aening hanlan a seipaw lang a rae.
Te kaening, amaw ry pynkheihlan ryalahtu`ae nynh mah Pachia thawccinaw kha alakaw lang na ccou han khyh nawlan oh nanning kha kae ngia oh.

Pawccecize Pachia nynh hynhte a ho: “Lehkhan lan accan ccyh kya nang kha phe kae thaepya vae, te khumnaw nin kya nang kha phe kae bawng vae,” a ci; dotua, atu hynh lehkhan lan accan ccyh nynh thua; dotua, atu hynh khumnaw nin nynh thua.
Kae ryalawnaw tuh ccae athua khyh nawlan, ming`ae khuliakunaw kha pawpaw kya sanmah kae rae khyh.
Thuasalama pawpaw kya balyn, kaening tuh Pachia ryalahtu`ae kae thuanawpaw kha kaemaw nynh kae langsaku: Pataepi phang ngaesangnaw kya, vawsawnaw`ae kya, ahobounaw`ae kya, lungvawsawnaw`ae kya;
ziabuanaw`ae kya, thungsawnaw`ae kya, keisukeilae umnaw`ae kya, arupaw ryalawnaw`ae kya, i leite umnaw kya, haedante umnaw kyakhe,
thinlung thyaanaw liate, nynaw liate, khaw teingnaw liate, thawccithyanaw liate, Thyaa Muisaw liate, thanccingpaw sungsakunaw liate,
byaccing kyae bya liate, Pachia kya-e thungnaw liate, ranglang kuih te voilang kuih kya dingnaw kya-e zunghe liate,
sawtuanaw te sawtua leinaw liate, ahoy leipaw te ahoypaw thaesanaw liate; hyngbya ho`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, ahme`ae paw thua te;
a ny lei`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, marya a ny`ae paw thua te; a chih`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, dotua oh, kaening tuh kae hiin; detah`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, a chia lei`ae paw;

ngaethah`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah pei lungtua`ae paw; ryachi`ae hawte kae thua zemah ccungccaw patae a hoirungsah`ae paw; pawsang a hoi lei`ae paw hawte kae thua zemah, pawpaw balyn a hoi`ae paw nynh kae thua. Hynh-e`ae kya Pachia ryalahtu`ae nynh kae thua cipaw kha kae langsaku.
Pou Korin`ae! Kaening nynh nanning kha ccaerarihlan kae hopya vae oh, kae thinlung kha kobalae lang kae hungpya oh.
Kaening nynh kae khawsung khyh oh, thuasalama naemaw rynaw te nynh na khawsungku oh.
Atu kha-e kha pyaru nawlan, nanning mah nae thinlung hung oh, tuh-e tuh ccaaw`ae hawte nynh kae hopya oh.
Zyn leitu`ae ryte anginkuh lei lante pynkheihlan taphu phukheih nan oh. Pawccecize dingnaw nynh kawbya einaw ryte paw vaeccawkunaw mou a hoi? Te awnaw nynh mohnaw ryte paw ccawkunaw mou a hoi?
Te Kri nynh Belial ryte paw nawccawnaw mou a hoi? Tukhyhze zyntu nynh zyn leitu ryte paw bawngku buanaw mou a hoi?

Te Pachia kya-e tempal nynh zohtuh`ae ryte paw nawccawnaw mou a hoi? Pawccecize Pachia nynh: “Minmin kya kae ka um cih zah minmin laku ka cceih cih. Kae tuh mih Pachia ka thua cih zah minmin tuh ka ccungccaw`ae a thua cih`ae,” a ci hawte, nanning tuh a hiinpaw Pachia kya-e tempal nynh na thua oh.
Tukeiccu, “Minmin laku kyate pou oh lah phiakuh oh; athyaa leipaw kha hae nan oh, te nanning kha kae ccou cih oh, Bawipaw nynh a ci.”
Te, “Kae tuh nae Paaw ka thua cih zah nanning tuh ka ccapaw`ae te ka ccanung`ae na thua cih oh, cite Tynre cyih khotu BAWIPAW nynh a ci.”
Tukeiccu sungsah`ae, tuh-e byakinpyakupaw`ae ah hoi oh thyhte, Pachia rawrinaw kya thyaanaw kha ccingsah te, pynsaw te muisaw nungsikunaw balyn kyate ahmaw te ahmaw hynh ccikankuh oh sih.
Kaening hynh thinlung oun hungpah oh; kaening tuh hung ccungccaw kya sanmah kae cyihsei khyh, hung sanmah kae rosah khyh, hung sanmah kae hyngpah khyh.
Hynhte ka hopaw tuh nanning kha seibe khylan ka ho khyh; pawccecize nanning ryte chikheih lan te hiinkheih lan, nanning tuh kae thinlung kya na um oh cite langmaw lya phe kae hopya vae oh.
Nae kalan bya hopaw ka rawhoinaw tuh ale raria, nanning keiccu myarya ka pookuh; ngaengannaw te phe ka beih. Vawsawrunaw kae teingnaw kya balyn kae tuh myarya ka lungtua.
Pawccecize Mesidonia ram lungkhu lang he kae thua te kae pynsaw hae-ungnaw hoi khyh, thuasalama hawlang hawlang te vawsaw kae tung; atolang tuh doukunaw a um, alungkhu lang tuh rawrinaw a um.
Tuhzemah lungthawthang`ae paw kha ngaengansah paw Pachia nynh Titu yn thuanaw liate kaening kha ngae oun ngansah;

te Titu yn thuanaw liate kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama nanning nynh myarya na pekinaw oh paw, na raw na khuinaw oh paw, kamaw hanlan myarya na zuakunaw oh paw kong kha aning nynh he oun hopah tuh, nae kya aning tuh ngaengansah athuanawpaw, thawzungpyanaw liate ngaengansah kae thua; tukeiccu kae tuh houh ka lungtua.

Pawccecize ka ccaky te nanning kha ngae kae la thyasah oh hei ze, ka la ngaesiku zemah, atu ka ngaesikuh vae khyh; pawccecize kha-e ccaky nynh nanning kha ngae ae thyasah oh zemah sosoh rou nynh ngae ae thyasah oh cipaw ka muihthya.

Atu ka lungtua paw tuh nanning kha ngaethyasah na thua oh keiccu thua khyh, thuasalama nae ngaethyanaw nynh ngaesikunaw kalan ae cciakhae oh paw te nynh ka lungtua. Pawccecize pawpaw kya sanmah kaening keiccu nanning nynh zonaw vaenaw na tung khyh nawlan oh, Pachia rynaw thyhte nynh nanning tuh ngaethyasah na thua oh.

Pawccecize Pachia rynaw thyhte athua paw ngaethyanaw nynh tuh bua ngaethyakhaeku aho vae leipaw, khumnaw kalan a thuakhae paw ngaesikunaw kha a pousah; thuasalama laephipi e ngaethyanaw nynh tuh chinaw kha nynh a pousah.

Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw ccaccei hynh dotua oh, nanning tuh Pachia rynaw thyhte nae ngaethah cipaw tuh: taemyasawkunaw, naemaw te naemaw kya lungthyaanaw, atazae leipaw kya thinrianaw, rawrinaw, myarya pekinaw, thawte zuapyakunaw, seibe lan um leinaw`ae kha nae kya a pousah. Hynh-e uccaw kya nanning tuh na thyaa oh cipaw pawpaw balyn kya phe na langsaku vae oh.

Tukeiccu nae kalan ccaw ka zei zemah a cyihseipaw hanlan ka zei khyh, cyiseinaw a teingpaw hanlan mah ka zei khyh, thuasalama Pachia malang kaening nynh kae dooihnaw oh paw nae kya alangku nawlan nynh ka zei.
Tukeiccu nae ngaengannaw kya kaening mah ngaengansah kae thua. Te nanning balyn liate Titu muisaw tuh bua thawmuinsah athua keiccuze, Titu kya-e lungtuanaw hanlan kaening tuh myaryamaw kae lungtua.

Pawccecize nanning konglang amaw kya ccangkhakheit phe ka pooku vae ze, ka maethah khyh; thuasalama byaccing kya nanning kalan pawpaw balyn kha nae kya phe ka ho vae hawte, tuhhawte Titu malang kae pokunaw tuh mah thanccingpaw nynh thua.
Te rawrinaw te thyngkute amaw na lawku oh paw, nae balyn kawngaenaw kha aning nynh he a liathui tuh, nanning ae sungsanaw oh paw tuh houh ale.
Tukeiccu pawpaw balyn kya nanning kya zynkunaw ka hoi pawte kae tuh ka lungtua.
Tuhlaeze uteno`ae, Mesidonia ram e kriccawbu`ae kya pya athua paw Pachia thawccinaw kha kaening nynh nanning kae nysah bua oh;
minmin tuh mih vawsawnaw kyaze alepipaw syntawnaw kya mih lungtuanaw phe abia paw, te myarya mih ryachiccih pite mih hysanaw kya-e hoirungnaw`ae kya phe abia paw kha kae nysah bua oh.
Pawccecize cyi khonaw thyhte, athua, cyi khonaw laelan hysah te pya rynaw a hoi`ae cite kae nynh ccaekia ka khan;
mih lasung kha kae lawku nawlan te mithyaa`ae ryalawpyanaw kya kaening bawngku bua nawlan, arangte kaening kha thawmawte oun ngia`ae.
Te kaening nynh kae la ngaehoi laelan, Pachia rynaw thyhte mimaw te mimaw kha Bawipaw kalan masaty pyakuh`ae zah kaening kalan mah a pyakuh`ae.
Tukeiccu Titu nynh nanning kya phe a tho vae hawte, kha-e thawccinaw kha nanning kya mah phe a thangsah nawlan, kaening nynh amaw kha thawte kae ngia.
Tuhte nanning tuh zynnaw kya, byahonaw kya, nynaw kya, thawte zuakunaw kya, te kaening nae sungsanaw oh kya, pawpaw kya miakaw na hoirung oh hawte, hynh-e thawccinaw kya mah hoirungbua oh.
Kawpyapaw liate ka ho khyh, thuasalama mingccang`ae nynh thawte zuakunaw liate, nanning kya-e sungsakunaw tuh thanccingpaw athua te thua khyh paw kha nynh kae syntaw ho.
Pawccecize, amaw ryachinaw liate nanning na hoirung nawlan oh, aning tuh a hoirung zemah nanning keiccuze a rya yn chi cite ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw kha na ny oh.
Te hynh-e kya tuanawroihnaw kae pya oh. Inkhawkum cyi lan na ry oh zah phe na tho vae oh paw rya kha po cyi lanpaw kyalya thua leite;
kha-e na cyi oh paw kha atu phe na thangsah hahe lan oh paw tuh nae hanlan ahoypaw nynh thua; cyi ry lan paccynkunaw a um hawkhate, na hoi oh paw kyate phe thangsanaw mah a um cih.
Pawccecize pya rynaw thinlung masaty a um lanze, ccungccaw nynh a hoi leipaw thyhte thua leite, a hoi paw thyhte a pya paw kha ccoupya athua.
Pawccecize mingccang`ae kha luesah lan zah nanning kha phurisah lan cite ka hory paw thua khyh;

thuasalama a nginkunaw liate, atu lya nanning paepaelui lan na hoi oh paw nynh minmin hobounaw kha a pyabua nawlan, te minmin paepaelui lan hoi paw nynh mah nanning hobounaw kha a pyabua nawlan, ou tuhte nginkunaw a um nawlan nynh ka hory.
Ccathyaa kya, “Pataepi a ccakhungkuh paw nynh alaepaw hoi lae khyh, pyhtari a ccakhungkuh paw nynh hobounaw hoi khyh,” cite azeiku hawte nynh thua.
Thuasalama nanning hanlan ka hoi paw te alokuhpaw thanccingte tuapyanaw kha Titu thinlung lungkhu lang a phangtupaw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho thua sah.
Pawccecize kae hynawpaw kha nawccaw kyalya thua leite, houh a zuakuhpaw athua pawte amaw lungthote nae kalan a cceih.
Te thehoypaw honaw kya, kriccawbu`ae balyn kya thehoy po a ccou paw uno lukheit kha Titu ryte kaening nynh kae saw;

tuh kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama hynh-e lasung ry, kaening ryte khuaccungkheih lan kriccawbu`ae nynh a po`ae paw mah athua. Tuh-e lasung tuh Bawipaw amaw phu-e nawlan, te a paccynkuh paw nae thinlung kha langsaku khylan kaening nynh kae nee.
Hynh-e myarya alungpaw lasung kae neethungnaw kyahin, hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah kaening hynh yn ccae khyh nawlan kae raeringkuh.
Bawipaw mitmuihnaw kya kyalya thua leite, ccungccaw`ae mitmuihnaw kya mah ahmepaw uccaw kha kae pyabua paw nynh thua.

Te minmin ryte kae unopaw kha kaening nynh kae saw. Aning tuh uccaw patae kya myarya a zuakuhpaw nynh thua cipaw pei kae langsaku he, thuasalama atu nae tungvaw zynkunaw alepi a hoi keiccuze houh a zuakuhpaw nynh thua.

Titu kong kha lukhakheit nynh a khia ze, aning tuh kamaw ryte kae mungkuhpaw, te nanning te asekuh lante rya kae lahkheihpaw nynh thua. Tukhyhze kae uno`ae kong a khiapaw a um ze, minmin tuh kriccawbu`ae kya-e locceihtu`ae, Kri kya-e phu-enaw nynh thua`ae.
Tukeiccu minmin kalan te kriccawbu`ae malang nae kya-e sungsakunaw ccaekia te nanning hanlan kae pookunawpaw kha langsapah oh.
Mithyaa`ae hanlan ryalawpyanaw te asekuh lante nae kalan ccaw zei lanpaw tuh ka hanlan ccungkiapaw thua khyh.

Pawccecize na bawngrynaw oh paw kha ka ny, kha-e hanlan inkhawkum te Akhai ram um`ae paw tuh paccynkute a um vae`ae cite Mesidonia`ae kalan nanning kong ka pookuh; te nae kya-e rynaw pipi nynh ccungccaw patae kha myarya lungthosah`ae.
Tuhzemah nanning kong kae pookunawpaw tuh e kya alakaw athua khyh nawlan, phe ka ho vae hawte nanning nynh na paccynku nawlan oh cite uno`ae kha nae kalan kae nynh kae saw`ae.

Tukhyh lanze, Mesidonia`ae nynh kamaw ryte mang oun thuabua`ae zah nanning paccynku leite na um oh paw kha oun muih`ae ze, nanning nae maethah cih cipaw thua leite, rawhoy te kae pookupaw kya kaening kae maethahsei cih.

Tukeiccu langmaw bya phe na kinku vae oh paw, hysah te lasung pya paw kha na la paccynty nawlan oh nae kalan cciaty lan, uno`ae kha hy aho cite ka tuaku. Tuhte kha-e lasung tuh pya lan hysah leipaw uccaw hawte thua leite, hysahnaw te paccynty paw athua nawlan nynh thua.
Thuasalama pyhtari ccacii a vua paw nynh tuh pyhtari nynh a rue cih, te pataepi ccacii a vua paw tuh pataepi a rue cih, cipaw hynh nyh oh.
Ccungccaw miakaw nynh a thinlung kya a tuaku hawte pya sah, hysah leinaw te pya nan sah, pya khyh ze hoy khyh cipaw thinlung te pya nan sah, pawccecize lungthote a pyatupaw kha Pachia nynh a sungsah.

Te pawpaw balyn kya nanning tuh ahobou lei lan khaleih pei na hoi oh zah, ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw hanlan paepaelui lan na hoi nawlan oh, thawccinaw balyn kha nae hanlan phe biasah lan Pachia tuh a cyih kho.
“Aning nynh phe apazaesaku vae; aning nynh ryachi`ae kha phe a pya vae`ae; a dingnaw tuh zungzae cia a tyn,” cite azeiku hawkhate nynh thua.
Atu ccaciivuatupaw hanlan ccacii kha pya zah looh hanlan sanlou a pyatupaw nynh ccacii na vua oh paw kha ae pungsathungpah oh sah lah nae dingnaw athae`ae kha ae lungsathungpah oh sah.
Hysanaw te na pya nawlan oh nanning tuh pawpaw kya balyn hoirungsah na thua oh, tuh-e nynh kaening liate Pachia kalan lungtuabya a hosah cih`ae.
Pawccecize hynh-e ryalaw neethungnaw nynh mithyaa`ae hobounaw kyalya kha a pyabua paw thua leite, Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho paw patae kha mah phe a biasah.
Hynh-e ryalawnaw langsakunaw liate, Kri thehoypaw na lawku oh paw kawngaenaw elan te ccungccaw balyn kha hysah te na neethung oh paw elan, minmin nynh Pachia kha phu-esah`ae.
Nae kya um paw myarya asungpaw Pachia thawccinaw keiccuze, nae hanlan saw a sang`ae tuh nanning kha myarya ae ngae oh.
Ho kho um leipaw a lasung hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho thua sah!
Nanning na umnaw oh kya zakawsangsakuhpaw, thuasalama na um leinaw oh kya nanning kalan a rawthungpaw, kae, Paul kamaw nynh Kri kya-e nevyalyanaw te thawcci lungnenaw liate nanning kha kae ngia oh.

Thuasalama kaening kha pynsaw rynaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw hawte kaening kha oun tua`ae paw ccungccaw abang kha rawse lan, zynkunaw te rawhoysaku lan ka tuakupaw kha he kae thua vae ze raw ka hoysaku vae khyh nawlan kae ngia oh.
Pawccecize kaening tuh pynsaw lante kae hiin zemah, pynsaw rynaw thyhte kaening nynh rhaw kae dou khyh.
Pawccecize kaening rhawdounawpaw zunghe`ae tuh pynsaw zunghe`ae thua khyh, thuasalama khuarhawhohung` ae kha tingsah bung nawlan Pachia kya-e a thawsaepaw zunghe`ae nynh thua.

Kha-e zunghe`ae tuh eikunaw`ae thuasah, te Pachia nynaw a rawsepaw amaw te amaw a tansakuhpaw, ahangpaw uccaw miakaw kha thuasah sawbung nawlan, tuanaw miakaw kha Kri kawngae sah khylan seetangnaw kalan a thuakhae paw nynh thua.
Te nanning kawngaenaw tuh he accing te kawngae lei`ae paw balyn kha detah khylan paccynkute kae um.

Nanning nynh atolang alangku thyhte tou uccaw`ae kha na do oh? Lukhakheit nynh Kri kya-e nynh ka thua cite amaw te amaw a zynku lanze, aning tuh Kri kya-e athua hawte kaening mah Kri kya-e nynh kae thua cipaw, hynh-e hynh aning nynh bua tuabia sah.
Pawccecize, nanning ro nawlan thua leite, nanning tynsathung nawlan Bawipaw nynh kaening oun pya paw kae kya-e kawhoinaw kong kha kae nynh houh ka pokhaeku zemah, ka maethyakhaekuh lan khyh.
Ccaky`ae khate nanning kha ae fu ae raw oh paw ka thuasei zya.
Pawccecize, minmin nynh, “A ccaky`ae tuh a khingcci zah a thung, thuasalama a pyn phang umnaw kya tuh a nyaa, te a byaho pawlang um khyh,” a ci`ae.
Kaening tuh kaemaw kae um khyh lya ccaky kya um paw bya thyhte kae thua hawte, kaemaw kae umnaw zemah kae cyisahnaw kya khahawte nynh kae thua mamin, cipaw kha khahtahawpaw ccungccaw nynh tuabia sah.

Pawccecize mimaw te mimaw thehoysakuh`ae paw ryte kaemaw hynh kae riakuh bua ngan khyh, kae khinkhiakuh ngan khyh. Thuasalama mimaw te mimaw kha toukuh`ae zah, mimaw te mimaw a khinkhiakuh`ae paw, minmin tuh haw khyh`ae.
Tuhzemah po alue lante kaening nynh kae pookuh lan khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh kaening oun pya paw a loori lungkhu nynh kae pooku, tuh-e a loori nynh nanning kha phe ae khungbia oh.
Pawccecize nanning kalan kae phah leipaw olante hawte, kaemaw te kaemaw kha po alue lang kae dyngkuh khyh; pawccecize Kri thehoypaw ryte nynh nae kalan po kae thua.

Kaening nynh po alue lante, ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae ryalaw kya kae pookuh khyh; thuasalama nae zynnaw tuh a kaethung thyhte, nanning liate kaening tuh kae kya-e a loori kya myarya kosah kae thua cih cite ngaehoinaw kae hoi.
Ou tuhte nanning na umnaw oh khunglang kaening nynh thehoypaw kae ho nawlan te ccangpaw ccungccaw nynh phe a cyity vae paw a loori kya kae pooku khyh nawlan nynh thua.
Thuasalama, “A pookuhpaw ccungccaw tuh BAWIPAW kyakhe pookuh sah.”
Pawccecize amaw te amaw thehoysakuhpaw kha tuh Bawipaw nynh nawccawkhaepaw thua khyh, thuasalama Bawipaw nynh thehoysah paw rou kha nynh nawccawkhaepaw athua.
Ka ngaeenaw kyahin nanning nynh sosoh oun ngaesangpah oh ci ka ry, te nae ngaesangpya ccaccing oh.

Pawccecize kae tuh Pachia lante thawsianaw khate nae hanlan ka thawsia. Pawccecize kae nynh nanning kha athyaapaw liaccady hawte Kri kalan kae pya ccaw oh cite vawpaw lukheit kalan nanning kha phe kae chiapya vae oh.
Thuasalama fupaw nynh a thyaruhnaw liate Evi kha a ling hawte, phinkhakheit lante, nae thinlung-tuanaw`ae tuh Kri kya um paw thinlung thyaanaw kyate oun rohsei cih cipaw ka thinphang.

Pawccecize nae kalan yn thua paw nynh, kaening nynh kae ho leipaw ccangpaw Jesu kong kha a ho lanze, tukhyhze nanning nynh na ccou lei oh paw, phin ccangpaw muisaw kha na ccou oh ze, tukhyhze nanning nynh na lawku lei oh paw phin ccangpaw thehoypaw kha na lawku oh ze, kou hoy lang la ngaesang oh.
Pawccecize abapi huapaw locceihtu`ae laeze kae tuh kharyh ka nyaahua khyh cite ka tuaku.
Kae tuh byahonaw kya a thya leipaw ka thua zemah, nynaw kya tuh tuhte ka thua khyh. Thuasalama kaening tuh nanning laku pawpaw balyn kya khaleih kae langkuh.
Nanning hangthung na thua ccaw oh cite kamaw te kamaw zakawsangsaku te, Pachia thehoypaw nae kalan alakaw te kae hopya oh keiccu, kae tuh seinaw ka rae tou?
Nanning hanlan ryalawpya khylan ccangpaw kriccawbu`ae kya-e uccaw kha lawkute kae nynh ka lua`ae.

Kae tuh nanning ryte ka um lya, ka ho ka bou lyakha, hung sanmah ria ka thaesah khyh; pawccecize kae ka ho ka bou paw kha Mesidonia langte oun thua`ae paw uno`ae nynh phe oun pya`ae. Pawpaw balyn kya nanning kha phurisah paw ka thua khyh nawlan kamaw te kamaw ka raeringkuh, tuhte po ka raeringkuh cih.
Kri kya-e byaccing tuh kamaw kya a um thyhhawte, Akhai pee`ae lungkhu kya hung nynh sanmah hynh-e ka pookunawpaw hynh oun khee lan khyh.
Pawccemou? Nanning kha kae sungsah khyh oh keiccu tou? Pachia a nyh.
Thuasalama ccyhhoypaw a muery`ae paw nynh kaening hawte ming`ae nynh oun tuabua`ae sah cite a pookunaw`ae kya, minmin nynh ccyhhoypaw a mue khyh nawlan`ae, ka cyipaw kha po ka cyih ung cih.
Pawccecize khatahaw`ae paw tuh ahme leipaw locceihtu`ae, ccungccaw a phee`ae paw ryalahtu`ae, Kri kya-e locceihtu`ae lang mimaw te mimaw muinsan a rulaekuh `ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Te ngaeangthua lanpaw thua khyh! Pawccecize Setan nynh mah amaw te amaw kha awnaw kya-e vaaw ccungccaw olante a muinsan kha a rulaeku.
Tukeiccu a ryalahtu`ae nynh mah dingnaw ryalahtu`ae hawte mih muinsan rulaeku`ae paw tuh ngaeang lanpaw thua khyh; minmin athangnaw tuh mih ryalawnaw`ae thyhte nynh athua cih.
Hung nynh sanmah kamaw hynh mingaeepaw hawte yn tua nan sah cite bua ka ho. Tuhte yn tua paw a um ze, kae nynh ccapyh ka pooku nawlan, kamaw hynh mingaeepaw hawte oun ccou oh.
Ka hopaw hynh Bawipaw rynaw thyhte ka ho khyh, thuasalama hynh-e rawhoinawpaw pookunaw kya ngaeeccaccu lang nynh ka ho.
Ccungccaw patae nynh pynsaw lante a pooku`ae pawte kae mah ka pokuh bua cih.
Pawccecize naemaw tuh na haw oh pawte nanning nynh mingaee`ae kha lungtuate na ngaesangpya oh.

Lukhakheit nynh nanning kha seetangnaw lungkhu lang ae cciakhae oh ze, lukhakheit nynh phe ae ae oh ze, lukhakheit nynh ae luade oh ze, lukhakheit nynh ae poonuaku oh ze, lukhakheit nynh nae mae kya ae bia oh ze, nanning nynh na ngaesang oh.
Kaening tuh myarya kae la nyaa cipaw kae maethyanaw kha nynh ka ho. Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh ccangkhakheit kya a zynku lanze, kae mah ka zynkuh bua cite ngaeeccaccu lang nynh ka ho.
Minmin tuh Hebru`ae thua tou? Kae mah ka thua. Minmin tuh Israel`ae thua tou? Kae mah ka thua. Minmin tuh Abraham ciihan`ae thua tou? Kae mah ka thua.

Minmin tuh Kri kya-e ryalahtu`ae thua tou? Kae tuh houh ka thua cite mingaeepaw hawte nynh ka ho. Thawmawte houh ryalah paw, ziabuanaw riatae lei a tungpaw, atu te atu thung a ccah paw, chinaw rhaw`ae te atu te atu a tungkuh `ae paw nynh ka thua.
Jew`ae nynh vae sungpali accing nawlan vaekheit ary lante oun bua`ae paw, vae pangaw ka tung.
Ruising te oun bua`ae paw vaethung acih; lung te vaekheit oun deih`ae, sanphalung ronaw vaethung ka tung; zi kheit te nin kheit rili lungkhu ka um.

Atu te atu khua ka ccung, tui kya-e vawsawrunaw, damiah`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw, ka ccungccaw`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw, Zenta`ae kya-e vawsawrunaw, khualipi kya vawsawrunaw, rangkaw kya vawsawrunaw, rili kya vawsawrunaw, ahme leipaw uno`ae laku vawsawrunaw kha ka tung.
Bangnaw te kou arupaw ryalaw, atu te atu i leite um paw, vuelawnaw te tuihawnaw, atu te atu looh-ae leite um paw, akyaapaw kya te uccaw leite um paw kha ka tung.
Kha-e atolang e uccaw`ae laelan, kriccawbu`ae balyn hanlan thawte ka thawsianawpaw nin takyh ka tungvaw a um.
Kae ka nyaa khyh ze, hungmou anyaa? Kae ka lungkhu maee lang rua leite, hungmou a maeleihsakuh paw a um?
Ka pooku lan accan lanze, kamaw ka nyaanaw`ae konglang kha nynh ka pookuh cih.
Kae tuh ka hyng khyh cipaw kha zungzae thehoysah athua paw, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw, Pachia nynh phe a ny.
Damaskas khuapi kya, Aretas siapharanpaw kuihkaw ram uktupaw nynh rhawkawphu ryte Damaskas khuapi a ngaw lyakhe, kamaw kha kyng lan yn ry.
Te kae kha sua lungkhu oun phang`ae zah thanlang-aw kyate, khua lungrua kyate oun sahbung`ae zah ram uktupaw kuih kyate phe ka lue.
Ka hanlan pooku lanpaw tuh athanepaw thua khyh. Bawipaw kya-e vizin te byaphy kong kha ka ho ung cih.

Kum haw laepali lae aro vae lyakhe Kri kya um paw ccungccaw lukheit tuh vaawran khaan thungnaw kalan lawthung athua paw kha ka ny, pyn ryte ta, tukhyhze pyn umbia leite ta cipaw ka nyh khyh, Pachia nynh a nyh.

Te kha-e ccungccapaw tuh Paradis lungkhu lang lawthung thua zah ccungccaw lukheit hanlan ho lan accan leipaw te ho kho leipaw bya`ae kha aning nynh a thae. Ou khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha ka ny. Pyn ryte ta, tukhyhze pyn umbia leite ta cipaw ka nyh khyh, Pachia nynh a nyh.
Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha ka pokhaekuh cih, tuhzemah kamaw ka nyaanaw kya laelan kamaw te kamaw tuh ka pookuh lan khyh.

Pawccecize pooku lan ka ry zemah kae tuh mingaeepaw ka thua lan khyh. Pawccecize kae tuh byaccing nynh ka ho cih. Thuasalama ccungccaw lukheit nynh kamaw yn muihpaw laelan, kamaw kong a thae paw laelan kamaw hynh yn tuasei khyh nawlan kae tuh ho leite ka sungkuh.

Te myarya alungpaw byaphy`ae liate tou kho lei lan cia ka tansaku sei khyh nawlan ka ngesaw kya hingpaw kha pya ka thua, tou kho lei lang cia ka tansaku sei khyh nawlan Setan kya-e locceihtupaw nynh kamaw kha vawsaw yn pya.
Hynh-e uccaw hynh kamaw kyate a pou ccaw cite Bawipaw kalan vaethung ka ngiakuh.

Te Bawipaw nynh kamaw kha, “Ka thawccinaw tuh na hanlan azaw; pawccecize ka thungnaw tuh nyaanaw kya phe ccingsah athua,” yn cipya. Tukeiccu Kri thungnaw tuh kamaw tungvaw atyn nawlan, ka nyaanaw`ae kya nynh lungtuate houh ka pookuh vae cih.
Tukeiccu Kri hanlan teingpaw nyaanaw`ae kya, sarisaryanaw`ae kya, ryachinaw`ae kya, yn tua yn sahnaw`ae kya, vawsawnaw`ae kya nynh ka lungrythua. Pawccecize kae he ka nyaa tuh, kae tuh ka thawsae.

Pookunaw kya kae tuh mingaeepaw lang nynh ka tang; nanning nynh tuhte nae nangse oh. Pawccecize nanning nynh kae hynh thehoysah lan ka ccan, pawccecize kae tuh pawsang ka thua khyh zemah lupi huapaw locceihtu`ae laeze ka nyaahua khyh.
Lungccuanaw te, muihsanaw kya, khuaruarunaw te athungpaw ryalaw`ae kya, locceihtu ka thuanawpaw muihsanaw tuh nanning laku langsapya athua ccaccing vae.
Kae tuh nae kya phuripaw ka thua khyh paw laelan, ccangpaw kriccawbu`ae laeze pawkyamou nanning tuh na nyaahua oh? Hynh-e ka menaw hanlan oun ngaethya oh!

Dotua oh, vaethungnaw nae kalan bua thua lan ka paccynkuh. Te nanning hanlan phuripaw ka thua lan khyh; pawccecize nae kya-e uccaw kha ka ccungkuh khyh, thuasalama naemaw kha nynh kae ccung oh. Pawccecize ccaaw`ae nynh nungpaaw`ae hanlan uccaw ccypya lan ccan khyh, thuasalama nungpaaw`ae nynh ccaaw`ae hanlan a ccypah`ae.

Te kae nynh nanning kha houhouh kae sungsah oh zah nanning nynh nae sungsahnaw oh tuh ryryh azyabung zemah, nae muisaw hanlan ka hoi paw kha myarya lungtuate ka thangkuh cih zah kamaw mah ka thangkuh ung cih.
Thuasalama tuhte athua ze la thuasah, nanning kha kae nynh phupaw kae risah khyh oh. Tuhzemah a pheethyapaw ka thua thyhte, pheenaw te nynh nanning kha kae kyng oh.
Nae kalan kae saw`ae paw lukhakheit liate, nae kya-e amia kae nynh ka lawkuh tou?

Titu kha nae kalan ccia lan ka ngia zah amaw ryte uno lukheit kae nynh kae saw. Titu nynh nae kya-e ae lawpakuh oh tou? Kaening tuh alokuhpaw thinlungtuanaw te kae cceih kheih khyh tou? Alokuhpaw laanpi kha kae zui kheih khyh tou?

Kaening nynh kaemaw te kaemaw hynh nae malang kae dangsaku cite tou bua nae tua oh? Kri kya Pachia malang nynh kaening bya kae ho. Thuasalama kou sungsah`ae paw, nanning tynsathungnaw hanlan nynh pawpaw balyn kha kae cyi.

Pawccecize kae he kae thua vae ze, nanning kha ka ry hawte kae muih lan khyh oh paw te kae kha na ry oh hawte nae muih lan khyh oh paw ka thinphang; nae kya eikunaw, eiungkunaw, thinrianaw, peku maekunaw, thanhokunaw, milae thethyahonaw, tansakunaw, keisukeilae umnaw a um sei cih cipaw thuasah;

kae he bua kae thua vae ze nungsikunaw, ohhuakunaw, sahpaw eih rynaw te phe sei`ae zah a ngaesikuh lei`ae paw patae hanlan ka raw ka khui nawlan, ka Pachia nynh kamaw kha nanning laku zakaw yn sangsah cih cipaw thuasah ka thinphang.
Hynh-e hynh nae kalan kae kae thua paw vaethungnaw nynh athua cih. “Ccaekia luning, tukhyhze luthung khalang liate bya miakaw tuh tynsah athua cih.”

Kae nynh langmaw phe kae hopya vae oh, te vaeningnaw nae kya ka um paw hawte kae hopyaty vae oh; te atu nae kya ka um leite, kae bua kae thua lanze hung sanmah ka haang lan khyh cite langmaw a sei`ae paw te tuhlaepaw balyn kalan ccaw kae zei.
Nae kya a nyaa leipaw, thuasalama athungpaw Kri nynh kamaw kya bya ho ta cipaw ccaekia kha na ccung oh keiccu tuh kae haang lan khyh oh.

Pawccecize nyaanaw kya amaw tuh khiade athua zemah, Pachia thungnaw liate aning tuh bua a hiin. Te kaening mah amaw kya kae nyaa, thuasalama Pachia thungnaw liate kaening tuh amaw ryte nae kalan kae hiin cih.

Zynnaw kya na um oh ta, na um khyh oh ta cipaw naemaw te naemaw sihseikuh oh. Naemaw te naemaw syntawkuh oh. Ccing khyh cite nue paw na thua khyh oh ze, Jesu Kri tuh nae kya a um cipaw naemaw te naemaw na nyhkuh khyh oh tou?
Thuasalama kaening tuh ccing khyh cite nue paw kae thua khyh cipaw na nyh cih oh cite ka zyn.

Atu nanning nynh ahoy leipaw kha kharyh na cyi khyh oh ccaw cite Pachia kalan saw ka sang. Kaening tuh nawccawkhaepaw nynh kae thua cite langsaku ry paw thua khyh, thuasalama kaening tuh nawccawkhae lei`ae paw hawte kae la thua zemah nanning nynh ahoypaw uccaw kha na cyi ccaw oh cite nynh saw ka sang.
Pawccecize byaccing rawsete kaening tuh pawsang mah kae cyih kho khyh, thuasalama byaccing hanlan nynh kae cyi.
Pawccecize kaening he kae nyaa zah nanning nae thawsae vae ze, kae lungtua; te nanning na ccing nawlan oh hei saw kae sangpya oh.
Tukeiccu ka um khyh lya hynh e uccaw`ae hynh nae kalan ka zei. Ka um lanze ronaw hanlan thua leite, tynsathungnaw hanlan Bawipaw nynh kamaw yn pya paw kawhoinaw thyhte rehahannaw kha ka mangsei cih.
Nyathyakou, uteno`ae ngedan te. Marya ccing oh. Ngaengante um oh, tuanaw-thinlung ccangkheit te um oh, daebabilan um oh; te sungsakunaw te daenaw Pachia tuh nanning ry a um cih.
Athyaapaw myngkupaw khate lukheit te lukheit beihlangkuh oh.
Mithyaa`ae balyn nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw, Pachia sungsanaw, te Thyaa Muisaw vaeccawkunaw tuh nae balyn tungvaw kya la um sah. Amen.
Ccungccaw`ae kya-e locceihtu athua leipaw, ccungccaw liate mah athua leipaw, thuasalama a chih`ae paw kyate Jesu kha a thosatupaw Paaw Pachia te Jesu Kri liate locceihtu athua paw Paul,
te kamaw ryte a um`ae paw uteno`ae balyn nynh Galati pee e kriccawbu`ae kha kae beihlang oh.
Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nanning kya la um sah.
Ah Paaw Pachia rynaw thyhte hynh-e atu e ahoy leipaw she kyate aening kha luesah khylan cite, aening seinaw`ae hanlan Jesu nynh amaw te amaw kha a pyaku.
Tuh-e Paaw kalan phu-enaw tuh zungzae te zungzae la um sah. Amen.
Kri kya-e thawccinaw liate nanning ae kotu oh paw kyate ccangpaw thehoypaw kalan na paleihkuh kanmaw vae oh cipaw ka ngaeangthua.
Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh thehoypaw ccaccing thua khyh; thuasalama nanning kha vawsaw pya ae ry oh zah Kri thehoypaw kha ahme leipaw lang a paleihry`ae paw ccungccaw abang a um.

Thuasalama kaening zemah thuasah, tukhyhze vaawran kyate vaaw ccungccaw nynh zemah thuasah, nanning kalan kaening nynh phe kae hopya vae oh paw thehoypaw laelan ccangpaw thehoypaw kha a ho paw a um lanze aning tuh thyalaw thua sah.

Nanning nynh phe na lawku vae oh paw thehoypaw laelan ccangpaw thehoypaw kha nanning kalan a ho paw a um ze, tuh-e paw tuh thyalaw thua sah, cite langmaw lya phe kae ho vae hawte, atu kae nynh bua ka ho.

Pawccecize atu kae tuh ccungccaw kya-e maehoynaw tou ka ccungku? Tukhyhze Pachia kya-e tou? Tukhyhze kae tuh ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasah lan tou ka ccungku? Pawccecize kae nynh ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasah lan ka ccungku lanze, kae tuh Kri seepaw ka thua vae lan khyh.
Thuasalama uteno`ae, kae nynh ka ho paw thehoypaw tuh ccungccaw kya-e thua khyh cipaw nanning kha kae nysah ry oh.
Pawccecize kha-e thehoypaw kha kae nynh ccungccaw kyate ka mue khyh, kha-e kha hung nynh san yn ccangpah khyh`ae, thuasalama Jesu Kri kya-e byaphy liate nynh ka mue.
Pawccecize athang vae paw ccyh kya, Jew`ae beiknaw kya ka cyisahnaw kong kha nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh; Pachia kya-e kriccawbu kha tou kho um lei lan ka tua ka sah zah ro lan ka la zuakuh.
Ka minpaaw`ae kya-e phungzae`ae kha myaryamaw houh pangkhaete ka minphuin`ae kya kamaw te kae kum akhinkuh`ae paw patae laeze Jew`ae beiknaw kya ka la zuakuh hua.

Thuasalama Zenta`ae laku kya Jesu Kri thehoypaw kong kha ho khylan ka nung vue kyate kamaw yn phiatu te a thawccinaw liate yn kotupaw Pachia nynh kamaw kya a Ccapaw kong phy lan a lungry he thua tuh, chiisaw te khua ka rua kanmaw khyh.
Kamaw laeze langmaw locceihtu athuaty`ae paw kalan Jerusalem lang mah ka cceihthung khyh; thuasalama Arabia ram lungkhu lang nynh ka ccia, oute Damaskas lang bua ka ki.
Tuhkoute kum thung aro koute Piter te tungku khylan Jerusalem lang ka cceihthung, te amaw ryte nin haw laepangaw kae umkheih.
Thuasalama Bawipaw a neitaw James holeite ccangpaw locceihtu`ae hung sanmah ka muih khyh.
Atu nanning kalan ka zei`ae paw hynh, dotua oh, Pachia malang ka hyng paw thua khyh.
Tuhkoute Siria te Silisia ram`ae lungkhu lang ka thua.
Te Kri kya um paw Judea pee e kriccawbu`ae kalan kae tuh ka mitmae langkute ny ka thua khyh.
Thuasalama minmin nynh, “Langmaw lya aening oun tua oun sahtupaw nynh langmaw amaw nynh a ro paw zynnaw kha atu amaw nynh a ho ki vae,” cite kyalya nynh a thae`ae.
Oute minmin nynh kamaw keiccuze Pachia kha thehoysah`ae.
Oute kum haw laepali aro koute kae tuh Titu kha ka hoeibua zah Barnabas ryte Jerusalem lang bua kae cceihthung.

Te byaphy liate ka cceihthung zah Zenta`ae laku ka hopaw thehoypaw khate minmin kha ka ccuepe`ae, thuasalama kae nynh ka cyi vae paw te ka cyi lei lanpaw kha pawpawte mah alakaw lang athua khyh nawlan sawtua lan um`ae paw kalan nynh ka makhaete ka hopya`ae.
Thuasalama kamaw ryte kae um paw Titu tuh Greek paw lukheit mang athua pite vindung awku lan nangse khyh`ae.

Te Kri Jesu kya kaening nynh kae hoi paw luenaw kha dophi lan zah kaening kha seetangnaw kalan thuakhae khylan cite ny leipaw ccungccaw`ae nynh aphiru lante oun thuakhae`ae paw ahme leipaw uteno`ae keiccu nynh tuhte a cyi`ae.
Ahmepaw thehoypaw tuh nanning kya po atyn ccaw cite, kaening nynh sosoh sanmah ahme leipaw uteno`ae kalan kae ahkuh khyh.

Thuasalama hynh-e`ae kyaze sawtua lan um`ae paw, minmin tuh hung ccungccaw athua`ae zemah, ka hanlan pawtua um khyh. Pachia tuh ccungccaw maedo khyh, pawccecize minmin te tungkupaw nynh ka phungho kha pawsang biachih khyh`ae.
Thuasalama arawsekuh lante, vindung awkuh`ae paw hanlan thehoypaw kha Piter kalan a pya hawte, vindung awkuh lei`ae paw hanlan thehoypaw kha kamaw kalan pya athua paw kha minmin nynh he nyh`ae zah,
(Pawccecize vindung awkuh`ae paw kalan Piter kha locceihtu thua lan ryalahtupaw nynh Zenta`ae kalan kae kha locceihtu thuasah lan ka kya mah ryalah kalang),

rungpi hawte a tua`ae paw James, Sefas te Johan nynh kamaw pya athua paw thawccinaw kha he nyh`ae tuh, mimaw tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw kalan ccia lan zah kaening tuh Zenta`ae kalan cciasah khylan ranglang kuih nawccawkhaenaw kha kamaw te Barnabas kha oun pya`ae.
Kaening nynh ryachi`ae kae ning lei lanpaw rou kha minmin nynh oun rypya`ae, tuh-e tuh kae nynh mah lungthote cyi lan ka nungdekupaw nynh thua.
Thuasalama Antiok khua kalan Piter he yn thua tuh, aning tuh ccae lan a um keiccu a maedo leite ka pe.

Pawccecize ccungccaw abang nynh James kyate oun thua maw`ae ze Piter tuh Zenta`ae ryte a aekheih`ae; thuasalama minmin he oun thua`ae tuh, Piter tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw rawri keiccuze nuhlang thungkuh zah Zenta`ae kyate phe a phiakuh.
Te ccangpaw Jew`ae tuh Piter ryte alokuh lante a cyiruh`ae; ou tuhte minmin cyiruhnaw nynh Barnabas kha mah mih kalan phe a pangsah bua.

Thuasalama minmin nynh thehoypaw kya-e byaccing thyhte hmerarihlan hiin khyh`ae cipaw he ka muih tuh, mih balyn malang Piter kha, “Nang nynh Jew ccungccaw na thua pite Jew`ae hawte um leite, Zenta`ae phung thyhte na um lanze, pawccemou nang nynh Zenta`ae kha Jew`ae phung thyhte um lan na nangse`ae?
“Pynsawthuanaw lante aening tuh Jew`ae ah thua oh zah Zenta`ae misei`ae ah thua khyh oh.

Te ccungccaw lukheit tuh Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate thyaaccoukuh khyh, thuasalama Jesu Kri zynnaw liate nynh thyaaccouku cipaw ah ny oh. Kri zynnaw liate aening tuh thyaaccou oh ccaw cite, Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate thua leite, Jesu Kri kha aening nynh phe ah zyn vae oh. Pawccecize Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate hung ccungccaw sanmah thyaaccou kho thua lan khyh.

“Thuasalama Kri liate thyaaccouku ccaw cite aening nynh ah ccung cciamang lya oh heize, ahmaw te ahmaw mah misei`ae cite ah muihku oh lanze, tukeiccu Kri tuh seinaw ryalahtu tou a thua? Tuhte thua khyh!
Pawccecize kae nynh phe ka ro vae paw uccaw kha bua ka sakthui lanze, kamaw te kamaw kha kawbya rohtupaw lang a raekuh paw nynh ka thua.
Pawccecize Pachia hanlan ka hiin kho nawlan, Kawbya liate kae tuh Kawbya kalan ka chih.

Kae tuh Kri ryte khiade ka thua, tuhzemah ka hiin ung. Tuhzemah kae ka hiin khyh, thuasalama kae ka kya Kri nynh a hiin. Atu pynsaw kya kae ka hiin paw hiinnaw tuh kamaw hynh yn sungsah zah kae ka hanlan amaw te amaw a pyakuh paw Pachia Ccapaw zynnaw liate nynh ka hiin.
Pachia thawccinaw kha kae nynh ka vua khyh, pawccecize dingnaw tuh Kawbya liate a ccouku lanze, Kri tuh alakaw lang nynh a chihhang vae,” ka cipya.
Pou Galati mingaee`ae, phe a khiade vae`ae paw Jesu Kri kha nanning laku ccaerarihlan langsapya athua vae te, byaccing kha nanning nynh na zyn khyh nawlan oh hung nynh mou nanning kha phe ae mua oh?
Hynh-e kyalya hynh nynh nanning kyate ny ka ry: Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae liate tou nanning nynh Muisaw kha na mue oh? Tukhyhze zynnaw kya-e thaenaw liate tou na mue oh?
Myaryamaw na ngaee oh ang tou? Muisaw kya rya phe na tho vae oh pite, pynsaw liate tou atu nanning tuh ccingsah na thua oh?
Uccaw patae kha alakaw lang tou na teing hang oh? Alakaw lang tou a tanghang cih?
Tuhlaeze nanning kha Muisaw ae pya oh zah nanning laku thungnaw ryalahtupaw nynh kha-e kha Kawbya cyisahnaw`ae te tou a cyi? Tukhyhze zynnaw kya-e thaenaw liate tou a cyi?
Tuhhawte, “Abraham nynh Pachia kha zyn zah kha-e kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua.”.
Tukeiccu zynnaw a hoi`ae paw, minmin tuh Abraham ccaaw`ae nynh thua`ae cipaw nyh oh.
Pachia nynh Zenta`ae kha zynnaw liate thyaaccousah cih`ae cite Ccathyaa nynh phe muihty zah, “Nang na kya minphuin`ae balyn nynh hythuaccou cih`ae,” cite Abraham kalan thehoypaw kha phe a hoty vae.
Tukeiccu zynnaw a hoi`ae paw tuh a zyn paw Abraham ryte hythuaccou`ae paw nynh thua`ae.

Pawccecize Kawbya cyisahnaw a doliakuh`ae paw miakaw tuh thyalawnaw zakaw nynh um`ae; pawccecize, “Kawbya ccauh kya cyi lan azeikuh paw balyn kha pei a zui leipaw ccungccaw miakaw tuh thyalaw thua sah,” cite azeikuh.
