Thuasalama Pachia malang hung ccungccaw sanmah Kawbya liate thyaaccoupaw um khyh cipaw tuh ccaerarihlan lang alangkuh. Pawccecize, “Adingpaw ccungccaw tuh zynnaw liate nynh a hiin cih,” a cikuh.
Kawbya tuh zynnaw te sekuh khyh. Thuasalama Ccathyaa nynh, “Kawbya`ae a zui paw ccungccaw tuh Kawbya`ae liate nynh a hiin cih,” a ci.

Pawccecize, “Thing kya sae athua paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh thyalawpaw nynh thua,” cite azeikuh hawte, Kri tuh aening keiccuze thyalawnaw a ccou paw thua zah Kawbya kya-e thyalawnaw kyate aening kha phe oun sawkhaw vae.
Ou tuhte Abraham nynh a mue paw hythuanaw tuh Jesu Kri liate Zenta`ae kalan a thuabua nawlan, aening nynh zynnaw liate byakinpyakupaw te asekuhpaw Muisaw kha ah mue nawlan oh.
Uteno`ae, ccungccaw`ae phung thyhte nynh ka ho. Ccungccaw lukheit kya-e byakin heize tynsah athua lanze, hung ccungccaw nynh san roh vae khyh, bia mah biachih vae khyh.

Byakinpyakupaw`ae kha Abraham te a ciihan hanlan nynh raepya athua. Pataepaw hawte, “Ciihan`ae hanlan,” cite Pachia nynh ho khyh; thuasalama lukheitpaw hawte, “Na ciihan hanlan,” cite nynh a ho, tuh-e paw tuh Kri nynh thua.

E hynh kae hopya oh; Kri kya Pachia nynh phe a tynsah vae paw byakin kha kum zapali sungthung alue koute a um paw Kawbya nynh roh kho vae khyh; byakinpyakupaw kha accakaepaw lang Kawbya nynh tangsah kho khyh.
Pawccecize rho uccaw tuh Kawbya kya-e athua lanze, byakinpyakupaw kya-e thua vae khyh, thuasalama Pachia nynh byakinpyakupaw liate nynh Abraham kha rho uccaw a pya.

Tuhte lanze pawkeiccumou Kawbya tuh yn thua? Byakinpyakupaw raepya athua paw kalan Ciihan a thua cia, cyiseinaw`ae keiccu nynh Kawbya tuh biachih athua. Vaaw ccungccaw`ae liate nynh kha-e kha ccawkunaw raetupaw kuih liate pya athua.
Te ccawkunaw raetupaw tuh lukheit hanlan rou thua khyh, thuasalama Pachia tuh ccangkheit nynh thua.

Tuhte lanze Kawbya tuh Pachia kya-e byakinpyakupaw te arawsekuh tou? Tuhte thua khyh. Pawccecize hiinnaw phe a pya khopaw Kawbya kha pya a la thua vae ze, thanccing lante dingnaw tuh Kawbya liate nynh athua vae cih.
Thuasalama a zyn paw ccungccaw`ae kha Jesu Kri zynnaw liate byakinpyakupaw kha pya athua nawlan, Ccathyaa nynh ccungccaw balyn kha seinaw zakaw pung oun khung.
Thuasalama zynnaw yn thua maw, aening tuh Kawbya zakaw nynh khung ah thua oh, nyalang yn langkuh vae cih paw zynnaw kalan phe oun la khawsung`ae.
Tukeiccu aening tuh zynnaw liate thyaaccou ah thua nawlan oh, Kawbya tuh aening kha Kri kalan thuakhae khylan, aening yn ccangpatu nynh thua.
Thuasalama zynnaw he yn thua koute, aening tuh yn ccangpatu zakaw ah um vae khyh oh.
Pawccecize Kri Jesu zynnaw liate nanning balyn tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh na thua oh.
Pawccecize Kri lungkhu lang baptisma-in vae`ae paw nanning balyn tuh Kri kha phe na lawkuh vae oh paw nynh thua.

Kri kya Jew paw ci um vae khyh, Greek paw ci um vae khyh, a luepaw ci um vae khyh, see ci um vae khyh, pise ci um vae khyh, nopi ci um vae khyh; pawccecize Kri Jesu kya nanning balyn tuh ccangkheitpaw nynh na thua vae oh.
Te nanning tuh Kri kya-e na thua oh lanze, nanning tuh Abraham ciihan nynh na thua vae oh, te byakinpyakupaw thyhte rhoccoutu`ae nynh na thua vae oh.
Atu kae hopya oh, rhoccoutu tuh uccaw balyn kha a hoitupaw mang athua zemah, imua athua lungkhu balyn tuh see lukheit te alaenaw um khyh.
Thuasalama a paaw nynh a khyapaw ccyh azaw mawlaezung tuh dooihtu`ae te ringtu`ae zakaw nynh a um ung.
Tuhhawte aening mah imua`ae ah thua lya oh tuh laephipi e atakaw ccangpyanaw kya-e seetangnaw zakaw kya nynh ah la um oh.

Thuasalama accyh ccingnaw he yn thua tetuh Kawbya zakaw um`ae paw kha sawkhaw khylan, ccaaw`ae kya-e ccaawthuanaw kha aening nynh ah ccoubua nawlan oh, nopinung vue kya poisah zah Kawbya zakaw yn puisah paw a Ccapaw kha Pachia nynh yn saw.
Te nanning tuh ccaaw`ae na thua oh keiccuze, “Abba, Apang!” cite a kosah paw, a Ccapaw kya-e Muisaw kha nanning nae thinlung`ae lungkhu lang Pachia nynh phe a saw vae.
Tukeiccu nang tuh see na thua vae khyh, thuasalama ccapaw nynh na thua vae, te ccapaw na thua vae lanze Kri liate Pachia kya-e rhoccoutu nynh na thua vae.
Tuhzemah langmaw nanning nynh Pachia na la ny khyh oh lyakha, pachia athua lei`ae paw kha nanning nynh aphungpaw lante rya na lawpya oh.

Thuasalama atu nanning nynh Pachia kha phe na ny vae oh, tukhyhze Pachia nynh phe ae ny vae oh paw nynh a thawzyapaw, anyaapaw huhan`ae kalan pawccemou bua na paleihku oh? Pawccemou tuh-e kalan see lang bua tang khylan nanning nynh na ry ung oh?
Nanning nynh nin`ae te sawpaw`ae, kumvaelori`ae te kum`ae kha na tuasethya oh.
Kae tuh nanning kya alakaw lang nynh ryalaw phe ka law hang vae cite nanning keiccu ka thinphang.
Uteno`ae, kae tuh nanning hawte ka thua keiccu, kae hawte nanning thuabua oh cite kae ngia oh; nanning nynh ka tungvaw kharyh na cyihsei khyh oh.
Kae nynh ka pynsaw nyaanaw ryte nae kalan thehoypaw masaty ka ho cipaw kha nanning nynh na ny oh.

Ka pynsaw kya ka tungpaw syntawnaw kha nanning nynh pawlangria leite na um khyh oh, kamaw mah nae deebia khyh oh; thuasalama Pachia kya-e vaaw ccungccapaw hawte thuasah, Jesu Kri hawte thuasah kamaw kha nae lehkhan oh.

Tuhte lanze nanning nynh hythuanaw na ccou oh paw tuh pawmou athua? Pawccecize, athua kho ze nanning nynh nae mit`ae kha poh khoiku lan zah kamaw kha phe pya lan hei na ry oh cite langmaw nanning konglang ccaekia ka khan.
Tukeiccu atu kae nynh byaccing kha nanning kae hopya oh keiccu kae tuh nae rhawpaw lang tou ka tang?

Minmin nynh nanning ae lungmung oh paw tuh, nae hanlan ahoypaw elan thua khyh; ou nanning nynh minmin kha na lungmungru nawlan oh, te minmin nynh nanning kha kamaw kyate phiasaku lan ae ry oh paw te nynh thua.
Thuasalama nanning ryte kae ka um lya kyalya ahoypaw kha myarya na lungmung lan oh paw thua khyh, ahoypaw kha pei na lungmung lan oh paw nynh thua.
Kri kha nanning kya phe a raekuh lan cia ccaawpuinaw neitangia bua ka teingpya`ae paw ka ccaaw taraw`ae,
atu nanning ryte um lan ka ry zah ka byaho rulaeku lan ka ry, pawccecize nanning kya lunghiinnaw ka hoi.
Kawbya zakaw a umry`ae paw nanning, Kawbya kha phe na thae vae oh khaw? Yn hopya tua oh.
Pawccecize Abraham nynh ccaaw`ae luning a hoi, lukheit tuh seenung ccaaw, lukheit tuh a luepaw nopinung ccaaw nynh thua cite Ccathyaa nynh a ho.
Seenung ccaaw tuh pynsaw lante a pui paw nynh thua, thuasalama a luepaw nopinung ccaaw tuh byakinpyakupaw liate a puipaw nynh thua.
Tuh-e`ae kong tuh tousenawpaw nynh thua: Pawccecize hynh-e nopi luning`ae tuh byakin`ae ccangning nynh thua; Hakar athua paw byakin ccangkheit tuh Sinai Mua kyate thua zah see ccaaw`ae kha a pousah.
Pawccecize hynh-e Hakar tuh Arabia ram kya um paw Sinai Mua nynh thua, te atu um paw Jerusalem te nynh aloku. Amaw a ccaaw`ae ryte seetangnaw kya nynh um`ae.
Thuasalama luki lang a um paw Jerusalem tuh aening balyn kya-e ah nung athua paw, a luepaw nopinung nynh thua.

Pawccecize, “Ccaawsaah leipaw a tinnung nang, na lungtua sah; neitangia a teing lei nung nang, roisaw lah sia; pawccecize a cciataw vae`ae paw nopinung nynh vawpaw a hoi paw nopinung laeze ccaaw`ae patae a hoihua,” cite azeikuh.
Uteno`ae, atu aening tuh Isaak hawte byakinpyakupaw kya-e ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh.
Thuasalama pynsaw lante a pui paw ccaaw nynh Muisaw liate a pui paw ccaaw kha a tua a sah hawte, tuhawmawte nynh atu mah athua.
Tuhzemah Ccathyaa nynh paw a ci mou? “Seenung te a ccapaw kha dae dee`ae; pawccecize seenung a ccapaw nynh a luepaw nopinung ccapaw ryte rhoccoutu lang tangkheih lan khyh,” a ci.
Tukeiccu uteno`ae, aening tuh seenung ccaaw`ae ah thua khyh oh, thuasalama a luepaw nopinung ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh.
Tukeiccu Kri nynh aening phe oun luesah vae paw luenaw kyakhe tynkaring lang thadyn oh, seetangnaw kya-e taphu khate bua bawkuh nan vae oh.
Dotua oh, kae Paul nynh nanning kae hopya oh paw tuh, nanning tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw na thua oh ze, Kri tuh nanning hanlan pawsang athanenaw um khyh.
Pawccecize vindung awkuh paw ccungccaw miakaw kalan ccaekia bua ka khan paw tuh kha-e paw tuh Kawbya khaleih zui lan laeba umtupaw nynh thua.
Kawbya liate thyaaccou`ae paw nanning miakaw hanlan Kri tuh nae hanlan pawlang tang vae khyh; nanning tuh thawccinaw kyate phe na khuliakuh vae oh.
Pawccecize aening tuh zynnaw liate dingnaw kya-e ngaehoinaw kha Muisaw liate nynh phang ah ngaw oh.
Pawccecize Jesu Kri kya vindung awkupaw thuasah, vindung awku leipaw mah thuasah pawsang thane khyh; thuasalama sungsakunaw liate ryalah paw zynnaw nynh athane.
Nanning tuh kou hoy lang na ccue vae oh, byaccing kha nanning nynh na ngae khyh nawlan oh hung nynh mou nanning kha ae khee oh?
Hynh-e soihnawpaw tuh nanning ae ko oh paw kyate yn thua khyh.
Ditaripaw ransi nynh vaedi khaleih kha pung a thosah.
Nanning lungccang na hoi lan khyh oh cite Bawipaw liate nae kya zynkunaw ka hoi. Thuasalama nanning vawsaw ae pyatu oh paw ccungccaw tuh hunghung athua zemah byapianaw kha a ing cih.
Uteno`ae, kae nynh vindung awkunaw kong kha ka ho ung lanze, pawccemou tuasahkunaw kha pei ka teing ung? Tuhte ka ho lanze, vaelantung kya-e thykupawkunaw tuh phe adae cih.
Nanning vawsaw ae pya oh paw ccungccaw`ae kha thoh bae`ae sah ci hei ka ry!
Pawccecize uteno`ae, nanning tuh luenaw kalan ko na thua vae oh, tuhzemah pynsaw ccyhhoypaw hanlan luenaw kha mang nan oh, thuasalama sungsakunaw liate lukheit te lukheit ryalawpakuh oh.
Pawccecize Kawbya balyn tuh, “Na innpaw kha namaw hawkhate na sungsah cih,” acikuh paw hynh-e bya kyahin phe accing.
Thuasalama nanning nynh lukheit te lukheit na teikuh oh zah na laangku oh ze, lukheit te lukheit na roku khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh!
Te kae nynh, Muisaw te hiin oh lah pynsaw duanaw kha nanning nynh na ccingsah lang khyh oh, kae cipya oh.

Pawccecize pynsaw rynaw tuh Muisaw rynaw te rawsekuh zah Muisaw rynaw mah pynsaw rynaw te arawsekuh. Hynhe` ae tuh ccangkheit te ccangkheit arawsekuh`ae; tukeiccu nanning nynh na cyi ry oh paw kha na cyih khyh oh.
Thuasalama nanning kha Muisaw nynh ae cciakhae oh ze, nanning tuh Kawbya zakaw na um vae khyh oh.
Pynsaw cyisahnaw`ae tuh raerae a langkuh. Tuh-e`ae tuh: milae zu milae vawpaw seikhaepaw, ohhuakunaw, nungsikunaw, sahpaw eih rynaw;
zohtuhbeiknaw, ccungccaw nawthyanaw, huakunaw, byalungnaw, ccungingkunaw, thinria bungpawnaw, ahmaw hanlan kyalya tuakunaw, lungnging leinaw, ahme leipaw ccangpyakunaw,

eiungnaw, ccungccaw chianaw, ruinaw, aeniapoituakunaw, te khahtahawpaw cyisahnaw`ae nynh thua. Khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae a cyih paw ccungccaw`ae tuh Pachia peenaw kha rhoccou lan khyh`ae cite langmaw lya ka ho vae hawte, kha-e`ae kong kha nanning kae hopyaty oh.
Thuasalama Muisaw thae tuh sungsakunaw, lungpawnaw, daenaw, lungsaenaw, tuathyanaw, hoynaw, lungzinaw,
nevyalyanaw, sungku khonaw nynh thua. Khahtahawpaw a rawsepaw kawbya um khyh.
Kri kya-e ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh pynsaw te pynsaw rynaw te duanaw`ae kha phe a khiade vae`ae.
Aening nynh Muisaw kya ah hiin oh thua ze, Muisaw kya mah cceih oh sih.
Lukheit te lukheit ccyaku te, lukheit te lukheit eiungkute accakaepaw pookunaw kha aening nynh peki nan oh sih.

Uteno`ae, ccungccaw lukheit tuh seinaw kya phe a phungku lanze, muisaw ccungccaw`ae nanning nynh nevyalyapaw thinlung te khahtahawpaw ccungccaw kha a umtynaw kya bua umsah oh; namaw mah tuhounaw na tung khyh nawlan la raeringkuh.
Lukheit te lukheit kya-e aripaw phupaw`ae kha duekute nanning nynh Kri kya-e kawbya kha la ccingsah oh.
Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh pawsang athua leite thanccingpaw maman lante a tuaku lanze, amaw te amaw kha a lingkuh paw nynh thua.
Te ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw a ryalaw kha sihseikuh sah, te mingccangpaw kya thua leite amaw makhae kyakhe aning tuh lungpawnaw a hoi cih.
Pawccecize ccungccaw miakaw nynh amaw a phupaw kha a phukuh cih.
Bya a ccangkuh paw ccungccaw nynh a ccangpatupaw kha ahoypaw uccaw balyn khate neethungbua sah.
Lingsakuh nan oh, Pachia tuh pawlangria leite nung kho thua khyh; pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh ccaciivua paw kha, a vua thyhte kha-e kha bua a rue cih.
Pawccecize a pynsaw hanlan ccaciivua paw nynh pynsaw kya-e aroh paw kha a rue cih; thuasalama Muisaw hanlan ccaciivua paw nynh tuh Muisaw kya-e zungzae hiinnaw kha a rue cih.
Te ahoypaw ryalawnaw kya thawbang lungthang nan oh sih; pawccecize tuhte ah lungthawthang khyh ze, accyh he yn zawte aening nynh ah ruekuh cih oh.
Tukeiccu aening nynh ccyhhoypaw ah mue oh thyhte, ccungccaw balyn hanlan ahoypaw cyipah oh sih. Abapi lante zynnaw kya-e innbyn`ae hanlan ahoypaw cyipah oh sih.
Pawcih alepaw ccaw kha nynh kamaw ka kuih te nanning kalan ka zei cipaw na muih oh!

Mimaw mih pynsaw maehoynaw a langsakuh ry`ae paw ccungccaw patae nynh nanning kha vindung awku lan ae nangse oh; tuhte a cyi`ae paw tuh Kri kya-e vaelantung keiccuze a tua a sahnaw`ae paw kha minmin nynh kae teing sei cih cite a tuaku`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Pawccecize vindung awkuh`ae paw mimaw mah Kawbya kha zui khyh`ae. Thuasalama nanning nae pynsaw kya a pookury`ae pawte nynh nanning kha vindung awkuh`ae sah ci ae ry oh.

Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e vaelantung kya laelan kae nynh ka pooku lanpaw kharyh um khyh; tuh-e vaelantung liate laephipi tuh kae ka hanlan khiade thua vae zah kae mah laephipi hanlan khiade ka thua vae.
Pawccecize Kri Jesu kya tuh vindung awkupaw thuasah, vindung awku leipaw thuasah pawsang thane khyh, thuasalama raethawpaw kha nynh athane.
Hynh-e upadi phung thyhte a zui`ae paw ccungccaw`ae balyn tungvaw kya thuasah, Pachia kya-e Israel`ae kya thuasah, daenaw te ngaethya-umsanaw tuh la um vae sah.
Atu liate hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah kamaw hynh vawsaw yn pya nan vae sah; pawccecize Bawipaw Jesu kya-e vaemaw daelaepaw kha ka pyn kya a phubia paw nynh ka thua.
Uteno`ae, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae thinlung kya la um vae sah. Amen.
Pachia rynaw thyhte Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw Paul nynh Efesa khua kya a um`ae paw mithyaa`ae te Kri Jesu kya zyn lan um`ae paw kalan kae beihlang oh.
Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um vae sah.
Kri kya vaawran te asekuhpaw muisaw hythuanaw`ae balyn ryte aening kha hythua oun pyatupaw ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw Pachia ccaccei tuh thehoy te um sah.
Tuhhawte Pachia malang aening tuh sungsakunaw kya ah thyaa nawlan oh te ccaenaw a hoi leipaw ah thua nawlan oh, laephipi athotakaw mawze aening kha Kri kya phe oun po vae hawte.
A lungrythuasahpaw amaw a rynaw thyhte, Jesu Kri liate amaw kalan ccaaw`ae hawte ccaawthuanaw khylan aening kha langmawpi te phe oun la paccynde vae.
A Sungsahpaw Ccapaw kya aening oun lehkhannawpaw tuh a phuepaw a thawccinaw kha thehoysah khylan nynh thua.
Ccapaw a thawccinaw hoirungnaw thyhte, a chii liate seinaw`ae ngaethyanaw athua paw sawkhawnaw kha amaw kya aening nynh ah mue oh.
Tuh-e thawccinaw kha hawnaw balynte thaethyanaw te aening kalan paepaelui lan oun raepya vae.
Amaw nynh phe a paccynkuty vae paw ahoypaw a lungrythuanaw thyhte Pachia nynh a rynaw kya-e byakhupaw kha aening kalan phe yn nysah vae.

Ou tuhte accyh`ae accingnaw kya-e ccyhphianaw kya, aning nynh vaawran kya um paw te laephi kya um paw paryhte Kri amaw ccaccei kyakhe pawpaw balyn kha pynkheihlan sang kheit kya pung a suelua nawlan nynh thua.
Amaw a khuakhannaw thyhte pawpaw balyn kha a cyihtupaw Pachia nynh amaw a eenaw thyhte langmawpi te phe a paccynde vae thyhte Kri kyakhe aening mah rhoccounaw kha ah mue oh.
Ou tuhte Kri kha masaty a ngaehoikuh`ae paw aening tuh amaw phu-enaw thehoysah paw ah thua nawlan oh nynh thua.

Nanning mah nae kya-e khumnaw thehoypaw athua paw byaccing bya kha na thae oh koute amaw kha na zyn oh, nanning nynh amaw kha na zyn oh koute Pachia nynh byakinpyakupaw Thyaa Muisaw khate nanning tuh tazeihkhia na thua vae oh.
Pachia nynh a re vae paw, a hoi paw uccaw kha a sawkhaw makhia cia, tuh-e Muisaw tuh aening rho uccaw kya-e pyatypaw nynh thua, tuh-e tuh a phu-enaw kha thehoysah nawlan nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Bawipaw Jesu na zynnaw oh paw te mithyaa`ae balyn na sungsanaw oh paw kha he ka thae tuh,
nanning hanlan dae leite lungtuabya ka ho zah nanning kha ka sawsangnaw kya tyty kae lia oh.
Saw ka sang paw tuh: ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Pachia, phu-enaw Paaw nynh hawnaw muisaw te amaw kya-e nynaw byaphy kha nanning ae pya nawlan oh,

thaethya nawlan nae thinlung mit ae awsapya nawlan oh, amaw konawpaw ngaehoinaw tuh paw nynh thua cipaw na ny nawlan oh, te mithyaa`ae kya um paw amaw kya-e rho uccaw phuenaw hoirungnaw tuh paw nynh thua cipaw na ny nawlan oh,
te amaw kya-e myarya athungpaw thungnaw kya-e ryalawnaw thyhte, a zyn`ae paw aening kalan amaw kya-e a thawsaepaw thungnaw tuh hohcih nynh ale cipaw na ny nawlan oh, saw kae sangpya oh.
Kri kha a chih`ae paw kyate thosah zah vaawran kya amaw a ranglang khe a dahungsah lya, kha-e thungnaw te nynh Kri kya Paaw nynh rya a law.

Alupihuanaw balyn, cyi khonaw balyn, thungnaw balyn, te ukkunaw balyn kya ahanghua lante a dahungsah, te atu she kyalya thua leite yn thua vae cih paw she kyacia minphukuh paw min miakaw balyn kya ahanghua lante a nung.
Te pawpaw balyn kha Kri a ccuphe kaw marya nung zah pawpaw balyn kyaze lu lang amaw kha kriccawbu hanlan a pya.
Tuh-e kriccawbu tuh pawpaw kya pawpaw balyn phe biasah paw amaw ccingnaw athua paw a pyn nynh athua.
Te ccouseikunaw`ae te seinaw`ae kya a chih vae`ae paw nanning kha Pachia nynh ae hiinsah oh.

Langmaw lya nanning tuh hynh-e laephipi ccianaw thyhte kha-e`ae kya na la hiin oh, khivae kya-e thungnaw uktu bawi paw rynaw thyhte, kawngae lei`ae paw ccaaw`ae kya atu ryalah paw muisaw rynaw thyhte na la hiin oh.

Tuh-e`ae laku aening balyn mah langmaw lya pynsaw rynaw te thinlung rynaw kha ccingsah te ah pynsaw duanaw`ae kya ah la ciakuh bua oh. Mingccang`ae hawnaw te, aening mah thuanaw lante thinrianaw a ccou`ae paw ccaaw`ae nynh ah la thua oh.
Thuasalama ngaethya-umsanaw te phe beihpaw Pachia nynh aening kha myarya alepaw a sungsanaw te oun sungsah keiccu,
seinaw kya ah chi oh lyakhe, Kri ryte pynkheihlan aening kha oun hiinsah vae, (thawccinaw liate nanning tuh khum na thua vae oh),
te pynkheihlan oun thosah zah Kri Jesu kya vaawran hmin`ae kya pynkheihlan oun dahungsah vae.
Ou tuhte yn thua lanpaw she kya myaryamaw alungpaw a thawccinaw kha a tuathyanaw liate Kri Jesu kya aening kalan oun langsapya nawlan nynh thua.
Pawccecize thawccinaw keiccuze zynnaw liate nanning tuh khum na thua vae oh. Naemaw te naemaw liate thua khyh, Pachia lasung nynh thua.
Ryalawnaw liate thua khyh, tukhyh lanze lukhakheit nynh phe a pookuh sei cih.

Pawccecize aening tuh amaw nynh oun rae paw, ahoypaw ryalaw`ae law khylan Kri Jesu kya rae paw nynh ah thua oh. Tuh-e ahoypaw ryalaw`ae kya aening nynh ah hiin nawlan oh Pachia nynh phe a la paccynty vae.

Tukeiccu langmaw lya, pynsaw kya kuih te rae paw vindung awkunaw a ccou`ae paw nynh nanning kha vindung awkuh lei`ae paw ae ci oh paw te pynsaw lante nanning tuh Zenta`ae na la thua oh paw kha liathui oh.

Tuh ccyh lya nanning tuh Kri leite na la um oh paw, Israel khuaram toonaw kyate khycce`ae na la thua oh paw, byakinpyakupaw kya-e byakin`ae kyate mikhia`ae na la thua oh paw, ngaehoinaw hoi lei`ae paw, te laephipi kya Pachia leite na la um oh paw kha liathui oh.
Thuasalama langmaw lya kou na la sawkuh oh paw nanning kha Kri chii liate Kri Jesu kya atu tuh naesaku na thua vae oh.
Pawccecize amaw tuh aening bua ccawkunaw nynh thua. Aning nynh alaku-e arihkhawpaw lungrua kha pung tingsabung zah minphuin phinning kha phinkheit lang phe a rae vae.

Ccangpyakunaw`ae kya a um paw, kawpyapaw`ae Kawbya athua paw rhawkunaw kha amaw pynsaw kya phe a rosah vae; minphuin phinning kha amaw kya athawpaw ccungccaw ccangkheit lang rae khylan nynh bua ccawkunaw kha a rae.
Te aning nynh minphuin phinning kha pyn pynkheit kya Pachia te bua ccawsakuthui khylan nynh rhawkunaw kha vaelantung liate phe a maemih.
Te Kri nynh yn thua zah asawnaw kya um`ae paw nanning kalan te anaenaw kya um`ae paw kalan daenaw thehoypaw kha a ho.
Pawccecize amaw liate Muisaw ccangkheit liate aening paryh tuh Paaw kalan thua khonaw ah hoi oh.
Tukeiccu atu nanning tuh mikhia`ae te minphuinccang`ae na thua vae khyh oh, thuasalama mithyaa`ae ryte khuaccaw`ae nynh na thua vae oh, Pachia innbyn kya-e`ae nynh na thua vae oh.
Nanning tuh locceihtu`ae te profeh`ae athua paw lung-inn athonaw vawlan sakthyh paw nynh na thua oh, Jesu Kri amaw tuh abapi huapaw alukipaccy lung nynh thua.
Amaw kya sak paw inn balyn tuh rekuhmamia lang sak thua zah Bawipaw kya athyaapaw tempal lang a lethung.
Muisaw liate Pachia a um nawlan nanning kha mah amaw kya pynkheihlan sak na thua oh.
Tuh-e keiccuze kae Paul tuh nanning Zenta`ae hanlan Jesu Kri keiccu thungccahpaw nynh ka thua.
Nanning thanenaw hanlan kamaw pya athua paw Pachia thawccinaw kya-e dooihnawrya kong kha nanning nynh phe na thae mamin vae cih oh.
Tuh-e tuh, byaphy liate Pachia nynh byakhupaw kha kamaw phe yn nysah vae (dyntari te ccaw phe kae zei vae hawte,
kha-e kha nanning nynh he na ria oh te, Kri kya-e byakhupaw kya ka nynaw kha nanning nynh na thaethya nawlan oh cite),
kha-e byakhupaw kha amaw kya-e athyaapaw locceihtu`ae te profeh`ae kalan Muisaw liate atu lya phe a phypya`ae hawte, ccangpaw she kya ccungccaw ccaaw`ae kalan la phypah khyh`ae.
Tuh-e tuh, thehoypaw liate Zenta`ae mah rhoccoubua`ae paw thua nawlan, phe alokuhpaw pyn kya-e thua nawlan, te Kri kya a byakinpyakupaw kya-e a neethungkuh bua`ae paw thua nawlan nynh thua.
Amaw thungnaw kya-e ccungkiapaw ryalawnaw liate, kamaw pya athua paw Pachia kyae thawccinaw lasung thyhte, kae tuh kha-e thehoypaw ryalahtu lang kae tang.
Tou kho um leipaw Kri kya-e hoirungnaw kha Zenta`ae kalan ka ho nawlan, mithyaa`ae balyn kyaze anyaa huapaw laeze houh anyaa huapaw kamaw kha hynh-e thawccinaw kha pya ka thua.

Pawpaw balyn Jesu Kri liate a raetupaw Pachia kya laephipi athotakaw kyate phisi athua paw kha-e byakhupaw kya-e vaeccawtangnaw tuh pawhynh nynh thua cipaw ccungccaw`ae balyn kha muihsah khylan hynh-e thawccinaw kha pya ka thua.
Tuhte muihsah rynawpaw tuh Pachia hawnaw aphuinphuin kha vaawran e uktu`ae kalan te kawhoitu`ae kalan kriccawbu liate atu nysah bua athua nawlan nynh thua.
Tuh-e tuh ah Bawipaw Kri Jesu kya Pachia nynh zungzae atynpaw eenaw thyhte a ccingsahpaw nynh thua.
Kri zynnaw liate zynkute rawhoynaw te Pachia kalan thua khonaw kha amaw kya ah hoi oh.
Tukeiccu nanning kya-e phuenaw athua paw, nanning hanlan ka teingpaw vawsawnaw`ae keiccuze nae lungthang khyh nawlan kae ngia oh.
Hynh-e keiccu nynh ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw kalan ccukharu ka tung.
Amaw kyate nynh vaawran kya te laephi kya innbyn khaleih tuh minphu athua.
Saw ka sang paw tuh: amaw phu-enaw kya-e hoirungnaw thyhte Pachia nynh nanning kha ae pya nawlan oh, amaw Muisaw thungnaw liate alungkhu lang-e ccungccapaw kha thawzung te thawsaesah athua nawlan,
te zynnaw liate Kri tuh nanning thinlung kya a um nawlan; te sungsakunaw kya nanning tuh tharuisaw te bingku na thua vae oh thyhte,
mithyaa`ae balyn ryte Kri kya-e sungsanaw akopaw, asaepaw, akhupaw te ahangpaw kha na nythya nawlan oh,
nynaw po aluepaw Kri kya-e sungsanaw kha na ny nawlan oh; ou tuhte nanning tuh Pachia kyae ccingnaw balyn ryte phe na bia nawlan oh saw ka sang.
Atu aening kya ryalah paw thungnaw thyhte, aening nynh ah ngia oh paw balyn, tukhyhze ah tua oh paw balyn laeze myaryamaw alunghua lante a cyih khopaw Pachia tuh,
Kri Jesu liate kriccawbu kya she balyn kya zungzae te zungzae cia phu-esah. Amen.
Tukeiccu Bawipaw keiccuze thungccahpaw kae Paul nynh ko na thua oh paw nanning kha, kha-e konaw te angaekuh lante na hiin nawlan oh kae ngia oh.
Pawpaw balyn kya zakawsangsakunaw te, lungnenaw te, ngaesangnaw te, sungsakunaw kya lukheit te lukheit ngaethyaku te,
ccawkunaw te sueluakunaw kya Muisaw kya-e lungngingnaw kha tynsah khylan thawte zuakuh oh.
Nanning konaw kya-e ngaehoinaw tuh ccangkheit kyalya athua hawte, pyn pynkheit, Muisaw ccangkheit,
Bawipaw ccangkheit, zynnaw ccangkheit, baptisma ccangkheit,
pawpaw balyn Paaw athua paw Pachia ccangkheit nynh a um. Tuh-e Pachia tuh pawpaw balyn luki a um paw, teitei balyn kya a um paw, te nanning balyn kya a um paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama Kri kya-e lasung tounawpaw thyhte aening lu raveih tuh thawccinaw kha pya ah thua oh.
Tukeiccu, “Aning nynh ahangnaw lang he a kaethung tuh, kyngte thungsaw`ae paw kha a cciakhae`ae, te ccungccaw`ae kha lasung a pya`ae,” cite a ho.
(Atu, “Aning tuh a kaethung,” a cipaw tuh pawmou a hory? Masaty laephi anehuanaw kalan mah a rungbung paw kha nynh thua.
Yn rungbung paw aning tuh pawpaw balyn kha phe biasah khylan, vaawran`ae balyn luki lang a kaethung paw aning maw kha nynh thua.)
Te amaw ccaccei nynh ccungccaw abang kha locceihtuthuanaw, te abang kha profehthuanaw, abang kha evangelistthuanaw, abang kha pastor te ccangpatuthuanaw a pya`ae,
tuhte a pya`ae paw tuh Kri pyn kha tynsathung khylan, ryalawnaw kya-e ryalaw hanlan mithyaa`ae kha paccyn khylan,

aening balyn nynh zynnaw kya lunglokunaw te Pachia Ccapaw nynaw lunglokunaw kya ah thua oh cia, Kri kya-e ccingnaw pynrua tounawpaw athua paw, piccangthua vae paw ccungccaw athuakuh cia ah thua nawlan oh;

ou tuhte ccungccaw`ae nynh hyngpyanaw liate, a cyisakuh thyapaw thyaruhnaw te a pheethyapaw pheenaw kya ccangpyanaw khivae miakaw nynh po cciakhae`ae zah nuhlang malang ahekuh`ae paw imua`ae kharyh ah thua vae khyh nawlan oh,
thuasalama sungsakunaw kya byaccing kha hote, aening tuh lu athua paw Kri kya pawpaw kya balyn ah lethung nawlan oh,

amaw kyate atungkunaw miakaw nynh thawpya zah pyn balyn tuh rekuhmamia lang tungkuh`ae zah akyngkuh`ae, pyn kya-e raveih nynh ccungkia lang rya a law`ae thyhte, sungsakunaw kya kha-e pyn kha tynsathung nawlan pyn kha a lethungsah.
Tukeiccuze tuhlaepaw Zenta`ae nynh accakaepaw mih tuanaw-thinlung kya a hiin`ae hawte nanning nynh na hiinbua khyh nawlan oh e hynh ka ho zah Bawipaw kya ccaekia ka khan.
Minmin kya nythyanaw kharyh a um khyh keiccu, mih thinlung mitmoh keiccu, mih thaethyanaw tuh karae amoh, Pachia kya-e hiinnaw kyate phe a phiakuh vae`ae.
Minmin tuh maethya ny leite, eih duanaw te nungsikunaw tynre kha cyi khylan mimaw te mimaw kha myarya ohhuakurynaw kalan a ahkuh`ae.
Thuasalama nanning tuh Kri kong kha tuhte na ccangkuh khyh oh;
byaccing tuh Jesu kya a um hawte, amaw kong kha nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh zah amaw nynh phe ae ccangpya vae oh lanze,
langmaw nae ozia te asekuh lante a hyngthyapaw ryduanaw thyhte phe aroh vae paw arynpaw ccungccaw kha nanning nynh na vua nawlan oh,
te nae tuanaw-thinlung muisaw kha thawsahte na um nawlan oh,
te ahmepaw dingnaw kya te thyaanaw kya Pachia hawmawte rae athua paw, athawpaw ccungccaw kha nanning nynh na lawku nawlan oh nynh thua.
Tukeiccu hyngbya kha nungbiate, “Nanning lu raveih nynh nae innpaw`ae ryte byaccing kha ho oh,” pawccecize aening tuh lukheit te lukheit pyn kyae` ae nynh ah thua oh.
“Nae thinria zemah sei nan oh:” nae bungpawnaw khate khuanin ccawsah nan oh.
Diabolos kha umnaw ua nan oh.
Aruhpaw ccungccaw nynh kharyh ruh nan vae sah, thuasalama ahoboupaw ccungccaw kha pyabua lanpaw a hoi nawlan, amaw a kuih te ahoypaw ryalaw kha zuakute lah sah.
Anungsikuhpaw bya kaw kheit san nae khalang kyate pou nan sah. Thuasalama a thaetu`ae kha Pachia thawccinaw a neethungbua nawlan, tynsathungnaw hanlan athanepaw ahoypaw bya palia pousah oh.
Sawkhawnaw nin hanlan nanning tazeih ae khianaw oh paw, Pachia Thyaa Muisaw kha thinlungccisah nan oh.
Thinlung kya phang poi paw balyn, bungpawnaw, thinrianaw, sianuakupaw, te thethya hokupaw, milae rosahrynawpaw balyn kha nae kyate dae vua oh.
Te lukheit te lukheit thawccihkuh thya oh lah ngaethya-umsakuh oh, Kri kya Pachia nynh nanning kha ae ngaethya vae oh hawte lukheit te lukheit ngaethyakuh oh.
Tukeiccu kou sungsahpaw ccaaw`ae na thua oh hawte, Pachia dosuinkuh`ae paw thua oh.
Kri nynh aening kha yn sungsahpawte, Pachia malang mynkhuhpaw pyapaw te silawku nawlan amaw te amaw kha aening halan a pyaku hawte, sungsakunaw kya hiin oh.
Thuasalama mithyaa`ae elan angaekuh hawte ohhuakunaw, thyaa leinaw tynre, tukhyhze karangkunaw kha nanning laku ho ci um boi nan vae sah;
nungsikunaw, angaekuh leipaw ccyasakupaw, ngaeeccaccu lang bya hopaw mah um nan vae sah, thuasalama lungtuabya palia la ho oh.
Pawccecize, a ohhuakuhpaw, athyaa leipaw, zohtuhbeiktu athua paw a karangkuhpaw ccungccaw tuh Kri te Pachia peenaw kya rho uccaw kharyh hoibua khyh cipaw kha na ny oh.
Ccakaepaw bya`ae khate hung ccungccaw nynh san ae la ling nan oh sah; pawccecize khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae keiccu nynh Pachia thinrianaw tuh kawngae leipaw ccaaw`ae tungvaw kya a thua.
Tukeiccu nanning tuh minmin ryte la mungkuh bua nan oh.
Pawccecize langmaw lya nanning tuh mohnaw nynh na la thua oh, thuasalama atu tuh Bawipaw kya awnaw nynh na thua vae oh; tukeiccu awnaw ccaaw`ae hawte hiin oh.
Pawccecize Muisaw athae tuh hoynaw tynre kya, dingnaw te byaccing kya nynh a um.
Bawipaw lungrythua paw uccaw kha ccangku lan zuakuh oh.
Te athae thae leipaw mohnaw ryalaw`ae ryte vaeccawtang nan oh, thuasalama kha-e`ae kha seinaw muihsakuh oh.
Pawccecize minmin nynh aphiru lante a cyi`ae paw kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha ho lan heize maethya lan um paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama awnaw liate langsapya athua paw seinaw miakaw tuh ccaerarihlan muih kho athua, pawccecize pawpaw balyn a langsakuh thya paw tuh awnaw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Pachia nynh, “A ih paw nang, tho ccavae, a chih`ae paw kyate tho lah Kri nynh nang kha awnaw ae pya cih,” a ci.
Tukeiccu angaeepaw hawte thua leite, thuasalama ahawpaw hawte myarya raeringkute hiin oh.
Ninsaw`ae tuh ahoy vae khyh keiccuze accyh kha mangkuh thya oh.
Tukeiccu ngaee nan vae oh, thuasalama Bawipaw rynaw tuh paw nynh thua cipaw kha thaethya ccavae oh.
Te azaw ci um leipaw misutui te rui nan oh, thuasalama Muisaw te phe beih oh.
Sam law`ae, thehoysanaw law`ae te muisaw law`ae khate lukheit te lukheit byahokuh oh lah nae thinlung kya ahoypaw roi sawbiate Bawipaw kalan law sah oh.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min te Paaw Pachia kalan pawpaw balyn hanlan lungtuabya pei ho oh.
Pachia rawri sawtuanaw liate lukheit te lukheit ahkuh oh.
Zu`ae, Bawipaw kalan ahkupaw hawkhate, nae vawpaw`ae kalan ahkuh oh.
Pawccecize Kri tuh kriccawbu lu athua hawte, vawpaw tuh zu lu nynh athua; te Kri tuh pyn Khumtu nynh athua.
Tukeiccu kriccawbu nynh Kri kalan a ahku hawte zu`ae nynh pawpaw kya balyn mih vawpaw`ae kalan ahkuh`ae sah.
Kri nynh kriccawbu kha sungsah zah amaw kha kha-e hanlan a pyaku hawte, vawpaw`ae nae zu`ae kha sungsah oh.
Kri nynh bya athua paw tui te singpyanaw liate kriccawbu kha thyaasah nawlan te a ccikan nawlan;

akalyhkuhpaw khyh ze, akhinkuhpaw, tukhyhze khahtahawpaw ccangkhakheit sanmah a um leipaw, aphu-epaw kriccawbu kha amaw kalan thuakhae khylan; ou tuhte kriccawbu tuh athyaa nawlan te ccaenaw um khyh nawlan amaw kha a pyaku.
Tukeiccu vawpaw`ae nynh mimaw mih pyn a sungsah`ae hawmawte mih zu`ae kha a sungsah`ae aho. A zu a sungsahpaw tuh amaw kha a sungsakuh paw nynh thua.
Pawccecize amaw a ngesaw a hua paw hung sanmah um khyh, thuasalama Bawipaw nynh kriccawbu kha a dooih a kua hawkhate, amaw pyn kha a dooih a kua.
Pawccecize aening tuh amaw ngesaw kya-e, amaw ru`ae kya-e, te amaw a pyn kya-e`ae nynh athua oh.
“Hynh-e keiccuze pise nynh a nung te a paaw kha a cciataw cih zah a zu kalan a bekuh cih, te minmin luning tuh ngesaw kheit lang a tang cih`ae.”
E tuh myarya byakhupaw nynh thua. Thuasalama Kri te kriccawbu kong kha nynh ka ho.
Tuhzemah nanning lu raveih nynh naemaw na sungsaku oh hawkhate nae zu`ae kha mah sungsah oh. Te zu nynh vawpaw kha sawtua sah.
Imua`ae, Bawipaw kya nae nung nae paaw`ae kawngae oh, pawccecize tuh-e tuh ahmepaw nynh thua.
Byakinpyakupaw te asekuhpaw masaty kawpyapaw tuh: “Na nung te na paaw kha sawtua,” acikuh,
“ou tuhte na hanlan ahoy nawlan, te laephi vawlan asaepi na hiin nawlan nynh thua.”
Te nanning paaw`ae, nae ccaaw`ae kha thinriasah nan oh, thuasalama Bawipaw kya-e ccangpyanaw te thuiheinaw khate minmin kha cciakhae thung oh.
See`ae, Kri kawngae hawte, rawrinaw te thyngkute, thinlung thanccingte, pynsaw lante nae bawizua`ae kawngae oh.
Ccungccaw lungrythuasahpaw hawte, mitmuihnaw kya kyalya kawngaepaw thua leite, thuasalama Kri kya-e see`ae hawte, thinlung kyate Pachia rynaw kha cyite,
ccungccaw`ae kalan ryalawpyapaw hawte thua leite, Bawipaw ryalawpah paw hawte, ahoypaw thinlung khate ryalawpah oh.
See athua zemah, a luepaw athua zemah, lukhakheit nynh ahoypaw kha a cyi ze, kha-e kha Bawipaw kyate a mue cih cipaw nyh oh.
Te nanning bawizua`ae, furawnaw kha sungku te, nae see`ae kha tuhhawte cyih bua oh. Nanning nae Bawipaw mah vaawran kya a um cipaw te amaw tuh hung ccungccaw sanmah maedo khyh cipaw kha nyh oh.
Nyathyakou ka uno`ae, Bawipaw kya te a thawsaenaw thungnaw kya nae thawsae sah.
Diabolos hyngpyanaw kha na dou kho nawlan oh Pachia kya-e rhawuccaw khaleih kha lawkuh oh.

Pawccecize aening tuh ngesaw te chii a hoi paw rhaw te ah doukuh oh paw thua khyh, thuasalama ahang huaccepaw`ae ryte, thungnaw`ae ryte, hynh-e she mohnaw kya-e uktu`ae ryte, vaawran um paw ahoy leipaw muisaw`ae ryte nynh ah doukuh oh.
Tukeiccu Pachia kya-e rhawuccaw khaleih kha lawkuh oh, ou tuhte athah-aruhpaw nin kya nanning nynh na douku kho nawlan oh, pawpaw balyn phe na thangsah kho nawlan oh te na thadynnua kho nawlan oh.
Tukeiccu, byaccing athua paw taesung khate nae cce kha cciaku te, te dingnaw athua paw bykhawphua kha zingku te;
te daenaw athua paw thehoypaw paccynkunaw kha ccukoh lang kohkute;
kha-e`ae balyn laelan, zynnaw athua paw rhawphua kha ccyngkute varyn thadyn oh; kha-e zynnaw te nynh ahoy leipaw lukheitpaw kya-e maee lang ruapaw thee`ae balyn kha nanning nynh na the kho cih oh.
Te khumnaw athua paw sivawlukhung te Pachia bya athua paw Muisaw thaloi kha ccyngkuh oh.
Sawsangnaw phin balynte, ngianaw balynte Muisaw kya sawsang zungzae oh; te mithyaa`ae balyn hanlan taemyasawkunaw balynte, ngianaw balynte ngawrando oh.
Te thehoypaw kya-e byakhupaw kha nysah khylan`ae, ka khalang hynh rawhoy te ka aw kho nawlan, ho khonaw kha kamaw pya ka thua nawlan, kae ka hanlan mah sawsang oh.
Tuh-e thehoypaw hanlan kae tuh saw paw kosale ka thua zah kha-e keiccuze sivarui`ae te khii ka thua; tukeiccu ho lan ka ccang hawte kha-e kha rawhoy te ka ho kho nawlan saw oun sangpabua oh.

Thuasalama kamaw kya acyihkuh paw konglang kha nanning nynh na ny nawlan oh, sungsahpaw uno te Bawipaw kya zyn lan um paw ryalahtu athua paw Taichikas nynh pawpaw balyn kha nanning marya ae la nysah cih oh.
Alokuhpaw eenaw hanlan amaw kha nae kalan kae saw, ou tuhte nanning nynh kaening konglang kha na ny nawlan oh, te aning nynh nae thinlung kha ngaengansah khylan nynh kae saw.
Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate daenaw te zynnaw ryte sungsakunaw tuh uteno`ae kyakhe la um sah.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha thinlung thanccingte a sungsah`ae paw balyn kya thawccinaw tuh la um sah. Amen.
Jesu Kri see`ae Paul te Timote nynh Filipi khua um`ae paw, Jesu Kri kya-e mithyaa`ae balyn, dooihtu`ae te kriccaw piccang`ae nae kalan kae beihlang oh.
Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nanning tungvaw kya la um sah.
Nanning liathuinaw takyh kya ka Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
Nanning balyn hanlan ka sawsangnaw takyh kya lungtuate ngiapyanaw kha pei ka rae.
Pawccecize, thehoypaw kya nanning na umbuanaw oh paw tuh masaty nin kyate atu cia,
nanning kya ahoypaw ryalaw phe a tho vae paw Pachia nynh Jesu Kri nin a thua cia kha-e kha a ccingsah cih cite hynh-e uccaw kong kya zynkunaw ka hoi.

Nanning balyn kong tua lanpaw tuh ka hanlan accanpaw nynh thua. Pawkeiccumacize thehoypaw kong thung ka ccawnaw`ae kya thuasah, thehoypaw elan ka thungkhawkunaw kya thuasah, thehoypaw ka tynsanaw kya thuasah nanning balyn tuh kamaw ry thawccinaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw na thua oh keiccu nanning tuh ka thinlung kya na um oh.
Pawccecize Jesu Kri thawccinaw te nanning balyn kha pawcih babang nynh kae ngae oh cipaw Pachia tuh ka ccaekia nynh thua.
Te saw ka sang paw tuh nynaw kya te phiathyanaw balyn kya nanning sungsanaw tuh houhouh alungthung nawlan,
ahoy huaccepaw uccaw`ae kha nanning nynh nae nawccawkhae nawlan, nanning nynh thinlung thanccing na thua nawlan oh, te Kri nin kyacia ccaenaw um leipaw na thua nawlan oh,
Pachia phu-e nawlan te thehoysah nawlan, Jesu Kri liate athua paw dingnaw kya-e athae`ae khate phe na bia nawlan oh saw ka sang.
Thuasalama uteno`ae, ka tungvaw acyikuh paw uccaw`ae tuh thehoypaw houh apazaeku nawlan nynh acyiku cipaw kha nyh oh ci ka ry.
Ou tuhte Kri keiccu kae oun khiinaw`ae paw tuh siapharan inn ngawtu`ae khaleihte tuhlaepaw`ae kalan balyn a langkuh.
Te Bawipaw kya uteno`ae alunghua tuh, kamaw oun khiinaw`ae paw keiccu zynkunaw oun hoi`ae zah Pachia bya ho lan rawthungnaw houh hoi vae`ae.
Ccungccaw abang nynh eiungnaw te peku maekunaw lante Kri kong kha a ho ccaccing`ae. Abang nynh mah ahoypaw rynaw lante a ho`ae.
A hoty`ae paw nynh thinlung ccaccingte thua leite, eikurynaw te, kamaw oun khiinaw`ae kya vawsawnaw khyngchih khylan tuakute mimaw elan eenaw te Kri kong kha a ho`ae.
Thuasalama nyalang a ho`ae paw nynh kae tuh thehoypaw thungkhawnaw hanlan khang paw nynh thua cipaw nybiate sungsakunaw te nynh a ho`ae.
Tuhte lanze pawte? Pawpawte a ho`ae zemah, cyisakunaw te thua zemah, tukhyhze thanccingte thua zemah, Kri kong tuh ho athua. Te tuh-e kya kae ka lungtua. Ou, ka lung bua tua ung cih.
Pawccecize nanning sawsangnaw liate thuasah, Jesu Kri Muisaw bawngnaw liate thuasah, tuh-e`ae tuh kamaw ka lue nawlan yn tang cih cipaw ka ny.

Kae nynh myaryasangkae ka ngaehoi paw ngaehoinaw thyhte pawpaw kya sanmah kae tuh ka maethah lan khyh. Thuasalama ka raw pei hoy hawte, rawhoynaw balyn ryte hiinnaw te tou, tukhyhze chinaw te tou, atu mah Kri tuh ka pyn kya langsaku athua cih.
Pawccecize kae ka hanlan ka hiin paw tuh Kri nynh thua, te chi lanpaw tuh amia.
Thuasalama pynsaw kya kae ka hiin ze, tuh-e tuh ka ryalaw kya-e athae nynh thua, tuhzemah kae nynh pawmou ka poku cih cipaw ka nyh khyh.
Pawccecize kae tuh ccangning laku areihkunaw kya nynh ka um. Pou lan zah Kri ryte umkheih lan rynaw ka hoi, tuh-e tuh myarya ahoy huapaw nynh thua.
Tuhzemah pynsaw kya kae ka hiin ung lanpaw tuh nanning hanlan houh ahopaw nynh thua.
Te hynh-e zynkunaw hynh hoite, nanning lethungnaw hanlan te nae zynnaw kya-e lungtuanaw hanlan kae tuh ka um cih zah nanning balyn ryte ka um ung cih cipaw ka ny.
Ou tuhte nanning kalan bua kae thuanaw liate, nae kya-e lungtuanaw tuh Jesu Kri kya houh alung nawlan.

Pawpawte thua zemah nanning nae umtu ziazae tuh Kri kya-e thehoypaw te, angaekuh lante thuasah. Ou tuhte kae kae thua zah nanning kae muih oh ze thuasah, tukhyhze kae ka um khyh ze thuasah, nanning tuh thehoypaw te asekuhpaw zynnaw hanlan tuanaw pynkheihlan na zuakuh oh zah muisaw ccangkheit kya tynkaring lang na thadyn oh cipaw nanning kong kha kae nynh ka thae nawlan.

Te pawpaw kya sanmah nae rhaw`ae raw kha rih nan oh. Tuh-e tuh minmin hanlan ronawpaw a langsakuh paw muihsanaw nynh thua, thuasalama nanning hanlan tuh khumnaw nynh thua, tuh-e tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua.

Pawccecize kamaw kya na muih oh paw te atu na thae oh paw alokuhpaw rhawdounaw kha na hoi oh thyhte, amaw kha zyn lanpaw kyalya thua leite, thuasalama amaw hanlan teingbia lanpaw kha Kri ccelang nanning kalan pya athua.

Tukeiccu Kri kya thawzungpyakunaw ccangkhakheit a um ze, sungsakunaw kya-e ngaengannaw ccangkhakheit a um ze, Muisaw kya-e vaeccawkunaw ccangkhakheit a um ze, te tuapyanaw thinlung te ngaethyaumsakunaw ccangkhakheit a um ze,
nanning nae lunglokute alokuhpaw sungsakunaw hoibiate, nawccawkheihnaw te, te tuanawthinlung ccangkheit hoibiate, nanning nynh ka lungtuanaw kha oun ccingsah oh.
Peku maekurynaw te, tukhyhze accakaepaw pookunaw te pawsang mah cyih nan oh, thuasalama lu raveih nynh mingccang`ae kha amaw laeze ahoy huapaw lante zakawsangsakunaw thinlung te tua sah.
Ccungccaw miakaw nynh maw rya kyalya kha roihku leite mingccang`ae rya kha mah roihbia sah.
Kri Jesu kya a um paw hynh-e tuanaw-thinlung hynh nanning kya mah la um sah.
Kri tuh Pachia muinsan phang a ke pite, Pachia ryte nginku khylan kha-e kha luadeku lante tuakuh khyh.
Thuasalama amaw te amaw kha accakaepaw lang a raeku. Amaw tungvaw see muinsan kha lawkuh zah ccungccaw alo lante yn pui.
Ccungccaw muinsan kya muih athua, amaw te amaw kha zakawsangsakuh zah chinaw kyacia, vaelantung kya-e chinaw ccaccei kyacia kaw a ngae.
Tukeiccu Pachia nynh mah amaw kha kou hangthung zah min balyn laeze alesae huapaw min kha amaw a pya.
Ou tuhte vaawran um`ae paw, laephi vaw um`ae paw te lae kaw um`ae paw miakaw nynh Jesu min kya ccukharu a tung cih`ae zah,
Paaw Pachia phu-e nawlan khalang miakaw nynh Jesu Kri tuh Bawipaw nynh thua cite a ci cih`ae.

Tukeiccu ka sungsah`ae paw, kamaw ka um lya kyalya thua leite, nanning nynh kaw pei na ngae oh hawte, atu kamaw ka um khyhnaw kya houh kawngae te, rinaw te thyngkunaw te naemaw khumnaw elan ryalah oh.
Pawccecize amaw lungrythuapaw ahoypaw kha ry lan te cyi lan nanning kya ryalah paw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
Ccohku leite, eiku leite pawpaw balyn kha cyih oh.

Ou tuhte a lungkou paw te a ccouseikuh paw minphuin`ae laku kya nanning tuh ccaenaw um leipaw, seibe lan um leipaw, thuihei aho leipaw, Pachia ccaaw`ae na thua nawlan oh, kha-e`ae laku laephipi kya nanning tuh awnaw`ae hawte na aw oh.
Hiinnaw bya kha varyn kyngkuh oh; ou tuhte kae tuh alakaw lang ka ccuehang khyh cipaw, alakaw lang rya ka lahhan khyh cipaw kha Kri nin kya ka lungtua nawlan nynh thua.
Athua, nae zynnaw ryalawnaw te silawnaw vawlan kae tuh nia lan pyapaw-uccaw ka thua heize, ka lungtua zah nanning balyn ryte ka lungtua cih.
Tuhhawte nanning mah lungtua oh, kamaw ryte lungtua oh.
Thuasalama aro mawze Timote kha nanning kalan saw lan Bawipaw Jesu kha ka doliakuh, ou tuhte nanning kong kha he ka nyh te kae mah ka ngaengan nawlan.
Pawccecize aning nynh nanning thanenaw hanlan lungthyaa te dooih rynaw a hoi hawte alokuhpaw tuanaw a hoi paw ccungccaw hung san ka hoi khyh.
Pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh Jesu Kri kya-e uccaw`ae kha ccung khyh`ae, mimaw kya-e nynh a ccungku`ae.
Thuasalama ccapaw nynh paaw ryte rya a law hawte, Timote tuh thehoypaw ryalaw kya kamaw ryte ryalah paw nynh thua cipaw amaw kya-e ccaekia langsakupaw kha na ny oh.
Tukeiccu kamaw kya pawte nynh acyiku cipaw ccahe ka nyh tuh, amaw kha nae kalan palou saw lan ka ngaehoi.
Thuasalama kae kamaw mah aro mawze nae kalan kae thua cih cite Bawipaw kha ka doliakuh.

Tuhzemah ryalaw kya kamaw te kae mungkuhpaw, kamaw kya a zuikuh bua paw, rhawkaw hawte athua paw, ka ho ka bounaw kya rya yn lawpatupaw, nanning nae zeccuetu athua paw ka neitaw Epafroditas kha nanning kalan saw lan aho cite ka tuaku.
Pawccecize aning tuh kou accih cipaw kha nanning nynh phe na thae oh keiccu, aning nynh nanning balyn kha ae ngae oh zah a lungria kou thae.

Pawccecize aning tuh vya chih lang a ccih ccaccing; thuasalama Pachia nynh amaw kha ngaethya a umsah. Amaw kyalya ngaethya a umsah paw thua leite, ngaethyanaw vawlan ngaethyanaw ka hoi khyh nawlan kamaw mah ngaethya yn umsah.
Tukeiccu amaw kha he bua na muih oh te nae lungtua nawlan, te kae mah ka ngaethyapaw a zyahua nawlan nynh thawte zuakute amaw kha kae saw.
Tukeiccu lungtuanaw balyn ryte Bawipaw kya amaw kha lehkhan oh; te khatahaw`ae paw kha sawtua-muintuanaw la pya oh.
Pawccecize nanning nynh kamaw nae dooihnaw oh na bou oh paw kha ccingsapya khylan aning tuh a hiinnaw kha duaku leite, Kri ryalaw keiccuze vya a chibia.
Nyathyakou lang ka horypaw tuh ka uteno`ae, Bawipaw kya lungtua oh. Phe alokuhpaw nanning kalan bua zei lanpaw tuh ka hanlan pawtua um khyh, thuasalama kha-e tuh nae hanlan khynnaw nynh athua.
Ui`ae kha la raeringkuh oh, ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae kha la raeringkuh oh, mih ngesaw a awkuh`ae paw kha la raeringkuh oh.
Pawccecize aening tuh Muisaw kya Pachia beik`ae paw, Kri Jesu kya lungtua`ae paw, te pynsaw kya zynkunaw a hoi lei`ae paw, vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh ah thua oh.
Tuhzemah kae mah pynsaw kya zynkunaw ka hoi paw nynh ka thua. Mingccangpaw lukhakheit nynh pynsaw kya doliaku lanpaw ka hoi cite a tuaku lanze, kae tuh houh ka hoi;
nin taryanaw kya vindung awkuh paw, Israel minphuin, Benjamin ciihan, Hebru`ae kyaze Hebrupaw, Kawbya te asekuh lante Farasipaw;
eih rynaw thinlung te asekuh lante kriccawbu a tua a sah paw; Kawbya kya um paw dingnaw te asekuh lante ccaenaw um leipaw nynh ka thua.
Thuasalama ka hanlan athanepaw kha-e`ae kha Kri keiccuze shungnawpaw lang nynh ka tua vae.

Athua, ka Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynaw ahoy huaccepaw elan pawpaw balyn kha mah shungnawpaw lang ka tua, kae nynh Kri kha ka mue nawlan amaw hanlan pawpaw balyn kha marya ka shung zah kha-e`ae kha ia lang nynh ka ria,

te kae tuh amaw kya muih ka thua nawlan, Kawbya kya a um paw kamaw dingnaw kha ka hoi khyh, thuasalama Kri zynnaw liate a muekuh paw dingnaw, zynnaw liate athua paw Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha nynh ka hoi.
Ou tuhte kae nynh amaw kha thuasah, a thothuinaw kya-e thungnaw kha thuasah, a teingnaw neethungku buanaw kha thuasah ka ny nawlan, a chinaw kya amaw ka lobua nawlan,
a chih`ae paw kyate thothuinaw kalan pawpawte zemah ka phyabua nawlan ka ry.
Phe ka phahbua vae cipaw thua khyh; phe ka ccing vae cipaw mah ka thua khyh; thuasalama Kri Jesu nynh yn kyngnuathepaw hanlan kae nynh kha-e kha ka kyng nawlan ka deesui.
Uteno`ae phe ka kyng vae cite kamaw te kamaw ka tuakuh khyh, thuasalama ka cyi paw ccangkheit tuh nuhlang-e uccaw`ae kha ningte, malang um paw uccaw`ae kha phyate,
Kri Jesu kya luki lang-e Pachia konaw te asekuhpaw zuakunaw te mue paw lasung hanlan eenaw kuetung kalan ka ccuebua.

Tukeiccu piccang athua vae paw miakaw nynh khahtahawpaw tuanaw-thinlung kha hoi oh sih; te ccangkhakheit kya nanning nynh ccanglang te na tua oh ze, kha-e maw kha Pachia nynh nae kalan ae phypah cih oh.
Tuhzemah phe ah phya vae oh paw kalan khe, alokuhpaw phung thyhte cceih oh sih, alokuhpaw tuanawthinlung hoi oh sih.
Uteno`ae, kamaw thydokuh`ae paw thua oh, dosuinku lanpaw kaening hynh nae hoi vae oh thyhte, ou khate a hiin`ae paw kha la dokuh oh.
Pawccecize ccungccaw patae tuh Kri kya-e vaelantung rhaw`ae nynh thua`ae, tuhte a hiin`ae cipaw, minmin kong kha langmaw pei kae hopah vae oh zah atu mitphi te kae hopya ki oh.
Kha-e`ae athangnaw tuh ronaw nynh thua, mih pachia tuh mih vuebua nynh thua, mih phu-enaw tuh mih maethyanaw kya nynh thua, laephi uccaw`ae kha nynh mih thinlung kya a um.
Thuasalama aening ram ccungccawthuanaw tuh vaawran kya nynh thua. Tuin kyate yn thua lanpaw Khumtu Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha aening nynh mah ah ngaw oh.
Pawpaw balyn kha amaw zakaw nung lan aning tuh a cyih kho, kha-e liate a ryalawnaw thyhte a nyaapaw aening pyn hynh aphu-epaw amaw pyn alo lante yn rulae cih.
Tukeiccu ka lungtuanaw te ka suilukhung na thua oh paw, kou ka sungsah`ae zah kou ka ngae`ae paw, ka uno`ae, Bawipaw kya tynkaring lang thadyn oh, kou ka sungsah`ae paw.
Bawipaw kya tuanawthinlung aloku nawlan`ae Euodia kha thawte ka ngia zah Syntykhe kha mah thawte ka ngia.

Te ahmepaw ryalahkheihtu nang kha mah kae ngia; kamaw ry, Klement ry, te hiinnaw ccauh kya mih min um`ae paw tuhlaepaw kamaw ry ryalahkheihtu`ae ryte, thehoypaw ryalawnaw kya ryalahbua`ae paw nopi`ae kha la bawng`ae.
Bawipaw kya pei lungtua oh. Bua kae ho hin, lungtua oh!
Nae lungnenaw kha ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh nyh`ae sah. Bawipaw tuh nae pe a um.
Pawpaw elan sanmah nae thinphang nan sah; thuasalama pawpaw balyn kya lungtuabya hote, sawsangnaw te ngianaw liate na ngiaku ry oh paw kha Pachia kalan nysah oh.
Te thaethyanaw balyn nynh a phya kho leipaw Pachia kya-e daenaw nynh Jesu Kri liate nae thinlung`ae te nae tuanaw`ae kha ae khynsah cih oh.

Nyathyakou lang uteno`ae, ahmepaw, sawtua lan um paw, adingpaw, athyaa-accipaw, ry lan um paw, thehoyccousah lan um paw; ccangkhakheit tuh aphute lanze, thehoysah lan angaeku lanze, kha-e`ae kha nae thinlung kya la tua oh.
Te nanning nynh kamaw kya phe na ccangkuh vae oh zah phe na lawku vae oh paw, phe na thae vae oh zah na muih vae oh paw, kha-e`ae kha la cyih oh, te daenaw Pachia tuh nanning kya a um cih.
Thuasalama atu nyathya kya kamaw nae dooihnaw oh paw tuh paepae bua alui pawte kae tuh Bawipaw kya myarya ka lungtua; nae la dooih oh zemah ccyhhoypaw na la mue khyh oh.
Ka ho ka bou keiccuze ka hopaw thua khyh, pawccecize kae tuh pawtahawpaw kya ka um zemah lungccingkhaeku lan phe ka ccangku vae.
Nyaasaku zia ka thya zah hoirung zia ka thya; vueso lan thuasah, vuelaw lan thuasah, hoirung lan te ryachi teing lan, teitei balyn kya te pawpaw balyn kya kae tuh ccangpya ka thua vae.
Kamaw thawzung yn pyatupaw Kri liate pawpaw balyn kha ka cyi kho.
Tuhzemah ka vawsawnaw na neethungku bua oh paw tuh kou hoy lang phe na cyi vae oh.

Thehoypaw hopaw athotakaw lya, Mesidonia ram kyate he ka pou lyakha, pyanaw te muenaw kya nanning holeite teitei-e kriccawbu nynh sanmah kamaw ryte neethungkuh bua khyh cipaw kha nanning Filipi`ae nynh mah na ny oh.
Pawccecize Thesalonika khua ka um lya heize, ka hanlan ahoboupaw kha vaekheit kyalya thua leite, bua nae ky oh.
Lasung kha ka ccungkupaw thua khyh, thuasalama na ccykunaw oh kya paepae aluipaw amia kha nynh kae ccungpya oh.

Thuasalama kae tuh pawpaw balyn ka hoi zah ka hoirung. Amynkhuhpaw, Pachia lungrythuasahpaw, douccahpaw silawkunaw athua paw, nanning nynh nae ky oh paw uccaw`ae kha Epafroditas kyate ka mue zah phe beih lang ka hoi.
Thuasalama ka Pachia nynh a phu-enaw kya a hoirungnaw thyhte nanning kya-e ahoboupaw balyn kha Kri Jesu liate ae pya cih oh.
Atu ah Paaw Pachia tuh zungzae te zungzae cia phu-esah. Amen.
Kri Jesu kya um paw mithyaa`ae balyn kha la beihlang oh. Kamaw ryte a um`ae paw uteno`ae nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
Mithyaa`ae balyn nynh ae beihlang oh, abapi lante Sizar inn kya um`ae paw nynh ae beihlang oh.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae balyn kya la um sah. Amen.
Pachia rynaw liate Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw kae, Paul te kae unopaw Timote nynh,
Kolosa kya um`ae paw mithyaa`ae te Kri kya zyn lan um paw uteno`ae kalan kae beihlang oh. Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah!

Nanning nynh Kri Jesu na zyn oh cipaw te mithyaa`ae balyn kha na sungsah oh cipaw kha kaening nynh he kae thae tuh nanning hanlan pei sawsang te, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw athua paw Pachia kalan lungtuabya kae ho.
Thehoypaw kya-e byaccing bya kha langmaw lya nanning nynh na thae oh pawte, vaawran kya nanning hanlan nungpya athua paw ngaehoinaw kha na hoi oh.

Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh laephipi balyn kya po pazaeku vae hawte nanning kalan mah yn thua. Byaccing kya Pachia kya-e thawccinaw na nyh oh zah kha-e na thae oh nin kyate nanning kya mah athae thae hawte, teitei kya balyn athae kha a poukhae.
Kae sungsahpaw rya kae lahkheihtupaw, Epafras kyate nanning mah phe na ccangkuh vae oh thyhte, aning tuh nanning hanlan Kri kya-e zyn lan um paw ryalahtu nynh thua.
Muisaw kyate na sungsakunaw oh paw kong kha kaening kalan aning nynh oun hopya.
Hynh-e keiccu kaening mah kha-e kae thae nin te nanning hanlan saw pei kae sangpah oh, te hawnaw balyn kya amaw rynaw nynaw te muisaw lante thaethyanaw te phe na bia nawlan oh saw kae sangpya oh.
Ou tuhte ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya pung liate, Pachia nynaw kya lethungte pawpaw balyn kya a lungrythua lante Bawipaw te angaekuh lante na hiin nawlan oh;
lungtuanaw ryte pawpaw kya balyn ngaesang kho nawlan te lungsae nawlan, alesaepaw a thungnaw thyhte, thawzung khaleih te thawsaesah na thua nawlan oh saw kae sangpya oh.
Mithyaa`ae kya-e rho uccaw kha awnaw kya a neethungkuh bua`ae paw lang aening yn raetupaw Paaw kalan lungtuabya kae ho.
Amaw nynh mohnaw kawhoinaw kyate aening kha poh oun thua zah a sungsahpaw a Ccapaw kya-e peenaw lungkhu lang aening kha oun teesah.
Ccapaw a chiise liate nynh seingaethyanaw athuapaw sawkhawnaw kha aening ah mue oh.
Ccapaw tuh muih kho leipaw Pachia muinsan nynh thua, rae paw balyn kyaze ccatawccaaw nynh thua.

Pawccecize vaawran kya um paw, te laephi vaw um paw, muih khopaw te muih kho leipaw, suitungkhung`ae te ukkunaw`ae, lupi huacce thuanaw`ae te kawhoinaw`ae, pawpaw balyn tuh amaw liate rae thua`ae zah amaw hanlan nynh thua.
Te pawpaw balyn a um mawze aning tuh um zah pawpaw balyn tuh amaw liate nynh a um.
Aning tuh kriccawbu athua paw pyn kya-e lu nynh thua. Pawpaw balyn kya aning tuh ahang huaccepaw athua nawlan, athotakawnaw thua zah a chih`ae paw kyaze ccatawccaaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize pawpaw balyn ccingnaw tuh Ccapaw kya a um lanpaw kha Paaw a lungrythua.
Laephi kya um paw uccaw`ae thuasah, vaawran kya um paw uccaw`ae thuasah pawpaw balyn kha Ccapaw liate Pachia te bua ccawsakuthui khylan a vaelantung kya-e a chiise liate rhaw daenaw kha a rae.
Te langmaw lya nanning tuh Pachia te na la ccawkuh lei oh paw, ahoy leipaw ryalaw`ae keiccuze nae tuanaw-thinlung kya rhaw`ae nynh na la thua oh paw,
tuhzemah atu tuh nanning kha athyaapaw, ccaenaw um leipaw, douccahpaw lante amaw malang thuakhae khylan chinaw liate amaw pyn kya phe ae ccawsakuthui vae oh.

Nanning nynh zynnaw kya na bingkuh oh zah pia leite po na tyn oh ze, te vaawran zakaw um paw rae paw miakaw kalan ho athua vae paw, nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh paw, thehoypaw kya-e ngaehoinaw kyate na nueku khyh oh ze, amaw kalan ae thuakhae cih oh; kae Paul tuh tuh-e thehoypaw hanlan ryalahtu lang rae paw nynh ka thua.
Nanning hanlan vawsaw ka teingnaw kya atu ka lungtua. Te kriccawbu athua paw amaw pyn hanlan Kri vawsaw teingnaw kya aboupaw kha ka pynsaw kya ka ccingsah.
Pachia bya ccingsah khylan nanning hanlan kamaw pya athua paw Pachia kya-e synriatuthuanaw thyhte kae tuh kha-e kriccawbu hanlan ryalahtu lang rae ka thua.
Tuh-e byakhupaw tuh she`ae kya te ciihan`ae kya thuru a la thua, thuasalama atu tuh amaw mithyaa`ae kalan langsapya athua vae.

Zenta`ae laku hynh-e byakhupaw kya-e phu-enaw hoirungnaw kha mithyaa`ae nysah lan Pachia nynh a ry; tuh-e byakhupaw hoirungnaw tuh phuenaw kya-e ngaehoinaw athua paw, nanning kya a um paw Kri kha nynh thua.
Kri Jesu kya accingpaw lang ccungccaw miakaw kha kaening nynh kae thuakhae nawlan, ccungccaw miakaw kha raeringnaw pyate, hawnaw balyn ryte ccangpyate Kri kong kha kaening nynh kae ho.
Hynh-e eenaw hanlan kae mah rya ka lah, kamaw kya myarya athung lante ryalah paw a ryalawnaw thyhte thawte ka zuakuh.
Nanning hanlan, te Laodisia khua kya um`ae paw hanlan, te pynsaw kya ka mae oun muih boi lei`ae paw patae hanlan, pawcih alepaw rawsekunaw nynh ka hoi cipaw na ny oh ka ry.

Ou tuhte sungsakunaw kya pynkheihlan kheleku te, Paaw kya-e te Kri kya-e athua paw, Pachia kya-e byakhupaw nynaw kalan te thaethyanaw kya-e khaleih lungngaengankhaekunaw kalan phya khylan mih thinlung`ae tuh thawzungpya athua nawlan ka ry.
Kri kya hawnaw sisua`ae te nynaw sisua`ae balyn tuh thuru athua.
Hung ccungccaw nynh san soihpaw bya`ae te nanning kha ae ling khyh nawlan oh e hynh kae hopya oh.

Pawccecize kae tuh pynsaw lante nanning ryte ka umbua khyh zemah muisaw kya nanning ryte ka um. Nanning nynh angaekuh lante na cyi oh paw te Kri kya nae zynnaw a tynkaringpaw kha ka muih zah ka lungtua.
Tukeiccu Kri Jesu Bawipaw kha nanning nynh phe na lawku vae oh hawte, amaw kya hiin ccavae oh.
Amaw kya na bingkuh oh zah tynsathung na thua oh, te nanning tuh ccangpya na thua vae oh hawte, zynnaw kya tyn oh lah lungtuabya hote zynnaw kya phe biate amaw kya hiin oh.

Kri ccangpyanaw thyhte thua leite, ccungccaw`ae phung thyhte zui zah laephipi e atakaw phung`ae thyhte a zui paw, laephi thyahawnaw te accakaepaw lingkunaw`ae khate hung ccungccaw nynh san ae ro khyh nawlan oh la raeringkuh oh.
Pawccecize Pachiathuanaw ccingnaw balyn tuh Kri kya nynh pynsaw lante a um.
Lupi huaccenaw te kawhoinaw balyn kyaze lu athua paw, amaw kya nanning tuh ccingsah na thua oh.
Kri kya-e vindung awkunaw liate pynsaw kya-e seinaw pyn kha khahku te, kuih te rae leipaw vindung awkunaw khate nanning mah amaw kya vindung aw na thua oh.
Baptisma kya Kri ryte na uhkuh bua oh. Kri kha a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw Pachia kya-e ryalawnaw zynnaw liate amaw ryte nanning mah na thothui bua oh.
Te nae seinaw kya te pynsaw vindung awku leinaw kya na chih oh paw nanning kha Kri ryte pynkheihlan Pachia nynh ae hiinsah oh, na cyiseimenaw oh balyn kha ae ngaethya oh.
Aening oun rawsepaw te ah rhawpaw athua paw, kuih te zei paw kawpyapaw`ae kha marya a the; te kha-e kha cciakhae zah vaelantung kya phe a khiade vae.
Lupi huaccenaw`ae te kawhoinaw`ae kha marya khah zah raerae alangkuh lan maethyasah`ae, te vaelantung liate kha-e`ae kha phe a tae kou.
Tukeiccu aenaw kya, nianaw kya, athyaapaw nin sungnaw kya, sawpaw adiapaw sungnaw kya, tukhyhze Sabbath nin sungnaw kya, hung nynh san bya ae la pia nan oh sah.
Kha-e`ae tuh yn thua vae cih paw uccaw`ae kya-e mynlyh nynh thua`ae; thuasalama accaccingpaw tuh Kri kya-e nynh thua.

Ahme leipaw zakawsangsakunaw kya te vaaw ccungccaw`ae beiknaw kya lungrythua te, hung nynh san nae ryalaw mee kha ae la ling nan oh sah; tuh-e paw tuh a pynsaw tuanaw-thinlung liate accakaepaw kya a tansakuh paw, a muih leipaw uccaw`ae kalan a teenua paw,
lu kha varyn a kyngkuh leipaw nynh thua. Lu kyate pyn balyn tuh kuaa thua zah rukhua atungkunaw`ae kyate pynkheihlan a khelekuh`ae, Pachia kya-e lethungnaw te a lethung`ae.

Tukeiccu laephipi kya-e atakaw phung`ae kyate nanning tuh Kri ryte na chi vae oh thua ze, laephipi kya phang na um oh paw hawte, pawccemou, “Hae nan, tangtua nan, kyng nan,” acikuh paw phungbya`ae kalan na ahku oh?
Kha-e`ae balyn tuh ccungccaw`ae ccangpyanaw te kawpyapaw`ae thyhte, mangnaw ryte azo cih paw uccaw`ae te asekuhpaw nynh thua.

Kha-e`ae tuh mawtemaw raekupaw beiknaw kya, te ahme leipaw zakawsangsakunaw kya hawnaw langkunaw a hoi ccaccing, te pyn kha pawlangria khyh; tuhzemah pynsaw lung rynaw kha rawsete pawpaw lang um khyh`ae.
Oute nanning tuh Kri ryte phe na thothui bua vae oh thua ze, Pachia ranglang Kri dahungnaw kya um paw vaawran lang-e uccaw`ae kha ccung oh.
Vaawran lang-e uccaw`ae kya nae tuanaw-thinlung kha nung oh, laephi uccaw`ae kya nung nan oh.
Pawccecize nanning tuh na chih oh zah nae hiinnaw tuh Kri ryte Pachia kya thuru athua.
Aening hiinnaw athua paw, Kri he yn langkuh te, nanning mah phu-enaw kya amaw ryte nae langkuh bua vae cih oh.
Tukeiccuze ohhuakunaw, nungsikunaw, sungku kho leipaw rynaw, ahoy leipaw duanaw, zohtuhbeiknaw athua paw karangkunaw cikuh`ae paw laephi vawlan um paw nae pyn kya-e`ae kha chisah oh.
Khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae keiccu nynh Pachia thinrianaw tuh kawngae leipaw ccaaw`ae tungvaw khe a thua.
Kha-e`ae kya na um lya oh, nanning mah kha-e`ae kya nynh na la hiin oh.
Thuasalama atu hynh-e`ae balyn: thinrianaw, bungpawnaw, thinlung hoy leipaw, thethyahonaw, nae khalang kyate anungsikuhpaw bya hopaw kha la vua oh.
Ccungccaw rynpaw te a cyisahnaw`ae kha phe na vua vae oh thyhte lukheit te lukheit hyngpakuh nan oh.
Te amaw a raetupaw muinsan lonaw thyhte, nynaw kya thawsathui athua paw ccungccaw thawpaw kha phe na lawkuh vae oh paw nynh na thua oh.

Tuh-e thawsathuinaw kya Greek ci um khyh, Jew ci um khyh, vindung awkuhpaw ci um khyh, vindung awkuh leipaw ci um khyh, barbariapaw ci um khyh, Saithiapaw ci um khyh, see ci um khyh, a luepaw ci um khyh; thuasalama Kri tuh pawpaw tynre thua zah pawpaw tynre kya balyn a um.
Tukeiccuze Pachia nynh popaw, athyaapaw te sungsahpaw na thua oh hawte, ngaethya-umsanaw, thawccikunaw, zakawsangsakunaw, lungnenaw, lungsaenaw kha lawkuh oh.

Lukhakheit nynh mingccangpaw kha rawsete byaeikunaw a hoi lanze, lukheit te lukheit ngaesangpyakute, lukheit te lukheit ngaethyakute, Kri nynh nanning kha ae ngaethya vae oh hawte, khahawte nanning mah la cyih bua oh.
Hynh-e`ae balyn laelan ccingnaw kya-e sueluakunaw athua paw sungsakunaw kha lawkuh oh.
Te Pachia kya-e daenaw nynh nae thinlung kha ae la uk oh sah; tuh-e khylan nynh nanning mah pyn pynkheit kya ko na thua oh; te lungtuabya hothya oh.

Kri bya tuh hawnaw tynre te nanning kya phe beih lang la um sah. Bawipaw kalan nae thinlung kya thawccinaw ryte law sahte, sam law`ae, thehoynaw law`ae te muisaw law`ae kya lukheit te lukheit ccangpyakute raeringnaw pyakuh oh.
Te bya na ho oh zemah, ryalaw na law oh zemah, Bawipaw Jesu min liate pawpaw balyn kha cyih oh lah amaw liate Paaw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ho oh.
Zu`ae, Bawipaw kya angaekuhpaw athua hawte naemaw te naemaw kha nae vawpaw`ae kalan ahkuh oh.
Vawpaw`ae, nae zu`ae kha sungsah oh lah mih tungvaw eih rua ro paw thua nan oh.
Ccaaw`ae, pawpaw balyn kya nae nungpaaw`ae kaw la ngae oh. Pawccecize hynh-e tuh Bawipaw a lungry paw nynh thua.
Paaw`ae, nae ccaaw`ae kha thinriasah nan oh, mih lung oun rohsei cih.
See`ae, ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasahpaw hawte thua leite, mitmuihnaw lante kyalya thua leite, Pachia rawrite, thinlungphei leite pynsaw lante nae bawi nae zua`ae kaw kha pawpaw balyn kya la ngae oh.
Ccungccaw`ae rya a lah paw hawte thua leite, Bawipaw rya a lah paw hawte pawpaw na cyi oh zemah thinlung ccaccingte cyih oh.
Rho uccaw athua paw ryalaw mee kha Bawipaw kyate na mue cih oh cipaw kha nyh oh. Pawccecize nanning tuh Kri Bawipaw rya nynh na law oh.
Thuasalama aseipaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh a cyi paw hanlan kha pyaru athua cih; laesakunaw cipaw um khyh.
Bawizua`ae, nanning mah vaawran kya um paw Bawi kae hoi cipaw nyte, atazaepaw te atekuhpaw ryalaw mee kha nae see`ae kha pya oh.
Sawsangnaw kalan tyty pyakuh oh lah lungtuabya hote ngaw oh.
Kri kya-e byakhupaw kha kae ho nawlan, ho khonaw thuakaw kha Pachia nynh oun hungpya nawlan kaening hanlan mah saw oun la sangpah oh; kha-e byakhupaw keiccuze kae tuh sivarui te khii ka thua.
Kae nynh ho lan ka ccan thyhte kha-e byakhupaw kha ka langsaku nawlan, saw oun la sangpah bua oh.
Accyh kha sawkhawku te, atolang-e ccungccaw`ae kya hawnaw te la um oh.
Ccungccaw miakaw kha pawcihte nynh khung lan cipaw na ny nawlan oh, nae byaho tuh thawccinaw ryte loi te pei la ekhaekuh sah.
Bawipaw kya zyn lan um paw te rya kae lahkheihpaw, sungsahpaw ka neitaw Taichikas nynh ka konglang balyn kha nae kalan ae la hopah cih oh.
Ou kha-e eenaw khylan nynh amaw kha nae kalan kae saw. Ou tuhte aning nynh nae konglang kha a ny nawlan te nae thinlung kha ngaengansah nawlan nynh kae saw.
Nanning kyaze lukheit athua paw, zyn lan um paw te sungsahpaw ka neitaw Onesimas ryte kae saw`ae. Minmin nynh e kya acyikuh paw balyn kha ae nysah cih oh.

Kamaw ryte thung kae ccahkheih paw Aristarkhas te Barnabas a ccianung ccapaw Markas te Justas acikuh paw Jesu nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh. Markas konglang nanning bya kae tawsya vae oh. Nae kalan yn thua ze amaw kha leh la khan oh.
Minmin tuh vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh thua. Minmin kyalya nynh Pachia peenaw hanlan rya kae lahkheihtu`ae te kamaw ngae yn ngansatu`ae athua.

Nanning lakuze lukheit athua paw, Kri seepaw Epafras nynh ae beihlang oh. Nanning nynh phe ccing lan na thadyn nawlan oh, te Pachia rynaw balyn kya phe na bia nawlan oh aning nynh nae hanlan thawte saw pei ae sangpya oh.
Nanning hanlan te Laodisia khua um`ae paw, te Hierapolis khua kya um`ae paw hanlan aning tuh lungthonaw alepi a hoi cipaw kae nynh ccaekia ka khan.
Sungsahpaw sibawi Luka te Demas nynh ae beihlang oh.
Laodisia khua kya um`ae paw uno`ae te Nymphas te a inn kya um paw kriccawbu kha la beihlang oh.
Te hynh-e ccaky hynh nanning laku he na ria oh koute Laodisia kriccawbu kya mah la riasah bua oh. Te tuhhawte Laodisia kyate mue paw ccaky kha mah nanning nynh la riabua oh.
Te Arkhippas kha, “Bawipaw kya na mue paw ryalaw kha na thangsah nawlan, la raeringkuh,” cite la hopah oh.
E beihlangnaw hynh Paul ka kuih te nynh ka zei. Kamaw oun khiinaw`ae paw kha la liathui oh. Thawccinaw tuh nae kya la um sah. Amen.

Paul, Sailas te Timote nynh Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya a um paw Thesalon khua e kriccawbu kha kae beihlang oh. Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah!
Nanning balyn hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya pei kae ho, kae sawsangnaw kya nanning kha pei kae hobia oh.
Ah Paaw Pachia malang, nae zynnaw kya-e na cyisahnaw oh, te sungsakunaw kya-e na zuakunaw oh, te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya ngaehoinaw kya-e ngaesangnaw kha tyty kae liathui.
Sungsahpaw uteno`ae, Pachia kya-e nanning ponaw kha kae ny.

Pawccecize kaening kya-e thehoypaw tuh nae kalan bya kyalya te yn thua khyh, thuasalama nanning hanlan kaening tuh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw`ae nynh kae thua cipaw kha na ny vae oh hawte, thungnaw te Thyaa Muisaw te phe ny ccaccingnaw ryte nynh yn thua.
Te nanning tuh vawsawnaw patae teingbiate, Thyaa Muisaw kya-e lungtuanaw ryte Pachia bya kha na lawkuh oh zah kaening thydokuh`ae paw te Bawipaw thydokuh`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
Tukeiccuze Mesidonia ram te Akhai ram kya a zyn`ae paw balyn hanlan nanning tuh dosuinku lan um`ae paw nynh na thua oh.

Pawccecize nanning kyate Bawipaw bya roi tuh Mesidonia ram te Akhai ram kya kyalya ccae khyh, thuasalama Pachia na zynnaw oh paw tuh ahmin takyh kya mah pung pazaekuh vae, tukeiccu kaening nynh pawpaw sanmah kae ho ho vae khyh.

Pawccecize kaening nynh nae kalan pawcihte nynh kae tee cipaw kaening konglang kha minmin nynh a ho`ae, te hiin zah ahmepaw Pachia ryalawpya khylan zohtuh`ae kyate Pachia kalan pawcihte nynh na paleihku oh cipaw,
yn thua lanpaw thinrianaw kyate aening kha yn luesatupaw Jesu, Pachia nynh a chih`ae paw kyate a thosah paw, vaawran kyate yn thua cih paw a Ccapaw ngaw lanpaw kha a ho`ae.
Uteno`ae, nae kalan kaening nynh kae tee paw tuh accakaepaw thua khyh cipaw kha naemaw ccaccei nynh na ny oh.
Nanning nynh na ny oh hawte kaening tuh Filipi khua kya langmaw kae teing zah maethya oun law`ae koute rawsenaw pataepi ryte Pachia kha doliakute, Pachia thehoypaw kha nanning kalan rawhoy te kae ho.
Pawccecize kae hynaw oh paw tuh lingkunaw, nungsikunaw te pheekunaw kyate thua khyh.

Thuasalama thehoypaw kha zyn lan um lante ho khylan Pachia nynh nawccawkhaepaw kae thua thyhte, ccungccaw`ae lungrythuasahpaw hawte thua leite, kae thinlung oun syntawtupaw Pachia lungry thyhte nynh kae ho.
Pawccecize nanning nynh na ny oh hawte, kaening nynh lunglebya ho paw kha vaekhakheit san kae mang boi khyh, a karangku nawlan cyiruhnaw thinlung mah kae hoi khyh, Pachia tuh kae ccaekia nynh thua.
Kri kya-e locceihtu`ae kae thua hawte, hoku lanpaw kae hoi zemah, ccungccaw`ae kya phu-enaw kha kae ccungkuh khyh, nanning kya mah, mingccang`ae kya mah kae ccungkuh khyh.
Thuasalama oihtunung nynh a ccaaw`ae kha a oihsah`ae hawte nanning laku kaening tuh kae nevyalya.
Nanning tuh kou sungsah lan na um oh keiccuze myarya kae ngae oh, Pachia thehoypaw kyalya kha thua leite, kae hiinnaw hei kha neethung lan kae lungrythua.

Pawccecize uteno`ae, kae ryalaw te thawbangte rya kae law paw kha na ny oh. Nanning lukhakheit hanlan sanmah phuripaw kae thua khyh nawlan, khuazi khuadae ryalawku biate Pachia thehoypaw kha nae kalan kae hopya oh.

A zyn`ae paw nanning laku kaemaw te kaemaw kha thyaararih lang, dingrarih lante ccaenaw um lei lante pawcihte nynh kae hiin cipaw nanning tuh ccaekia`ae nynh na thua oh, te Pachia mah ccaekia nynh thua.
Paaw nynh a ccaaw`ae kya a cyi hawte, kaening nynh nanning milu raveih kha pawcihte nynh kae hy oh, thawzung kae pya oh zah bya kae tawsya oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
Ou tuhte a peenaw lungkhu lang te a phu-enaw kalan ae ko oh paw Pachia te angaekuh lante nanning nynh na hiin nawlan oh nynh thua.

Kaening kyate na thae oh paw Pachia bya kha nanning nynh he na lawkuh oh te, ccungccaw`ae bya hawte na lawkuh khyh oh, thuasalama byaccing thua zah a zyn`ae paw nanning kya mah amawccih lante ryalah paw Pachia bya hawte na lawku oh keiccuze, hynh-e hanlan apaekuh lei lan Pachia kalan lungtuabya kae ho.

Pawccecize uteno`ae, nanning tuh Kri Jesu kya um paw, Judah pee e Pachia kriccawbu`ae thydokuh`ae paw lang na tang oh. Pawccecize minmin nynh Jew`ae kya-e a teing`ae hawte, nanning mah naemaw ccungccaw`ae kya-e khahtahawpaw uccaw`ae kha na teing bua oh.
Kha-e Jew`ae nynh Bawipaw Jesu te mih profeh`ae kha paryh a chia`ae, te kaening kha oun tua oun sah`ae; te minmin nynh Pachia kha lunghoysah khyh`ae, te ccungccaw balyn kha a rawse`ae.
Zenta`ae nynh khumnaw a muebua khyh ccaw`ae cite thehoypaw ho lan kaening kha oun khee`ae zah mih seinaw kha pei a biachihkuh`ae, tukeiccuze Pachia thinrianaw tuh minmin tungvaw khe khaleih accah.
Thuasalama uteno`ae, kaening tuh thinlung kyate thua leite, pyn lante nanning te sosoh ah phiakuh oh pawte nae mitmae muih khylan myarya kae peki zah thawmawte kae zuakuh.
Tukeiccu kaening tuh nae kalan thua lan kou kae ry. Kae, Paul mah atu te atu ka zuaku tua. Thuasalama Setan nynh kaening kha phe oun khee.
Kaening ngaehoinaw, tukhyhze lungtuanaw, tukhyhze lungpawnaw suilukhung tuh pawmou athua? Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thua te, amaw malang e nanning ccaccei kha na thua khyh oh tou?
Pawccecize nanning tuh kae phu-enaw te lungtuanaw nynh na thua oh.
Tukeiccu kaening nynh he kae ngaesang kho khyh tuh, Athen khua kya kae makhaete umhy lanpaw tuh ahoy cite kae tua.
Te Kri thehoypaw kya rya kae lahkheihtu, Pachia rya a lahtupaw, kae neitaw Timote kha, nanning tynsathung khylan te nae zynnaw konglang te nanning kha thawzungpya khylan,
hynh-e vawsawnaw`ae keiccuze hung sanmah na pia khyh nawlan oh kae saw; pawccecize kaening tuh hynh-e`khylan khang paw nynh kae thua cipaw naemaw ccaccei nynh na ny oh.
Pawccecize kaening tuh nae kya kae um lyaze, vawsawnaw kae teing vae cih cite langmaw phe kae hopyaty vae oh. Ou tuhhawte acyikuh paw kha na ny oh.

Hynh-e keiccuze he ka ngaesang kho khyh tuh nae zynnaw kha ny khylan Timote kha kae saw. Tukhyh lanze tuhoutu nynh ccangkhakheit te nanning kha he ae tuh-ou oh tuh kae ryalaw kha alakaw lang a tangsei cih.

Thuasalama atu nae kyate kaening kalan Timote he yn thua tuh nae zynnaw te sungsakunaw thungpang hoypaw kha oun phupah zah, kaening tungvaw ahoypaw liathuinaw pei na hoi oh cipaw, te kaening nynh nanning kha kae muihry oh hawte kaening kha myarya muih nae ry oh cipaw oun hopya.
Tukeiccu uteno`ae, kae vawsawnaw balyn kya, te kae riathaenaw balyn kya nae zynnaw nynh kae ngae oun ngansah.
Pawccecize Bawipaw kya tynkaring na thadyn oh zetuh, atu kaening tuh kae hiin.
Ah Pachia malang nanning keiccuze kae lungtuanawpaw lungtuanaw balyn hanlan, nanning elan pawtahawpaw lungtuabya mou Pachia kalan bua kae ho kho ung cih?
Nae mae kha kae muih oh ccaw cite, te nae zynnaw kya aboupaw kha kae ccingsapya oh ccaw cite khuazi khuadae thawte saw kae sangpah oh.
Atu ah Pachia, Paaw amaw te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynh kae laanpi tuh nae kalan oun paccynpah vae sah.
Te nae kya kae cyi hawte, Bawipaw nynh ae pungthungsah oh sah lah ccungccaw balyn kya te lukheit te lukheit kya sungsakunaw te phe ae biasah vae oh sah.
A mithyaa`ae balyn ryte ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thua vae ze, ah Pachia te Paaw malang thyaanaw kya ccaenaw um lei lante nae thinlung kha amaw nynh ae tynsah vae oh sah.

Tuhlaeze uteno`ae, nanning nynh pawcihte nynh hiin lan accan, Pachia kha pawcihte nynh a lungrythuasah lan accan cipaw kha kae kyate phe na mue vae oh hawte, houhouh na bia nawlan oh, Bawipaw Jesu liate kaening nynh kae ngia oh zah kae hy oh.
Pawccecize pawtahawpaw kawpyapaw`ae kha nynh Bawipaw Jesu liate kaening nynh kae pya oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
Pawccecize nanning thyaasanaw Pachia rynaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: nanning nynh ohhuakunaw kha na sungku nawlan oh,
nanning milu raveih nynh amaw pyn kya-e kha thyaasanaw te sawtuanaw kya pawcihte nynh hoi lan cipaw na ny nawlan oh,
Pachia nyh leipaw Zenta`ae hawte myarya ohhuakurynaw kya um leite;

hynh-e kong kya hung nynh san ccyhhoypaw a lawku khyh nawlan, te unopaw kha a hyngpya khyh nawlan Pachia nynh a ry. Pawccemacize kaening nynh phe kae hopah tou vae oh zah ccaekia phe kae khang vae hawte, Bawipaw tuh khahtahawpaw a cyih`ae paw balyn kha ccaeliatu nynh thua.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh athyaa leipaw kalan aening kha oun ko khyh, thuasalama thyaanaw kalan nynh oun ko.
Tukeiccu hynh-e pawlangria leipaw ccungccaw tuh ccungccaw kha pawlangria khyh paw thua leite, a Thyaa Muisaw oun pyatu Pachia kha pawlangria khyh paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama uteno sungsakunaw konglang te kae nynh nae kalan zei ho vae khyh. Pawccecize nanning tuh lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lan Pachia nynh a ccangpya vae paw nynh na thua oh.

Te Mesidonia ram kya um`ae paw uteno`ae balyn tungvaw kya nanning nynh khahcihte na cyipya ccaccing oh. Thuasalama uteno`ae, nanning nynh houhouh na pungthung nawlan oh kaening nynh thawte kae ngia oh.
Kaening nynh kaw kae pya vae oh hawte, daebabilan na umthya nawlan oh, te naemaw ryalaw kha nae kuih te na law nawlan oh kae ngia oh;
atolang e ccungccaw`ae kya kou ngaekuh lante na hiin nawlan oh, te pawpaw sanmah na bou vae khyh nawlan oh kae ngia oh.
Thuasalama uteno`ae, ngaehoinaw a hoi leipaw mingccang`ae nynh mih ngaethya hawte nae ngaethya khyh nawlan a ih`ae paw konglang kha nanning nynh ny leite na um lan oh paw kha ka ry khyh.
Pawccecize Jesu tuh chih zah bua a thothui cite aening nynh ah zyn lan oh ze, tuhhawte Jesu kya a i`ae paw kha mah amaw ryte Pachia nynh a cciakhae cih`ae.
Bawipaw bya liate nanning kha e hynh kae hopya oh, Bawipaw yn thua cia, ah hiinhy oh paw aening nynh a ih vae`ae paw kha ah thoih lan khyh oh.
Pawccecize Bawipaw amaw tuh siaruanaw ryte lupi athua paw vaaw ccungccapaw roi ryte, Pachia mungkae roi ryte vaawran te yn rungbung cih zah Kri kya a chih`ae paw tuh masaty oun tho cih`ae.
Oute ah hiinhy oh paw aening tuh khivae kya Bawipaw te tungku khylan, minmin ryte pynkheihlan maeking kya hangthung ah thua cih oh, ou tuhte aening tuh Bawipaw ryte po umkheih lan vae.
Tukeiccu hynh-e bya`ae hynhte lukheit te lukheit thawzung pyakuh oh.
Thuasalama uteno`ae accyh te kumvaelori kong tuh kae nynh nae kalan zei ho vae khyh.
Pawccecize Bawipaw nin tuh khuazi kya miruh hawte nynh yn thua cih cipaw kha naemaw nynh ccaerarihlan na ny oh.
“ Daenaw te khynnaw a um,” a ci`ae lyakhe, ccaaw a poipaw nopinung tungvaw neitangia nynh a thuanua hawte, minmin tungvaw ronaw nynh vaekheihmawte a thuanua cih`ae zah minmin tuh lue lan khyh`ae.
Thuasalama uteno`ae, tuh-e nin nynh miruh hawte nanning tungvaw ae thuanua bua lan khyh oh, pawccecize nanning tuh mohnaw kya na um khyh oh.
Nanning balyn tuh awnaw ccaaw`ae te khuadae ccaaw`ae nynh na thua oh. Aening tuh khuazi ccaaw`ae ah thua khyh oh, mohnaw kya-e mah ah thua khyh oh.
Tukeiccu mingccang`ae nynh a i`ae hawte, aening ih nan oh sih, thuasalama aening tuh raeringku oh sih lah kyhrarihlan um oh sih.
Pawccecize a ih`ae paw tuh khuazi nynh a i`ae, te a rui`ae paw mah khuazi nynh a rui`ae.
Thuasalama khuadae ccaaw`ae ah thua oh paw aening tuh kyhrarihlan ung oh sih, zynnaw te sungsakunaw kya-e bykhaw saphua te khumnaw kya-e ngaehoinaw sivawlukhung khate ccaankuh oh sih.
Pawccecize Pachia thinrianaw kha teing khylan Pachia nynh aening kha yn khang khyh. Thuasalama ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate khumnaw mue khylan nynh yn khang.
Aening tuh ah thaeku oh zemah, ah i oh zemah, amaw ryte pynkheihlan um khylan, aening hanlan nynh Kri tuh a chi.
Tukeiccu nanning nynh leih na cyi oh hawkhate, naemaw te naemaw kha thawzungpyakuh oh lah lukheit te lukheit tynsakuh oh.
Uteno`ae, nanning laku ryalah`ae paw, Bawipaw kya nanning luki a um`ae paw, te nanning ae thuihei oh paw kha saw la tua oh cite kae ngia oh.
Te mih ryalawnaw liate minmin kha sungsakunaw kya myarya ahang lante la tua oh. Naemaw te naemaw laku la ccawkuh oh.

Uteno`ae, atu nanning kha kae ngia oh; mih ry thyhte a le`ae paw kha raeringnaw la pya oh, lungthawzya`ae paw kha thawzung la pya oh, thawzya`ae paw kha la bawng oh, ccungccaw balyn kya nae lung la sae sah.
Hunghung nynh sanmah lukhakheit kha ahoy leipaw hanlan ahoy leipaw te liaru nan sah, thuasalama naemaw laku te ccungccaw balyn kya ahoypaw kha pei la zui oh.
Pei lungtua oh.
Apaekuh lei lan sawsang oh.
Atyn-are balyn kya lungtuabya ho oh; pawccecize tuh-e tuh Kri Jesu kya nae hanlan Pachia rynaw nynh thua.
Muisaw kha daesah nan oh.
Profehbya ho paw kha pawlangria leite um nan oh.
Pawpaw balyn kha syntaw oh, ahoypaw uccaw kha tynkaring lang kyngkuh oh.
Ahoy leipaw miakaw kha sibia oh.

Te daenaw Pachia amaw ccaccei nynh nanning kha marya ae la thyaasah vae oh sah; te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thua te, nae muisaw, nae thinlung te nae pyn khaleih kha ccaenaw um lei lan ae la khynsah vae oh sah.
Nanning ae kotu oh paw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua, kha-e kha mah a cyih cih.
Uteno`ae, kaening hanlan saw oun sangpah oh.
Athyaapaw myngkunaw khate uteno`ae balyn kha la beihlang oh.
E ccaky hynh athyaapaw uteno`ae balyn kalan la riapah oh cite Bawipaw liate kae nynh nanning kha bya kae tawsya oh.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw tuh nae kya la um sah. Amen.
Paul, Sailas te Timote nynh ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya um`ae paw Thesalon kriccawbu kalan kae beihlang oh.
Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um vae sah.

Uteno`ae, nae zynnaw tuh myarya lethung zah nanning kyaze milu raveih nynh lukheit te lukheit na sungsakunaw oh tuh paepae alui keiccuze kaening nynh cyi lan accan hawte nanning hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya pei kae ho.
Ou tuhte nanning ae tua ae sahnaw oh kya te nae vawsawnaw kya na ngaesang oh zah nae lungsaenawpaw te nae zynnawpaw elan Pachia kya-e kriccawbu`ae kya nanning hanlan kae pookuh.
Tuh-e tuh Pachia peenaw te angaekuh`ae paw cite nanning kha ria na thua nawlan oh, Pachia kya-e adingpaw byapianaw kha a langsakuh paw nynh thua. Tuh-e peenaw hanlan nynh nanning mah na teing oh.
Nanning vawsaw ae pya oh paw ccungccaw`ae kha vawsawnaw pyaru lanpaw tuh Pachia hanlan atazaepaw nynh thua.
Te Bawipaw Jesu nynh athungpaw a vaaw ccungccaw`ae ryte vaawran kyate he yn langku vae ze, vawsaw na teing oh paw nanning kha kaening ryte hae-ungnaw pya khylan,
Pachia a nyh lei`ae paw tungvaw te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri thehoypaw kha a ngae lei`ae paw tungvaw kya aruapaw maee khate ccaeliaru paw tuh a hanlan atazaepaw nynh thua.
Tuh-e ccungccaw`ae tuh Bawipaw a umnaw kyate, te a thungnaw kya-e phu-enaw kyate phiate zungzae ronaw khate detah athua cih`ae,

nanning laku kae ccaekia kha na zyn oh keiccuze, a mithyaa`ae kya phu-esah athua nawlan te a zyn`ae paw balyn laku ngaeang thehoysah athua nawlan, tuh-e nin kya Kri he yn thua te tuhte detah athua cih`ae.

Tukeiccu hynh-e konaw te angaekuh lante ah Pachia nynh nanning kha ae riabua nawlan oh, te a hoynaw kya-e ahoypaw lungrythuanaw balyn kha a ccingsah nawlan, te zynnaw kya-e ryalaw kha thungnaw khate a ccingsah nawlan kaening mah nanning hanlan saw pei kae sang.
Ou tuhte ah Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw thyhte, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min tuh nanning kya phu-esah athua nawlan, te nanning kha amaw kya phu-esah na thuabua nawlan oh.
Atu uteno`ae, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn thuanaw lanpaw te asekuh lante thuasah, te amaw kalan aening pynkheihlan ah sueluaku oh paw konglang te thuasah,

Kri kya-e nin tuh phe a thua vae paw lante, kaening kyate oun thua paw olante, muisaw te thuasah, tukhyhze bya te thuasah, tukhyhze ccaky te thuasah, taloi nae bungzou khyh nawlan, tukhyhze nae lungvawsaw khyh nawlan nanning kha kae ngia oh.
Hung ccungccaw nynh zemah pawpawte sanmah ae la ling nan oh sah. Tuh-e nin a thua maw, zynnaw kyate khuliakunaw masaty a umty cih, te seinaw ccungccapaw athua paw ronaw ccapaw kha yn langkuh cih.

Tuh-e paw nynh Pachia cite ko athua paw, tukhyhze beik athua paw kha rawse zah amaw te amaw kha kha-e balyn laelan a hangthungku, Pachia nynh ka thua cite amaw te amaw kha langku te, Pachia tempal kyakhe Pachia hawte nynh a dahung.
Nae kya ka um lyaze kha-e kong tuh phe kae hopya vae oh cipaw kha na syntaw vae khyh oh tou?
Te aning tuh amaw ccyh kya yn langku nawlan, atu paw nynh a khee ung cipaw na ny oh.
Pawccecize kawbya pawlangria leinaw kya-e byakhupaw tuh rya a lah cciamang vae. Tuhzemah atu a kheetupaw kha dae law athua makhia, kha-e kha po a khee ung cih.
Oute tuh mihoy leipaw tuh yn langkuh vae cih. Kha-e paw kha Bawipaw nynh a khalang kya-e hyte phe a maemih cih zah amaw yn thuanaw kya-e phaephae ahpaw khate phe a roh cih.
Tuh-e mihoy leipaw yn thuanaw lanpaw tuh Setan ryalawnaw te asekuhpaw thungnaw balyn ryte, muihsanaw`ae ryte, te ahyngpaw khuararunaw`ae ryte,
te ading leipaw lingnaw balyn ryte aroh cih`ae paw kya nynh yn thua cih. Pawkeiccumacize minmin nynh khumnaw mue khylan byaccing kya-e sungsakunaw kha a lawku khyh`ae keiccu nynh thua.
Hynh-e keiccu minmin nynh hyngbya kha a zyn ccaw`ae cite Pachia nynh mih tungvaw khe tynkaringpaw zynseinaw kha a sawnua cih`ae.
Ou tuhte byaccing kha zyn leite, dingleinaw kya a lungrythua paw balyn tuh seibe athua nawlan`ae nynh thua.
