Thuasalama Bawipaw nynh a sungsah`ae paw uteno`ae, Muisaw nynh thyaasanaw liate, te byaccing kha zynnaw liate nanning tuh khumnaw mue khylan Pachia nynh atakaw lya mawte phe ae po vae oh keiccuze, nanning hanlan Pachia kalan lungtuabya pei kae ho lanpaw nynh thua.
Nanning nynh ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e phu-enaw kha na ccoubua nawlan oh, kaening kya-e thehoypaw liate, kha-e khumnaw kalan nanning kha Pachia nynh ae ko oh.
Tukeiccuze uteno`ae, tynkaring lang thadyn oh lah kae bya te thuasah, kae ccaw te thuasah kae ccangpya oh paw kha varyn kyngkuh oh.
Aening kha oun sungsah zah thawccinaw liate zungzae ngaengannaw te ahoypaw ngaehoinaw oun pyatupaw, ah Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri amaw ccaccei nynh,
nae thinlung kha ngae ae ngansah oh sah lah ahoypaw bya te ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya ae la tynsah vae oh sah.
Nyathyakou uteno`ae, Bawipaw bya tuh nanning kya phu-esah athua hawte, teitei balyn pung pazaekuh kanmaw zah phu-esah athua nawlan kaening hanlan saw oun la sangpah oh.
Acyih rarou paw, ahoy leipaw ccungccaw`ae kyate kaening hynh yn luesah nawlan saw oun la sangpah bua oh; pawccecize ccungccaw balyn nynh zynnaw hoi khyh`ae.
Thuasalama Bawipaw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua. Amaw nynh nanning kha ae tynsah cih oh zah mihoy leipaw kyate ae thungkhaw cih oh.
Te nanning kaw kae pya oh paw kha atu na cyih oh zah bua na la cyih ung cih oh cite nanning konglang te Bawipaw kya zynkunaw kae hoi.
Te Pachia sungsanaw lungkhu lang te Kri kya-e lungsaenaw lungkhu lang Bawipaw nynh nae thinlung kha ae la cciakhae oh sah.
Uteno`ae kaening kyate a mue`ae paw phung thyhte hiin leite angae-aduakuh lei lante a hiin`ae paw uteno miakaw kyate la phiakuh oh cite ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri min te nanning kha kaw kae pya oh.
Pawccecize naemaw ccaccei nynh kaening kha pawcihte nynh dosuinku lan`ae cipaw na ny oh. Pawccecize kaening tuh nanning kyakhe angae-aduakuh lei lante kae um khyh.
Ccungccaw lukhakheit kya-e looh kha mah alakaw te kae aepah khyh; thuasalama nanning lukhakheit kya san phuripaw kae thua khyh nawlan, phe kae bang lang khuazi khuadae thawte rya kae lawkuh.
Tuhte rya kae lawku paw tuh nanning kya-e lawku lan kaw kae hoi khyh keiccu cipaw thua khyh, thuasalama nanning nynh kaening hynh dosuinku khylan nae zui oh ccaw cite nynh thua.
Pawccecize nanning ryte ah umkheih oh lyakha, lukhakheit nynh rya a law khyh lanze, aepaw mah ae nan sah cite kaw phe kae pya vae oh.
Pawccecize angae-aduakuh lei lante hiin zah ryalaw kharyh law leite, pei a ccukuh bua`ae paw ccungccaw abang nanning laku a um cite kae thae.
Khatahaw`ae paw tuh daebabilan ryalawkuh`ae sah lah mimaw looh kha ae`ae sah cite ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate kaw kae pya`ae zah thawte kae hy`ae.
Thuasalama uteno`ae, nanning tuh ahoypaw ryalawpaw kya nae lungthawthang nan sah.
Hynh-e ccaky kya-e kae bya hynh lukhakheit nynh a ngae khyh lanze, kha-e paw kha la syntaw oh lah a maethya nawlan la mungkuh nan oh.
Tuhzemah rhaw lukheit hawte tuh la tua nan oh, uno lukheit hawte raeringnaw la pya oh.
Atu daenaw Bawipaw amaw ccaccei nynh ccianaw miakaw kya nanning kha daenaw pei ae la pya vae oh sah. Bawipaw tuh nae balyn kya la um sah.
Kae beihlangnaw oh paw hynh Paul kamaw kuit ccaccei te nynh ka zei; tuh-e tuh ka ccaky takyh kya muihsanaw nynh thua.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri thawccinaw tuh nae balyn kya la um vae sah. Amen.
Aening oun Khumtu Pachia kawpyapaw liate, te aening ngaehoinaw athua paw Bawipaw Jesu Kri liate, Jesu Kri locceihtu athua paw kae, Paul nynh,
zynnaw kya ka ccapaw ccaccing na thua paw Timote nang kha kae beihlang. Ah Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh na tungvaw la um sah.

Ccungccaw abang nynh ccangpaw doctrine`ae kha a ccangpya`ae. Minmin nynh phungpaw huataw`ae te athangthya leipaw thokeinaw phungpaw`ae kha a ngaery`ae. Kha-e uccaw`ae nynh eikunaw kha a thuakhae. Zynnaw te Pachia lante asekuhpaw tynsathungnaw kha thawpya khyh`ae. Tukeiccu ccungccaw abang nynh tuhhawte a cyibua khyh nawlan`ae kaw na pya kho nawlan, Mesidonia ram lang ka ccia lyaze, Efesa khua khe na umhy ccaw cite nang kha kae ngia.
Kawpyapaw kya-e athangnaw tuh, athyaapaw thinlung kyate, ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw kyate, te cyiruhnaw um leipaw zynnaw kyate yn thua paw sungsakunaw nynh thua.
Tuh-e kyate ccungccaw abang nynh phe cciataw`ae zah accakaepaw byahokupaw kalan phe paleihkuh vae`ae.
Minmin tuh mimaw nynh a ho`ae paw toulou kha nyh khyh`ae, paw kong nynh kae ho cipaw san a nyh lei`ae pite kawbya ccangpatu`ae lang tang a ry`ae.
Thuasalama ccungccaw lukheit nynh Kawbya kha angaekuh lante a mang lanze, Kawbya tuh ahoy cipaw aening nynh ah ny oh.

Kawbya tuh adingpaw ccungccaw hanlan rae paw thua khyh, thuasalama kawbya pawlangria lei`ae paw te kawngae lei`ae paw hanlan, Pachia pawlangria lei`ae paw te misei`ae hanlan, athyaa lei`ae paw te maethya nyh lei`ae paw hanlan, paaw`ae te nung`ae theihtu`ae hanlan, ccungccaw theihtu`ae hanlan,

a ohhuakuh`ae paw hanlan, pise te pise a sei`ae paw hanlan, ccungccaw ruh`ae paw hanlan, mihyng`ae hanlan, ahme leite ccaesakuh`ae paw hanlan, te akyhpaw ccangpyakunaw te arawsekuhpaw uccaw hanlan nynh kawbya tuh rae athua cipaw mah ah ny oh.
Tuh-e akyhpaw ccangpyakunaw te nynh thehoyccoupaw Pachia kya-e aphuepaw thehoypaw tuh accawkuh. Tuh-e thehoypaw tuh kae ka kya pya athua.
Kae hynh thawzung yn pyatupaw ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha ka thehoysah. Kae hynh zyn lan um paw lang yn riabua zah a ryalawnaw lungkhu lang yn nungbua.

Kae tuh langmaw lya Pachia alue lante byahotupaw, ccungccaw a tua a sahtupaw, ccungccaw saryatupaw nynh ka thua. Thuasalama kha-e kha zyn leinaw kya ny leite ka la cyi paw athua keiccuze, ngaethya-umsanaw kha ka mue.
Ah Bawipaw kya-e thawccinaw tuh Jesu Kri kya um paw zynnaw te sungsakunaw ryte myaryasangkae alung.
Kri Jesu tuh misei`ae khum khylan nynh laephipi kalan yn thua cipaw tuh zyn lan um paw bya thua zah khaleih lawku lan accanpaw nynh thua. Tuh-e misei`ae laku kae tuh a sei huaccepaw nynh ka thua.

Tuhzemah zungzae hiinnaw hanlan atu koute amaw a zyn vae cih paw ccungccaw`ae nynh dosuinkupaw thua khylan, Jesu Kri nynh kamaw kya khaw cia teingnaw balyn kha masaty a langsaku nawlan, kae tuh ngaethyaumsanaw kha ka mue.
Atu zungzae atynpaw, a chih kho leipaw, muih kho um leipaw Siapharan, a makhae kyalya ahawpaw Pachia tungvaw sawtuanaw te phu-enaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia um sah. Amen.
Ka ccapaw Timote, nang na konglang te yn thua paw profehbya thyhte nang nynh ahoypaw rhaw kha na dou nawlan, hynh-e kawpyapaw hynh nang kha kae pya.
Zynnaw te ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw kha varyn la kyngkuh. Ccungccaw abang nynh kha-e zynnaw kha phe vuasya`ae zah minmin tuh arohpaw sanphalung hawte nynh thua`ae.
Tuh-e`ae laku Hymenaeas te Alexanda a umbua`ae. Minmin nynh saryapawbyaho vae khyh nawlan`ae, a ccangku ccaw`ae cite minmin kha Setan kalan phe ka ah vae`ae.
Tukeiccu, masaty lang ngiapyanaw, sawsangpyanaw, muisaw lante bohpyanaw te lungtuabya hopaw kha ccungccaw balyn hanlan la raepah`ae,

aening nynh Pachia nyh paw hiinnaw kya te sawtua lan um paw hiinnaw kya daenaw te ah hiin kho nawlan oh, te daebabipaw hiinnaw ah hoi kho nawlan oh siapharan`ae te kawhoitu`ae paw balyn hanlan saw la sangpah oh cite kae ngia.
Pawccecize hynh-e cyisahnaw tuh aening oun Khumtu Pachia malang ahoypaw te angaekuhpaw nynh thua.
Ccungccaw balyn nynh khumnaw mue`ae sah lah byaccing kha nyh`ae sah cite Pachia nynh a ry.
Pawccecize Pachia ccangkheit nynh a um. Te Pachia te ccungccaw`ae laku Ccawkunaw Raetu Ccungccapaw Kri Jesu lukheit nynh a um.
Amaw nynh ccungccaw balyn sawkhaw nawlan amaw kha a pyaku. Accyh azaw paw kya ccaekia khan khylan,
tuh-e khylan kae tuh phunghotu lang, locceihtu lang, te zynnaw te byaccing kha Zenta`ae ccangpatu lang khang paw nynh ka thua. Kri kya byaccing nynh ka ho, ka hyng khyh.
Tukeiccu athyaapaw kuih`ae kha hangthung te, thinrianaw te lunghiinnaw hoi leite pise`ae nynh teitei balyn sawsang`ae sah cite ka ry.

Tuh-e hawte, nopi`ae nynh mah uccaw lawkunaw kya, maethyaum leipaw boeining lawku te, ahoypaw ozia te kou angaekuh lante mimaw te mimaw kha ccaankuh`ae sah ci ka ry. Akhekuhpaw sang, sui, te pale`ae, te amee rupaw uccaw te ccaankuh nan`ae sah.
Thuasalama Pachia rawrinaw a hoi paw nopi`ae hanlan ahoypaw cyisahnaw`ae khate ccaankuh`ae sah ci ka ry.
Nopi nynh tuh kawngaenaw balynte daebabilan ccangkuh sah.
Thuasalama nopi nynh ccangpya lan, pise tungvaw kaw hoi lan ka ua khyh, daebabilan zya um sah.
Pawccecize Adam kha nynh masaty rae athua, oute nynh Evi kha rae athua.
Te Adam kha hyngpya thua khyh; thuasalama nopinung kha tuh hyngpya thua zah phe a sei.
Tuhzemah nopi`ae nynh maeethyaum leipaw boeining lawkute zynnaw kya, sungsakunaw kya, te thyaanaw kya a tyn`ae lanze, ccaawpuinaw kya khum athua cih`ae.
Ccungccaw lukheit nynh kriccawbu cciakhaetu lang a ry lanze ahoypaw ryalaw kha a ry paw nynh thua cipaw tuh akyhpaw bya nynh thua.

Oute kriccawbu cciakhaetu tuh ccaenaw um leipaw athua hahe cih, zu lukheit vawpaw athua cih, a yhkuh khopaw athua cih, a lungccing paw athua cih, a ozia hoypaw athua cih, mikhia dooihthya paw athua cih, a ccangpah khopaw athua cih;
misutui a rang leipaw, peku maeku mang leipaw, phua elan a karangkuh leipaw, a lungnepaw, milae uccaw a dua leipaw athua cih;
amaw a innbyn kha kou hoy lang a uk paw, a ccaaw`ae nynh sawtua rawrinaw khaleihte kawngaepyanaw a hoi`ae paw athua cih;
(pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit nynh amaw a innbyn kha pawcihte nynh uk lan cipaw a ny khyh lanze, pawtemou Pachia kya-e kriccawbu kha a dooih kho cih?);
a zyn thawpaw thua lan khyh, tuhte athua ze, a tansakuh sei cih zah diabolos hawte detahnaw lungkhu lang a phungkuhsei cih.
Tuhlaeze, atolang e ccungccaw`ae laku thehoyccoupaw athua cih. Tukhyh lanze saryanaw lungkhu lang te diabolos kya-e kaang lungkhu lang a phungkuhsei cih.
Tuhhawte kriccaw piccang`ae mah sawtua lan um paw athua cih`ae, a lae phei paw thua lan khyh, misutui eih neih paw thua lan khyh, phua elan a karangkuhpaw thua lan khyh`ae.
Accipaw mawtemaw nykunaw kya zynnaw byakhupaw kha varyn a kyngkuh paw athua cih`ae.
Te minmin tuh masaty syntaw thua`ae sah. Oute ccaenaw um khyh`ae cipaw muih athua tetuh kriccaw piccang rya kha lah ccavae`ae sah.
Tuhhawte mih zu`ae mah sawtua lan um paw athua cih`ae, ming`ae thethya ho`ae paw thua lan khyh`ae, a yhkuh khopaw, pawpaw balyn kya zyn lan um paw athua cih`ae.
Kriccaw piccang`ae tuh zu lukheit vawpaw athua cih`ae. Mih ccaaw`ae te mih innbyn kha kou hoy lang a uk paw athua cih`ae.
Pawccecize kriccaw piccang ryalaw kha kou hoy lang a lah paw tuh mimaw elan ahoypaw thadynnaw kha a muekuh`ae paw te Kri Jesu kya um paw zynnaw kya rawhoynaw alepi a muekuh`ae paw nynh thua.
Aro mawze na kalan thua lan ngaehoite hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh kae nynh na kalan kae zei.

Thuasalama khaw kae ro lan thua ze, byaccing kya-e atungpi te abingkunaw athua paw, a hiinpaw Pachia kya-e kriccawbu athua paw, Pachia inn kya namaw te namaw kha pawcihte nynh ka um cih cipaw na nyku ccaw cite hynh-e`ae hynh na kalan kae zei.

Te ahmepaw beiknaw kya-e byakhupaw tuh alepaw uccaw nynh thua cipaw eiku lanpaw um khyh. Pachia tuh pynsaw lante phe yn langkuh vae. Muisaw liate thyaaccousah athua vae. Vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh phe muih vae`ae. Zenta`ae kya ho athua vae. Laephipi kya amaw kha phe zyn vae`ae. Phu-enaw vaawran lang lawthung phe athua vae.
Nyalang ccyh kya ccungccaw abang nynh zynnaw kha a poutaw cih`ae, lingthyapaw muihsaw`ae te raerangsaro`ae ccangpyanaw kha a ngae cih`ae cite atu Muisaw nynh raerae alangkuh lang a ho.
Kha-e`ae nynh cyiruhnaw kya hyngbya kha a ho`ae, mimaw nykunaw thinlung kha alingpaw sivaw khate phe pinsakuh`ae.
Zu te vaw tangnaw kha oun khee cih`ae, byaccing kha nyh zah a zyn`ae paw nynh lungtuabya hote ae lan accanpaw, Pachia nynh a rae paw, aepaw phin`ae kha sung lan kaw oun pya cih`ae.
Pawccecize, Pachia nynh a rae paw miakaw tuh ahoypaw nynh thua. Lungtuabya hote lawku lanze pawpaw mah sung lan ccan khyh.
Pawccecize Pachia bya liate thuasah, sawsangnaw liate thuasah pawpaw balyn tuh thyaasah athua.

E uccaw`ae kong hynh nang nynh uteno`ae kha na hopya lan`ae athua ze, nang tuh Jesu Kri ryalahtu hoypaw na thua cih. Namaw nynh phe na zui vae paw, ahoypaw doctrine te zynnaw bya`ae khate nang tuh na kuakuh cih.
Thuasalama atawpaw nopi`ae nynh tuanawte a ho`ae paw phungpaw`ae kha la vua lah Pachia lante hiinnaw kya namaw te namaw la leihcinh.

Pawccecize pynsaw lante leihcinh paw tuh ccapyh nynh athane. Thuasalama Pachia lante hiinnaw tuh atu e hiinshe te yn thua vae cih paw hiinshe kya-e byakinkupaw kha a hoi paw thua keiccuze pawpaw balyn hanlan athanepaw nynh thua.
Hynh-e bya tuh zyn lan umpaw bya thua zah khaleih lawku lan accanpaw nynh thua.

Hynh-e keiccuze aening tuh rya ah lah oh zah saryanaw kha ah teing oh. Pawkeiccumacize aening tuh ccungccaw balyn Khumtu athua paw, abapi lante a zyn`ae paw Khumtu athua paw, a hiinpaw Pachia kha a doliakuh`ae paw nynh ah thua oh.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh kawpya`ae lah la ccangpah`ae.
Na kum ano keiccu hung nynh san ae la dothatheih nan`ae sah. Thuasalama nang tuh bya kya, ozia kya, sungsakunaw kya, muisaw kya, zynnaw kya, thyaapapingnaw kya, zyntu`ae nynh dosuinkupaw la thua.
Kae kae thua makhia ccathyaa ria paw, ming`ae hybuanaw, te ccangpyanaw kha thawte la rae.
Pastor`ae nynh na tungvaw mih kuih he khan`ae te profehbyahonaw thyhte nang kha muisaw lasung pya na thua. Kha-e lasung kha mang lan la maah nan.
Na kaethungnaw kha ccungccaw balyn kya alangku nawlan, e uccaw`ae hynh pei la tua lah thawte la zuakuh.

Namaw te namaw thuasah, na ccangpyanaw thuasah la raeringkuh lah kha-e`ae kyakhe pei la tyn. Pawccecize khate na cyinaw liate namaw kha thuasah, na hopaw a thae`ae paw kha thuasah paryhte na khum cih`ae.
Kum tang huapaw kha la pe nan, thuasalama paaw hawte thawte la soihbia. Kum nohua paw pise`ae kha u te neitaw hawte,
kum tang huapaw nopi`ae kha nung`ae hawte, kum nohua paw nopi`ae kha ccia`ae hawte lungthyaanaw balynte la soihbia`ae.
Numae ccaccing athua paw numae`ae kha saw la tua`ae.

Thuasalama numae lukhakheit nynh ccaaw`ae, tukhyhze mintaw`ae a hoi lanze, innvaw kya Pachia sawtuanaw langsaku khylan, te mih nungpaaw`ae dooih ru khylan minmin tuh masaty innvaw khe ccangkuhty`ae sah. Pawccecize tuh-e tuh Pachia malang ahoypaw te nawccaw lan um paw nynh thua.
Numae ccaccing thua zah a makhaete a um paw nopi tuh Pachia kha doliakuh zah sawsangnaw te ngianaw kyakhe nynh khuazi khuadae po a tyn.
Thuasalama pynsaw hoysanaw kya a hiinpaw numaenung tuh phang a hiin pite a chihpaw nynh thua.
Minmin tuh ccaenaw a um khyh ccaw`ae, kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha kaw la pya`ae.

Thuasalama lukhakheit nynh amaw ccungccaw`ae kha a dooih khyh lanze, abapi lante amaw a innbyn`ae kha a dooih khyh lanze, zynnaw kha phe a vua paw nynh thua, zyn leitu laeze houh athah huapaw nynh thua.
Kum sungtaruh kaw e numae tuh numae ccazing kya teebua nan sah, pise lukheit zu po a la thua paw,

ahoypaw ryalaw`ae hanlan thehoyccousah`ae paw; imua`ae kha a kua ze, mikhia`ae kha a thuasah`ae ze, mithyaa`ae ccu kha a singpya ze, riathae`ae paw kha lunghoysah ze, ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kha thawmawte a zui ze, ccazing kya la teebua sah.
Thuasalama kum ano huapaw numae`ae kha tuh la nue`ae. Pawccecize ohhuakurynaw he a hoi`ae tuh Kri kha rawsete vawpaw bua a hoiry`ae,
masaty-e mih zynnaw kha a vua vae`ae keiccuze minmin tuh seibenaw a mue`ae.

Tuhlaeze, inn kheit kyate inn kheit kalan pae`ae zah thawnawpaw kha a ccangku`ae. Mih thawnaw kyalya thua leite thanry`ae paw mah thua`ae zah ho lan accan leipaw a ho paw, a ccukuh bua paw nynh athua`ae.
Tukeiccuze a rhawtupaw nynh saryanaw lanpaw kha ccyhhoy a pya khyh nawlan, kum anohua`ae paw numae`ae tuh vawpaw la hoi`ae sah, ccaaw la saah`ae sah, innlo la dooih`ae sah cite ka ry.
Pawccecize abang tuh Setan nuhlang phe a paleihkuh vae`ae.

A zyn paw pise, tukhyhze a zyn paw nopi nynh numae`ae a hoi ze, mimaw nynh minmin kha dooih`ae sah lah kriccawbu kha tavuin pya thua nan sah. Ou tuhte numae ccaccing`ae kha kriccawbu nynh a dooih nawlan.
Ahoyte a uk`ae paw pastor`ae, abapi lante phunghonaw kya te ccangpyanaw kya ryalah`ae paw tuh sawtuanaw leih ning te ccou lan angaekuh`ae cite tua lanpaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize Ccathyaa nynh, “Ccatan a tin paw tangnuapaw a mung kha na bucceih lan khyh,” a ci. Te, “Ryalahtupaw tuh a ryalaw mee mue lan accan,” bua a ci.
Ccaekia luning, tukhyhze luthung a um khyh ze, pastor sei a benaw`ae kha nawccawpah nan`ae.
Mingccang`ae nynh mah a ri ccaw`ae, a sei`ae paw kha ccungccaw balyn malang khe pe`ae.

Lukheit laeze lukheit maedo huanaw kharyh hoi leite, laesanaw te pawpaw sanmah na cyi khyh nawlan, Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri malang thuasah, popaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae malang thuasah e uccaw`ae hynh nang nynh na zui nawlan, bya kae tawsya.
Hung ccungccaw tungvaw sanmah na kuih palou la khang nan. Milae seinaw kha mah la neethungkuh bua nan, namaw te namaw kha la thyaasakuh.
Na vue elan te leih na ccinawpaw hanlan, tui kyalya kha la neih nan, thuasalama misutui beihtaraw kha la mangbia.
Ccungccaw abang seinaw tuh raerae alangkuh, mih seinaw`ae tuh byapianaw kalan laanmawty vae. Ccungccaw abang seinaw tuh nyalang te nynh alangku.
Tuhhawte ccungccaw abang kya-e ahoypaw ryalaw tuh raerae alangkuh, te alangkuh loh leipaw ahoypaw ryalaw`ae mah phisi kho thua lan khyh.
Pachia a min te a ccangpyanaw kha thethyaccou khyh nawlan, taphu kaw um paw see`ae miakaw nynh tuh mih bawi`ae kha myarya sawtua lan accan cite tua`ae sah.

Te zyntu bawi`ae a hoi paw see`ae nynh uteno athua`ae keiccuze pawlangria leite um nan`ae sah. Thuasalama thanenaw a ccou`ae paw tuh zyntu`ae te sungsah`ae paw athua`ae keiccu mih bawi`ae kha houh ryalawpah`ae sah. Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh la ccangpah`ae lah la hy`ae.

Lukhakheit nynh ccanglangte a ccangpya lan thua ze, te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri bya athua paw phe riapaw bya`ae kha a nawccaw khyh lan thua ze, te Pachia lante ccia paw te accawkuhpaw ccangpyakunaw kha a nawccaw khyh lan thua ze,

aning tuh pawsang ny leite a tansakuhpaw nynh thua. Thuasalama aning tuh byalungnaw te byaeikunaw kya a lungzua paw nynh thua. Tuh-e`ae kyate eiungnaw, peku maekunaw, thethyahonaw, ahoy leipaw lunghiinnaw,

ahoy leipaw tuanaw-thinlung kyate ccungccaw`ae ry thawte eikunaw kha a pou, te byaccing cipaw um khyh, Pachia lante ccia paw tuh muenawpaw nynh thua cite a tua`ae. Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kyate namaw kha la phiakuh.
Thuasalama lungryachikhaekunaw ryte Pachia lante ccia paw tuh alepipaw muenaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize laephipi lungkhu lang aening nynh pawsang mah ah thuakhae khyh oh; pawsang mah ah poukhae kho lan khyh oh cipaw phe aria.
Te aepaw te boeining-sungpue ah hoi oh paw khate ah lungryachikhaeku lanpaw nynh thua.

Thuasalama hoirung a ry`ae paw tuh tuh-ounaw lungkhu lang, kaang lungkhu lang, ngaeenaw patae te ronaw thuakhae paw ryduanaw lungkhu lang nynh a phungkuh cih`ae. Tuh-e`ae nynh ccungccaw`ae kha ronaw te zonaw kya a phungsaku`ae.

Pawccecize phua rynaw tuh ahoy leipaw phin balyn kyaze atharuipi nynh thua. Kha-e kha ccungccaw abang nynh he a dua`ae tuh zynnaw kyate phe a cceihsei vae`ae, te mimaw te mimaw kha ngaethyanaw pataepi khate a thuinkuh`ae.
Thuasalama, pou Pachia ccungccapaw, nang tuh kha-e uccaw`ae kha ccuetaw lah dingnaw, Pachia lante ccia paw, zynnaw, sungsakunaw, ngaesangnaw, nevyalyanaw kha la zui.
Zynnaw kya-e ahoypaw rhawtuknaw kha la tuk, zungzae hiinnaw kha varyn kyngkuh. Kha-e kalan nang tuh ko na thua zah ccaekia patae malang ahoypaw ccaekia phe na khang vae.
Pawpaw balyn hiinnaw a pyatupaw Pachia malang te Pontias Pilat malang ahoypaw ccaekia a khangtupaw Kri Jesu malang, nang kha bya kae tawsya paw tuh:
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri yn langkuh cia nang nynh athupaw beku leite, seibe lanpaw a um lei lante, kawpyapaw kha la zui cipaw nynh thua.
Tuh-e langkunaw kha Pachia nynh amaw accyh kya yn langsakuh cih. Aning tuh thehoyccoupaw, a makhae kyalya Athungpaw, siapharan`ae Siapharan te bawi`ae Bawipaw nynh thua.

Amaw rou nynh chi kho leinaw a hoi, hung ccungccaw nynh san a naeku kho leipaw awnaw kya a um paw nynh thua; amaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san muih boi khyh zah muih kho khyh; sawtuanaw te zungzae thungnaw tuh amaw kya um sah. Amen.

Atu she kya a hoirung`ae paw kha a tansaku khyh nawlan`ae, atyn leipaw hoirungnaw kha a doliaku khyh nawlan`ae, thuasalama ah lungtua nawlan pawpaw balyn phe beih lang oun pyatupaw, a hiinpaw Pachia kha a doliaku nawlan`ae kawpya`ae.
Minmin nynh ahoypaw ryalaw kya a hoirung ccaw`ae, pyabua lan a paccynku ccaw`ae, neethungbua lan a ry ccaw`ae ahoypaw rya law lan kawpya`ae.
Zungzae hiinnaw kha a phyabua nawlan`ae, yn thua vae cih paw ccyh elan mimaw hanlan ahoypaw atungpi kha a ccakhungkuh cih`ae.
Pou Timote, na kya ae ahsya`ae paw kha la ring. Anungsikuhpaw te accakaepaw byahokupaw, te akyh lei lante nynaw a ci`ae paw, arawsekuh`ae paw kha la sibia.
Kha-e akyh leipaw nynaw kha lawku bua te ccungccaw abang nynh zynnaw kha phe a poutaw vae`ae. Thawccinaw tuh na kya la um vae sah. Amen.
Kri Jesu kya a um paw hiinnaw kya-e byakinpyakupaw thyhte, Pachia rynaw liate Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw Paul nynh,
kou ka sungsahpaw ka ccapaw, Timote: Paaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh na kya la um sah.

Khuazi khuadae ka sawsangnaw kya nang kha apaekuh lei lang kae liathui hawte, ka minpaaw`ae ka tawpaw`ae nynh rya a la lawpya`ae hawte, athyaapaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung te rya ka lawpyapaw Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
Na mitphi kha ka tuathui tuh lungtuanaw te phe ka bia nawlan nang kha muih lan myarya kae ry.
Na minnung Lois te na nung Eunis kya masaty a la um paw zynnaw hawte, cyiruhnaw um leipaw na zynnaw kha ka liathui; te kha-e zynnaw tuh nang na kya mah a um cipaw ccaerarihlan ka ny.
Tukeiccu ka kuih khangnaw liate na kya um paw Pachia lasung kha houh na ruasah nawlan, nang kha kae nysah thui ry.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh rawthyanaw muisaw kha aening oun pya khyh, thuasalama thungnaw, sungsakunaw, te mawtemaw yhku khonaw muisaw kha nynh oun pya.
Tukeiccu ah Bawipaw kya-e ccaekia kha thuasah, amaw keiccu thung a ccah paw kamaw kha thuasah mae oun thyakhae nan; thuasalama Pachia thungnaw liate thehoypaw hanlan teingnaw kha la neethungkuh bua.

Tuh-e Pachia nynh aening kha phe oun khum vae zah athyaapaw konaw te phe oun ko vae. Tuh-e tuh aening ah ryalawnaw thyhte thua khyh, thuasalama amaw a eenaw te laephipi atho mawze Kri Jesu kya aening pya athua paw a thawccinaw thyhte nynh aening kha oun ko.
Tuh-e thawccinaw tuh aening oun Khumtu Jesu Kri yn langkunaw liate atu alangkuh vae. Tuh-e Jesu nynh chinaw kha phe zosah zah hiinnaw te chi kho leinaw kha thehoypaw liate awnaw kalan a thuakhae.
Tuh-e thehoypaw phunghotu lang, locceihtu lang te Zenta`ae ccangpatu lang kae tuh khang ka thua.

Kha-e keiccu nynh hynh-e vawsawnaw`ae hynh kae mah ka teing. Tuhzemah ka maethah khyh. Pawccecize hung nynh ka zyn cipaw kha ka ny. Te amaw kalan kae nynh ka ah paw uccaw kha tuh-e nin kyacia a khynsah kho cipaw ka ny.
Kri Jesu kya a um paw zynnaw te sungsakunaw te asekuhpaw, kamaw kyate phe na thae vae paw dosuinku lan um paw ahmepaw bya kha varyn la kyngkuh.
Nang na kalan ahpya athuapaw, ahoypaw uccaw kha, aening kya a um paw Thyaa Muisaw liate la khynsah.
Asia ram kya a um`ae paw balyn nynh kamaw kha phe oun cciataw vae`ae cipaw nang nynh phe na ny. Tuh-e`ae kya Fykelas te Hemokene a umbua`ae.
Onesiphoras innbyn kha Bawipaw nynh ngaethya-umsanaw la pya`ae sah. Pawccecize aning tuh kamaw kha thaw pei yn muinsah he paw nynh thua. Kamaw sivarui te yn khii`ae paw kha mah mae yn thyakhae khyh.
Thuasalama Rom khuapi kya a um lya kamaw kha thawmawte yn la ccung zah phe yn muih.
Tuh-e nin kya Bawipaw ngaethya-umsanaw kha aning nynh a mue nawlan Bawipaw nynh la pyabua vae sah. Efesa khua kya kamaw hanlan pawcih nynh yn cyipya cipaw kha nang nynh phe na ny ccaccing.
Tukeiccu, ka ccapaw, nang tuh Kri Jesu kya a um paw thawccinaw kyakhe na thaw la sae sah.
Te ccaekia`ae patae laku kamaw kyate phe na thae vae paw uccaw`ae kha, zyn lan um paw ccungccaw`ae te ming`ae kha mah bua a ccangpah kho cih`ae paw kalan khe kha-e kha la ahpah`ae.
Tukeiccuze Jesu Kri kya-e rhawkaw hoypaw hawkhate, nang tuh vawsawnaw kha la ngaesang.
Rhawkaw nynh tuh amaw kha rhawkaw lang a potupaw lungrythuasah khylan amaw te amaw kha hynh-e hiinnaw kya-e uccaw`ae khate khawsakuh boi khyh.
Lukhakheit nynh khungtaekunaw kya khungtaekuh bua zah aphung thyhte khungtaeku khyh ze, haetapaw lukhung kha mue khyh.
Thawte reihkuhpaw loophopaw tuh masaty looh a mue paw athua hahe cih.
Ka hopaw kha hoyte la tua, te Bawipaw nynh pawpaw balyn kya thaethyanaw kha ae pya vae sah.
David ciihan athua paw Jesu Kri tuh kae nynh ka hopaw thehoypaw thyhte a chih`ae paw kyate a thothui cipaw kha la liathui.
Kha-e thehoypaw hanlan kae tuh ahoy leipaw ryalahtu hawte sivarui te khiinaw hei kha vawsaw ka teing; thuasalama Pachia bya tuh khii kho thua khyh.
Tukeiccuze popaw ccungccaw`ae nynh mah Kri Jesu kya a um paw khumnaw kha zungzae phu-enaw ryte a muebua nawlan`ae, minmin hanlan pawpaw balyn kha ka ngaesang.
Hynh-e tuh zyn lan um paw bya nynh thua: Pawccecize amaw ryte ah chi oh ze, amaw ryte ah hiinbua cih oh.
Aening ah teing oh ze, amaw ryte ah uk bua cih oh; amaw kha ah vua oh ze, aning nynh mah aening kha yn vua cih.
Aening tuh zyn lan ah um khyh oh zemah, aning tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua, amaw te amaw kha vuakuh kho khyh.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh la tuasathui`ae. Athane leipaw te a thaetu`ae kha arosah paw bya kong kha minmin nynh a peku khyh nawlan`ae Bawipaw malang bya tawsya `ae.
Byaccing bya kha hmerarihlan phiathyate, maethya aho leipaw ryalahtu lukheit hawkhate, Pachia malang nawccawkhaepaw na thua nawlan, namaw te namaw kha langsaku khylan thawte zuakuh.
Thuasalama anungsikuhpaw, accakaepaw ccohkupaw kha la sungkuh. Pawccecize kha-e`ae nynh Pachia lante zuaku leinaw kalan houh ae kaethungsah cih.
Te mih bya tuh khensa ccinaw hawte apazaekuh cih. Tuh-e`ae laku Hymenaeas te Filetas a umbua`ae.
Minmin nynh thothuinaw tuh phe athang vae paw nynh thua a ci`ae keiccuze byaccing kyate phe a cceihsei vae`ae, te ccungccaw abang zynnaw kha phe a buleihpya`ae.

Tuhzemah Pachia kya-e atynpaw atungpi tuh a thadyn; hynh-e tazeihkhiapaw a hoi, “Bawipaw nynh amaw a ccungccaw`ae kha a ny,” te, “Kri min a phukuhpaw ccungccaw miakaw nynh tuh hoyleinaw kha poutaw sah,” acihkuh.
Thuasalama inn lepipaw kya sui ang`ae te phua ang`ae kyalya um khyh. Thing ang`ae te lae ang`ae mah a umbua. Abang tuh sawtuanaw hanlan thua zah abang tuh sawtua leinaw hanlan nynh thua.

Tukeiccuze ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh anungsikuhpaw uccaw kyate amaw te amaw kha a ccikanku lanze, aning tuh sawtuanaw hanlan mang lan um paw ang, thyaasah athuapaw, Bawipaw nynh mang lan asypaw, ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw hanlan paccynpaw athua cih.
Ngawphue ryduanaw kha mah la ccuetaw, thuasalama athyaapaw thinlung hoi`ae paw, Bawipaw a ko`ae paw ryte dingnaw, zynnaw, sungsakunaw te daenaw kha la deesui.
Thuasalama angaeepaw te pawsang ny leipaw byakhianaw kha la sibia. Kha-e nynh tuh peku maekunaw kha nynh a thuakhae cipaw kha na ny.
Bawipaw ryalawpatu nynh tuh pekuh maekuh hahe lan khyh. Thuasalama ccungccaw balyn kya a nevyalya cih, a ccangpah kho cih zah a lungsae cih,
amaw a rawse`ae paw kha lungnenaw te a thuihei cih`ae, byaccing kha a ny nawlan`ae ngaesikunaw kha Pachia nynh minmin kha a pya ze yn pya cih`ae,
te minmin nynh tuathya nythyanaw kha a hoi ccaw`ae cite, te diabolos nynh a rynaw kha raesah khylan a kyngnaw`ae paw kaang kyate a lue cih`ae.
Nyathyakou nin tuh vawsawrunaw ccyh yn thua cih cipaw kha la nyh.

Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae tuh mimaw a sungsakuh`ae paw, phua a sungsah`ae paw, a pookuh`ae paw, a tansakuh`ae paw, Pachia thethyaho`ae paw, nung te paaw kawngae lei`ae paw, lungtuabya a hothya lei`ae paw, athyaa lei`ae paw,
sungsanaw hoi lei`ae paw, ccungccaw ngaethya lei`ae paw, milae thanho`ae paw, a syngkuh kho lei`ae paw, eih re kaesy`ae paw, ahoypaw a hua`ae paw,
lungzi lei`ae paw, paw peki lei`ae paw, alysakuh`ae paw, Pachia sungsahpaw laeze hoysanaw a ryhua`ae paw,
Pachia lante a cceih paw olante a umsaku`ae zemah kha-e thungnaw kha a vua`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kha la sibia`ae.

Pawccecize tuhtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae tuh inn`ae lungkhu lang tee`ae zah seinaw nynh phang ne`ae paw, zoikadeih lang ling kho um paw nopi`ae kha see lang kyng`ae zah duanaw aphuinphuin te a cciakhae`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Tuh-e`ae tuh pei a ccangkuh`ae pite byaccing nynaw kya a phah kho lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Jannes te Jambres nynh Mawsi kha a dou`ae hawte kha-e ccungccaw`ae nynh byaccing kha a dou`ae. Minmin tuh thinlung arohpaw ccungccaw`ae thua`ae zah zynnaw konglang te a nue`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Thuasalama kha-e luning`ae a ngaeenaw`ae tuh phe alangku vae hawte hynh-e`ae mih ngaeenaw mah ccungccaw balyn malang a langkuh cih. Tukeiccu minmin tuh khalaeze lethung kho vae lan khyh`ae.
Thuasalama ka ccangpyanaw, ka hiinnaw ozia, ka eenaw, ka zynnaw, khaw ka teingnaw, sungsakunaw, ka ngaesangnaw,

Antiok khua kya, Ikoniam khua kya, Lystra khua kya ka tungpaw yn tua yn sahnaw`ae, vawsawrunaw`ae tuh pawtahawpaw tuasakunaw`ae kha nynh ka teing cipaw marya na ny; thuasalama kha-e`ae balyn kyate Bawipaw nynh kamaw kha yn luesah.
Athua, Kri Jesu kya Pachia rawrinaw te a hiinry`ae paw ccungccaw balyn nynh tuh tuasakunaw kha a teing cih`ae.
Thuasalama athahpaw ccungccaw`ae te ccungccaw pei a hyngpah`ae paw tuh houhouh athahpaw lang a tang cih`ae. Ming`ae kha a phee cih`ae zah mimaw mah phee athua cih`ae.
Thuasalama nang tuh phe na ccangku vae paw te phe na zyn ccaccing vae paw uccaw`ae kyakhe po la tyn, pawccecize hung kyate nynh na ccangku cipaw kha na ny.
Te na imua lya mawte nang tuh Ccathyaa kha phe na ny vae, kha-e Ccathyaa nynh Kri Jesu kya um paw zynnaw liate khumnaw mue lan nang kha ae hawsah kho.
Ccathyaa balyn tuh Pachia hysawnua paw nynh thua. Tuh-e Ccathyaa tuh ccangpyakunaw hanlan, seimuihsakunaw hanlan, raethuinaw hanlan, dingnaw kya thuiheikunaw hanlan athanepaw nynh thua.
Ou tuhte Pachia ccungccapaw tuh accing nawlan, ahoypaw ryalaw balyn hanlan khaleih paccynpaw athua nawlan nynh thua.
Tukeiccu Pachia malang te Bawipaw Jesu Kri malang kae nynh bya kae tawsya. Tuh-e Bawipaw nynh amaw yn langkunaw kya, te a peenaw kya a hiin`ae paw te a chih`ae paw kha byapia vae cih.
Pachia bya kha la ho! Accyh thua zemah, accyh thua khyh zemah la paccynkuh, lungsaenaw pipi ryte, thuiheinaw ryte mih seinaw kha la muihsakuh`ae, la pe`ae lah la hy`ae.

Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh ahmepaw ccangpyakunaw kha a ngaery khyh`ae ccyh yn thua cih, thuasalama azeipaw nakaring`ae keiccuze mimaw rynaw thyhte mimaw te mimaw kha ccangpatu`ae lang oun sueluakuh cih`ae.
Te minmin nynh mih nakaring`ae kha byaccing kyate oun paleih cih`ae zah phungpaw huataw`ae kalan oun paleihkuh cih`ae.
Thuasalama nang tuh pawpaw balyn kya la raeringkuh, riathaenaw`ae kha la ngaesang, evangelist ryalaw kha la lah, na ryalawpaw kha la ccingsah.
Pawccecize kae tuh nia lan pyapaw-uccaw hawte atu phang paccyn ka thua vae, te ka pou nawlan paw accyh tuh anae vae.
Kae nynh ahoypaw rhawtukkunaw kha phe ka tuk vae. Ccuetaekunaw kha phe ka thangsah vae. Zynnaw kha phe ka tynsah vae.

Atu te vae tuh dingnaw suilukhung kha kamaw hanlan nungpya athua vae. Tuh-e kha adingpaw byapiatu, Bawipaw nynh tuh-e nin kya kamaw kha yn pya cih. Kamaw kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama amaw yn langku lanpaw a ngaehoi`ae paw balyn kha mah a pya cih`ae.
Kamaw kalan aro maw thua lan thawte yn zuakuh.
Pawccecize Demas nynh hynh-e atu she hynh sungsahte, kamaw kha phe oun vuasya vae, te aning tuh Thesalonika khua lang phe a pou vae. Kresen tuh Galati kalan, Titu tuh Dalmatia kalan phe pou vae`ae.
Luka kyalya nynh kamaw ryte a um. Marka kha yn kobua lah namaw ryte oun cceih oh. Pawccecize aning tuh kamaw hanlan ryalawnaw kya accungkia.
Te Tykhikas kha Efesa lang phe ka saw vae.
Troas khua um paw Karpus kya ka cciataw paw angkiccua kha he nae ccia vae ze yn phubia, te ccaleih`ae, abapi lante saving-ccaleih`ae kha yn phubia.
Sohinlaeetupaw, Alexanda nynh kamaw tungvaw athahpaw patae a cyi; Bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha amaw a ryalaw thyhte amee pyaru vae sah.
Amaw kha nang nynh la raeringkuh, pawccecize aning nynh kae ccangpyanaw`ae kha thawmawte a rawse.
Masaty ka thungkhawkunaw kya hung sanmah kamaw yn pangkhae khyh, thuasalama mih balynte phe oun vuasya`ae; kha-e hanlan mih tungvaw seibe thua nan sah.

Tuhzemah ou tuhte kamaw liate phunghopaw tuh khaleih phy athua nawlan te Zenta`ae balyn nynh marya a thae ccaw`ae cite kamaw kha Bawipaw nynh yn pangkhae zah thawzung yn pya. Te kae tuh chindeih khalang kyate luesah ka thua.
Bawipaw nynh ahoy leipaw ryalaw miakaw kyate kamaw kha yn luesah cih zah a vaawran peenaw kalan khyndadyhlan yn nung cih. Amaw kya phu-enaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia um sah. Amen.
Priska te Akuila, te Onesiphoras innbyn kha la beihlang`ae.
Erastas tuh Korin khua kya nynh a um; thuasalama Trofimas tuh a cci keiccu Miletas kya nynh phe ka cciataw.
Khoccihsaw athua maw kamaw kalan thua lan thawte yn zuakuh. Eubulas, Puden, Linas, Klaudia te uteno`ae balyn nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae.
Bawipaw Jesu Kri tuh na muisaw ryte la um sah. Thawccinaw tuh na kya la um sah. Amen.
Pachia nynh a po`ae paw zynnaw thyhte, te Pachia lante ccia paw te accawkuhpaw byaccing nynaw thyhte, Pachia seepaw te Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw, Paul nynh,
zungzae hiinnaw ngaehoinaw kya a hyng kho leipaw Pachia nynh accyh atho mawze byakinpyaku vae paw,
thuasalama accyh he azawte phunghonaw liate a bya kha phe a langsaku vae, kha-e kha aening oun Khumtu Pachia kya-e kawpyapaw thyhte kamaw kya pya athua.
Ranzae zynnaw lante ka ccapaw ccaccing athua paw Titu: Paaw Pachia te aening oun Khumtu Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh na kya la um vae sah.

Ahobou ung paw uccaw`ae kha nang nynh kou hoy lang na la law ccaw cite, nang kha kaw phe kae pya vae hawkhate, khua takyh kya kriccaw piccang`ae na khang ccaw cite nynh, nang kha Krete tuikoih kyakhe kae cciataw;

na khang lanpaw ccungccaw tuh ccaenaw um leipaw athua ze, zu lukheit vawpaw athua ze, a ccaaw`ae tuh zyn lan um`ae paw thua`ae zah, a ccouseikuh`ae paw cite, nawngae lei`ae paw cite a ccae lei`ae paw athua ze khang lanpaw nynh thua.

Pawccecize kriccawbu cciakhaetu tuh Pachia kya-e synriatu athua hawte ccaenaw um leipaw, amaw rynaw te um leipaw, a thindyn leipaw, misutui a rang leipaw, peku maeku a mang leipaw, phua elan a karangkuh leipaw,
tuhkoute mikhia dooihthya paw, ahoypaw a sungsah paw, a tuathya paw, hmerarihpaw, thyaararihpaw, a sungkuh khopaw;

ahmepaw ccangpyanaw khate ming`ae kha a hy kho nawlan`ae te kha-e ccangpyanaw a rawse`ae paw kha mih seinaw a muihsaku kho nawlan`ae, aning tuh ccangpya a thua vae thyhhawte zyn lan um paw bya kha varyn a kyngkuh paw athua hahe cih.
Pawccecize nawngae lei`ae, accakaepaw byahotu`ae te lingtu`ae patae a um`ae. Abapi lante vindung awkuh`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Tuh-e`ae mih khalang tuh phang fu athua hahe cih, minmin nynh ahme leipaw muenaw a ry`ae keiccuze, ccangpya lan accan leipaw kha ccangpah`ae zah innbyn mawte phe a buleih`ae.
Mimaw kyaze minphuin kheit athua paw, mih profeh lukheit nynh, “Krete ccungccaw`ae tuh pei a hyng`ae paw, arepaw rangsaw`ae, thawnaw`ae paw aemoh`ae nynh thua`ae,” a ci.
Hynh-e bya hopaw tuh ahmepaw nynh thua. Tukeiccu minmin tuh zynnaw kya atyn nawlan`ae phe ccihtheih lang la pe`ae.
Byaccing kyate a paleihkuh paw ccungccaw kawpyapaw`ae te Jew`ae phungpaw huataw`ae kha pawlang a ria khyh nawlan`ae nynh thua.

Athyaapaw ccungccaw`ae hanlan tuh pawpaw balyn marya athyaa, thuasalama anungsikuhpaw te a zyn lei`ae paw hanlan tuh pawsang mah thyaa khyh. Thuasalama mih tuanaw-thinlung te mimaw nykunawpaw thinlung heize anungsikuh.

Minmin nynh Pachia kae nyh cite ho`ae salamah mih cyisahnaw kyate Pachia kha a vua`ae; pawccecize minmin tuh luathua-ae-ui lang um`ae paw, kawngae lei`ae paw, te ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya ccungkia lei`ae paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama nang tuh akyhpaw ccangpyanaw te angaekuhpaw bya kha la ho.
Ou tuhte pawpi`ae tuh a lungkyhpaw, sawtua lan um paw, ngaesangnaw a hoi paw, zynnaw kya, sungsakunaw kya, lungsaenaw kya atynpaw athua nawlan`ae la ccangpah`ae.

Tuhhawte nungpi`ae kha mah umtu ziazae kya sawtua lan um paw athua nawlan`ae, milae thanthya a ho`ae paw athua khyh nawlan`ae, misutui eih a rang paw athua khyh nawlan`ae, ahoypaw uccaw`ae ccangpatu`ae athua nawlan`ae la ccangpah`ae.
Ou tuhte nungpi`ae nynh kum nohua`ae paw nopi`ae kha, mih vawpaw`ae sungsahpaw, mih ccaaw`ae sungsahpaw,
a tuathya paw, athyaapaw, innlo a dooihthya paw, ahoypaw, mih vawpaw`ae kawngae`ae paw athua nawlan`ae a thuihei ccaw`ae; ou tuhte Pachia bya tuh thethyaccousah athua khyh nawlan nynh thua.
Tuhhawte kum anopaw pise`ae kha a tuathya`ae paw thua nawlan la hy`ae.
Pawpaw balyn kya ahoypaw ryalaw`ae khate dosuinkupaw lang la langpakuh`ae. Ccangpyakunaw kya ccirarihnaw, lungzinaw, thanccing thuanaw te,
seibe kho a um leipaw accipaw byaho kha la mang. Ou tetuh ae rawsetupaw nynh na konglang athahpaw uccaw a ho lanpaw hoi vae leite maethya a bongkuh vae cih.
See`ae nynh pawpaw kya balyn mih bawi`ae kawngae nawlan`ae, mih lunghoysah nawlan`ae, bua a khungru khyh nawlan`ae,
a rupya khyh nawlan`ae, thuasalama pawpaw kya balyn aening oun Khumtu Pachia ccangpyanaw kha minmin nynh a paccaan nawlan`ae, ahoypaw zyn lan umnaw balyn kha a langsaku nawlan`ae la hy`ae.
Pawccecize khumnaw yn thuakhae paw Pachia kya-e thawccinaw tuh ccungccaw`ae balyn kya phe a langkuh vae.

Pachia pawlangria leipaw te laephi lante ryduanaw`ae kha vuate, aening tuh kyhrarih lante, dingrarih lante, Pachia lante zuakute hynh-e atu she kya ah hiin lan oh paw nynh thua cite tuh-e thawccinaw nynh yn ccangpya.
Lungtua lan um paw ngaehoinaw te alesaepaw Pachia athua paw, aening Khumtu Jesu Kri kya-e aphu-epaw langkunaw kha ah ngaehoi oh paw nynh thua.

Tuh-e Jesu Kri tuh cyiseimenaw balyn kyate aening kha sawkhaw khylan, te amaw elan ccungccaw`ae kha ccikan khylan, tuh-e a ccikan paw ccungccaw`ae nynh ahoypaw cyisahnaw kha mih lungzua nawlan amaw te amaw kha aening hanlan a pyaku.
Hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh kawhoinaw balyn khate la hopah`ae, la hy`ae lah la pe`ae. Hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah pawlangria leite ae la um nan`ae sah.
Uktu`ae te kawhoitu`ae nynh oun uknaw`ae kha nawccaw lan, kawngae lan, te ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya paccynku khylan,
hung ccungccaw kong sanmah thethyaho khyh nawlan, peku maeku khyh nawlan, nevyalyapaw thua nawlan, ccungccaw`ae balyn kya lungnenaw kha langsakute a um nawlan`ae minmin kha la nysathui`ae.

Pawccecize langmaw lya tuh aening mah mingaee`ae, kawngae lei`ae, ming`ae nynh a phee`ae paw, ryduanaw aphuinphuin te hoysanaw`ae see nynh ah la thua oh, ahoy leipaw te eiungnaw kya hiinte, ming`ae nynh a hua`ae paw te lukheit te lukheit a huakuh`ae paw nynh ah la thua oh.
Thuasalama aening oun Khumtu Pachia kya-e thawccithyanaw te sungsanaw tuh ccungccaw`ae kya he yn langkuh tuh,

aening nynh ah rae oh paw dingnaw cyisahnaw`ae liate thua leite, thuasalama amaw ngaethyaumsanaw thyhte bua saahthuinaw kya-e singpyanaw liate, te Thyaa Muisaw thawsathuinaw liate nynh aening kha yn khum.
Aening oun Khumtu Jesu Kri liate kha-e Muisaw kha aening tungvaw kya phe beih lang yn bu.
Ou tuhte a thawccinaw liate thyaaccousah ah thua oh koute, zungzae hiinnaw ngaehoinaw thyhte aening tuh rhoccoutu`ae ah thua nawlan oh nynh thua.

E tuh zyn lan um paw bya thua zah hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nang nynh atu te atu la ho ci ka ry. Ou tuhte Pachia a zyn`ae paw nynh ahoypaw cyisahnaw kya tyn lan a raeringku nawlan`ae nynh thua. E uccaw`ae tuh ccungccaw`ae hanlan hoy zah athanepaw nynh thua.
Thuasalama ngaeepaw byakhiakunaw`ae, thokeinaw`ae kong, byaeikunaw`ae, kawbya kong peku maekunaw`ae kha la sibia. Pawccecize kha-e`ae tuh ccungkia khyh zah athane leipaw nynh thua.
Phiasakunaw a rae paw ccungccaw kha vaekheit, vaening thuiheinaw na pya koute tuh la dee ccavae.
Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw tuh amaw te amaw seibekuhpaw, a lungzi leipaw te a seipaw nynh thua cipaw na ny oh.
Artemas, khyh ze Tykhikas kha na kalan he kae saw te, Nikopolis khua cia ka kalan thua khonawte yn zuakuh. Pawccecize khoccihsaw lungkhu tuin kya um lante phe ka tuaku vae.
Kawbya a thya`ae paw Zenas te Apollos kha mih khuaccungnaw kya mih hanlan pawsang ahobou khyh nawlan zuapahkuh`ae lah la cciakhae`ae.
Te aening ah ccungccaw`ae mah athae thae leipaw athua khyh nawlan`ae, mih hanlan ahoboupaw kya mang lanpaw a hoi nawlan`ae, ahoypaw ryalaw pei law lan la ccangkuh`ae sah.
Ka kya a umbua`ae paw balyn nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae. Zynnaw kya aening oun sungsah`ae paw kha la beih`ae. Thawccinaw tuh nae balyn kya la um vae sah. Amen.
Jesu Kri keiccu thung a ccah paw Paul te kae unopaw Timote nynh kou sungsahpaw te rya kae lahkheihpaw Filemon kalan,
te kae sungsahpaw Apphia te rhawkaw kae thuakheih paw Archippus kalan te na innbyn kya um paw kriccawbu kalan ccaw kae ky oh.
Ah Paaw Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah.
Ka sawsangnaw kya nang kha pei sangpya biate ka Pachia kalan lungtuabya ka ho.
Pawccecize nang nynh Bawipaw Jesu kalan te mithyaa`ae balyn kalan na hoi paw na kya-e sungsakunaw te zynnaw kha ka thae pawte,
Kri Jesu liate na kya um paw ahoypaw uccaw miakaw nynaw liate na zynnaw kya-e hoiccaw tangnaw tuh ccungkia thanepaw lang a tang nawlan saw kae sangpya.
Pawccecize na sungsanaw kya ngaengansanaw te lungtuanaw alepi kaening kae hoi. Pawkeiccumacize ka unopaw, nang na liate mithyaa`ae thinlung tuh bua lungpawsah athua.
Tukeiccu nang kawpya lan accanpaw kha Kri liate kae tuh kou ka zynku zemah,
a kum tang vae paw lukheit athua paw, te atu mah Jesu Kri keiccu thungccahpaw Paul nynh sungsakunaw keiccuze kae ngia paleih.
Thung yn sawnaw`ae kya ka saah paw, ka ccapaw Onesimas hanlan nang kha kae ngia.
Langmaw lya aning tuh na hanlan ccungkia khyh, thuasalama atu tuh na hanlan te ka hanlan ccungkia vae.
Amaw kha na kalan bua kae saw. Tukeiccu nang nynh amaw kha leh la khan, tuh-e tuh kamaw ka thinlung kya-e nynh thua.
Thehoypaw keiccuze thung ka ccaw lungkhu aning nynh nang na ccelang kae kha rya yn lawpya nawlan amaw kha ka kya ka umsah ry paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama na hoynawpaw tuh nangsepaw keiccu hawte thua leite, lungthote athua nawlan na nawccaw leite pawsang ka cyihry khyh.
Pawccecize aning nynh na kyate sosoh taraw a la toikupaw tuh amaw kha nang nynh zungzae na hoi nawlan athua kho ci lante nynh a um.

Atu tuh see lukheit hawte thua vae leite, see laeze ahang lante la ccou ccavae. Abapi lante kamaw hanlan sungsahpaw uno nynh athua vae, te pynsaw lante thuasah, Bawipaw kya thuasah na hanlan pawcihmou houh sungsahpaw thua lan accan.
Tukeiccu nang nynh kamaw hynh ah mungkuhpaw lukheit lante nae tua ze amaw kha kamaw hawte la ccou.
Na tungvaw phe a cyisei ze, tukhyhze ccangkhakheit lae ae um ze, kha-e kha kae nynh laeba ka um paw lang la tua.
E hynh kae, Paul nynh kamaw ka kuih te ka zei paw nynh thua, kha-e kha kae pyaru cih. Tuhzemah nang nynh kamaw kya namaw te namaw heize laeba nae um cipaw kha kae hopah khyh.
Athua, ka unopaw, na kyate lungpawnaw kha Bawipaw kya yn muesahbua, Bawipaw min te nang nynh ka thinlung kha bua lungpawsah.
Nang nynh kaw na la ngae cih cite zynkunaw ka hoi pawte e ccaw hynh na kalan kae zei. Ka hopaw laehei nang nynh na la cyih cih cipaw ka ny.
Te ka thuanaw lanpaw kha mah yn la paccynpah; pawccecize nae sawsangnaw liate nae kalan bua thuasah ka thua cih cite ka ngaehoi.
Kri Jesu kya kamaw ryte thung kae ccahkheih paw Epafras nynh nang kha ae beihlang.
Te kamaw ry rya kae lahkheihtu`ae Marka, Aristarkhas, Demas te Luka nynh ae beihlang`ae.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thawccinaw tuh nae muisaw kya la um vae sah. Amen.
Langmaw lyaze profeh`ae kyate ah minpaaw`ae kalan khe avae pataepi aphuinphuin te bya ho paw Pachia nynh,

hynh-e nyathyakou nin ccyh kya vae tuh amaw a Ccapaw kyate nynh aening kalan khe bya yn hopya vae. Kha-e Ccapaw kha pawpaw balyn rhoccoutu lang phe a khang vae. Amaw liate nynh laephipi hynh mah a rae.

Tuh-e Ccapaw tuh Pachia phu-enaw awnawpaw te Pachiathuanaw muinsan langsakunawpaw nynh thua. Athungpaw a bya liate nynh pawpaw balyn kha po a tynsah. Aening seinaw`ae kha amaw ccaccei nynh he yn thyaasapah koute ahangnaw kya Lesaenaw ranglang khe a dahung vae.
Vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze houh ahoy huaccepaw min kha rhoccounaw liate a mue keiccuze, Ccapaw tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze patae alesaehua.

Pawccecize, “Nang tuh ka Ccapaw nynh na thua, atunin nang kha phe kae saah vae,” cite thuasah; te bua, “Kae tuh a Paaw ka thua cih zah aning tuh ka Ccapaw athua cih,” cite thuasah, vaaw ccungccaw`ae kyaze hung kalan mou Pachia nynh a ho boi?
Te, masaty saah paw ccaaw kha laephi kalan he yn cciakhae lyaze, “Pachia vaaw ccungccaw`ae balyn nynh amaw kha beik`ae sah,” a ci.
Te vaaw ccungccaw`ae konglang kha Pachia nynh, “A vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha muisaw lang rae zah a ryalawpatu`ae kha maeesoi lang a rae,” a ci.
Thuasalama Ccapaw konglang tuh, “Pou Pachia, na suitungkhung tuh zungzae te zungzae cia atynpaw nynh thua. Dingnaw hoitang tuh na peenaw hoitang nynh thua.
Dingnaw kha na sungsah zah kawbya pawlangria leinaw kha na hua. Tukeiccuze pou Pachia, na Pachia nynh nang kha na ruiban`ae luki lungtuanaw satho kha phe ae thuh vae,” a ci.
Te, “Pou BAWIPAW, atakaw lyate nang nynh laephi athonaw kha na bing, te vaawran`ae tuh na kuih te na rae`ae paw nynh thua.
Minmin tuh aroh cih`ae, thuasalama nang tuh na tyn zungzae. Te boeiningsungpue nynh apue hawte kha-e`ae tuh apue cih`ae.
Te minmin kha uccaw zungkheit hawte na bi cih`ae zah minmin tuh a rulaekuh cih`ae. Thuasalama nang tuh na rulaekuh khyh zah na kum`ae tuh thang lan khyh,” a ci.
Thuasalama, “Na rhaw`ae kha na ccusy lang kae raepya makhia tuh, ka ranglang khe dahung,” cite vaaw ccungccaw`ae lakuze hung kalan san a ho boi tou?
Minmin balyn tuh khumnaw rho a ccou vae cih`ae paw kya ryalawpya khylan saw paw ryalawpatu muisaw`ae thua khyh`ae tou?
Tukeiccuze aening nynh ah thae oh paw kha houh ah tua ah roih hahe lan oh paw nynh thua, tuhkhyh lanze po cciakhae`ae paw ah thuasei cih oh.
Pawccecize vaaw ccungccaw`ae liate hopaw bya tuh rulae kho thua khyh zah cyiseimenaw miakaw te kawngae leinaw nynh cyisahnaw mee atazaepaw detahnaw kha a mue`ae lanze,

Bawipaw nynh masaty lya mawte a ho paw khumnaw, te amaw bya a thae`ae paw liate aening kya tynsah athua paw, myarya alepaw khumnaw kha aening nynh pawlang ah ria khyh oh ze, pawcihtemou ah lue cih oh?
M u i h s a n a w ` a e, khuaruarunaw`ae, te ngaeang lan um paw ryalaw aphuinphuin te Thyaa Muisaw nynh amaw rynaw thyhte a pya paw lasung`ae ryte Pachia nynh ccaekia a khan.
Pawccecize aening nynh ah ho oh paw, yn thua vae cih paw laephipi tuh Pachia nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kaw kya nung khyh.
Thuasalama Ccathyaa sangkheit kya lukheitpaw nynh, “Ccungccaw tuh paw thua zah te mou nang nynh na tua na lia? Tukhyhze, ccungccaw ccapaw tuh paw thua zah te mou nang nynh na la dooih?
Amaw kha vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze ccapyh anehua lante na rae; amaw kha phu-enaw te sawtuanaw kha na khungsaku, na kuih te na rae paw uccaw`ae luki khe amaw kha na nung.

Pawpaw balyn kha amaw a ccu kawlang marya na nung,” cite ccaekiakhan zah a ho. Pawccecize pawpaw balyn kha amaw zakaw marya a nung cipaw tuh amaw zakaw a nung leipaw pawsang um khyh cipaw nynh thua. Thuasalama pawpaw balyn amaw zakaw marya a nung paw kha atu aening nynh ah muih loh khyh oh.

Thuasalama Pachia thawccinaw liate ccungccaw miakaw hanlan chinaw tangtua khylan, vaaw ccungccaw`ae laeze ccapyh anehua lante rae athua paw Jesu kha aening nynh ah muih oh. Chinaw a teing keiccuze aning tuh phu-enaw te sawtuanaw khate khungsah athua.

Pawccecize ccaaw`ae patae kha phu-enaw kalan a cciakhaenaw kya, pawpaw balyn tuh amaw liate um zah amaw hanlan athua paw, mih khumnaw lupi kha teingnaw liate ccingsah athua nawlan, Pachia hanlan angaekuhpaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize a thyaasahtu te thyaasah athua paw balyn tuh paryhte ccangkheitpaw nynh thua`ae. Tukeiccu aning nynh minmin kha uno`ae cite ko lan a maethyakhaekuh khyh.
Aning nynh, “Ka uno`ae kalan na min kha ka siakhae cih, pumkunaw kya namaw thehoysanaw law kha ka sah cih,” acikuh.
Te, “Amaw kha ka doliakuh cih,” bua acikuh. Te, “Kae te Pachia nynh kamaw yn pya paw imua`ae tuh e kya kae um,” bua acikuh.

Tukeiccuze imua`ae tuh chii te saw kha a neethungkuh bua`ae paw athua`ae keiccuze, Kri amaw mah tuhhawte chii te saw kha a neethungkuh bua, ou tuhte chinaw tungvaw thungnaw a hoitupaw diabolos kha, chinaw liate aning nynh ro khylan,
te chinaw rawri`ae keiccuze mih hiin lungkhu balyn seetangnaw kya um`ae paw kha luesah khylan nynh thua.
Pawccecize Kri nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha bawng khyh`ae, thuasalama Abraham ciihan kha nynh a bawng.

Tukeiccu ccungccaw seinaw`ae hanlan lungdaesanaw rae khylan, Pachia te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kya Kri tuh thawccithyapaw te zyn lan um paw Ranpibawi Lupi athua nawlan, pawpaw balyn kya amaw a uno`ae hawte rae athua lanpaw tuh accanpaw nynh thua.
Amaw nynh tuh-ounaw kha phe a teing vae keiccuze, tuh-ounaw a teing`ae paw kha bawng lan a cyih kho.
Tukeiccuze vaawran te asekuhpaw konaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw, athyaapaw uteno`ae, aening nynh ccaekia ah khan oh paw Locceihtu te Ranpibawi Lupi athua paw Kri Jesu kong kha tuatua oh.
Mawsi nynh Pachia inn balyn kya zyn lan a um hawte, Jesu Kri mah amaw a khangtupaw kya zyn lan um paw nynh thua.
Inn saktupaw tuh inn laeze sawtuanaw a hoihua thyhhawte, Jesu tuh Mawsi laeze phu-enaw mue lan angaekuh huapaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize inn miakaw tuh ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh sak paw nynh thua, thuasalama pawpaw balyn a saktupaw tuh Pachia nynh thua.
Nyalang ho athua cih paw uccaw`ae kya-e ccaekia lang, see lukheit hawte Mawsi tuh Pachia inn balyn kya zyn lan um paw ccaccing nynh thua.

Thuasalama Kri tuh amaw a inn kya Ccapaw lukheit hawte zyn lan um paw nynh thua. Zynkunaw te ngaehoinaw kya-e lungtuanaw kha athangnaw cia tynkaring lang ah kynku oh ze, aening tuh amaw a inn nynh ah thua oh.
Tukeiccuze Thyaa Muisaw nynh, “Atunin amaw roi kha na thae lan oh ze,
rangkaw kya syntaw nin kya a rawse`ae lya hawte, nae thinlung kha khungsah nan oh.
Nae minpaaw`ae nynh kamaw kha yn tuhou` ae, yn syntaw`ae, te ka ryalaw`ae kha kum sungpali cia a muih`ae.
Tukeiccuze kae tuh kha-e ciihan kya ka thinlungccih zah, ‘Mih thinlung tuh palei cceihsei zah ka ccianaw kha nyh khyh`ae,’ ka ci.
Tukeiccu ka thinrianaw kya, ‘Minmin tuh ka haeungnaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh`ae,’ cite bya ka kinku,” a ci.
Uteno`ae, nanning lukhakheit kya a hiinpaw Pachia kyate poutawnawpaw ahoy leipaw zyn leinaw thinlung a um khyh nawlan la raeringkuh oh.
Thuasalama, “Atunin,” cite ho athua lungkhu balyn lukheit te lukheit nin takyhte thawzung la pyakuh oh. Tukhyh lanze seinaw kya-e lingnaw liate nanning nae lungkhungsei cih.
Pawccecize aening nynh atakaw-e ah zynkunaw oh kha athangnaw cia tynkaring lang ah kyngku oh lanze, aening tuh Kri ryte a neethungkuh bua`ae paw nynh ah thua vae oh;
tuhte ah thua oh paw tuh, “Atunin amaw roi kha na thae oh lanze, rawsenaw kya hawte nae thinlung khung nan sah,” cite ho athua lyakhe ah thinlung khung khyh ze nynh thua.
Pawccecize phang a thae`ae pite amaw a rawse`ae paw tuh hung`ae mou? Mawsi nynh Izip ram kyate yn cciakhae`ae paw balyn kha thua khyh`ae tou?
Thuasalama kum sungpali lungkhu hung kya mou aning tuh a thinria? Mih rhua rangkaw kya a huekuh`ae paw, a sei`ae paw kya thua khyh tou?
Te a haeungnaw lungkhu lang minmin tuh tee lan khyh`ae cite hung kalan mou aning nynh ccaesaku? Kawngae lei`ae paw kalan thua khyh tou?
Tukeiccu zyn leinaw keiccuze minmin tuh tee kho khyh`ae cipaw ah muih oh.
Tukeiccu, amaw hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang teenaw lanpaw byakinpyakupaw phang a um pite, nanning kyaze lukhakheit nynh kha-e kha phya kho leite a um lanpaw tuh, aening rikhae oh sih.

Pawccecize minmin kalan mah hopya a la thua hawte, aening kalan thehoypaw tuh hopya athua vae; thuasalama a thae`ae paw nynh zynnaw te a lawku khyh`ae keiccuze, ho athua paw bya tuh minmin hanlan thane khyh.

Pawccecize a zyn`ae paw aening tuh kha-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang ah tee oh. Laephipi athonaw kyate ryalaw`ae tuh phe athang vae zemah, “Ka thinrianaw kya ccae ka sah hawte, ‘Ka haeungnaw lungkhu lang minmin nynh tee lan khyh`ae,’ ” cite a ho hawte nynh thua.
Pawccecize sangkheit kya nin sarinaw kong kha hynhte a ho, “Te nin sarinaw kya Pachia tuh a ryalaw`ae balyn kyate a hae-ung,” a ci.
Te tuh-e kya, “Minmin nynh ka hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang tee lan khyh`ae,” bua a ci.
Tukeiccu, ccungccaw abang hanlan tuh kha-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang tee khonaw phang a um, te masaty thehoypaw hopya athua`ae paw minmin tuh kawngae leinaw keiccuze tee khyh`ae.
“Atunin a roi kha na thae oh lanze nae thinlung khung nan sah,” cite langmaw lya a la ho vae hawte, ccyh khaw aro koute David kya, “Atunin” cite nin nin kheit kha a khyapya.
Pawccecize Joshua nynh minmin kha hae-ungnaw a la pya`ae ze, tuh-e koute nin ccangpaw kong kha Pachia nynh la ho vae lan khyh.
Tukeiccu Pachia ccungccaw`ae hanlan hae-ungnaw tuh a um ung.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh a ryalaw kyate a hae-ung hawte, Pachia kya-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang a tee paw ccungccaw tuh amaw ryalaw`ae kyate phe a haeung vae.
Tukeiccu kawngae leinaw kya-e alokuhpaw dosuinku lanpaw thyhte hung sanmah a khuliakuh khyh nawlan, tuh-e hae-ungnaw lungkhu lang tee khylan aening thawte zuakuh oh sih.

Pawccecize Pachia bya tuh ahiinpaw, athungpaw, te kynning mawte ahepaw thaloi laeze ahe huapaw nynh thua; hiinnawmuisaw te muisaw, kincui, te ru atungkunaw`ae phianaw cia hei a thuin khopaw, te thinlung kya-e tuanaw`ae te paccynkunaw`ae aphiathya paw nynh thua.
Amaw malang a langkuh leipaw rae paw uccaw pawsang um khyh. Thuasalama ahmaw konglang ah phypakuh cih oh paw amaw mitmuihnaw kya pawpaw balyn sahsete um zah raerae a langkuh.
Oute vaawran lang po a khung vae paw, alesaepaw Ranpibawi Lupi, Pachia Ccapaw Jesu ah hoi oh keiccu tuh ah ccaekiakhannaw kha tynkaring lang kyngkuh oh si.

Pawccecize aening ah nyaanaw oh kya thawccihthya leipaw Ranpibawi Lupi kha aening nynh ah hoi khyh oh, thuasalama aning tuh aening hawte pawpaw balyn lante tuh-ou a la thua, thuasalama sei leite nynh a um.
Tukeiccu ahoboupaw ccyh kya bawng kho nawlan, aening nynh ngaethyaumsanaw te thawccinaw ah mue nawlan oh, thawccinaw kya-e suitungkhung kalan rawhoy te cceih oh sih.
Ccungccaw laku kyate popaw ranpibawi lupi miakaw tuh seinaw hanlan silawkunaw te lasung`ae kha pya khylan, Pachia lante asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kya ccungccaw`ae hanlan khang paw nynh thua.
Amaw mah nyaanaw nynh phang ave paw athua keiccuze, aning tuh a nyhthya lei`ae paw tungvaw te a cceihsei`ae paw tungvaw ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi kho.
Te hynh-e keiccuze ccungccaw`ae hanlan te amaw hanlan, aning tuh seinaw hanlan silawpya lan ahopaw nynh thua.
Hynh-e sawtuanaw hynh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah amaw kalan lawkuh khyh, thuasalama Aaron a ko hawte Pachia nynh a ko paw ccungccaw nynh a lawkuh.
Tuhhawte Kri mah Ranpibawi Lupi thua khylan amaw te amaw kha phu-esakuh khyh, thuasalama, “Nang tuh ka Ccapaw, atunin nang kha phe kae saah vae,” a cih paw nynh amaw kha phuesah.
Ccathyaa ccanglang kya, “Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte, nang tuh zungzae ranpibawi nynh na thua,” cite mah a ho.
Aning tuh pynsaw lante a um lya chinaw kyate amaw kha a khum khopaw kalan thawte rawnaw te mitphi ryte, sawsangnaw te ngianaw kha a rae, te aning tuh Pachia rawri keiccuze thaepya athua.
Aning tuh Ccapaw mang athua zemah, a teingpaw uccaw`ae liate kawngaenaw kha a ccangkuh.
Te accingpaw lang rae athua koute, amaw kawngae`ae paw balyn hanlan aning tuh zungzae khumnaw athotupaw lang yn tang.
“Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte,” Ranpibawi Lupi lante Pachia nynh phe a ko vae paw nynh thua.
Amaw kong ho lanpaw patae kae hoi zemah nanning nynh na thaethya khyh oh keiccu tuh ccaesahpya lan aru.

Pawccecize atu nanning tuh ccangpatu`ae lang hei tang phe na zaw vae oh zemah, Pachia bya`ae athonaw kha bua ccangpyaku na ho ung oh. Te looh tangpaw thua leite samatei bua aho ung paw nynh na thua oh.
Pawccecize samatei kyalya a neih ung paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh dingnaw bya kha nythyanaw hoi khyh, pawccecize aning tuh imua nynh thua ung.
Thuasalama looh tangpaw tuh piccang`ae hanlan nynh thua, tuh-e`ae tuh ahoypaw te athahpaw paryh phiathya khylan mih nythyanaw a mangkuh thya`ae paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccuze Kri konglang atakaw ccangpyakunaw`ae kha cciataw te, piccangthuanaw kalan aening cceih oh sih. Achihpaw ryalaw kyate ngaesikunaw kong, Pachia zynnaw kong,
baptisma ccangpyakunaw kong, kuih khang paw kong, a chih`ae paw thothuinaw kong, te zungzae byapianaw kong ccangpyakunaw lungbing kha bua bing vae leite piccangthuanaw kalan cceih oh sih.
Te Pachia nynh oun ua lanze, hynh-e hynh aening nynh a cyih cih oh.
Pawccecize vaekheit awsah athua vae`ae paw, vaawrane lasung phe a tangtua vae`ae paw, te Thyaa Muisaw kya-e a neethungkuh bua vae`ae paw,
te Pachia kya-e ahoypaw bya te yn thua vae cih paw she kyae thungnaw`ae phe a tangtua vae`ae paw,

kha-e`ae nynh a khuliaku`ae lanze, Pachia Ccapaw kha mimaw hanlan athaw lante a khiade`ae paw thua zah raerae alangkuh lang maethyasah`ae paw athua keiccuze minmin kha ngaesikunaw kalan bua thawsathui lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh.
Pawccecize laelung nynh amaw vawlan palei leih accah paw khuatui kha neih zah kha-e vawlan ryalahtupaw hanlan thingthae-eccang kha a pousahpya, te kha-e laelung tuh Pachia kyate hythuanaw kha a ccou.
Thuasalama hingpaw te thabu a pousah paw laelung tuh nue athua, te thyalawnaw kalan a naekuh vae, kha-e athangnaw tuh maee te rua lanpaw nynh thua vae.
Thuasalama sungsah`ae paw, hynhcihte nae kya kae ho zemah, nanning nynh khumnaw te azuikuh paw uccaw, nanning te asekuhpaw ahoyhuapaw uccaw`ae kha na cyih cih oh cite kae zynkuh.

Pawccecize amaw min hanlan na cyi oh paw, mithyaa`ae hanlan nanning nynh rya phe na lawpya vae oh paw te rya na lawpya ung oh paw kya, nae ryalaw te sungsahkunaw kya-e nae cyisahnaw kha phe ning lante Pachia tuh ading leipaw thua khyh.
Te na ngaehoinaw oh kha phe aria nawlan, alokuhpaw thawte zuakunaw kha athangnaw cia nanning lu raveih nynh na langsaku nawlan oh kou kae ry.
Ou tuhte nanning tuh nae thawnaw khyh nawlan, thuasalama byakinpyakupaw`ae kha zynnaw te ngaesangnaw liate rhoccou`ae paw thydokuh`ae paw na thua nawlan oh kae ry.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh Abraham kha bya he a kinpakuh tuh, amaw lae ale huapaw min phya lanpaw a um khyh keiccu, amaw te amaw kha ccaesakuh zah,
“Thanccingte nang kha hythua kae pya ccaccing cih zah kae pungthungsah ccaccing cih,” a ci.
Tukeiccu aning nynh lungsaete a ngaesang koute byakinpyakupaw kha a mue.
Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh ale huapaw min phyate ccae leih sahku`ae, te byakinkupaw nynh tuh hopaw kha tynsah zah byaeikunaw balyn kha a thangsah.
Tuhte Pachia nynh a byakinpyakupaw rhoccoutu`ae kya arulaekuh kho leipaw a khuakhannaw kha ccaerarihlan langsaku a ry keiccu a byakinkupaw liate a tynsah.

Aening khynnaw ah mue vae oh paw nynh tuh ah malang nungpya athua paw ngaehoinaw kha ah kynku kho nawlan oh, alepipaw thawzung pyanaw ah hoi kho nawlan oh, a hanlan hyng lanpaw athua kho leipaw Pachia nynh arulaekuh kho leipaw uccaw ccangning kya hynhte a cyi.
Kha-e ngaehoinaw kha zokhawpaw boei lungkhu lang phe a tee paw, phe ria zah tynkaringpaw hiinnawmuisaw kya-e sivawhinpi hawte aening nynh ah hoi oh.
Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte zungzae Ranpibawi Lupi athua paw Jesu, aening hanlan zeccuetupaw tuh tuh-e kalan phe a tee vae.
Pawccecize tuh-e Melkhizedek, Salem siapharan, Ahang Huaccepaw Pachia kya-e ranpibawi nynh siapharan`ae chianaw kyate yn ki paw Abraham kha cciadue zah hythua a pya.

Abraham nynh mah amaw kha luadepaw uccaw`ae balyn kya-e pumhaw pumkheit kha a pya. Masaty a min asuilan tuh “Dingnaw siapharan,” nynh thua, tuhkoute Salem siapharan mah athua, tuh-e tuh “Daenaw siapharan,” cipaw nynh thua.
Aning tuh paaw hoi khyh, nung hoi khyh, thokeinaw hoi khyh, umnaw atho nin hoi khyh zah hiinnaw athangnaw mah hoi khyh, thuasalama Pachia Ccapaw alo lante rae thua zah po atynpaw ranpibawi nynh thua.
E ccungccapaw tuh pawcih nynh alesae cipaw kha tuatua oh. Ciihan kyaze paaw athua paw Abraham nynh heize amaw kha luadepaw uccaw`ae kya-e pumhaw pumkheit kha a pya.
Ranpibawithuanaw a hoi`ae paw Levi ccaaw`ae nynh mih uno`ae athua paw, ccungccaw`ae tuh Abraham ciihan athua`ae zemah minmin kyate pumhaw pumkheit kha Kawbya thyhte lawku lan kawpyapaw a hoi`ae.
Thuasalama a thokeinaw kha Levi kyate suih athua leipaw Melkhizedek tuh Abraham kya-e pumhaw pumkheit kha ccou zah aning nynh byakinpyakupaw a mue paw Abraham kha hythua a pya.
Te anyaa huapaw kha alesae huapaw nynh hythua a pya cipaw tuh eiku lanpaw um khyh.
Te e kya a chihthyapaw ccungccaw`ae nynh pumhaw pumkheit kha a ccou`ae; thuasalama khuhlang tuh po a hiin cite ccaekia khanpya athua paw nynh pumhaw pumkheit kha a ccou.
Te pumhaw pumkheit a ccou paw Levi nynh mah Abraham kyate pumhaw pumkheit a pyabua cite ho lanpaw a um.
Pawccecize Melkhizedek nynh Abraham te a tungku lyakha Levi tuh a paaw pyn lungkhu nynh a um ung.

Tukeiccuze, Levi kyate a tho paw ranpibawithuanaw kaw khe ccungccaw`ae nynh Kawbya kha a mue`ae keiccuze, ccingnaw tuh Levi kyate a tho paw ranpibawithuanaw liate athua lanze, Aaronthuanaw thyhte ko leite, Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte ccangpaw ranpibawi yn pou lanpaw tuh pawmou aho ung?
Pawccecize ranpibawithuanaw tuh rulae athua keiccuze Kawbya mah rulae aho vae.
Pawccecize e uccaw`ae nynh a honuathepaw ccungccaw tuh ccangpaw phuin nynh thua. Tuh-e phuin kyate hung ccungccaw nynh san silawhang kya ryalawpah boi khyh.
Pawccecize ah Bawipaw tuh Judah phuin kyate nynh yn langku cipaw tuh phe aria. Tuhe phuin tuh ranpibawithuanaw te asekuh cipaw Mawsi nynh kharyh ho khyh.
Te Melkhizedek alo lante ccangpaw ranpibawi alangku lanze, tuh-e tuh houh ariapaw nynh thua.
Tuh-e paw tuh pynsaw lante kawpyapaw, kawbya thyhte ranpibawi thua khyh, thuasalama athang kho leipaw hiinnaw kya-e thungnaw thyhte nynh athua.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh, “Nang tuh Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte, zungzae ranpibawi nynh na thua,” cite ccaekia a khan.
Pawccecize, voihaw lante, langmaw-e kawpyatypaw tuh a thawzyanaw te accungkia khyhnaw keiccuze vua athua,
pawccecize Kawbya nynh pawsang ccingsah khyh; hawkheit lante, ahoy huapaw ngaehoinaw kha thuakhae athua, tuh-e ngaehoinaw liate aening tuh Pachia kalan ah naekuh oh.
Te ccaesakunaw um leite aning tuh ranpibawi lang tangsah thua khyh.

Pawccecize minmin tuh ccaesakunaw um leite ranpibawi`ae lang yn tang`ae paw nynh thua. Thuasalama aning tuh, “BAWIPAW tuh ccaesakuh zah ngaesikuh vae lan khyh, ‘Nang tuh Melkhizedekthuanaw thyhte zungzae ranpibawi nynh na thua,’ ” cite amaw kha ccaesakunaw te a cipatupaw liate nynh ranpibawi lang yn tang.
Tuh-e ccaesakunaw liate Jesu tuh ahoy huapaw byakin kya-e aamahkhan lang yn tang.
Te ranpibawi`ae tuh patae a um`ae, pawkeiccumacize po tynnaw kyate chinaw nynh a khaw`ae keiccuze nynh thua.
Thuasalama Jesu tuh zungzae atyn keiccuze, arulaekuh kho leipaw ranpibawithuanaw kha a hoi.
Amaw liate Pachia kalan oun cceih`ae paw hanlan ngiapyanaw rae khylan aning tuh zungzae a hiin keiccuze minmin kha athangnaw cia khum khylan a cyih kho.

Pawccecize athyaapaw, seibe lan accan leipaw, anungsikuh leipaw, misei`ae kyate a phiakuhpaw, te vaawran`ae laeze ahanghua lang rae athua paw tuh-e Ranpibawi Lupi tuh aening hanlan angaekuhpaw nynh thua.

Tuh-e ranpibawi lupi`ae hawte, masaty amaw seinaw hanlan, oute ccungccaw`ae seinaw hanlan nin takyh silawnaw rae ho vae khyh, pawccecize amaw a pyn a pyaku lyakhe, zungzae hanlan vaekheit te phe a ccingsah vae.
Pawccecize Kawbya nynh nyaanaw a hoi paw ccungccaw`ae kha ranpibawi lang a khang. Thuasalama Kawbya koute yn thua paw ccaesakunaw kya-e bya nynh zungzae accingpaw Ccapaw kha a khang.
Atu ah ho oh paw uccaw`ae kong abapi tuh: Vaawran`ae kya Lesaenaw suitungkhung ranglang a dahung paw, khahtahawpaw Ranpibawi Lupi kha aening ah hoi oh.
Aning tuh ccungccaw nynh sak leipaw, Bawipaw nynh a sak paw beikbuu ccaccing athua paw athyaapaw hmin kya-e ryalahtu nynh thua.
Pawccecize ranpibawi lupi miakaw tuh lasung`ae te silawnawpaw khate silawpya khylan khang paw nynh thua. Tukeiccu hynh-e paw mah silawpya nawlan ccangkhakheit a hoi aho.
Pawccecize aning tuh laephi vawlan hin a la um lanze, ranpibawi la thua lan khyh, pawccecize Kawbya thyhte lasung te silawpah paw ranpibawi`ae a um.

Minmin tuh vaawran te asekuhpaw uccaw pungsan te mynlyh rya nynh a law`ae. Tuh-e keiccu Mawsi nynh beikbuu kha sak lan vae cite he a noukuh tuh, “Mua vawlan nang na kya langsapya athua paw pungsan thyhhawte pawpaw balyn kha na rae nawlan raeringkuh,” cite Pachia nynh Mawsi kha raering a pya.
Thuasalama Jesu tuh ahoy huapaw byakinpyakupaw kya thadynsah athua paw, ahoy huapaw byakin kya-e Daenaw Raetu mah athua keiccuze atu aning tuh ahoy huaccepaw ryalaw kha phe a mue vae.
Pawccecize masaty e byakin tuh seimenaw a la um khyh lanze, vaeningnaw byakin kha ccung la thua vae lan khyh.

Pawccecize ccungccaw`ae kya Pachia nynh seimenaw muihpah`ae zah a ho paw tuh, “ Ngaetua oh, nin`ae yn thua cih, BAWIPAW nynh a ci, Israel innbyn te Judah innbyn ryte athawpaw byakin ka rae cih nin ccyh yn thua cih,

Izip ram kyate minmin kha kuih te ka sue`ae zah ka cciakhae lya`ae nin kya mih minpaaw`ae ryte ka rae paw byakin thyhte thua vae lan khyh. Ka byakin kya minmin nynh atyn khyh`ae keiccuze kae mah minmin kha ka dooih khyh`ae, cite BAWIPAW nynh a ci.

Pawccecize tuh-e nin`ae koute Israel innbyn ryte ka rae cih paw byakin tuh e hynh nynh thua, cite BAWIPAW nynh a ci. Ka kawbya`ae kha mih tuanawthinlung kya ka sang cih zah kha-e`ae kha mih thinlung kya ka zei cih; te kae tuh mih Pachia ka thua cih zah minmin tuh ka ccungccaw`ae athua cih`ae.

Te, ‘BAWIPAW kha nyh,’ cite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah a innpaw kha ccangpah vae lan khyh`ae zah ccungccaw miakaw nynh a uno kha ccangpah vae lan khyh`ae. Pawccecize adih huapaw kyate tho zah ale huapaw kyacia kamaw kha marya yn nyh vae cih`ae.
Pawccecize minmin ding leinaw kha ngaethya ka umsah cih`ae zah mih seinaw`ae te mih cyiseimenaw`ae kha kharyh ka ccykepah vae lan khyh`ae,” a ci.
“Byakin thawpaw,” a cipaw kya masaty byakin kha arynpaw lang phe a tangsah vae. Te ryn zah arohthyapaw uccaw tuh zo lan a cih vae.
Oute masaty byakin nynh hei Pachia ryalawpyanaw kaw`ae te laephi-e athyaapaw hmin kha a hoi ccaccing.
Pawccecize rae paw beikbuu a la um; masaty tuh-e lungkhu kya maeekhua awnawpaw te ccaboi, te nungpyapaw sanlou a um`ae, tuh-e khaan tuh athyaapaw hmin a ci`ae.
Te sanningnaw zokhawpaw boei nuhlang Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin a ci`ae paw khaan a um.
Tuh-e khaan kya sui pakephepaw te sui te po alekuh lang a lae`ae paw byakin kua a um, tuh-e lungkhu kyatuin manna a nungnaw`ae paw sui ang, anaw toih paw Aaron hoitang te byakin lungphe`ae a um.
Te tuh-e byakin Kua vawlan phu-enaw kya-e cherub`ae nynh ngaethyaumsanaw tungkhung kha phang a dawkhaw`ae, kha-e kong kha atu aening nynh phe ccing lan ah ho kho loh khyh oh.
Kha-e uccaw`ae kha tuhcihte paccyn he athua tuh, ranpibawi`ae nynh Pachia ryalaw kha lawte, beikbuu masaty akhaan lungkhu langkhe leih a tee`ae.

Thuasalama sanningnaw akhaan lungkhu lang tuh ranpibawi lupi rou nynh chii ryte kum kheit ze vaekheit kyalya a tee. Amaw te ccungccaw`ae nynh nyku leite a rae`ae paw seinaw hanlan kha-e chii te aning nynh si a law.
Masaty beikbuu phang a thadyn lya tuh Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang ccianaw tuh hungpya thua loh khyh cipaw kha hynhcihte Thyaa Muisaw nynh a muihsah.
Tuh-e beikbuu tuh atu ccyh hanlan muihsanawpaw nynh thua; tuh-e kya Pachia pyapaw te silawkunaw`ae paw kha a pya`ae, tuh-e nynh mawtemaw nykunaw te asekuh lante ryalahtupaw kha ccingsah kho khyh.
Tuh-e tuh aepaw, niapaw, singkupaw aphuinphuin te pynsaw te asekuhpaw phunglang`ae kyalya thua zah raethuinaw ccyh kyacia rou nynh mang athua.

Thuasalama Kri tuh yn thua vae cih paw ahoypaw uccaw`ae kya-e Ranpibawi Lupi hawte yn thua zah, kuih te rae leipaw, tuh-e horypaw tuh hynh-e raenaw kya-e athua leipaw, lesaehua zah houh accingpaw beikbuu liate,
aening hanlan zungzae sawkhawnaw kha hoite, mia`ae te vaetuataw`ae chii liate thua vae leite, amaw a chii liate Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang vaekheit rou a tee.
Pawccecize tangnuapaw`ae te mia`ae chii, te maee te u paw vaetua tohlaw buhaw`ae khate a thyaa lei`ae paw kha theipaw nynh pynsaw ccikanku nawlan a thyaasah kho lanze,

zungzae tynpaw Muisaw liate Pachia kya ccaenaw um leipaw, amaw te amaw a pyakuh paw, Kri chii nynh achihpaw ryalaw kyate a hiinpaw Pachia rya lawpya khylan naemaw nykunaw thinlung kha pawcihmou houh a thyaasah kho cih?

Tukeiccuze masaty byakin kaw e cyiseimenaw kya-e sawkhawnaw hanlan chinaw la um vae zah, zungzae tynpaw rho uccaw kya-e byakinpyakupaw kha ko athua`ae paw nynh a mue nawlan`ae aning tuh athawpaw byakin kya-e Daenaw Raetu nynh thua.
Pawccecize rhosuinaw a umnaw kya tuh rhosuitupaw chinaw a um aho hahe.
Pawccecize rhosuitupaw a chih koute nynh rhosuinaw tuh cyi khonaw a hoi, rhosuitu phang a hiin lya tuh rhosuinaw nynh kharyh kaw hoi kho khyh.
Tukeiccu masaty byakin hei kha chii leite tynsah thua khyh.

Pawccecize Mawsi nynh Kawbya thyhte ccungccaw`ae balyn kha kawpyapaw miakaw kha a hopah`ae koute vaetuataw chii, te mia chii te tui ryte sekakungpaw tuuming te hyssop kha laah zah ccauh te ccungccaw`ae balyn kha thei`ae zah.
“Hynh-e tuh Pachia nynh nanning ae pya oh paw byakin kya-e chii nynh thua,” a ci.
Tuhhawte beikbuu te Pachia ryalawnawpaw uccaw`ae balyn kha mah chii te pung a thei.
Te Kawbya thyhte pawpaw balyn vya thang lan chii liate thyaasah athua, te chii luanaw um leite seingaethyanaw um khyh.

Tukeiccu vaawran kya um paw uccaw`ae pungsan kha khahtahawpaw silawnaw`ae te thyaasah lanpaw tuh ahobou paw nynh thua, te vaawran te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae tuh kha-e`ae laeze ahoy huapaw silawnaw te nynh thyaasah athua.

Pawccecize thanccingpaw pungsan athua paw, kuih te rae paw athyaapaw hmin lungkhu lang Kri tuh tee khyh, thuasalama atu aening hanlan Pachia mitmuihnaw kya langku khylan, vaawran lungkhu lang nynh a tee.
Tuhzemah ranpibawi lupi nynh amaw chii athua leipaw ryte Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang kum takyh a tee hawte, Kri nynh amaw te amaw kha pei pyaku lan tee vae khyh.
Tuhte athua lanze, laephipi athotakaw te aning tuh pei a la teing vae cih; thuasalama atu she athangnaw kya, amaw silawnaw liate seinaw kha ccaring vua khylan vaekheit rou nynh a langku.
Te ccungccaw`ae hanlan vaekheit chi lanpaw tuh laerui-awde paw thua zah tuh-e koute byapianaw a um hawte,
Kri nynh ccungccaw patae seinaw kha phu khylan vaekheit kyalya a pyaku. Te amaw kha ngaehoite a ngaw paw ccungccaw`ae kha, khum khylan aning tuh seinaw leite vaeningnaw bua yn langkuh ung cih.

Pawccecize Kawbya tuh yn thua vae cih paw ahoypaw uccaw`ae mynlyh thua zah uccaw`ae muinsan ccaccing thua khyh, kum takyhte a pya he`ae paw alokuhpaw silawnaw khate oun thua`ae paw kha kharyh ccingsah kho khyh.

A ccingsah kho lanze, silawkunaw kha phe a la umtaw vae cih`ae khaw? Pawkeiccumacize a beiktu`ae tuh zungzae hanlan vaekheit te sei thyaasah athua vae`ae ze seinaw nykunawpaw la hoi lae vae lan khyh`ae.
Thuasalama kha-e silawnaw kya tuh seinaw bua liathuinaw kum takyhte a um.
Pawccecize tangnuapaw`ae te mia`ae chii nynh seinaw po lawpya lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh.
Tukeiccu laephipi lang Kri yn thua lyaze aning nynh, “Silawnaw te pyapawuccaw kha nang nynh na ry khyh, thuasalama kamaw hanlan pyn kha phe nae paccynpya vae.
Apynpi te maee te u paw silawkunaw`ae te seinaw hanlan silawnaw`ae kya nang na lungrythua khyh.
Oute kae nynh, ‘Ccauh kuekuhpaw kya kamaw konglang azeiku thyhte ngaetua, pou Pachia na rynaw rae khylan nynh kae tuh kae thua,’ ka ci,” cite a ho.

Luki langkhe, “Kawbya thyhte silawnaw te pyapawuccaw` ae, te apynpi te maee te u paw silawnaw`ae te, seinaw hanlan pyapaw-uccaw`ae kha na ry khyh, kha-e`ae kya na lungrythua khyh,” (tuh-e`ae tuh kawbya thyhte pyapaw nynh thua) cite a ho koute,
aning nynh, “Ngaetua, pou Pachia, kae tuh na rynaw rae khylan nynh kae thua,” a ci. Vaeningnaw-e kha tynsah khylan masaty-e kha phe a vua.
Tuh-e rynaw liate, Jesu Kri pyn kha zungzae hanlan vaekheit rou pyanaw liate aening tuh thyaasah athua vae oh.
Te ranpibawi miakaw tuh nin takyh ryalawpya te a thadyn`ae, te seinaw kharyh a thyaasah kho leipaw alokuhpaw silawnaw khate pei silawpya`ae.
Thuasalama hynh-e paw tuh seinaw elan silawnaw ccangkheit kha zungzae hanlan a pya koute, Pachia ranglang khe a dahung vae.
Tuh-e ccyh kyate a rhaw`ae kha a ccusy lang rae athua makhia phang a ngaw vae.
Pawccecize pyapaw-uccaw ccangkheit liate thyaasah athua cciamang`ae paw kha aning nynh zungzae a ccingsah`ae.
Te Thyaa Muisaw mah kaening kya ccaekia nynh thua; pawccecize langmaw lya,

“Tuh-e nin`ae koute minmin ryte ka rae lanpaw byakin tuh e hynh nynh thua, BAWIPAW nynh a ci: ka kawbya`ae kha mih thinlung kya ka sang cih zah kha-e`ae kha mih tuanawthinlung kyakhe ka zei cih,” cite a ho koute,
“Mih seinaw`ae te kawbya pawlangria leipaw mih cyisahnaw`ae kha kharyh ka ccykepah vae lan khyh`ae,” a ci.
Atu hynh-e seingaethyanaw a umnaw kya, seinaw hanlan pyapaw-uccaw kharyh um vae khyh.
Tukeiccuze uteno`ae, Jesu chii liate Athyaa Huaccepaw Hmin lungkhu lang tee lan rawhoynaw ah hoi oh keiccu,
aening hanlan paccynpya athua paw, thaw zah ahiinpaw ccianawlaanpi liate, a pynsaw athua paw, zokhawpaw boei liate,
Pachia inn tungvaw Ranpibawi Lupi ah hoi oh keiccu,

ahoy leipaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung kyate ah thinlung tuh thei thua vae zah ah pyn tuh tui ccipaw te sing athua vae keiccuze phe ariapaw zynnaw te thinlung thanccingte aening nynh Pachia kalan naekuh oh sih.
Ngaehoinaw kong ccaekiakhannaw kha hawlang hawlang pu leite varyn kyngkuh oh sih, pawccecize bya yn kinpakuh paw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua.
Te sungsakunaw te ahoypaw ryalaw kha lungthosah khylan lukheit te lukheit tuapakuh oh sih.

Ccungccaw abang nynh leih a cyimae`ae hawte, aening nynh pynkheihlan pumkupaw kha umtaw nan oh sih. Thuasalama lukheit te lukheit thawzung pyakuh oh sih. Nin tuh houhouh yn naekuh vae cipaw kha na muih oh hawte thawzung houh la pyakuh oh.
Pawccecize byaccing nynaw kha aening nynh phe ah mue oh koute lungrarou te aening ah sei oh lanze, seinaw hanlan silawkunaw um lae vae khyh.
Thuasalama ri lan um paw byapianaw yn thua lanpaw te rawsetu`ae kha phe ccung lan a u vae cih paw, bungpawnaw maee rou kha nynh a um vae.
Mawsi Kawbya kha pawlangria leipaw ccungccaw tuh ccaekia luning khyhze luthung kaw khe ngaethya-umsanaw mue leite a chih.

Pachia Ccapaw kha a ccu kaw syde zah amaw kha thyaasah athua paw byakin kya-e chiise kha athyaa leipaw uccaw lang ria zah thawccinaw Muisaw kha a saryapaw ccungccaw tuh pawcih alepaw detahnaw kha mou mue lan accan cite nanning nynh na tua oh?

Pawccecize, “Ccaeliarunaw tuh kamaw kya-e nynh thua, kae nynh ccae ka liaru cih,” cite Bawipaw nynh a ci. Te, “BAWIPAW nynh a ccungccaw`ae kha byapia cih,” bua a ci, cite a hotupaw kha kaening nynh kae ny.
A hiinpaw Pachia kuih lungkhu lang boh ccaw lanpaw tuh ri lan um paw uccaw nynh thua.
Thuasalama nanning awsah na thua oh koute alepaw vawsawnaw kya-e teingnaw na ngaesang oh paw, langmaw-e nin`ae kha bua liathuitua oh.
Vaekhakheit vae ze saryanaw`ae te vawsawnaw`ae liate nanning tuh maethyalaw na thua oh; te vaekhakheit vae ze nanning tuh tuhcihte a teing`ae paw ryte a mungkuh`ae paw nynh na thua oh.

Pawccecize sivarui te yn khiinaw`ae kya nanning nynh thaw nae cci oh, te nanning nynh vaawran kya ahoy huapaw te atynpaw uccaw na hoi oh paw kha na nyku oh keiccu na hoi oh paw uccaw`ae ae luade oh paw kha lungtuate na ngaesang oh.
Tukeiccuze alepipaw ryalaw mee a hoi paw nae rawhoynaw kha vua nan oh.
Pawccecize Pachia rynaw kha na cyih oh koute byakinpyakupaw na mue nawlan oh ngaesangnaw na hoi oh aho.
“Pawccecize sosohtari aro koute yn thua cih paw tuh yn thua vae cih; yn ro vae lan khyh.
Te adingpaw ccungccaw tuh zynnaw liate nynh a hiin cih; thuasalama lukhakheit nynh nuhlang a sihku lanze ka muisaw tuh kha-e paw kya a lungrythua lan khyh,” a ci.
Thuasalama aening tuh ronaw kalan nuhlang a sihkuh`ae paw ah thua khyh oh, thuasalama hiinnaw-muisaw khynnaw kalan zynnaw a hoi`ae paw nynh ah thua oh.
Te zynnaw tuh ngaehoi paw uccaw`ae a um ccaccingpaw, muih loh leipaw uccaw`ae phe riasapaw kha nynh thua.
Pawccecize kha-e zynnaw liate nynh langmaw-e ccungccaw`ae tuh thehoysanaw kha a ccou`ae.
Laephipi tuh Pachia bya liate nynh rae athua cipaw kha zynnaw liate nynh ah thaethya oh; ou tuhte muihpaw uccaw`ae hynh muih khopaw uccaw`ae te rae paw thua khyh`ae.

Zynnaw liate Abel nynh Kain silawnaw laeze ahoy huapaw silawnaw kha Pachia kalan a pya. Pachia nynh amaw lasung kong ccaekia he a khan tuh zynnaw liate aning tuh ading cite ccaekia a mue. Te aning tuh a chi vae zemah zynnaw liate bya a ho ung.

Enok tuh chinaw a tung vae khyh ccaw cite zynnaw liate lawthung athua. Te, “Pachia nynh amaw kha phe a lawthung vae keiccuze aning tuh muih lan um vae khyh.” Pawccecize lawthung athua maw, aning tuh Pachia lungrythuasah cipaw ccaekia kha a hoi.

Te zynnaw leite Pachia a lungrythuasah lanpaw tuh thua kho khyh. Pawccecize Pachia kalan yn thua paw ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia tuh a um cipaw te amaw kha thawte a ccung`ae paw kha amee pyatu nynh thua cipaw kha a zyn hahe aho.

Noah tuh muih loh leipaw uccaw`ae kong kha Pachia nynh raering a pya koute a innbyn khumnaw hanlan Pachia rawrinaw te zynnaw liate sanphalung kha a sak, kha-e zynnaw liate laephipi kha seibe zah zynnaw liate athua paw dingnaw rhoccoutu lang yn tang.
Abraham nynh rho lang a ccou vae cih paw ram langkhe ccia khylan ko he athua tuh zynnaw liate kaw a ngae; te teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw ny leite a cceih.
Byakinpyakupaw ram kyakhe ccangpaw ram kya hawte zynnaw liate a um. Kha-e byakinpyakupaw kha amaw ry rhoccoutu athua`ae paw Isaak te Jakob ryte bu kyakhe a um`ae.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh a sak paw te a rae paw, athonaw a hoi paw khuapi kha aning nynh a ngaehoi.

Sarah nynh mah amaw kha byakinpakuhtupaw tuh zyn lan um paw nynh thua cite a tuaku keiccuze ccaawpoi kho lan cipaw zynnaw liate thawzung a mue. Te ccaawsaah kho lan a kum phe alue vae zemah ccaaw kha a saah.
Tukeiccuze achihpaw hawte athua vae paw lukheitpaw kyate vaawlui e awsi`ae hawte alungpaw, te rili kin um paw riatae leipaw laesia hawte ccaaw patae a pui`ae.

Hynh-e ccungccaw`ae balyn tuh byakinpyakupaw kha ccou leite zynnaw hoite phe chih`ae. Thuasalama asawpi te kha-e kha muihlang`ae zah a cciadue`ae, te minmin tuh laephi vawlan mikhia`ae te khuaccung`ae paw nynh kae thua cipaw ccaerarihlan a nyku`ae.
Pawccecize kha-e uccaw kong a ho`ae paw nynh minmin tuh mimaw ram nynh a ccung`ae cite ccaerarihlan a ho`ae.
Te a poutaw`ae paw ram kha minmin nynh palei a tuathui ccaccing`ae lanze, tuh-e kalan bua kithui lan ccyhhoypaw phe a hoi cih`ae paw.

Thuasalama minmin nynh ahoy huapaw ram, tuh-e tuh vaawran, kha nynh mih pe a ki. Tukeiccuze Pachia tuh mih Pachia cite koku lanpaw kha a maethah khyh. Pawccecize minmin hanlan khuapi kha Pachia nynh phe a paccynpya vae`ae.
Abraham tuh syntaw he athua lyakhe, zynnaw liate Isaak kha silawku nawlan a pya; te byakinpyakupaw a muetupaw nynh a hoithypaw a ccapaw kha phe a pya.
Amaw kong lante asekuh te, “Isaak kya nynh na ciihan tuh minphu athua cih,” cite hopya athua.
Pachia tuh achihpaw heize a thosathui kho cite aning nynh varyn a zyn; aning nynh muihsanaw lante a chih`ae paw kyate Isaak kha mah a mue.
Isaak nynh yn thua vae cih paw uccaw`ae kong lante Jakob te Esau kha zynnaw liate hythua a pya`ae.
Jakob nynh a chidyn khe Josef ccaaw`ae kha zynnaw liate ccarou hythua a pya`ae, te a hoitang dung kyakhe phang ngeikute Pachia kha a beik.
Josef nynh chi lan he cih tuh Israel ccaaw`ae nynh a pou lan`ae paw kong kha zynnaw liate hosya zah amaw a ru`ae konglang te bya a tawsya`ae.
Mawsi he a pui tuh apuithyapaw imua nynh thua cipaw kha a muih`ae keiccuze zynnaw liate siapharan awda kha ri vae leite a nung te a paaw nynh Mawsi kha zynnaw liate sawpaw sathung a thuru`ae.
Mawsi nynh piccang he thua tuh Faro ccanung a ccapaw cite koku lanpaw kha zynnaw liate phe a ei.
Seinaw kya-e lungrythuanaw kha sosoh hoysah lanpaw laeze Pachia ccungccaw`ae ryte vawsawnaw teing lanpaw kha a poku paleih.
Izip ram kya-e sisua`ae laeze Kri keiccuze saryakunaw tuh asung huapaw hoirungnaw nynh thua cite a tuaku. Pawccecize nyalang mue lanpaw ryalaw mee kha nynh a tua.
