Siapharan thinrianaw kha ri leite Izip ram kha zynnaw liate a cciataw. Pawccecize muih kho leipaw Pachia kha a muih paw hawte aning tuh phang a ngaesang.
Ccatawccaaw`ae a rohtupaw nynh Israel ccatawccaaw`ae kha a tung khyh nawlan, Mawsi nynh Kawtaw Poi te chii theipaw kha zynnaw liate a rae.
Israel`ae nynh laerou kya ccia hawte zynnaw liate Rili Se kha po a zuaa`ae. Kha-e kha Izip`ae nynh he a zuaabua`ae tuh tui nynh pung a vu`ae.
Jeriko khua lungruapi kha nin sari a voilu`ae koute, zynnaw liate lungruapi tuh pung ating.
Ohhuanung Rahab tuh dophitu`ae kha ahoyte innccung a thuasah`ae keiccuze zynnaw liate aning tuh kawngae lei`ae paw ryte chihbua khyh.
Tuhlaelan pawmou ka ho ung cih? Gideon kong, Barak kong, Samson kong, Jefthah kong, David kong, Samuel te profeh`ae kong ho lan ccyh ka zaw lan khyh.
Tuh-e`ae tuh peenaw`ae kha zynnaw liate a tae`ae, dingnaw rya kha a law`ae, byakinpyakupaw a mue`ae, chindeih`ae khalang kha a myhsah`ae,

maee thungnaw kha a the`ae, thaloi haw kyate a lue`ae, thawzyanaw kyate a thawsaepaw lang rae athua`ae, rhawdounaw kya a rawthungpaw lang a tang`ae, ramccangpaw rhawkaw`ae a ccuesah`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Nopi`ae nynh mih michi`ae kha hiinnaw kalan bua thosahnaw te a mue`ae, te mingccang`ae tuh ahoy huapaw thothuinaw kha mue khylan minmin nynh luesanaw kha lawku leite tuasahnaw kha a teing`ae.
Te mingccang`ae tuh saryanaw te ziabuakunaw kha a teing`ae, athua, sivarui te khii`ae zah thungsaw`ae.

Lung te a deih`ae, thing-aw te phaebua`ae, a syntaw`ae, thaloi te a chia`ae, tuuphua te miaphua kha kikuh`ae zah a khiakuh`ae; boeining leite ae van ae leite a um`ae, vawsaw a teing`ae, ming`ae nynh a tua-a sah`ae;
laephipi tuh minmin te ngaekuh khyh. Minmin tuh rangkaw kya, mua`ae kya a la khiakuh`ae, lungkarung te laekarung`ae kya a la um`ae.
Te minmin balyn tuh zynnaw liate thehoynaw a ccou`ae zemah byakinpyakupaw kha mue khyh`ae.
Minmin tuh aening leite ccingsah athua khyh nawlan`ae Pachia nynh ahoy huapaw uccaw kha aening hanlan phe oun paccynpya vae.

Tukeiccu aening mah ccaekia athua paw maeking pi nynh phang oun koihlu keiccuze, zoikadeih lang kaang oun kaesah paw seinaw te phupaw miakaw kha ccanglang dae nung oh sih lah aening malang a um paw ccuetaekunaw kyakhe lungsaenaw te ccue oh sih.

Aening zynnaw athotu te ccingsatupaw Jesu kha rirido te ccue oh sih. Aning tuh maethyanaw kha pawlangria leite amaw malang nungpya athua paw lungtuanaw hanlan vaelantung kha phang ngaesang zah Pachia kya-e suitungkhung ranglang khe a dahung vae.
Pawccecize nanning nae hiinnawmuisaw`ae kya nae thawthang khyh nawlan te nae lungthawzya khyh nawlan misei`ae kya-e khahtahawpaw rawsenaw a ngaesangtupaw amaw kha la tuatua oh.
Nanning nynh seinaw dounaw kya chii phe lua lan ciate na dou loh khyh oh.
Te ccaaw`ae kya hopya hawte nanning hopya paw hynaw bya kha phe na ning vae oh. Tuh-e bya tuh: “Ka ccapaw, BAWIPAW thuiheinaw kha pawlangria leite um nan, amaw nynh ae pe vae ze na lungthang nan sah.
Pawccecize BAWIPAW nynh a sungsahpaw kha a thuihei, te aning nynh lehkhan paw ccaaw miakaw kha a zia a bua,” acikuh.
Thuiheinaw kha nanning nynh na ngaesang oh lanze, Pachia nynh nanning kha ccaaw`ae hawte ae ccuepe oh. Pawccecize paaw nynh a thuihei leipaw ccaaw um zaw?
Thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw nynh a mue`ae paw thuiheinaw kha nanning nynh na muebua khyh oh ze, nanning tuh ccaaw ccaccing na thua khyh oh, ccalah nynh na thua oh.
Tuhlaeze aening yn thuihei paw pynsaw lante paaw`ae ah hoi oh, te minmin kha saw ah tua oh; muisaw`ae Paaw kaw te tuhlae houh umte ah hiin lan khyh oh tou?

Pawccecize tuh-e paaw`ae nynh mimaw nynh ahoy cite a tua`ae thyhte sosoh nynh yn thuihei`ae. Thuasalama Pachia nynh tuh amaw kya-e thyaararihnaw kha a neethungkuh bua`ae paw ah thua nawlan oh, aening thanenaw hanlan nynh yn thuihei.

Te thuiheinaw miakaw teing lya tuh lungpaw lan a um paw lo khyh, thuasalama ngaethya lan um paw nynh thua; tuhzemah thuiheinaw te kia athua`ae paw hanlan, kha-e nynh nyalang tuh daenaw te asekuhpaw dingnaw thae kha a thuakhaepya`ae.
Tukeiccuze balae ting paw kuih`ae te a thawzyapaw ccukharu`ae kha thawsaesah oh.
Te ccukhoupaw ccu akhahku khyh nawlan, dansah athua paleih nawlan, nae ccu hanlan laanpi kha dingsah oh.
Ccungccaw balyn ryte ccawkute um paw te thyaanaw kha deesui oh; thyaanaw leite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah Bawipaw kha muih lan khyh.

Pachia thawccinaw kha hung ccungccaw nynh san mue leite a um khyh nawlan, tukhyhlanze akhahpaw kyate yn pou paw tharui nynh nanning kha vawsaw ae pya khyh nawlan oh, te kha-e liate ccungccaw patae tuh nungsisaku athua cih`ae.
A ohhuakuhpaw a um khyh nawlan, tukhyhze a ccatawccaawthuanaw kha aepaw kawkheit lang phe a zuakuhpaw, Esau hawte Pachia pawlangria leipaw na thua khyh nawlan oh raeringkute ngawdo oh.
Pawccecize Esau nynh nyalang te hythuanaw kha rhoccou ry zah mitphi te thawmawte a ccung zemah ngaesiku nawlan a muihku vae khyh keiccuze aning tuh nue athua vae cipaw kha na ny oh.
Pawccecize nanning nynh kuih te tung kho um paw te maee nynh a u paw mua kalan, te maeking amanpaw kalan, mohnaw, khise,
mungkae roiccaepaw, bya roi a umnaw kalan khe na thua khyh oh; ou tuhte kha-e roi a thae`ae paw nynh bya kha mih kalan bua hopya athua vae khyh nawlan a ngia`ae.
Pawccecize, “Saring nynh heize kha-e mua kha a tung lanze lung te deih athua cih, tukhyhze thee te kaw athua cih,” cite kawpyapaw kha minmin nynh ngaesang kho khyh`ae.
Te tuh-e muih paw tuh myarya ri lan um paw thua zah Mawsi nynh, “Myaryasangkae ka rih zah ka thyngkuh,” a ci.
Thuasalama nanning tuh Zion Mua kalan, a hiinpaw Pachia khualipi athua paw vaw Jerusalem kalan, riatae lei vaaw ccungccaw`ae phu kalan,

vaawran kya min zei athua paw ccatawccaaw kya-e kriccawbu te lungtua lan um paw pumkunaw kalan, ccungccaw balyn Byapiatupaw Pachia kalan, phe ccing lang rae athua paw adingpaw ccungccaw muisaw`ae kalan,
te byakin thaw kya-e Daenaw Raetu Jesu kalan, te Abel kya-e laeze ahoy huapaw uccaw`ae kong a hopaw theipaw chii kalan nynh na thua oh.

A hotupaw kha nanning nynh na ei khyh nawlan oh raeringkuh oh. Pawccecize laephi vawlan a hotupaw kha a ei`ae paw minmin tuh detahnaw kha a lue khyh lan`ae ze, vaawran kyate a hotupaw kyate ah maeleihku oh lanze pawtemou ah lue kho cih oh.
Tuh ccyh lya amaw roi nynh laephi kha a hysah; thuasalama atu aning nynh, “Tuhzemah laephi kyalya thua vae leite, vaawran kha mah vaekheit bua ka hy ung cih,” cite byakinkute a ho.
Te hynh-e, “Tuhzemah vaekheit bua,” cipaw nynh a langsakupaw tuh hy kho a um leipaw uccaw`ae tuh po a um nawlan, ahy khopaw uccaw`ae, tuh-e tuh rae paw uccaw`ae nuenawpaw kha nynh thua.
Tukeiccuze ahy kho leipaw peenaw kha a ccou oh keiccu tuh, sawtuanaw te rawrinaw ryte douccah lante Pachia kha rya ah lawpya nawlan oh thawccinaw kha hoi oh sih.
Pawccecize aening ah Pachia tuh aruapaw maee nynh thua.
Uteno sungsakunaw kha po tynsah oh.
Mikhia`ae dooihpaw kha la ning nan oh. Pawccecize khate mikhia dooihnaw te abang nynh vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha tua lei pite innccung a la thuasah`ae.
Minmin ryte thungccahkheih`ae paw hawte naemaw kha tuakuh oh lah thungccah`ae paw kha la ning nan oh. Naemaw mah pyn kya na um oh paw athua hawte, vawsawnaw a teing`ae paw kha la ning nan oh.

Ccungccaw balyn laku zu te vaw tangnaw tuh pawpaw balyn kya sawtua lan um paw nynh thua, te anungsikuh leipaw ikhung mah sawtua lan um paw nynh thua; thuasalama a ohhuakuh`ae paw te milae zu, milae vawpaw ry asei`ae paw tuh Pachia nynh byapia cih`ae.
Nae hiinzia tuh phua duanaw a hoi leipaw thua sah, na hoi oh paw uccaw`ae khate nae lungryachih sah. Pawccecize amaw nynh, “Nang kha kae cciataw boi lan khyh zah kae vua boi lan khyh,” a ci.
Tukeiccu, “BAWIPAW tuh kamaw yn bawngtu thua zah ka rih vae lan khyh. Ccungccaw nynh kamaw kya pawmou a cyihkho cih?” cite aening nynh raw hoite ah ho kho vae cih oh.
Nae kya Pachia bya ae hopah oh paw, nanning ae uk oh paw kha la ning nan oh. Mih hiinzia nynh a poukhae paw kha tuabiate, mih zynnaw kha zui oh.
Jesu Kri tuh inkhawnin, atunin, te zungzae cia lae khyh.

Ccangpyakunaw aphuinphuin te alokuh leipaw ccangpyakunaw`ae nynh ae la cciakhaesei nan oh sah. Pawccecize aepaw te thua leite, thawccinaw liate thinlung thawsaesah paw tuh ahoypaw nynh thua. Aepaw kyalya phang a tua`ae paw tuh kha-e aepaw nynh thanesah khyh`ae.
Silawhang kha aening ah hoi oh. Tuh-e kya tuh beikbuu ryalawpatu`ae nynh aenaw kaw hoi khyh`ae.
Pawccecize seinaw hanlan ranpibawi lupi nynh athyaapaw hmin lungkhu lang mih chii a teekhae paw, saring pyn`ae kha ryabuu atolang khe maee te a rua`ae.
Tukeiccuze Jesu mah amaw a chii te ccungccaw`ae kha thyaasah khylan koikua atolang khe a teing.
Tukeiccuze aening nynh amaw kya-e saryanaw kha phubiate ryabuu atolang amaw kalan khe cceih oh sih.
Pawccecize e kya aening tuh po atynpaw khualipi ah hoi khyh oh, thuasalama yn thua vae cih paw khualipi kha nynh ah ccung oh.
Tukeiccu amaw min kya lungtuabya hote, ah khalang`ae thae athua paw, thehoysanawpaw silawkunaw kha amaw liate Pachia kalan pei pya oh sih.
Thuasalama ahoypaw cyi lanpaw te neethungbua lanpaw kha la ning nan oh. Pawccecize khahtahawpaw silawnaw`ae kya Pachia tuh a lungry kou thua.

Nanning ae uktu oh paw kaw kha ngae oh lah naemaw kha minmin kalan la pyakuh oh. Pawccecize minmin tuh mimaw konglang a phykuh cih`ae paw hawte, nae hiinnawmuisaw ae ringpah oh paw nynh thua. Ngaethyanaw te thua leite lungtuanaw te kha-e kha cyih`ae sah. Pawccecize tuhte ngaethyanaw te cyi paw tuh nae hanlan athane leipaw nynh thua.
Kaening hanlan saw yn sangpah oh. Kaening tuh mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung ahoypaw kae hoi zah pawpaw kya balyn kou hoy lante hiin lan kae ry cipaw kha kae nyku ccaccing.
Thuasalama kae tuh nae kalan taloi bua kae thua nawlan, hynh-e hanlan abapilante saw oun sangpah oh cite kae ngia oh.
Atu zungzae atynpaw byakin kya-e chii liate, tuu`ae kya-e alesaepaw Tuuringtu, ah Bawipaw Jesu kha a chih`ae paw kyate bua a thuakhaetupaw, daenaw Pachia nynh,

amaw malang a lungrythua paw rya kha Jesu Kri liate nae kya lawte, amaw rynaw kha cyi khylan ahoypaw ryalaw miakaw kya nanning kha ae ccingsah vae oh sah. Amaw Jesu Kri kya zungzae te zungzae cia phu-enaw um sah. Amen.
Te uteno`ae hynawpaw bya hynh la ngaesang oh cite kae ngia oh; pawccecize nae kalan ccaky tuh pyhtari te nynh ka zei.
Ah unopaw Timote kha phe a luesah vae`ae cipaw kha la nyh oh. Aning nynh aro maw yn thua lanze amaw ryte nanning kha kae muih cih oh.
Nanning ae uktu oh paw balyn te mithyaa`ae balyn kha la beihlang oh. Itali ram kya a um`ae paw nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh.
Nanning balyn kya thawccinaw la um sah. Amen.
Pachia te Bawipaw Jesu Kri seepaw kae James nynh pung pazaekuh lang a phiakuh`ae paw Israel phin haw laening kha kae beihlang oh.
Ka uteno`ae, nae zynnaw kya-e syntawnaw nynh lungsaenaw kha a poukhae cipaw kha nyte, syntawnaw`ae aphuinphuin lungkhu lang he na phungku vae oh ze, kha-e kha marya lungtuanaw lang la ria oh.
Thuasalama nanning nynh pawsang hobounaw um leite khaleih phe na ccing nawlan oh, lungsaenaw nynh amaw kya-e accingpaw ryalaw kha hoi sah.
Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh hawnaw abou lanze, seibe leipaw, ccungccaw balyn kha hysate a pyatupaw Pachia kha aning nynh ngiakuh sah, te kha-e kha amaw kalan pya athua cih.
Thuasalama lunghiinnaw hoi leite, zynnaw te ngiakuh sah. Pawccecize lunghiinnaw a hoi paw tuh khivae nynh mung zah athekuhpaw rili kya-e tuileih te nynh aloku.
Pawccecize tuhte a um paw tuh-e ccungccapaw nynh tuh Bawipaw kyate ccangkhakheit ka mue cih cite tuakuh nan sah.
Tuanawthinlung apheipaw ccungccaw tuh a ccianaw balyn kya atyn leipaw nynh thua.
Zakawsang paw uno nynh tuh amaw hangthung athuanaw kyakhe lungtua sah.
Thuasalama mihoipaw nynh tuh amaw sawbungnaw kyakhe lungtua sah. Pawccemacize loo kya-e haetapaw hawte aning tuh azo cih.
Pawccecize khuanin nynh asopaw ryte ccahe apaw tuh kha-e nynh lonua kha naansah zah kha-e apaw tuh akhuakuh, te apuithyapaw a muinsan tuh azo; tuhhawte mihoipaw mah a ccianaw kya aroh cih.

Tuh-ounaw kha a ngaesang paw ccungccaw tuh hythuaccoupaw nynh thua; pawccecize aning tuh syntaw he athua koute, Bawipaw nynh amaw a sungsah`ae paw elan byakinpyakupaw hiinnaw suilukhung kha a mue cih.

Tuh-ounaw kha a tung vae ze, “Pachia nynh kae tuh yn tuhou,” cite hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ho nan sah; pawccecize Pachia tuh ahoy leipaw liate tuhou kho thua lan khyh, amaw nynh mah hung ccungccaw sanmah tuh-ou boi khyh.
Thuasalama ccungccaw miakaw tuh amaw ryduanaw nynh soih zah he a sue vae ze, aning tuh ling athua vae.
Oute ryduanaw nynh ccaaw he a poi tuh kha-e nynh seinaw kha a saah. Te seinaw nynh he ale tuh chinaw kha a thuakhae.
Ka sungsahpaw uteno`ae, va lingsakuh nan oh.
Ahoypaw lasung miakaw te accingpaw lasung miakaw tuh a luki langte, te awnaw`ae Paaw kyate nynh oun thua`ae. Amaw kya tuh rulaekunaw um khyh zah paleihkunaw mynlyh cipaw um boi khyh.
Aening tuh amaw nynh a rae`ae paw balyn kyaze masaty a thae`ae phin ah thua nawlan oh, amaw a rynaw thyhte byaccing kya-e bya khate aening kha oun saah.
Tukeiccu ka sungsahpaw uteno`ae, ccungccaw miakaw tuh nawthae lan a khyrang sah, bya ho lan a khysung sah, thinria lan a khysung sah;
pawccecize ccungccaw thinrianaw nynh Pachia kya-e dingnaw kha poukhae khyh.
Tukeiccu nungsikunaw balynte paepaeluipaw hoyleinaw kha dae nue oh lah, nae hiinnawmuisaw` ae a khum khopaw, bing athua paw Pachia bya kha lungnenaw te lawkuh oh.
Naemaw te naemaw kha lingku te, bya a thaetu`ae kyalya thua nan oh, thuasalama a cyihtu`ae la thua oh.
Pawccecize lukhakheit tuh bya thaetu thua zah a cyihtu athua khyh ze, aning tuh a puikhaepaw a mae kha muinsado kya a dokuh paw ccungccapaw te nynh aloku.
Pawccecize aning nynh amaw te amaw kha dokuh zah po a cceih, te aning tuh pawtecihpaw ccungccaw nynh thua cipaw kha phe a ning kanmaw.

Thuasalama luenaw kya-e accingpaw kawbya lungkhu lang do zah kha-e kya po atynpaw ccungccaw tuh, a ningthyapaw thaetu thua khyh, thuasalama ryalaw a lahtu nynh thua, tuh-e ccungccapaw tuh a cyipaw kya hythuaccoupaw athua cih.
Nanning laku lukhakheit nynh beiknaw lante a zuakuhpaw cite tuakuh zah a lae kha a kia khyh lanze, aning tuh amaw a thinlung a lingkuh paw nynh thua. Tuh-e paw beiknaw tuh accakaepaw nynh thua.
Paaw Pachia malang accikuhpaw te anungsikuh leipaw beiknaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: Ngawraw`ae te numae`ae mih vawsawnaw kya paebua paw te amaw kha laephipi kyate kalouhku leite um paw kha nynh thua.
Ka uteno`ae, phu-enaw Bawipaw athua paw, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri zynnaw kya ccungccaw laesahnaw la hoi nan oh.
Nanning na pumkunaw oh lungkhu lang ccungccaw lukheit nynh sui kuihpu te apuithyapaw uccaw lawkute yn teebua ze, te a ryachipaw mah anyaapaw uccaw lawkute yn teebua ze,

apuithyapaw uccaw te yn ccaankuh paw kha nanning nynh saw na tua oh zah, “E ahoypaw hmin kyahin dahung,” na cipah oh zah a ryachipaw kha, “Khuhlang khuin la thadyn,” tukhyhze, “Ka ccu nungnaw kyahin yn dahung,” na cipya oh lanze,
naemaw te naemaw laku ccungccaw laesanaw na hoi khyh oh tou? Te nanning tuh athahpaw tuanaw`ae ryte byapiatu`ae khaw na thua oh?

Ka sungsahpaw uteno`ae la ngaetua oh; hynh-e laephipi kya-e ryachi`ae kha zynnaw kya a hoirung nawlan`ae, te amaw a sungsah`ae paw hanlan byakinpyaku vae paw, peenaw rhoccoutu`ae lang Pachia nynh po khyh`ae tou?
Thuasalama nanning nynh ryachi`ae kha pawlangria leite na um oh. A hoirung`ae paw nynh nanning kha ae tua ae sah khyh oh zah byapianaw zung malang nanning kha ae sue khyh oh tou?
Nanning ae konaw oh paw, aphutepaw min kha minmin nynh thethya ho khyh`ae tou?
“Na innpaw kha namaw te namaw hawkhate na sungsah cih,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa thyhte alesaepaw kawbya kha na ccingsah oh ccaccing ze, kou hoy lan na cyih oh paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama maedonaw kha na hoi oh lanze, nanning tuh a sei`ae paw nynh na thua oh. Kawbya a lue`ae paw hawte kawbya nynh a sei cite a nysaku`ae paw nynh na thua oh.
Pawccecize hunghung zemah Kawbya khaleih kha zui salamah ccangkheit kya a thyku lanze, aning tuh kawbya marya a cyihseipaw nynh thua.

Pawccecize, “Milae zu seikhae nan,” cite a hotupaw nynh, “Ccungccaw theih nan,” cite mah a hobia. Atu nang tuh milae zu na seikhae khyh zemah ccungccaw na chia lanze, nang tuh kawbya zui leipaw nynh na thua.
Luenaw kya-e kawbya liate byapia athua vae cih`ae paw hawkhate, nanning mah bya ho oh lah tuhte cyih oh.
Pawccecize ngaethya-umsanaw a langsakuh leipaw ccungccaw tuh ngaethyaumsanaw leite byapianaw kha a mue cih. Ngaethya-umsanaw nynh byapianaw kha phe a tae.
Ka uteno`ae, ccungccaw lukheit nynh zynnaw ka hoi a ci zemah cyisahnaw`ae a hoi khyh ze pawmou athane? Kha-e zynnaw nynh amaw kha a khum kho cih tou?
Uno lukheit tukhyhze ccianung lukheit tuh uccaw leite um zah nin takyh aepaw kha hoi leite a um lanze,

te nanning kyaze lukheit nynh minmin kha, “Daebabilan la cceih oh, nae khua la lungsah lah nae vue la so sah,” a cipya`ae, tuhzemah pyn hanlan ahopaw kha-e uccaw`ae kha na pya khyh oh ze, pawmou athane?
Tuhhawte zynnaw mah cyisahnaw um leite, a makhaete tuh achihpaw nynh thua.

Athua, ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Nang tuh zynnaw na hoi, te kae tuh cyisahnaw`ae ka hoi, na cyisahnaw um leite na zynnaw kha yn langsapya tua, te kae tuh ka zynnaw kha ka cyisahnaw`ae liate kae langsapah cih,” a ci ze a ci ngaw.
Nang nynh Pachia ccangkheit nynh a um cite na zyn, kou ahoy. Raerangsaro`ae nynh mah zyn`ae zah a thyngkuh`ae.
Thuasalama, pou mingaeepaw, cyisahnaw`ae um leite zynnaw tuh a chih cipaw hynh na nyhry tou?
Ah minpaaw Abraham nynh silawhang vawlan a ccapaw Isaak kha silawnaw lang he a pya tuh, cyisahnaw`ae liate aning tuh thyaaccou khyh tou?
A zynnaw tuh a cyisahnaw`ae ryte pawcihte nynh ryalaw cipaw te cyisahnaw`ae liate nynh zynnaw tuh accingpaw lang rae athua cipaw kha na muih ta?
“Abraham nynh Pachia kha zyn zah kha-e kha a hanlan dingnaw lang riapya athua,” acikuh paw Ccathyaa tuh phe accing. Te aning tuh Pachia banpaw cite ko athua.
Oute ccungccaw tuh zynnaw kyalya liate thua leite, cyisahnaw`ae liate nynh thyaaccou a thua cipaw kha nanning nynh na muih oh.
Tuhhawte ohhuanung Rahab kha mah, zeccuetu`ae kha innccung ua`ae zah minmin kha ccangpaw ccianaw kalan phe a saw`ae tuh, cyisahnaw`ae liate aning tuh thyaaccou thua khyh tou?
Pawccecize muisaw um leite pyn tuh a chih, tuhhawte cyisahnaw`ae um leite zynnaw mah achihpaw nynh thua.
Ka uteno`ae, aening tuh aru huapaw byapianaw kha ah mue cih oh cipaw kha nybiate ccangpatu`ae patae la thua nan oh.
Pawccecize aening balyn tuh uccaw patae kya ah thypawkuh oh. Lukhakheit nynh bya kya a sei khyh ze, tuh-e paw tuh accingpaw ccungccaw nynh thua. Aning tuh a pyn khaleih kha a taekuh khopaw nynh thua.
Dotua oh, marang`ae nynh aening kaw a ngae ccaw`ae cite mih mung kya rangtei kha ah teisah oh, te mih pyn khaleih kha ah mae kho oh.
Sanphalung`ae kha mah dotua oh: kha-e`ae tuh myarya le`ae zah khivae arupaw rou nynh a mung kho zemah a mungtupaw nynh ditaripaw maenawpaw khate a rynaw langkhe phe a mae.
Tuhhawte lae tuh pyn kya-e ditaripaw athua zemah myarya a pookuh thya. Maee-ia taraw nynh pawcih alepaw lorang mah a u kho cipaw kha dotua oh!

Te lae tuh maee nynh thua. Seimenaw laephipi nynh thua. Tuhhawte nynh lae tuh ah pyn kya-e`ae laku athua, pyn khaleih kha a nungsisaku; te aphungpaw ccianaw kha maee vawlan khe a nung; te kha-e kha hell maee vawlan nung athua.
Pawccecize rangsaw`ae phin miakaw, pavaw`ae phin, vue te a vaw`ae paw phin, rili kya um paw ngasaw`ae phin kha ngaesah kho thua zah ccungccaw`ae nynh phe a la ngaesah`ae.
Thuasalama lae tuh hung ccungccaw nynh sanmah ngaesah kho khyh, uk kho leipaw athahpaw uccaw nynh thua, a chisah khopaw asy te nynh phe abia.
Tuh-e lae te ah Paaw Pachia kha hythua ah pya oh; te tuh-e te Pachia alo lante rae athua paw ccungccaw`ae kha thya ah law oh.
Khalang sang kheit kyate hythuanaw te thyalawnaw kha yn pou. Ka uno`ae, tuh-e`ae tuh tuhte cyiku lan ccan khyh.
Tuidy ccangkheit nynh tuinaw sang kheit kyate tui epaw te tui khahpaw kha pousah ta?
Ka uteno`ae, thaeku ku nynh oliv thae`ae kha thae kho ngaw ta? Misu ku nynh so thaeku thae kha thae kho ngaw ta? Tuhhawte tuinaw sangkheit nynh loi tuipaw te tui thuapaw kha paryh pousah khyh.
Nanning laku a lunghawpaw te a thaethyapaw ccungccaw tuh hungmou? Aning nynh hawnaw kya-e lungnenaw te ahoypaw ozia khate a ryalaw`ae kha langsakuh sah.
Thuasalama nae thinlung kya akhahpaw eiungnaw te peku maekunaw na hoi oh lanze, pookuh nan oh lah byaccing kha rawsete hyng nan oh.
Tuh-e hawnaw tuh luki langte yn thua paw thua khyh, thuasalama laephi hawnaw, pynsaw te asekuhpaw hawnaw te raerangsaro hawnaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize eiungnaw te peku maekunaw a umnaw tuh keisukeilae umnaw te athahpaw ryalaw`ae miakaw nynh a um.
Thuasalama luki lang-e hawnaw tuh masaty accikuh, oute ccawkunaw a umsah, nevyalya, soih lan a zoi, ngaethya-umsanaw te phe beih zah ahoypaw athae te phe beih, laesanaw um khyh zah cyiruhnaw um khyh.
Te ccawkunaw a rae`ae paw nynh dingnaw thae kha daenaw te ccaciivua`ae.
Nanning laku rhawtukkunaw`ae te peku maekunaw`ae tuh paw kyate mou oun thua`ae? Nae pyn kya-e`ae kya rhawtukkuh`ae paw naemaw ryduanaw`ae kyate oun thua khyh`ae tou?
Na ry na dua oh zah na hoi khyh oh. Na dua oh zah ccungccaw na chia oh, te na mue kho khyh oh. Na puihkuh oh zah rhaw na tukkuh oh. Tuhzemah na mue khyh oh; pawccemacize na ngia khyh oh.
Nanning nynh na ngia oh zemah na mue khyh oh; pawccemacize naemaw hoysanaw`ae hanlan karyh mang khylan phe na ngiakusei oh keiccu nynh thua.

Milae zu seikhaetu`ae te milae vawpaw seikhaetu`ae! Laephipi te vaeccawkunaw tuh Pachia ryte rhawkunaw nynh thua cipaw kha na nyh khyh oh tou? Tukeiccu hunghung zemah laephipi ruiban lang a tangry paw tuh Pachia rhawpaw lang a raekuh paw nynh thua.
“Aening kya a um paw Muisaw tuh ccunging lan ciate myarya a ry,” cite Ccathyaa nynh a hopaw hynh accakaepaw nynh thua cite tou na tua oh?
Thuasalama aning nynh thawccinaw kha houh lung a pya. Tukeiccu aning nynh, “Pachia tuh a pookuh`ae paw kha a rawse, thuasalama zakawsangsakuh`ae paw kha thaw a cci,” a ci.
Tukeiccu nanning Pachia kalan pyakuh oh. Diabolos kha rawse oh lah aning tuh nae kyate ae ccuetaw cih oh.
Pachia kalan naekuh oh lah aning mah nae kalan a naekuh cih. Misei`ae nae kuih kha ccikan oh, lungphei`ae paw nae thinlung kha thyaasah oh.
Ngaethah oh, khui oh lah rah oh. Nae nuinthuanaw tuh rawkhuinaw lang tang sah lah nae lungtuanaw tuh ngaethyanaw lang tang sah.
Bawipaw malang naemaw te naemaw zakawsangsakuh oh, lah aning nynh ae hangthung cih oh.

Uteno`ae, lukheit te lukheit thethya hokuh nan oh. A uno kha thethya ho zah a uno byapia paw ccungccaw tuh kawbya kha thethya ho zah kawbya byapiatu nynh a thua. Thuasalama nang nynh kawbya kha bya na pia lanze, nang tuh kawbya kawngaepaw na thua khyh, byapiatu nynh na thua.
A khum khopaw te a roh khopaw, Kawbya pyatu lukheit rou nynh a um. Mingccangpaw kha byapiatupaw nang tuh hungmou na thua? Awkhualan hanlan Pookuh nan

“Atunin, tukhyhze awkhualan tuhtahawpaw khuapi lungkhu lang ah cceih cih oh zah tuin kya kum kheit ah um ngaw oh, ah re cih oh zah ah zua cih oh, te amia mue lan,” cite a ho`ae paw nanning, atu ngaetua oh!
Tuhte na ho oh paw kya, awkhualan pawmou yn cyihkuh cih cipaw na nyh khyh oh. Pawccecize nae hiinnaw tuh pawmou athua? Nae hiinnaw tuh ccyh sosoh a langkuh koute phe avaepaw tuihu kha nynh athua.
Te, “Bawipaw nynh a ry lanze, aening ah hiin cih oh zah hynh-e khyh ze kha-e kha ah cyih cih oh,” cite nynh na ho lan oh accan.
Thuasalama atu nanning tuh na tansakunaw oh kya na pookuh oh; khahtahawpaw pookunaw balyn tuh ahoy leipaw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu ahoypaw cyi lanpaw kha nyh zah a cyih leipaw tuh a hanlan seinaw nynh thua.
Mihoi`ae, atu ngaetua oh, nae tungvaw yn thua lanpaw vawsaw riathaenaw hanlan rah oh lah rawkhui oh.
Nae hoirungnaw tuh phe aroh vae, te nae uccaw`ae tuh ari nynh phe a ae.

Nae sui te ngun tuh chihhangkae zah, kha-e chihhangkaepaw nynh nanning kha rawsete ccaekia lang a tang cih`ae zah maee hawte nae ngesaw kha a ae cih. Nyathyakou-e nin`ae hanlan nynh sisua kha na ccakhungku oh.

Ngaetua oh, nae leikua`ae kya ccatan aw`ae paw ryalahtu`ae kha ryalaw mee pya leite phe na hyngpya oh, te mih ryalaw mee nynh a sia`ae. Te loohruetu`ae siaruanaw tuh Sabaoth Bawipaw nakaring kalan phe a thua vae.
Laephi vawlan hoysanaw kya na hiin oh zah na hoysah oh. Chia nin lo nin hawkhate nae thinlung`ae kha na hoysakuh oh.
Adingpaw kha sei na be oh zah phe na chia oh; aning nynh nanning kha ae rawse ru khyh oh.
Tukeiccu uteno`ae, Bawipaw yn thua cia lungsaete la ngaw oh. Dotua oh, loophopaw nynh khuatui te hawkhua kha a mue cia, laephi kya-e aphutepaw athae apaw kha lungsaete phang a ngawdae.
Nanning mah nae lungsae sah, nae thinlung`ae kha tynsah oh; pawccecize Bawipaw yn thuanaw lanpaw tuh anae vae.
Uteno`ae, nanning byapia na thua khyh nawlan oh lukheit te lukheit ccohnuakuh nan oh; dotua oh, thuakaw malang byapiatu phang a thadyn.
Ka uteno`ae, Bawipaw min liate a ho`ae paw profeh`ae kha vawsaw teingnaw te lungsaenaw hanlan dosuinkupaw lang la lawkuh oh.

Dotua oh, a ngaesang kho`ae paw tuh hythuaccou`ae paw ah ci oh. Joba a ngaesangnaw kong kha phe na thae vae oh, te Bawipaw tuh myarya thawccihthyapaw te ngaethya-umsanaw a hoi paw nynh thua cipaw kha Bawipaw nynh a thangsahnaw kyakhe phe na muih vae oh.

Thuasalama ka uteno`ae, pawpaw balyn kya ccaesakuh nan oh, vaawran phyate mah ccaesakuh nan oh, laephi phyate mah ccaesakuh nan oh, pawpaw byakinkunaw te mah ccaesakuh nan oh. Thuasalama byapianaw lungkhu lang na phungku sei khyh nawlan oh, “Athua,” na ci oh paw kha “Athua,” ci oh lah “Thua khyh,” na ci oh paw kha “Thua khyh,” ci oh.
Nanning laku vawsaw teingpaw um tou? A um ze sawsang sah. A lungpaw paw um ta? A um ze sam law sah sah.
Nanning laku ngeccih um tou? A um ze kriccawbu kya-e pastor`ae kha ko sah lah minmin nynh Bawipaw min kya satho kha thuhpah`ae sah lah a tungvaw sawsangpah`ae sah.
Te zynnaw kya-e sawsangnaw nynh ngeccih kha a khum cih zah Bawipaw nynh kha-e paw kha a thosah cih. Seinaw kha phe a la rae ze aning tuh ngaethya athua cih.

Lukheit te lukheit na cyisei oh paw kha hopakuh oh; te nanning kha dansah na thua nawlan oh lukheit te lukheit sawsangpakuh oh. Adingpaw ccungccaw nynh thawmawte amawccih lante sawsangpaw tuh myarya a thanesah.
Elijah tuh aening hawte thuanaw alokuhpaw ccungccaw nynh thua, te aning nynh khuaraw khyh nawlan thawte sawsang; te laephi vawlan kum thung te sawpaw sataruh cia khuarah khyh.
Te aning nynh bua sawsang zah vaawran nynh khuarawsah, te laephi nynh a thae a pousah.
Uteno`ae, nanning laku lukhakheit tuh byaccing kyate phe cceihsei zah lukhakheit nynh amaw kha a paleihsaku lanze,
miseipaw kha a ccianaw menaw kyate a paleihsakuh paw ccungccaw nynh tuh chinaw kyate hiinnaw-muisaw kha a khum cih zah seinaw pataepi kha a khawpah cih cipaw kha la nyh sah.
Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu athua paw, Piter nynh Pontas, Galatia, Kapadosia, Asia, te Bithynia ram kya phiariphiarae um`ae paw khuaccung`ae paw kalan ccaw kae ky oh.
Kawngaenaw hanlan te Jesu Kri kya-e chii theinaw ccou nawlan, Muisaw kya-e thyaasanaw liate, Paaw Pachia nytynaw thyhte po`ae paw: Thawccinaw nae kya la um sah lah daenaw la pungthung sah.

Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri a Paaw tuh thehoysah thua sah. A chih`ae paw kyate Jesu Kri thothuinaw liate ahiinpaw ngaehoinaw hoi nawlan, paepaeluipaw a ngaethyaumsanaw thyhte aening kha bua oun saah vae.
Tuh-e tuh nanning hanlan vaawran kya ccypya athua paw arohthya leipaw, anungsikuh leipaw, te anaanthya leipaw rho uccaw kha mue khylan nynh thua.
Nyathyakou ccyh kya langsaku khylan paccynpaw, zynnaw liate khumnaw mue nawlan Pachia kya-e thungnaw liate nanning tuh ccy na thua oh.
Syntawnaw`ae aphuinphuin liate, aho lanze atu ccyh sosoh nae ngaethya zemah e kyahin myarya lungtua oh.

Ou tuhte thanccingpaw nae zynnaw tuh arohthyapaw sui laeze aphute huapaw athua thyhte, maee te syntaw athua zemah, Jesu Kri yn langkunaw kya amaw thehoysah nawlan, sawtua nawlan te phuesah nawlan muih athua nawlan nynh thua.
Amaw kha na muih lei oh pite na sungsah oh; atu amaw kha na muih khyh oh zemah na zyn oh; phe beihpaw phu-enaw te ho kho um leipaw lungtuanaw khate nae lungtua.
Pawccecize nae hiinnaw-muisaw khumnaw athua paw, nae zynnaw kya-e thanenaw kha na mue oh keiccu nynh thua.
Nae kalan yn thua lanpaw thawccinaw kong a la phyty`ae paw profeh`ae nynh hynh-e khumnaw kong kha la khia`ae zah thawte la ccung`ae.
Kri teingnaw, te tuh-e yn zui lanpaw phu-enaw kha minmin kya um paw Kri Muisaw nynh he a langsapaty`ae tuh pawmou a hothery, tukhyhze paw ccyh mou a hothery cipaw kha thawte a ccung`ae.

Mimaw hanlan thua leite, thuasalama nanning hanlan nynh rya ae lawpya oh cipaw tuh mih kalan phy athua, vaawran kyate saw athua paw Thyaa Muisaw liate nae kalan thehoypaw a ho`ae paw liate khae` ae kha atu nae kalan thaesah athua vae. Kha-e uccaw`ae kha vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh rirido lan a ry`ae paw nynh thua.
Tukeiccu nae tuanawthinlung kha varyn cciakuh oh, kyhrarihlan um oh lah Jesu Kri langkunaw kya nae kalan thuakhae athua cih paw thawccinaw kha athangnaw cia ngaehoi oh.
Na la ny khyh lya oh, langmaw lya-e pynsaw ryduanaw`ae muinsan kha la ke nan vae oh, kawngaepaw ccaaw`ae hawkhate um ccavae oh.
Thuasalama nanning ae ko oh paw tuh athyaa thyhhawte, nae umtu ziazae balyn kya nanning mah thyaa oh.
Pawkeiccumacize, “Kae tuh ka thyaa keiccu, nanning mah thyaa oh,” cite azeikuh.
Ccungccaw`ae laesahnaw um leite, ccungccaw miakaw a ryalaw thyhte byapia paw, Paaw kha na ko na ngiaku oh ze, e kya na um lungkhu oh balyn amaw rawrinaw te la um oh.
Nae minpaaw`ae kyate na mue oh paw accakaepaw nae hiinnawzia kyate, phua te sui tahawpaw arohthyapaw uccaw`ae khate nanning tuh sawkhaw na thua khyh oh,
thuasalama ccaenaw um leipaw, athupaw um leipaw, tuutaw hawte athua paw, Kri kya-e aphutepaw chii te nynh sawkhaw na thua oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
Tuh-e Kri tuh laephipi atho mawze laerui-awde ty vae paw ccaccing nynh a la thua, thuasalama hynh-e nyathyakou ccyh`ae kyahin nanning hanlan yn langkuh.
Nae zynnaw te ngaehoinaw tuh Pachia kya athua nawlan, amaw kha a chih`ae paw kyate thosah zah phu-enaw a pyatupaw Pachia kha Kri liate na zyn oh.
Muisaw liate byaccing kawngaenaw kya nae hiinnawmuisaw` ae kha phe na ccikanku vae oh thyhte, uteno`ae thanccingte sungsanaw kya, athyaapaw thinlung khate lukheit te lukheit thawmawte sungsakuh oh.
Pawccecize arohthyapaw ccacii te thua leite, arohthya leipaw, ahiinpaw te zungzae atynpaw Pachia bya liate nynh na puithui oh.
Pawccecize, “Ccungccaw balyn tuh lonua hawte nynh thua. Te ccungccaw phu-enaw balyn tuh lonuapaw hawte nynh thua. Lonua tuh anaan, te kha-e apaw tuh akhuakuh.
Thuasalama BAWIPAW bya tuh zungzae atyn.” Te tuh-e tuh thehoypaw liate nanning kalan hopya paw bya kha nynh thua.
Tukeiccu ahoy leipaw balyn, hyngpyakunaw balyn, thyaruhnaw, eiungnaw, te thanhokunawpaw`ae balyn kha ccaring vuate;
apuithawpaw imua`ae hawte, Pachia bya accipaw samatei kha peki oh; ou tuhte kha-e liate nanning nynh na lethung nawlan oh,
Bawipaw tuh thawccithyapaw nynh athua cipaw kha phe na tangtua vae oh ccaccing lanze, peki oh.
Ccungccaw`ae nynh a nue`ae paw, thuasalama Pachia nynh a popaw, aphutepaw, ahiinpaw lung athua paw amaw kalan nae thua oh hawte,

nanning kha mah ahiinpaw lung`ae hawte muisaw lante sak paw inn nynh na thua oh, Jesu Kri liate Pachia kalan douccahpaw, muisaw lante silawkunaw`ae kha pya khylan, athyaapaw ranpibawi nynh na thua oh.
Tukeiccu Ccathyaa kya, “Dotua oh, popaw lung, aphutepaw, abapi huapaw aki lang-e lung kha Zion kya ka nung, te amaw kha a zyn paw ccungccaw tuh maethya ccou vae lan khyh,” cite a um.
Tukeiccu a zyn paw nanning hanlan aning tuh aphutepaw nynh thua. Thuasalama a zyn lei`ae paw hanlan, “Inn saktu`ae nynh a nue`ae paw lung tuh aki lang-e abapi huapaw lung lang yn tang,”
te, “Thykupawkunaw lung, khuliakunaw lungpi,” lang yn tang. Bya kha a ngae khyh`ae keiccu nynh athyapawkuh` ae; minmin tuh kha-e hanlan khang paw nynh thua`ae.

Thuasalama nanning tuh mohnaw kyate ngaeang lan um paw amaw kya-e awnaw lungkhu lang ae kotu oh paw a hoynaw kha siakhae khylan popaw ccungccaw, bawiphin ranpibawi ciihan, athyaapaw minphuin, amaw nynh a hoi paw ccungccaw nynh na thua oh.

Langmaw lya tuh Pachia ccungccaw na la thua khyh oh, thuasalama atu tuh Pachia ccungccaw nynh na thua vae oh. Langmaw lya ngaethyaumsanaw na la ccou khyh oh, thuasalama atu tuh ngaethyaumsanaw na ccou vae oh.
Sungsah`ae paw, ramccang`ae te mikhia`ae na thua oh keiccu tuh hiinnawmuisaw rhawdou paw pynsaw ryduanaw`ae kha na sungku nawlan oh, nanning kha kae hy oh.

Zenta`ae nynh nanning kha ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae hawte thethya he ae ho vae oh ze, minmin nynh a muih`ae paw ahoypaw nae ryalaw`ae liate Pachia paebuanaw nin kya Pachia kha phu-esah nawlan`ae, Zenta`ae laku ahoypaw ozia khate la hiin oh.
Tukeiccu kawhoitu lang ccungccaw nynh a khang`ae paw miakaw kalan Bawipaw keiccuze pyakuh oh; lupi huaccepaw hawte athua paw siapharan kalan thuasah,
tukhyhze ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae kha detah khylan te ahoypaw ryalahtu`ae kha thehoysah khylan, siapharan nynh a saw paw uktu`ae kalan thuasah pyakuh oh.
Pawccecize ahoyte cyinaw liate angaeepaw ccungccaw`ae ngaeenaw kha nanning nynh zya na daesah nawlan oh, tuhte cyi paw tuh Pachia rynaw nynh thua.
A luepaw hawte hiin oh, tuhzemah na luenaw oh paw kha ahoy leipaw khawsung nawlan mang leite, Pachia ryalawpatu`ae hawte um oh.
Ccungccaw balyn kha sawtua oh. Uno na thua oh paw kha sungsah oh. Pachia kha rawrih oh. Siapharan kha sawtua oh.
Ryalawpatu`ae, rinaw khaleihte nae bawizua`ae kalan pyakuh oh. Ahoypaw te nevyalyapaw bawizua kalan kyalya thua leite, are-aruapaw bawizua kalan mah pyakuh oh.
Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit tuh Pachia nynaw keiccuze thinlungccinaw kha atazae lei lante ngaesangte teingsah athua lanze, tuh-e tuh thehoysah lan accanpaw nynh thua.

Pawccecize na cyiseinaw oh keiccu ae zia ae bua oh paw kha lungsaete na ngaesang oh zeso phu-esah lanpaw pawmou a um? Thuasalama ahoypaw rya na lah oh zah kha-e hanlan lungsaete na ngaesang oh ze, tuh-e tuh Pachia malang thehoysah lan accanpaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize tuh-e khylan nynh nanning tuh ko na thua oh. Kri nynh mah aening hanlan a teing keiccuze a ccuhnoh kha na zui ccaw oh cite aening kha dosuinku lanpaw yn cciatawpyasya:
“Aning tuh seinaw rae khyh. A khalang kya hyngbya muih lan um khyh.”
Aning tuh he a sarya vae`ae ze, bua sarya ru khyh; he a teing vae ze, aning nynh furaw khyh`ae, thuasalama hmerarihlan byapiatupaw kalan amaw kha a ahku.
Ou tuhte seinaw`ae kya a chih`ae paw aening tuh dingnaw hanlan ah hiin nawlan oh aning nynh aening seinaw`ae kha amaw a pyn kya thing vawlan yn phupya. A vaemaw`ae liate nanning tuh na dan vae oh.
Pawccecize nanning tuh laanpi phe a me paw tuu`ae hawte nynh na la thua oh; thuasalama atu tuh Tuuringtu te nae hiinnawmuisaw Dooihtu kalan phe na paleihkuh vae oh.
Tuhhawte, zu`ae nanning, nae vawpaw`ae kalan pyakuh oh. Ou tuhte vawpaw lukhakheit nynh Pachia bya kha a ngae khyh zemah, bya hopya liate thua leite zu`ae ozia liate minmin kha bua mue athua nawlan,
nae kya-e sawtuanaw te athyaapaw nae ozia kha minmin nynh he muih`ae te minmin kha bua mue athua nawlan nynh thua.
Na ccaankunaw oh paw tuh, atolang-e ccaankupaw, sangkhekupaw, sui lawkupaw, tukhyhze uccaw hoypaw lawkupaw kyalya thua leite,
thuasalama, nevyalyapaw te daebabipaw muisaw kya-e arohthya leipaw puithyanaw khate thinlung lungkhu e ccungccapaw kha la ccaan oh. Hynh-e tuh Pachia malang myarya aphutepaw nynh thua.
Pawccecize hynhcihte nynh langmaw lya Pachia doliakuh`ae paw, athyaapaw nopi`ae nynh mah mih vawpaw`ae kalan pyakute mimaw te, mimaw kha a ccaanku`ae.

Sarah nynh Abraham kawngae zah amaw kha ‘bawipaw’ cite a ko hawkhate, minmin mah kawngae`ae; nanning nynh ahoypaw kha na cyih oh zah rinaw hoi leite na um oh ze, nanning tuh Sarah ccanung`ae nynh na thua oh.

Tuhhawte vawpaw`ae nanning, nae sawsangnaw tuh akhawpaw a um khyh nawlan zu`ae tuh hiinnaw kya-e thawccinaw rhoccoutu`ae athuabua`ae thyhhawte, thawzya huapaw angphe hawkhate, zu kha sawtuanaw pyate thaekuthyanaw te pynkheihlan um oh.
Nyathyakou, lukheit te lukheit thawccikunaw hoite, nanning balyn tuanaw-thinlung lokuh oh, uteno hawte sungsakuh oh, ngaethya-umsakuh oh, tuapakuh thya oh.

Athahpaw hanlan athahpaw te liaru leite, saryanaw hanlan saryanaw te liaru leite, thuasalama hythuanaw te liaru oh. Pawccecize nanning tuh hythuanaw rhoccou khylan ko paw nynh na thua oh cipaw kha na ny oh.
Pawccecize, “Hiinnaw kha sungsah ry zah ahoypaw nin`ae muih lan a ry paw ccungccaw nynh tuh a lae kha athahpaw kyate syngkuh sah lah a mung kha hyngbya honaw kyate syngkuh sah.
Athahpaw kha sibia sah lah ahoypaw kha cyih sah; daenaw kha ccung sah lah kha-e kha deesui sah.
Pawccecize BAWIPAW mit tuh adingpaw ccungccaw tungvaw nynh a um. Te mih sawsangnaw`ae kha a nakaring`ae nynh a ngaepya. Thuasalama BAWIPAW mitmae nynh athahpaw ryalah`ae paw kha a dou.”
Nanning tuh ahoypaw uccaw thydokuh`ae paw na thua oh lanze, hung nynh mou nanning kha vawsaw ae pya cih oh?
Thuasalama dingnaw keiccuze na teing oh heize, hythuaccoupaw nynh na thua oh; “Te minmin furawnaw kha rih nan oh, lungvaw mah saw nan oh.”

Thuasalama nae thinlung kya Bawipaw Pachia kha sawtua rawrih oh. Nanning kya um paw ngaehoinaw konglang ae khia oh paw ccungccaw miakaw kha nevyalyanaw te, rinaw te nae zynnaw thungkhawku khylan pei paccynkuh oh.
Ahoy leipaw ryalahtu`ae hawte nanning thethya ae honaw oh kya, Kri kya ahoypaw nae ozia kha ahme lei lante nynh sei kae be cite mih maethya nawlan, ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung kha hoi oh.
Pawccecize Pachia rynaw athua lanze, athahpaw cyipaw hanlan laeze ahoypaw cyipaw hanlan teing lanpaw tuh ahoyhua.
Pawccecize Kri mah seinaw`ae keiccu vaekheit a teing, aening kha Pachia kalan thuakhae khylan adingpaw tuh ading lei`ae paw hanlan pynsaw kya chia athua zemah Muisaw liate hiinsah athua.
Tuh-e Muisaw liate Kri nynh mah cceih zah thunginn kya um paw muisaw`ae kha a thaesah`ae.

Tuh-e muisaw`ae tuh langmaw Noah she lya, sanphalung sak athua lya, Pachia nynh lungsaenaw te phang a ngaw lya`ae kawngae lei`ae paw kha nynh thua`ae, khae sanphalung kya zyataripaw ccungccaw lutarya kha tui liate khum athua`ae.

Tuh-e tuh Jesu Kri thothuinaw liate atu aening yn khum paw baptisma muihsanaw nynh thua. Tuhe baptisma tuh pynsaw kyate athupaw singpaw kha thua khyh, thuasalama ahoypaw mawtemaw nykunaw thinlung kyate Pachia kalan byakinkupaw kha nynh thua.
Tuh-e Kri tuh vaaw ccungccaw`ae, kawhoinaw`ae te thungnaw`ae kha amaw kawngae lan a pyasakuh`ae koute vaawran lang cceih zah Pachia ranglang khe a um vae.

Ou tuhte aening hanlan Kri nynh pynsaw kya a teing hawte, nanning mah tuhhawte alokuhpaw tuanaw-thinlung khate naemaw kha paccaankuh oh. Pawccecize pynsaw kya a teingpaw ccungccaw tuh seinaw kyate phe a lue vae.
Ou tuhte a pynsaw kya a hoi ung paw ccyh kha ccungccaw ryduanaw hanlan a hiin vae khyh nawlan, thuasalama Pachia rynaw hanlan a hiin nawlan nynh thua.

Pawccecize Zenta`ae rynaw cyi paw athua paw sahpawrynaw, ohhuakurynaw, ruinaw, eih hoysakaesynaw, zuaete hoysanaw, luathua-ae-ui lang um paw zohtuhbeiknaw`ae kya ah la ciaku lya oh, alia vae paw ah ccyh tuh phe azaw vae.
Tuh-e kya nanning tuh minmin ryte alokuhpaw ozia roh paw hiinnaw kya na umbua khyh oh paw kha minmin mih ngaeangthua zah nanning kha thethya ae ho oh.
A hiin`ae paw te a chih`ae paw byapia lan a paccynkuh paw amaw kalan mimaw konglang kha a phykuh cih`ae.
Tuh-e keiccu pynsaw kya ccungccaw lante minmin tuh byapia athua nawlan`ae, thuasalama Pachia malang muisaw kya a hiin nawlan`ae, a chih`ae paw kalan mah thehoypaw tuh ho a la thua.
Thuasalama pawpaw balyn athangnaw tuh anae vae; tukeiccu kyhrararih lang um oh lah sawsangnaw elan ngawrando oh.
Pawpaw balyn laeze lukheit te lukheit thawte sungsakunaw hoi oh; pawccecize, “Sungsakunaw nynh tuh seinaw pataepi kha a khawpya.”
Ccohku leite, lukheit te lukheit mikhia thuasakuh oh.
Ccungccaw miakaw nynh lasung kha na mue oh hawte, Pachia thawccinaw aphuinphuin kya-e ahoypaw synriatu`ae hawte, lukheit te lukheit ryalawpakuh oh.

Jesu Kri liate pawpaw balyn kya Pachia tuh phu-esah athua nawlan, lukhakheit nynh phungho lanze Pachia bya thathyhte ho sah, lukhakheit nynh ryalawpya lanze Pachia nynh a pya paw cyi khonaw thyhte lawpah sah. Phuenaw te uknawkaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia amaw kya-e nynh thua. Amen.
Sungsah`ae, ccangpaw mazi athua paw uccaw nanning kya acyikuh paw hawte, nanning syntaw khylan acyihkuh paw, maee lang ruapaw syntawnaw kha ngaeangthua lante tua nan oh.
Thuasalama a phu-enaw langkunaw he yn thua vae ze, myarya lungpawnaw ryte nae lungtuabua nawlan nanning tuh Kri teingnaw`ae a neethungkuh bua`ae paw na thua oh thyhhawte lungtua oh.

Kri min keiccuze sarya na thua oh ze, lungtua paw nynh na thua oh. Pawccecize phu-enaw kya-e Muisaw te Pachia kya-e Muisaw tuh nanning tungvaw a um; minmin kalan te aning tuh thethyaho athua, thuasalama nanning kalan te aning tuh phu-esah athua.
Thuasalama nanning kyaze hung sanmah ccungccatheihpaw hawte, tukhyhze miruhpaw hawte, tukhyhze ahoy leipaw ryalahtu hawte, tukhyhze ccangpaw ccungccaw`ae kong a ccukuh buapaw hawte la teing nan oh.
Tuhzemah lukhakheit nynh Kriccaw athua keiccu a teing lanze a maethah nan sah; thuasalama hynh-e hanlan Pachia kha phu-esah sah.
Pawccecize Pachia innbyn kya byapianaw tho lan accyh azaw vae. Te tuh-e tuh aening kya masaty a tho lanze, Pachia kya-e thehoypaw a ngae lei`ae paw kya-e athangnaw tuh pawcihte athua cih?
Te, “Adingpaw kha kou aru lante khum athua ze, Pachia pawlangria leipaw te miseipaw tuh paw kalan alangkuh cih`ae?”
Tukeiccu Pachia rynaw thyhte a teing`ae paw nynh tuh ahoypaw ryalawnaw kya mih hiinnaw-muisaw`ae kha zyn lan um paw Raetu kalan khe ahkuh`ae sah.
Piccang athuabuapaw, Kri teingnaw`ae kong ccaekia athua paw, te yn langkuh vae cih paw phu-enaw a neethungkuh buapaw mah athua paw, kae nynh nanning laku-e piccang`ae kha thawte kae hy oh.
Dooihtu`ae hawte nanning laku a um paw Pachia tuuphu`ae kha la dooih oh. Nangsepaw liate thua leite, thuasalama lungthote, anungsikuhpaw muenaw hanlan thua leite, thuasalama thawmuinte la dooih oh.
Dooih khylan nanning kalan pya athua`ae paw tungvaw kya bawisaku leite, thuasalama tuuphu`ae hanlan dosuinku lanpaw la thua oh.
Te Tuuringtu Lupi he yn langku vae ze, nanning tuh anaan kho leipaw phu-enaw suilukhung kha na mue cih oh.

Tuhhawte anohua`ae paw nanning, atawhua`ae paw kaw kha ngaepah oh. Athua, nae balynte lukheit te lukheit kawngaepahkuh oh, te zakawsangsakunaw khate ccaankuh oh; pawccecize, “Pachia nynh a tansakuhpaw kha a rawse, thuasalama zakawsangsakuhpaw kha thaw a cci.”
Tukeiccu accyh he yn zaw vae ze nanning kha Pachia nynh ae hangthung nawlan oh, Pachia kya-e a thawsaepaw kuihkaw khe naemaw te naemaw kha zakawsangsakuh oh.
Aning tuh nanning hanlan a tua paw athua keiccu, nae thinphangnaw balyn kha amaw tungvaw khaleih ah oh.
Kyhrarihlan um oh; raeringkute um oh; pawkeiccumacize nae rhawpaw diabolos tuh a sia a ruapaw chindeih hawte hung vema ka laang cih cite ccungte a khiakuh.
Laephipi kya a um paw nae uno`ae tuh khahtahawpaw riathaenaw`ae kha a teing`ae cipaw kha nybiate zynnaw kya varyn tynte diabolos kha la dou oh.

Thuasalama Kri Jesu liate zungzae tynpaw a phu-enaw kalan aening kha yn kotupaw, thawccinaw balyn a hoitupaw Pachia nynh sosoh na teing oh koute, nanning kha ae ccingsah cih oh, ae thadynsah cih oh, thaw ae saesah cih oh zah ae tynsah cih oh.
Amaw kya phu-enaw te thungnaw tuh zungzae te zungzae cia um sah. Amen.

Nanning kha hybiate, na thadynnaw oh paw hynhe tuh Pachia kya-e ahmepaw thawccinaw nynh thua cipaw kha ccaekia langsapyate, Silvanas liate nae kalan ccaw dyntari kae zei. Aning tuh nae hanlan zyn lan um paw unopaw nynh thua cite ka tua paw nynh thua.
Babilon khuapi kya um paw, nanning ryte pynkheihlan po athua paw kriccawbu nynh nanning kha ae beihlang oh; te ka ccapaw Marka nynh mah ae beihlang oh.
Sungsakunaw kya-e myngkunaw khate lukheit te lukheit beihlangkuh oh. Kri Jesu kya na um oh paw nanning balyn kya daenaw la um sah. Amen.
Jesu Kri kya-e locceihtu te seepaw athua paw Simon Piter nynh ah Pachia te Khumtu Jesu Kri kya-e dingnaw liate aening kya-e te alokuhpaw, aphutepaw zynnaw a hoi`ae paw kalan:
Pachia nynaw te ah Bawipaw Jesu nynaw liate thawccinaw te daenaw tuh nanning kya la pungthung sah.
Phu-enaw te hoyhuanaw liate aening yn kotupaw amaw nynaw liate, hiinnaw te Pachia lante zuakunaw te asekuhpaw uccaw balyn kha Pachia a thungnaw nynh aening kha phe yn pya vae.

Tuh-e`ae liate nanning tuh Pachiathuanaw a neethungkuh bua`ae paw na thua nawlan oh, myaryamaw alesaepaw te aphutepaw byakinpyakupaw`ae kha aening pya ah thua oh. Ryduanaw liate laephipi kya a um paw ronaw kyate luesah athuakuh koute nynh pya ah thua oh.
Te hynh-e khylan thawte zuakute nae zynnaw kya hiinzia hoynaw kha biachih oh, hiinzia hoynaw kya nynaw kha biachih oh;
nynaw kya ahmaw sungku khonaw kha biachih oh, ahmaw sungku khonaw kya taemyasawkunaw kha biachih oh, taemyasawkunaw kya Pachia lante zuakunaw kha biachih oh;
Pachia lante zuakunaw kya uteno thawccikunaw kha biachih oh, te uteno thawccikunaw kya sungsakunaw kha biachih oh.
Pawccecize hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nanning kya um zah apungthung lanze, ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynaw kya athae thaesah leite, thanesah leite ae nung lan khyh oh.
Thuasalama hynh-e uccaw`ae ahoboupaw ccungccaw tuh a mitmoh zah asaw lang muih kho khyh, te arynpaw a seinaw`ae kyate aning tuh thyaasapya athua vae cipaw kha phe a ning.
Tukeiccu uteno`ae, nanning konaw te ponaw kha phe riasaku khylan thawte zuakuh paleih oh; pawccecize tuhte na cyi oh lanze nanning tuh na khuliakuh boi lan khyh oh.
Pawccecize hynhcihte nynh ah Bawipaw te oun Khumtu Jesu Kri kya-e zungzae atynpaw peenaw lungkhu lang teenaw kha nanning hanlan phe beih lang raepya athua cih.
Tukeiccu kha-e uccaw`ae kha na nyh oh zah atu e byaccing kya tynsah na thua vae oh zemah, hynh-e uccaw`ae kong nanning kha pei liathuisah khylan kae tuh ka sawphahkuh lan khyh.
Athua, hynh-e bu kya kae ka um lungkhu balyn liathuisanaw te nanning kha lungthosah lanpaw tuh akyhpaw cite nynh ka tua.
Ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri nynh kamaw kha phe yn muihsah vae hawte, hynh-e ka bu tuh aro mawze ka cciataw hahe cih cipaw ka ny.
Tuhlaeze, kae ka chih koute nanning nynh hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh pei na liathui nawlan oh kae thawte ka zuakuh cih.

Pawccecize ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kya-e thungnaw te yn thuanaw lanpaw kha nanning kalan kaening nynh he kae hopya vae oh ze cyiruh-ccaccu lang raenoihpaw phungpaw`ae kha kaening nynh kae mang khyh, thuasalama kaening tuh a lesaenaw kong mit te a muih`ae paw ccaekia`ae nynh kae thua.

Pawccecize, Paaw Pachia kyate sawtuanaw te phu-enaw kha aning nynh he a mue tuh, “E paw tuh ka sungsahpaw ka Ccapaw nynh thua, amaw kya ka lungrythua,” cite Alesae Huapaw Phu-enaw kyate amaw kalan roi yn thua.
Te vaawran kyate yn thua paw tuh-e roi kha athyaapaw mua vawlan amaw ryte kaening kae um lyakhe kae thae.

Te houh ariapaw profehbya kya-e bya kha mah aening ah hoi ung oh. Khua adae makhia nae thinlung kya nizy yn langkuh cia, mohnaw kya a awpaw awnaw hawkhate kha-e bya na ngae oh paw tuh nanning nynh kou hoy lang na cyi oh paw nynh thua.
Ccathyaa kya-e profehbya tuh maw rynaw te asuilan leihkupaw kyate thua khyh cipaw hynh masaty nyh oh.
Pawccecize profehbya tuh ccungccaw rynaw thyhte yn thua boi khyh, thuasalama Pachia kya-e athyaapaw ccungccaw`ae tuh Thyaa Muisaw nynh a cciakhae`ae thyhte nynh a ho`ae.

Thuasalama ccungccaw`ae laku ahme leipaw profeh`ae mah a la um`ae, tuhhawte ahme leipaw ccangpatu`ae nae laku yn langkuh cih`ae. Minmin nynh ccungccaw arosahthya paw ahme leipaw ccangpyakunaw kha aphiru lante yn teekhae cih`ae, te mimaw kha a retupaw Bawipaw hei kha a ei`ae keiccu mimaw tungvaw arangpaw ronaw kha a thuakhaekuh`ae.
Te ccungccaw patae nynh mih kya-e ronawpaw kalan ccianaw kha a zui cih`ae zah minmin keiccuze byaccing kya-e ccianaw tuh thethyaho athua cih.
Duanaw liate hyngpaw bya`ae khate minmin nynh nanning kha amia ae ccungnawkuh cih oh. Langmaw lya mawte minmin byapianaw tuh amaw um lan hung um khyh, te minmin kya-e ronaw mah ih khyh.
Pawccecize aseipaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha Pachia nynh a haang khyh ze, thuasalama hell lungkhu lang boh sah`ae zah byapia khylan nungde zah mohnaw kya-e sivarui te phang a khii`ae ze;
te Pachia rawrih lei`ae paw umnaw laephipi vawlan tuipayn a ynsaku lyakha, arynpaw laephipi kha a haang khyh ze, thuasalama dingnaw phunghotu Noah ry ccungccaw lutarya kha a khum`ae ze;
te Sodom te Komorah khuapi`ae kha dae dawleih te buhaw lang tangsah zah ronaw kalan sei a be ze, Pachia rawri leite a hiin vae cih`ae paw hanlan dosuinku nawlan a rae ze;
te ccungccahoy lei`ae kya-e anungsikuhpaw ozia nynh lungvaw a sawsah paw adingpaw Lot kha a luesah ze,
(pawccecize tuh-e adingpaw ccungccapaw tuh minmin laku a um lya, mih kya-e kawbya pawlangria leipaw cyisahnaw`ae kha nin takyh muihte thaete, adingpaw a hiinnaw-muisaw tuh lungvawsawsah athua),
Oute Pachia rawrih`ae paw kha tuh-ounaw kyate pawcihte nynh luesah lan cipaw, te atazae lei`ae paw kha detah khylan byapianaw nin hanlan pawcihte nynh nungde lan cipaw Bawipaw nynh a ny.

Abapi lante athyaa leipaw kya-e ryduanaw kya pynsaw rynaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw te kawhoinaw pawlangria lei`ae paw kha pawcihte nynh detah lan cipaw Bawipaw nynh a ny. Minmin tuh apuaatho` ae paw, mih ry thyhte a um`ae paw, phu-e`ae paw kha thethya ho lan a rih lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Mimaw laeze thunghua`ae zah mih thawsae huapaw vaaw ccungccaw`ae nynh Bawipaw malang minmin tungvaw kya saryapaw seibenaw kha rae khyh`ae.

Thuasalama minmin tuh kyng khylan te chia khylan rae athua paw, tuanaw hoi leipaw lorangsaw`ae hawte, mimaw nynh a ny lei`ae paw uccaw`ae kong kha thethyaho`ae zah mimaw ccouseikunaw kya khaleih aroh cih`ae.

Te dingleinaw kya-e cyinaw mee kha a mue cih`ae. Khuadae ccyh kya hoysapaw kha minmin nynh lungrythua nawlan a ria`ae. Nanning ryte poitua lya`ae ming`ae lingnaw te ahoysah`ae, minmin tuh akalyhkuhpaw te athupaw abekuhpaw nynh thua`ae.

Lungtyn leipaw ccungccaw`ae kha soih te milae zu milae vawpaw kya seinaw mit te phe beih`ae zah sei leite um kho khyh`ae. Mih thinlung nynh karangkunaw kha thya zah minmin tuh thyalawpaw ccaaw`ae nynh thua`ae.
Minmin nynh ahmepaw ccianaw kha vuasya`ae zah laanpi phe me vae`ae. Beor ccapaw, Balaam ccianaw kha nynh a zui`ae. Balaam tuh dingleinaw mee a ry paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama a cyiseimenaw hanlan aning tuh pe athua. Bya ho leipaw lann nynh ccungccaw roi lante bya ho zah kha-e profehpaw a ngaeenaw kha a khee.
Hynh-e`ae tuh tui a um leipaw tuikhua`ae, khisang nynh po cciakhae paw maeking`ae nynh thua`ae. Minmin hanlan karaezipaw mohnaw kha zungzae nungpya athua.
Pawccecize a cceihsei`ae paw kyate kou ru lante a lue`ae paw kha apokuh paw accakaepaw bya te thuasah, pynsaw ryduanaw`ae te thuasah, ohhuakunaw te thuasah minmin nynh a soih`ae.
Ming`ae kha luenaw kong byakinpyaku`ae lyakhe, mimaw te mimaw tuh ronaw see`ae nynh thua`ae. Pawccecize ccungccaw lukheit tuh ccangkhakheit nynh a tae lanze, aning tuh tuh-e see nynh athua.

Pawccecize Bawipaw te Khumtu Jesu Kri nynaw liate minmin tuh laephipi kyae athu-anangpaw`ae kyate phe a lue`ae koute, kha-e`ae kya bua kaangkae`ae zah kha-e`ae nynh a tae`ae lanze, nyalang e minminthuanaw tuh atakaw laeze houh a seihua vae.
Pawccecize adingpaw laanpi kha phe a nyh kou`ae te, minmin kalan pya athua paw athyaapaw kawpyapaw kyate paleihku lae tuh kha-e adingpaw laanpi kha a la ny khyh`ae ze mih hanlan a la hoyhua cih paw.
Thuasalama, “Ui nynh tuh amaw a lua kha bua a kinua,” te, “A singkuh vae paw vohpinung nynh a ohkunaw ccingccua kha bua a kinua,” acikuh paw ahmepaw phungtangbya thyhte minmin tungvaw kya acyikuh.
Sungsah`ae paw, hynh-e vaeningnaw ccaky hynh atu nae kalan ka zei. Ccaky paryh khate na liathui nawlan oh athyaapaw nae tuanaw-thinlung kha kae thosah oh.
Langmaw lya athyaapaw profeh`ae nynh a ho`ae paw bya`ae te Bawipaw Khumtu a locceihtu`ae athua paw kaening kawpyapaw kha nanning nynh na liathui nawlan oh nynh kae zei.
Masaty ny lanpaw tuh, nyathyakou ccyh kya, mimaw ryduanaw thyhte a hiin`ae paw ccungccaw saryatu`ae oun langkuh cih`ae;
te minmin nynh, “Amaw yn thuanaw lanpaw byakinpyakupaw tuh teisangmou? Pawccecize minpaaw`ae a i`ae ccyh kyate tho zah pawpaw balyn tuh raenaw athonaw kya hawmawte nynh atu mah po acyiku,” a ci`ae.
Pawccecize langmaw lya vaawran`ae tuh Pachia bya liate nynh a la um, te tui akhung lang te tui kya nynh laephi hynh Pachia bya liate a um cipaw,
khaccyh lya a la um paw laephipi kha kha-e tui nynh khaleih vu zah phe aroh cipaw kha minmin nynh riarou nyhry khyh`ae.
Thuasalama atu a um paw vaawran`ae te laephi hynh, byapianaw nin te Pachia pawlangria leipaw ccungccaw`ae ronaw nin kyacia maee te rua khylan kha-e bya liate phang ccy athua.
Thuasalama sungsah`ae, Bawipaw hanlan nin kheit tuh kum thungkheit hawte, te kum thungkheit tuh nin kheit hawte athua paw hynh-e uccaw ccangkheit hynh ny leite um nan oh.

Ccungccaw abang nynh a khysungpaw lante a tua`ae hawte, Bawipaw tuh byakinpyakupaw kong lante a khysung khyh. Thuasalama ccungccaw balyn nynh a ngaesiku nawlan`ae, lukheit san aro lanpaw a ry khyh keiccu nynh aening kya a lungsae.

Thuasalama Bawipaw nin tuh khuazi kya miruh a thua hawte nynh yn thua cih. Tuh-e nin kya vaawran`ae tuh alepipaw siaruanaw khate azo cih, te laephipi raenawpaw uccaw`ae tuh myarya asopaw sonaw nynh palae tuisah cih, laephi mah, te laephi kya um paw ryalawnaw`ae mah maee nynh pung a u cih.
Oute hynh-e uccaw`ae balyn tuh ro athua cih keiccuze, athyaapaw hiinnawzia te Pachia rawrinaw kya pawtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae lang mou thua lan na ccan oh?

Pachia kya-e nin yn thua lanpaw kha ngaehoite na ngaw oh paw thua keiccu tuhte na hiin lan oh paw nynh thua. Tuh-e nin keiccu vaawran`ae tuh maee te ro athua cih, te myarya asopaw sonaw nynh laephipi raenawpaw uccaw`ae kha pung a tuisah cih.
Tuhzemah aening tuh a byakinpyakupaw thyhte dingnaw a umnaw athawpaw vaawran`ae te athawpaw laephi nynh ah ngaw oh.
Tukeiccu sungsah`ae, kha-e uccaw`ae kha na ngaw oh keiccu, nanning tuh athupaw um leite, ccaenaw hoi leite, daenaw kya amaw nynh ae muih nawlan oh thawte zuakuh oh.
Aening nynh ah sungsah oh paw, ah unopaw Paul nynh mah amaw kya pya athua paw hawnaw thyhte nanning kalan phe a zei vae hawkhate, ah Bawipaw ngaesangnaw tuh khumnaw nynh thua cipaw kha la tuathya oh.

Hynh hawte a ccaky`ae balyn kya mah hynh-e uccaw`ae kong hynh a la ho. A ccaky`ae kya thaethya lan arupaw uccaw`ae abang a um. A ccangkuh lei`ae paw te atyn lei`ae paw nynh ccangpaw Ccathyaa`ae kha mah phe a maeleih`ae hawte mimaw ronaw hanlan phe maeleih`ae.

Tukeiccu, sungsah`ae nanning, hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh na nyty vae oh hawte, ccungccahoy lei`ae kya-e cyiseinaw khate cciakhaesei na thua khyh nawlan oh, naemaw na tynnaw oh kyate na khuliaku khyh nawlan oh nanning mah la raeringkuh oh.
Thuasalama thawccinaw kya, te ah Bawipaw te Khumtu Jesu Kri nynaw kya lethung oh. Amaw kya atu te zungzae cia phu-enaw po um sah. Amen.

Athotakaw kyate a um vae paw, tuh-e tuh kaening nynh phe kae thae, kae mit te phe kae muih, hoyte phe kae do zah kae kuih te phe kae haetua paw hiinnaw Bya te asekuhpaw uccaw kha nanning kae hopya oh.

Pawccecize hiinnaw tuh yn langkuh zah kaening nynh phe kae muih vae. Kha-e zungzae hiinnaw kong kha ccaekia kae khan zah nanning kalan kae langsapya oh. Kha-e zungzae hiinnaw tuh Paaw ryte la um`ae zah kaening kalan yn langkuh.

Nanning mah kaening ryte vaeccawkunaw na hoibua ccaw oh cite kaening nynh phe kae muih vae paw te kae thae vae paw kha nanning kalan kae hopya oh. Te thanccingte kae kya-e vaeccawkunaw tuh Paaw te a Ccapaw Jesu Kri ryte nynh thua.
Te nae lungtuanaw phe accing nawlan nynh e uccaw`ae hynh nanning kalan kaening nynh kae zei.
Hynh-e tuh amaw kyate kae thae paw bya thua zah nanning kalan kae hopya oh. Tuh-e bya tuh: Pachia tuh awnaw thua zah amaw kya mohnaw kharyh um khyh.
Aening tuh amaw ryte vaeccawkunaw ah hoi oh cite aening nynh mang ah ho oh zemah mohnaw kya ah um oh ze ah hyng oh paw nynh thua, byaccing kya ah zui khyh oh.

Thuasalama Pachia tuh awnaw kya a um hawte, aening nynh awnaw kya ah um oh ze aening tuh lukheit te lukheit vaeccawkunaw ah hoi oh, te a Ccapaw Jesu Kri chii nynh seinaw balyn kyate aening kha phe oun thyaasah.
Seinaw ah hoi khyh oh cite aening nynh ah ho oh ze ahmaw te ahmaw ah lingkuh oh paw nynh thua. Byaccing tuh aening kya um khyh.
Ahmaw seinaw`ae kha aening nynh ah phykuh oh ze seinaw`ae kha ngaethya lan te dingleinaw balyn kyate aening kha thyaasah lan Pachia tuh zyn lan um zah adingpaw nynh thua.
Aening nynh ah sei khyh oh cite ah ho oh lanze Pachia kha hyngbya ah be oh paw thua zah amaw bya tuh aening kya um khyh.

Ka ccaaw taraw`ae, nanning nynh na sei khyh ccaw oh cite hynh-e uccaw`ae hynh nae kalan kae nynh kae zei. Te lukhakheit nynh a sei lanze, aening oun hokhawtupaw ah hoi oh; amaw tuh Paaw ryte a um`ae paw adingpaw Jesu Kri nynh thua.
Te amaw tuh aening seinaw`ae hanlan lungdaesanawpaw nynh thua. Te aening seinaw`ae hanlan kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama laephi ccungccaw`ae balyn seinaw`ae hanlan mah athua.
Te aening nynh amaw kha ah ny oh cipaw ah ny nawlan oh paw tuh amaw kawpyapaw`ae kha aening nynh ah zui oh ze ah nyh oh.
“Amaw kha ka nyh,” ci zah amaw kawpyapaw`ae a zui leipaw ccungccaw tuh mihyngpaw nynh thua. Byaccing kha kha-e paw kya um khyh.
Thuasalama hunghung zemah amaw bya a zui paw tuh Pachia sungsanaw kha a kya accing ccaccing. Hynhcihte nynh aening tuh amaw kya ah um oh cipaw ah nyh oh.
Amaw kya ka um cite a ho paw nynh tuh Jesu nynh a hiin hawte aning mah a umbua aho.

Uteno`ae, nanning kalan athawpaw kawpyapaw kha ka zei khyh. Thuasalama nanning nynh atakaw kyate na hoi vae oh paw arynpaw kawpyapaw kha nynh ka zei. Arynpaw kawpyapaw tuh atakaw kyate nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh paw bya kha nynh thua.
Athawpaw kawpyapaw ccangkheit nae kalan bua ka zei. Tuh-e tuh amaw kya, te nanning kya akyhpaw uccaw nynh thua. Pawkeiccumacize mohnaw tuh zo cciamang zah ahmepaw awnaw tuh atu phe a aw vae.
Awnaw kya nynh ka um ci zah a uno kha a hua lanze, aning tuh mohnaw kya nynh atu cia phang a um ung.
A uno a sungsahpaw ccungccaw tuh awnaw kya tyn zah thysaku-pawsakunaw lanpaw tuh-e paw kya um khyh.
Thuasalama a uno a hua paw ccungccaw tuh mohnaw kya um zah mohnaw kya nynh a ccia. Kha-e mohnaw nynh a mit phe mohsah keiccuze teilang nynh ka ccia cipaw nyhkuh khyh.
Ccaaw taraw`ae, Bawipaw min liate Pachia nynh nae seinaw`ae kha ae ngaethya vae oh. Tukeiccu nynh nanning kalan kae nynh ccaw kae zei.

Paaw`ae, atakaw kyate a um vae paw amaw kha nanning nynh phe na ny vae oh. Tukeiccu nynh nanning kalan ccaw ka zei. Ccangvae`ae, nanning nynh mihoy leipaw kha phe na tae vae oh. Tukeiccu nynh nanning kalan ccaw ka zei. Ccaaw taraw`ae, nanning nynh Paaw kha phe na ny vae oh. Tukeiccu nanning kalan ccaw ka zei.

Paaw`ae, atakaw kyate a um vae paw amaw kha nanning nynh phe na ny vae oh. Tukeiccu nanning kalan ccaw phe ka zei vae. Ccangvae`ae, nanning tuh nae thawsae zah Pachia bya nae kya atyn keiccuze mihoy leipaw kha phe na tae vae oh. Tukeiccu nanning kalan ccaw phe ka zei vae.
Laephipi hynh sungsah nan oh. Laephipi kya a um paw uccaw`ae mah sungsah nan oh. Ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh laephipi kha a sungsah lanze Paaw sungsanaw tuh kha-e paw kya um khyh.
Pawccecize laephipi kya a um paw uccaw`ae; pynsaw duanaw, mit duanaw, te hiinnaw kya-e tansakunaw tuh Paaw kya-e thua khyh`ae, thuasalama laephipi kya-e nynh thua`ae.
Laephipi te laephipi uccaw`ae duanaw tuh azo avae he. Thuasalama Pachia rynaw hawte a hiinpaw ccungccaw tuh zungzae atyn.

Ccaaw taraw`ae, atu ccyh tuh nyathyakou ccyh nynh thua. Antikri yn thua cih cite nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh hawte, atu ccacceimaw antikri patae um vae`ae. Tukeiccu atu ccyh tuh nyathyakou ccyh nynh thua cipaw aening nynh ah ny oh.

Minmin tuh aening kyate a pou`ae, thuasalama minmin tuh aening te sekuh bua khyh`ae. Pawccecize minmin tuh aening te asekuh bua`ae lanze, aening ryte po a um cih`ae paw. Thuasalama minmin nynh a pou`ae paw tuh minmin balyn tuh aening te sekuh bua khyh`ae cipaw a langsaku`ae paw nynh thua.
Thuasalama Athyaapaw Lukheit nynh nanning kha satho phe ae thuh vae oh, te nanning nynh pawpaw balyn kha na ny oh.

Nanning nynh byaccing kha na ny khyh oh keiccu nynh nanning kalan ccaw ka zei cipaw thua khyh. Thuasalama nanning nynh byaccing kha na nyh oh zah hyngbya tuh byaccing te kharyh sekuh khyh cipaw na ny oh keiccu nynh nae kalan ccaw ka zei.
Hungmou mihyngpaw tuh? Jesu tuh Kri thua khyh cite a ei paw ccungccaw tuh mihyngpaw nynh thua. Paaw te Ccapaw kha a ei paw ccungccaw tuh antikri nynh thua.
Hunghung zemah Ccapaw a ei paw ccungccaw tuh Paaw kha hoi khyh. Ccapaw kha ccaekia a khan paw nynh Paaw kha mah a hoi.

Tukeiccu nanning nynh atakaw kyate phe na thae vae oh paw bya kha nae kya la tynsah oh. Atakaw kyate nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh paw bya nynh nae kya a tyn lanze, nanning mah Ccapaw kya te Paaw kya na tyn cih oh.
Pachia nynh aening oun kinpyakupaw byakinpyakunaw tuh zungzae hiinnaw nynh thua.
Nanning ling lan ae ry oh paw ccungccaw`ae kong lante asekuhpaw hynh-e uccaw`ae kong kha nae kalan ka zei vae.

Thuasalama Pachia kyate na mue oh paw sathothuhnaw tuh nae kya atynpaw zah nanning tuh lukhakheit nynh ccangpyaku na ho vae khyh oh. Tuh-e sathothuhpaw nynh pawpaw balyn kha nanning ae ccangpya oh, tuh-e tuh akyhpaw thua zah hyngpaw thua khyh. Te tuh-e nynh nanning ae ccangpya oh thyhhawte nanning tuh amaw kya na tyn cih oh.
Te ccaaw taraw`ae, atu Ccapaw kya la tyn oh. Ou khate amaw he yn langku vae ze aening nynh zynkunaw ah hoi ccaw oh, te he yn thua vae ze amaw malang maethyanaw ah ccou khyh ccaw oh, amaw kya tyn oh.
Pachia tuh ading cipaw na ny oh lanze, dingnaw a rae paw ccungccaw miakaw tuh Pachia kyate a pui paw nynh thua cipaw na ny oh.

Dotua oh, Pachia ccaaw`ae cite ko ah thua nawlan oh, pawtahawpaw sungsanaw babang mou Paaw nynh aening kha oun pya! Tukeiccu laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh amaw kha a ny khyh`ae keiccuze, aening kha mah oun nyh khyh`ae.

Sungsah`ae, atu aening tuh Pachia ccaaw`ae nynh ah thua oh. Nyalang aening tuh pawte nynh ah thua cih oh cipaw langkuh lah khyh. Thuasalama Ccapaw he yn langkuh te aening tuh amaw te loku bua lan cipaw ah ny oh. Pawccecize aening nynh amaw kha athua thathyhte ah muih vae cih oh.
Te amaw tuh a ccikankuh hawte, amaw kya ngaehoinaw a hoi paw ccungccaw miakaw nynh tuh amaw te amaw kha a ccikankuh.
Hunghung zemah a seipaw tuh Kawbya po aluepaw nynh thua. Pawccecize seinaw tuh Kawbya po luepaw nynh thua.
Te aening seinaw`ae kha cciakhae khylan Ccapaw tuh yn langkuh cipaw na ny oh. Amaw kya tuh seinaw kharyh um khyh.
Hunghung zemah amaw kya atynpaw tuh sei khyh. Hunghung zemah pei a seipaw tuh amaw kha muih khyh zah ny mah nyh khyh.
Ccaaw taraw`ae, hung ccungccaw nynh san ae la ling nan oh sah. Kri tuh ading hawte dingnaw ryalah paw ccungccaw tuh adingpaw nynh thua.
Aseipaw ccungccaw tuh diabolos kya-e nynh thua, pawccecize diabolos tuh atakaw kyate pei a seipaw nynh thua. Diabolos ryalaw`ae kha ro khylan eenaw te nynh Pachia Ccapaw tuh yn langku.
Pachia nynh a saah paw ccungccaw miakaw nynh tuh seinaw kha rae khyh. Pawccecize Pachia kya-e ccacii kha khae paw kya atyn. Te aning tuh Pachia nynh saah paw athua keiccuze sei kho khyh.
Pachia ccaaw`ae te diabolos ccaaw`ae tuh hynhcihte alangkuh: Hunghung zemah dingnaw ryalah leipaw tuh Pachia kya-e thua khyh. A uno a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw mah Pachia kya-e thua khyh.
Pawccecize atakaw kyate nanning nynh na thae vae oh paw phungbya tuh hynhte nynh thua: Aening lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lanpaw nynh thua.

Kain hawte thua nan oh sih, aning tuh mihoy leipaw kya-e thua zah amaw a neitaw kha phe a chia. Pawccemou a neitaw kha a chia? Pawccemacize amaw ryalaw`ae tuh hoy khyh zah a neitapaw ryalaw`ae tuh ading keiccu nynh thua.
Ka uno`ae, laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh ae hua oh ze nae ngaeangthua nan sah.
Aening nynh uteno`ae kha ah sungsah oh keiccuze, aening tuh chinaw kyate hiinnaw kalan ah khung vae oh cipaw ah ny oh. A uno a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw tuh chinaw kya nynh atyn.
Hunghung zemah a uno a hua paw tuh ccungccaw theihtu nynh thua. Te ccungccaw theihtu miakaw tuh atynpaw zungzae hiinnaw a kya hoi khyh cipaw na ny oh.
Kri nynh amaw hiinnaw kha aening hanlan a pyaku. Ou hynhcihte aening nynh Pachia sungsanaw kha ah nythya oh. Te aening mah uteno`ae hanlan ah hiinnaw kha ah pyaku lan oh accan.
Thuasalama ccungccaw lukheit nynh e laephi uccaw`ae kha mang a hoi pite a uno a ryachi kha muih zah ngaethyaumsanaw a hoi khyh lanze, pawtemou Pachia sungsanaw tuh kha-e paw kya a um kho cih?
Ka ccaaw taraw`ae, aening nynh ah bya te kyalya, khalang te kyalya sungsaku lan ccan khyh. Thuasalama cyisahnaw te thanccingte sungsaku lan accan.
Ou tuhte ze nynh aening tuh byaccing kya-e nynh ah thua oh cipaw ah nyh oh zah Pachia malang ah thinlung zynkunaw ah hoi cih oh.
Pawccecize ah thinlung nynh ahmaw kha sei oun be lanze, Pachia tuh aening thinlung laeze lesaehua zah pawpaw balyn pung a nyh paw nynh thua.
Sungsah`ae, ah thinlung nynh ahmaw hynh sei oun be khyh ze, Pachia malang aening zynkunaw ah hoi oh.
Te amaw kawpyapaw`ae kha aening nynh ah zui oh zah amaw lungrythua paw ryalaw`ae kha ah law oh keiccuze, ah ngiaku oh paw miakaw kha amaw kyate aening nynh ah mue oh.
A kawpyapaw tuh e hynh nynh thua: A Ccapaw Jesu Kri min kha aening nynh ah zyn lan oh paw te Ccapaw nynh kaw yn pya thyhhawte lukheit te lukheit ah sungsaku lan oh paw nynh thua.
Te Pachia kawpyapaw a zui paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya tyn zah Pachia mah kha-e paw kya atyn. Te aening oun pya paw Muisaw liate nynh Pachia tuh aening kya atyn cipaw ah ny oh.

Sungsah`ae, muisaw miakaw kha la zyn nan oh. Thuasalama muisaw`ae kha Pachia kya-e thua ta, thua khyh ta cipaw la syntaw oh. Pawkeiccumacize ahme leipaw profeh patae tuh laephipi lungkhu lang phe cceih vae`ae.
Pachia kya-e Muisaw tuh hynhte na nyh cih oh: Jesu Kri tuh pynsaw lante nynh yn thua cite ccaekiakhan paw muisaw miakaw tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua.

Te Jesu Kri tuh pynsaw lante nynh yn thua cite ccaekiakhan leipaw muisaw miakaw tuh Pachia kya-e thua khyh. Tuh-e muisaw tuh antikri kya-e nynh thua. Antikri tuh yn thua cih cite nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh. Te atu ccacceimaw tuh-e antikri muisaw tuh laephipi kya phe um vae.
Ccaaw taraw`ae, nanning tuh Pachia kya-e nynh na thua oh. Te minmin kha phe na tae vae oh. Pawkeiccumacize nanning kya a um paw aning tuh laephipi kya a um paw aning laeze alehua keiccu nynh thua.
Minmin tuh laephipi kya-e nynh thua`ae. Tukeiccu minmin nynh laephi te asekuhpaw uccaw`ae kong kha a hothya`ae. Te laephi ccungccaw`ae nynh minmin bya kha a ngaepya`ae.

Aening tuh Pachia kya-e nynh ah thua oh. Pachia a nyh paw ccungccaw nynh ah bya kha a ngae. Pachia kya-e a thua leipaw ccungccaw nynh tuh aening bya kha ngae khyh. Ou hynhcihte ahmepaw muisaw te ahyngpaw muisaw kha aening nynh ah ny oh.
Sungsah`ae, aening lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh sih, pawccecize sungsakunaw tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua. Te ming`ae a sungsahpaw miakaw tuh Pachia nynh saah paw thua zah Pachia kha a nyh.
Ming`ae a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kha nyh khyh. Pawccecize Pachia tuh sungsakunaw nynh thua.
Hynhcihte nynh Pachia kya-e sungsakunaw tuh aening kalan a langku. Ccapaw liate aening ah hiinbua ccaw oh cite Pachia nynh a hoithypaw a Ccapaw kha laephipi kalan phe oun saw vae.

Sungsakunaw tuh hynh-e nynh thua: Aening nynh Pachia ah sungsah oh cipaw thua khyh. Thuasalama Pachia nynh aening kha oun sungsah zah a Ccapaw kha aening seinaw`ae hanlan lungdaesanawpaw lang cite oun saw.
Sungsah`ae, Pachia nynh aening hynh myarya oun sungsah lanze, aening mah lukheit te lukheit sungsaku lan accan.
Pachia kha hung ccungccaw nynh san vaekheit san muih boi khyh. Aening nynh lukheit te lukheit ah sungsaku oh ze, Pachia tuh aening kya um zah a sungsanaw kha aening kya a ccingsah.
Pachia nynh a Muisaw kha aening phe oun pya vae keiccuze, khahcihte aening tuh Pachia kya ah um oh zah Pachia tuh aening kya a um cipaw ah ny oh.
Laephi ccungccaw`ae Khumtu lang cite Paaw nynh Ccapaw kha yn saw cipaw kaening nynh phe kae muih zah kha-e kha ccaekia kae khan.
Hunghung zemah Jesu tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cite ccaekiakhan paw tuh a kya Pachia um zah aning mah Pachia kya a um.

Te Pachia nynh aening hanlan a hoi paw sungsahnaw kha aening nynh phe ah nyh vae oh zah phe ah zyn vae oh. Pachia tuh sungsakunaw nynh thua, te sungsakunaw kya atynpaw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya atyn. Pachia mah kha-e paw kya atyn.
Byapianaw nin kya aening nynh rawhoynaw ah hoibua nawlan oh, aening laku kya sungsakunaw tuh hynhcihte ccingsah athua. Pawkeiccumacize amaw athua hawte aening mah e laephipi kya ah thuabua oh.

Sungsakunaw kya tuh rinaw um khyh. Accingpaw sungsakunaw nynh tuh rinaw kha ccaring a dee. Pawccecize rinaw nynh tuh riathaenaw kha a thuasah. Rinaw a hoi paw ccungccaw tuh sungsakunaw kya ccingsah thua loh khyh.
Pachia nynh aening kha masaty oun sungsah keiccuze, aening nynh amaw kha ah sungsah oh.

Ccungccaw lukheit nynh, “Pachia tuh ka sungsah,” ci zah amaw a uno kha a hua lanze, aning tuh mihyngpaw nynh thua. Pawccecize phang a muih paw amaw a uno kha a sungsah leipaw ccungccaw nynh a muih leipaw Pachia kha pawtemou a sungsah kho cih?
Te Pachia a sungsahpaw nynh tuh amaw a uno kha mah a sungsah hahe cih, acikuh paw hynh-e kawpyapaw kha amaw kyate aening ah hoi oh.
Hunghung zemah Jesu tuh Kri nynh thua cite a zyn paw miakaw tuh Pachia nynh a saah paw nynh thua. A saahtupaw Paaw kha a sungsahpaw miakaw nynh tuh Paaw nynh a saah paw ccaaw kha mah a sungsah.
Aening nynh Pachia kha ah sungsah oh zah a kawpyapaw`ae kha ah zui oh pawte Pachia ccaaw`ae kha ah sungsah oh cipaw aening ah ny oh.
Pawccecize Pachia sungsah cipaw tuh a kawpyapaw`ae kha aening nynh ah zui oh paw hynh nynh thua. Te a kawpyapaw`ae tuh phuripaw thua khyh.
Pawccecize Pachia nynh a saah paw miakaw nynh tuh laephipi kha phe a tae. Te laephipi a tae paw taenaw tuh aening ah zynnaw oh hynh nynh thua.
Laephipi a tae paw tuh hungmou? Jesu tuh Pachia Ccapaw nynh thua cite a zyn paw ccungccaw kha thua khyh tou?

Tui lante thuasah, chii lante thuasah yn thua paw aning tuh Jesu Kri hynh nynh thua. Tui lante kyalya thua khyh, thuasalama tui lante, chii lante nynh yn thua. Te ccaekia a khantupaw tuh Muisaw nynh thua, pawccemacize Muisaw tuh byaccing nynh thua.
Pawccecize vaawran kya ccaekiakhan paw luthung a um`ae: Paaw lukheit, Bya lukheit, te Thyaa Muisaw lukheit nynh thua`ae. Te hynhe luthung`ae tuh ccangkheit nynh thua.
Te laephi vawlan ccaekiakhan paw ccangthung a um. Tuh-e`ae tuh Muisaw, tui te chii nynh thua`ae. Te hynh-e ccangthung`ae tuh ccangkheit kya mih lungnging.
Ccungccaw`ae ccaekia kha aening nynh ah lawkuh oh ze, Pachia ccaekia tuh houh alesaepaw nynh thua. Pawccecize hynh-e tuh Pachia nynh a Ccapaw kong ccaekiakhan paw Pachia ccaekia nynh thua.

Pachia Ccapaw a zyn paw nynh tuh amaw te amaw kya ccaekia a hoi. Pachia a zyn leipaw ccungccaw nynh tuh Pachia kha hyngbya a hosah. Pawkeiccumacize Pachia nynh a Ccapaw kong ccaekiakhan paw kha aning nynh a zyn khyh keiccu nynh thua.
Ccaekia tuh e hynh nynh thua: Pachia nynh aening kha zungzae hiinnaw phe oun pya vae. Tuh-e hiinnaw tuh a Ccapaw kya nynh a um.
Ccapaw a hoi paw nynh hiinnaw kha a hoi. Pachia Ccapaw kha a hoi leipaw tuh hiinnaw kha hoi khyh.
Zungzae hiinnaw na hoi oh paw kha na nyku nawlan oh, te Pachia Ccapaw min kha na zyn nawlan oh, Pachia Ccapaw min a zyn`ae paw nanning kalan e uccaw`ae kong hynh kae zei.
Te Pachia kya aening rawhoynaw ah hoi oh paw tuh e hynh nynh thua: Aening nynh amaw rynaw thyhte ccangkhakheit kha ah ngiaku oh ze, Pachia nynh yn thaepya.
Te aening nynh ah ngiaku oh paw miakaw aning nynh yn thaepya cipaw ah ny oh lanze amaw kyate ah ngiaku oh paw kha ah mue oh cipaw ah ny oh.

A uno nynh chinaw kalan a phyasah leipaw seinaw a sei paw kha lukhakheit nynh a muih lanze, a hanlan sawsangpah cih. Te chinaw a phyasah leipaw seinaw a rae`ae paw kha Pachia nynh hiinnaw a pya cih`ae. Chinaw kalan a phyasah paw seinaw a um. Kha-e seinaw hanlan sawsangpah sah cite ka ho khyh.
Dingleinaw balyn tuh seinaw nynh thua. Te chinaw kalan a phyasah leipaw seinaw a um.
Hunghung zemah Pachia nynh a saah paw tuh sei khyh cipaw aening ah ny oh. Pachia nynh a saah paw nynh tuh amaw te amaw kha a ringkuh. Te mihoy leipaw nynh amaw kha tung kho khyh.
Aening tuh Pachia kya-e nynh ah thua oh cipaw te laephipi khaleih tuh mihoy leipaw kuih kya nynh a um cipaw ah ny oh.

Te ahmepaw amaw kha ah ny nawlan oh, Pachia Ccapaw tuh phe yn thua vae zah aening kha thaethyanaw phe yn pya vae cipaw ah ny oh; te aening tuh ahmepaw amaw kya te a Ccapaw Jesu Kri kya nynh ah um oh. Aning tuh ahmepaw Pachia thua zah zungzae hiinnaw mah athua.
Ccaaw taraw`ae, zohtuh`ae kha la sibia oh. Amen.

A kum tang vae paw kae, Johan nynh, byaccing kya ka sungsah`ae paw, popaw bawinung te a ccaaw`ae kalan ccaw kae ky oh. Kae kyalya nynh kae sungsah oh paw thua khyh, thuasalama byaccing a nyh`ae paw balyn nynh ae sungsah oh.
Kaening kya um zah kaening ryte zungzae a um cih paw byaccing keiccu nynh nanning kha kae sungsah oh.
Paaw Pachia kyate thuasah, Paaw a Ccapaw, Bawipaw Jesu Kri kyate thuasah byaccing te sungsakunaw kya thawccinaw, ngaethya-umsanaw te daenaw tuh nae kya la um sah.
Paaw kyate kawpyapaw kha kaening nynh kae mue thyhhawte na ccaaw`ae abang nynh byaccing kya a ccia`ae paw kha ka muih tuh myarya ka lungtua.

Bawinung, athawpaw kawpyapaw hynh na kalan kae zei khyh. Thuasalama atakaw kyate kae hoi vae paw kawpyapaw kha nynh kae zei. Atu nang kae ngia ry paw tuh aening lukheit te lukheit sungsakuh oh sih cipaw nynh thua.

Te a kawpyapaw`ae thyhte aening nynh ah hiin oh paw hynh nynh sungsakunaw cipaw tuh athua. Atakaw kyate nanning nynh phe na thae vae oh hawte, kha-e kawpyapaw kya na cceih cih oh cipaw kha nynh kawpyapaw tuh athua.

Pawccecize ccungccaw lingtu`ae patae laephipi lungkhu lang phe tee vae`ae. Minmin nynh Jesu Kri tuh pynsaw lante yn thua cipaw ccaekiakhan khyh`ae. Khahtahawpaw ccungccaw tuh ccungccaw lingtu te antikri nynh thua.
Aening nynh rya ah law oh paw kha ah shung khyh nawlan oh, thuasalama phe ccing paw ryalaw mee ah mue nawlan oh, naemaw te naemaw la raeringkuh oh.
Hunghung zemah Kri ccangpyanaw kya tyn khyh zah kawngae leipaw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kha hoi khyh. Kri ccangpyanaw kya atynpaw ccungccaw tuh Paaw te Ccapaw kha paryh a hoi.
Kha-e ccangpyanaw kha ccyngku leite, ccungccaw lukhakheit nynh nanning kalan yn thua lanze nae inn lungkhu lang la thuasah nan oh. Beih mah la beih nan oh.
Pawccecize kha-e paw kha a beih paw ccungccaw tuh kha-e paw kya-e ahoy leipaw cyisahnaw`ae a neethungkuh bua paw nynh thua.

Nanning kalan zei lanpaw uccaw`ae patae ka hoi zemah ccanaw te ccatui te zei lan ka ry vae khyh. Thuasalama ah lungtuanaw phe abia nawlan nanning kalan kae thua cih zah nanning ryte hawiliakute byabeihku lan cipaw ka ngaehoi.
Po athua paw na neitanung a ccaaw`ae nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae. Amen.
A kum tang vae paw kae, Johan nynh, byaccing kya ka sungsahpaw, kou sungsahpaw Kaias kalan ccaw kae ky.
Kou sungsahpaw, na hiinnawmuisaw a pungthung hawte, nang tuh pawpaw balyn kya na pungthung nawlan te na ngedan nawlan saw kae sangpah.
Pawccecize nang nynh byaccing kya na hiin thyhhawte, nang na kya um paw byaccing kong kha uteno`ae nynh oun thua`ae zah ccaekia he khan`ae tuh myarya ka lungtua.
Ka ccaaw`ae nynh byaccing kya a hiin`ae cipaw ka thae paw lungtuanaw laeze ale huapaw lungtuanaw ka hoi khyh.
Kou sungsahpaw, nang nynh uteno`ae kya te mikhia`ae kya na cyipya`ae paw miakaw tuh zyn lan um lante nynh na cyi.

Minmin nynh nang na kya-e sungsakunaw kong kha kriccawbu malang ccaekiakhan`ae. Nang nynh minmin kha mih khuaccungnaw kya Pachia ccaaw te angaekuh lante na saw`ae lanze, nang tuh kou hoy lang na cyih cih.
Pawccemacize minmin tuh amaw min hanlan cceih`ae zah Zenta`ae kyate pawsang mah lawkuh khyh`ae.
Tukeiccu aening tuh byaccing rya a lahbua`ae paw ah thua nawlan oh khahtahawpaw ccungccaw`ae kha aening nynh lehkhan lan accan.
Kriccawbu kalan ccaw phe ka zei vae; thuasalama minmin lakuze lupi huapaw lang tang a ry paw Diotrephes nynh kaening kha kaw yn ua khyh.

Tukeiccu kae thua vae ze amaw a cyisahnaw kha a liathui nawlan a cyipaw kha ka dianah cih. Aning nynh ahoy leipaw bya`ae te kaening kha sarisarya oun ci. Te tuh-e te a lungryachih khyh zah uteno`ae kha mah innccung ua khyh`ae apiaze innccung ua ry`ae paw kha mah phe khee`ae zah kriccawbu kyate minmin kha a dee`ae.

Kou sungsahpaw, ahoy leipaw kha kaheihlawkuh nan, thuasalama ahoypaw kha lawkuh. Ahoypaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kya-e nynh thua, thuasalama ahoy leipaw rya a lah paw ccungccaw tuh Pachia kha muih vae khyh.

Ccungccaw miakaw nynh Demetrias a hoynaw kong kha ccaekiakhan`ae, te byaccing nynh mah a kong ccaekiakhan. Te kaening nynh mah a kong ccaekia kae khan. Te ccaekia kae khan paw tuh akyh cipaw nanning nynh na ny oh.
Kae nynh zei lanpaw uccaw patae ka hoi ung. Thuasalama ccatui te ccaccung te na kalan ka zei ry vae khyh.

Thuasalama aro maw nang kha kae muih cih zah hawiliakute lukheit te lukheit byahoku lan cite ka ngaehoi. Daenaw na kya la um vae sah. Kae ruiban`ae nynh nang kha ae beihlang`ae. Ruiban`ae kha mih min te la beih`ae.
Jesu Kri seepaw, te James neitapaw, kae Jude nynh, Paaw Pachia liate thyaasah athua`ae paw te Jesu Kri kya ccy thua`ae zah ko athua`ae paw kalan ccaw kae ky oh.
Ngaethya-umsanaw, daenaw te sungsakunaw tuh nanning kya la pungthung sah.

Sungsah`ae, aening nynh ah mue kalang oh paw khumnaw kong kha nae kalan zei lan thawte he ka zuakuh lyakhe, mithyaa`ae kalan vaekheit te zungzae cia a la pya vae`ae paw zynnaw hanlan nanning nynh thawte na dou nawlan oh nanning kha hy khylan nae kalan ccaw zei lan aho.

Pawccecize ccungccaw abang tuh nanning laku aphirute zya oun tee vae`ae. Minmin tuh langmawpi te seibenaw hanlan syntaw ah thua vae`ae paw, Pachia pawlangria lei`ae paw nynh thua`ae. Minmin tuh ah Pachia kya-e thawccinaw kha pynsaw eih ohhuakury nawlan a rulae`ae paw, te amakhae kyalya paw Bawipaw Pachia te ah Bawipaw Jesu Kri kha a vua`ae paw nynh thua`ae.
Tukeiccu, Bawipaw nynh Israel ccungccaw`ae kha Izip ram kyate phe a khum`ae, tuhkoute a zyn lei`ae paw kha phe bua a ro`ae cipaw kha nanning nynh phe na va ny vae oh zemah bua kae liathuisah ry oh.

Te masaty e mih thuanaw thyhte a um lei`ae paw, thuasalama mih umnaw phe a cciataw`ae paw vaaw ccungccaw`ae kha alesaepaw nin kya-e byapianaw hanlan, mohnaw zakaw khe zungzae atynpaw sivarui te Pachia nynh phang a khung`ae.

Tuhhawte Sodom te Komorah, te mih pepan e khuapi`ae mah tuh-e`ae hawkhate mimaw te mimaw kha ohhuakunaw kalan pyakuh`ae zah ccaccangpaw ngesaw rynaw kalan a zuiku`ae keiccu, zungzae maee te detahnaw kha a teing`ae, ou khate kha-e`ae tuh dosuinkupaw lang nung athua`ae.
Tuhhawte hynh-e maansatu`ae mah mih pynsaw kha a nungsisakuh`ae, kawhoinaw kha pawlangria khyh`ae; te a lesae`ae paw kha thethya a ho`ae.

Tuhzemah vaaw ccungccaw lupi Mikhael tuh Mawsi a rhua konglang te diabolos ryte doukuh`ae zah he a eikuh`ae tuh sanruinpaw seibenaw kha honua ngan khyh, thuasalama, “Bawipaw nynh nang kha ae pe sah!” a cipya.

Thuasalama kha-e ccungccaw`ae nynh tuh mimaw nynh a ny lei`ae paw kha-e uccaw`ae kong kha thethya a ho`ae; thuasalama nythyanaw a hoi lei`ae paw sarangpaw`ae hawte, puikhaepaw nynaw uccaw`ae khate mimaw te mimaw kha a rosaku`ae.

Minmin tuh paw ngaethya lan a um babang! Pawccecize minmin tuh Kain ccianaw kya nynh phe a cciabua vae`ae. Te amia mue khylan Balaam cyiseinaw thyhte karangkute dekuh bua`ae zah Korah a dounaw kyakhe phe roh`ae.

Minmin tuh nanning ryte poi he a tua`ae tuh na ry oh paw poi`ae kya ri leite, mimaw te mimaw kyalya loohdangkuh`ae paw, abekuhpaw athupaw nynh thua`ae. Minmin tuh khivae nynh po a cciakhae paw khuatui a um leipaw maeking`ae; vaening a chihpaw, atharui kyate phe khohbia`ae paw, athae a um leipaw, tangvaw ccyh-e thingku`ae;
mimaw maethyanaw tuiphua a pousah paw rili kya-e kou rupaw tuileih; po amohpaw mohnaw kha zungzae cia paccynpya athua paw azoupaw awsi`ae nynh thua`ae.

Te Adam kyate she sarinaw athua paw Enok mah hynh-e`ae kong hynh profehbya a ho.
